1b1(rgyud): /rgyu gar skad du/shrIDAkAN+Tha ba ma hA yau gin+ti tan+t+rar+yA dzA nA ma/ba
1b2(rgyud): skad du/dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya
1b3(rgyud): oM sangs rgyas dpa' bo la phyag 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das gsung
1b4(rgyud): mnga' bdag la phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
2a1(rgyud): na/bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo chen po'i dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
2a2(rgyud): kyi dpa' bo'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi b+ha ga rnam su rtsen pa dang ldan par gyur to//
2a3(rgyud): der dpa' bo chen po'i dbang phyug gis bka' stsal pa/bde ba chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis//dbang po'i dri ba
2a4(rgyud): bdag gi mthong //'khor ba dang ni nges 'byung gis//mya ngan 'das pa so sor skyed//de yi dbusu skye
2a5(rgyud): chen po//bdag gi dbang po yis rig go/dpa' bo rang gi rang bzhin ni//ye shes rgya mtshor mnyan
2b1(rgyud): par gyis//rnal 'byor ma 'khor lo dbus su//phag mo bdag ni 'dri ba'o//dbang po'i dra ba tsi ru byA shad//bdag gis gang du
2b2(rgyud): bshad par bya//mthong ba dang ni chen po'i sgra//bde ba za ba de bzhin ci//ting 'dzin mong ci de la ni//byung ba nyams par byas
2b3(rgyud): pa dang //'khor ba yang dag byung ba ni//gang du thim par 'gyur ba yin//bcom ldan mya ngan 'dus pa'i ming //ji ltar sbyor
2b4(rgyud): yang yongs su skyed//skur brjod pa ni gsung bar mdzod//nyid kyi dbang pos rig pa ni//bde ba chen po bzhugs gyur pa'i//
2b5(rgyud): bdag gi badrug pus gsung par mdzod//dpa' bo'i dbang phyug chen pos bka' stsal pa/phag mo lha rdzas pad+ma ca na//lha mo
2b6(rgyud): gcig yid kyis nyon//sngon du spyod pa'i mtshan nyid ni//mdor bsdus pa yis bshad par bya//dbang po 'jig rten mchog
3a1(rgyud): chos ba shad//dra ba de la yid rol pa'o//bdag gi nga rgyal tsam gyis ni//dam tshig mchog glang byung
3a2(rgyud): ba'o//de phyir ye shes che mthong ste//thibs chen bde la bzhugs pas so//gang du dbang po rnams kyis za//de yis nga yi meng
3a3(rgyud): sngon song //de tshe ting nge 'dzin tsam du//thub pa skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs//yang dge lhag rtogs ye shes ni//spangs
3a4(rgyud): rgyas rnams kyi lha dbang pos//de rnams su byung ba'i sbyor bas//mkha' 'gro mchog mang gis byas so//bde dang mi bde gnyis
3a5(rgyud): nyams las//slar yang 'dir ni byung ste//sgra yi gzugs las byung zhing 'thon//dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yulo//sems
3a6(rgyud): gsum rnams kyi dbye ba yis//sgrub mo khyod kyis shes par gyis//'di yis rang byung bcom ldan 'das//dpa' bo mkha' 'go
3b1(rgyud): dra ba'i sdom//'byung dang 'byung po'i dus su ni//yongasu gsal ba 'od gsal ba'o//de phyir 'jig rten 'khor bar byed//de ni 'khor bar yongasu brjod//
3b2(rgyud): 'dir ni sgyu ma skyes de bzhin//de ni thim pa'i dngos po'ang med//myang 'das gzhan pa'i rdzas yod yin//'khor ba yi ni phyi rol son//srid pa'i rtse mo gang 'dzin
3b3(rgyud): pa//de phyir mya ngan 'das par brjod//gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu'i sku//de yi gnas la rnam par 'phro//bdag chen ye shes gzugs kyi ni//dbang pos
3b4(rgyud): gsal bar rig pa ste//lha dang sbyin byed la sogs pas//mi mtho nga mkha' la 'gro ba'i gzugs//lha khyod kyis ni gsung rnams kyi//ye shes chen pos
3b5(rgyud): ros bdag tshim//de ring bdag lo the tshom mchis//dpa' bo rnams kyi rang bzhin ci//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dpa' rnams thams cad
3b6(rgyud): rang bzhin te//rang bzhin de rnams chos can no//'dir ni 'dod pa dus brjod de//'dod pa sems las yongasu byung //'dod dang sems gnyis dgra
3b7(rgyud): las ni//byung ba gzugs ni gtso bo'o//'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba//thog ma dbus mthar yang dag gnas//gang zhig mtha' ma rnams kyi sems//
4a1(rgyud): sems de ro mnyam gyuran//dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba las//mkha' 'gror de ni de phyir byung //rdo rje mkha' 'ablo de ni de phyir byung /
4a2(rgyud): rdo rje mkha' 'gro bdag nyid che//sku gsum po ni bsgrub par bya//gang tshe sngon du yang dag byung //'gro ba'i gtso bo tshangs pa'o//gnas nang de bzhin ji ltar stong /
4a3(rgyud): mgon po sems can rnams grol byed//de tshe 'jig rten khams gzhan gyis//chung ngu 'dir ni bskul ba'o//gson gson byang chub spros son pa'i//
4a4(rgyud): sems can bsgral ba'i sems med po//sgyu ma'i rang bzhin khyod bzhugs nas//khyams gsum ma lus bsgral bar mdzod//yon tan ngag 'di thos nas ni//
4a5(rgyud): sems can grol byed 'di ltar skom//de bzhin gshegs pa kun rnam pa//'gro ba'i gtso bo he ru ka/dpal ni sngon du mngon brjod pas//rten la sogs pa
4a6(rgyud): bskyed pa ste//glo dang rol mo dri za dang //gzhan rnams gang rnams de rnams dang //'gro ba'i sde dang las dang ni//de yi rgyuni las yongasu byung //de la
4a7(rgyud): sogs pa mtha' med dang //stong phrag sum cu rtsa gsu mo//gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na//thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu zhugs//de nyid rnam pa bcu
4b1(rgyud): drug dang //skye ba dang ni thim pa'i rgyu/rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma de nyid//zla ba'i dbye bas 'gro ba'o//dga' ba rtag tu shes byas nas//chos gcig zla bla 'phel bas so//nug
4b2(rgyud): pas gas dang hUM/ mapa yang /byung dri dri bzhon 'dir shes bya//'di skad thos pa bdag gi dag/gsang ba'i 'dod pa thams cad ster//de bzhin 'dir bdag the tsho ma mchis
4b3(rgyud): gsang ba la sogs gsung ni ci//bdag gi bdag pos gsung por mdzod//sems can rnams kyi don byed pa//lha mo chen mo bdag dga'o//sems can kun gyi dgos pa'i
4b4(rgyud): rgyur/mdor bsdus bdag gis bshad bya ste//rtse gcig pa yi sems kyis nyon//gsang ba khoms thams cad kyi mtha'//dbang po'i gnas ni mchog yin la//rnam
4b5(rgyud): shes phyin tsho gus de rnams//dgyes pa na mkhye' las byung ba'o//thams cad bdag nyid khams gsum gyi//khyab pa'i gzugs yang dag son//rtag bzhugs
4b6(rgyud): gnyi su med pa'i chos//sgyum+b+ha rmi lam lta bu mchog/yid na bdag med bcu drug dang //khyad par du yang snying rje //dri yi rnam pa ye shes che//de kho na nyid kun tu
4b7(rgyud): sa dang 'dir ni skye bar go bya bo//rnal 'byor rje su rnal 'byor//them pa sgrub pa gnyis dang ni//de bzhin bsnyen pa gnyis kyang //rnal 'byor TIg le re ba shad
5a1(rgyud): pa ste//phra mo'i rnal 'byor rnal 'byor pa'o//dus kyi phyed dang zla ba yis//rdzogs ldan gsum gnyis rtsod dus son//'di yi rdo rje'i zhal
5a2(rgyud): bzhi po//dga' ba brgyad gnyis su 'gyur ste//tshe shes bcu drug rnam ldan pa'o//phyogs kyi dbye bas 'gro ba'o//thung ngu nyi ma'i rgyu ba yis//de bzhin du ni cha shas
5a3(rgyud): za//bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgyu//gnyis med ye shes bla na med//byang chub sems 'od chen por ni//rnal 'byor chen po nges por 'gro//stong nyid snying rjes dbyer
5a4(rgyud): med de//dngos rnams na mkha'i me tog bzhin//sad pa na yang nyams pa ste//de gnas kun tu gnas min pa'o//rmi lam yul med las byung ba//dbang po kun
5a5(rgyud): las byung ba med//gnyid log pa yi stobs kyis ni//sa gsum po ni bza' bar bye//gnyid mthug skyes pa'i dus de ltar//sad med gnyid med rmi lam med//'das
5a6(rgyud): pa'i bde ba'i dus rnams su//sangs rgyas nyid kyang lag par gnas//mkha' 'gro kun dngos sems dpa' ni//rdo rje mkha 'gro mchog tu bde//las kyi yul ni bsnyen
5a7(rgyud): byas na//sum cu rtsa gsum du lhung ngo //ma rig pas slang nges par ni//'gro ba dmyal sogs 'jigs pa che//de'i phyir sangs rgyas chos dge 'dun//rdzu 'phrul che 'dir
5b1(rgyud): a chags bya//dza ltar bcom ldan 'das bdag po//mkha'agro makun gyi ni myong //do ni badrug la sems dpas gdung //mkha' blo kun la bdag mchog tu//gsang ba der ni btud/
5b2(rgyud): byas nas//phag mo lha rdzas rnal 'byor ma//gnyis med tshig gis ji ltar zhes//de bzhin yang nas yang du dris//mkha'agro ma'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa/phra mo'i rnam pa
5b3(rgyud): rtse gsum ste//rnam par shes pa gsum gyi rgyu//de phyir phra mor rig bya ste//rtsa 'byung ba ni bdag nyid che//sum cu rtswa bdun rnal 'byor ma//re re l-i ni de yongs ldan//
5b4(rgyud): mkha'agro ma kun der bshad de//gzhan yang de ltar ngo mtshur che//ming mdor bstan pa'i rgya mtsho 'dir//de kun ji lta bzhin bshad bya//zla ba 'o ma snum pa mo//'jam pa
5b5(rgyud): 'dod ma kun sbyin ma//ma dang sring mo bu mo dang //sring mo bu mo ne ne mo//gnyen mo pheM yi ma dong ni//zhang po yaM yang chung ma dang //pad+mo can dung can sna tshogs ma//glang po
5b6(rgyud): ma dang mos brlabs ma//gzugs ma sgyu ma dri ma dang //ro ma reg ma yang ma dang //chos dbyings ma dang tshogs can ma//gnyid ma lo lo ma gzhan min na//rlom pa mo dang /
5b7(rgyud): sgeg maM dang //bzang zhal ma dang drag mo ma//'thung zhing za ma 'jigs pa mo//ha ha sgrogs mo dur khrod ma//bcom ldan dgyes mar rtag tu bshad//sum cu rtsa bdun rnal
6a1(rgyud): 'byor ma//las kyi cho ga blangs pa yis//gzhan gyi ming yang shes par bya//gang zhig gang gir mngon brjod pa'i//rtsa de 'dir ni brjod pa'o//de
6a2(rgyud): rnams sems dpa' bde rang bzhin//mthar gyur mchog tu zhi ba'o//rdo rje mkha'agro'i dngos po yang //mchog tu zag med rnal 'byor ldan//mdog dang phyag sogs
6a3(rgyud): rnam pa ru//srid pa'i 'khor lor yang dag byung //gnas dang nye ba'i gnas sogs 'dir//pul+li ra sogs dbus su'o//gang zhig gang gi lha bdag po//de ni de dang
6a4(rgyud): des rgyas gdab//nyid dang bdag tu rtsen gyur pas//bde ba kun dang yang dag ldan//'di yis rang byung bcom ldan 'das//gcig pu de bzhin dang po'i lha//mkha 'gro/
6a5(rgyud): ma kun bde ster ba'i//bcom ldan rdo rjes 'di gsungaso//na mkha' thog ma tha ma med//gang 'drar mchog tu 'du shes pa//de 'drar bdag ni rig pa ste//snang med par
6a6(rgyud): yang yongs su gsal//der ni 'byung ba'ang yod min te//'jig rten pa yi tha snyad mchog/ji ltar mkha' las me byung ba//bla med me 'dir de bzhin ni//ro bro ba
6a7(rgyud): ni gcig dngos la//de yi nang na dngos mang po//gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin 'dis//thams cad ro ste ro'i khyab bdag/pho nya rnams kyi bdag po yis//sa gsum po
6b1(rgyud): ni mchog tu za//thabs dang shes rab snying rje che//lha yi bdag po gzhan med do//'dod chags ma yin chags bral min//dbu ma yang ni mi dmigaso//de ltar rtag shes rnal
6b2(rgyud): 'byor pas//'dod bya kun la longs spyad bya//rtag tu nang du gyur byas nas//kha dog rnams ni zhal las byung //rtag tu lus kyi sbyin pa ste//sems las byung ba spang bar bya//de
6b3(rgyud): ltar 'dod chags sgyu mtha' la//rol po mchog gi go 'phang ngo //'dod chags bral ba dga' ba gsum//spangs pa dbu ma zag po med//bzung bar bya ba min pa ste//dngos po'i rang //
6b4(rgyud): bzhin 'dod chags min//bral ba'i dga' ba nyams pa ste//de la'ang dga' bar mi bya'o//de gnyis dbus ni gnas pa yi//chos de la yang dga' dmigs med//dbye ba med pa
6b5(rgyud): yi ni chos//rdo rje la ni dga' bar bgyis//lha yi rnam pa'i rnal 'byor bdag/skad cig mngon sum byed pa'o//lugs ma la sogs rnal 'byor gyis//rnam par byas pa'i dbyib
6b6(rgyud): su 'gyur//stong nyid rang bzhin gzugs rnal 'byor//rab byin rlab pa'i mtshan nyid do//bdag byin rlob dang bral rnal 'byor//spun skogs dum bu bzhin shes bya//'di 'dri'i
6b7(rgyud): mtshan nyid mchog gyur pa//skye bo phyugs rnams kyis mi shes//de phyir sgyu 'phrul 'di bsgo mas na//byang chub bla na med pa 'thob//skye ba 'di la glen pa nyid//shes rab snyan
7a1(rgyud): dngags skyes bur 'gyur//'di 'dra'i yon tan tshogs ldan pas//rmi lam dang ni mnyam par ltos//rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud//'gro ste de
7a2(rgyud): phyir 'jig rten pa'o//mngon sum rang nyid sngags kyi sku//'khor lo gsum rnams nyis 'gyur ro//gcig la 'khor lo gsum bshad do//gnyis la nyis 'gyur du
7a3(rgyud): ni 'dod//'khor lo gsum po thabs shes rag/snyoms par 'jug par 'chad pa'o//de ni nyis 'gyur zhes bya ste//'khor lo nyis 'gyur des bshad do//khams
7a4(rgyud): gsum gyi ni gnas chen po//dkyil 'khor 'khor lo sgom pa'o//dpa' bo thams cad ma nyam sbyor ba//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/de bzhin gshegra pa dpal
7a5(rgyud): dbang che//bcom ldan rdo rjes 'di gsungaso//chos dang chos min gang du nub//byang chub der ni sems bzung gyis//grub pa lha dang lha ma yin//dbang po dang ni yul
7a6(rgyud): dang ni//khams dang skye mched thams cad ni//skye ba dang ni 'gag pa ste//rmongs pa'i ching zhing mkhas pa ni//yongasu shes pas grol ba'o//sems 'di rang nyid mngon
7a7(rgyud): sum du//khams gsum du ni rnam par gnas//bdag dang mchog khyod gnyis med las//tshogs pa'i gtso bo byung ba'o//spyod lam la sogs bye brag chos//mdo sde
7b1(rgyud): rnams shes dbu ma pa//mos pa'i sems can rnams bshad de//bden pa ma yin brdzun pa min//phyag ni bcu gnyis dang ldan te//de bzhin zhal ni bzhi pa'o//khwa dog nam
7b2(rgyud): mkha' sngon po la//spyan gsum brkyang bskum ldan pa ste//'phrog byed dkar mo mnyam par mnan//gzhani 'bum tsho stong phrag/gang dang gang gi rgyud kyi ni//phyi dang gsang
7b3(rgyud): ba nang bdag nyid//de dang de yi gzugs nges pa re//lha ni he ru ka'i bdag nyid//rgyud dang rgyud kyi nang mchog tu//dbye ba mos pa'i dbang gis te/ming ni de ltar shes par//
7b4(rgyud): byad 'on kyang he ru ka bsres pa'o//kha dog de dang 'drar shes bya//bzhugs tshul he ru ki'i rnam pa//sa ni bcu gnyis rnams kyi rgyu//de yis he ru ka dang 'dra//rdo rje mkha' gro/
7b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs//dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor bya//rdo rje sems dpa' badro ba'i mchog/bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungaso//dpal mkha' gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor
7b6(rgyud): ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa ste/'di ni le'u dang po'o////pheg mo lha rdzas rnal 'byor mAs//slar+ya yang rdo rje mchod byas te//
7b7(rgyud): bcom ldan bdag pos bstan par mdzod//phag mo ci yis yongs su byung //bskyed pa gang gis bskyed pa yin//rang bzhin ji ltar du ni 'dod//bdag byung ba
8a1(rgyud): rgyu mtshan ci//'dir ni dgos pas ji ltar yin//dbang po dang ni yul thams cad//lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du rab zhugs//spyi bo'i rdo rje gur
8a2(rgyud): du ni//steng du kha bltas rlung 'bab bo//'dod chags nyi ma'i dbus su ni//skad cig gis ni sprul thim gyur/der skyes pa yi phag mo ni//b+ha ga ling ga yid las
8a3(rgyud): byung //bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin khams//de rnams las ni sngon du skyes//rang bzhin bdag mo dA gcig pu ste//mkha' mnyam rnal 'byor gzugs can no//rgyu
8a4(rgyud): mtshan skye bo dgrol ba dang //snying rje'i gzugs rang bzhin du byung //'dir ni dgos pa gnyis rig ste//phyag rgya sbyor ba rab bsgrub pa'o//khyod ni lha mo'i bdag
8a5(rgyud): ste//kun tu spyod pa mang spyod pa'o//sngags kyi phreng ba brje byas nas//a yig la sogs de'i khyab bdug/yang na phag mo'i rtsa ba dang //go cha'i sngags rnams kyis
8a6(rgyud): ldan to//yA gau re re'i sngags kyi ni//spyod pa sdom par son pa'o//rab 'byor ma mchog skye ba ni//rtswa yi mchog gi grong du ste//stong phrag bdun cu rtse gnyis kyi//dbus
8a7(rgyud): ma a ba d+hU ti'i 'o//dbu mo 'di ltar thams cad kyi//khyab byed du ni rnam par gnas//de phyir phag mo gtso mo yin//go 'dang mchog bzhin shes par bya//rdo rje la sa/
8b1(rgyud): snyi nA pa//adzar+d+ha dang ka dz+ra rje//sngags mthar de la stsogs pa ste//yang na sa sa thA dud du'o//gang gis dum+b+ha sngags zlos pa//de dus rnams rnal 'byor ldan//
8b2(rgyud): da snun du//de ltar 'bre du 'ong ba med//depe bo rnal 'a ma gtsats+tsha/dA ni ri ni nyid rnam par 'o s+ho//rang gi 'khor lji ni rnaM'i 'gyur ma//zhing deng snying rnam
8b3(rgyud): sau nI 'gro// mo khyod ni bdag pa ste//da dang lhan cig kha sbyar ro//dus dang thuni ma yin par//nA ni khA'i bu g+ha'i nang 'dug nas//de bzhin skyo gnas lam mthon nas//
8b4(rgyud): 'chi ba med pa'i sa bon 'jug/der ni 'pho med ye shes bya//tig pyid yi ges bsgom bya ste//myi mo skyes bu'i dus yang //mchog tu zag mod mngon par bya//de byung
8b5(rgyud): ba yi rig ma che//sgom pa'i bdag nyid kyis bri'o//thag mar rnam snang mgon po ste//ri mo suM maskor ste 'og gnas//langs nas maman pa'i bar du 'gro//suM gsum
8b6(rgyud): sgron ma lta bur sun//gzhan pa'i sngags ni sa mtha' 'dra//de las zla 'brebra ga yan naso//sngags 'di thig les rgyun pa ste//sngags ni rnal 'byor ma skyed po//slar
8b7(rgyud): yang sa bon gnyis pa brjod//g.yas pa nyi ma bskyed pa ste//log su gnyis phye mgor thig le//ya sde'i mtha' yi sa bon no//byang chub sems tshon 'babo la mo//'di
9a1(rgyud): ni phag mo'i sa bon yin//a yi yi ges mthar rgyan pa//bcu drug zla phyed nyi mas rgyan//ya sde'i dang po'i sa bon ni//sbyor bas su gsum rlung ston//
9a2(rgyud): dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pas rgyas gdag/dkar po'i phyogs kyis mgo bor rgyan//thithog le dang ni bcas pa 'bar//dga' ba bzhi pa dag pa'o//pa sde'i mtha' ma bde
9a3(rgyud): ba'i gzugs//o yi yi ge zhon ldan pa//mgo bor zla phyed nyi mas mnan//sa yi pha rol gzhom med ma//nyi ma yi ni gdan la gnas//dbyangs kyi bzhi pa rna drung bzung //
9a4(rgyud): mgo bor zla phyed thig len rgyan//'dod chags mtha'i rang bzhin no//ye shes sa bon nyis 'gyur dbye//spro ba dang ni byasdu bas skyes//'og dang steng du gnas pa yi/
9a5(rgyud): mgon po longs spyod rdzogs 'dzin pa//snying kha dang ni chu ste su//don gyi cho ga yongasu rdzogs pa'o//yongasu skrag bye mas bon//pa mtha'i yi ge bzung nas ni//slar
9a6(rgyud): yang de bzhin brjod par bya//dbu rgyan 'bar ba 'dzin grong gi/bu gar gtum mo sbyor ba'o//byang chub sems kyis sa gsum 'gengs//de ltar bshad pa'i sngags
9a7(rgyud): gang ni//rim pas yi ge rnams mi mthun//rnal 'byor ma yi ming ldan par//las dus de ltar rtogs par bya//re re'i che ba'i bdag nyid ni//yi ge yi ni grangs kyis//
9b1(rgyud): bdag nyid chen po rnam par 'phro//byang chub cha shas cha rgyu'o//thog mar rnam snang phyag 'tshal ba//chos kyi dbyings ni bya ba'i gzugs//tA sde'i lnga pa'i yi ge ni//lnga pa yi n+da/
9b2(rgyud): sde mtshan no//rnal 'byor ma gzugs na mkhar rten//pa mtha'i sa bon+d+ha i dpyongs ldan//gti mug 'joms par byed ma ste//rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs spro ba'o//de yi
9b3(rgyud): bzhi pa'i sa bon ni//sau gsum du ni khyab pa yi//rnal 'byor ma ni spro ba'o//tho gau ma'i sde yi gsum pa ste//'gro ba drug po nyams byed pa'i//mkha'agro ma yi 'khor lo
9b4(rgyud): spro//ya sde'i mtha' ma'i sa bon ni//byang chub sems kyi rang bzhino//lnga pa'i sde yi tho ga mA ste//de bzhin nyid kyi sa bon te//I yi dbyangs kyis mgo la reg/chu yi yi
9b5(rgyud): gi yongs bsags pa//thams cad byed pa'i rang bzhin//ce sde'i dbus gnas be zung nas ni//nyi ma yI ni gdon ldan pa//lus kyi dus su khyad par ldan//phug mo yi nI
9b6(rgyud): sa bon ni//a yi yi ge rnam par reg/sa gsum ye shes rang bzhin mnyam//me yI sa bon dbyangs gnyis ldan//'khor ba'i lus kyi rang bzhi no//sematha'i mgo lnga
9b7(rgyud): dbyangs reg/rtag tu tshangs pa'i rang bzhin blta//dbyangs kyi gnyis pa bzung nas ni//de ltar mkha' 'gro ma yi gzugs//sems can sgrol bar byed pa'o//ya yig
10a1(rgyud): gnas par dang ldan//slad yang oM yo dbyangs smra'o//khams gsum rnal 'byor ma spya//drug pa'i b+hU yi dang ba ni//rnal 'byor ma sngags kun rang /
10a2(rgyud): bzhin//ra gnas pa ni oM dbyangs ldan//ldang ba'i sems can gsod byed 'gyur//dza yi maM gi yongs gzung/oM yig dbyings dang yang dge ldan//sgyu ma'i rang bzhin
10a3(rgyud): yongs ldan pa'o//sa yi sa bon nu be le//e yi dbyangs kyis reg pas //klu yi sngags ni sbyar bya ste// yi ge sa gsum kun//ye shes k+She ni khyod par sngags//
10a4(rgyud): la yi yi ge oM dang ldan+tu//'jig rten rnams kyi rten yin te//byang chub byed pa'i don yin no//thog ma'i ka ni ya stan ldan//'chi dang lhan skyes dbye ba med//pa yi sde la
10a5(rgyud): mtha' ma lA//a yi yi ge'i dbyangs sbyor bya//sa gsum gyi ni ma rang bzhin//ta yig e yi yi ges brgyun//bde ba 'dzin par byed pa'o//slar yang ba snga'i mtha' ma ste/
10a6(rgyud): tshad med pa y-i wAn skyes kyis//dbus ni bzhugs pa'i rang bzhin no//sa yi mtha' ma A dang ldan//rdor sboms ye shes gzhom med pa'o//yi'i sde'i mthe' ma i sh+tsa
10a7(rgyud): ldan//mi shes rang bzhin 'joms byed pa'o//kye sngags chos dbyings rang bzhin te//thams cad rang bzhin du khyab pa'o//bu ga rnams nas 'dzags pas//'bab po /
10b1(rgyud): bon nyi ma ldan//rgyu skyon dbyung y-i n+ti sngags//bsta bzhi pa s+yA dz+nyAn ni//m+b+ha dbyung sa s+thAn dang ldan pa ste//'khor ba'i 'jigs pa nyams byed pa//tA yi sngags sa
10b2(rgyud): dgra rnams byed// yid pa'i sde'i bzhi pa ni//sgra chen po ni sgrogs pa'o//rlung gi yin A yig reg/sdigs ni nor bur 'bab bzhin pa'o//chu lo sa bon rna ge nung go/
10b3(rgyud): sgyu ma yi ni rang bzhi no//sa yi pha rol e yig ldan//sa gu sum g+hi ni 'khrul 'dzems rgyu//pA sde'i mtha' ma rkang rang bzhin//sa yi pha rol a dung ldan//ngo mtshar cha bA yi ni
10b4(rgyud): chos//ya ye ste yi mtha' ma ni//pad+ma'i sa bon sna tshig yig/tsa yi dbus ma'i sa bo ni//rA nI myeg+ho lA gnas pa ste//e yig gis ni phye bA ni//lce dang lha min rang bzhin no//
10b5(rgyud): de ltar sdug tshigs drug po ste//rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs spro ba//las kun rang bzhin 'khor lo'o//snying rje'i 'dod par gyur pa yi//de kho na nyid tshig rgya che//rnal 'byor thams
10b6(rgyud): cad rab 'gengs pa'i//bcom ldan mkha' gro 'di gsungaso//'khrul 'khor 'khor lo bshad bya ste//khyod kyi 'khrul 'khor chung rgya che//kun nas yongasu zlum por ni//ri mo
10b7(rgyud): bcu gsum bri bar bya//lha mo dum bu bcu gnyis 'gyur//sum cu rtsa drug rtsibs kyis rgyan//rtsibs re re la'ang yi ge ni//rimo pas yongasu gsal bai ra sbyin//lhag ma
11a1(rgyud): nyi shu bzhi yi ge/thams cad lte ba'i snying po la'o//de rnams kyis ni bskyed pa'i rtsa//stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis//sngo so re re yi ni 'khor//nor dang /
11a2(rgyud): mda' dang zla ba'o//kun la lhag pas dman pa ni//nor dang rig byed tshogs pa'o//der gnos pa la 'khrul 'khor ba tu//las gcig ji ltar mos pa'o//rnam par shri
11a3(rgyud): pa'i gzhom pa ni//rtsa thams cad du 'char dus su//der ni dbang po dang ni yul//las kyi dus su bsad par bya//yid ces bya ba bskrang bya zhing //sems ni dbang du bya ba ste//
11a4(rgyud): khams dang skye mched gzhan de bzhin//zhi ba dang ni rgyas par bya//phung po kun drang de bzhin srog/dgug pa dang ni spang ba'o//lus dang ngag dang de bzhin sems//de rnams
11a5(rgyud): rengs par bya ba'o//las gzhan ji ltar rigs pa yis//brgyad kyis lhag pa'i brgya yang ngo //yang na sa bon ci 'dre ba//de yi tshad dang mnyam las so//de dus bdag nyid
11a6(rgyud): che ba yis//yi ge swa skyed dang 'joms pa'o//phag mo rdo rje gtso mo yi//'khrul 'khor gnyis pa bshad bya ste//ya sde'i mtha' yi sa bon ni//byang chub sa bon rang bzhi no//
11a7(rgyud): lce gnyis yi ge ra yig ldan//rnal 'byor ma sngags I yig dgang //se gnas pa ni mi g.yo ba'o//ni yaM yi ge ai dang ldan//sems can kun sprul rgyu mtshan no//thog
11b1(rgyud): gnas dbyangs ni thog ma'i mgon//lce gnyis u dbyangs mgo la rnyeg/sa gsum khams kyi rang bzhin no//ta yi yi ge e dang ldan//lnga pa yi ni thog mA ste//rnal 'byor ma yi
11b2(rgyud): rang bzhin no//ya sde gzhir gnas pa yi sa bon//kun gyi gtso mo'i rang bzhin no//brgyad pa'i sde yi thog sa bon//stong pa yis ni rgyan pa ste//khu ba'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid//
11b3(rgyud): gnyis par gnas pa'i thog ma ni//keng rus thig le 'dzin pa'o//ya ste gnyis pa'i sa bon ni//I yI dbyangs dang ldan pa ste//rdo rje snying nas mgon po'o//ta thA e yi yi ges
11b4(rgyud): rgyan//skye gnas la ni spras pa'o//ta yig nyi ma dang ldan pa//rIms 'joms pa yi rgyal po'o//b+ha ni nyin ldan a yige rgyan//lte ba'i thab tu gnas pa'o//pa sde'i mtha' ma
11b5(rgyud): granas rang bzhin//Ta mtha' i yis rgyan pa ni//'gugs pa yI ni rang bzhi no//bI sho ShA Shi sngags bzhi ste//dga' ba bzhi yi rang bzhin gyi//gter chen po yi sa bon no//ra
11b6(rgyud): yigra o yI yi ges rgyan//rtsa drag po yi rang bzhino//sha yi gnyis pa'i sa bon ni//snying po yi ni gzugs su'o//Ni yig rang bzhin gyis gzung ba//rnal 'byor mi yi de nyi do//
11b7(rgyud): ka yig ra yig oM yig ldan//dbu ma rkyang ma ro rang bzhin//ta ba'i bar gnas bzung bar bya//rnal 'byor ma yi tshegs kyi ni//rkang pa brgyad pa sgrub rang bzhin//ta sde'i mtha' ma/
12a1(rgyud): e yig rgyan//thod pa'i dbus kyi rtsa rang bzhin//ka ru mngon brjod bzung bar bya//de yis las rnams zad par byed//ra yig a yi yi ges gzung //mgo
12a2(rgyud): bo'i dbus nas sgra chen 'dzag/sa yi sa bon i yig ldan//gru gsum gyi ni dbus su'o//ta yau mtha' ma is rgyan pa//sprul pa'i steng dang 'og tu'o//ta yig ra yig A
12a3(rgyud): yig sbyar//chos kyi dbyings ni gru gsum ste//de phyir sa gsum skyed pa'o//sa bzung dbus ma bcas sa bon//na yig I dang ldan rang bzhin//pa sde'i mtha' ma a yis
12a4(rgyud): rgyan//sgyu ma'i ngo bo pad+ma'i rtsa//rA gang gar+Ya pa rna rang bzhin//Ta sngo'i mtha' ma i dang ldan//ma lus dbyer med sems can gyi//khams 'dzin pa yi mgon po'o//de ltar sAH/
12a5(rgyud): tshig ba nu brjod de//dus bzhi yi ni tshad can no//rnal 'byor me kun las kyi ni//'khor los bsgyur ba longs spyod pa//dus kyi gzugs kyi rang bzhin can//bcom ldan lha
12a6(rgyud): yis 'di gsungaso//mkha' gro ma gnas 'du ba ni//'khor lo 'khor lor shes pa'o//nyi khri ba rgya phrag bcu drug gi/ye shes las ni de bzhin byed//yon por smra ba rnams
12a7(rgyud): kyi ni//de'i rdul grangs pa sa skyes par 'dod//bsgrub par bya ba'i ming bzung nas//phyi nas blo ldan gyis sngags sbyor//sngon du pa la ra bstan//thog mi ya ni chos gzugaso//
12b1(rgyud): de yI bzhi par gnas pa la//e yi yI gles rnir rgyan pa//rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi sngagaso//ta sde'i dbus nas ci 'dod ster//nA yi ga i yi yi ge ldan+da//sna tshegs sprul pa byed pa'o//
12b2(rgyud): pa yig spros pa dang bcas pa'o//rwa yi yi ge oM dang ldan//rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor lo sgyur//tsa sde'i dbus gnas sa byon gzung //gang la de lta'i rlung bzhi no//rlung ba sogs/
12b3(rgyud): pa ni e yig ldan//a haM yi ge'i rang bzhi no//ya yi sde yi mtha' ma la//dbyangs kyi ga sum pas mgo la rgyan//sna tshogs ye shes sngags rang bzhin//dza yi sa bon mtha'
12b4(rgyud): med par//'bar bar 'gyur ba yi ni gzugs//yi ge ye ni e yig ldan//theg pa kun gyi lta ba'i gzugs//tsa sde'i gsum pa'i sa bon ni//rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs zhes
12b5(rgyud): bya//pa mtha' de yi bzhi pa la'o//sngags thams cad kyi bla ma'o//ta sde'i mtha' ma dbyangs gsum ldan//ma lus sems can 'bod pa'i gzugs//dro ba'i gsum pa ta stan
12b6(rgyud): can//'gro dang mi 'gro bcas 'gro sgol//de bzhin m+ba'i yi ge bzung //sa ni bcu bzhi pa'i gzugaso//ni sngags rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi//brda yi su ni 'jug pa'o//pa sngo'i mahA/
12b7(rgyud): ma aM yig reg/sna tshogs mi shes 'dzin pa'o//sa mthar rdor sems rang bzhin no//ni yi yi ge chos dang ni//chos min sun 'byin pa yin no//ya yi sde yi mtha' ma ni//rnal
13a1(rgyud): 'byor mAs+t+rai nu mkha'i gzugs//dz+nyA yIg+ga ra yag bstan can no//khu Sh+Ti rang bzhin shar ba'o//slar yang rlung gi mtha' ma ni//a yI ye gas
13a2(rgyud): gzo bskyed pa//tshangs pa pad+ma yi ni gzugs//raM yig a yi yi ge ldan//'gyur ba med pa'i rang bzhi no//sa mtha' dbyangs gsum mgo la gnas//rnal 'byor ma rnams
13a3(rgyud): 'bab po'i gzugs//ma ni dbus ma de nyid gzugs//sa mtha' e yis bkrang ba ste//rnal 'byor ma gzugs kyi khar brjod//ya yigra o yI cod pan gnas//lhan
13a4(rgyud): cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin no//ka sde'i dbus gnas dbyangs gsum rgyan//de nyid med pa'i rang bzhin no//de yi yi ge rang bzhin med//gnyis pa yi ni thog ma la//a mi
13a5(rgyud): yi ge gsal bar byas//'dod pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin no//pa sngo'i mtha' ma e dang ldan//thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin no//pa yi sa bon mthar sha ste//ya sde'i mtha'
13a6(rgyud): yig stag can ni//khu ba dang ni rlung dbyer med//I dbyangs mgor rgyan me sa bon+ya//grub pa sgyu ma'i rung ba sbyin no//ka yi gnyis pa'i sa bon ni//na mkha' rnal 'byor ma
13a7(rgyud): yi gzugs//sa boni de yi mtha'i yi ge/e yi yi ges rnar brgyan pa//dpa'o gcig pu mi bskyod pa'o//de ltar 'khor lo mkha' rang bzhin//de ltar rkang pa dgu
13b1(rgyud): po ni//rnal 'byor ma tshogs yi ge ste//khyams gsum gyi ni sngags rang bzhin//sngags kun spyod pa'i sbyor bdag nyid//mkha' 'gro'i dam tshig la bcu
13b2(rgyud): nas//dngos grub thams cad rab gsol ba'i//bcom ldan lha yis 'di gsungaso//'khor lo gsum pa'o nus pa yis//ji ltar 'dod pa'i las bya'o//rnal 'byor/
13b3(rgyud): rnams kyi las dus su//sgyu mas thams cad rmongs par bya//rdo rje ma bdag slar langs nas//'khor lo gzhan gyi rnal 'byor ldan//mchog tu mi 'gyur gtso bo la//bdag
13b4(rgyud): med ma yi dam 'khyudado//ti yai sngags kyi gnyis pa sbyor//bya gnas me dang rlung sa bon//bde ba chen po'i 'dod chags che//de yi gnyis pa sa bon ni//a yi yi ges dgang ba'o//
13b5(rgyud): 'byung ba chen po bzhi rang bzhin//pa yi ge raM yig oM yig sbyar//gsum po rlung gi rang bzhi no//ta yi yi ge aM yig ldan//slar yang rnam shes sa bon no//ka yI sde yi dbus gnas
13b6(rgyud): pa//e yi yi ges rnam par rgyan//rnal 'byor ma'i phyag rgya rang bzhin//slar la yang nI brjod par bya'o//tshig 'di thabs shes dbyer mAng drangos//sa mtha' dang ni ne yi sngags//
13b7(rgyud): slar la yang ni brjod par bya//skyed cing sdud par byed gzugaso//pa ra a yig sa bon gcig/don dam pa yi yi ge'o//Ta mtha' A yi yi ge ldan//gzhom du med las skyes/
14a1(rgyud): pa'o//ta'i mtha' ma kun 'joms pa'o//ka ka drung ni Na gnas la//dbyangasu gsum sbyar zhing thig le sbyin//rnal 'byor ma kun 'bod pa'o//de bzhin du ni kha
14a2(rgyud): kha dang //gsum pa Na ru gnas pa'o//dub pa sel bar byed pa'i rgyu//d+hu na yi ni sngags kyi tshig/lon gnyisu ni brjod par bya//rtog pa thams cad 'joms par byed//
14a3(rgyud): sde'i mtha' ma ya ni sngags//rdo rje bu gar rgyan pa'o//tsa sde'i dbus gnas sa bon ni//ra yi stan la yongasu gnas//geti mug za par byed pa'o//sa mtha' gzhom med dbus
14a4(rgyud): ma'o//shra sde'i gsum pa hastan can//e yi yi ge rnam par rgyan//sna tshogs mkha' gro ma yI gzugs//'bod par byed pa yi ni sngags//sho Sha ya yi sngags kyi tshig/
14a5(rgyud): lan gnyi su ni brjod par bya//ye shes can rlom nga rgyal 'joms//byang chub byang chub med de nyid//de ltar rked pa bcu gnyis ni//sa dang rnal 'byor las rang bzhin//bcu gnyis/
14a6(rgyud): pa rnams khyab bdag gi/bcom ldan lha yis 'di gsung ste//yi gau rnams kyi gnas sogs kyi//badz+ra yas de nyid pha rol 'gro/bdag las sems can thams cad skyes///
14a7(rgyud): las kyang bdag byung //bdag de rtag tu med gyur nas//sgyu ma rmi lam de bzhin gshegs//'khrul 'khor 'di ni stobs che ste//las rnams ji lta bar ni byung //rdo rje mkha' gro'i
14b1(rgyud): mtshan nyid du//dus 'dir thams cad 'gyur ba'o//'khor lo lnga pa 'di rnams//mya ngan 'dus pa'ang brjod par bya//lta sogs thams cad rgyun du gsod//de rnams thams//
14b2(rgyud): rtag tu 'grel//bka' stsal pa/ka yi gnyis pa'i sa bon ni//rnal 'byor mu'i tshogs de nyid do//nu bzung po mtho'i stan can te//a~M gas N+Di dpin+de brgyan par bya//de la a
14b3(rgyud): yi yi ges dgang //'gro ba drug gi rang bzhi no//kasde'i dbus gnas sa bon ni//dug gis reg pa 'phrog par byed//ka yi sa bon stong rang bzhin//na yi mtha' ma oM yig ldan//
14b4(rgyud): me 'bar ba yi dbang ldan te//'dzin pa yi ni sa bon ni//spyod pa'i khyab bdag chen po'o//ta yI sde yi bzhi pa ni//a yi dbyangs kyis brgyan pa yi//sred pa dang bral ba yi gzugs//
14b5(rgyud): nyi ma a yig ldan ro langaswa//ta mtha'i sa bon bzung bar bya//dbyangs kyi gsum pas mgo la brgyur//sa gsum thams cad gsod pa'o//pa sde'i mtha' yi sa bon ni//yid kyi sgra
14b6(rgyud): ba rtog med byed//sa mtha'i A yi dgra ldan pa//thar pa'i bshos ni rtog pa'o//ma gnyiswA ha ginyis brjod par bya//rmongs pa'i rang bzhin 'phrog cing 'phrog/pa yi sa bon i yig
14b7(rgyud): rgyan//pa nags kun nyams gzung de nyid//sha yi yi ges i dang ldan//seng ge za ba yi ni sngags//ta'i sngags slar yang 'chi med skye//pa mtha' a yi yi ges dgang //thig le
15a1(rgyud): da ngan la reg pa'o//rgyu m+bu chub d+d+ho/sa pa yin//sa yig dbyungs gnyis brjod b+hin+dar+thAnA//skyon du 'phrog byung b+h+yo pa'o//shU gnas sa don du da //
15a2(rgyud): mtha' spyi dang ldan pa ni//thams cad rang bzhin med pa'o//pa sde'i maH ma oM dbyangs ldan//steng ba'i yin+dan ni dzin chen po//nA lcig u n+da rtog kun sel//bi sde'i gnyi
15a3(rgyud): pa'i sa bon ni//e yige mgor reg thig la gnas//byang chub sgrub pa yi nI sngags//bur du sil ba'i rlung gi so//tre dang rol yi gas gnyis//sa ni 'jigs par byed sngags
15a4(rgyud): so//par A yi sa bon+da gcig/sum cu rtsa gsum skyo du ba 'joms//ya sde'i mtha' ma ri mnan pa//ye shes kyi ni dag byed do//Ni yi 'gram gnas sa bon ni//i yin
15a5(rgyud): bar rgan pa'o//rnal 'byor pa yi mi shes 'joms//so yig a yi yi ges dgang //dbugs 'chad pa ni nyams par byed//ma yi sngags gsum mgo la phyin//chos de
15a6(rgyud): chos yin spong rang ldan no//d+hA yIg sa dang sbyang ba ste//bsam gratAnA sngags kyi rang bzhino//ta sne'i mtha' ma bzung bya ste//grong khyer ltar snang dngos po med//yo ste'i gnyis
15a7(rgyud): ba'i sa bon ni//gti mug ring bzhin 'bar ba'o//sa yig yi yi ges dbye//seng ge ma te 'jams pa'o//nyi mar yang ni gnas pa ni//rnal 'byor makun rgyal po'o//bsde'i
15b1(rgyud): mUny+dza ma u dbyangs rgyal//sgyu mar sems can kun nges 'dzin//'dzin pa'i sa bon a yig rgyan//de kho na ye ye shes thob//de ltar rkang pa bcu bzhi po//sems can kun gyi
15b2(rgyud): mi shes gsod//dam pa'i sngags dngos gzugs bdag nyid//'byin cing sdud par byed pa po//'byung po thams cad 'jigs byed pa//bcom ldan lha yis 'di gsungs//'khor//
15b3(rgyud): lo rnam pa'i gzugs bdag nyid//phyag mo'i thugs khar rgyan pa ste//stong nyid snying rje byed med pa rA//gsod pa dang ni mi gsod pa'o//ka sde'i dbus na re stan can//gsum da'i
15b4(rgyud): mgo la thig le sbyin//theg pa mchog gi chos cano//tA sde'i ga tipa'i yi ge ni//i yi dbyangs dang ldan pa'o//mu stegs rnal 'byor nyams byed pa'o//ta yig
15b5(rgyud): rtos par byed pa'o//tA sI'i gzhir gnas A dang ldan//byang chub mtha' med 'dzin pa'o//ra gnas pa la dbyangs gsum rgyan//rnal 'byor ma kun 'chang ba'o//na sngags
15b6(rgyud): yi yig gis rgyan pa'o//rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi la mo//sum+b+ha b+ha na yi tshig rkang ste//lan gnyi su nI brjod par bya//tshig drug rtog sa pA'i de nyid do//de bzhin du ni
15b7(rgyud): sum+b+ha'i sngags//rnal 'byor ma yi mcho de rang bzhin//ha na'i sngags ni lan gnyis brjod//sdang ba'i theg pa nyam par byed//pa ra a yi yi ge gi cig/dbang po ring rang
16a1(rgyud): ngo bo gzhun//Na a oM gI yI gos dgang //sa bon 'di ni yon tan sngags//sa yig rtswa kun 'jug pa'o//pa yig ra yI yIg rgyun ri//pa gnas nam
16a2(rgyud): mkha' la 'jug pa'o//sa yi yig gnas kun gyi gzugs//ya sde'i mtha' ma I yis dgang //rlung ni srog gi ye sheso//na yig A yI yi ges dgang //byang chub
16a3(rgyud): gang du'ang mi rtog pa'o//thig le mgo la blta bar bya//pa sde'i mtha' ma spyad chen gzugs//sa mtha'i A yis dgang bar bya//rnal 'byor ma yis tshogs srog go//pa ma
16a4(rgyud): a dang ldan pa la//aM gi cod pani la rgyan pa'o//chos kun gyi ni sprin rang bzhin//sa yig dam chos mi shes gsod//ts+tshe sngags byang chub sems dpa'o//sod pa 'khor bar
16a5(rgyud): skye ba med//ta sde'i dbus gnas sa bon ni//da ni don med pa snang ba'o//na la i dang ldan pa ste//'jig rten ma lusa'i tshong ba nyid//kr-i sngags gnon pas 'khor ba gcod//
16a6(rgyud): d+haM yI swa bon 'gro kun 'joms//spros pa med par byed pa'o//mU yi yi ge sa bon ni//rmongs pa'i 'jig rten kun gyi las//de ltar byed bac+doMs tshig bcu bzhi//rtsa ba'i khor
16a7(rgyud): po yi ni maH'o//bum pa can la sogs pa'i las//rnal 'byor gang dang gang 'dod byed//'khor lo drug gi rab sbyor bas//ci 'dod las kyi rang bzhin te/
16b1(rgyud): bdag pa sbyor ba grub nus rdzun//bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung ste//gtsug tur la sngogs skye gnas mthar//lus dag samasA shAs nA ma kha' las//lags
16b2(rgyud): 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yis//de nyid byang chub rnams shes bya//'dir ni thabs kyi cha dang ni//shos rab kyi yang cha ru brjod//yang na yi ge re re yi//bar bar du ste slar
16b3(rgyud): yang ni//d+hi sngags lhan skyes rang bzhin te//'khor lo yi ni khyad par gyi//nye ba'i las rnams byed pa'o//dr-iSh+Ti ka rA li yi sngags//'gro ba rnams kyi rang bzhino//ma sngags ha
16b4(rgyud): sngags mu dr-i'i sngags//rU ba yi ni rang bzhin no//shrI t+te ru ka de ba stu gro ma hi Sh+Ti'i//sngags tshig sna yi rang bzhin no//sra ha sra shi rI li sdigs//
16b5(rgyud): dbyings kyi bdag po yi ni gzugs//sar+b+ba sra bA~M ha bA ye//sngags kyi yi ge lus kyi gzugs//sha ta sna'i sngags 'khor gcig/mkha' gro ma'i sngags 'chi ba dang //skye ba
16b6(rgyud): so ni rang bzhi no//gnyis med rnam pa'i chos las ni//gnyis sems can 'dzin pa ste//shes rab la ni bde steng ba//bcom ldan bla mas 'di gsungaso//nyan thos la sogs mu
16b7(rgyud): stegs rnams//me shes pa yi phyugs thams cad/de rnams ye shes 'thob byi'i phyir//tshul lugs 'di ni bstan pa'o//ha s+the na na yi ni sngags//yul gyi gzugs la
17a1(rgyud): rag pa'o//dz+wA la ta te dza sa'i sngags//sngags kyi rlig ni yid kyi yul//dz+wA la mu khi'i tshig+sa lus yul//bi gram can yi sngags//mig gi rnam par shes pa'o//
17a2(rgyud): badz+ra sha rI re'i sngags//lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o//badz+nyA sa ne yi ni sngags//sna yi yul la rag pa'o//mi li tI ya sngags kyi tshig/sna yI rnam par shes pa'o//tsi li te yi
17a3(rgyud): sngags kyi tshig/dbyangs kyi bdag po ye ni yul//he sngags gnyis brjod sgra yi yul//sgra dang dbyangs gnyis kyi rnam shes//da ltar sngags tshig phyed bcas bdun//'chi dang
17a4(rgyud): skye ba kun gyi gzugs//phag mo la ni bde dga' ba'i//bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung ste//bo la ka ko sbyor bdag nyid//yul dang dbang po sogs gsod pa'o//sems can
17a5(rgyud): gong dang gang rnams kyi//yul gyi chu skyes las skyes te//sems can de dang de rnams kyi//rang rang las rnams kyis gsod pa'o//yul la sogs pa 'joms pas na//shes rab
17a6(rgyud): 'khor lor de bshad//rgyu dang rgyud rnams kyi ni laso//sgrub pa'i snying po'i ye sheso//sa mtha' drug po'i dbyangs stan can//zla dum thig les mgo la brgyan//lan gnyis su
17a7(rgyud): ni brjod par bya//rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba'i gzugs//kha gnyis rgyu gnyis mu ru gnyis//las rnams kyi ni dngos po ste//srog dang mnyam du gnas pa'o//a dwe te ma
17b1(rgyud): yau gi nI//pa Thi ta si d+he'i sngags kyi tshig/de yang lus mtha' ya ni gzugs//dre d+haM tshig gnyis gra mya tshig granyis//he yI tshig gnyis ha tshig gnyis//khro bcu'i ye ge bshin
17b2(rgyud): rje ni//mthar byed la sogs kyir gor bya//pa sde'i bzhi pa'i sa bon la//I yig mgo la reg pa'o//me si'i sngags ni tshig kun te//mkha' 'gro ma yi rang bzhin no//de ltar/
17b3(rgyud): sngags tshig bcu gnyis ni//rten 'brel bcu gnyis slu ba ste//ston pa dam tshig chen po gtso//bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungaso//rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis kyi//
17b4(rgyud): las kyi lhan cig rmugs byed pa'o//pho nya rnams bskyed pa'i yi ge/'khor lo'i rnam pa'i rang bzhin can//'khor lo yi ge min de ltar//pho nya'i rang bzhin med pa'o//rnam smin de
17b5(rgyud): las rnam skyes pa//so so'i ming du 'du shes te//'jom rdor la sogs dngos po yis//a ba dU tI'i mtshan nyid bya//sa ha dpa'o gcig sngags tshig/de bzhin gshegs drug
17b6(rgyud): sa bon te//yon tan mtha' med 'chad pa'o//hA yi sa blon yi ge bzhi//ho gtsug ho gnyis brjed par bya//yi ge bdun po lpags sog khams//trai lo kya bi nA sha'i sngags//
17b7(rgyud): sdang ba la ni cho ga'o//sha ta sa ha sra ko tri//ta thA ga ta pa ri bA re//sa mtha' U yi dbyangs kyis spras//zla ba'i dum bu thig les rgyan//de ltar sngags kun nyer sdud pa'o//ha A
18a1(rgyud): sngags kyi rang bzhin//de ltar sngags kyi cho ga ni bzhi//rnal 'byor mu skyed dngos grub 'gyur//bkas gnang dngos grub rab 'jug pa//bcom ldan dpal
18a2(rgyud): byos 'di gsung so//mekhe 'gro sdom pa mngon bair+N+Nad dang //gzhan yang rnal 'byor mi'i rgyu dang /ts+tsha kun rnams shesu pa'i//lngas kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub steng//bkang snang 'khor
18a3(rgyud): lo'i rab sbyor byas//'grub 'gyur sbyor ba gzhan gyis min//slar yang sa mtha' dbyangs lnga pa'i//drung na gnas pa'i stan can+da la//zla dum thig les brgyan pa'o//cho gas/
18a4(rgyud): de kho na'i sa bon//pa drung gnas pa rnal 'byor ma'i//tshogs ni bskyed par byed pa'o//Ta yig 'bar bar byed pa'i sngags//sing ha ru pe khaHsngags tshig/bgegs kyi
18a5(rgyud): gtso bo bArlag byed pa'o//gA dza ru pe gaiHyi sngags//sems can kun gyi bgegs byed pa'o//trai lokya da ro yi tshig/rab mchog po nya kun bskyed pa'o//sa mu dra me kha la
18a6(rgyud): gra ha gnyis kyi tshig/rgya mtsho lta bu'i ske rags spras//de ni sngags kyi sku rag so//hUM dang phaT gyi yi ge ni//mkha'agro mA yi khyab bdag go/bI rI dwi te hUM sngags tshig/thabs
18a7(rgyud): dang shes rab gnyis med las//tha mal 'dus byas skyes pa'o//de ltar rkang pa bdun sngags te//ye shes sa yi rang bzhin gyis//bcom ldan rdo rjes 'di gsungs
18b1(rgyud): to//sems can las las grub pa'i mthar//dri yi gau 'phangs mchog tu 'gro//sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang ba'i ming //slar yang skye zhing lAm lnga gnas//sgyu ma'i rnam pa sgyu
18b2(rgyud): ma min//rang gi bdag nyid so sor rig/hUM ha gnyis ma hA pa shu mo hA ni'o//tshig gi 'khor ba'i rmongs pa'o//yo ge shU ri tAM gi sngags//zhi ba yi ni gzugs su'o//
18b3(rgyud): nI lo ka nAM ban+d+ha ni'i tshig/'jig rten byang chub tu 'jug byed//sa t+ya me hUM phATa'i sngags kyi tshig/mtha' bzhi po ni ston pa'o//b+hU ta tA sa na yi tshig/mu stegs ye shes 'joms
18b4(rgyud): pa'o//de ltar sngags tshig bdun pas ni//las kyi dbye ba byed pa ste//pa d+hA'i mdab mA re re la//sngags kyi yi ge rnam gnasapa'o//dpa'o sngags kyi gzugs gnas pa'i//
18b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs//'khrul 'khor chen po bcu gnyis de//bdag gi mdza' blo yis ni gsungs//las thams cad kyi 'khrul 'khor ni//bcu gnyis rnams
18b6(rgyud): kyis lhan cig bya//'khor lo chen po re ra ru//re snga par so so'i las bya'o//phrad pa rnams ni bcu gnyisu//bsgrub bya'i ming gis bsgrub par bya//pa mtha' sa mtha' a
18b7(rgyud): dang ldan//ye mna' I yi dbyangs dang bcas//yig na mtha' ra yi ga dang //pa mtha' dang ni sid d+he'i tshig/bi da d+yo'i tshig dang shwa ro'i sngags//pa drung ma dang Ta sa bon//
19a1(rgyud): hUM la zla dum thig les brgya na//bsgyur la yang ni brjod par bya//bu drung gunas dang Ta yig ste//hU~M dU du ni swAd+hu bcus//sngags 'di lte bar cho ga yis//
19a2(rgyud): bsgrub bya ming dang bcas par brjod//bcu gnyis rnams drang lte bcas la//de bzhin gshegs pas 'di gsungs so//sa bon yi ge nyi shu bzhi//pul+li ra sogs
19a3(rgyud): bsres pa'o//dpal he ru ka rdo rje phag mo me byung 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro//sngags 'di yi ni mthu stobs ni//bye ba stong phrag gsungs pa yi//mtha' med gzhung las dpa' bo
19a4(rgyud): yis//de bzhin snying po bsdus pa yin//rgyud gzhan du ni gsungs pa'i sngags//sngags 'di yi ni bsgrub thab so//bzlas med grangs ca ga med//gzugs med bsam
19a5(rgyud): gtan de bzhin med//lha dran pa yi ye shes kyis//dngos grub thams cad skyed pa'o//dbugs 'jug pa yi dus su rI//yi ge thams cad bsad par bya//'byin pa rnams
19a6(rgyud): kyi sbyor kun skye//'byung ba'i dus su shes par bya//gnas dus rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis//sangs rgyas zhing ni 'dod mi bya//dbugs rgyu de ltar shes bya ste//byis pa'i rnal
19a7(rgyud): 'byor pas mi rtogs//gang gi slob ma dbang bskur ba//de nyid gzhi rnams bcas paso//theg pa chen por yongs smin lo//phyi nas sngags ni rab bstan bya//sngon du phag
19b1(rgyud): /mo'i dkyil 'khor ni//bI bya de nas he ru ka'i'o//rdo rje'i bu mo 'am de nas gzhan//dar ni shes+yA rab gzhug par bya//rgyud gzhan du ni dbang bskur la//tshul byedi bstan par mi bya'o//
19b2(rgyud): ye shes bya ba'i rang bzhin can//a pa d+hU tIr dkyil 'khor bya//ye shes rnam pa phag mo yi swA//shes bya dpaliM he ru kar 'khyud//spyan gsum drag po'i gzugs can
19b3(rgyud): ma//zhal bzhi mche ba gtsigs pa ste//phyag ni bcu gnyis rnams dang ldan//dkar mo dang ni 'jigs byed gnon//skul phyag rgya rje la sogs//'jig dus me lha'i 'od
19b4(rgyud): zer can//phyag g.yas rdo rje dang gri gug/dgr-i s+phA T+Ta me ru de bzhin//rtse gsum lus med lhags pa ste//phyag g.yon pas kyang de bzhin no//g.yon du dril bu thod pa dang //
19b5(rgyud): zhugs pa kha~M T+wAM ga dang mgo/dbu skra grol zhing gcer bu ma//mag blo'i phreng ba 'dzin pa mo//sgeg pa'i rgyan rnams dang ni ldan//dbu la thod pa'i phreng ba can//'dod cha
19b6(rgyud): rdo rjes rgyas btIb ste//yang na he ru ka yis so//yan lag lha rdzas dris nyir byugs//zhabs gdub dpung ba rgyun rnams dang ldan//lha rdzas me tog phreng byas klubs//d+hU bran
19b7(rgyud): zla gnas rdo rje ni//dpral bar rtag tu 'dzin pa mo//g.yas brkyang po ni zhabs dang ldan//rnal 'byor ma yi tshogos midun du//sku las 'ber ba'i phreng ba spro//he ru ka mig
20a1(rgyud): sman nag po 'dra//ral pa'i cod pa na mdun du'o//stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can//phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par klubs//dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can/
20a2(rgyud): sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed ldan//spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs pa ste//zhal bzhi pa la 'jigs par byed//phyag bcu gnyis par rig par bya//brgya phyed mgo bos rgyan pa ste/
20a3(rgyud): mchod phyir thogs dang thal ba dang //'bar ba'i phreng can gtsigs pa po//skye gnas phyag brgya phya gnyis kyis//lhag ma rdo rje phag mo'i 'o//gal te he ru ka gtso bo//de tshe phag mo'i
20a4(rgyud): phyag gnyi su'o//glang blo'i lpags pa 'dzin pa po//thabs dang shes rab bdog nyid de//zag med rnal 'byor bde chen bzang //srid dang mya ngan 'das pa gzugs//gnyis po
20a5(rgyud): snying por sbyin par bya//lhag ma rnal 'byor ma rnams ni//mkha' 'gro ma sogs rim ji ltar//thod du ma la sogs sngags rig pas//dpa' bo kun kyang sbyin par bya//re re yi
20a6(rgyud): yang de yi rgyud//ji ltar sngon gyi rje sa'o//rkyang ma dang ni ro ma'i rtsa//shes rab dang ni thabs 'du ba'i//rten ni a ba d+hU tI ste//gang der ro mnyam son po'o//'khor lo gsum
20a7(rgyud): gnyis 'gyur zhes bya//mkha' 'gro ma sogs rim ji bzhin//he ru ka dang rdor phag mo//'bum tsho stong phrag phyag can te//phyag gnyis la sogs nas brtsams nas//gzhan/
20b1(rgyud): nI gang rnams de rnamaso//dbang po'i yul ni mi lta zhing //phyag dang bzhugs tshul la sogs min//bsgoms pas spros pa kun bzung ste//gti mug de ni spang bar gyis//skad/
20b2(rgyud): TIg rnam pa'i rnal 'byor bdag/skad cig la sogs de spyir can//snying khar snga bon rnam par dgad//spro dang bsdu ba la sogs bya//dkyil 'khor spyan drang mchod pa dang /
20b3(rgyud): sdig pa bA shugs pa la sogs te//stong nyid la sogs ri rab mthar//ra ba dang ni gur la sogs//sa ma chen ni rdo rje'i thig/'khor lo drug tu bri bo'o//ji lta'i mngon
20b4(rgyud): mtshan nyid kyi//rnam pa sna tshogs tham+b+has cad bya//thabs dang man ngag thams cad ni//mdzes ma bdag gis kun bshad do//der ni gtor ma sbyin bya ste//sa sogs
20b5(rgyud): rnams kyis mchod bya//yi ge 'bar ba'i yig rnams kyis//sngags kyi bzlas pa yang bya'o//'bar ba'i gnyis 'phel yig rnams kyis//srog gos gtum mo 'bar bar
20b6(rgyud): bye//stong du kha bltas rtsa sreg ste//de bzhin ye shes mkha' gro skyes//mkha'agro ma sogs ma lus dang //rnam par shes la sogs thim pas//bsregs pas ri bong
20b7(rgyud): tsan haM 'dzag/dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje mkha' gro de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so//
21a1(rgyud): dpal mkha' blo rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/rdo rje phag mo bskyed pa dang /gtso mo dang 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang /dkyil
21a2(rgyud): 'khor sgom pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin te 'di ni le'u gnyis pa'o////de nas mkha' 'gro ma sogs kyi//ji ltar bskyed pa rab bshad bya//mkha'agro ma'i sbyor brtenas//
21a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ni mchog tu rtsen//phab mo gzugs ni mtha' yas pa'ang //spros pa dra ba'i sdom pa'o//lus kyi dngos po'i dbye ba yis//mtha' yas gzugs can mkha' gro/
21a4(rgyud): ma//lus kyi bde ba la brten nas//'dod pa rnam pa gsum du 'gyur//dga' ba gsum dang rtsa gsum ste//bzhi pa lhan cig skyes par 'dod//sangs rgyas sku yi nyams
21a5(rgyud): chen po//de'i rang bzhin las sna tshogs 'phro//mkha' gro ma ya gnas brten nas//dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rang bzhi no//'dzam bu'i gling ni chen po yi//dum bu bcu gnyis
21a6(rgyud): kyi dbus su//shar gyi yul du gnas pa la/kha dog gnag lha mo//dus sbyor ro hi ta chu srin dang //rgyal dang nyi ma dge bskyed dang //rtsa yi dngos po srog 'bab pa'o//lha mo/
21a7(rgyud): phyi nang bdag nyid du//bcom ldan gzugs can ma gnas te//phyag bzhi ma la kha dog gnag/spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs shing drag pa ste//phyag brgya lnga mngon 'dzin/
21b1(rgyud): bamo//ro la zhon ma sgra grol ma//gal+mas b+hU d+hAng zhabs dang ldan pa mo//drag ma thod pa'i bred nAn mA//rmA yas pA Tau ru ze zug can//g.yon par thod pa khyAn+taM gu/ ning spyad da'i
21b2(rgyud): sku can ma//sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid kyi//dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhag par bya//snying po'i yi ge nyi shu gnyis//mkha 'gro ma dang bcas pa sbyor// n+da d+he te na
21b3(rgyud): nI dru ya~M kaM d+d+he nA d+h+r-i kI nAn+d+ra badzin laT s+yA smr-i b+hU ha ra hUM hUM phaT swA hA/dkyil 'khor bya yi lha mo rnams//yi ge rdo rje can du 'dod//mkha' grom thog joms pa'i mtha/
21b4(rgyud): rigs kyi b+har nI rab tu grags//mkha 'gro mo'i gnas bsgrubs nas//dor ni phag mo glanas par 'gyur//sum cu rje bdun lha rnams ni//rlung 'dra'i thabs dang gnyis mang
21b5(rgyud): de//ming gi sbyor bas shes bya ba//dgos pa rnams mang man ngag go/sum cu rtsa bdun gyi ni rgyud//bde ba che las bskyed par 'gyur//gang phyir bdag po mkha 'gro ma//rgyu
21b6(rgyud): de mkha' g+ho ma'i rigs so//bdag po khyod la bdag 'dri'o//ji ltar bdag gi bskyed 'gyur ba//mkha'agro ma la bde ste dro ba'i//bcom ldan 'das ni mnyes byas nas//khyud
21b7(rgyud): bskyed pa ni bshad kyis nyon//rang gi rgyud ni mnyams pa//DoM yig gsang po'i bu ga bdag nyid//gzhu yi rnam pa srog dang ldan//lus kyis gzugs can yang dag pa//
22a1(rgyud): yul dang dbang po'i bdag nyid can//byang chub sems kyi pheg le tshe//rgyud I zhes bya'i ming can te//'gro dang 'ong ba'i pad chen du//yi 'khor lo la
22a2(rgyud): khyad gyur//kayig ka gzugs kyang de bzhin//'od gsol sprul bya sprul pa'o//phrin lasaM kyis ni khams kun gyis//zhi ba'i gzugs kyis 'gro po che//dga' ba med ces
22a3(rgyud): mi 'gyur kyang //brjod min lhan skyes tshon gyis mdzes//mi gr-i zugs rtag tu bde chen pos//sgyu 'phru nges par 'phro bar 'gyur//I ni 'byung po che kun dang //dbang phyug
22a4(rgyud): la sogasu ni ston//lug dmar ser yid bzang gis/de yi gzhi ni skyed par 'gyur//'di ni mkha 'gro ma yi ming //las kyi dus bzhin mtshon par bya//klu rnams yang dag
22a5(rgyud): dgug bya dang //tshar 'bebs gzhug phyir bzhu ba dang //lha rnams dang ni 'byung po kun//rgyal po rnams kyis 'ang 'phrul chen dang //dbang dang mngon spyod rengs pa dang //bsad
22a6(rgyud): dang bskyod pa la sogs pa//mngon spyod dus las shes par bya//rang rang blang du bskyed pa ste//shes rab thabs kyi snyoms 'jug pas//stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid kyi/
22a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor dbang pos sems phra zhing //shin tu phra bas der 'jug 'gyur//sems can don du de dang der//rang bdag sbyor bas mdzad par 'gyur//stong gsum stong ni chen
22b1(rgyud): po ru//gAng du khyab bdag kun spyod 'gyur//der ni dum+b+ha bu bcu gnyis su rang gtso mo rnal 'byor ma//shrI ma dang longs spyod spyod rnams//rdzu 'phrul che rnams kun stong
22b2(rgyud): 'gyur//nyi borgya phrag bcu na gi//dri bugs rgyu bIr ni shes par bya//brgya phrag bco brgyad srog rnams kyis//'phro bar 'dir ni badz+rod pAr b+hu//bcu gnyis rnams ni
22b3(rgyud): nyin zhag 'gyur//dus sbyor bcu gnyis rim pa so//dus sbyor gsum bsgyur byas na su//dus kyi pho nya mo kun spyod//dus brgya'i phyed kyis pho nya mo//re re rnam par shes
22b4(rgyud): parar+ya bya//lnga bcu gsum gyi yang dag phyung //nyin zhag gi cog la spyod pa//de rnams yi ger yang drug pa shAn/a yig la sogs k+Sha mtha' can//yon tan 'phar
22b5(rgyud): ma yin bsten pas//gsum 'gyur brgya phrag phyed dang bcas//de rnams pho nya mor nges bshad//'di ni mkhara' gro ma phyag brgya//mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod gzhan//
22b6(rgyud): sa 'og rnams na'ang gnas pa mo//rnal byor mo rnams rnam gsum ni//zhing sngags lhan cig skyes rung ngo //gang zhing gang gis lcug gnas pa//de ni de yi ga stsal
22b7(rgyud): mthong 'gyur//rigs kyi khyad par la rten nos//'dod pa'i sbyor skyes gnas pa cin//tsau ru'i bza ba de rnams//ye shes gzugs can phyugs chen po//bza' min
23a1(rgyud): bza' bya der lung ni//'tshon min gsal bar mtshon par bya//mtshan nyid mtshan nyid min pa spyong //de ni spyong bar rab spong ba'o//rjes na char
23a2(rgyud): gcad la chags pa'ang //gang zhig gang gis rang rlung dngos//sangs rgyas dang ni chos gnas par bya//byas te mngon sbyor sbyor ba yis//a ba d+hU tI'i srog gi rlung //
23a3(rgyud): brten pa phag sogs rnal 'byor ma//ma brtan srog gi rlung rnams kyi//dngos grub gsal bar mi 'gyur ro//lha mo rnam snang gos rgyas gdab//rdo rjer 'dzin bdag rmi
23a4(rgyud): bskyod pas//pho nya mo sngags sum cu drug/dus las rang dang ngang gi rigs//ji ltar bdag mo'i rigs dang ni//phyag dang mtshan mo rI ma ji ltar//yang na nges par
23a5(rgyud): brjod pa ru//mngon rtog mtshan nyid las shes bya//po l+la kak+ko la sbyor las//lha mo rang nyid zhu bar zhugs//skad cig dri la ma lus pa'i//dkyil 'khor thams cad ro/
23a6(rgyud): mnyam lta//lha mo na mkha'i nang snang bas//'di yis mnga' bdag bskul bar bya//mchog tu bde ba chen po'i rdo rje rol cig rol//shes rab thabs kyis dgongs pa grub
23a7(rgyud): par mdzod//'jig rten rnams lo khyod kyi thugs rje bsgoms//ji ltar lha dang lha min ma lus sangs rgyas mdzad//byang chub rdo rje 'dzin pas bde chen gyis ni mnyes par
23b1(rgyud): mdzod//khyod ni stong nyid ting 'dzin la zhugs sam ci//rdo rje pad+mo rol pas deng ni nges rtogs mdzod//gang gis lhan cig stong nyid ting 'dzin la khyod bzhubs//mnga'
23b2(rgyud): bdag khyod kyis khams bzhi'i sa bon 'dzag par mdzod//a bi d+hU tI'i rang bzhin gtu mo ldang bar 'gyur//sa gsum sreg par byed de gang du'ang mi mthong ngo //mya ngan
23b3(rgyud): 'das pa'i ngo bos 'barA zhing 'bar bar 'gyur//lhan skyes rang bzhini gyis ni mkha 'gro ma rnams dga' bar mdzod//rga ba dang ni 'chi bar snang ba ma mthong ngo //thugs kyi
23b4(rgyud): rgyal ba mgron po yis ni 'di dag sad par mdzod//sgyu mos sems can khams ni basbrel bar mdzod//glu chen po ni 'di gsan nas//rnal 'byor 'khor lo can rab sad//
23b5(rgyud): sgyu ma lta bu'i 'gro ba kun//brtan pa la sogs 'gro bo ni//mthong bzhin rang gi 'khor lo can//na mkhar thim pa sku tsher 'gyur//lhan skyes sogs kyis sprul pa can//
23b6(rgyud): gnyis po gcig pa'i sku chen po//dang po'i sangs rgyas rang bzhin can//thams cad kyi ni chos kyi sku//rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud thob naso//rnal 'byor rgyu dri rnams la
23b7(rgyud): yid ches//slob dpon sems kyi rdo rje yang //dbu mi'i tshul gyi spyod yulo//de nyid phyir bstan thob pa las//dbu ma chen po'i mtshan nyid do//grub mtho'i man ngag spyod
24a1(rgyud): yul ni//mkhas pa rnams kyi'ang spyod yul min+da//grub mtha' mngon sum las shes bya//man drug kyang ni rjes dpag las//shes bya bla ma'i
24a2(rgyud): zhal las kun//de mkhas sangs rgyas spyod yulo//byis pa'i rigs kyi rnam shes bya//mngon nga rgyal can spyod yul min//dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las//
24a3(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje mkha 'gro de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so//zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i
24a4(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las mkha'agro ma bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid dang /bde ba la kun tu spyod pa'i las kyi de kho na nyid kyi rnam par gzhag pa'i cho ga ste le'u gsum pa'o//
24a5(rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//lA ma ji ltar gnas pa ni//ji ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis//gsungs pa mdag gis gsal bya tsam//rdo rje sdom pa bcom ldan 'das//
24a6(rgyud): phag mo rnal 'byor sdom pa ste//'khor lo sdom pa mkha'agro ma//de bzhin dam tshig sdom pa ni//lA ma yis ni yang dag bston//pad+ma'i sdom par 'dod pa ni//dum skyes
24a7(rgyud): ma can gzugs can ma//rin chen sdom pa'o khyab bdag la//lA ma rang nyid kyis zhus pa//rdo rje sdom sogs ji lta bu//ngo mtshar bdag gi bdag po skye//rdo rje dmo
24b1(rgyud): tshig de bzhin spyon//pad 'khor de bzhin rin chen gyi//sdom pa yang ni ji ltar lags//de nas rdo rje can mchod nas//mnyes pas bdag la yang dgra gsungs//rdo rje bugs
24b2(rgyud): 'pho med ye shes//rtogs nas rdo rje gsum rnams la//sdom pa rdo rje gsum rnams la//skyes pa rdo rje sdom pa ni//dam tshig rtsa rnams thams cad kyi//shes bya lam
24b3(rgyud): rjes skyob pa'i//sdom pa'o 'khor lo mchod pa ni//dam tshig sdom par 'dod pa yin//rnal 'byor rnam pa drug po ni//sbyor drug na mkha'i bu gu ru//sdom pa bden pa'i
24b4(rgyud): dngos po kun//bdag gi rnal 'byor sdom pa'o//pad+ma a ba d+hU ti'i rtsa//'khor lo bzhi la gnas pa ni//sdom par 'khor lA rnams//pad+ma'i sdom par brjod par bya//'khor
24b5(rgyud): lo bde bar gshegs pa'i lam//dbang sogs rnamasu bskyed pa yis//sdom pa'o chos de rnamasu ni//'khor lo sdom pa yin par bshing//rin chen rdo rje mgo bo yis//
24b6(rgyud): nor bur 'bab pa 'ongs pa yis//sdom pa'o srog gi thig le yang //rin chen sdom pa yin par 'dod//ma bshed pa las de rnams kyis//mkha' gro bdun pa ye
24b7(rgyud): shes mchog/kha gdong la sogs brgyad dang ni//'dren pa gnyis med mtshan nyid phyir//de ltar thams cad mnyam sbyor bas//gcig tu sdom pa'i mkha' gro yin//
25a1(rgyud): /gtu mo 'bar mu la ni gzugs//rtsa so so dang dbu ma ste//ye shes mkha' gro de las bskyed//rnam pa kun rig skad cig las//byang chub sems
25a2(rgyud): kyi dbus su ni//bdud rtsi gsang ba'i gzugs can gang //rdo rje mkha' gro de bshad do//na mkha' rwa 'gro ba yi ni mchog/glo bur byung ba bdag med pa//sgyu 'phrul chen
25a3(rgyud): po chu skyes gzugs//rnal 'byor rang sems sems med kyang //rnal 'byor mkha' gro'i mtshan nyid do//'khor lo nang gi bdag nyid gzugs//thig le kun tu sbyar
25a4(rgyud): pa'o//mtshan nyid gnad dang mtshams la ni//kun tu sangs rgyas skye bar 'gyur//'du ba phyi dang nang bdag nyid//ye shes dngos rang bzhin laso//dam tshig so mos
25a5(rgyud): dpa' gsum rig pa//skye dang 'chi dang bar rnams kyi//srid pa kun las shes par bya//spong bas dam tshig mkha' 'gro skye//bdag nyid kun gyis mi shes kyang //'gro
25a6(rgyud): ba mkhas pa'i lam gyis 'gyur//'dod chags sgyu ma bcas na mkha'//pad+ma mkha' gro rang nyid gtso//dbyangs yig de bzhin rnal 'byor dang //phyag brgya lhan skyes
25a7(rgyud): 'dod rnams kyi//bgrod bzhin du ni rtag tu skye//'o bar ba rin chen dbang mkha 'gro//de bzhin khams ni rnam pa bdun//rnam shes bdun gyi mtshan nyid //chu gto ro ri//
25b1(rgyud): dang gling rnams kyang //rgya mtsho che der rab tu zhugs//de nyid nyi shu lnga bdag nyid//sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes rgyus//khor yug la sogs stong nyid dang //rang bzhin skyes
25b2(rgyud): bu de bzhin du//'od gsal ba dang thams cad ming //chos kyi dbyings dang rang mtshan nyid//ther dang sangs rgyas de bzhin du//ye shes rdo rje sems lam bdag/chos 'byung //
25b3(rgyud): dang ni theg chen dang //gsang ba sngags tshul khyab bdag dang //lhan skyes dang ni 'dus de bzhin//thugs rje chen po'ang rang nyid dang //bdag med ma dang kun de nyid//
25b4(rgyud): rang bzhin can stong yang nas yang //de phyir rgya mtsho'i ming dang yang //rgya mtsho chen po'i gzugs can ni//A kun 'jig/gzer sems can rnams//drang gis sangs
25b5(rgyud): rgyas yon tan ldan//d+hA de rnams dge ba mngon 'dod la//du ba dang yongasu ngal ba med//wa/rtogs pa thams cad spangs pa las//thob pa sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid ma//gsang
25b6(rgyud): sngags tshul gyi bdag nyid kun//hA ni skyed pa'i gzugs tsan no//sa de yi chos ni mi bden twe//mu/dngos po skad cig 'jig phyiro//bra/rdzas dang sna tshogs rang bstan
25b7(rgyud): chos//rgya mtsho chen po'i mtshan nyid do//lA/ma yi rang gi mtshan nyid sa//ji lta ba bzhin rim gyis te//rol pa'i myos las bskyed pa ni//rnal 'byor mi kun shes par bya//
26a1(rgyud): ma sngogs kun gyi 'khor lo yi//rtsa'i lam nas rjes 'gro ma'o//yang na sgyu ma 'dzin par 'gyur//de ni sgyu mtshe rang bzhin//bum pa'i rA si spyod pa yis//
26a2(rgyud): 'phro ba'i grangs kyang gnyis pa'o//rdo rje phag mo can lha mo//kun tu spyod pa lA mar gnas//kha dog ldang snang lha mo ste//lhag ma mkha' gro ma dang mtshungs//sred pa
26a3(rgyud): dang ni snang ba'i dngos//thams cad de yi steng du gnas//he ru ka yi mdog dang gzugs//de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes 'gro rnams//lhag ma 'khor drug rnal 'byor ma//
26a4(rgyud): dpa' bo rnams dang thams cad 'byung //'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi dbusu sbyin//thugs sogs kha dog drug tu grangs//'khor lo cha mnyam la b+hi bya//rdo rje pad+ma 'khor de bzhin
26a5(rgyud): ral gri rin chen gri gug gi/phreng ba rtag tu rim shes bya//phyi rol sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng //mgo bo'i phreng ba thams cad du'o//lam byang gi sems las bskyed//rnal
26a6(rgyud): 'byor ma tshogs gtso mo ste//dus kyis rjes 'thun sems can don/smon lim gyi ni mtshan nyid don//bskal pa bzang po'i dbus yang //rdzogs ldan la ni rnam gzigs so/
26a7(rgyud): de yi dus su shes bya ba/de bzhin rnam gzigs byang gling du'o//'dzam bu'i gling ni chung ngun du'ang //bdag ni shAkya'i rigs rjes 'gro//lhag ma gling lnga rnam su ni//
26b1(rgyud): do bzhin gshegs rigs rim pas s+ho//de phyir ldu ma 'gro ba kun+ta//sangs rgyu sa mchog gli gnas mtha' len//mA ni rnal 'byor banas rgyud kyi//skyed stobs bya ba byed pa gsul//
26b2(rgyud): sa yi dbang phyug nag lnga ni//mchu yi zla ba can du 'dod//thu ro sel zhes bya'i rlung dang ni//'gro dang zla ba zhes d+ha'i rtsi//ji srid 'chi ba'i dus nyid bu re//'dzin bzhin du ni rmi
26b3(rgyud): nyam mo//de ltar rnal 'byor ma bcu gnyis//zla ba nyid zhag rlung rnam so//dz+yo dang ni nas 'bab pa ste//mi nI bskyed pa rnal 'byor ma//rtsa yi tshogs ni thams cad la//skad cig
26b4(rgyud): las ni zlog 'a gro 'gyur//rang bzhin de la shes byas nus//sdeng sogs yon tan gyis rim pas//des ni sna tshogs sprul bdag dang //las kyi grwanas ni mang po'o//rnal 'byor
26b5(rgyud): pa yi dngos gcig ni//lA ma mya ngan 'das mtshan nyid//mya ngan 'das dang mtshon pa nA'ang //gnyis po zhugs gyur ming myed pa//ji ltar mi shes de la ni//bdag gis mchod
26b6(rgyud): tu 'du shes so//sangs rgyas med cing byang chub sems dpa'ang med par 'gyur//chos kyi sku sogs dngos po'o//dbang po rnams kyi drin gyis ni//skye ba can kun thob par
26b7(rgyud): 'gyur//dbang po'i dngos po bden min yang //de tshe mi bden pas thob 'gyur//dbang po gnyis kyi dngos nyid ci//grib ma yi ni skyes bu mtshungs//gri'i ma'i dngos po
27a1(rgyud): de d+hAn /sa gang+gAsan na ma yin//de shin dbang po ma bdun dang //da dngas dran pa nan da da //na du rgyams pasang bdan na//
27a2(rgyud): tshig tu bsngags pa shes par //btung ba 'i sogs bdag pa ste//bla ma pa ni 'bul bu 'de//den mi byeden pas spyad bya//de mo brnyem pa mi gyi'o//'di la sngangs
27a3(rgyud): da kyi /rgyu man gyi rgyu 'drur/ 'i snying po sdugs rnams la//( m+b+ha m+b+ha ba sa rgyun 'o//skye dang gi slong gags rjes//nyi sbyid na sa pags m+b+ha dud+d+ho/
27a4(rgyud): sngags 'phrug zugs yis bzlog pa chis//de bzhin dbus su su nus 'byung mi ni/oM oM bad+hiHrje Sh+Te hrId+hI li ts+tshi tI d+hIn+de ba na na/
27a5(rgyud): bcoM moM zhes bya'o//samA cu rtsa bdun rnams kyis mi//rnal 'byor dbang phyug ma rim las//rje dang ni gas ni nas m+b+ha ste//ye ge brjod pa'i bdon nyid kyi/
27a6(rgyud): dang gsum gyi rtsa bskyed de//yi ge re ro yi yang ngo //yang nA thams cad bsdus pa yis//bdag nyid chen po'i dus 'di'o//de phyir sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid//la 'byong
27a7(rgyud): martag re re skye//g.yo nyi sems dpa' che khros na//spros pa'i khro bo rnal 'phyir ma//de bzhin gti mug 'dod chags sogs//rnal 'byor ma ni rtag tu s+ho//tshogs tshung/
27b1(rgyud): s+yalas 'grub pa//yum mchog ldu ma 'ang 'brib par 'gyupa//bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs te//yi g+he re re rnal 'byor ma//ming ni de dang mnyam zhes bya//khyod 'dzud
27b2(rgyud): mchog bsres pa'o//de ltar de nyid rtag brten nas//rnal 'byor phyag brgya dang lhan cig/rtsen cing rgya cher rol par bya//srid dang mya dran 'das dbus//dpa' bo thams
27b3(rgyud): cad mnyam sbyor ba//rdo rje sems dpa' byed pa'i mchog//rdo rje mkha 'gro blo bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so//zhes bya ba ni dpal mapa 'gro rgyu
27b4(rgyud): tsharnal 'byu ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las ldum bskyed de'i mtshan nyid dang sngags dgod pa dang //'khor lo sbyar ba drug la sogs pa'i rang bzhin dang mya ngan
27b5(rgyud): 'das pa la sogs pa'i rnam par bzhag pa ste le'u bzhi blo'o////de nas mchog tu rab bshad bya//sems can rnams la phan rtse bas//baN+Da ro hI'i gnas zhu
27b6(rgyud): nas//mnga' bdag rdo rje mapa 'gro dang //'khor lo bzhi yi pad+moru//rtswa n+ya brgyu dang nyi shu'o//de rnams ming ni ci rigs par//de kho na nyid stong l+ya ba shad/
27b7(rgyud): yul dbus ma dang ka ling ka ma dang //o Da ma dang kar+N+NaH mo ma ru mi//sa se raSh+Ta mo ma lo ya ma bingag ma//'gro lding ma dang ta li ga ka mo//mA la waM mo ma hA raSh+Ta maM/
28a1(rgyud): ba ren+d+ra mo k+Sha ma ru bi ma//nA hA li mo a Ta li yul ma//b+ha Da ri mo lU Da dbus 'gyur ma//ti ra hut+ti mo dang dad dA ra Na DA ma dang bal yul ma//mnyan yod/
28a2(rgyud): ma dang rA D+ha mo dang Di ka ki ri ma dang //bang ga lA mo khA Da ma dang ha ri ka la ma//gser gling ma dang seng ge li mo dang //DaM ma Da mo kan+to ra ka mo//sin d+hu kha ba'i gnas ma ts+tsha NI
28a3(rgyud): mo//ku lu Ta mo dza Ta ra mo pa tha ma//dza dz+nyA yu ta ma dang pa ru Na ma dang //u D+yan ma dang lam pa ka ma dang //dzA lan+d+ha ra ma dang ar bu daM ma dang //kha che ma dang ko sa la
28a4(rgyud): mo kAny+tsi ma//dza yAn+t+ra mo tri shak+ta ma tsi b+hi ma//lu ha ra ma pu ra ho ri ka mo dang //mu mu na ma kA ma bo dza ma dang //b+hin+to ma la gri ha de ba mo//pre Ta pu ri ma dang bab b+ha ra ma rAng //
28a5(rgyud): pi la mo dang nye ba'i pi la mo//dur khrod ma dang nye ba'i dur khrod ma//rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram ma kha sa mo//kla klo ma dang thams cad yul ma ste//rim pa drug cu bzhi lha mo//lte ba'i khor
28a6(rgyud): lo rnal 'byor ma//rigs kyi rtsar ni shes par bya//snying kha'i 'khor lor de bzhin brgyad//pho nya mo kun 'gro ma ste//phra ya ge mo de bi ko Ta ma//'phags rgyal ma dang //dpal
28a7(rgyud): chen mo//'bar ba'i gdong ma grub pa srin pa la mo dang //ma hi la ma kau ma ri sau ra ma//de ltar thams cad snying gnas su//sgyu ma'i rnam par rang zhing ma'o//mgrin par 'khor
28b1(rgyud): lo'i lha mo yang //gtso mo mchog ni bshad par bya//cha chen bcu drug nyid yin te//khams rnams bcu drug de bzhin no//khrag dang khu ba rkang dang ni//rdul dang tshul dang lpags//
28b2(rgyud): pa dang //sha dang rus pa rgyus pa dang //rnag dang rgyu ma rang 'byung dang //bshang gci mkhris pa mchil ma'o//ra he s+ya sogs tshil gyi khams//de rnams myos byed 'bab ma'o//mgo bo ru
28b3(rgyud): ni lha mo che//'khor lo su ma cu rtsa gnyis rtsa//zhig gi rim pa thams cad du//mtshams kun rmad 'byung chen mo'o//nag mo gtsigs ma 'jigs rung ma//dga' ma 'das ma log
28b4(rgyud): 'dren ma//tsA muN+Da dang drag gzugs ma//lha mo dka' zlog dbyangs can ma//nag bzang mo dang nag chen mo//nag sbom ma dang gzhan mi thub//rgyal ma dang rnam par rgyal ma//mi 'pham/
28b5(rgyud): mra dang rgyal ba mo//drag mo sdang ma dang mo dang //zla ba lam gyi bzhi mdo ma//grong gnas ma dang drag mig ma//kaM po dza ma DoM bi ma//gtum mo dang ni gdol pa mo//bram ze mo dang dmadras
28b6(rgyud): rigs maM//rgyal po'i bu mo 'phrul chen mo//lha rdzas chang gis 'gengs byed ma'o//de ltar rtswa yi 'khor lo ru//khaN+Da ro ha nang 'gro ma'o//bdag 'dir 'gro ba mo yin ci//rang
28b7(rgyud): gi bdag pos bka' stsol cig/lus rnams thams cad la ni khams//mkha' gro dngos po gcig tu 'gyur//sa gzhi cha bzhin shes bya ste//yul gyi phye yang sa gzhi gcing //
29a1(rgyud): dum du dum bur gyur pa'i khams//yang na yul dang zhag dgu 'gyur//Da yi yi ge bstan de'i phyir//sgo nga mngal gyi mtshan nyid las//'dir ni rnam shes
29a2(rgyud): bskyed par 'gyur//gang 'dra'i gang gis khams rnams la//bzhir ni rnam par shes bya ste//las la dum skyes ma rong nyid//sdig pa chen po 'phrog bzhin ma//bsadade la khAma?//
29a3(rgyud): ni thams cad do//des ni sems can bral du ma skyes//shin tu las kun mdzad pa mo//gtso mo mchog gi rnal 'byor ma//rang gi 'pho ba lam bzhengs mchog/nyin 'char ba'i
29a4(rgyud): dus dang ni//'dod dang rgyu skar gre mchog dang //nub kyi ba lang spyod gling du//'dod chags chen po'i rang bzhin ma//dngos med byed pa min lha mo//gnyis med go 'phreng la brten mya//
29a5(rgyud): sum cu bdun bdag nyid dbus su//bskyed 'gyur rang gi sngags las skye//oM bA sa dz+ra rma sa buN+Da d+ha ro ba hi dz+ra kA NA ye ke hUM nI hUM ye phaT ba phaT r+d+ha s+thA nI hA ye hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA//oM//
29a6(rgyud): sngags 'di rab tu sbyor ba yis//dkyil 'khor 'dod pa thams cad la//lha mo re re rnams kyi ni//dbus su 'khor lo bzhi skyes ma//thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid can//tha
29a7(rgyud): chos 'byung dbus su te//sgo bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan//rta babs kyis ni de rnams rgyan//sha chen po ni za bzhin du//'jigs byed sgra ni bsgrags pa'o//lA ma'i 'khor lo ba
29b1(rgyud): lad+ba sha/mkha 'gro ma la klung chen sha/phag mo lA nI sha thams cad//dam tshig sdom pa'i sbyor bas so//gsang sdugs bden par shes byas nas//sngags kyi yi ge /
29b2(rgyud): blasmin//sems can kun gyi dag ga de//sngags ni rnal 'byor mA ru grags//gale trAM yi go ba sngags yin//gau Di'i yi ge pa dang mtshungs//rtsayi bu gu bu gA ru//dA
29b3(rgyud): ni yi ger 'du shes bya'o//sngags kyi btung bas sems la ni//ji srad rkang mthar 'grog pa las//yul dang yul du kun tu spyod//yul dbus su yang 'ongs pa las//tshim
29b4(rgyud): bya rang gi 'khrul 'khor du//bum pa bzhin du btung ba 'bab//dkyil 'khor rang gi spyan gnas nas//srog gi 'khor lo bzhin du bskor//sems dpas 'khor bzhin
29b5(rgyud): pa d+ha ni//na d+hi bu'i bu ga ra btsi bar bya//bu gi dgu rus bon krung //rdo rje sogs pas bsgom par bya//ya na d+ha rnams thams cad dr-i//sngags kyi yi ge 'di dgong prA/
29b6(rgyud): ka oM/ma so mo bi drA ta m+b+ha mA b+huk+ShA nA oM b+h+rUM lAmA ti da nI sA ran+ti bA khA he su swi T+Ta ka si ts+tshi Ta ku dza ya dza pra oM li ma dza ak+Sha ko k+Sh+mAM dz+re ai k+Sha kr-i kAM dza tItsay+YA yu mr-i k+ShI b+h+yad+d+ha
29b7(rgyud): usma u kham+be zhes bya ba ni lte bi re raM//pri daM u ma dzu si ma kau zhes bya ba ni snying khar ro//ra~M su ma sre me tsa mAM as+t+ra pU a swa bi mU pe sh+le zhes bya ba ni mgrin po'i 'o//kri ka
30a1(rgyud): nab+hUn tI bin+d+ha ga oM sa b+h+ra mo stu A dza i ts+tsha nA mA rok+Shato \u0f7fm+b+ha b+hU stA r+ya zhes bya ba ni mgo ba'i 'khor lho la'o//yang na mi phyed ma la sogs pa'i ming nAn+ya tA/
30a2(rgyud): de rnams kyi yang yig dang po//thams cad mgo bo'i 'khor lor sbyin//'khrul 'khor 'di ni blo chen po//srog gi rlung ni rnam 'dzin 'gyur//pad+ma bzhi'i 'dab ma'i dbyibs//
30a3(rgyud): re'u mig 'khor lo rim thig gdab//thams cad zlum po'i rnam par ni//thig lnga rnams ni gdab par bya//brgyad dang bcu drug drug cu bzhi//sum cu rtsa gnyis re'u mig 'dod/
30a4(rgyud): lte ba'i gnas ni thob na su//srog gi nus pa rnams kyis 'khor//ji srid a ba d+hU ti'i rlung //de srid 'khrul 'khor 'dir brjod de//gal te ngag gis de ltar byed//sngags
30a5(rgyud): ni 'jam snyan gyis glu len//sgras ni srog nges phur btab nas//rtsa dgu po ni dgug par bya//nad med mi rgas mdze med cing //rtag tu bkres dang skom pa med//de ltar la/
30a6(rgyud): sogs mtha' yas pa//nad dang 'chi ba'i mtha' thug med//dkyil 'khor lngar ra mA yang na ni//'khrul 'khor can kun 'bab par bya//khams dang skye mched gzhan la so//
30a7(rgyud): bdud rtsi'i rnal 'byor ldan pas bza'//mdog dmar 'du shes lhag ma ni//lA ma'i phyag dang gzugs cano//dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba//rdo rje sems dpa' bde
30b1(rgyud): bri'i mchog/rdo rje mkha'agro de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so//zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las dum/
30b2(rgyud): skyes ma'i mtshan nyid dang bskyed pa dang 'khor lo'i bzhi'i rtsa'i rnam par gzhag pa'i ming 'dor bstan pa dang sngags dgod pa la sogs pa'i cho ga ste le'u lnga pa'o///
30b3(rgyud): dro nas gzhan mchog bshad par bya//mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas par min//dpal he ru ka'i kun sbyor las//gzugs can ma yi mtshan nyid dge/lus ldan dang ni las dang
30b4(rgyud): tshigs//sngon du gzugs can mA la rten//phyi nang bdag nyid can gzugs//bde la gnas pos 'gro bar 'gyur//'drir ni rkang lag thams cad la//tshogs ni bcu gnyis
30b5(rgyud): nyid yino//lde lnga ru ni shes bya ste//bcu gnyis la rtsa drug cu'o//dkyil 'khor rnams la'ang 'bab pa mo//'pho ba bcu gnyi su 'dod do//g.yon pA dang ni g.yas pa la'ang //
30b6(rgyud): sngon du lug sogs sngags rig pas//lhag ma bu ga bzhi rnamaso//lta ba 'doms dang rtsibs lo gra gnyis//gru gsum de bzhin shes bya ste//de yi sgo rnams rtsa drug cu/
30b7(rgyud): mtshams ni rnam pa lnga rab gsungs//nyi ma rgyu bar gang 'gro ba//de 'gro zla ba zla ba rnams//drug lnga sum bcu'i cha rnamasu//snying khar grags pa de bzhin gsungs//
31a1(rgyud): /dgu ji ltar 'gro ba'o//mig la sogs pa'i bu ga rnams//sgro la rten nas gnas par 'gyur//mgrin pa ru gang 'dra ba yi khams//de ru gyur nas gnas
31a2(rgyud): pa'o//mi byed ma sogs sum nu gnyis//rgyud mang por ni bsngags pa'o//de yi gzugasu gnas lha mo//gzugs can ma de'i rnam rtag pas//bcom ldan 'das la blangs
31a3(rgyud): dre'o//gzugs can ma yi ming ci gsungs//'gro ba thams cad gzugs med mdzod//rtsi yi bde sogs ming gi po//'gro ba'ang dbang po'i lam rnams//gang 'dra'i gzu
31a4(rgyud): kyi gzugs can ma//pA las thob pa'i bde ba ni//dbang gnyis rnam pa'i sbyor la so//gang dang gang gi rigs gang ni//de dang de yi 'gro bar bshad//bden pa kun las 'dren
31a5(rgyud): par 'gyur//sngags kyi tshul las gzhan mi 'gro/de phyir gzugs can mo 'grogs las//lhan skyes rdzogs pa'i byang chub tshol//lha mo chen mo kha dog ser//lhag ma dum
31a6(rgyud): skyes ma dang mtshungaste//'du byed phung po'i gzugs dang ni//mi dang bud med sogs gzugs can//mnyam med sems can de ni lus phyir//gling 'di ru ni skyes 'gyur//sru
31a7(rgyud): dong byagu le nag pa'o//hUM'i du sa'i rang bzhin can//thabs dngape shes rab bde bas kyang //dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugs pa'o//yang dag sum du bdun bdag nyid//
31b1(rgyud): rim pas dang rnal 'byor//gsang sngags kha dag sbyor ba dru//gzugs can gtso ma shes par bya//oM drA a r+d+ha grA n+d+ham+b+ha bI maT+TAn+ni hrIy+Ya oM ka skAn+na d+hU hU~M hU~M oMn
31b2(rgyud): laTaT Ne sne It+ma.oM phaT da~Mn+na /de ltar rang bzhin las shes bya//sngon gyi cho ga'i las kyis ni//dbu ma thu gar byin nas ni//dbugs ni rnam shes nga bo naR+Sha/
31b3(rgyud): sangaste rgyas zhing ni glengs med pa//mA lus skad cig de la mthongad//ma lus rang bdag dri ba can//bsgoms drang byos deng mthong ba yang //bzod bzhin bAn rtogs mi 'gyur//'drin
31b4(rgyud): sgyu ma'i rang mtshan nyid//gzugs kyi sku yang rnams gsum ste/sku gsum thugs kyi mtshan nyid de//de ni 'dod gzugs gzugs med//me ldong du ni gdong rdzogs pa//ji bzhin
31b5(rgyud): khams gsum la gnas//de yi gzugs dang gzhan gzugs can//gzugs dang gzugs lnga gzugs brnyan te//grangs med pa yi 'jig rten khams//gzugs can
31b6(rgyud): sgyums bud med dang //thams ni skyes bu'i las can gyi//gnyis myed bud med skyes bu gcig/gcig min gcig min mAn gzugs can//gzugs kyi lus la sogs dngos
31b7(rgyud): /mtshon byed mtshan bya med gzugs can//mtshan dka' mtshon bya'i mtshon byal//mtshan bya gdugs med mtshan nyid ma//mtshon med spyod yul daM yang ni//mtshon /
32a1(rgyud): da nga //// la la lam mdzad //patsod sho bsung 'thun na dang//mad+ma sngon du byung chubar pyod//gzugs dang gzhan
32a2(rgyud): gzugs can ni//de ltar bani gyi rlung bzhin du//rdo rje mazlas dper dang bri dang //khyim da chen po'i nga sbyinanu dang //dem tshig sems da chen pod//byung
32a3(rgyud): rluchu chen po'i rnaM m+bi m+b+has /bainA du 'gro ba tshigs//de lta'i gzugs ji ltar ldan//gle zhe b+h+ya a mi shes//byis pa'i rnal 'byor rtogs min/
32a4(rgyud): ma yi mchog thob pa ste//skyeba'adi nyid la shes 'gyur//skye bo thams cad byang tshu ra dzin ni/rmo ste pa'i byis ngas shes pa ma yin//sems can thams cid
32a5(rgyud): 'byor ma'i de nyid//myi gang yin po de ni rdo rje 'chang //glu 'di gleng po pas thams cad ni//skrag ste sa lo brgyal bar 'gyur//rnal 'byor ma rnams 'grel nas klung //
32a6(rgyud): dbul ngom/'o pa 'dum dul sog pa / po nam da //gapani kyig khring ma da/sems pa ni khams kyi rang bzhin rnal byeng
32a7(rgyud): mi/khyed dang mas can rnams la dbye ba med //dpa' bo thams ca tshul pa mdzad pagi/ yang mam ldan 'das kyis//thu la thams cad rab tu zhugs/
32b1(rgyud): / nas nas rnas par 'gyur //ma snang bang dus dgas pa rgyu//skar ma na po pa ma da // ldan mya nga 'a
32b2(rgyud): byur po la rgyud stan//rmad du brjod pas rmed brjod mad//rnal 'byor rgyud kud lnga yang ngo //rnam snang mdud dang rin chen dbang //'dir ni 'dod chags deni mod dru
32b3(rgyud): mi spyod pa dang /na mi'i d+hAd//mA mi kI dang glos dkar mo//sgrol ma dang ni gzugs rdo rje//sgra dang dr-i dang ri de bzhin//reg dang chos dbyi sa grags dang //sa snying nam
32b4(rgyud): snying ba dang //na rdo rje jig rten dbang //bu kun sel dang bzang po dang //'jam dpal dang ni byams pa dang //gshin rje'i sgyu dang shes mthar mdza h+ma sa me
32b5(rgyud): khyo de dang ste su rkyen gad mdzes dang //gzug tur la por mos sgyur ba dang //tho gat+tar ri khrod na nA//sdug ma rdo rje sems du 'o//de ltar du
32b6(rgyud): ni//zabs kyi nges pa'i mtshan nyid//shes rab rgyung ni rang 'byung nyid//rang gi rang bzhin drug tu gan+d+ha//byang chub phyogs kyi rgyu rnams//mi 'dzin go 'di rje /
32b7(rgyud): bskal pa sreg pa'i dus su ni//gzhan du song nas yang dag gnas//zod pa'i dum la sogs dpa' bo//ming ni mo bskyod la sog so//dngos po'i dbye ba'i rnam grangs kyi/
33a1(rgyud): ni du ma 'gyur ba'o//gzugs can ma yi gnas brten nus//dpa' bos la bsgyings par 'gyur//gzugs ni gzugs med gyur pa'i gzugs//byed
33a2(rgyud): mchog dang ni mnyam par mkhyer//dpa' bo byams cad mnyam sbyor las//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje mkha' gro de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan bdag pos 'di
33a3(rgyud): gsung so//zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' glo rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las gzugs can ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin rtsa'i 'khor lo'i rang bzhin dang gnas kyi
33a4(rgyud): rnam par gzhag pa dang rgyud kyi mtshan nyid kyi cho ga ste le'u drug pa'o//de nas rnal 'byor mchog gi sa//cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis te//gang gis khwa gdong ma byung ba//de yis
33a5(rgyud): tsho gas thar 'gro ma//nye ba'i gling du gnas ma ste//khyu mchog 'pho dang bzang po ma//sa ga'i zla bar shes bya ste//sa lnga par ni 'dod pa yin//lha mo sgo na gnas pa mo//k+Sha ni chos/
33a6(rgyud): dbyings mar 'du shes//gnyis pa chos kyi sku dang ni//de las longs spyod rdzogs 'byung ba//s+yA nI sprul pa'i sku yin te//lte snying mgrin pa mgo bo las//bu ga bzhi rnams shes bya
33a7(rgyud): ste//bya rog 'dra ba'i srog gdong can//de la rtag tu sngon spyod ni//srog chags rnams ni skad cig gsod//klu rnams dgug par bya ba dang //char dbab pa dang rings pa'o//chos
33b1(rgyud): kyi dbyings dang byang chub che//rnal 'byor ma kun rang bzhin ma//chos dang longs spyod sprul pa la//bde ba 'dod pas 'gro ba mo//sngags badren las kyi bdag nyid can//bya rog
33b2(rgyud): gtso mo de la rten//rdo rje phag mo de la ni//bya rnyog ma nI gan su son+da//sum cu rtsa bdun rnal 'byor ma//sngags 'di las ni byung ba yin//oM ba na dzA mo kA b+hu kA ga s+yA ba a te ke bIng+ga/
33b3(rgyud): hUM shA sa pa ya Ta hUM bi hUM TA pa s+phA Ta hA pa oM Ta swA hU~M hA hU~M/'dir ni rang thung dbye ba las//shes rab thebs kyi rang bzhin cen//thung ngu thabs kyis d+ha zhe na dang //ring po shes
33b4(rgyud): ro ba mngon par brjod//kha dog nag mo drag chen mo//lhag ma mkha' gro ma dang mtshungs//gang phyir byang chub sems zhu ba//de tshe bya rog las rgyal mo//nu mkhar bya rog bzhin
33b5(rgyud): 'khor bya//bya rog gdong ma'i rlung giso//gang phyir 'phur zhing steng 'bur ba//de phyir 'og dang steng du lta//bya rog bzhin du ring 'phur nas//bya rog gling du slar 'ong ba'o//
33b6(rgyud): der son pa ni bde chen po//lus kyis nyam su myong ba'o//bsod nams las kyis skye bar 'gyur//rnal 'byor gong nas gong du'o//bsod nams min ldan de bzhin 'dir//
33b7(rgyud): dmyal ba bya rog dum bu can//pha rol phyin tshul rnams kyi yang //sbyin pa'i pha rolo phyin par 'dod//ma byin len pas dmyal ba pa//bye rog bzhin du rtag tu bkres//de
34a1(rgyud): de ltarar+ya las dus su//mi gang ngang gis 'chi bar 'gyur//rnal 'byor ma ni de bsgoms nas//bde chen nyam su myong bar 'gyur//rnal 'byor ma yi spyod kun
34a2(rgyud): kyang //rang gis rang ni thob par 'gyur//las ma byas na gang gi ni//las can med cing las byed med//rang sems 'pho ba las yin te//las de las byed pa yang dri//
34a3(rgyud): lus kyi dbyibs dang gzugs bdag nyid//sems med pa ni sems pa mchog/lag pa rkang pa thams cad kyis//gang byas las byed par ngo //de kun gyis nar khyer ba ni//
34a4(rgyud): yang dag las mtha'i mtshan nyid do//las kyang dge ba rgyu don gnyer//mi dge rang gis spang bar bya//rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi mchod pa'am//de bzhin bza' ba 'du ba ni//grong
34a5(rgyud): dang grong khyer gnas pa dang //ri la sogs pa'i rtse chen du//dam tshig don du mchod par bya//rnal 'byor dngos grub 'bras rab ster//mkha 'gro ma yi gzugs brnyan kyang /
34a6(rgyud): khyab gnas rlung gi ming can te//srog dang thur sel mnyam gnas dang //khyab byed ji lta'i rim gnyis kyis//mkha 'gro de bzhin lA ma dang //dum skyes ma dang gzugs can/
34a7(rgyud): ma//'ug gdong khyi dang phag gdong ma//rim pas klu dang ru sbal rtsangs//lho sbyin dang ni nor las rgyal//rtag tu brtan ma pho nya gnyis//dga' dang skyo ba zhes bya ba//mtsha
34b1(rgyud): mr-i dang ni 'joms ma mchog/mdor bstun+da pa yi tshig 'di yang //rgyas be shad kun nas brjod par bya//phag mos mchod shi byas nas ni//rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus pa//ji srid
34b2(rgyud): srog sogs rlung rnams kyi//so so re re'i ming 'du shes//bdag gi ston pa ngo mtsher che//dus kun du ni skye bar 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dang por gci
34b3(rgyud): bo can 'dzin pa//stong pa'i ngo bos grol bar 'gyur//rdo rje lta bu'i rlung dgod bya//rten ni snod kyi 'jig rten lo'o//gang phyir 'jig pa thim 'gyur ba//de yi dbyi bas tshul kyang med pa//
