34b4(rgyud): de phyir thur sel zhes bya yang //'gro ba dang ni 'ong bar bstan//mnyam ga nas rigasu song nas ni//sngon du gang dang gang rnams kyis//ngag tu brjod pa smra bar 'gyur//sngon
34b5(rgyud): du bag tshugs ma lus pa'o//khyab byed 'gro ba thams cad la//rgyas 'debs pas na las kyi rlung //klu na khro ba'i ngo bo nyid//khyab byed de bzhin tshig gnyis te//ru sbal
34b6(rgyud): ser sna'i ngo bo ni//smra ba yi ni mtshon nyid do//rtsangs pa 'dod chags mnyam gnaso//thur sems phrag dag lha sbyino//nor rgyal gti mug bdag nyid do//srog gi rlung ni grangs//
34b7(rgyud): gnyis las//dga' ba'i ye shes can shes bya//skyo ba de yi btags pa'o//de phyir mkhas pas so sor shes po yis//gang phyir srog gi rlung ni thams cad bdag nyid skye//
35a1(rgyud): ji ltar sa ni bcu gnyis las//thog ma de nyid bcu gnyis pa'o//bcu po rnams kyis de shes bya//gang phyir sa bcu'i dbang phyug/sa gcig rang bzhin rnams
35a2(rgyud): kyis ni//rdo rje 'dzin ma chen mor 'dod//sbyin sogs pha rol phyin pa gang //lhan skyes yang dgra byang chub nyid//thams cad kyi ni nang son pas//rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug ma
35a3(rgyud): mchog/bshad dang ma bshad gang tsi rung //de kun byang chub tshul cano//slar yang bya rog dbyibs lha mo//de nas byed gzugs can ma'o//byed pa phyogs kyi gnas la
35a4(rgyud): ste//rtsa gnas kun gyi bu ga'o//thim dang de las langs bsam gtan//khwa gdong ming du 'du shes//de ltar rnal 'byor gter thams cad//bla mo'i zhal las gsal
35a5(rgyud): 'thob 'gyur//bla ma gang de mi brnyas shing //ston byas de nyid 'dod par bya//'phags pa'i go 'phang ma thob ni//mnar mod la sogs rnamasu 'tshed//kun nas bla
35a6(rgyud): ma gus pa las//byang chub bar du thob par 'gyur//dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las//rdo rje sems dpa' byede ba'i mchog/rdo rje mkha 'gro de bzhin gshegs/
35a7(rgyud): bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so//zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha'agro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las khwa gdong me la sogs pa'i srog bskyed pa'i
35b1(rgyud): mtshan nyid kyi cho ga sto ljo'u bdun pa'o////dri nas gzhan gyi mtshan nyid mchog/'ug gdong lta sogs gang gsal pa//byed pa yang dag bya ba dang //thams cad mtshams
35b2(rgyud): ni bAshad pAr bya//'khrig pa sdig pa snron rnams ni//zla ba'i sbyor bas rtag tu gnas//'ug gdong ye shes thob nas ni//rtsa ni lom gsum 'gro ba mo//u/drag shul gzi
35b3(rgyud): brjid gtsigs pa mo//ye shes lam dbang bza' ba las//lU/'dod la dga' ba sgyu 'phrul che//lha min la sngogs skye rnams la//rkang pa'i mthe ba mthar bcu gnyis//ka/mda'
35b4(rgyud): yi shugs kyis 'gro bar 'gyur//'ug gdong ma yi ming las yang //u ni un+manr-i bu gar 'dod//la/pul+lI ra ma lo yAr grags//U nI muM mu ni zhing ngo //kA ni kA ma ru pa ste//
35b5(rgyud): de bzhin s+yA 'dir zhing kun 'dod//zhing kun dbugasu gyur pa ni//gru gsum rnam pa'i bde ba'i mtha'//gang phyir gnas lha'i bdag nyid kyi//mi zad he ru ka'i go 'phang //yang na
35b6(rgyud): bdag bri gi dan sogasu//dpal he ru ka rdo rje dang //skye gnas gnas lnga'i bdag nyid de//snying lte rkan dang mgo bo dang //gsang ba ru yang rtsa kun gyis//skye gnas bu ga'i lnga'i
35b7(rgyud): bdag nyid//sgong skyes dang ni drod gsher skyes//mngal skyes brdzus te skyes pa rnams//sems can sangs rgyas yon tan bdag/rigs lnga rab tu ston pa'o//nye ba'i gling
36a1(rgyud): /dug nasam snang //na ma gzugs can yad+hA dag gnas rdzun rgyu rlung byasas spyos rnams//sum n+taT+Ta dun rgyu nas//oM d+ham thA
36a2(rgyud): \u0f7fsrA b+hI ya sa~M kai ni d+hur+m+mAb+h+rUM ya pa d+hun pA phaTanA~M swA pa hrIHmr-i s+t+rai hU~M hU~M/de ltar thugs de kho na'i 'dzin/shes rab 'gyis kyi rang bzhin can//kha dag ltung su dag
36a3(rgyud): rgyun //lhig+ni ma ny+dza m+b+ha dang nai nA rmyangs//dkyil 'khor dbus su rgom byas nas//dur khrod gnas dang gnyis med pa//kun spyod na rnams thams cad kyis//rgyas pa'i dag
36a4(rgyud): ba'i spyod yu'o//'di ni 'tsho ba'i ting 'dzin dang //'od gsal rnam pa'i chos nyid de//bskyed pa'i las dang rnal 'byor ma//'jig rten gyi ni 'dren pa mo//rang bstan chos las
36a5(rgyud): bla sung smai bA mi//sna tshogs las kyang bya ba'o//kun gyi rnal 'byor yongs rdzogs nas//rgyud 'di yi ni spyod 'o//'on kyang rnal 'byor dri kun kyang //mdor bsdus rdul ni/
36a6(rgyud): tshig 'di yin//sau sor sdud dang de bzhin tu//bsam gtan srog rnol 'dzin pa dang //rje su rkyen dang ting 'dzin te//sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid rnam drug/so sor sdud pa gas
36a7(rgyud): ma//'ug gdong ma ni bas mi gtan 'dod//srog nyid dun gnas pa kyi//'dzin pa la ni thig mo'o//rjes dran gnas po bo nya mo//ting nge 'dzin ni brtan mar 'didi//mcho
36b1(rgyud): mun d+has bstan thog//'joms mu 'bras bu kun bdag skyes//'khor ba las ni grol gyur pa//rang gi sku ni sgyu ma mnyam//bdag byin rlab 'di phra mo dang //rdo rje bzlas rang mtshan
36b2(rgyud): nyid do//rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyi gau ter//de los lhag ma zung 'jug/mya ngan 'das zhes bya ba' 'di//lam thams cad kyi mya ngan 'das//thig chen kun la rab
36b3(rgyud): 'jug pa//sngags kyi theg pa ru ni byed//bya ba bstan chos dge sna tshogs//snying rje mnyes glo shin po yis byed//gang 'dri'i dngos drang dngos po la//ye shes rnam pa'i rang 'byung
36b4(rgyud): gis//de 'dra ba yi sems rgyun laso//bdag nyid rnal 'byor rnams kyis mthong //lus kyi mtshan nyid yod dag pa//rtswa yi gur ni bshad par bya//spyi gtsug nas ni nor bu'i
36b5(rgyud): mtha'//mtshams dang mgrin pa rnam gnyis 'dod//rkang pa'i mthe bong mtshams mtha' dang //smin dbus de bzhin spro ba ste//mtshan ma'i rtsa ba dpral ba dag/mig dang rlung
36b6(rgyud): pa'i sor mo gnyis//med med pa ni pus mos shes//byin pa rna ba gnyis dag dang //rkang pa'i mthil dang snying ka dag/lte ba dang ni rgya ba gzhung dang //ba shang lam dang ni
36b7(rgyud): rkan shes bya//nang pa'i tshig dang mchu dag dang //'khur po 'khur chos dag dang ni//'doms dang mtshan khung gnyis dang ni//leg pa'i tshigs dang nang pa dag/
37a1(rgyud): dpung pa'i tshogs dang num gnyis//'jid pa thal gong 'dir mams so//mjug ma nor bu gnyis dag dang /
37a2(rgyud): rked pa'i tshig dang mgrin pa dang //dpral ba dang ni tshigasde gnyis dag/rna bug dag dang rtsu ba dang //brang dag gnyis kyi mtshams su 'dod//sngun dag dag
37a3(rgyud): ni sprin khugs dang //lce dang mi yi ste gang dag/de bzhin du ni rkan dang //dail+la kAk+ko la gnyis rnyege/de la sogs pa du ma ni//rtsa dang tshogs kyi
37a4(rgyud): gA ning du 'gyur//rang rlung spyod pa btsir bya ste//byang sems bdag nyid che rnams kyi//pratsun thabs sbyor ba'i cho ga ru//shes bya bla ma'i gsung
37a5(rgyud): gis so//zla ba zla ba'i chos gang du//tshe sa grangs de la rtsa ba'i rtse//drakar po'i chos gcig la sogs nas//ji srid nago po'i mthar thug
37a6(rgyud): par//shes bya byang chub 'bab pa'i rtsa//'ug mo sgo la spyod pa mo//gang dang 'dra ba'i gdong de yi//de 'dra'i sor mo phyag rgya ni//dbugs ni de dang 'dra bar bya//
37a7(rgyud): phyi dang nang gi bdog nyid 'dod//yang na rtsa rnams thams cad ni//brtsir bya bcu gnyis kyis lhag pa'i//brgya yi tshig rnams thams cad ni//ji ltar gdang
37b1(rgyud): gis rimyi pa so//de dang der ni a lci nga bar//drag mo'i sgyu ma dus kun tu//de phyir a zhes bya tra'i sgo//tshig tu rtog pas dwa rtags pa'o//dri bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs
37b2(rgyud): dbyung bar//rdo rje 'chang ltar brtag pa'o//gang dang gang gi chos 'ching bar 'gyur ba//rtsa ni gauti mug chen por 'gyur//de yis de yi rang bzhin gyur//sna tshogs gzugs
37b3(rgyud): kyi rin chen bzhi ni//rmongs dang mkhas rnams kyi dag la//mnga' bdag thar pa chen por bzhugs//byed pa 'byung po thams cad kyi//dbang phyug skye bo sna tshogs rnams//de phyir
37b4(rgyud): rtag tu lam nyams pa//sngon byas sdig pa'i lus kyis te//nyams 'gyur bstan pa 'di la ni//bgrod bya sangs rgyas nyid 'thob 'gyur//dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las//
37b5(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungaso//zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal
37b6(rgyud): blo chen po las 'ug gdong ma'i nges pa'i tshul dang yang dag pa'i cho ga las bskyed pa dang srog la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid le'u brgyad pa'o////de na sa gzhan nI do ni che bo//
37b7(rgyud): khyi gdong rgyu yi dbye bshad bya//gang zhig rnam par shes tsam gyi//rnal 'byor rnams kyis mchog 'grub 'gyur//sgra khyi ni rnal 'byor ma dbugs 'byin//rang gis 'jug da
38a1(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur//dus kun du ni gnyid lob dang //sad pa bde ba yon tan che//na sna tshogs gnas su sdod nas ni//bdag nyid kyis ni bde rig 'gyur//brgya
38a2(rgyud): la nyi shus lhag pa ni//nges tshig bstan bya'i mtshan nyid do//de ltar khyi yi ming du ni//bde ba sbyin pa por shes bya//pad+ma'i skye gnas de rnams//A s+yai/pad+ma'i khe ni rab
38a3(rgyud): rgyas pa//gtong dang longs spyod gar chen po//glu dang rol mo gnyid log dang //reg dang gos dang chun dag dang //me tog la sogs bsung can 'dod//'thun par lta ba'i ma
38a4(rgyud): la sogs//mdzes ma rnams kyis ngag can te//sangs rgyas mcho de sogs thams cad du//su rA'i btung la 'thung 'gyur dang //bskyed mos tshal dang rdzing bu'i 'gram//bsti
38a5(rgyud): gnas 'gro ba la sogs kyis//tshim dang ston mo 'dod po ltar//bla ma'i gsung ni bde chen po//mi dang mi mo'i bsregs pa dang //rgod dang sgeg pa'i bya ba gang //mkhas pa
38a6(rgyud): rnams kyi yid dam pa//skye bo dbang phyug nyid du'o//sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la//mchod dang phyag byed la sogs pas//bla ma gus las bde ba ste//yon dbul ba dang
38a7(rgyud): bud med//spyod la sogs chos rnams la//las thams cada' mi 'jug/rgol ba rnams ni gzhom pa dang //sangs rgyas chos rnams bzhag pa dang //rnal 'byor ma dang bzang/
38b1(rgyud): btung dang //sgom dang dga' ba bskyed pa dang //dbang po gnyis kyi bdag nyid skyes//sbyin sogs pha rol phyin rnams kyi//las kyi skyed pa btsal bya dang //byams dang snying rje dag
38b2(rgyud): ba dang //kun gyi tha mar btang snyoms dang //ye shes rnam shes smra ba dang /dbu mi'i tshul ni bzhag pa la sau//kun la dbugs dbyung sbyin pa dang //skur po 'debs pa dgag
38b3(rgyud): pa dang //dge ba bcu yi las dang ni//klog dang kha ton byed mchog las//byang chub la lam gnas pa yi//dpa' bo gnyis med lta bu'i phyir//lus la ltos pa med pa yis///
38b4(rgyud): grong dang grong du gnas rnams kyi//de ltar gnas skabs gcig pa'o//gnyis pa slar yang bshad par bya//sangs rgyas rnams kyi rgyud la dga'//don dam rnams la gsal ba/
38b5(rgyud): yi//rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gan su//dngos grub gtam rnams brjod pa dang //chos ni don chen 'du shes la//dusu 'du shes sgom pa po//'gro drug spong ba'i 'du shes ni//
38b6(rgyud): de nyid rtogs pa'i ming cano//dngos rnams sgyu ma'i 'du shes dang //zhi sogs las kyi bde ba dang //pha dang bu las gcig min dang //gnas sogs 'gro bar spro ba can//
38b7(rgyud): nyon mongs phung po yongs gtong dang //ye shes phung po bskyed pa dang //slar yang 'khor bar mi 'ong dang //'khor lo sdom pa'i rnal 'byor ldan//rtog pa po yi tshig bzu
39a1(rgyud): nas//rtog ldan min pa'i tshig spyangad bya//dbang po rnams kyi myi mthun min//rang bzhin gyis ni mdzes pa yi//lhan cig skyes dang longs spyod rdzogs/
39a2(rgyud): sprul pa dang ni chos sku'i yang //'du shes sad pa la sogasu//gang phyir srid 'tshor kun spangs bya//lhag ma dga' ba bzhi po ni//smon la mo rdzogs ldan la sogs la/
39a3(rgyud): rdzogs ldan du su rang bzhin skyo//dga' ba sangs rgyas rdzogs ldan gang //sems can gsum ldan la phra skyes//rig pa des la sbom po skyes//gnyis ldan la ni bde ba med/
39a4(rgyud): rtsod dus cha yi rags pa'o//thams cad sangs rgyas yon tan thob//smon lam gyis ni rang gi 'bras//de ltar bde skabs rnams kyis ni//sum cu rtsa gnyis rmad byung che//
39a5(rgyud): gnas skabs gsum pa'i bde ba la//dga' ba bcu drug rtag brtags pas//khams bcu drug tu shes par bya//rang bzhin skyes par gyur pa gsal//sman dang 'dra bar
39a6(rgyud): shes par bya//bdud rtsi zos pas pha rol 'gro/pade can dung dang sna tshogs can//glang po me dang bung ba'i ming //'khor lo rdo rje skye snar ma//du ba mo dang bu skye tshe//ljang rtsi spras
39a7(rgyud): dang ngo tsha dang //glog dang tsan dan nyi ma skyes//dmar po de bzhin sbrul gyi mig/sman mchog du ni shes par bya//bde bas dga' ba'i dus su ni//khab sogs byed pa'i skad cig
39b1(rgyud): las//bya ba de dag zhar la dran//sgom pa'i skad cig mthar 'gro ba'o//gnas skabs bzhi la bshad pa ni//yid can rnams kyi grangs brgya de//'gro dang 'pho 'gyur de bzhin du/
39b2(rgyud): skyug 'gyur gnyid yur 'gyur de bzhin//ltung 'gyur 'dzag 'gyur dang ni 'dir//g.yo 'gyur 'gyel bar 'gyur ba nyid//rnal 'byor mo brgyad dkar mo sogs//bde ba'i
39b3(rgyud): rgyu yi gnas skabaso//de ltar gnas skabs rnam bzhi la//khyi gdong ming gis 'du shes gyur//yang dag pa yi go 'phang 'dir//gong dang su yir gnas par 'gyur//yang
39b4(rgyud): dag rtsol ba la gnas nas//khyi ni gzhan gyi grong du'o//sngags bden sbyor ba bdag nyid de//dkyil 'khor dbusu bsgom pa'o//oM ba badz+ra TA shA ma na ta a ka s+yA Te ya oM ge taM
39b5(rgyud): hUM k+Sha hUM nA pha ya Ta srA Ta hA pa oM Ta swA hA//sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid sngogs//shes rab thabs te dad+mo grub ster//kha dog dmar po drag chen mo//lhag ma dri mye skyes ma dang /
39b6(rgyud): mtshungs//chu stod ka ra kra ta yugs sra//rang gi bdag po rab gnas ma//nye ba'i gling du gnas ma ste//sems can rang rang bzhin du skyes//dbang gi las la lha mo sto//lha dang //
39b7(rgyud): lha min sogs sngags rig/bdud rtsi lnga dang sgrol mche//mchod pa las rnams thams cad la'o//snying kha'i pad mar yongs bkugo nas//bdud rtsi tshigs kun las skyes pa/
40a1(rgyud): rdo rje sbu gu'i rab sbyor bas//sbyar dang bsro ba la sogs pas//sku rdo rje sogs sngags kyi ni//byin gyis brlab par byas pa la'o//dpa' bo thams cad
40a2(rgyud): mnyam sbyor las//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje mkha'agro de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungaso//zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' gro rgya mtsho
40a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las khyi gdong ma'i mtshan nyid dang bde ba la sogs pa'i gnas skabs kyi cho ga ste le'u ste dgu pa'o////de nas phag gdong
40a4(rgyud): ma yi ni//nyung ba rgya cher bshad par bya//dngos po kun la rab 'jug dang //dngos po de las ldog pa'o//phag mo rengs pa'i las rnams la//mi shes ri bo 'joms ma'o///
40a5(rgyud): smra//bab ni rdo rje'i gdod de yang //skud pa bzhin du kun 'gro ma//byang chub sems kyi dga' chen po//kwa/keng rus bdud rtsi 'byin pa mo//de'i rang bzhin 'dod chags
40a6(rgyud): sogs kun//bzhi pa las 'dras mi 'gyur ma//de nas lha mo chen mo brgyad//mngal srogs bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid de//thog mar bye rog bzhin sa bon//ma yi pad+ma la
40a7(rgyud): ltung ba'o//nub gcig gis ni phye ba yis//phye nas 'ug par gnas dang 'dra//zla ba gcig tu gnas nas ni//khyi yi dbugs ni 'phel ba las//phag tu'ang yan lag
40b1(rgyud): bdag nyid can//brtan ma sa skye gnas dul ba las//pho nya byis pa dang 'tshe phyis//ma che ba mo ni las bcom pas//'joms ma byang chub yan lag dgyes//dngos grub kun
40b2(rgyud): gyi 'bras 'byung ma//yang dag pa yi rtsol ba 'di//gzhon gyi lte ba nya phyogs kyi//'jug pa thams cad badren pa ste//'jug med de dngos spyod yulo//rkang gnyis
40b3(rgyud): rkang bzhi la sogs pa'i//rtsol ba'i yan lag la 'jog ma'o//mthong ba dang ni reg pas kyang //'jug med nyid rtag tu'o//kha dog srir mo drog chen mo//lhag ma
40b4(rgyud): gzugs can ma dang mtshungs//rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbusu ni//shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin can//seng ge gro zhin chu srin la//nye ba'i gling du gnas pa mo//sngags
40b5(rgyud): las bzhengs pa'i lha mo rnams//rang rang zhing dang nye zhing ma'o//oM bi daM dr-it+tA sU/kaR+Sha s+yA gra ye mu hUM kha hUM b+hi pha ShA TaN+Da ya Ta hUM swA hUM hA phA oM Ta phaT swA hA//sum cu rtsa bdun
40b6(rgyud): bdag nyid kyis//gtso mo mchog gi rnal 'byor ma//dkyil 'khor thig gdab la sogs ni//bsgoms pa'i sbyor ba'i ma yi ste//thig chen gnyis ni btab na su//shar
40b7(rgyud): dang so sor 'dod thig dang //zur gyi thig gnyis btab byas nas//phur bu'ang gdab par bya ba ste//tshangs pa'i thig gi logs nas ni//sum cu rtsa gnyis gdab//sgo na
41a1(rgyud): 'khor lo'i brgyud cha ste//lte ba'i pad+ma de dang mnyam//snying po 'dab ma'i ngos nas ni//cha gsum du yang de shes bya//de yi cha gcig 'khor lo gsum//
41a2(rgyud): lcug ma mtshon gyi sa gzhi'o//de yi sum cha phreng ba ste//rdo rje pad+ma dang 'khor lo//rtsibs rnams 'khor lo dbu ma las//dman te gnyis gcig sdom par sbom//ka ba rnams
41a3(rgyud): ni kun tu sbyin//brgyad gsum 'khor lo gsum du'o//sgo las sum 'gyur rta babs te//sgo khyud sgro yi cha can//stegs bu rnams nA de'i phyed te//'gram dang logs ni de
41a4(rgyud): bzhin no//gzugs kyi snum bu dang ni 'dir//rin chen phreng phyed snam bu'o//mgo bo'i phreng ba de yi phyed//mun paM'i snam bu de bzhino//ka ba'i rtse las 'thon rtse'o//sna
41a5(rgyud): tshogs rdo rje 'od chen po'i//dril chung dra ba gros rnams dang //ba de ni dril bu sgra sgrogs pa'o//de'i phyi chu skyes thams cad du//snying po la sogs yang dag bri//sna tshogs
41a6(rgyud): rdo rje'i phreng dang 'dir//lhag mar 'bar ba'i phreng ba'o//de'i phyi rol khor yug ni//sa gzhi'i rim pas bri bar bya//gri gug phyung ba sbyin bya zhing //mgo dang lagi pa dag
41a7(rgyud): de bzhin//snying po'i pad+ma'i phyi rol du//rin chen phreng ba yang dag bri//dur khrod brgyad po bri bya ste//kun nas gtum drag la sogs//sa bon rnam par dgod par bya/
41b1(rgyud): thams cad glo gug lA byung ba'o/yang na m+b+ha phyog sman mas na//yi ge rnams kyi dkyis 'byoran kun//de bzhin skad c-ig rnam pas byung //sa bon rgyam na dmyal la
41b2(rgyud): byung //mtshosaHpad+d+hi 'dab //'dud hUM mi thod pa ni//sum pa/du sbyin bya ste//su na bdun kwizhin b+h+yo//gan dang ba sgreng po paste//rgyu ni 'a
41b3(rgyud): zhing mgrin pa mgo//mthun pa rnam gas byu //drin chen lnga dang 'bru dang sman//d+hI ye hU~M med pa ma //bdud rtsi sgra rnams kyis dgang b+h+yo//gaN+DI ba lngas rna sa na
41b4(rgyud): ste//sbyin nas bsgoms pa la sogs pa'i/rdo rje l+h+wa mo rnam sa dang ni//zhing spyod dang ni khri rnams la//bdud sde sogs rdzas rnams dbul//Nim d+h+ya b+he la stsogs rnam
41b5(rgyud): pagags med yang dag 'phel bar 'gyur//phyi nas las nI yang dag ban+d+ha mau//du ma'i dud 'gro'i zhal+la lA~M mo//ma cu rtsa bdun gzugs can rnams las kyi rdo rje 'jam
41b6(rgyud): byas nas//ting 'dzin gsum gyi rnal 'byor//bdud rtsi gnyis phyug drug mo ste//zhabs bcwo brgyad ni rnams kyis ldan//rtswa bo'i zhal ni phag zhilnga te//dus gnyis
41b7(rgyud): dog tu dgu dgu'o//de yi steng du bdun bdun te//phyi nas gsum ni bzhag par bya//g.ya su khyi dang lce snying dang //byi la stag dang seng ge dang //'jigs byed mtsha can
42a1(rgyud): // ltar po/ sa papa /ga na du // sa smon da //so dang ga /dung mun du dang //rdo snyan rnam
42a2(rgyud): par bya//sbrul dang sre ma ngasaM pa dang //sram dang bye ba dang ni de me//mkha' sdong byi nad bye rog dang //'ug pa bya gar khra dang ni/
42a3(rgyud): gtsug pude can//phug ron 'dri rnams thams cad la//rang bzhin mdog tu 'dod par bya//dkyil 'khor gyis bya nges par ni/
42a4(rgyud): na na nade /na nas/la rlo byung bdag da/ rnam su
42a5(rgyud): na khyon pa zhenan/ sa skye 'jug ni / ma ma ni//debang po da ba ni rdo 'i dang / sbyin 'o//gan
42a6(rgyud): da //bdu snyan rgyu ma dang /sa kyi dag stod nga//na drug bu dang gi nga ga ste//de ltar ba N+Did dbyings rnams ni//sa pa rnyed
42b1(rgyud): zlo gug mdur drung no//gas pA shong phub dang tho bdad//'khar ma rbAr+m+ma klo dang //dbyug pa dang ni mtshan rtswa gtsug/dung dang blangs dung dbyug drung //rma byA'i mjug ma do ngan
42b2(rgyud): te//bya rog sgro dang bir dang ni//me yi thab dang ri bong dang //dbyug pa mi long pi wang dang //rkang mgo ldeg pa glo ba dang //sgyu ma sgra can lcags sgrog dang //gdas dang sgrog
42b3(rgyud): dang shAr+g+ha dang //mgo bcad 'bar ba mar nag dang //'jigs byed gzugs te rim pas//g.yon par dril bu phub rnyings myo che//tho bzhags pa thod pa dang //gzhu dang kha T+wAM ga
42b4(rgyud): to//phub rlung yu can bsdig mdzub dang //ga r+ya ka'i phreng dang lkugs sgrog dang //brag drung dur khrod rdul dang ni/kwalpags rlon dang //sgra yi zag pa'i phyeng ba dang /
42b5(rgyud): skul byed ro yi shing bu dang //brag dang phub dang mgo bo dang //keng rus zor ba de bzhin te//mig dang mkha la ma gnyi ma dang //spen pa dang ni phur pa dang //sa bon gang dang sog
42b6(rgyud): l-i dang //khab dang lus kyi zhugs pa dang //sprin rgyur 'bab dang shing ral gyi//de ltar rim pas shes byas pas//bdun cu rtsa gnyis rgyud kyi rgya'o//gnyis lhag pa yi phyag
42b7(rgyud): gnyis kyis//glang po'i lpags pa steng bgos pa'o//khams gsum glang po la bzhugs pa//dral ba bgegs ni bcom pa'o//kun gyi kha dog rang bzhin te//yang nan
43a1(rgyud): mo'i kha dog bzhin//mgo ba'i phreng sogs thams cad dang //gos drang rgyan rnams lus skyes pa'o//de ltar yang dag pa rtsol ba'i//gzugs brnyan can
43a2(rgyud): mar shes par bya//srang dag dran pa'i rang bzhin gyis//dngos dbye rlung gnyis bdag nyid do//ting 'dzin dra bas kun bkung nas//'od gsal ba la kun thim byos//rtogs
43a3(rgyud): nas sangs rgyas nyid 'thob 'gyur//sna tshogs dud 'gro sogs skye'o//rang rang skad kyis chos kyang ni//rang rig skyes la ston par 'gyur//sI ya yi ges 'gro kun
43a4(rgyud): rgyas btab ste//lhan skyes rang bzhi ni de kho na nyid dran par bya//slar yang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'ong ngo //phyugs gang yin pa'i skye bo de rnams sangs rgyas so//
43a5(rgyud): dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor bas//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje mkha' gro de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan bdag po so 'di gsung so//dpal mkha'
43a6(rgyud): 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/phag gdong ma bskyed pa dang dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa la sogs pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o////
43a7(rgyud): de nas brtan ma'i sbyor ba 'di //bshad kyi sgom pa po rnams nyon//kun nas dus ni bzhi rnamasu//zla ba gsum gsum pa ni bzhi//bgrod dang mnyam pas bcings
43b1(rgyud): pA ste//mtshams med rnams na rab bshad bya//byang du bgrod pa la sogs pa//brtun mA la sogs mtshams gnas ma//nye ba'i gling du gan sa pa ste/nAg so zla ba dang ni g+hun///
43b2(rgyud): hI ta ni rtag tu de'i//las gnyis dag tu shos bya ste//sbom po rnams kyi dus min pa'i//'chi ba mche bras gcod ma gang //de yis gshin rje'i mcher shes bya//thog mar
43b3(rgyud): yi ge gnyis cano//bcom ldan dus min 'chi ba ni//mi rnams la ni ji ltar 'byung //gang gis drin gyis bdag rig 'gyur//su zhig bdag la sprul par 'gyur//bcom ldan
43b4(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/brtan ma dus min 'chi ba ni//sems can+da rang rang las kyis so//skye bo kun lnga tshe ba yi//sdig gang bdag nyid kyis byas pa//de yi sa dA ni dus min
43b5(rgyud): 'chi//khams dang dbugs ni 'chad par 'gyur//gzhan rnams kyis ni bcad pa yis//bza' bo tung phyin ci ldog tu 'gyur//sbyin pa rnyed pa dang bcas sbyin//dus min gyis ni
43b6(rgyud): nyams mi 'gyur//sbyin pa rnam pa gnyi su bshad//lus dang bsam pa las kyang //g.yon gyi sna yi sgo ru ni//zla ba rgyu ba'i r-i me pA yis//bzod po srog na nyi mi'i ste/
43b7(rgyud): a ba d+hU tI'i rlung rim pas//de yis ya yis yi ge bshad//ma yi yi ge dbus 'bab ma'o//de yig ga ya su song ne sa ni//re zhig dbus ma rgyu bar 'gyur//a yaM yi gre/
44a1(rgyud): gnas pa 'thob/slu ba na mkhar 'gro ba mo//rtswa ni bde kun bdag nyid rnams//d+hi yi yi ge'i ming du shes//mdor bsdus pa yi yi ge ni//dkyil/
44a2(rgyud): 'khor lnga rnamasu ni brjod//de rnams dngos las khyab bskyed de//dus min slu bar rig par bya//de ltar bsod nams gcig nyid po//gun sa gnas bgrod pa'i lus can
44a3(rgyud): no//'chi ba zhes 'di rnam rtog ste//mkha' spyod go 'phang 'khrid par 'gyur//'dir ni kha dog gnyi su 'gyur//lus sgom pa ni de bzhi no//ji ltar mkha' 'gro ma'i rim pas//
44a4(rgyud): mtshan ma mtshon cha so byas 'gyur ro//spong ba'i chos zhes bya bar gsungs//dkyil 'khor dbus kyi gtso mo'o//rnal 'byor sum cu bdun bdag nyid//sngags las byung /
44a5(rgyud): ba'i bdag nyid kyi//oM ASh+Tas hUM ha ba sra dz+nyA b+hU ya dza ma b+hU dA su Da rA kI ya ye hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT phaT swA hA hA oM//'di ni shes rab thabs bdag nyid//rnal 'byor
44a6(rgyud): ma dang dpa' bo'i gtso//gshin rje'i mche ba'i rab sbyor bas//skye ba mthar byed bzo' bar bya//dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/
44a7(rgyud): rdo rje mkha 'gro de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungaso//zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha'agro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las gshin rje
44b1(rgyud): byu ba'i rnam par banag b+h+yo dang bskyod pa'i mtshan nyid zhes bya ba sgra/9'u bAn+d+ha gaN+DIg pa/de nas gshin rje bauny+dza'argyung //gang+gA gis 'chi bdabadu 'gyur bya'o//
44b2(rgyud): br-i sh+tsi kA ru meng dag byung //smin drug tso nu dang bzang por ldan//dpyid kyis mnyam pa'i dus kyis ni//pho nya ma bskyed mtshan nyid do//gshin rje gsod pa de yi ni//'chi
44b3(rgyud): slu ba'i 'khor lo la//rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo tshur//yun gsum du ni bskor bar bya//lha rnams nyi shu rtswa lngar ni//bcu gsum par ni bri bar bya//slar yang
44b4(rgyud): sum cu gnyis rnams//gsum gnyis gcig ni lo yin no//dus tshod me dang gnyis zla ba//zla ba'o ches phyogs de bzhin meda'//gsum gnyis gcig gi skabasu ni//rim
44b5(rgyud): bas b+hin te phyed sogs//nyi me gcig dang nag dang gnyis//gsum bzhi sa dang nyi ma phyogs//nor ra chu phyogs rimya pas te//sumA cu bdun bdag nyid gsal ba'o//srog
44b6(rgyud): sa pa gis phyag/tsu bu 'i ni dag /cu dgu skur yang 'di ru ni//'joms pa'i bdag nyid nus tseno//nyi mar bdun po mnyam son par//skye bo'i skar mo dang zla ba//gcig tu spyod par chu
44b7(rgyud): rgyu las//rgyas pa'i dus ni yang de gi 'thob//bar gyi nyi ma rnams nyid ni//bcu drug grangasu shes bya la//bdun cu rtsa gnyis rim po yis//lo yi rim pas yang dag sbyar//de phyir
45a1(rgyud): bar+N+Na yang //dkyil 'khor bdug nyid can sa sgra//blang rgyun ga smras pa//da ni 'di dri 'arab paraH//s+yAd du yal 'du b+h+ya \u0f7fga/da
45a2(rgyud): ba yis ni dbugs bya ba'o//de ni mnyam pa mtshams kun te//mnyam pa ya yig gyis 'gugs ma'o//de nas gnad bcings pas nyams pas//ma yI yi gos thams cad
45a3(rgyud): bshad//'og dang steng du bskyod byas nas//rnon po'i mA ni rab sbyar bya//nad rnams dang ni sdig mang rnams//las kyi rang nyid nyams par 'gyur//der ni sbyin pa sbyin bya ste//
45a4(rgyud): ba lang ma he zhon sogaso//byang chub sems kyis lam du ni//mdzes ma rnams kyi de ro btung //dar yang rang gi yan lag las//byung ba'i sna sman btang bar bya//'o ma dang
45a5(rgyud): mnyam bza' bya ste//glo ba la sogs mtshos pa'o//g.yul ngo rang nyid 'gyel ba yi//gal te rnyed na khrag chen po//the tsom spangs nas btung byi zhing //de yi sha yang bza'
45a6(rgyud): bar bya//yang na gang gi sa gnasu//'chi ltas zad nas song bar du'o//bza' ba 'o mas byas na bde//yang na sha rnams thams cad//gos 'jam rnams kyis yongs
45a7(rgyud): g.yogs nas//bdag nyid la ni dus kun tu//der ni gnas pa bsro bya zhing //me dang lhan cig nges gnas bya//der ni chu dron kyang btung zhing //bza' ba chung ngu nyung ngu'o//
45b1(rgyud): gshin rje'i pho nya bsgom bya ste//sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid rang //gsung sngags kha sbyor bdag nyid can//ser dmar gnyis kyi khwa dog can//ser pos 'chi ba rengs par byed/
45b2(rgyud): dmar pos dbang du 'gugs par byed//lhan skyes rdzogs byang chub dngos kyi//lte 'ogo mgrin pa rkan 'gro rnams//zab pas srog ni gzhan 'gro ba//phan tshun bug rnams su
45b3(rgyud): 'du 'gyur//de phyir kha T+wAM pA sgom ste//yan log kha T+wAM sbyor bas so//snying ka'i pad dbusu sems kyi sra//dkyil 'khor sngon cha'i cha can no//lha mo'i mdog ni ston can te/
45b4(rgyud): dbyibs sogs gzugs can ma dang mtshungs//oM ba pa dz+wa ra ya shu ma pU dU shro tI d+ya ye tA hUM sU hUM la phaT kha phaT D+hA sA ga hA d+hA ri Ni hUM hUM phaT swA hA oM hUM//shes rab/
45b5(rgyud): thabs bdag nyid du skyes//sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rang bzhin can//rnal 'byor mi ni la di rnams kun//bdude rtsi'i gzugasu bsgom par bya//de rnams snying khar dkar ba ni//
45b6(rgyud): 'khor lo thaMdaM rnaM sgom byad rnams ni nga du rang ming kyang //kha dog dkar mo 'os bcas pa//rtsa yi bu ga so so yi//nang du'ang rnam par bsgom par bya//rlon dang btsos pa'i ra'i 'o ma//
45b7(rgyud): bdud rtsi lnga dang rang 'byung ni//rdo rje'i rtse mos 'thungs pas kyang //dus su 'chi ba nyams par 'gyur//zag med de nyid thob pas na//de la dus min 'chi ming ci//de phyir yang
46a1(rgyud): dag rab spong ba'i//chos nyid ga shin rje'i pho ny+tsar shes//rdo rje btung byas rab bshad pa//las kyis rnam pa gnyi su 'dod//gcig ni phyi rol gyir
46a2(rgyud): bshad do//gnyis po nang gi bdag nyid 'dod//rdo rje rtse gsum bsgom bya ba//rtse drug dus ni rgyu ba mo//ngang pa'i rgyu bar 'dzin pa'i srog/'og pa chu ni 'thung ba yi//bdud
46a3(rgyud): rtsi lnga sogs gang cung zad//de yi dbus su rab tu zhugs//'thungs pas rgas dang 'chi ba 'bros//rdo rje 'chang gi gdam dug go/grwashin rje pho nya ma yi rnal 'byor ma
46a4(rgyud): khyod bzhugs//de yis slar yang rgas dang 'chi ba med pa 'thob//'chi ba slong bar byed pa'i rnal 'byor ma bla med//rnal 'byor ma la sdig dang bsod nams me ldano//de ni
46a5(rgyud): mnyam pa'o mnyam srog las//g.yon dang g.yas dang dbu ma yi//rtsol ba g.yo med dngos po laso//slar yang ya mi'i yi ge 'dod//pho nya phyogs gnyis kyi ngad pa//drabu
46a6(rgyud): ma zad pa'i go 'phang //de ltar rnam pa mang po ni//brtan pa'i blo ldan gyis mtshon bya//'dir mang bshad pas ci bya ste//sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin sogs pa//dge ba'i
46a7(rgyud): las kyang bsnyen bya ste//lus gcig lus mang po can//rnal 'byor ma la mchod bya zhing //dpa' bo rnams la rjed par bya//gang zhig gang slong la yang dag/de phyir
46b1(rgyud): dri rnams lnga nges sbyin//dpa' bo byams cad mnyam sbyor las//rdo rje sems dpa' bde du'i mchog/rdo rje mkha' gro de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan dadag pos 'di gsungaso//
46b2(rgyud): zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor mi'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las gshin rje pho nya mo bskyed pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang 'chi ba be smra ba'i 'khor lo sdom pa'i
46b3(rgyud): mAn ngag mdor bsdus pa ste lo'u bcu gnyis pa'o////de nas gshin rje mtsho gtsigs ma//bshad kyis da ni mnyan par gyis//sems can rnams kyi bag chags kyi//skyon
46b4(rgyud): gyis gur la 'bigs dang sreg/gang zhig gang la las byas pas//da yi dus su 'bigs par 'dod//brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i gnad rnams ni//glang drang der ni gnas rnams kyang //
46b5(rgyud): 'di rnams dbusu bya ba ste//dge dang dman pa mtshon par bya//mi dge ba ni 'chir dogs pas//gnad du na bas mtshon par bya//gal te dus ni gcig la ni//rka na gsum du
46b6(rgyud): ni gzar ba na//de tshe zhag gsum na 'chi brla//rig bya 'di la the tsom med//rkang pa'i brang ba gzer ba dang //gal te lte bar gzer ba ni//lha mo zhag gnyis na 'chi bar//
46b7(rgyud): skye bo rnams ni 'gyur ba'o//rkang pa gnyis kyi brang mthil dang //gal te mig tu gzer ba na//de tshe zla ba gsum na yang //'chi byed kyi ni dbang du 'gro/rkang pa'i mthil ni gzed
47a1(rgyud): bdang //kapra tas+thA nI gzir pa na//zhag gsum na nI N+DI 'gyur bar//'di la yang ni thetsom med//bshad dang gci ba'i dus su ni//gal tI pa/
47a2(rgyud): byung ba na//de yi de ltar dus chod kyi//ljon nges pur 'chi ba'o//sde d+mo yi ni nyin lnga dang //dbus na'i gung la bcu de bzhin//gzhan gyi gung la zla byed gcig/nam byed la
47a3(rgyud): yang zla ba ste//'di tshe'i de ltar dus su ni//gal te sbrid byung sngon bzhin te//dus kyi nges par 'tsho 'gyur bas//'di la the tsom med pa'o//lhag pa yi ni bdud khung du//
47a4(rgyud): gzeng na ka ni lnga rnams na//de ni'i chi bar 'gyur ba ni//zhes 'di la the tsom med//lha mo lde rtsi ma mthong na//dri phyir zhag ni gsum na 'chi//nyan pa yi ni rje
47a5(rgyud): gzer//'chi ba zla ba bzhina'o//rlig g.yon pa yi 'bras bu ni//me long la ni ma mthong na//de tshe zhag bdun na 'chi bar//sngon gyi skye bar bshad pa'o//dkar po yI ni
47a6(rgyud): tshe gcig la//gal te khu ba dkar min 'gyur//zla ba drug na de 'chi ste//dmar pos nang du nges par 'gyur//b+ha ga ling ga yongs sbyar ba'i//mtha' ru gal te sbrid pa ni//
47a7(rgyud): byung na zla ba ldan ni//de tshe ltung bar 'gyur ba'o//sbyor ba'i dus su dril bu'i sgra//rna dag la byung 'tsho gsal bar//gal te brgya byin mnyam gyur pa//zla ba ldan
47b1(rgyud): tsamA med//de bzhin dus ni gcig glo tshe//gral te zla ba nyi ma dag/gang gi sems can la gzor ba//zla ba gtsug tu 'tsho bcas pa'o//rkang lag dag gi tshogs ban dang //
47b2(rgyud): ma rlu sbyin sa mal//gang gi c-ig gzezung ba//des pad zla ba gcig nA //bskur ba rnams kyis gar bya ni//la tu nus rjes bdag marnam pa/
47b3(rgyud): mnyan kyang 'gyur//snying ka'i dbus dang de stozhin sngon//'dir yang ma grin pa'i spyod yul te//zla phyed gsum na 'an bar ni/
47b4(rgyud): rnam spyad spyod yul 'dri la med//slar yang mgro bo'i rtse mor gzor//grong khyer grwa sum gyi rgya mtsho sreg/'bral du 'chi bar shes bya bar//lus kyi gur
47b5(rgyud): du bshad pa'o//rna ba'i rtsi bar de bzhin gzer//'phrul du'i chu bar nges par bshad//sbyin pa'i dbu su do bzhin gzer//de yI skad cig la 'tsho 'gyur//sU yA N+Di ma
47b6(rgyud): rlung grang mor//gyur na yongs rdzogs dus yin//de ltar 'chi ba thams cad ni//mche gtsigs go'i 'phang gis bslu'o//gang gi du su 'di 'gyur ba //gzir ni de tsha
48a1(rgyud): dus 'dir 'gyur//bzor ba'i gnas ni gsal mtshan nas//rtsa bru bcu yo mnyo bar bya//khyab 'jug nos bya'i mamyur khu ni//mgo bor rtag tu bzung bar bya//
48a2(rgyud): snga nus rnam snang mar khu dang //mar dang khrug tu yongs ldan pa'o//nyi ma'i 'od kyis mi gdung ste//skye bo dang bral khyim dron por//sbyor ba'i rgya mtsho che bzung bas//rnal
48a3(rgyud): 'byor ma de ying bsgom bya//yaM/gang gi dkyil 'khor chen por ni//ma/dbu ma'i mthi'i yi mtshan nyid las//g.ya su bgrod po'i dus su ni//daM/sa yig tshig
48a4(rgyud): mtshams kun tu'o//bu ga ga zer byed phug nas ni//de'i skad cig la dbyug gu dbyug/nA dril hril pon ni 'gyur bzhin pa//Sha/snying khwa'i rdzing bu la sogs la//
48a5(rgyud): shes bya mtshoms kun tu yang so//gzer ba'i 'chi ba m+bu bA la//i/dbang po yos ni thams cad la//yid ni de bzhin nges par gnas//Sh+Ti yi yi gaM zhes bya ba//
48a6(rgyud): lhun tshogs bcad gnyis kyis gsungs//der ni ting 'dzin zhes bya ba//dbang po sbyangs pas thob par gyid//be sbrul skud pas nor bu dang //spyi gtsug klo ni gcig
48a7(rgyud): /rnam shes brgyad pader gnas par//bsgom bya myos rgyad nga rdzab pa'o//kun tu sdud pa de btang bas//gshin rje'i mche ba 'joms pa ma//de yis nA mi yig/
48b1(rgyud): shud do//gan rU ba thams cad rnam 'joms ma'o//kha dog dmyur dang sngo ba skye//'chi ba 'joms ma byang chub 'gro//de yis mtshon char 'gyur ba ni//dum skyes rnal 'byor
48b2(rgyud): ma yi'o//rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid mchog/oM ba b+hA dz+ra g+hA ya dz+ri ma na daM aSh+NI m+ba nI ra ya d+ha ke rA ya hUM ya hUM hU~M pha hUM TA pa pha Ta To phaT smA/ swA hA
48b3(rgyud): A~M/shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin du'ang //skud pa'i dbus su bsgom par bya//tha skar zla ba de bzhin du//sra 'ang dang khyu mchog rI si'i 'o//'dis ni byed bzhin pa yis ni//
48b4(rgyud): 'chi ba slu ba dge ba'o//gzhan ni de la de ltar bya//pho nya ma ni gsal bar brjod//gzhan gyi 'chi ba slu ba yang //brgya phrag 'bum rnams shes par bya//'on kyang kun stong gnas
48b5(rgyud): byas nas//bla mchog rgyanyes pas byas pas so//dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje mkha' gro de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan
48b6(rgyud): bdag pos 'di gsungaso//zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha'agro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'o rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las gshin rje mche ba ma'i rab tu sbyor ba la 'jug pa'i 'chi ba bslu ba
48b7(rgyud): sogs pa'i le'u skye nu gsum pa'o////de nas 'joms ma'i 'jug pa ni//gang gis pha rol 'gro bshad bya//rnal 'byor ma rnams 'dus byas nas//gzhi las 'dri
49a1(rgyud): bar byed pa ste//'jug pa zhes bya ci ru bshad//khyab bdag pha rol 'gro ni ci//shin tu ngo mtshar ston pa gsungs//rdo rje 'dzin pa bka' drin mdzod/
49a2(rgyud): nyon cig sgyu ma'i 'jug pa yod //mi bden pa ni rtags pa ste//lha mo dbang po'i dra ba ltar//'joms ma yi yang 'jug pa ste//mthong ba na yang de la med//chu yi zla ba lta bu
49a3(rgyud): mchog/rang gi rang bzhin la 'jug 'gyur//rnal 'byor de nyid 'dzin rnams kyi'o//dus kyi 'chi ba'i dngos po yang //las kyis su ni sgrub ste//'khor ba las ni pha rol 'gro/
49a4(rgyud): 'chi med slu ba yang ni med//ston gyi nam nya ni mnyam dus su//sna yi na mkha'i dkyil 'khor du//rlung ni rnam par 'dzin bzhin pas//'chi ba'i dus ni slu ba'o//brgya phrag
49a5(rgyud): drug dang nyi shu gcig/stong phrag rnams kyi srog rnams ni//oM pa d+hU tIr rab zhugs pa//de ni 'joms mer mngon brjod pa'o//byis pa'i mkhas pa rmong sa pa yi//zla ba
49a6(rgyud): bshad pa de ma yin//de min slu ba rab bshad pa//'di ni bdag gi bo rang mtshan nyid//slar yang lha mo des gsungs pa//ya sogs de ltar don bstun pas//gang gang ting
49a7(rgyud): 'dzin dmigs nas ni//namakha'i mnyam sogs 'dus pa'i mtha'//rgyud ni de bzhin srog chen po//rdo rje lta bur yang ni bshad//dal gyis dal gyis 'gro bdag nyid/
49b1(rgyud): tshogs rnams kun tu thim pa'o//zhi gla nas lhag mthong dag gis ni//byang chub 'chi ba spyod sprul min//rdo rje'i sngar ni 'khrid pa d+ma grags//gau 'phang chen po 'dzin mchog rga
49b2(rgyud): de ltar yin tani khyod 'phags pas//mi rnams kyi ni mi dge mdzad//nor chen go 'phang thob pa ni//yang dag spyong pa'i mtshan nyid do//srog gi yang dag rgyu byas nas//dus sun
49b3(rgyud): tu ni nye bar bya//rtog tu 'chi ltas 'chi ba bslu//rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis lhan cig/rnal 'byor ma rnams dang mjal ba//bsod nams dbang gis rgya lama'i thob//de rnams dang
49b4(rgyud): byas dga' chen po//myangs pas 'chi ba smra bu yin//de phyir rnal 'byor mya rnams kyi//mchod pa rnalnga 'byor pa yis bya//rdo rje 'chang chen go 'byung ni//de rnams mnyes pas
49b5(rgyud): thob par 'gyur//rmongs pa gang zhig smod byed pa//de yi dngos grub mchog med do//de rnams la ni smod pa las//mA nur med dmyal ba chen por 'gyur//dri yis bsod nams
49b6(rgyud): byas pas ci//bsrungs par gnas pa'i mdoka' thub ci//rnal 'byor ma la rtag gus pa//skad cig yid tsam stsogs kyiso//lha mo kha dog gnyis ma ste//srid dang mya ngan 'das
49b7(rgyud): gzugs can//dkyil 'khor pa rnams dbus su ni//bsgom bya mtshan ma lA ma bzhin//sngags kyi yi ge'i sbyor ba yis//sum cu rtsa bdun rnal 'byor mas//bskyed bya tham
50a1(rgyud): dang brtsastu ga//spyan smyos sbyor bsdu rdza //oM dAsh+tsadz+dzad+hu ya d+hu mam+b+han+ta g+hAHn+tir phyu d+d+haTu d+g+had+hU ba yan+na d+hU pa s+thA nAn pa oMn+dak+Shany+tsa//de sna
50a2(rgyud): shungs kur tsam gyi ni//thig la'i dbus ma bsgom par bya//snying kha la sogs 'khor lo ru//gang du yid ni yongs spyir gyi sa//bu mo ru s+tha la zla ba ying //khrums can nye ba'i/
50a3(rgyud): gling ma'o//sems can don byed de nyid du//thim dang longs spyod sogs byed ma//phag mo'i sprul pa'i bdag nyid du//skyes pa srid pa 'jams byed ma'o//bcom ldan rdo rje'i rnam
50a4(rgyud): 'byor ches//lha rnams thams cad gtsug pa dang //'khor mi sgyung chen ngo bo las//thams cad kun ni sgrul pa nga //sangs rgyas nyid bdag 'du shes kyi//de'i bdag nyid /
50a5(rgyud): spyod par 'gyur//bsdu de de ltar yod min pa//'byin pa du ni ji ltar 'gyur//'di kun sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste/sgyu mamed cing stong nyid med//ngo bo kun tu sbyor ba tsam//sangs rgyas
50a6(rgyud): nyid sogs 'du bcas pa'o//rdzogs ldan gsum ldan sogs dngos gnyis//rang gI ri nga bzhin mtshan nyid do//rnam gzhag tsam du gsungs pa no//dngos po ma 'khrul
50a7(rgyud): po nyid//rnam par rtog pas brtag par bya//rtog pa med par gyur pa na//brtag pa nyid du mi bya'o//rtog dang rtog med las grol 'gyur//thams cad gzigs pa rnams
50b1(rgyud): /bstan//gang zhig gang dngos skad cig mthong //de mthong ri bong rwa bzhin no//'dri yis 'bog pa med par ni//skye ba la srogs yongs rtogs bya//sna tshogs lung dang rgyud rnams/
50b2(rgyud): la'ang //rig pa can 'dir rnam par dpyod//rnam dpyad gyur pas rigs pa ni//de rigs bdag gi che ba'o//semo sa ni de yi gzhi rtogs par//rna ba'i drung du brjod pa'o//slob
50b3(rgyud): ma'i phyir dang bla ma la//pus phyir 'don gzung bar gyis//deng se skye bo che thung la//rig pa gzhan dag la yod min//gso can rtsod pa'i dus ni//blo chung bsod nams shin tu
50b4(rgyud): chung //de phyir bsod nams ldan rnams kyi//ye shes sangs rgyas spyod yul min//yun ring dus nas snying rje ni//bsten 'gyur rtog pa ma byed cig/bsod nams grangs med
50b5(rgyud): ma byas par//slar yang ye shes smra ba ci//byang chub sems ci sangs rgyas ci//'dri la khyad par yod mi 'gyur//dngos po rtogs phyir sangs rgyas nga //de dngos byang chub
50b6(rgyud): sems dpa' rang //dbang po rnams ni byang chub sems dpang bskyed//yul rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas nyid du gyis//phung po dang ni sangs rgyas lhan cig zung //khams rnams rdo rje
50b7(rgyud): 'dzin par gzung bar byas//srid par slar yang ldog par 'gyur po ma yino//thams cad 'chi ba med pa'i ngo bor zung //snying rje yi ni sbyor bas khyod bzhugs shing //gang dang gang
51a1(rgyud): /gis gzhan gyi dogs pa gyis//brjod med kun la'ang nan tan byos//mkha' 'gro ma sogs 'joms mtha' yi//'joms ma 'dus pa thams cad dang /
51a2(rgyud): bgegs sogs 'byung po 'dus pa ma//'jig rten sdang ba thams cad dang //yi dgas sogs dang dmyal ba'ang rung //gshin rje la sogs khro ba 'dir//sngon gyi brag chags
51a3(rgyud): 'joms ma'o//dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor bas//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje mkha' gro de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so//
51a4(rgyud): zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las gshin rje 'joms ma 'jug pa bskyed pa drang dus su 'chi ba sru ba'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid dang
51a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi gnas skabs kyi rang bzhin to le'u bcu bzhi pa'o////de nas 'di la gsang chen bshad//yang dag ting 'dzin mtshan nyid do//dpal he ru kar gnas
51a6(rgyud): gang gis//gus bcas las gzhan lo yod min//'jig pa la sogs chags pa'i mthar//bstan pa sprul pa'i sku gsal ba'o//chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sogs
51a7(rgyud): 'dir//thams cad bsdus pa byas par 'gyur//thog mar gnas ni kun bsgrub bya//skye bo med dang ri sogs dang //dur khrod du byed ru ni//gtor ma zhing skyed rnams la'o//
51b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor kha yig tsang sbra sogs//sngon song mchod yon la sogs dbul//bcom ldan 'das kyi skur dmigs nas//raswa bris sogs sgom bshad par bya//yi dag sa
51b2(rgyud): can dragro chen po//sgom pa 'gro ba'i don dang ldan//kun nas kun tu skad cig gis//ting 'dzin ni dmigs par bya//shrI yig 'byung ba kun gyi dron//phyi dang nang gi
51b3(rgyud): bdag nyid 'dod//'di dag kun rdzob gzugs dang ni//'jug med bde ba'i mtha' can dang //e baM lnga sogs gnyis med pa'ang //shrI zhes bya ba'i yig dos brjod//
51b4(rgyud): haMhe yig snying kA nas kun d+hu//he ru ka sogs rang 'khor 'gro//sgom pa kun gyi 'byung gnas las//'dzin pa la sogs rnam bskyed 'gyur//de ni rgyu stong bdag nyid de/
51b5(rgyud): bdag nyid du mi rtog sde'o//rang bzhin chos bdag med pa nyid//de ni stong pa'i rnal 'byor gnas//bkod pa gang zag bdag med pa//rtog pa'i dra ba chen po ni//
51b6(rgyud): yig rkyen gyi bdag nyid can//de ni bdag gi bkod bral ba'o//slarA brjod ga ni ma lus pa'i//bdag gis gnyis byar med shes gang //gang phyir ci la'ang mi gan+tha//
51b7(rgyud): pa/de phyir ka zhes bya bar brjod//dngos po mngon sum stong pa min//dngos po tsam gyi rang bzhin can//dpal he ru ka gnas lha mo//snga nos sgom pa kun 'a
52a1(rgyud): pa'o//snying lnga pad+ma'i nyi dbus su//ye shes sa bon rang 'byung las//'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa//na mkha' gang bar spro bar bya//ye shes mkhA/
52a2(rgyud): 'gro ma yi gzugs//lha yi tshogs ni spyan drangs nas//na mkha'i khongs kyi dbus su ni//'gro ba'i bdag po bzhig byas la//zla nyi shar bshad nyid skyes pa'i//bdud
52a3(rgyud): rtsi sogs kyis mchod byas nas//sdig po bshags sogs byas nas ni//snying rje la sogs rjes dran bya//stong nyid rang bzhin bdag nyid kyi//rnal 'byor dag pa rnam bsgom
52a4(rgyud): bya//sa bon lnga yi rang bzhin las//khang pa brtsegs pa rnams sprul bya//rgyu yi rdo rje 'chang ba phyis//ri rab pad+ma'i steng du gsal//sku mdog dkar po zhal bzhi pa//sbyin
52a5(rgyud): gsum phyag ni bcu gnyis pa//shes rab khwa sbyor sbyor bdag nyid//byis pa'i rkyen gyis brgyan pa'o//dkar dang ljang ku dmar ba dang //ser po g.yon nas bskor bso//
52a6(rgyud): zhal gyi rol pa'i cod pan la//sna tshogs rdo rje blo phyod 'dzin//'phrog byed dkar mo mnyam par mnan//g.yas rgyang zhabyas kyis yang dag bzhugs//rdo rje dril bu gling
52a7(rgyud): chen gyi//spags pa cang te'u gri gug dang //dgra sta rtse gsum de bzhin du//kha T+wAM ga snod zhags pa dang //mgo ste g.yon dang g.yas poro//'dam skyes kho dod/
52b1(rgyud): sgra tshogs la//ma ban pan bAn+d+ha rtsa brgyad dang //'khor lho'ang byun+d+ha gnyis bdag nyid ldan//skyon bcu drug bdag nyid dang //nyams dga' dur khrod srog tu sman to//d+hU
52b2(rgyud): thig rin chen rdo rje dang //pad+ma 'khor mo rol gri dang //sna tshogs rdo rje bod pa dang //mgo bo keng rus 'di rnams dang //zhags pa'am lhag suMk+ShA raM shes b+ha ste/
52b3(rgyud): la 'khor lor phreng ba'o//rI ri ru rtsibs ni sum cu drug/rdo rje pad+ma nyi ma n+dan//rgyu yi rdo rje yongs gyur pa//lnga brgya bzhi yis lhag pa yi//dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rdzogs
52b4(rgyud): pa'o//rtag tu glu maSh+Ti sgra yiso//mnga' bdag nyi ma re rer 'gro ba 'gron 'bod na//khyod ni ci yi phyir na stong pa nyid du bzhugs//bzhengs shigra bdag ni snying rje'i rang
52b5(rgyud): bzhin te//rdo rje 'dzin pa byede chen bdag la 'dod pa mdzod//gson cig gson cig gzhan gyi dgos pa nub//'jig rten phyugs gang shi bA bzhin du 'gyur//
52b6(rgyud): bdag gi pad+ma rgyas pa lnga 'dod mdzod//de ltar 'jig rten kun padar 'gyur byar byos//rdo rje 'dzin pas byadagu le rol cig rol+la//lhan skyes rlung bzhin brjod du med pa
52b7(rgyud): thog/se miso can 'jig rten gzhan ni rmongs gyur pas//ji ltar khyod kyi stong po don med 'gyur//khyod ni chos rnams kun gyi byed pa ste//ci phyir lhan skyes pa
53a1(rgyud): bzhin 'gro med bzhugs//bdag la mchog gi don gyis 'dod pa mdzod//de ltar khyod ni 'jig rten rnams 'thun bzhud//glu 'dis rje su bskul
53a2(rgyud): ba yis//rang rang he ru ka rab spyad//oM AHkA ya bAk+tsit+ta badz+ra hUM phaT hoH//gsang sngags 'di ni 'don pa ni//skad cig rnam pa'i rnal 'byor ldan//skad cig sngags
53a3(rgyud): las byung bdag nyid//dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma'o//'jigs byed mtshan mo na ge mo dang //lte ba nyi ma che mchog la//gang du mdzad pa yi ni sku//gnag dang ldang
53a4(rgyud): ku phyed phyed do//bdun cu rtsa drug phyag dang ni//zhal bcu bdun la spyan gsum pa//dpa' bo ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin//sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed ca na//mche ba chen po
53a5(rgyud): gtsigs pa'i zhal//g.yos dang g.yon pa rtag tu ni//ser ba dang ni ljang ku grags//nub ni dmar po de bzhin te//lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs//mche ba gtsigs
53a6(rgyud): 'jigs par byed//rim pa ji lce'i mtshon cha'i mchog/g.yas dang gi yin par shes par bya//glang chen lpags pas phyag gnyis kyis//skye gnas phyag rgya de bzhin
53a7(rgyud): gzhan//rdo rje ral gri mdung rings dang //rtse gsum ji lta'i rim pas g.yas//dgra sta gri gug mda' dang ni//gsol shing phub dang tho ba dang //'khor lo cang te'u
53b1(rgyud): spyod// dru nan gas+ho// du bla sma du ga dang // m+b+ha m+mA ga ma da na du// ga/da D+ga // sno sa du tha~Md dud//
53b2(rgyud): drig pa mo mang bri weng dang //rlung mgo lag pa glo ba dang //sgyu ma b+hU gcin lcags sgrog dang //gdos dang du b+h+yo sany+dzats+tsha//mgo med 'bar ba'i mar naglu dang //'jigs
53b3(rgyud): byed gzugs te rim paso//g.yon pa dril bu phub rings mchog/hU~MtAn+ta shong zhags pa spyod pa dang //grezhu dang kha T+wAM go po thi//phub chung yu can bsdigs mdzub dang /
53b4(rgyud): go ye ra ka'i phreng dang lcags sgrog dang //brag drong dur khrod rdul dang ni//b+ho ka rnga dang lpags rlon dang //sgra yi theg pa 'byung bya dang //ro smrig skul ba'i shing bu dang //'pho
53b5(rgyud): dang phub rings mgro bo dang //keng rus zor ba de bzhini du//mig de ma sum gnyi ma dang //smon pa yi ni phur bu dang //so bon gang sog le dang //khab dang srung ba shus
53b6(rgyud): lpags pa dang //sprin cher 'bab dang shing lcags kyu//phyag gi mtshon cha bdun cu gnyis//de lta'i rimi pas shes par bya//mgo bo lnga yi rgyan du byi se//phyag
53b7(rgyud): rgya drug dang ldan pas klubs//de bzhin mgo brgya'i phreng ba dang //dpung rgyan zhabs gdub sgra sgrogs dang //sku la ba spu'i phreng bar ldan//de yi mdun du lha motsho/
54a1(rgyud): rdo rje phag mo sngar dang mtshungs//shes rab thabs kyi bde bas brlan//sku yi tshig rnams kun la'o//sna tshogs he ru ka 'bar bas//rnam par 'phro
54a2(rgyud): bas rnam bsgom bya//dbu rnams kun la dar sbyangs kyi//phreng ba brtul zhugs can gyis bya//pad+ma'i mdab mar shar sogs kyi//bar bar du ni rnal 'byor ma//nyi shu
54a3(rgyud): rtsa bzhi'i grangs nyid ni//mkha' gro ma sogs drug drug go/shar la sogs nas byang gi mthar//mkha' gro ma sogs drug de bzhin//dang po byang nas nub kyi mthar//
54a4(rgyud): slar yang lA ma la sogs drug/nub la sogs nas lho yi mthar//dum skyes ma la sogs pa'i rigs//dang po lho nas shar gyi mthar//de nas gzugs can ma so Da/
54a5(rgyud): drug/mkha' 'gro ma dang gzugs can nyid//'o byed ma dang gzhan bsgyur ma//byis bcas ma dang rjes 'jug ma//phyed gnag phyed sngon can rnamaso//lA ma rnal 'byor dbang
54a6(rgyud): phyug dang //bzang mo thod pa can nag mo//rgyal po bskor ma phyed lnga nga ku//gang phyir phyed dmar rem pas so//dum skyes ma dang dur khrod mo//rnam par zhu ma ku ru kul ma//nu
54a7(rgyud): ma gar mar grags ma rnams//phyed dmar po la phyed ser mo//gzugs can 'jigs byed gtsug bud ma//thor drug so ral pa can drag mo//lha mo phyed ser phyed nag ma'o//phyag/
54b1(rgyud): mtshan la stsogs phrag mo bzhin//mtshams kyi mdab ma rnams la ni//bdud rtsi lnga yi snod rnamaso//g.yas rgyang zhabs kyi de bzhin du//thod pa'i phreng ba sogs 'dzin ma//
54b2(rgyud): g.yon bskor du ni shes bya ste//ri rab steng gi char skyes ma'o//de rgyab rdo rje'i 'khor lo ni//sngo gnag pa yi dbusu ni//mkha 'gro de bzhini lA ma dang //dum skyes mA dang gzu
54b3(rgyud): can ma//rab gtum mo dang gtum mig maM//'od ljon ma dang sna chen mo//dpa' blo mo dang mi'u thung ma//lang ka'i bdag mo shing sgrib mo//sa srung ma dang de bzhin 'dir//'dzi
54b4(rgyud): byed chen mo ru ni dran//rlung shugs ma dang chang za mo//sngo bsings lha mo rab bzangs ma//rta rnam dang bya gdod ma//'khor lo'i shugs ma dum skyes ma//chang 'tshong 'khor//
54b5(rgyud): lo'i go cha ma//shin tu dpa' mo stobs chen ma//'khor lo sgyur ma brtson chen mo//gru shin rje ma skyes gshin rje ma//de bzhin g.yo byed skrag byed ma//gtum mo dang ni dbyangs
54b6(rgyud): can ma//'dod 'grub ma dang 'bar tshon mo//kha dog 'khor lo ji lta ba'o//phyag bzhi ma lnga zhal tsog ma//thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin//tsadwe te'u gri gug de bzhin no//skra grol
54b7(rgyud): phyogs kyi gos can ma//sku la phyag rgya lnga sogs te//rdo rje'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan//yi dgra gdan can drag chen mo//'khor lo kun gyi rnal 'byor ma//sna tshogs rgyan
55a1(rgyud): dang ldan pa dang //de bzhin shes rab rlabs ldan pa'o//de ltar glazugs myed khams dang ni//de yang gan spro nges par brjod//rab tu dgra' bu'i sa grags can//
55a2(rgyud): slar yang gnas deng nyir gnas sogs//de ltar sa yi dbu sde sbeng /sa bcu gnyi su 'dod pa yin//de ltar thams cad du shes kyu//khams gcig 'dir ni thams cad de/
55a3(rgyud): sum cu cu drug pa shad pa rnams//gcab yon tan kun rang bzhin//de ltar khams ni dpa' bo dang //rnal 'byor ma rnams rang bzhin nan//khyor yug du ni sems can rnams/
55a4(rgyud): brdzus skyes rigs kyi rim paso//de yang sum cu rtsa drug gi/yul dang rim pas phye ba'o//zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i 'khor lo'o//de nas de yi phyi rol 'chad//slar yang snying po'i
55a5(rgyud): 'khor lo 'di//dmar ser kha dog la de bzhin//'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi dbusu ni//rdo rje 'chang ma mi bskyod ma//rnam snang rin chen dbang mo dang //pad+mo gar ma dron yod ma/
55a6(rgyud): spyan ma dang ni mA ma ki/gos dkar sgrol ma gzugs rdo rje//sgra dang de bzhin dri dang ro//reg dang chos dbyings rdo rje ma//sa snying ma dang mkha' snying mo//phyag ma 'jig rten mgon
55a7(rgyud): pom//sgrib kun sel ma kun bzang mo//rin chen sgron ma bdag med ma//khro gnyer ri khrod lo ma can//gshin mthar byed ma shes mtha' ma//pad+ma mtha' ma bgogs mtha
55b1(rgyud): byed ma//mi g.yo ma dang dbyug sngon mo//'dod rgyu ldum dang stongs chen mo//gtsug ta ro ma dang gnod mdzes ma//kha dog 'khor lo ji bzhin te//zhal la sogs pa'i
55b2(rgyud): mtshan nyid kun//lhag ma rdo rje'i 'khor lo bzhi ni//nye ba'i gan su lha mo rnams//rang 'dra'i thabs dang bsam par bya//g.yas rkyang ba yi zhabs kyis kyang //gzugs
55b3(rgyud): kyi khams dang dri med dang //gling dang po ru 'dod pa yin//'dren par rnam par shes bya dang //chung ngu'i he ru kar 'dod dang //gsum par pad+ma'i he ru ka/bzhi pa na mkha'
55b4(rgyud): bur 'dod dang //lnga par 'thor rlung he ru ka/drug pa ru sa yi hI ru kA/bdun par 'bar ba'i he ru ke/brgyad pA ga sher ba'i he ru ka/dgu pa ra ye shos he ru ka/bcu par thugs
55b5(rgyud): kyi he ru ka/bcu gcig gsung gi he ruka/bcu gnyis par ni sku yir 'dod//bcu gnyis de rnams rdo rje che//he ru kA ste rgyud gzhan med//'khor lo gsum sdo ma he ru ka/
55b6(rgyud): de rnams dbyibs ni ci 'dra ba/sku mdog rang rang 'khor lo las//blo ldan rnams kyis mtshon par bya//zhes bya ba ni snying po'i 'khor lo ste gnyis pa'o///
55b7(rgyud): de nis de rgyob yon tan kun//zhes bya'i 'khor lo'i dkar dmar bi//rdo rje'i rtsibs kyi dbus sbyin pa//pho nyi ma mchog sum cu drug/bram ze rgyal rigs
56a1(rgyud): rigs mo//dmangs mo gtu mo khyi 'tshod ma//g.yung mo gar ma thod pa can//nya ba mo dang bsnyigs dkar ma//dung mkhan mo dang tha ga mo//khur ba mkhan
56a2(rgyud): mo shing bzom//phreng ma khe mtshos ma dang //srin bal byed ma pho nya mo//bshang 'phyag me dang rtsi mkhan ma//chang 'tshong ldumA r+ya'i gnyer ba mo//rgyalnga pos bkrab
56a3(rgyud): ma shen pa mo//so rtse 'tshong bar byed pa dang //gser mgor mo dang lhags mgar mo//nor bu rgyud mA nags pa mo//klaklo ma oM Di tshong mo//rdo bzo mu drang zhing las ma//
56a4(rgyud): ko lpags mo ste rnal 'byor ma//'dri rnams 'khor lo'i kha dog go/lhag ma thams cad snying po yi//'khor lo je bzhin shes par bya//'dir ni zhing du shes bya ste//
56a5(rgyud): 'dod rnams rigs kun bdag nyid dang //gnyis pa'i gling zhes bya bar bshad//rang gi shes rab thabs bdag nyid//'od byed pa yi sa de bzhin//bla ma rang nyid
56a6(rgyud): mchod par bya//rang ming brjod pa'i sngags la ni//thog mar phyag 'tshal rab tu grags//hUM hUM phaT kyi yi ge mthar//de ltar 'khor lo kun la bya//de yi phyi
56a7(rgyud): rol zlum por sbyin//ri mo gnyis ni genag dang sngo//sgo dang rta babs kha khyer dang //dra ba dra ba phyed pas mdzes//shar gyi sgo yi dbus su yang //mkha' gro
56b1(rgyud): myo nga ShA ga dang //b+h+ya du g+sa pa'o gdod nAn+dan+ta//na N+ya g+ha dang dz+nyAnA m+bo dang // ru brag gi 'dod na // d+mo/ma stsogs 'du mchog/mo dang /
56b2(rgyud): la n+ti de /dbang sa na gnas pa na// ma/gli gas 'dzums ma ma ba na// dog r+m+ma ny+dzis g+hAN+DI sa par
56b3(rgyud): d+hI nI/rgyu na rim pas//shrId dang byu R+ha dang ni// yis gzhi nAg par+ya//gnag dang blo dang ljang dang da /skye na myA gA r+b+ha thA/
56b4(rgyud): skyes dkyil 'khor de bzhin du//glang phyir la bIr lI rIm pA ba ni//chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul d+hI//'jug tu b+hiSh+Ti rIm dzi bAg+ni nA~M//'khor mo gnyis par
56b5(rgyud): mau gsum//gsam+me pA lI ni rim tho'o//bzhi pa mo lha'i bdag nyid//drer khrod kun ni sai rIm+bi sa te//phyi rol lo sngogs sa /zlum po'i dbyibs byu byur
56b6(rgyud): 'dod//'bar mi rlom lnga'i bdag nyid//grwa bzhi pa la kun tu 'be //de la rgyu ni skyes 'khor lo /dun khrod rnams ni bshad bya ste//gaN+DIm drug tsha rji de pa'i
56b7(rgyud): dro/'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i keng rus can//'jigs sde shir la sogs pa'i gyon su g.yon no lnga rong mugan//an+d+ran+d+riT rgod dbang ldan du//dpal gyi nags ni sreg zar
57a1(rgyud): te//mun pa drag po bden bral du//rlung du kI li ki lI sgrogs//dur khrod drag po'i gzugs rnams ni//ro langs 'byung po lce spyad sgra//rim po 'di
57a2(rgyud): yis gnas pa ste//dur khrod brgyad po rnamasu yeng //shing dang phyogs skyong klu dbang te//shi shing khyab nas kaM kai li//tsu tA'i shing dang n+ya gro d+ha//de bzhi ni ka rany+dza ka nyid//
57a3(rgyud): la tA pa ra ka Ti dang pI tha ba//dbang po nor sbyin de bzhin du//klu dbang ni ga shau ni rje'i bdag/dbang ldan de nas sreg za dang //srin po'i dbang po klung bdag po//nor rgyas 'jog
57a4(rgyud): po de bzhin du//stobs kyi rgyu dang pad+ma nyid//padad+ma chenA hu lu hu lu dang //rigs ldan dang ni dung skyongango //sgrogs pa dang ni 'ur sgrogs dang //drag po 'khyil pa mthug de bzhin//
57a5(rgyud): gang ba char 'bebs gtum po ste//'di rnams sprin gyi bdag po'o//'dir ni dur khrod thams cad la//rdo rje phreng ba rnam par sbyin//thams cad kyang 'dir de bzhin bya//phyi
57a6(rgyud): dang nang du 'dod pa yin//zhes bya ba ni gsum pa yon tan gyi 'khor lo'o//de nas phyi rol na mkha' yi//'khor lo 'dum skyes sngon po mtshungs//sum cu drug rtsibs dbus
57a7(rgyud): su yang //mkha' spyod rnal 'byor mi 'di rnams//mi 'am ci mo dri za mo//hu Tu ka ma pA Ta ba ma de bzhin du//pi wang gling bu mu kun da ma dang //rdza rnga ma dang nges par gag ga
57b1(rgyud): ri ma dang //cha lang mya dang she lan dri ki mra//glu ma ka ra DA dang ta ma nA mchog dang //gar ma sgeg mo Ta ka kra ma drang ni//tA li sha rA Na mo rnga chen mu//mau dri ma dang rgyud can ma dang
57b2(rgyud): mA tU ma//nA la ba mo de bzhin d+ha ma pa ki/DaM ru ma dang nu ki dang de bzhin du//zangs dung ma dang ra dung ma de bzhin//b+hu ki ma dang dril bu me dang dril chung ma//g.ye ra ka ma dang dri
57b3(rgyud): bzhi nA Da ko li ka ma dang //gdung ma dang ni dbyangs ldan ma de bzhin//'khor ba mchog gi dbang phyug mo//kha dog sna tshags bkra ba 'am//yang na 'khor lo'i kha dog go/1
57b4(rgyud): ba'i zhing na gnas pa mo//gling ni gsum po mo mchog go/mkha' la spyod ma'i rigasu byon//gling 'di la ni yang dag gnas//sa ni 'od 'pho can de dang //rang rang gnas
57b5(rgyud): sogs zhing ma'o//yang na DaM ru kha T+wAM ga/'dir ni slar yang spangs na su//rang rang mtshan ma so so'i tshul//ji ltar 'dod par bya ba'o//'khor lo kun gyi cod pan la//rang
57b6(rgyud): gi bdag pos bya ba'o//'dir na shi sa rab thabs bdag nyid//rigs ldan bdag nyid rigs can ma'o//ji lta rgyun la sogs mang po//lhag ma sngon bzhin bya ba'o//'kho/
57b7(rgyud): lo kun tu spyad gsum dang //phyogs kyi gos 'chang rjes 'gro ma'o//zhes bya ba ni na mkha'i 'khor lo ste dang po'o//de nas phyi rol rlung 'khor lo//sngon po sna tshogs pa yi/
58a1(rgyud): mdog/rdo rje'i rtsibs dbus sbyin bya ba//rnal 'byor ma rnams rim ji bzhin//na mkha'i snying po las gzhan ming //blo dang ldan pas shes par bya//mkha'
58a2(rgyud): lding dang mo bkra ba mo//bya rog byi gar sreg pa mo//rma bya zangs kyi gtsug bud ma//gu dbu li 'jam pa mo//rug ron bya rog chen mo dang //gA Di ni dang gong ma sreg/ne tso bsngags ma
58a3(rgyud): bzhed mo dang //byA rgod 'ag pa mchil pa mo//shing bye'u mo dang rung ba ma//prik+Sha ra tI kak+ka bI//so bya mo dang byil mo//sdug ma'i mgrin dang sA ri mo//khro mo gur gu me lce can
58a4(rgyud): ma/b+hA TI rI k+Sha ka~M dza~M g+h+ra mo//hor mo ka kra mo de bzhin//dad da ri mo ri dgas dge/de ltar rnal 'byor mA'i 'khor lo dang //'khor lo'i sa gzhi gung 'dra'i mdog/yang na
58a5(rgyud): rlung rlung lngas shes bya//phyug sogs de bzhin skyon dang mtshungs//thams cad shes rab thabs bdag nyid//'dun sa ni gnas ma mchog/spya ki'i sar ni shes bya ste/
58a6(rgyud): gling ni bzhi pa mar 'dod do//'khor lo 'di ni slong skyes dang /ston gcu kyi dbye ba can//rgyam kyi bdag nyid gsum pa yis//'khor lo drod gsher skyes gzugs can//bzhi pa mnga'
58a7(rgyud): skyes zhes bya ba//'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid 'dod//zhes bya ba ni rlung gi 'khor lo ste/gnyis pa'o//de nas phyi rol gyi bshad bya//'khor lo sa yi ming can mchog/
58b1(rgyud): kha dog sdor po'i rang bzhin la//sum cu drug rtsibs rnams kyis spras//rnal 'byor mi ni sum cu drug/sa spyod ma rnams rim ji bzhin//seng mo stug mo b+hUm+b+ha ri bod ma/
58b2(rgyud): glang che ri dgas byi la mo//kha dog pa dang mi he mo rta mo//lce spyang mo dang bas mo 'bri//byi ba bong mo b+ho Da ma//ra mo lug mo rim pa bzhin//khyi mo phag mo dom mo dang //daN+Di ra mo d+hA/
58b3(rgyud): ma de bzhin//dred mo dang ni sgeg mo dang //nags ma dang ni khyi tshon mo//bya rog chen mo kha sgom//sbrul mo bkra mo rnga mo dang //sre mo rtsangs mo phug pa mo//grong na gnas po ma
58b4(rgyud): mchog go/de ltar 'khor lo'i mdog bzhin ma//yang na rang rang kha dog go/lha mo shes rab thabs bdag nyid//nye ba'i mdun sar gnas pa mo//mngon du gyur pa'i sa nyid
58b5(rgyud): dang //de ni shes rab pha rol phyin//lnga pa'i gling du gnas pa mo//mtshon cha la sogs sngon bzhi no//lus ni bud med rnam pa'i gzugs//gdod pa rang gi dngos por
58b6(rgyud): 'dod//shar dang byang dang nub dang ni//lho yi sgo ru shes bya ba//tshungs pa dbang phyug chen po ma//gzho nu khyab 'jug ma de bzhin//pheg mo dbang mo gtum mo dang //dpal
58b7(rgyud): chen mo ni bA rnams//sgo ru gzugs dang mtshan ma ni//mkha'agro ma sogs bzhin du grags//grwa ru bstan mo la sogs bzhir//shes bya 'dir ni ri mo gsum//
59a1(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi chos rnamas+ho//chos kyi 'khor la shin tu mdzes//dur khrod rnams ni brjod byu ste//mye yi 'khor lo'i dbus ni//bsod dang kun//
59a2(rgyud): tu skrag byed dang //'jigs pa che dang 'jigs byed do//drag po'i dur khrod de bzhin du//g.yon skor du ni rnam par dgod//spyod byed dang ni sdang byed dang //lcags byed
59a3(rgyud): dang ni ring byed slar//dbang ldan la sogs grwa la'o//shing ni rim pas sbyin bya ste//go yu ltar ka nA li re//se 'bru bil ba'i shing de nas//skyu ru bi d+hI rag shi'i she
59a4(rgyud): rim pa ji bzhin rnam par dgod//dbang po gshin rje mchu mo//gnod sbyin 'byung mo drang srong ma//srin mo rlung gi chung ma ste//'jig rten skye ngam sbyin par bya//
59a5(rgyud): klu mo srin mo thams cad ni//'dir ni rnam pa kun sbyin//de ltar dkyil 'khor 'khor bshad la//phun sum tshogs pa thams cad sbyin//las kyi rjes mthun sku
59a6(rgyud): mdog can+da//der ni gtso bo bsgom par bya//zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor la rim pa gnyis dang bcas pa'o//de nas phyi rol slar yang 'dir
59a7(rgyud): me yi 'khor lo bdag gi bshad//kha dog dmar po 'bar chen po//sum cu drug rtsibs rnams mchog la//rnal 'byor ma slar dgod bya ba/lha so blo rigs las
59b1(rgyud): byung myu ste//lha mau klu mau gnod sbyin mo//'byung myo do bo tsamya blo'o//de kun gsungs pa 'drin ci//lha yi rigs 'byung bra shad par bya//ma drang chung ma srong mau dang //
59b2(rgyud): bu mo sring mo'i bu mo dang //phi yi sring mo de dang ni//zhang po yi ni chung mo dang //chung ma'i sprin zlum dang ni//de nyid kyi ni pha yi ma//chung ma med phyi mo dang //ma yi
59b3(rgyud): ma dang gnyen mo dang //ma'i spun zla spun zla'i bu mo dang //rang gi phyi mo'i spun zla drang //spun zla 'aM bu mo de'i bu mo//pa yi ma dang phyi mo dang //khu bo yi ni chung ma dang //
59b4(rgyud): bu mo'i bu yi chung ma dang //sla rI yang chung mi'i spun zla dang //rang pa'i sring mo'i bu mo dang //de nyid kyi ni rang rigs skyes//spun zla'i chung ma bu mo dang //bu nyid kyi ni
59b5(rgyud): chung ma dang //bu mo'i khyo yi me yi ni//bu nyid kyi ni smyig mo dang //bu mo'i bu mor yang dag bshad//pho nya sum cu drug rnams so//khe dog dmar por yang dag gran/
59b6(rgyud): mtshon tshwa la stsogs sngar dang mtshungs/sa ni ring du so nga nyid dang //drug pa'i gling du gnas pa mo//'du bar rtag tu shes bya ste//shes rab thabs bdag ngo bo can//
59b7(rgyud): nus pa'i 'khor lo 'di rtag tu//shes bye rang 'dra'i mdzes ma'o//kun tu rdo rje'i phreng la sogs//lug 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yis//g.yon dang g.yas/
60a1(rgyud): pa'i lug pany+dzi sa//'dir ni mchod pa byed pa yin//phyugs rnams kyi ni sha thams cad//kun tu son par dbul bar bya//gtung ba rnams pa sna tshogs
60a2(rgyud): dbul//bldag bya sna tshogs nyid de bzhin//rang rang ston lngas langs nas ni//zla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog/slar yang 'od sde nas 'khor lo yi//mchod pa bcu gnyis
60a3(rgyud): rnams lnga'o//zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'phar ma'i me'i 'khor lo dang po'o//de nas de yi phyi rol bshad//chu yi 'khor lo rdzu 'phrul che//mdog dkar sum/
60a4(rgyud): tsucu drug rtsibs la//rnal 'byor ma ni rim pas bsgom//ma ka ra mo ru sbal nya//sbal mo ru sbal chu sram mo//sdig nag g+ha ra ma shI la ma//chu yi phug ma srin bu'i gdong ma/
60a5(rgyud): dang //chags mo ka ka ru mo su~M ya mo//chu byi mo dang grog mo'i gdong ma dang //chu yi mi mo dang ni rgod ma dang //glang chen mo dang stag mo lce spyang mo//chu sbal mo dang dung mo 'gron bu ma//
60a6(rgyud): nyabyis ma dang nor bu dzing gu ra ma dang //li sa mo dang dud du ra ma kar+N+Na nA//pha Ta ka mo dA bA ka ma kri ma mo//dzu'i dzuSh+Ti ma dang /sha smr-id mu ka lA mA//lha yi gtso bo mchog
60a7(rgyud): rnamaso//de ltar kha dog rang bzhin ni//dkar po'am rang rang rigs skyes pa'o//gdong ni rang rang gzugs kyis te//rnal 'byor ma'i rim ji bzhi no//nye ba'i 'du ba nyid
60b1(rgyud): dang no//sa ni mi g.yo ba mchog go/bdun pa'i gling du gnAs pa ni//shes bya mtshon cha sngon bzhino//yang na gang burang sogs kyis//mi rnams sumA du drug lta'o//gnas sogs
60b2(rgyud): bas de rnams//mi mo dngosu yang dag bya//'dzam bu'i gling 'di de yis no//dum bu bcu gnyis rgyun pa'o//bA tshA zhes bya'i rgya mtshar ni//de ru ga ti zlos pa'i skye bo rnams//drod
60b3(rgyud): shwer skyes dang 'du 'brod las//skyes 'am mngal nas skyes par byasam//'khor lo 'di ni drod gsher skyes//me yi 'khor lo mnga' skyes//mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs
60b4(rgyud): /kau shes rab thabs bdag rang nyid do//zhes bya ba ni chu'i 'khor lo ste gnyis pa'o//de nas de yi phyi rol 'chad//kun nas ye shes 'khor lo'o//sum cu drug rtsibs sna
60b5(rgyud): mdog/lha min mo yi rigs rim pas//til mchog ma dang phul du bde//lha yis bu mo dga' chen ma//dga' dang dgar grags pad can ma//dung tsun sna tshogs glang chen ma
60b6(rgyud): gzugs chen ma dang gzugs mdzes ma//'od chags rnam skyeg bde ba mo//me tog 'dod ma ud bal dkar//ud pal sngo dang mdzes ma dang //'dod chags ma dang 'dod
60b7(rgyud): chags che//rol grags ma dang rol chen ma//myos ma dang ni myos dga' ma//'dod pa mo dang 'dod chen ma//pade las 'byung deng bde ldan ma//'thun mchog ma dang byam pa
61a1(rgyud): mo//sbrul bang ldan ma//la bzang mo//dma' ba myo dang bum+b+ha pa s+ho//smre gzugs par ni glags pa ste//rnal 'byor ma yi gtsam mchog/thams cad shes rab
61a2(rgyud): thabs bdag nyid//rnam pa sna tshogs mdog de bzhin//phyag dang mtshon cha sngon bzhin shos//legs pa'i blo gros so de bzhin//dur khrod rin po cher snang ba//rang 'byung bde
61a3(rgyud): ba byed pa po//de phyir longs spyod rdzogs sku dang /dkyi 'khor lo gsum pa la//dga' ba bzhi ni dag pa yis//kun nas ri mo bzhi can//shar la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi ru//rnal
61a4(rgyud): 'byor na rnams rim ji bzhin//dkar mo chem rkun ro langs ma//za bod ma yang rnam par dgod//grwa la gnas pa'i lha mo bzhi//spos mo ri khrod ma de bzhin//gtum mo dang
61a5(rgyud): g.yung mo ste//rim pas sngon bzhin rtag shes bya//phyi rol dur khrod 'khor lo ni//chu yi dkyil 'khor dbusu ste//byis pa 'chi dang lhag ma za//g.yul drag po dang mche ba kun//
61a6(rgyud): shar la sogs par g.yon bskor du//de ltar brtse ba chen pos bsam//du ba mun nAg dang ni me//hA t+tha'i sgra dang sgra chen no//shing ni tsan dan ga pur dang //dza ti ba la dang
61a7(rgyud): la dang //nA ga ge sar tsam pa dang //kun tu ru dang lha'i shing //phyogs spyod rnams ni mtshon bya ba/nyi ma bsil ba sa yi bu//ri bong can skyes bla ma nyid//ngan sprong nyi ma'i
61b1(rgyud): bu de bzhin//lha min mgo bong shes bya ste//brag po'i gadrongs rnamasu bya'o//'bar ba la ram gri mu gri dang //mdung rings spu gri brag de bzhin//klog dang sna tshogs mtshon
61b2(rgyud): 'bebs par//dur khrod kyi ni dbus su byaM'o//ral gri myig smin ril bu dang //rkang pa byug dang btsu len dang //mchi lnga lhom dngul chu sa 'ogra go//dongs grub sgrub pa
61b3(rgyud): mkhas pas bya//zhes bya ba 'di ye shes kyi 'khor lo ste longs spyod rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'khor po gsum gyi bdag nyid do//de nas de yi phyi rol 'chad//thugs kyi
61b4(rgyud): 'khor lo 'di gsal ba'o//mdog gnag sum cu rtsa drug rtsibaso//thams cad rang bzhin skyes pa mchog/klu mo gnod sbyin mo 'byung mo//yi dgas dmyal mo man du
61b5(rgyud): med ma//ltung ba mo dang bar med ma//bum mo ga shini rje mo de bzhin//thig nag ma dang me mdog mo//tsha bo mo dang rab tsha ga/ngu 'bod ma dang ngu 'bod cha//maur nug du 'tshed
61b6(rgyud): ri granyis 'tsher//sdang ma rmongs ma phrag dog ma//chags myos ser sna skud pa ma//grangs ma ral gri'i nag ma nyid//du mra dang ni mu ge ma//nod dgon ma dang mtshon gyi dang //
61b7(rgyud): chu yi dgon pa ma dang ni//ral gri sen mo rab med ma//spu gri'i so mi 'khor lo ma//grul bum mo ste lha mo che//mdog ni 'khor lo ci 'dra'o//phyag dang mtshon cha sngon
62a1(rgyud): bzhin du//shes bya rang gi gzugs can no//de la nye ba'i dur khrod dang //de nas su ni chos kyi sprin//sems kyi rang bzhin dag pa nyid//kun 'gro 'khor lo
62a2(rgyud): can du 'dod//rang bzhin spangs pa bdag med pa//'khor lo can sar bzhugs pa'o//'khor lo rnams ni rim ji bzhin//thams cad de ltar shes par bya//sgo skyong ma ni
62a3(rgyud): thams cad kye//gnas bzhi rnams ni bcu gnyis//de ltar bcu drug shes bya ba//stong pa nyid ni mkhas pa yi//ye shes rnam shes ngo bo'i phyir//dur khrod bcom ldan 'das
62a4(rgyud): rang nyid//sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'di la ni//gsum gyi bdag nyid ming giso//phyi nas gzhan 'di thams cad ni//'khor lo gnyisu bshad par bya//zhes bya ba ni thugs kyi
62a5(rgyud): 'khor lo'i dang po'o//de nas phyi rol du gzhan pa//gsung gi 'khor lo de bshad bya//dmar po bcod kyi kha dog ste//sum cu drug rtsibs bdag nyid gtso//mchod ma za
62a6(rgyud): ma nyid ma dang //le lo ma chos sems sgo mo//khyim sems bud med sems ma dang //don sems ma dang sbyor bral ma//bu sems rnams dang mya ngan ma//bsam gtan ma dang
62a7(rgyud): sngags zlos ma//ngo tsha nga rgyal gdung ba mo//sems can don byed brtson ma dang //rgyal po sems ma gzhan gnod ma//ye shes thob mo dka' thub ma//rgas ma 'chi ba'i///
62b1(rgyud): bsam can ma//bde ba sdug ma mi dge mya//yod drang myed ma nyid dang ni//bla ma sems ma 'gre ba mo//bzod ma mi brjod ma ngal ma//ngal sos mA dang bkres ma mchog/las ni
62b2(rgyud): thams cad byed lha mo//rang bzhin 'khor lo 'di che'o//kha dog rang gi 'khor lo 'di che'o//kha dog rang gi 'khor lor grags//lhag ma 'di ni sngon bzhi no//shes rab thabs
62b3(rgyud): bdag nyid lha mo//rang bzhin gyi ni dkyil 'khor 'dir//gdan bzhi pa'i rgyud stong phrag ni//bcu gnyis pa la bshad pa ste//ye shes mkha' 'gro ma sogs kyi//mchod
62b4(rgyud): sogs lha mor 'dod pa yin//grong mtha'i gnas ni 'di lta bu//kun tu 'od kyis sa yi no//de ltar ye shes sog sku'i mtha'//chu me rlung dang ra mkha' yi//bskor ba'i
62b5(rgyud): 'khor po zhes bya bar//rdo rje mchog ma shes par bya//zhes bya ba ni gsung gi 'khor lo'i gnyis pa sprul pa'i 'khor lo'o//de nas sku yi 'khor lo bshad//sku
62b6(rgyud): gsung thugs kyi kha dog can//sum cu rtsa drug rtsibs dbu su//rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor sgyur ma'o//rgyal chen bzhi yi ris ma dang //sum cu rtsa drug 'khor sgyur ma//'thab
62b7(rgyud): bral dga' ldan 'khor bsgyur ma//'phrul dga' ma dang de bzhin du//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ma dang ni//tshangs ris ma yis 'khor lo ma//tshangs pa bdun 'don ma de
63a1(rgyud): bzhin//tshangs pa tshon po'i 'khor sbyar ma//'od rlung chud med 'ong ma dang //'du gasngal mdung dge rlung ma//chud med dge ba'i 'khor sgyur ma//d+hag+sar+m+ma sa//
63a2(rgyud): ma dang sprin med ma//bsod nams skyes ma'i 'khor lo dang //'bras bu che'i 'khor sgyur ma//mi che mi gdung 'khor lo ma//shin tu mthong ma bzang sna ngam//'og man
63a3(rgyud): ma yi 'khor sbyar ma//na mkha' mtho' yas skye mched ma//rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched ma//ci 'ang med skye mched ma de nas//'du shes 'du shes med min ma//
63a4(rgyud): dmyal mo yi dgas ma de bzhin//dud 'gro mi mo lha min mo//gzhal med khang spyod ma de bzhin//zla ba nyi ma gau shin rje mo//dbang mo 'khor bsgyur mar shes bya//rang gi
63a5(rgyud): 'khor lo'i mdog bzhin bya//phyag dang mtshon cha sngar bzhi no//shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin te//nye ba'i grong mthar yang dag gnas//sa ni mos pa spyod pa ste//'di/
63a6(rgyud): rnams 'khor lo bcu gnyis//dkyil 'khor 'di ni gru bzhi ste//sprul pa'i skur ni 'du shes//ri mo lnga ni me long sogs//thams cad mtshan nyid kyis mtshan pa'o//
63a7(rgyud): brgyad gnyis lha mos byas pa yi//mchod pa dkyil 'khor bzhi la 'o//phyi rol dur khrod brgyad rnam ste//sgo skyong ma ni rim ji bzhin//shar du chu skyes dkar mo skem//
63b1(rgyud): byung du g+han+d+ha ro ma'o//nung du rdo rje gar mya s+ho//lho ru rta rgod mA yI kha//g+hA yi char ni lha mo pan+de//dadong ldan la sogs rIm ji bzhin//lha mo rdo rje 'bur zhal dang /
63b2(rgyud): rdo rje khro gnyer ma'i zhal dang //rdo rje 'thub ma gtum mo ste//kha dog la sogs sngon bzhi no//drag mo chen mo gtsigs pa'i zhal//'bar ba'i phreng bas rnam mdzes
63b3(rgyud): ma'o//dpa' bo rnams kyi mdog dang gzugs//rnal 'byor ma kun ji lta ba'o//kun la mgo bo'i phreng bsdu rgyun//dpa' bo rnams la dar phreng can//ral pa'i gcod pan
63b4(rgyud): pa de rnams//yan lag kun la thal bas bsduste//rnal 'byor ma yi mtho zhing 'ablang //lug gdub spyi gtsug rgyan pa dang //mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs//
63b5(rgyud): phrag mo'i rigs las byung ba'o//dpa' bo kun gyi ming rnams ni//thog ma'i 'khor lo la sogs mchog/rdo rje mkha' gro de bzhin du//sna tshogs pad+ma mkha'agro dang //
63b6(rgyud): rin chen thong ba'i dum bu dang //keng rus chen po'i gleng rus dang //mche ba rnam gtsig lha dgra dang //'od dpag med dang rdo rje 'od//rdo rje sku dang myu gu cin//rdo rje ral
63b7(rgyud): pa can de bzhin//dpal chen rdo rje hUM mdzad dang //shin tu bzang dang rdo rje bzangs//'jigs byed chen po mig mi bzang //stobs chen rin chen rdo rje dang //rta mgrin ma
64a1(rgyud): mkhar snying po dang //he ru ka dang pad+ma gar can//rnam snang mdzad dang rdo rje sems//stobs chen ye shes mkha' gro dang //blo brtan thar dang ye shes dang //
64a2(rgyud): thabs dang thugs kyi rdo rje'o//lhag ma'i ming ni lha mo bzhin//skyes bu rtags rnamasu bya'o//'khor lo bcu gcig rnams kyi ni//sgo la sogs pa'ang de bzhin no//snying po'o//
64a3(rgyud): pad+ma'i lha mo rnams//gtso bos bdag po bzhin du bya//'on kyang bdag po sogs 'khor lor//ji ltar bskal bzang rgyal ba ni//bzhi yin dman pa'i stong phrag gcig/
64a4(rgyud): de rnams thams cad rnam bsgom bya//mtshan ni yon tan dbye bas phye//sprul pa'i sku can bdag nyid//gang zhig gang gi 'khor lo yi//rnal 'byor ma ni thog mar 'byu
64a5(rgyud): de'i bcu gnyis shesa? par bya//kun spyod gnas dang nye gnas ma'o//lhag ma sa ni bcu gsum pa//sgo dang grA la sogs gnas ma'o//mchod dang bstod sogs du su ni//
64a6(rgyud): thog mar rdo rje'i ming shes bya//dpa bo rnams la'ang de bzhi no//phyi rol dur khrod bshad bya ba//dang por tshig par shes bya ste//gnyis par yang ni ma tshig pa/
64a7(rgyud): gsum pa dum bur gyur pa nyid//bzhi pa yang ni ma gtugs pa//lnga pa 'jig su rung bar bshad//drug pa yang ni 'jigs byed pa//bdun pa gsal shing phug pa/
64b1(rgyud): /ngan sna brtags pasdu brgyad du'o//rgyu da / pa d+hagar+b+ha//dmyal sku can rdzobargyang rnams//shalam lo shong mya ngan mod//maung sa du A dum ba na
64b2(rgyud): bzhen//Dom+bi ra dang gam+b+ha ri//rgya shug dang ni bai ru ra'o//sna tshogs ro langs tshogs dang ni/rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo'i
64b3(rgyud): tshogs//mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod gzhan//glang yan de yid rdzu 'phrul che//mgo med rgyug dang gzhan yang ni//mgo bo med pa gar byed dang //nyol ba dang ni rkang med dang /
64b4(rgyud): mgo dang lus sogs gtugs po ste//ting 'dzin chen po'i rgyu yis ni//de rnams dga' byis gar byed pa'o//de ltar de bzhin dbus ni//sgyu skar sna tshogs bya ba yin//
64b5(rgyud): kha dog sna tshogs shes bya ste//bzhon pa gang gi yin pa'o//rdzogs par byang chub rgyu'i bdag nyid//yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor bsgo/ma par bya//rgyu yi rdo rje ci 'dra
64b6(rgyud): byA/ying ni de 'dra spro bar bya//dud 'gro'i zhal can lha mo ni//lngas thams cad mas ma khyer na sa 'ong //khro bo'i tshogs kyis mnyam bkug nas//sngon du byag/
64b7(rgyud): ni gsal bar bya//suM b+has bka' bsgo rdo rje can//brtul zhugs can gyi phur gdab bya//oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha kA ya kaM hUM hUM phaT/oM grih+Na gr-ih+Na bA kA tsi kaM hUM hU~M phaT/oM gr-i
65a1(rgyud): pam zlo sna na nas kats+tsha ga smyan pas+ho/nAg/sman du / // pa sogs /zur myod na//
65a2(rgyud): 'og tu rdo rjes ga ner 'gyur//steng du rnyed y-i dz+wa ba can//rdo rje ra ba ma ro'o//chos kyi byung gnis nang du yan//de yang gsum bAn-i lnga dang ni//TI drug pA ru'i ma
65a3(rgyud): par \u0f7f//'phar ma bani'i rim ji bzhin//rim pa thams cad 'dir dgod bya/oM m+b+haSh+Tapag+hA ta ya~M sar+b+ba duSh+TAn Ta//k+Shi lA yak+ShI la yA serba pA hU~M phaT/hUM hUM bad+d+hinI la
65a4(rgyud): ya badz+ra d+hA ro Ad+b+ha pa ya tI big+h+nAn//k+ShA ya bIk+Shir+N+Na badz+nyAk+ShI la ya hUM phaT/phur b+ha gdab pa'i sdig so//oM bad+d+ha mud ra badz+ri kI lA kau Ta ya hUM phaT/brdungs paN+Di ts+tshaHsa~M//
65a5(rgyud): sbyar 'khor mo tsun dpa/bcom ldan rdo rje'i rims 'byung ba'o//sprul pa'i sgra ni ma lusde pa//rnal 'byor pa kun byang chub stod//'di ni sgra'i 'khor lo sku gsum gyi
65a6(rgyud): nyid dang sprul pa dang sbyin cig pa ste gsum pa'o//de nas gan sa dang nyi gnas sogs//ji lta'i rim pa rnams gsungs pa//gnas nI ga ba'i ri nyid dang //rna ba'i
65a7(rgyud): dang u rkyen dang //ar bu da yang de bzhin gnas//go dA ba ri nye gnas te//dga' ba'i dbang phyug lha mo'i mkhar//gyad yul yang ni nye gnas//'dod gzugs de
65b1(rgyud): bzh-in aut+pa dang //tI sha ku ne ko salwa zhing //ka ling ka dang pham pA ka/k+Shany+dzi kha pa'i gnas nye zhing //yI dgas grong dang khyim lha mo//sau rASh+Ta dang gseraR+Ya gling ni/'dun
65b2(rgyud): sa'i nye ba'i 'dus su ni//grong khyer sin+d+hu ma ru dang //ku lut+pa yang nye 'dun saM//'du ba chu klung 'gram dang ni//skyed che la rgyu mtshar rab bshad dang //lAm gyi bzhi mda'i
65b3(rgyud): nye 'du ba//ri yi spyi bo grong dbus dang /tshegs can gzhan nu'i rI dang ni//rigs kyi zhong yang nye du ba'o//dur khrod mu mu nI yang nas//spyod dang hA ri ki la dang //sgyu ma'i
65b4(rgyud): grong khyer dur khrod do//nye ba'i dur khrod ri mtha' dang //sngags kyi zhing dang lha yi grong //kaN+Da Ta dang pa Ta yang //de bzhin grong mtha' kaung ka nA ny+tsid dang //khyab bdagra
65b5(rgyud): las kyi yul ljongs dang //rnal 'byor ma ni stug po'i grong //de bzhin 'dir ni nye grong mtha'o//pha yi nags dang khyim gyi logs//steng ka dang ni rdzing bu ste//gnas 'di
65b6(rgyud): rnamasu bu mo gang //lhan skyes rang gi skye granas skyes//yul dang yul du shes bya ba//ye shes ldan dang gnyis med granas//'khor lo bcu gnyis rnams kyis ni/mangs
65b7(rgyud): yi dbye bas gnas skyes rnams//bcu gnyis gnos sogs rab bshad pa//sum cu drug khams rgyu yiso//re re yi ni khams rnams la'ang //mig la sogs pa'i skye
66a1(rgyud): /smo/rlon na sa /sa na sus pa kya ga can tu can nan du dus na/du na na na
66a2(rgyud): snrums na gshegs rnams sa gsu /zhin ga sa da pa gyur/
66a3(rgyud): yidrug par bya//rdo rje dang ni mkha' bar du//sangs rgyas thams cad son 'di ni//ye shes 'od zer byung du rnams//rab byung bdud rtsi rgyun gyis ni//dbang dusgyur rdo rje mgrin
66a4(rgyud): /spyan skyes chus ni dgang phyi//oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hiSh+Te ga ta sa mA ye shre ye hUM/dbang bsku rI ba'i sdig so//'khor lo gang dang gang gi ni//de dang de yi rgyas ga
66a5(rgyud): /nal babyor ma rnams bdug yol te//khyab bdag gzhan gyis rgyas mi gdug//mi shis ting 'dzin sems dpa' yang //'khor lo kun la bsgom par bya//de las
66a6(rgyud): gi bo la ni mtshad zed gzug//thig le dang ni bram che'i//rnal 'bying gnyis mi mo me dmigs bya//'tshar lo bcu gnyis thig la yang //rdo rje na na su mtshan/
66b1(rgyud): 'og rtswa rnams no//stong phrag gtsug ni thig le can//rtswa mo bcu ye thig le rnams//dze m+b+hi'i rim pa rnams mtshan//du ba la sogs brgya phrag gcig/thig le 'ogan/
66b2(rgyud): su 'bab par bya//de phyir phra ma gang ci la'ang rung //sangs rgyas sgyid yul min de bsgom//rdo rje'i srog rnams la bsdus pas//phyag rgya che sbyangs rgyas de//gas sa
66b3(rgyud): bzlas pa bya ba ni//rkang pa brgyad lcug rtsa ba ni//bzhi bcu lo sogs 'di rnams kyis//mtshan nyid thams cad rtogs pa dang /bode chen sogs dang bzang po dang //ga
66b4(rgyud): kun rnam par sbyangs pa dang //mchod pa khams gsum bdag nyid ni//dngos po kun 'byung rnams kyis so//dkar mo stsogs dang 'gro drug 'khor sgyur ma//gzugs
66b5(rgyud): gzugs med gnyis kyi lha mo ste//rlung gis thams cad rang bzhin gyis//ma lus 'khor lo mchod par 'gyur//dkyil 'khor bde ba chen po sgom par gyis//rnal
66b6(rgyud): bcu gnyis bsod nams sdig med pa'o//thams cad zag med rang bzhin mos par gyis//dkyil 'khor du na pA da ni bde bar shes par byos//dbang po 'khrul pa bde rje
66b7(rgyud): chen po mos pa gyis//skad cig de la rang dang gzhan gyi ngo bo med//gang gi rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs chen gyis//sa gsum du ni dkyil 'khor 'khor lo spro bar byos
67a1(rgyud): sngags dang phyug rgyu sogs n+dan pas//rdul 'byor chen byas gtor ma sbyin//da ma bzlas pa yis rjes las ni//b+h+yo bA skyabs dngos zla //ji lta //
