99a5(rgyud): tu gsal ba'i mthar gyur gzugs//srid pa'i rgya mtshor 'byung bar 'gyur/ji srid gnyisu med spyod yul//g.yo ba'i chos kyang shes par bya//mkha' gro ma tshogs ma lus
99a6(rgyud): pa//lhan cig skyes pa'i rgya mtshor 'dus//rab gtum yi ges shes par bya//thams cad bud med sgyu ma'i gzugs/phyag brgya kun gyis 'dun pa yi//rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i rang
99a7(rgyud): bzhin du//gsungs pa'i rang bzhin ma lus pa//de ni rdzu 'phrul rkang par 'dod//phyag rgya'i brda ni ma lus pa//rnal 'byor ma bskyed mtshan nyid//sngon ba shang chung ngu'i
99b1(rgyud): bde mchog gi/dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dbus su te//sum cu bdun bdag nyid dbus su//sngags 'di thams cad rnal 'byor ma'o//mkha' gro ma sogs bcu gnyis kyis//dus
99b2(rgyud): smyo chu srin la sogs te//rab gtum la sodas nyi shu rizhi//dus de rnams 'byung ba yin//skyed cig yud tsam la po gso pas//thams cad kyi ni 'pho ba gA cig/shin tu phra dang
99b3(rgyud): rags rnams kyi//skye bo rnams kyi dus kyis ni//lor 'gyur ba yi tshad kyis ni//rtag tu rnal 'byor ma rnams rtsis//kha ra sogasu dus byas nas//ldog pa gnyis dag gis ni mtshon//
99b4(rgyud): gnyis dag bcu bris bsgres byas pa//lo yi chu tshod de bzhi no//brgyad cu rtsa lngas lhag pa'i brgya//chu tshod lnga la shes par bya//nyi ma gcig gi tshad kyang ni//na mkha' mig dang la
99b5(rgyud): pa mig/zla ba gcig gi tshad kyang ni//mkha' mkha' ro dang dus tshod do//lo gcig gi ni tshad kyang ni//mkha' stong mig drang bug de bzhin//mkha'agro ma kun shes par bya//gsang
99b6(rgyud): sngags kha sbyor bdag nyid de//rtsa ba'i sngags rnams kyi ni yang //rkang pa gnyis gnyis mnyam par ni//rnal 'byor ma yi rkang pa gcig/de rnams las ni lhag gyur gang //hUM
99b7(rgyud): phaT la sogs spang bar bya//oM tri Na d+hu ma ka ba shrI na ba kaM dz+wa ya NA kaM ka pA ma ba hA Ne pI ya ra hUM bI hUM rI phaT shwa ra~M ya phaT ya swA hUM hUM hUM pra tsaN+Da hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA//zhes bya ba ni
100a1(rgyud): sngagasngo//kha dog nag mo phyag bzhi ma//skra grol 'jigs par mdzad pa mo//lha mo shes rab thabs bdag nyid//lhag ma sngon bA shad mtshan nyid ni//
100a2(rgyud): lha mo 'di rnams thams cad ni//slar yang rtag tu rgya mtsho mnyam//rab mchog bde ba thob pa na//dgos pa mang po yang dag rig/ye shes zla ba'i rang bzhin du/'di
100a3(rgyud): ni 'char dang nub pa yi//tshangs pa'i sgo ngo'i 'odra gzugs gang //'od zer mkha' gro mkha'agro ma//'od zer zhes bya rab bcing ba'ang //ye shes 'bab par rab tu nus//
100a4(rgyud): ri mo'ang na mkha'i dbus rnamasu//bgrod bya rang gi ma las skyes//de ltar rab gtum ma'i yon tan//rab mchog la sogasu mtshon bya//dus thams cad du kun spyod pa//
100a5(rgyud): sngags las byung ba shes par bya//mchog gi dngos grub rgyu yis ni//'du ba rnal 'byor mAr rab gsungs//dngos grub rmi lam du ster ma//stes na dus kyis shes par
100a6(rgyud): bya//las ni gang dang gang 'dra bo//de dang de 'dra'i 'bras bu ste//rgyu dang 'bras bu'i 'brel nyid pas//rang nyid rnal 'byor pas skyes 'gyur//rgyu med cing ni 'bras bu med//
100a7(rgyud): mngon sum mngon sum min de bzhin//'di 'dra'i bden pa smra rnams kyi//tshad ma'i bstan bcos las shes bya//dpa' bo thams cad mnyam spyi ra las//rdo rje sems dang/
100b1(rgyud): 'dro ba'i mchog/d+hA rna rmA pa 'bru~M de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsu sa//dpal mkha' r+g+ha maN+Da rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyul rgyun po lngas//rang tu
100b2(rgyud): gtum mo bdag po'i dkyil 'khor du rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo rnams kyi phyag rgya'i brda yis gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi tshig zhes bya ba'i spyod yul gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug
100b3(rgyud): pa'o////de nas gtum mig ma'i phyag rgya//rgyud gzhan ni med bshad par bya//mig gi brdar ni shes bya ste//'di thams cad kyang kha sbyor yin//btsums pa dang ni ma
100b4(rgyud): btsums pa//g.yas dang g.yon dang g.yas 'gro dang //gyen du bskyod dang sna rtser dang //sar lta dngos po'i mig can dang //khro dang zhum dang 'thun bung med//bu dang gnyen dang
100b5(rgyud): spun rnams dang //gti mug zhe sdang chags phrag dog/skyon dang nga rgyal cher rlom dang //'dod dang snying rje glen pa dang //sgyu mar lte dang ring du lta//'phro dang bsam gtan phyed phyed
100b6(rgyud): dra //thams cad phye dang dga' ba dang //tshad dang nad dang yul ngo dang //chos dang bcas par lta ba mchog/gal te sum bcu drug lte ba//'di nyid rnal 'byor mas skyer no//de nyid/
100b7(rgyud): kyi ni phyag rgya'i lan//rnal 'byor rnams kyis rtag sbyin pa//me long chu dang mchod pa dang //ral gri ma de mthe bong dang //na mkha' pad+ma ku mu dang //mda' dang zla ba nyi ma dang //nor bu/
101a1(rgyud): mu tig byi ru dang //gzhu ba'i gser drang 'dra ba dang //'bar ba grib ma ras bal dang //bla marta glung sa ra b+h+yo//glar dang skrag dang 'dor ba drang //'phrog pa//
101a2(rgyud): rtsod sgra nye bar drang //gtor ma ri mo dkyil 'khor dang //zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang ni//bsad pa dang ni bskrad rnams kyis//lta ba ru ni bshad gyur pa//brda ni sum cu rtse drug
101a3(rgyud): po//ji lta'i rim pas sbyin par bya//de nyid rnal 'byor pa yin de//de rnams dgos pa bshad par bya//zla ba'i rgyu bar son pa'i srog/g.yon par rgyu ba yi ni mchog/sum cu/
101a4(rgyud): rtsa drug sems 'bab pa//de rnams ngo bor shes par bya//mig gi phyag rgya gang 'dra bar//de 'dra'i sogs ni rgyu bar bya//mgo la sogs pa'i tshigs kun tu//rtsa rnams
101a5(rgyud): gnas ni bsgrub byas nas//mi phyed ma sogs skyeng 'og tu//der ni blta bo chen po bya//de ltar bdun cu gnyis shes bya//phun sum tshogs kun 'thob par 'gyur//gtum/
101a6(rgyud): mig rnal 'byor ma'i bdag mo//sdang ba tshar gcod mdzad ma yin//byang chub phyogs kyi cho su yang //rnal 'byor ma kun shes 'gyur ba//gtum mig rnal 'byor ma rtag
101a7(rgyud): chu//brtson 'grus rdzu 'phrul rkang pa nyid//gtum mo'i rnam par rtog kun la//mig lta ba za ba yin//g.yo ba'i sems kyi rang bzhin ni//sems gcig du ni 'ching
101b1(rgyud): ba yin//tho co'i sku spyod 'jig rten du//'joms pa phyag rgya mkha' gro skyes//kun rdzob dang ni don dam pa//long med par ni gnyis med byed//gnyis med mog ni 'dir de nyid//
101b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi so rab tu bsngags//rdzu 'phrul gyis ni snang ba byed//rtso rnams thams cad rab tu ston//dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dbus su ni//tshul 'di bsgom par bya ba
101b3(rgyud): yin//gtum mig ma ni thabs ldan pa//sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid can//de yi tshum ma mngon brjod pas//thams cad byang chub rang bzhin can//sngags kyi yi ge las
101b4(rgyud): skyes pa//kun spyod rtsa yi bdag nyid can//de ye ji ltar kha dog gzugs//rab gtum rnal 'byor ma yi'o//oM sa daM taSh+To sat+ka Ta pra b+hA ne Sha tra tA ya b+hi hUM ra hU~M b+hA pha ya Ta hUM
101b5(rgyud): Ta pheM srA Ta hUM phaT swA hA//oM tsat+tAk+ShI ye hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA//gang ba'i rI yi gan su yang //rab tu gtum mo dus kun skyes//zla ba nya la dpal ba ru//ri bo chen por zla ba
101b6(rgyud): 'bar ba 'dzin par gtum mig ma//rA hu~M yis ni za su byas//tshes gcig tu nA yang dag bshad//nyi ma'i rjes 'gor ngos bshad pa'o//de ltar rnal 'byor ma re re'i//rang
101b7(rgyud): gi zhing du ming rgya che//re re yi yang nyi shu bzhi//slar yong gnas dang nye gnaso//bsam gtan sngags kyi bzlas pa'ang med//yi ge las byung spangs pa yin//dus dang
102a1(rgyud): dus min ngo bo'i bdag/hU~M phaT yi ges 'dod par gyis//yi ge lngas byung ba'i gzugs kyi//he yi rdo rje'i bdud rtsa 'byung //spun gyi spyod par dum pa/
102a2(rgyud): gang //'jug dang ldog par byed pa'o//snying ka'i 'khor lor shes bya ste//migri rang bzhin can sring ka snying kar gnas rang rnal 'byor ma//gtu mo lA~M bya'i spring nas 'bar/
102a3(rgyud): dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje mkha' gro de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so//zhes bya ba ni
102a4(rgyud): dpal mkha'agro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/gtum mig ma'i mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya dang bdag po'i rang bzhin gyi cho ga zhes bya ba ste le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun
102a5(rgyud): pa'o//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//ji lta'i cho gas brda'i yi go/rnal 'byor 'khor ba'i 'ching ba las//shes nas myur du nges par grol//nA dA li ka/nA
102a6(rgyud): ma dang nAM/pi ShI taM/rA dzi k+Sha/ba Tan+daki pi Ta ka rni/kun d+hu ra/ka pU ra/sil+la ki/swa yaM/b+hU/kasU ri kA/tsau sa ma/bo l+lA/kak+ko laM/k+ko lpa/kA li& dza raM/shA laM bI raM/a
102a7(rgyud): bya kaM/pi dri ba naM/byany+dza naM/mA la tin d+ha naM/rat+ne sam+b+ha bi/go/ku/daM/ha/na/gi mUd shu re/ma/de ltar rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi/de bzhin dpa' bo spun rnams brda//rnal
102b1(rgyud): 'byor ma de'i dgongs pa ni//kha yis brjod pa byed par 'gyur//skyes bu rnal 'byor ma/bud med/chang /sha/lce/bA T+ya bA/cang te'u/dud med kyi/'khris pa/khu ba/khrag sha las/
102b2(rgyud): skyes/khrag/bud med kyi gcin/bshang ba/ling ga/pad+ma/'dus pa 'am/skol ldan/skye gnyis kyi sha/she be'i ro//rgyal po'i skyes bu/dur khrod/nya'i sha/bya'i sha/g.yu
102b3(rgyud): ngo'i khrag/ba lang /khyi/glang po che/rta/mi bshang ba/gci ba/khu ba khrag/rkang mar/de ltar yang ni brda yi lan/spags pas rtag tu shes par bya//rnal 'byor dngos po shes
102b4(rgyud): rnams kyi//dus rnams kun tu bskyed pa ni//sprul pa semaHna sgrol ba po//zhing dang zhing du skye bar 'gyur//byang chub sems ni zhu ba'i khams//sum cu rtsa drug grangs kyang ni//sra dang chu
102b5(rgyud): dang me dang rlung //na mkha' dang ni ye shes khrims//de'i yang khams ni drug drug 'gyur//mngon pa'i gzugs sogs shes mtharo//nges par bshad don smra ba po'i//rang bzhin
102b6(rgyud): gyis ni brda re shes bya//re re'i bar du lha mo ni//'od ldan ye shes gzugs can//sum cu rtsa drug khams rnams kyi//'char ba'i dus mtha' mkha' spyod ma//ye shes 'od zer de
102b7(rgyud): bsgrubs nas//bde ba kun gyi gnas la bzhugs//gos kyi mtha' nas gzung nas ni//gnad dang gnad du rtse bar bya//ye shes kun rdzob spangs pa las//sgom pa'ang rnam rtog
103a1(rgyud): bdag nyid do//rdo rjes 'og sbyor bdag nyid//rtswa thams cad ni gzhig par bya//non por sreg pa'i sbyor bdag nyid//mkhas pas 'od ldan la glo'o//rgyu/
103a2(rgyud): ba'i rdzu 'phrul rkang pa ste//ur+yan gan su de bzhin du'o//dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dbu su ni//lha yi bdag mo chog bsgo mo bya//gsang sngags bden pa'i sbyor bdag nyid//sna
103a3(rgyud): tshogs yi ge rnams dbus son//sum cu rtsa bdun lha rnams ni//shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid nyid//oM ke bi kA dA la yu mA tA lA dzi b+he ha ra bA na ya oM hUM grA hU~M pha ya hUM phaT/
103a4(rgyud): sA n+ya thA phaT swAt+ma/oM pre b+hA wa tI ye hUM hU~M phaT swA t+ma/kha dog gzugs ni sngon ba'i no//rang gi 'od kyis rnal 'byor 'gug/oM yig phyi mo 'byung ba'i bdag/smig gi rlu ni
103a5(rgyud): bskyod cing spyod//skar me'i bdag po kun mkhyen rnams//dbang po sogs kyi'ang spangs pa yin//ya yig dang ni a yig gzugs//rkang pa'i mtha' dang mgo bo can//
103a6(rgyud): nA da tsam la thams cad brten//rang byung chos brjod pa yino//de ltar yi ge bzhi rnams ni//chos kyi sku la sogs pa'ang yin//mi ni yid de'i cha'i ye shes//de yod
103a7(rgyud): pas ni dpyod pa ste//'jig rten dbus dang sa la ni//rdzu 'phrul rkang pas spyod lam byed//yon tan kun gyi 'khor lor yang //thar pa'i rgyu yis stor bar 'gyur//yon
103b1(rgyud): kun bdag stong pa nyid//'khor bar 'di las tha ras gzhan med//dpa' blo thams cad mAm spyod las//rdo rje sems dpa' badre ba'i mchog/rdo rje mkha' gro de bzhin gshegs//
103b2(rgyud): com ldan bdag pas 'di gsung so//dpal mkha 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal ba chen po las 'od ldan ma'i mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya'i tshu ka zhes bya bA s+t+waM lde'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad
103b3(rgyud): lo//de nas rnal 'byor mchog gaH//mtshon ma'i badzin po shad d+d+ham+b+ha//rtswa chen ma yis rab sbyor bas//srog dang rtsol po'i rang bzhin can//'di la dril hU~M ba mtsho //
103b4(rgyud): gtun shing zhags pa thaMdi pa dang //gzhu dang kha T+wAMg paN+Di//phub chung dang ni po rdzogapa'i'ajub dang //gamacho ga'i spyong dang lcags pag dang //khrag drang dur khrod rdul dang ni//mdud dang
103b5(rgyud): dang lpags rlon dang //rtswa yi theg pa spyangs pa dang /ro sreg bsdus pa'i shing dang ni//ga ti dbyug pa phub dang mgo keng rus dang ni zor ba nyid//myig dang 'khol ma gnyi ma dang //spun
103b6(rgyud): pa yi ni phung bu dang //sa bon gar dang srog le dang //khab dang srid bshus lpags pa dang //sprin char 'bru ba dang shing lcags kyu//de ltar rnal 'byor mas ster ni//phyag rgya'i ldan du/
103b7(rgyud): brjod bye ga/rdo rje la gra mdung rings dang //rtse gsum dgra sta gri gug ma pa//gsal shing phub dang tho ba dang //'khor ma tsang te'u gri dang //dbyug pa dang ni mtshon rtsi gcig/
104a1(rgyud): dung dang zangs dung dbyug gu gsum//der ni rma phyi'i mjug ma dang //bya rog sgo dang por dang ni//me yi thab dang rnyi bo dang //dbyug/thung me long pi wang dang //
104a2(rgyud): rkang mgo lag mgo glo ba dang //sgyu me sgra gcan lcags sgrog dang //mangs dang sgrogs dang ti N+ya dang //mgo med mar nag 'bar ba dang //'jigs byed gzugs can zhes
104a3(rgyud): byAbya ba//phyag rgya lan du mngon pa rjod yin//rlung gi rang bzhin ma lus pa//de'i rig rnal 'byor ma'i khyim du'o//gang dang gang gi phyag rgya'i dbyibs//de de rnal 'byor ma
104a4(rgyud): yis yus//de yi rang bzhin rjes bzung ngam//tshar gcod pa yang byed par 'gyur//stong pa nyid ni bco brgyad da //khyad par du yang snying rje dang //sangs rgyas chos ni ma
104a5(rgyud): 'dres dang //de bzhin du ni khams pa ni brgyad//rnal 'byor ma yi rgya mtshan nyid//skye bo thams cad shes par bya//sna tshon ma yi rab sbyor bar//rang gi mtshan nyid gsungs
104a6(rgyud): pa yin//'byung po thams cad kyi ni ma//mngon par sna tshogs nor bu bzhin//hA yig bstod pa'i nA da'i bdag/de bzhin kha 'og bltas par 'phyang //nA dar gnas pa'i srung
104a7(rgyud): pa yang //de gzugs gnyis med phreng ba can//sgrub thabs man ngag sbyor bdag nyid//dbyangs dang gsal byed las sngon byung //chos dang las dang dam tshig dang //phyir/
104b1(rgyud): chen po'i rang bzhin nan//piM go gan yo gru pa pas//phyag rgya bani mngon du rjod nyid do//gnas na u bu dang shes bya//sems kyi rdzu 'phrul rkang de bzhin//lha rdzas rnal 'gyur/
104b2(rgyud): mo 'dus pa//na mkha'i 'khor lor grags pa yin//sum nu bdun bdag nyid yi//bdag med chen ma yino//sna ya tho ga ma ba myur dbugs//'jug dang gnas dang ldang ba cano//
104b3(rgyud): dbus mtshan bya mtshan nyid bral//rnal 'byor ma kun rtse bar 'gyur//nu ma la ni dbyangs can 'gro//dbusu gang gang 'bab pa mo//gzhu 'gengs pa yi sbyor ba yis//srog dang thu
104b4(rgyud): ser can 'dzin pa'o//rnam shes brda ru shes nas//mtshon tshad yang gi zhom par bya//gang du sems ni gtong ba na//der ni rdzu 'phrul gyis dpag bya//ye shes ma yi mngal nyid
104b5(rgyud): du//thams cad du ni rnam par dpyad //dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dbus ni//'dir ni slar yang bsgom par bya//shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin ni//gsang sngags yi ge d+har+ya
104b6(rgyud): skyes byung //mdage dang dbyibs ni sngon gyi ste//'jigs byed mtshan mo nag mo can//e dza ko bA nI lA la bik+Sha lA~M b+hu d+hA dz+wA la ya ga thAM nA hUM ya baM hUM Ta trUM Tu sA be hA Ta swA hA i rdo/
104b7(rgyud): oM mahU~M nI sa hUM hU~M phaT phaT swAhA//zhes bya'i gsang sngag so las rdzogs pa//'dod pa kun gyi rang bzhin can//depe'i ri thams cad mnyi ma sbyar las//rdo rje sems dpe'i brda
105a1(rgyud): dz+dza ga/rti r+d+hamUSh+Ta 'grong 'dun gshegs//bcom ldan bdug pos 'di gsungs//da sa mkhyu kro d+ha man+tha rnal 'byor ma'i d+hud kyi rgyal ba chen+da d+ha/
105a2(rgyud): las sna chen ma'i mtshan nyid kyi brda'i cho ga'i nges pa zhes bya ba ste le'u nyi shu rtswa dgu pa'o////de nas lus kyi ts+tsha ma ni//mdzes pa'i spyod pa bshad par bya//dpa' bo'i/
105a3(rgyud): blo gros ma'i sbyor bas//lha rdzas lus skyes 'thor par 'gyur//mgo dang sdi gtsug dpral ba dang /g.yon dang g.yo sa pa'i rna ba dang //rgyob kyi rgyung dang dpung pa gnyis//
105a4(rgyud): dang sbyin mo mig dang kha//rkanA dang snying khaM lag pa dang //mtshan khung nu ma rtse bo logs dang //lte ba 'doms dang phongs ling ga/brla rang pus mo byin rkang pa//sor mo ma
105a5(rgyud): chen long bu dang //rkang pa'i mthil du thams cad du//rlig pa lag pa glang po'i lpags//mkhrig ma dpal ba'i ngos dang ni//mtshams dang lto bar shes bya ste//rtag tu rnal
105a6(rgyud): 'byor mas ster na//phyag rgya'i lan gyur rnal 'byor pas//ji lta'i rim pa sbyin bya ba//gling bu pi wang khar rnga dang //glu rnga rdza rnga rol mo dang //phreng ba sgeg pa gar zangs dung //
105a7(rgyud): spos dang dri dang lha bshos dang //'bras bu ma chags 'bras dang snod //zhabs bsil mchod yon mar me phul//gos dang me long gdugs dang ni//bla re rnga yab de bzhin
105b1(rgyud): du dan mr-i d+h+r-ig blong ba dang //rgyul mtshan dang ni rje gcod khang //sna dung zung blang ba dad phyud dang //smrang yang dril chudad+ha ba dang //seng ge'i gdan da cod pan dang //dr-i t+ya//
105b2(rgyud): tshogs de bzhino//go d+hA ba ra'i nye gnas gzhugs//dad pa'i dbang po'i rang bzhin can//dpyir blo ma yi rab sbyor bas//phyag rgya thams cad rab tu bshad//spyan skyes skad
105b3(rgyud): kyis bi'i zhes bya//sum cu drug dngos bdag nyid can+da//phung po khams dang yul dang ni//dbang polas nga masan ste/tshul gyi spyan de bzhin 'dir//kun la drug drug rim ji bzhin//
105b4(rgyud): de rnams nang du song ye shes//lhan skyes gzhan gyi dngos po min//mtshan mo nyin mo'i rab sbyor bas//shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid//lhan skyes rnal 'byor ma de rnams/
105b5(rgyud): sum cu rtsa drug dbye bas phye//dam tshig chen po 'dusdu pa ni//pud+ma'i lte bar rig par bya//de los skyes pa'i rang phyag rgya//yul dang yul du rnam par bzhagro/rang rig rnal
105b6(rgyud): 'byor ma'i byed ba//'di ni sangs rgyas spyod yum yin//'jig bzhin pa ni chen pa nyid//bcu gnyis mi rnam so nang du son//rdo rje'i rlung ni rab zhugs pa'i//der ni bran du
105b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor skyes//'od zer slong ba'i bde bo yis//'pho med rnams kyis bgrod par byos//de ltar go d+ha bar shes byas nas//dang po'i dbang po'i rdo rje can//dpa' blo ma 'i
106a1(rgyud): rang byinan shes//dmyal 'byor dbus kyi gca mo yin//sum cu bdun bdag nyid rdo rjed//rang ming gsang stabs ldan par//sna tshogs rnams rtog nas//
106a2(rgyud): na ni//lhan skyes brtson 'grus mang groso//oMka pA la~M ru pA lut+tA yA d+h+r-i sham+bi d+hA ra~M tu gr-i shwA bA lA pA ye k+She ts+tsha ya b+h+rUM b+h+rUM phaT hU~M phaT hU~M Ta swA phaT hA phaT//oM bI ra ma hA
106a3(rgyud): hU~M phaT/pan+do swA hA//kha dog dang dbyibs sngon gyi ru//rnal 'byor ma kun gyi ni byA//gang phyir ba tsun 'gro ni yang dag 'pho//mngon par brjod pa yang dag 'byung //nem
106a4(rgyud): mkha'i steng gi sbyor ldan pas//'dir ni the tsam med par byed//sngon du bsten pa'i ma//mchog gi lha ru shes par bya//phyag rgyatI lan ni gzhan med//lan gyi skye ni
106a5(rgyud): dbang gnyis kyi'o//sna tshogs rgyud dang lus rnams//dra yis khyod la mang ba shad//rgyud 'di yi ni rab sbyor ba//ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur//mya rig pa dang ldang sems
106a6(rgyud): dang //skye bo rmongs gang yul spya na//sangs rgyas nyid ni mu 'thob cing //nges par dmyal bar 'tshed par 'gyur//de phyir gus pa'i sems bdag gis//bya ba gus pas
106a7(rgyud): rig bya//sngon gyi rmongs pa medo 'gyur zhing //sangs rgyas nyid 'thob yul mi ring //moso pas rgyun tu gzhol gyur pas//tshe deng nad med 'phel ba yin//rlung gi 'kho
106b1(rgyud): rnalnga 'byor ma//stongs ldan dpa' ba blo gros mA//rdo rje rlung phyir rab ldan pas//sems chen por ni rnam par 'gyur//dpa' bo tha~Md mnyam sbyor pas rdo rdza ma 'a bdi bar mchog/rdorjemadza rga/
106b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so//dpal mkha' gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las phyag dang phyag rgya ri len dpa' bo'i blo gros ma'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid kyi ming
106b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba ste le'u sum cu pa'o////khams thaMd kyi ts+tsha ma ka/bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol//gang zhig dri med dngos po'i brda//bshad kyi sgrub mo mnyan par gyis//so yi mchu ni yongs
106b4(rgyud): bzung nas//bde bas bo lA 'jigs par byed//phyi ni sa ye shes rab ston pa'i//'di skad kyi na tshig smra so//phyi mo'i yi ge'i sbyor ba yis//bcu po gsum la drug ldan pa'i//phyag rgya phyag rgya'i lan
106b5(rgyud): gyis ni//'di las dam tshig dbye bar bya//ka kha ga g+ha nga kaM tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya tsi Ta tha Da Ta ta TaM ta tha da d+ha nau taM pa pa ba b+ha ma paM ya ro la wa ha yaM/zhes bya rnal 'byor mas ster na//phyag rgya'i len nI slar yA
106b6(rgyud): 'di//k+Sha khA gA g+hA dA kaHtsA tshA dzI dz+ha ny+dza tsaHTA dzA DA D+ha NA Ta/tra thA dA d+ha nA taM/pA bA bA b+hU mA paHyA rA lA wA hA yaHde ltar phyag rgya'i khyad shes nas//lus can kun gyi sgo glegs yi naM//bu ga gnyis kyi rab sbyor//
106b7(rgyud): par//yid kyang ni yi ge 'dre//rig dang steng du 'dus byas nas//rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma gnyis med//skad rdeg pa ni yi bden rnams kyis// nyid dga' ba bzhi de bzhin/
107a1(rgyud): sde pa bzhi dang 'khor lo bzhi//e bi ma yA sku rnams ni//rgyud 'dir mdo ru bstan pa ste//rgyas b+ha shad gzhan du rtogs dran bya//mi'u thung //
107a2(rgyud): ma yi rab sbyor bas//cho ga sngags pas shes par bya//nam mkha' dang mnyam sgo glegs phreng //mkha' spyod ma ru spyod pa rang //ngag kyang skad kyi rang bzhin
107a3(rgyud): bdag/'gogrog par nye bar 'gro bar gyis//gsong chen sems dang sems byung rnams//mtha' ma gsal bar mthong ba yis//rin chen rdo rje
107a4(rgyud): las dga'i gzugs//bltas pa'i mtshams su mthong bar 'gyur//thams cad bden pa'i sbyor bdag nyid//bzhi po yi bdag nyid
107a5(rgyud): can/rA me shwa ra dang dbang por//mchog tu rmad byung shes par bya//'dod chags chags bral rnams bsres pa//de yi
107a6(rgyud): skad cig las byung min//'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid las//mi ni dbus su bdud rtsi'i gnas//dbugs kyi 'khor lo rtag tu bde'i//
107a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa bza' bar bya//lha dang klu rnams bud med la//mkhas pa yis ni rol pa yin//de rnams kyi ni dus kun tu//lus can kun gyi 'pho ba yang //sgo dgu'i bdag
107b1(rgyud): nyid na mkha' la//dri rnams bzhi 'gyur du shes bya//de ltar b+h+yo rmigs rnams ni//rtag tu sum cu rtsa drug 'gyur//sgo yi dbye ba mi shes la//skyon dang yon tan ji ltar ljags//
107b2(rgyud): 'pho ba'i dus tshod kyi ni tshad//yang dag rab tu sbyor ba nyon//mdzes pa'i gnas ni lam bzang pos//lam ngan gyis ni srid pa'i skyon//thig le lte ba steng rnams dang //mig dang
107b3(rgyud): sna dang rna ba dag/bshang ba dang ni gtse ba'i sgo//sgo dgu yi ni mtshan nyid do//lte bas 'dod pa'i mtho ris dang //thig les gzugs kyi lus can rnams//steng gis steng gi gnas
107b4(rgyud): kyi ni//'gro dang 'ong bar rab tu grags//gnod sbyin dngos po sna la so//rna ba dag gis grub pa'i lha//gal te mig nas ye shes bgrod//mi rnams mi bdag bsgyur rnams 'gyur//
107b5(rgyud): srid pa'i sgo yis yi dgas rnams//gci bas dud 'gro de bzhin no//dmyal ba brgyad kyi dngos rnams kyis//lus can rnams ni bshang ba las//gzhan gyi sgo ni gsum gsuM /
107b6(rgyud): mkhas pas rtswa yi kun spyod can//nyi shu rtsa bdun rnams kyang ni//smin drug la sngogs rgyu skaro//rnam dag ye shes gsum po ni//re re'i sgro ma rnams kyi'o//brtson 'grus dbang po'i
107b7(rgyud): dngos rnams kyis//thoms cad nyer spyod mtshan nyid//sum cu bdun bdag nyid dbu su//sngon gyi mdog can bsgom par bya//rdo rje dkar mo sogs sa bon//sgo glegs gzu
108a1(rgyud): su gzhag par bya//shes rab thabs bdag nyid lha mo//swA yi 'khor lo'i sbyor bas so//sngags kyi yi ge rnamasu gyur pa ni//oM mU bi tri ka ga Ta Na mu ba
108a2(rgyud): khA ri hA pU he ri ra ta bA ma ya na hA hU~M ya hUM hUM pha hUM Ta pha phaT Ta pa sA Ta hUM swA hA oM kharba ri hUM hUM phaT paT swA hA/de ltar sngags las yang dag byung //daMn dam sbyor ba las skyes
108a3(rgyud): pa'o//dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las//rdo rje sems dpa' bde bo'i mchog/rdo rje mkha 'gro de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so//zhes
108a4(rgyud): bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las mi'u thung ma'i yi ge'i brda'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi ye shes zhes bya ba ste le'u sum cu rtsa gcig
108a5(rgyud): pa'o///slar yang mchod po byas nas ni//yang dang yang du zhus pa nyid//dngos po ye shes kyis phyag rgya//bcom ldan gtso bo ji ltar lags//bdag gis mtshan/
108a6(rgyud): nyid bshad bya yis//yid ni gcig tu gyur pas nyon//lhan skyes bde dang steng pa dang //rang gis rig dang bde ba che//chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs//sprul pa dang ni rmad
108a7(rgyud): byung tsha//'od gsal sems dang bsam pa dang //zhi dang myang 'odas sbyor skyes dang //pha rol phyin dang gnyis med dang //thar pa dang ni don dam dang //ye shes rnam shes
108b1(rgyud): chub dang //chos spyodas nang rgyar ngo bzhin du//pad+ma dang ni chus 'byung dang //slar yang bdag mod mtho rIs dang //nr-i dang sgra dang b+h+ra ma dang //dog dang 'khrul med rtog spang
108b2(rgyud): bcud len dang ni smra bshod//mkhas pas rgyu ma ma'i rnam grang so//ji ltar de ltar yag dang po/thams cad lan gyi snum ma yin//ji ltar yi ga de bzhin da//dmyal ba la sdang shes pa/
108b3(rgyud): pa ge'i dbang phyug ma'i sbyor bar/rnas 'byung ba khyod kyis byur//'byung bar gyur pa'i sa bon gyi//rnyed ni zlum ma thams cad de//gaM sar ye shes khams kyin//rang gi
108b4(rgyud): bzhin du mtshan nyid//rang yang de mnyam rnal 'byor pa//pad+ma'i snying po d+hu ni gnas//r-i ni rnam shes 'gro ba ste/yi dkyis khams rnams thaMd du'o//lang kar bdag nyid skye ba ste
108b5(rgyud): dngos po'i ye shes rnams kyis byung //dbang phyug 'byung po thams cad kyi//ye shes min pa dngos kun skyes//de bi ko Ta'i gnasu te//slar yang byang chub dran dbang po//gang du
108b6(rgyud): ye shes byas ma med pa//der ni bstan pas thos par 'gyur//'dod chags bral bas gang drag gi/de ni kun 'gro'i ye shes//rlung rnams ci ni mkhar rnam su//dbang ba rnams
108b7(rgyud): bde de bzhin//Ti ni rdo rje'i nus par grags//yul rnams kyi ni grong du 'grod//dran pa lhan cig skyes ye shes//gang du yod ni rab brjod pa//dang ni dbang po'i byang chub kyang /
109a1(rgyud): nas rdo rje'i chu lnga bdag nyid//de ltar de nyid nges shes nas//rang gi rang bzhin du gnas bya//rgyas dang 'jog rten bcas pa spang //cung zad mong mod bzung bar phyu//
109a2(rgyud): yang na dngos po kun bdag nyid//yang na thams cad rnam par sdang //dngos dang dngos po can yod min//dngos po med pa gsal mthong 'gyur//dngos dang dngos med rnam par
109a3(rgyud): grol//thams cad mi bden las skyes blta//bla ma rdo rje 'dzin zhal las//brgyud pa'i rim pas phrad par gyis//me yi dkyil 'khor du lha mo//de phyir de yi rang bzhin bus//
109a4(rgyud): sum cu bdun bdag nyid dbu su//sngon gyi gzugs can bsgom par bya//thams cad thabs dang ldan par 'gyur//sngags kyi yi ge las byung ba'o//oM hAM sa hAM ha kA dza ro su
109a5(rgyud): ts+tshin+da ra rI nI ba mu l+la khA b+ha ya ka hUM rA hU~M yA phaT hUM phaT swA paTahA ya A hA//oM lang+ge shwa rI ye hUM hUM phaT pa Ta? swA hA//de ltar shes byas gsang sngags che//dngas grub yang bas
109a6(rgyud): byed pa yin//las thams cad kyi rang bzhin te//brgya la na yang gzhan du min//dngos gru ba ri yi ming can ni//nyi shu rtsa brgyad sman du'o//smin drug dang ni snar mar 'gyur
109a7(rgyud): mgo bo dang ni lag de bzhin//nab so dang ni rgyal nyid dang //skag dang mchu dang gzhan pa ni//shar gyi gre dang byang gi dag/me bzhi nag pas ri dang //sa ga ding ni lha mtshams/
109b1(rgyud): dang //snron dang sbubs dang chu stod dang //chu srad dang ni byi shin dang //gro zhin mon gru de bzhin du//mon ze da na khrums spyod dang //khrums smad dang ni num gru dang //tha skad du
109b2(rgyud): bzhin bri nye dang //zla ba nyi ma rA hu dang /sa'i ma nyid dang spen pa rnams//rang rang dus nyid shes par bya//the tsom med pas bzung bso//thams cad zla ba'i spyod bdag nyid//nam mkha'
109b3(rgyud): la ni mnyam par gnas//'chad bzhin pa yi rab sbyor bas//sngags pas cho ga shes par bya//dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las//rdo rje sems dpa' bode ba'i mchog/rdo rje mkha'
109b4(rgyud): 'gro de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan bdag pos 'dri gsungaso//zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las//lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'i phyag
109b5(rgyud): rgya'i brda'i mtshan nyid dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rang bzhin dang //ming gi che ga'i ye shes kyi le'u ste sumau nu rtsa gnyis pa'o////slar yang gzhan pa bshad bya ste//
109b6(rgyud): dwagos dang byed pa'i phyag rgya'o//gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis//sgrub pos dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur//zla ba nyi ma gzas bzung bar//rnal 'byor ma yi sngags mtshan nyid//po taM/
109b7(rgyud): ge ni gsong por sla bo ste//pra ti po ti gi ni lan yino//ga mu 'gro ba lo lu ma ba ni 'ong ngo zhes bya ba nyid//de hi grong khyer ro tsa nu ka ma zhes bya//zungs shig pa'o//hri da ya ni dpa' bo yin/
110a1(rgyud): kau ra ni sod cig pa nyid de//kar+t+ti ka ni dril bu'o//a la byed pa'o//shi ra khyil pa'i sgra yin te//sra ba Na rna ba 'o gzhan pa nI//man tha na nI bdud rtsi ste//nar phrad pa'o tA
110a2(rgyud): li ka yang //mkha 'gro ma 'o na ra kau dkyil 'khor//a mu kAM ni dur khrod de//kA khi la sgro Sha swa sa naM//bram ze'o pa ri rgyal po'i rigs//yi ra ti rje'u rigs kru ra ni//dmangs an+ti
110a3(rgyud): gdol pa can//a li phyugs nA kI ni//sring mo 'o mu da ka tshil//lce yi so reg pa bzhin du//zas kyis lcogs par reg par bya//traM sA dri yAs bsgos pa ste//U ga ma na zhes
110a4(rgyud): bya gnas gang nas//che ge mo'o ki ra Na me tog go/lam pa lto ba dan ta rkos pa ste//ni ro d+ha char ro bi dz+nyA pa ti tshim pa'o//d+hu mra zhes bya smin de bzhin//d+hu ma br-i ya ri bo ste//sU nu
110a5(rgyud): sa ri ta chu klung //ang gu l+ya ni cha shwas te//ba da na ra dzi ka lce//a d+ha ra se yin paM ka ti//rgyal mtshan no tsha do phreng bzhin//tsa la rlung mr-i ga ti phyugs//maN+Da la ni mnyam pa s+ye/
110a6(rgyud): sA se laM gyi bzhi mdor shes par bya//skye ba phal gu sham mo ma hA k+Sha ra ni//phyugs che no ts+tsha ni ra skya so//na ni mi 'o ba ni glang yino//ma ne ma he b+ha ni ba ba ste//sa ni seng ge bya ni
110a7(rgyud): stag de bzhin//sgra ni gnas pa'o kha la rog pa zos pa yin//so la reg pa rim pa yin//hra ko ngo tsha stong pa la reg pa//'khrig pa 'o brla la reg pa ni//de ltar da ltar gyis
110b1(rgyud): zhes pa//mchog tu 'thung ma shes par bya//'dir ni dgos pa slar bshad pa//mkhas pa yis ni bsrub par bya//byed pa rnal 'byor mar shes bya//dpa' bo kun tu dgos pa'o//sna
110b2(rgyud): tshogs dngos po'i rang bzhin gyis//ye shes shes bya'i rang bzhin bdag/bskyed pa srid pa'i sbyor ba dang //sbyor bral kun rdzob de bzhin du//sgyu ma 'thun pa 'khor ba dang //brtse ba
110b3(rgyud): rang bzhin brtags pa dang //gzhan gyi dbang dang yongs grub dang //tu ri yaM 'khor lo sgom po dang //sems dpa' byas dang tshul khrims dadong //gtong ba brtul ba dpa' de bzhin
110b4(rgyud): skar rtsis mkhan dang sman pa nyid//bzo dang khams dang smra ba po//lhag ma rten 'brel yan lag ni//bcu gnyis ma rig sogs shes bya//mA lA ba yi nye gan su//shing grib ma yi
110b5(rgyud): rab sbyor bas//ting 'dzin dbang po'i phyogs rnams//'jug pa mod dang 'jug pa mtshungs//dbang po 'dod chags chags bral dag/yang dag phun sum tshogs bdag po//mA ma ki rdo
110b6(rgyud): rje'i bu gar ni//spyi gtsug gan su yongs gnas bya//'phyang bzhin pa kha 'og tu ste//gam po ji yi phyag rgya'i tshul//ba ni yang dag pa'i rgyud//rang bzhin sgyu ma'i rang mtshan nyid//de/
110b7(rgyud): ltar byas dang ma byos kun//mkhas pas dmu mar mi snang //zhu ba'i dngos po'i ye shes 'dir//rnal 'byor bdud rtsi sku can te//smig rgyu dang ni 'dra ba'i gzugs//bdag nyid
111a1(rgyud): gzugs can mthong bar 'gyur//ye shes shin tu bas g.yogs pa//kun 'gro ba yi lhar dran byas//gang 'dra'i snying rje gnyis byung med//de 'dra'i dngos par
111a2(rgyud): skyes dran bya//sum cu bdun bdag nyid dbus//ston can grags pa bsgom par bya//gsang sngags bden pa'i gzungs bdag nyid//chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus son pa'o//oM sa
111a3(rgyud): me rba hA b+huM sh+ma ta shA sa ne tra pri sa yA na ya ka hUM ra hU~M ya pha hU~M Ta hUM pha phaT Ta swa pho hA Ta swA hA/oM dru ma ts+tsha ye hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA//de ltar sngags gzugs bdag nyid du//kun tu
111a4(rgyud): 'gro ma tsa na shes bya//mchod pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin du//lhan skyes mdzes ma 'dus pa'o//ye shes mkha' 'gro ma dngos bdag/rnal 'byor mkha' bragari bo yin//dbugs ni spro ba
111a5(rgyud): byas nas ni//slar yang ur+yan kun tu 'gro/sa gsum po yi ri su ni//gzugs kyi gtso mo bsgom par bya//yid ni nang du chud pa yis//'dod pa'i dngos grub bsgom par bya/
111a6(rgyud): slar yang rdo rje phug mo yi//rnal 'byor pa yis rigs ldan mchod//lha rdzas mi yi bde ba ni//bsdus byas pa bas de mchog go/ma mo'i grong khyer nyams dga' ba//'gro/
111a7(rgyud): ba'i gtso bo bsgom par bya//'di 'dra'i dus kyis ye shes ni//mkhas pas a ba d+hU ta'i nang du'o//rnal 'byor pas bsgoms sems bdag nyid//stong pa nyid gzugs
111b1(rgyud): dmigs pa can//da ya thams cad rig byas nas//sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rang mtshan nyid//dpa' bo thams cad mnyam spor las//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje mkha' gro
111b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan bdag pos 'di ga sungs so//dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las shing grib ma'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya'i
111b3(rgyud): brda'i cho bro'i nges pa zhes bya ba ste le'u sum cu rtsa gsum bya'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das bdag po rdo rje mkha' gro khyab bdag che//phyag rgya yang dag rig pa'i gzugs//
111b4(rgyud): nga lha'i rigs pas bstan du gsol//phyag rgya bzhi rAb sbyor bas//re re la ni dku dgu ste//las dang chos dang dam tshig dang //phyakra rgya chen po bzhi pa yin//padad+ma rtsa ltar dkar
111b5(rgyud): rad med gang //pad+ma'i dri ni gtong ba yin//pad+ma dang ni ud pa la dri//kha dog ci maM piM ka yaM yin//dza ti dang ni tsam pa'i dri//de yi gzugs dang mdog 'dzin ma'o//ga bur dang ni
111b6(rgyud): tsan dran dri//pad+ma dkar po'i ljags can ma'o//ri dgas lte ba dang mnyam dri//ud pa la sngon po'i mdog can ma'o//ud pal spro 'deb ljang ku la//dI ni de nyid kyis mtshan bya//
111b7(rgyud): ma l+le ka dang ud pal dri//mu man dang ni mtshungs ma'o//ke ta ke yi dri shes bya//dmar po ban du ka lta bu'o//pA Ta li mal+li ki dr-i//slar yang na mkha'i kha dog go//de ltar lnga
112a1(rgyud): kye phyag rgyar 'gyur//chos kyi phyag rgya bshad par bya//bde gshegs tshogs pa la dga' ba//mthar skyes rnal 'byor ma mchog yin//bsam gtan
112a2(rgyud): bzlas la rgyun tu dgra'o//bram ze mo ru rab tu bshad//rtag tu khrus dang gtsang sbra dga'//rje'u rigs kyi ni bud med do//rnam rtog med bdag nyid mi mo//rdul cing dpa'
112a3(rgyud): la rtse zhing //rgyal rigs kyi ni rang bzhin te//'di ni mchog tu gtam dga' ma'o//las la yongasu rdzo ba ste//dmangs rigs kyi ni rnal 'byor ma'o//bde gshegs lus
112a4(rgyud): lngal rje su chags//mchog tu 'thun ma'i rnal 'byor ma'o//mkhas pa yi ni phyogasu gsol//chos kyi gan su khro med ma'o//dpa' bo yi ni rigasu skyes//rtag par sha ni zam
112a5(rgyud): yin//bde bar gshegs pa'i lam srung ma//byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa byed//khro ba rnams la me khro zhing //mnyes par byed pa'i khur khyor ma'o//de ltar chos kyi
112a6(rgyud): phyag rgya ste//dam tshig phyag mngan brjod bya//gtor ma mchod pa la dga' ma//dam tshig can du de mngon brjod//rab gnas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang //don dam pa la
112a7(rgyud): dga' ma'o//'gro ba rnams la dbang bskur ma//rnal 'byor dam tshig can mar grags//chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor zhing //rtag tu dam tshig skyong ma'o//rnal 'byor ma yi cho gas
112b1(rgyud): dbus su//mchog tu rmad byung rtsen mar//dus thams cad du dga' dang bcas//rab tu rgyas pa'i bzhin byung ra'o//rnal 'byung ba rnams bu bzhen snang //rdo rje rnal 'byor mar nga shas//
112b2(rgyud): dus kun tu ni dub med ma//mtshan cha 'bebs pa'i ming can ma'o//mi mo rtag tu 'gro bzhin du//dam tshig brda' ni skyong ma ste//de ltar dam tshig phyag rgya yin//phyag rgya chen par
112b3(rgyud): bshad bya//lhan skyes zhing skyes lha mo dang //sngags skyes 'jig rten mgon po ma//sbyor skas gnas skyes de bzhin du//dam tshig lha rdzas rnal 'byor ma//bod can ma ni dus kun
112b4(rgyud): tu//phyag rgya chen por rab bsngags pa'o//de ltar phyag rgya'i rong bzhin to//de mngon tshul bdog phyog rgya'i lano//gang zhig gang gi mdog dang dri//de yi da ltar tshul dran bya//sa srungs
112b5(rgyud): ma yi rab sbyor bas//kA ma rA pe shes rab dbang //sems can kun gyi dgos pa'i phyir//phyag rgya 'di ni bsgrub par bya//e yig ye shes rlung rnams ni//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
112b6(rgyud): rab zhugaso//'dod chags mi yis rang bzhin bdag/thugs kyi 'khor lo rnal 'byor ma//rdo rje gsang ba las bzhengs rtse//khams thams cad ma 'pho med ma'o//'das dang ma byon
112b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams//da dge sems can chad no//sems ni re re la yang ni//sum du rtsa drug las can ma'o//lus na gzugs ni des bzhin//zhing du ka la sogs pa'i//gzugs
113a1(rgyud): shA ba// / sku/gyur//du sa na drugs su nga // rgyu da ga rdzu na su sum+ba//d+hA/
113a2(rgyud): du d+has sbyim//ngas rgyas lam na zhes byed ma/dang bdun gyi sa // phying shes / byin//de nyid lag
113a3(rgyud): da na pani du sum du ni pa'o///de nas skyem mchod byas nas//di nyid byin cig smraso//gang gini 'byung ba sems cad thog sa/
113b1(rgyud): kun d+ha ga pa s+ho//thams cang bdon pa yin //tsam ldan pa du nyid kyis gsungs/prAb d+hA rmA rgyun /d+yag+sad+hA na \u0f7f/rgyud gang du yang
113b2(rgyud): 'ong ba'i ma pan//smre tshig sa dzA yi rim pas so// nyim mapon rgyag tu//bde ma dang semasan dbyung sngagasas//sum du nga dang byung /rgyu mngan skyed na//
113b3(rgyud): phyag spyad du ni lan//she su bya ba rang bzhin can// chub sems son pa yi dbugs//'di kun thams can la thim pa'o//'dregs byed chen po'i snong ni yi
113b4(rgyud): slob sa pA la so na pasgrub pa //skye ma nyams kyang na pa/nga dzin pa ni sa na 'du byung //nas rje kyi da nga kun rnam su/shing du sbyin du ma//dgu' bas dang
113b5(rgyud): ts+tshi du ba ni//khams dang skye mtshud rnams nga // gas tham pa cad dang rnam pa//'jigs byed 'i tshong bzhin gaman//oM Di'i gan su dad pa'i snob sa//de lta'i thA
113b6(rgyud): na//bar 'dzul pa'i ma sakyi gan dang 'gre ba ni//ma par dngo sa bdun bye da/mdzes pas byag kyi rnams kyis brtan//rnam pa na
114a1(rgyud): 'phur bzhin pas//'gro ba kun las ye shes mchog/dad pa'i shugs las shes byas nas//lus can kun gyi stobs ldan yin//sha chen po la za bzhin
114a2(rgyud): dang //yid kyi khrag ni 'thung bar byed//he ru ka mar byed rig ma//ljon shing drung du yang dag zhugs//de ni dkyil 'khor 'khor dbu su//'jigs byed chen mo rnam par sgom//thugs
114a3(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo'i dbu su ni//sngags rnams yi ge las byung ba'o//oM ma kha hA Ta sa pAM mu ga drA ka ma yA kha la lA sU ya la hUM b+hi hUM nA pa d+hA Da ri phaT Ni swA hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA oM ma hA
114a4(rgyud): b+hai ra bI ye hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA//zhes bya'i gsang sngags sbyor chan las//rnal 'byiraM ma yi sku thugs can//yid ni nang du chud pa yis//'dod pa'i dong+ge gru ster bar byed//
114a5(rgyud): dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje mkha'agro de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so//dpal mkha' gro rgya mtsho
114a6(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las 'jigs byed chen mo'i nang gi phyag rgya'i cho ga 'chad pa'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga zhes bya ba ste le'u sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o////de nas
114a7(rgyud): 'dod ma'i rnal 'byor ma//phyag rgya yi ni brda yi rgyud//snying rjes bshad bya rnal 'byor pa'i//mthong ba yis ni dngos grub 'gyur//snang ba rnamasu gang tshe dngos//dbang po'i spyod//
114b1(rgyud): yul du mthong 'gyur//gnag dang dkar dang dmar ba dang //sngo dang dmar ser ljang ku dang //ser dang sngo skya khro bor snang //sna tshogs pa dang du bo'i mdog/sngo dang dmar ser 'dres pa dang //
114b2(rgyud): slar la yang ni dkar nag mdog/dmar ser dang ni ljang sngo skya//sngo ba dang ni dmar po'i mdog/dkar sngo dang ni dmar ljang dang //sprin dang sna tshogs mdog can dang //sna tshogs dang ni
114b3(rgyud): ser po'i mdog/du ba dang ni ser mdog can//ser ljang dong ni ljang ser dang //dmar po dang ni dung mdog can//du de ka dkar po sna tshogs sde//ser dang dmar po skyes pa can//kun
114b4(rgyud): ka dang ni sngo skya'i mdog/kar dang sna tshogs pa 'i mdog/skye bo dang ni du ba'i mdog/skya dkar dang ni dmar skya dang //sprin dang skya bo ljang skya dang //sna tshogs pa dang skya bo'i mdog/thams
114b5(rgyud): cad mdog gi kha dog tu//khams bcu gnyis kyi kha dog can//gser dang dngul dang zangs dang lcags//'khrur ba dang ni ra gen to//phan tshun 'dras pa'i khyi dog gis//rtse ba
114b6(rgyud): chen po da bcu gnyis//rnal 'byor rnams kyi khams thams cad//drir ni snang ba skye bar 'gyur//de yis snang ba'i du su ni//'phrul chen mo ni 'byung bar 'gyur//phyag rgya gnyis dag/
114b7(rgyud): rnam shes pas//kha dog mthong bas 'grub par 'gyur//sngon dang phyis ni bsdus pa las//gal te lha ni skyes sbyor bdag nyid//rlung shugs ma yi rab sbyor bas//ji
115a1(rgyud): ku ni'i gnasu ni//lha mo brtson 'grus stobs te//de ltar yi ge'i don rnams kyang //ba ni dbu mar 'bab pa ste//bag chags stobs kyi 'chi bar 'gyur//dus 'jom
115a2(rgyud): thams cad chos rnams//slar yang mthong lam bdag nyid yin//be ni yul dang ldan pa nyid//bdag nyid rnams kyi sgram b+hi lam//de kho na nyid mas 'khyud pa//skyob pa rnams
115a3(rgyud): gyi grol ba'i lam//mtho ris mye yul sa 'og gi/grol ba rnam pa gsum zhes bya//mnyam pa'i bde ba mthong 'gyur ba'ang //rdo rje 'bar ba'i mtshams na gnas//bum pa kun
115a4(rgyud): sogs byas gang phyir//gtu mo phra ba'i rtsa can no//pad+mar rtsa ni thams cad can//de dang 'dra ba'i ye shes med//de phyir brtson 'grus 'byung bar 'gyur//stob su ye shes ye//
115a5(rgyud): shes can//de ltar shes byas rtag rnal 'byor//'dod can ma la 'dod spyad kyis//dkyil 'khor gyi ni bdag mo dar//gsang sngags yi ger yang dag byung //lhan skyes rdzogs
115a6(rgyud): byang chub mchog tu//lha mo tshon mo skye bar 'gyur//oM be b+hU tA g+hA la tsa sar+m+ma gIn+ta ma ra d+ha d+hA NA ri ka Ne rA hUM ya hUM hUM pa hU~M T+Ta phaT swA phaT hA swA hA oM bA yu be ge hU~M hUM phaT phaT swA hA/
115a7(rgyud): kha dog gzugs ni sngon ji bzhin//sum cu bdun gyi dbus su'o//khams gsum snying po'i phyag rgya yis//gang de nus pa rdzogs par grags//gsung gi 'khor lo gsang ba
115b1(rgyud): cher//bdag gis gang zhig rim pa yis//thams cad bden par shes par bya//de phyir rdo rje 'chang dbugs dbyung //dpa' bo thams cad many+dzam sbyor las//rdo rje sems dpa' badre
115b2(rgyud): ba'i mchog/rdo rje mkha' gro de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung sau//'di ni dpal mkha' gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las rlung shugs ma'i
115b3(rgyud): kha dog gi phyag rgya'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid zhes bya ba ste le'u sum cu rtsa drug pa'o////de nas rdo rje phag mo yis//ji lta'i cho gas mchod byas nas//nyon cig lha mo bshad bya ba//
115b4(rgyud): tha ma rang gis lha'i phyag rgya//'o byed de bzhin lA ma dang //mkha' gro ma dang gzugs can ma//yongs 'gyur ma dang rjes 'jug ma//rnal 'byor phar phyin drug de bzhin//lag pa ga/
115b5(rgyud): pa yis ni brda//rnal 'byor dbye bas ston byed pa//re re la yang rnam gsum 'gyur//dpa' po'i rnam pa gsum nyid//de bzhin gshegs dang rdo rje nyid//A ro li ka dang rta mchog
115b6(rgyud): dang //he ru ka rnams lag g.yon la'o//mkhas pas gnyis sbyar rnal 'byor te//spyan ma dang ni ma mA kiM/sgrol ma gos dkar bdag med ma//de bzhin rdo rje dbying dbang phyug/
115b7(rgyud): pha rol phyin drug du shes bya//de ltar rnam gsum shes bya//dpa' bo 'gro ba kun gyi bdag/sa yi snying po la sogs der//de bzhin mkha' gro sogs gtso bo//lha mo lag pa'i
116a1(rgyud): rgyab son te//sor mo rnams la de bzhin gshegs//de bzhin lha mo dbus tshigs su//lag pa'i zil du de bzhin gshegs//dra par blo dri bzhin spen
116a2(rgyud): sgog la//lag rngu bo gan su rnal 'byor ma//lag pa'i rtse mos brda byas te//mkhas pas rgyab tu gshegs gsol bya//gang zhig gang gi bdag po nyid//de yi de nyid kyis
116a3(rgyud): mtshon bya//chung 'thung ma yi rab sbyor bas//ko sA la dang sna'i rtse mo//dran pa'i stobs kyis bdag nyid kyis//bza' ba dang ni ston mo bya//gnyid log dus kun las skyes par//
116a4(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po legs par zung //rA hu dus me nyi ma ru//zos pa sna yi rtser de bzhin//phra mo gnyi su med gzugs lngas//yul kyang bzanga' bar byas nas ni//me tog sems
116a5(rgyud): kyi sa bon las//k+Shi ni bdud rtsi skud pa 'dzag/de ltar nges byed rnal 'byor pa//lte ba'i 'chang sngon song la so//gzhu yis dbyug par son pa'i sems//rang gzugs yang dag
116a6(rgyud): rig pa tsa//ro mnyam po ni myang ba yang //the tshom med par 'dir byed 'gyur//rkyang ma'i bde ba'i nus pa yis//sa bon zag pa med par son//dus de nyid du rtag phyag rgya//
116a7(rgyud): dpa' byo'i brda yis thob par 'gyur//byang chub 'khor lo dga' bca su//'jug 'gyur mchog gi zhal can ma//brda' dang bral na 'khor ba ru//grol ba'i thibs gzhan
116b1(rgyud): yod ma yin//rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs bdag mo//tshang 'thung grags pa chen mo yin//sum cu rtsa bdun 'khor lo cher//gsang sngags las byung mchog zhal mo//oM sha mya tru hra/
116b2(rgyud): nib+h+r-i su g+ha stA na/ni ka d+hAr rI ya Ne d+hI b+h+rUM hU~M hUM ban+d+ha Ta pA phaT s+t+wa~Mh+Na hU~M/oM su rI b+hASh+NI ye hu~M hUM phaT phaT swA hU~M//de ltar sngags rgyal mngon par ni//ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro//
116b3(rgyud): 'byin dang rjud pa dag gis ni//gnyis gnyis kyis ni rkang par gsungs//shes rab thub sa bdag nyid lha mo//kha dag dbyibs ni sngon cano//kun mkhyen bgrod bya phyag rgya'i la
116b4(rgyud): mngon par shes pas sbyin mi bya//mi shes pa yis rnal 'byor ma'o//phyag rgya chen po 'di 'grub 'gyur//sbrul dang rkun sogs pas bsad nas//dmyal ba sogasu 'gro ba
116b5(rgyud): yin//sna tshogs lung 'dzin dpa' rnams la//yang dag yid ches bya phyir ster//bla ma'i drin gyis yod pa der//mkhas pa de yi rkyen gyis brda//dngos grub dngos po bdag nyid
116b6(rgyud): kyis//byed 'gyur gzhan du ma yino//de yi drin gyis gol ba ste//mkhas pas zhing du gnas par bya//bla ma'i man ngag zhing yin to//de ni gnas dang byang chub phyogs//gnas
116b7(rgyud): padz+dza ma maka rnams te//rang bzhin med pa snu ma ma'i lan//yang na 'di kun tha ma 'am//bla ma thams cad thams cad pa'o//man ngag dang bcas yaM shos che//ngag gi
117a1(rgyud): lam 'das spyod yul can//sku yi 'khor lor dngos grub che//thog pa kun gyi bde bar bzhugs//bde med bde ba med pa'ang med//thams cad der ni gnyis med
117a2(rgyud): che//dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las//rdo rje sems dpa' badre ba'i mchog/rdo rje mal 'gro de bzhin gi shegs//bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so//dpal mkha' gro
117a3(rgyud): rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud k+Sha rgyu kho bo chen po las/chang 'thung ma'i ratu sbyor ba'i brda'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid kyi cho ga zhes bya ba ste le'u sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o///
117a4(rgyud): de nas phag mo pod bzang mo'i//lha mos mchod pa byas nas ni//las dang rnal 'byor ma'i bdag po//rdo rje chen pos bdag la gsungs//sems can kun gyi dgos byed pa//
117a5(rgyud): rdzas las ni bshad par bya//gang gis thams cad dbang sogasu//lha sogs thams cad de bzhin 'ong //thog mar rdo rje phag mo'o//rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kyi ni las//ka ling/
117a6(rgyud): ka ru ljang lha mo'i//mngon par bka' bsgo byed par 'gyur//de'i rigs rnamasu skyes pa//bdag dang bdag gi'i gnang bas so//sum cu bdun bdag nyid dbu su//mchog gi
117a7(rgyud): dbang phyug ma bsgom bya//rkang pa gnyis kyi rtsa sngag su//sa bon yi ge las skyes pa'o//'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu//bde dang bral bas dngas grub med//oM sa tri ta sA sa
117b1(rgyud): sam pu khas maHhA s+yek+Sha ra pA r+b+ba swA /n+d+ha badz+nyAn du d+d+ha T+Ta paT swAhA/oM sh+tsa ma da R+Sha ya ts+tsha hU~M paT+Ta dz+nyAn//da.A chu thu na mchog 'don//bac+doMs zla
117b2(rgyud): dang bsamA ga ta no//rdo rje bag m-i bai nyese byu med//bad pas rna bi'i sngags rnamasa'o//zla ma chen gyi ni pa tig zhes//brlan pa'i glo/dri legs bskams las//gar+b+ha
117b3(rgyud): blun gyis ni//dwangos grub 'dod pas bdug spos sbyin//sngags pas bdug thos 'di yoston//bcom ldan 'das me te dA bya//phag mo'i yi ni b+h+yor ldan pas//'di skad kyi ni tshig
117b4(rgyud): //'dzun pa'i rtsa dang 'dus pa las//'bri ba thams pa dag yon lnga byud //rang gi rgyud ni mdzes bzhin de//zla mtshan gyi ni rdum gr-its+tsha/thun kyang hrI N+DinA gsus pa dang //
117b5(rgyud): bsres pas su su 'gyur//snrel bzhin du bzhag pa'i sems//b+hU yi yi gar tshig 'di //ljang gu'ang snying rje'i spyod ba ste//lha mo de bzhin dbu ma'o//ci zhig bde ba rig pa 'i//
117b6(rgyud): don dam pa'i spyod yul//gau sde bzhin pa ni rnal 'byor che//rnam par shos pa lha mor 'dod//skye bo kun gyi bdag nyid chos//bgrod pa mtshams rnams kun tu'o//thod pa kha
117b7(rgyud): bcing bya ba nas//blo rnams kyis ni sbyin sreg brjod//'di ni me tog du grags te//dam tshig so sor sbyong bar byed//rtag tu rnal 'byor ma mched bya//zhi ba'i brdung ba nyin ring
118a1(rgyud): ro//de ltar byed pa'i sngags shes pa//dngos grub thams cad rab stor ro//ba yang shA ni chung btags pa//lag pa g.yon pas skyon srog bya//lha thams cad
118a2(rgyud): dang rgyu skar bcas//klu sogs sum du'i gnas pa dang /sangs rgyas kyang ni dbang 'gyur na//phra mo'i mI ni slar yang ci//lud pa dang ni sngo shing dang //rang lus dril phyis de
118a3(rgyud): bzhin du//ming gis tshong btags sbyin sreg gis//'jig rten dang bcas dbang du byed//zla mchen gyi ni khrag dang ni//bza' ba zos pa'i skyugs pa ni//mi yi skra dang yongs
118a4(rgyud): ldan pas//da lta nyid 'gugs byed mchog/rang lus mar gyi skyugs pa dang //rang gi sgra ni mkhas pas sreg/nim pa'i me ni 'bar ba yis//mod la sdang bar byed pa'i
118a5(rgyud): mchog/bya rog pa shug pas sbyin sreg byed//mnyam gzhag d+ha ru ra yi mes//mang nag tshan te yongs ldan pas//mod la gsod spyod pa yin//stong phrag dgu yi sred
118a6(rgyud): thugs kyis//yun mi ring bas rgyal po 'thob//gang zhig sreg pa'i srog blugs ni//mkhas pas brgya ni sha yis te//de la zla ba gsum rjes la/skad cig le ni
118a7(rgyud): phongs pa 'joms//gang gis rgyun tu dran byed na//de ni skye ba'i 'thun par 'gyur//mtshan mo nyi shu rtsa gcig gis//'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med//lus med tshogs
118b1(rgyud): mchog bud med rnams//myos pa bapam can 'grub 'gyur//'dod pas myos bya'i 'jig rten rnams//mi 'jigs pa ni sbyin par byed//bud med bye bas da bskor nas//grub bya/
118b2(rgyud): sa yi steng du rol//dpal rdo rje phag mo sbyor ldan pa//dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor mnyam//rdo rje slob dpon gzhan dang 'dir//dpa' bo kun gyis phyag byed de//dam tshig spyod
118b3(rgyud): pa srun pa yi//'jig rten gsum la dngoso grub ster//sngon bshad rnal 'byor sbyor ba yis//de ltar sbyin sreg byas pas 'grub//rnal 'byor las gzhan las med//las dang
118b4(rgyud): bral bas sbyor ba med//'pho ba bcu gnyis rnams kyis las//rlung 'bab pa ni de rnams son//gnyis kyi mtshams ni 'dus pa las//sbyin sreg thab kyi nang du blta//lte ba gnyis
118b5(rgyud): ni 'dus par te//slar yang mtshams rnams thams cad du'o//de yi du su shes bya ba//sngags kyang yi ge la 'bum phrag/bzlas byas bskul ba gsang ba yis//byas pas
118b6(rgyud): kun nas dngos grub 'gyur//rdo rje'i 'khrul 'khor rab byas ste//de nas gcig gis dman lha bcu//re mig sa la bzhag par bya//sngags pas gnod mdzes rgyal po'i sngags/
118b7(rgyud): de la thog mar rnam snang mdzad//bdun pa la yang slar de'o//dgu par su yi yi ge sbyin//bcu gsum pa la gri yi go/bcu bdun par ni b+ha yig ste//slar yang bcu de gu/
119a1(rgyud): pA la hA//sum cu gaHg+sa pang gro sa sbyin//sum cu gsum par na la'o//sum cu bdun par spyon gyi ga//mkhas pas nA la ya do spya//bzhi da du
119a2(rgyud): rdza gcig pa 'dir ni//de bzhin du mAM yi ge sbyin//bzhi tsu gsum pa de bzhin//ye shes pa zin steng ba //byizhi bcu rdzu dgu par sbyin pa/dmas
119a3(rgyud): s+yes pas m+b+ha'i yig/dum du gaN+DIs pa sbyin bya ba//rig byed rnams kyi bod dbyung s+ho//dum du drug par de bzhin 'dir//dUng+kanr-i dus thams cad dug//'du byar bri
119a4(rgyud): yI yi ge sbyin//bcu gnyis pa la pa yi gro/bcoM brgyad pa la d+hU yig ste//sum cu gnyis pa ya yo go/sume nu brgyad par ts+tsha yi ge ste//bzhi bcu pa lnga yi swa bon//
119a5(rgyud): bzhi bcu ldan bzhin 'dir/nahU~M yi yi ge sma R+Ya sbyin bya//bi zhi bcu brgyad par sngags pa yis//rtag tu b+h+yo yig gzhon mu med pa'o//brgyad par de bzhin du ni 'drir//
119a6(rgyud): slar 'jom sbyin rtsA/ ban+d+ha ba du dza ga~M hU~M//shAcu drug pa la~M d+hA ya~M /ny+tsi shub y-i'i m-i kr-ini pa na na drug pad+man oM sbyin/
119a7(rgyud): sum cu pa la lani sbyar gyi//sum cu bzhi par la sbyin to//rA yi gi sum du drun de bzhin//bzhi bcu gnyis par hU~M b+h+yon bya//rdo rje 'phrul 'khor bsdus pa'o//dum
119b1(rgyud): ny+tsis rnams s+thAn+ti//bsgrub par bya ba'i maung gzhug tu//hUM yig dum bu thams cad kyi//bsgrub bya rnams dU m+b+ha nI//ba'i sngags kyi ma yongasu bskor//rdo rje yi ni brang ba bya/
119b2(rgyud): 'byor lo zung ni zlas ste//dbangol khams pa so mtha'i lce'o// tshul 'khor rdo rje las dz+yo 'o//drug gi rnaMs kyis yang dag buM//sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang ba yang //de tshe rgyu
119b3(rgyud): du blun par baib+hU // lnga rnams pa' pa las//dam tshig der ni byi ba yin//nang gi bdag nyid sbyin sdug gis//sngags kyi gtso mo shes par bye//dpa' bo gnyis med
119b4(rgyud): ba yis//de laMm+b+ha las mchog bshad pad+ma thA//rnal 'byor rnams sdi ga sang mchud pa//rtag tu 'khyud pos mchog rang byed//mtshan mo kun tu sgrub pa po//de nas po nya ma tsho
119b5(rgyud): par bya//sha za'i rtsa la khar/nukA nas//ji snyed 'dod pa'i bar du ni//de srid ling ga las rung 'gyur//zhan du du yis ma bshadado//sa ya~M lcags ma til mar du//btsos pas
119b6(rgyud): rkang pa phyug par bya//mkhas pa de yi mtshan ma ni//dus thams cad du rengs pa mkhas//pA tha ka Ta kA ro ho ti//rta yis dri dang 'di rnams ni//che rnams mnyam par bya ba ste/
119b7(rgyud): brtse chen tsha ga'o stag ma ni//a na'i 'o ma dang btabs nas//de yis ling ga drim phyis bye//gang gi tshad du 'dod pa 'i//de yi tshe du 'gyur zhes bya//myur ba ru ni chu na
120a1(rgyud): bkru ba byas na sngon gyi tshad//pad+ma dkar po'i kaM sA ra//sbrang dang btags pa'i byung ba ni//byin na ling ga brtan pa ru//de 'gyur 'dod ma la spyod do//pad+ma dkar
120a2(rgyud): po'i ge sar ni//til dkar po dang de bzhin gzhan//mar sar dang ni dpa' gcig gi/rtsa ba spyad dang lhan cig tu//btags nas lte bar byug byas na//de srid ling gi mi lhung //
120a3(rgyud): rdul can ma dang yung ba gnyis//yongs bzung ba yi dar ba dang //bre do gdu bar bya ba ste//bro gang ma gyur par du'o//de ltar 'thungs pas nyin bdun na//bcud len rdzogs
120a4(rgyud): par byed pa yin//de ltar sbyor ba mchog gtso bo//yang dag dpa' bos gsungs pa'o//spre'u gyi mchil ma bzung nas ni//byem zhib mo ru ni bya//rang gi dbang po yang dag
120a5(rgyud): ldan//dbang du byed pa bla no med pa'o//gang dang gang du gnas nas ni//rdo rje phag mo'i zlos gyur pas//lan cig bzlas pa'i bsdig mdzub kyis//g.yon dang g.ya su/
120a6(rgyud): bskor ba byas//gang gang //sam pa thams cad rnams//de ni thams cad rab stir byed//sa~M ba gos dang gser dang ni//bza' ston zas dang ltung ba ste//de thams cad ni
120a7(rgyud): 'thob byed//sngags pas de bzung yongs rdzogs byed//rnam 'gyur med pa dang ni khrag/sgrub pos gcig tu byas nas ni//rig pa lan bdun bzlas pa yis//de nas//
120b1(rgyud): mi la bskus pa yis//reg pas skyes bu rnams phye bar//'gyur te tshig ni gzhan du min//'di yi rlig pa lan cig ni//bzlas pa'i ru yis grol ba yin//de ltar gang dang gang gi ni//
120b2(rgyud): sems can kye khrag khrig gis ni//bsgos pa'i skud pa bcings pa yis//bzlas pas gzugs ni 'dzin pa ste//'di rnams thams cad chus grol bar//'gyur ba 'di la the tsom/
120b3(rgyud): med//bud med gzugs mdzes rgyal po dang //sa ya bdag po la bltas na//sgrub po ma mthong ba yang ni//de rnams thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur//lan bdun mngon par bsngags/
120b4(rgyud): byas na//de yi mtshan mo 'ong ba ste//nub bdun na ni mnga' shugs kyis//'ong ba la ni the tsom med//de ltar bya dang bya min pa'i//las kun rdo rje'i nor sen par//rang gis rig pa'i sbyor
120b5(rgyud): bdag nyid//ye shes pa rol son pa 'grub//'khrul 'khor khams kyi re'u mig tu//rtswa ni phra ma'i gzugs can ma//yi ge'ang rlung chen po yin te//wA ni kun tu 'gro ba'o//ljang kro
120b6(rgyud): gnyis med bdag chen mo//lha mo ye shes rgya mtsho yin//dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje mkha' gro de bzhin gshegs//bcom
120b7(rgyud): ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so//'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las rdo rje phag mo dang gnyisu med pa'i lding lha mo'i dbang du bya ba'i sbyin sreg dang
121a1(rgyud): 'khrul 'khor rgyalakhor lnga dang rdoSh+Tha d-i A la khod kyi chog mtshan nyid sa b+hA sam+b+ha cu n+d+ha bAts+tshad //de nas btsam+b+ha ldan myu rtswa
121a2(rgyud): yog/bdag pa yis ni skar gsungs pa//le bi ke ya~M ra spyor sa//shin tu bzang rnal 'byor mo'i sbyor ba//shes rab stobasu shes bya ste//'khrul 'khor ta yai 'gros dang nin/
121a3(rgyud): rab tu dga' ba'i sbyor bas bzhugs//rtsasngags rnal 'byor pa yis//ye shes ldan pa dbugs rgyu'i bdag/sman rdzob bden pa kun nas 'dzin//yi kun tu spyod lugs la
121a4(rgyud): bas ne la sna rnams thams cade du'o//gnyid log pa yis rab bzhugs pa'o//srog thams cad ni de'i nang du'o//les chen po la ba bzhin pa/rtsu ba'i sngags kyis byasmyanas
121a5(rgyud): ni//bdud rtsi dz+nyAn mo bcu byas nas//de'i dbus rnams kyis ga'i ma'o//da ni sum rgyu bdun bdug nyid//'phyang bzhin pa ni byang chub ///mye yi rnam par rtag lha mo//
121a6(rgyud): ma rnams skyes snying bdag nyid//keng dus drung rnam shes la//byin nas dur khrid bdag nyid rnams//dz+ha las blon yi go shes nas//nywan sa kyis d+hag tu
121a7(rgyud): ru ra yi ni sa bon gyi//mthar ni rtsa ba'i gsang sdigaso//oM ma dzA hA na po sde si gter ru pra d+hi b+hA ra yi ba hUM swA hUM hA pa riT Na pa hUMTahU~M swA rbahA pra swA hA oM su b+ha dre hUM hU~M Ta
121b1(rgyud): swAhA//de ltar sngags las yang dag byung //las kyi kha dog dang ni gzugs//rnal 'byor bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin can//gsang ba'i dbus bsgom par bya//gtor ma dang ni sbyin bsreg bya/
121b2(rgyud): phyi na sa las ni 'di dag brdzam//sngags pas lha yi sbyor ba yis//'bum phrag bzlas pa byas nas ni//sems can kun la dbye 'byung ba'i//'khrul 'khor 'khor lo bshad par bya/
121b3(rgyud): lo sngon ma'i gzugs ca ni//byas nas gnas sngags 'dir dgod bya//rnam par snang mdzad thog mar te//gnyis par de nas ni dgod bya//gsum par hUM yig sbyin bya ste//lnga par oM gyi mi
121b4(rgyud): ge'o//drug pa gr-i yi yi ge sbyin//hUM gI yi ge bdun pa'o//brgyad pa ra m+ba'i yi ge sbyin//bcu par su yi yi ge'o//bcu gnyis par ni hUM yig spyan//bcu bzhi par ni gr-i yi go/bco lngan
121b5(rgyud): m+b+hamA'i yi ge ste//bcu drug de bzhin hUM yi go/bcu bdun pa ru su yig ste//bcu dgu pa ru h+Na sbyar bya//nyi shu phaT yig sbyin par bya//d+ha yi gre nyi shu rtsa gcig par//nyi shu dgu par rnam
121b6(rgyud): pir snang mdzad//sum cu pa yo'i yi ge gnyis//sum cu gcig par slar de'o//rig byed dang po sum cu gsum/sbom cu bzhi pa ra ya yig ste//rA dza'i yi gra dag sumA~M nu wAr/
121b7(rgyud): sum cu drug par d+ha mig sbyin//sum cu brgyad par gro yi'o//bzhi 'du ba bzhi phran sbyin bye//'on bcu gnyis par a de bzhin//bzhi bcu ga sum pa ru ni hA/bzhi bdu na
122a1(rgyud): hUM hU~M dag/bzhi bcu lnga ba ru ni gr-i//bzhi bcu bdun pa ru ni na//bzhi bcu brgyad par sbyin bya ba//tsU ng+ku gau ni yig gnyis//b+ha ga'i sgra ni slar sbyin te//bzhi du//
122a2(rgyud): rtsa dgu pa la'o//lhag mo la ni rtsa sngags bri//'khor lo bzhi ru bsgrub bya'o//kun nas yongasu 'khor b.ro ni//sngags pas rta mgrin bri bAr bya//gnyis pa g.yon du bskor ba ste//
122a3(rgyud): 'khrul 'khor kha sbyar 'khrul 'khor bya//gsang ba'i yi ge las skyes par//shes bya lhan skyes rnal 'byor pas//klu dgug pa dang dbang dang ni//lha la sogs pa bsad pa yin//rnal/
122a4(rgyud): 'byor rtse bdag nyid can gyis//rang sems rtag tu bsad par bya//gang yang de'i yang sdang ba ni//de yis thams cad bsad pa yin//sdang sems can gyis gzhan du na//bsad pas
122a5(rgyud): dngos grub rnams mi 'thob//bde mchog phyi ma'i las gang ni//de kun nges par byed par 'gyur//re re yi ni las cung zad//mdor bsdus 'di ni bshad par bya//klu yi rgyal po de
122a6(rgyud): bzhin brgyad//mtha' yas rim pas bsgom par bya//nor rgyas sogs tu shes par bya//thur du sel ba dung skyong ngo //mnyam gnas pad+ma ye ni klu//bsam gtan pad+ma chen po'o//
122a7(rgyud): khyab gnas 'jog po yi ni klu//klu ni slar hu lu hu la'o//ru sbal mtha' yas shes par bya//rtsengs pa rgyal ba yi ni klu//lha sbyin rnam par rgyal ba'o//mtha' yas nor las rgyal
122b1(rgyud): ba'o//'jug pa yis ni dgug pa ste//datang ba yis ni gsuM gas la//bum pA can gyi char dang ba hA//mnyam pa'i mu gis gasngal ba'o//rnam shes brgyad pa dbazhin du//'drar ni bu mor shes
122b2(rgyud): par bya//ye shes na mkha'i dang gnyis bzhan//rnam par shes pa bcu yi rgyu//puHyi yi ge brgyad sbyin b+h+yo//ting 'dzin sna tshogs de bzhi no//phan tshun skyes pas dkris pa ste//klu mo
122b3(rgyud): de yi mtshan khung du'o//rdo rje mkha' gro'i gzugs tshan gyis//klu yi dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya//ji lta'i rim pas kha dog rnams//thun mtshams gnyis kyi thun tshod brgya//rtse snga
122b4(rgyud): mngon par brjod la nyid//klu dang klu mor shes par bya//dbang po thim par byas nas ni//yi ge la 'bum bzlas pa nyid//gang gang las ni phyi rol gyi//de de'i las kyi dbang tshul bya//
122b5(rgyud): gzugs ni gang 'dod par bya ste//khro bo 'am zhi ba'i gzugs dag tu'o//sems ni gzugasu yang dag grags//de phyir shin bzang ming cano//rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun gyi bdag
122b6(rgyud): de yis lha ni byed par 'gyur//slar yang phyi nang bdag nyid kyis//gzhan pa'i lha ni mA bsha//de yis thams cad mngon brjod pas//rnal 'byor pa yis gang 'dod 'gro/sems can
122b7(rgyud): rnams kyi bag chags skyon//phyi rol tu yang sprin mthong 'gyur//bag chags zad pa'i dus ni//sprin dang klu rnams mthong mi 'gyur//dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las//rdo rje sems
123a1(rgyud): sa// byud na ga zhanas/ma ldan nga den sug/ ma sgyu rgyun nga chu
123a2(rgyud): las bcom ldan 'das kyi rno ba'i sngags dang shin tu bzeng ma gnyi su med pa'i sbyor ba'i bdag nyid can d+ha'i sngogs mdor bstan pa rigs kyi klu'i las kyi cho ga'i mtshan nyid ce pa
123a3(rgyud): ba s+thA le'u su me nu rtsa dgu pa'o////de nas dri phyir skad la yang //lha mos mchod pa 'dir byas te//phag me'i 'dod chags bcas pas//mnyes nas lha yis ston pa mdzad//
123a4(rgyud): rna ma yi rab sbyor bas//dus kun tu nI kAT+Ti rI//ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag dang //ste kA ru ni yang dag bzhugs//haM yig nA dang lus kun tu//snying ga'i da A las kyang ni lam
123a5(rgyud): swa yig bskyod pa yi ni srog/rdo rje'i rlung gis bskyod pa yin//du tsam de bde dang bcas pa//slar yang 'dab 'dab la gsum gsum//sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi chos//nyi shu
123a6(rgyud): bzhi mdab mo brgyad//bcu gnyis lte ba'i pad+ma ru//rnal 'byor ma rtag sum cu drug/de tsherare re ri 'dir rnams kyis//mtshams kyis tal sogs pa rnams//dz+haiM yes lha mo de ma yin//
123a7(rgyud): gsam mi gsal rang bzhin can//'dod pa'i kham ma'ang skyes pa mo//bar pa'i gzugs kyi las cano//tsA yig 'pho ba yin chos//thams cad rig pa'i mtshams/
123b1(rgyud): sa grol//sum du bdun bdag nyid dbu sa//gsod pa'o las la btsun par bya//gang gang gsod pa'i ltas rnams kyis//rtswa mA byed phyir 'gyur//bstan pa la ni gnang byung bas
123b2(rgyud): 'am//de bzhin mtshams med lnga byed la//dug dang skye tsha lan tshwa dang //d+he du dur khrod sol ba dang //rang gi bsdigs mdzub khrag gis ni//'khor lo'i 'bad pas bri bar bya//gshin rjel
123b3(rgyud): 'khrul 'khor rtag tu do'o//byed 'gyur gzhan du ma yin no//sngon bshad re ru mog shes byas nas//gsang sngags phreng ba 'di dgod bya//thog mar rnam par snang mdzad//gnyis par smra nA
123b4(rgyud): rnam par brjod//gsum par m+b+ha'i yi ge brjod//rig byed dang pi lngar de bzhin//drug par gr-i yig de bzhin te//slar yang mdun par sti yogo//brgyad pa la nI hU~M yig gnyis//dgu par phaT ya/
123b5(rgyud): de bzhino//bcu par ni yig de bzhin te//skung yang bcu gnyis par hUM yig/bcu gsum+b+ha par ni tats+tsha ma gr-i ste//gri yig bcu bzhi par ngo 'o//hU~M ga yi ge bitse lnga par//b+hA ro yi ge bcu dru
123b6(rgyud): par/bcu bdun pa ru su yig ste/hUM yig 'du dgu pa la'o//nyi shu pa la hUM yig sbyin//ts+tsha yig nyi shu rtsa gcig par//rnam par snang mdzod nyi shu dgur//sum cu pa slar gri yig/
123b7(rgyud): sum du gcig pot+ta ma ga ste//sum nu gsum par rnam snang mdzad//sum du zin par I la gau dang sbyar bya//sum cu lnga par ya'i sa bo ni//he yig dang ni sbyir par bya//sum cu drug par/
124a1(rgyud): hUM gnyis sbyin//sum cu bdun par phaT yo go//sum cu brgyud pAng pra ya gnyis//bzhi bdur hU~M gnyis de ban no//bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa la phaT//banI bcu gnyis
124a2(rgyud): par b+hA ga gnyis//bzhi bcuHgsum pa la ni//pa ya gnyis dag yi go'o//bzhi bcu rtswa bzhi pa la ste//bai ni bi nu lnga par gri yig/bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa la ni//rA dza'i sgra ni sbyar bar
124a3(rgyud): bya//bi d+ha'i sgra ni slar bsngags pas//dum bu bzhi bcu brgyad par ro//wAn yig slar yang sbyin bya ba//bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa la'o//lhag ma rnams la go che'i sngags//bsgrub bya'i ming /
124a4(rgyud): nang bcug pa'o//gA shin rje'i gdong ni grwa kun tu//sreg pa rkang pa phyog suM dgod//snying kha kau shin rje'i sa gzhi no//de yi dbusu bsgom par bya//ye shes rnam shes sbyor ba dag nyid//
124a5(rgyud): mkhas pas sngags kyi kun spyod bya//bla ma dam tshig la brnyas pa'ang //rnam par shes dang blo dman pa'o//bstan pa la ni gnod byed pa//mig la sogs pa'i skye mched//mtshams
124a6(rgyud): med lnga po byed pa ni//phung po khams dang de bzhin gzhan//sems can thams cad gcig pa yi//rigs ni phung po sogs dang khams//rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams kyis de//bas
124a7(rgyud): par sems can khams bsad pa'o//gang dang gang gi gdong bltas nas//de dang de'i bdag nyid gzugs can//bag chags ye shes kyis bsad par//'gyu ro sems can gzhan
124b1(rgyud): bsad min//de rnams gsod pa'i lus sum yang //byas pas bsad pa de dang 'dra//sbyin srog dug la sogs rdzas kyis//yang dag rig gzugs can gyis bya//dkyil 'khor 'khor
124b2(rgyud): lo der dran bya//sreg pa gtum mo la ni'o//sa don yi ge las skyes pa//dkyil 'khor rta rna ma yi'o//kha dog dang ni dbyibs sngon gyis//shes rab thabs kyi mchod pa de//oM shrI sad+d+hi
124b3(rgyud): tsa saM mA ra rab kA la ra d+haM ka saM ya Ne hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT phaT swA swA hU~M hA oM ha yA kar+Ne hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA//'khor rnams ngo mtshar skyes nas ni//skrag nas sa la 'gyel par 'gyur//kye ma
124b4(rgyud): tshul 'di mi shes pa'i//'jig rten rnams na rmongs pa nyid//gang gi bde kun la gnas nas//skrag gis 'di la tshar bcad pa'o//mtshar nas sems can sar 'gyel bas//lag na rdo rje
124b5(rgyud): sogs bzhengs nas//dbus mo'i lha nga sar btsugs nas//bdag nyid chen po bdag 'dri'o//ci yis bdag dang gang gi nyid//'bras bu dang ni rgyu'i rang bzhi no//bcom ldan gang du rnam par
124b6(rgyud): gzhag/gal te nyid kyi 'bras rnams kyis//bsod pa da dang 'dra ba gsungs//yang ni rgyu bcom ldan 'das la//'bras bu skyes bu gsod pa yin//bdag gi bdag pos bka' stsal cig/the
124b7(rgyud): tsam bsal bar mdzad du gsol//bka' stsal pa/rtse gcig pa yis tshig de la//rdo rje khyod kyis mnyan par gyis//'bras bu las kyi rdza su 'dun//bdag ni bde ba kun gyi gnas//de'i las
125a1(rgyud): dbang gis sangs rgyas dang //byang chub sems dpar khyed rnamaso//rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni//gnyisu med pas gcig tu 'gyur//de ni dngos po kun gyi rgyu//mA
125a2(rgyud): pa las ni rkyen yi no//dmag dpung lo sogs su chen lnga//mkhas pa rnams kyis mthong ba yis//thams cad gnyis med bdag nyid bya//de'i phyi ro gsod pa dang ldan pa'o//bdag nyid//
125a3(rgyud): bsad pas sangs rgyas nyid//skye bo gzhan kun gyis ma yin//dus kyi dbang gis rgya srid na//tshegs chung las ni 'grub par 'gyur//de yi phyir na sngon gyi las//mkhas pa rnams kyis
125a4(rgyud): brtag byas na//khams ni dpa' bo'i rang bzhin du//de dang der ni gdags par bya//de yis bdag nyid bsad pa yis//sems can khams rnams de nyid//'bad pas brtse ba
125a5(rgyud): bskyed byas nas//nges par bsad bar bya ba yin//'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du//brtse ba dman pas 'grub mi 'gyur//dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i
125a6(rgyud): mchog/rdo rje mkha' gro de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan padrag pos 'di gsung so//dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las rta rnam dang dpa' bo gnyi su med
125a7(rgyud): pa'i sbyor bas go cha dang rtsa ba'i sngags kyi cho ga'i mtshan nyid kyis bsad pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu pa'o////de nas skye bar byed pa yi//sbyor ba kun tu rnyed dka' ba//bya gdong ma
125b1(rgyud): yo rab sbyor bas//mdor bsdus pa yisu bshad par bya//brtson 'grus byang chub yan lag chos//hi mU la yar yang dag zhugs//lto ba'i dkyil 'khor da'u su ni//'khor lo'i rtse mo
125b2(rgyud): par bya//mkha' gzugs nyid bdag pho nya mo//rkan dang rdo rje chu skyes dbus//rnam shes rlung dang lhan cig tu//mnga' ye shugs kyis gyen du 'phang //lus ni 'dar 'dar bya ba ste//drag
125b3(rgyud): shul sbyor bas bya ba yin//rtag tu byed bzhin rnal 'byor pa//mchog tu zag med 'grub par 'gyur//rnal 'byor ji srid mi 'dod par//rlung dang rnam shes gso mi 'gyur//sna yi bu gar
125b4(rgyud): srog srog la//lte ba'i dbus bskyod par bya//lte ba rna ba gnyis sbyor ba yis//'dzin bzhin pa yis g.yo mi 'gyur//rlung dang rnam shes lhan cig tu//de ni skyo bas 'khor ba yin//de yis
125b5(rgyud): dus sbyor ba'i bdag nyid la yang //dngos po thams cad mthong ba gang //de dang 'dra ba'i dngos por 'gyur//d+ha du ro'i me'i sbyin sreg gis//shing la dbyangs pa'i sgra dang ni//sha za'i rtsab bsreg/
125b6(rgyud): par bya//'di yis las kyi rab sbyor bas//sangs rgyas skad cig gis skyo 'gyur//de phyir brtson 'grus byang yan lag/de rnams las ni mngon par bya//brtson 'grus rdzogs byang chub
125b7(rgyud): mthong bas//rtag tu myur du 'thob par 'gyur//ha yig 'phyang ba'i ye she su//rang nyid dpa' bos bshad pa yin//ma'i yig kyang ni rang rig pa//bdag nyid rnam pa'i gnas bzhugs
126a1(rgyud): de//thim dang longs spyod rnam pa'i gzugs//sangs rgyas sku can skyo bar 'gyur//rang gis rig bdag rig pa rnams//sas tsan don byas nas gshegs 'gyur//su ma//
126a2(rgyud): cu bdun bdag nyid dbusu//las kyis rnal 'byor ma sgom bya//mdog dang gzugs ni sngon gyi bzhin//gsang sngags sbyor las yang dag byung //oM a san+tA rba mA nA lA g+ha d+hA nA ma ri sho 2/
126a3(rgyud): hUM sta phaT b+ha na sA bi hA d+hA ba NA ya hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA oM kha g+hA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA//zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi sbyor bdag nyid//shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin can//ji lta ba ni sngon gyi bzhin/
126a4(rgyud): 'khrul 'khor 'khor lo bshad par bya//yi dgas 'khor lor rtag tu ni//sngags kyi phreng ba 'di dgod bya//thog mar rnam par snang mdzad de//gnyis par m+b+ha sbyar bar bya//gsum par

126a6(rgyud): par hUM gnyis sbyin bya ste//gr-i yig slar yang bcu gnyis par//bcu gsum pa la hA'i yi go/bcu bzhi pa la hUM yi go/bco lnga pa la ni yig ste//hU~M yig bcu drug pa la dgod//

126b1(rgyud): dgod bya//sum cu gcig pa de nyid sbyin//sun nu gsum par rnam snang mdzad//sum nu bzhi par ya ho gnyis//sum cu lnga bA ra rA dzA gnyis//pri yig sum cu drug par spyon//sum cu
126b2(rgyud): bdun par de nyidado//sum cu brgyad pa ra hUM hUM gnyis//bzhi bcur A~M na ya ye tshig/bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa la ldan//hUM gnyis bzhi bcu gnyis pa la//bzhi ba cu gsum par pa ya ste/
