126b5(rgyud): mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya//yi dgas chos dbyings ngo bo nyid//rtog pa gsol phyir snying rje yin//rta yang gnas dang gnas min du'o//snying po'i byang chub kyi rdo rje//klu'i 'gros
126b6(rgyud): theg pa che rnams kyi//rang bzhin skye bo thams cad kyi'o//dge dang mi dge ro langs te//sems can slu bas bgrod pa'o//gzhan ni theg pa gsum po yang //sngon gyi las can ston pa yin/
126b7(rgyud): dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor la so//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje mkha' gro de bzhin gi shegs//bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so//dpal mkha' gro rgya mtsho rnam/
127a1(rgyud): 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las bya gdong ma dang dpa' bo gnyisu med pa'i smyo bar byed pa'i 'khrul 'khor 'khor po'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'i snang
127a2(rgyud): po'i sngags dang bcas pa'i las zhe sa bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o////de nas 'khor shugs ma'i sbyor bas//brang 'gro'i 'khor lo bshad par bya//pre ta pu
127a3(rgyud): rir byung yan lag/dga' ba zhes bya mdor bsdus pas//stobs rnams thams cad rengs byed de//'khor los bsgyur sogs las can no//yung brgya skyegs bsres pa yis//'khrul//
127a4(rgyud): 'khor thod pa la bri bya//spyod do dus ni thams cad du//lte ba sogasu phyed bcas gsum//ro langs kyang ni gzugs bdag nyid//'gro dang 'ong ba rengs byed pa'o//bud med phyag rgya
127a5(rgyud): bzang bcas pas//rim gyis dbugs ni dbyung bar bya//kun bdag gtso bo rnam par shes//bde ba rnamasu thim par 'gyur//de ni g.yo bar mi 'gyur te//blo ldan dus rnams
127a6(rgyud): thams cad du'o//'di yi bya ba kun med pa//byas pa'i bdag nyid kyi rab 'byung //las kyi sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing //de yi gnas ni dpag par bya//rnal 'byor pas dngos gang gang dran/
127a7(rgyud): de da ltar rengs par byed//de yi las kyis bskyod pa yis//slar yang las gzhan dran mi bya//de dang der ni byang chub che//skye bo thams cad byed par 'gyur//slar yang yongs su
127b1(rgyud): myang 'das pa'ang //byas nas bde ba tshe las 'jug/ri'i ni 'dod chags rang bzhin 'dir//skye bo thams cad byed pa'o//byang chub yan lag dga' las spyos//rang bzhin dor ni byung ba yin/
127b2(rgyud): 'khor shugs ma yi gnas zhugs te//da ltar rengs pa'i las bya'o//kha dog dbyibs ni ston gyi ste//'khor lo'i dbus su bsgom par bya//sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag nyid//
127b3(rgyud): de yi gnas la 'byung bar 'gyur//oM kro su d+ha me bi ru b+hA ka hA ma hA pi ra ta twA tA ya dA hUM ya hUM hUM pha hU Ta phA phaT Ta pa sA Ta hA swA hA oM tsakra bau ge hU~M hUM phaT phaT swA hA//lha mo chen mo gras
127b4(rgyud): sngags 'di//mchog las shes rab thabs bdag nyid//'khor lo'ang sngon gyi bshad pa ste//gcig gis dman pa'i lnga bcu'i bdag/thog mir rnam par snang mdzad de/su yig
127b5(rgyud): slar yang gnyis paro//gsum pa'i dam bur m+b+ha smin bya//ni yig bzhi par de bzhi no//lnga par su yig sbyin par bya//slar yang drug par m+b+ha'i yi do//hrI yig bdun par sbyin bya ste
127b6(rgyud): rlung gi yi ge brgyad pa'o//gI yig dgu par sbyin pararo bya//bcu pa ra hA yig de bzhi no//bcu gcig pa ru pa sbyin te//de nas bcu gnyis par ye yi ge/hUM gi yi ge bcu gsum pa ra/
127b7(rgyud): bcu bzhi pa ru hAM yi go/pa ye yi ge bco lnga par//baM yig bcu drug par dgod bya//bi yi yi ge bcu bdun par//slar yang r+ya yig bco brgyad par//gcig gis dman pa'i nyi
128a1(rgyud): shur par d+hA s+yAng dgod bya//nyi shu gcig par de nyid sbyin//sna yig nyi shu gnyis par dgod//ka yig nyi shu gsum par ste//nyi shu zin par yA yon/nyi shu
128a2(rgyud): drug par dza yig sbyin//hUM yig nyi shu bdun paro//nyi shu brgyad par phaT yig ste//gr-i yig nyi shu dbu pa'o//sum cu pa la b+ha yig ste//sum cu gcig par hUM yigo/sum cu
128a3(rgyud): gnyis par de nyid sbyin//hUM yig sum cu gsum pa'o//phaT yig sum cu bzhi par te//sum cu lnga par oM dgod bya//sum+ba cu drug par de nyid sbyin//sum cu bdun par
128a4(rgyud): de bzhin//ya yi gsum cu rtswa brgyad pa//sum cu rtsa dgu pa lan//bzhi bcu pa la A sbyin bya//bzhi bcu gcig pa la ni oM//gr-i yig pa ni bcu gnyis par te//bzhi bcu
128a5(rgyud): gsuM par phaT dgod bya//hU~M yig bzhi bcu bzhi par te//bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa ru hUM//bzhi bcu drug par hUM sbyin bya//bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa ya t+ta//gri yig bzhi ba cu brgyad par te/
128a6(rgyud): gcig dman lnga bcu paM la hA//de ltar 'khrul 'khor 'khor lo ni//mgrin pa las skyes rtag dgod bya//rengs po thams cad lus tshon las//srog ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin tshe//sbyor bar byas
128a7(rgyud): pa dang de ltar//sems can gnod byed rengs pa'o//grol ba sems can thams cad la rnal 'byor pa'i yang yid kyiso//lo gcig tu ni goms pa las//'grub 'gyur 'od la tho tsam
128b1(rgyud): med//nye ba yi ni snying po'i sngags//re'u mig dbus mar yang dag bri//bsgrub bya'i ming ni nang bcug nas//rlung dang rnam shes thim par bya//brang 'gro 'khyil par grags pa ste//'khrul
128b2(rgyud): 'khor yang lus can rnams kyi'o//ri bo phung por 'gro ba ste//byang chub sems ni thod pa'o//de ye steng du ster ba nyid//mkhas pa 'khrul 'khor gang giso//yi ge thams cad rang bzhin/
128b3(rgyud): te//nyin zhag las kyang shes par bya//sems kyi bran po chen po yi//rba rlabs rengs par bya ba yin//dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyar las//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/
128b4(rgyud): rdo rje mkha 'gro de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so//'dri ni dpal mkha' gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'i
128b5(rgyud): rengs par bya ba'i las dpa' bo dang gnyi su med pa'i sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid zhes bya ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o////de nas dum skyes ma'i sbyor bas//ji lta'i
128b6(rgyud): las ni gsal bshad bya//las thams cad pa'i thobs byas nas//ji lta'i cho gas sbyin sreg ste//las kyi cho ga rnams mthong bas//bskrad pa'i las ni bsgrub par bya//gr-i ha deH
128b7(rgyud): tA gan su//shin sbyangs byang chub yan lag tu'o//na mkha'i bu ga'i byang sems kyang //'dzin pa chen po steng 'phen 'gyur//bskam byas a yi rnam pas to//mgo bor rnam par
129a1(rgyud): bzung bar bya//n+ta yo gas 'gro bya ste//mda' yi shugs kyis yongasu 'khor//rlung gi dkyil 'khor can bsgoms nas//mgo bo'i dbusu rgyal mtshan te//rnam pa
129a2(rgyud): shes de ni bskyed par 'gyur//dpag tshad 'bum phrag stong phrag can//sangs rgyas nyid ma lus pa 'thob//rnal 'byor pa des gsum du//hA hA he he rnam brgyad du//mkha'
129a3(rgyud): 'gro'i sbyor bas dgod pa'o//mkha' spyod 'gro ba'i bya ba yis//rnal 'byor ma ni der byed//rang gis chung rtag gyen bgrod las//khyim du 'chi bar shes par bya//'phrog pa
129a4(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad de//sngar ba'i dbang po'i cho ga can//sbyin bya theg pa chen po kun//rtag tu sbas pa med rgyu so//rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dbugs dbyung ba'ang //sems can thaMd
129a5(rgyud): la sbyor bya//de srid rdo rje rnal 'byor che//ji srid bsgrub byar mo spyod par//shin tu sbyangs pa chos kun tu//ye shes shes bya'i bdag nyid du yang //byang chub yan lag yid
129a6(rgyud): kyis bltos//yid de chos can thams cad//de ltar bye brag chos shes pa'o//sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu stan//theg pa chen por bskrad pa ste//sbyin bsreg 'di yis
129a7(rgyud): rdzogs par bya//bya rog sha ba shog chu brgyus dang //bya rgod chang bstan mngon par ni//de yi sems kyis bsreg par bya//sangs rgyas rnams kyang sprod byed na//sa gzhi'i chung
129b1(rgyud): du'i 'jig rten pa'i//skye 'gro kun la smos ci dgos//sum cu bdun bdag nyid dbus su//ston du bshad pa can bsgom bya//sngags kyi yi ge las byung ba//shesra rab zhabs kyi
129b2(rgyud): rang bzhin can//oM bu ma d+hA trA kA kA Ti she sA ti ha lA swa k+ShAk+ShA t+sA dz+nyA nA~M ni hU~M shwe ni phAT ya swA hU~M hUM hUM phaT/phaT swA hA oM kha~Mt+tar-ihI b+h+rUM hUM phaT phaT swAt+ma//zhes bya'i sngags las
129b3(rgyud): yang dag byung //'khrul 'khor sngon bdag nyid dngos can//gcog dmin lnga bcu'i bdag nyid kyi//re'u mig gnod mdzes sngags gan su//rnam par snang mdzad thog mar ste/
129b4(rgyud): gnyis par de nyid sbyin par bya//a yig gsum par sbyin bya ste//bzhi par na yi yi ge'o//lnga par ya yi yi ge'o//drug par ya yig sbyin bya ste//bdun par su yi yi ge'o//
129b5(rgyud): brgyad par phaT kyi yi gaM ste//dgu pa ra su yig de bzhino//bcu par rnam par snang mdzad//gr-i yig bcu gcig par dgod bya//bcu gnyis pa la t+ta yi ge/bcu gsum pA la m+b+ha'i
129b6(rgyud): yig/bcu bzhi pa la nA'i sa bon//bco wAr hU~M gnyis de bzhi no//bcu drug pa la hUM phaT taM//bcu bdun pa la rnam snang mdzad//bco brgyad pa la h+Na yi ge/bcu dgu pA la gr-i da god
129b7(rgyud): bya//nyi shu pa la yi ge sbyin//nyi shu gcig par yang sbyar bya//nyi shu gsum par hU~M yig ste//nyi shu bzhi pir hUM phaT dgod//hU~M yiganyi shu drug par sbyin//nyi shu bdun par
130a1(rgyud): ya sbyar bya//hU~M yig nyi shu dgu par te//dza ga drang por sbyin par bya//sum nu pa la de nyid sbyin//gr-i yig sum+ba cu rtswa gcig par//sum cu gnyis par
130a2(rgyud): hUM yig ste//dz+ha ye ga sum cu gsum paro//sum du yin par gr-i b+hi nI bya//sum cu lAM par ho dgad bya//su mo cu drug par rA yi ga ste//sum cu bdun par hU~M phacu gnyis/
130a3(rgyud): sum cu brgyad par yA sa bon//gcig dman bzhi bcu pA la ya//bzhi bcu pA lad+hA sbyin bya//bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa la hU~M///d+hi yig bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis par//na
130a4(rgyud): bcu rtsa gsum pa la ni//bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa la d+hA//bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa la bi//bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa la wan//bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa la ga/m+b+ha yig bzhi bcu dgu par te//
130a5(rgyud): 'khrul 'khor ro langasu gzhug bya//le'u tshe lnga ru bsgrub bya dang //rnal 'byor ma drug char bcas//gsang sngags nang du chud bya ste//ro langs kha ru dgod par bya//gang dang gang
130a6(rgyud): gi ming gis ni//'khrul 'khor brtse chen gyis bri bya//de dang de yir shes bya ste//mkhas pa yis ni bgrad pa'o//gsang ba chen po mi bstano//skye ba 'di nyid la 'grub pa'o//
130a7(rgyud): gsang sngags brjod pa ma byas shing //sgrom brel rnal 'byor pa yang //bla ma rnal 'byor ma'i gnang bas//khyab bdag ji ltar 'dod par spyod//de phyir bla ma bsten bya zhing //
130b1(rgyud): bdag tshan rnams kyis mnyes par bya//de yis dgyes pas 'thob pa ste//las kyis byang chub 'byung ba'o//'khrul 'khor 'char ba'i du su ni//mgo bo rnam par bsgom par bya//des
130b2(rgyud): mngon grub par shes par bya//dus bzhin rnamasu 'grub pa min//dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje mkha' gro de bzhin gshegs//
130b3(rgyud): bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungaso//'di ni dpal mkha' gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las dum skyes ma'i sbyor ba rab tu sgom pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo bskrad
130b4(rgyud): pa'i las rnal 'byor ma drug gi go cha'i sngags kyi cho ga'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o////de nas ro langs zung gi ni//snang byed 'khrul 'khor de bzhin du//
130b5(rgyud): chang 'tshod ma yi rata sbyor bas//mdor bsdus pa yis rab bshad bya//sau rASh+ma yi gnas bsgrubs nas//yan lag rab tu rnam 'byed chos//byang chub mi tshom med 'thob par//mchog
130b6(rgyud): gi 'dod ma shes par bya//myes byed chen po sbyor byed par//shau yi ges rab tu bshad//bcud len dngos po yang //mchog gi pad+ma dag tu 'dzin//smin pa'i dbu su snal ma gang //
130b7(rgyud): rdo rje nor bu'i nang phyin nas//snyoms par 'jug las skye bzhin par//r+t+ti yig rang gis reg mi btu//reg med der ni rnam shes kyis//mchog gi bu me btung bar bya//bdag med pa yi/
131a1(rgyud): rA duH//dAn na m-i ba shud//ye shes 'di smra/snang ba thams dud pa rgyas //dbyub do na nas su//yod kyis dang rgyang par 'gyur/
131a2(rgyud): bde ba chen po la rol bya//so yig de ni bdag gis bshad//ro ma bsdums pa'i sbyor ba yas//ma mchu 'jib par bya ba yin//rta dang ma hA'i mkhrul 'khor du//dbye bo srog dang
131a3(rgyud): sel la'o//Sh+Tha yig tshigs pa thams cad du//shes par byed par the tsom med//yan lag rab tu rnam 'byed des//chos bdag med pa'i byang chub rtogs//'di dang ldan pa'i rnam
131a4(rgyud): 'byor gyis//dbye ba dang ni bsad pa ste//dbang po dang ni yul thams cad//mi bskyod pa yi 'jig rten spyod//brtse bas de rnams bsad pa yis//bdag nyid kyis ni grol rgyu can//
131a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor lo'i dbusu ni//mchog gi gtso mo sgom pa yin//smin dbus phyogasu gzugs rnams ni//dkar bu 'am dmar dang mtshon cha rnams//de'i dus nyid du yang dag byung /
131a6(rgyud): sum cu rtsa bdun yig rnamasu//shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid gzugs//mchog go gauN byai shes par bya//oM sa dz+nyA nAn+ta ka mr-i ma t+ya pa bi tA d+hU pA nA trA yA ya ni hU~M hUM hUM hU~M pha phaT
131a7(rgyud): pa pa Ta k+Sha A hA hA oM shoN+Di yai huM hU~M phaT phaT swA hA//sgom bdag nyid can rnal 'byor ches//ji ltar yid 'dod las bya ba ste//dur khrod sel ba'i sdig tsha yis//mau i rus pas
131b1(rgyud): bri zar bya//sman thams cad ni rgyu skar ni//rgyal sogs khams rnams mnyam pas//'khor lo sngon du brjod pa ste//dum bu 'dra gcig sman lnga bcu'o//phan tshun zung gi gsang snga/
131b2(rgyud): s+ya/yi ge'ang mkhas pas dgod par bya//grwa bzhir rnam par snang mdzad de//sgo bzhi rnams ni steng pa'o//lhag ma thog ma'i phreng la ni//dum bzhi rnamasu rim pas grang //hA
131b3(rgyud): gr-i dgod par bya//de la gnyis pa'i du ma bdun la//gr-i ya hoHgr-i b+ha ga p+tA ya//bA na bi Ta rim bzhi ni bri//gsum pa dbus mi'i log su ni//gsum gsum rnams ni sbyin bya ste//
131b4(rgyud): paTad+d+ha hU~M hU~M hrI ni sbyin bya//bzhi par dbus ltos thams cad du//phyog su raM de dor bar dang //g.yas dang g.yon gyi sgo gnyis kyi//dbus su yi ge gaN+DIs gnyis te//bA nr-i d+hA rA sbyin
131b5(rgyud): par d+hi/br-i lnga pa la dgod bya ba//dbu ma'i log su gsum gsum ste//d+hU pa ya hU~M hU~M gr-i su dgod de//'di rnams ji lta'i 'dir rim pas//drug pa'i phreng lnga shes bya ba'o//d+hU.An/
131b6(rgyud): phaT/de bzhin//phaT dzI hU~M pa rIm+bi ji ltar///sngags thams cad ni snron byug/dum du bdun pa rnams la bshad//sgro spangs pa la rim pa yis//spyan
131b7(rgyud): /khrul 'khor chen pa' chen pa'o//dbus kyi dum bu lda rnams dang //de bzhin dun sgo bani ru//bsti'i bya'i ming dang bcug sa la//rkang pa brgyad pa'i sdug sa pa kyi da//
132a1(rgyud): ro langs 'thab par 'gyur ba ni//mkhas pa yis ni zud bya'o//de dag lta bar 'khrul 'khor to//'grub 'gyur 'dri la the tsom med//dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyar/
132a2(rgyud): las//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje mkha' gro de bzhin gra shugs//bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so//'di ni dpal mkha' gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi
132a3(rgyud): rgyal po chen po las chang 'tshong ma'i rab tu sbyor bas dbye ba'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'i 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o//
132a4(rgyud): da nas 'khor lo'i go cha ma'i//ting 'dzin gsal bar bshad bya ste//'khor lo'i gi tshwa'i sbyor bas//lkugs par baNang ba'i sbyor ba pa'o//gser gling gi ni gnas dang ni//de nas
132a5(rgyud): dran byang chub yan lag/srin po'i rnam pa'i 'khrul 'khor te//cho ga gzhan du rab 'jug 'gyur//spyi gtsug mthil gyi sa gzhi la//mkhas pa yis ni bya ba yin//lha dang lha min
132a6(rgyud): 'thab mo cher//mi smrar gyur to de'i 'jog pa//de yi dus su gzugs chen po//'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bltas//yi ge gnyis kyis 'chad pa ni//g.yo ba'i sems ni 'ching ba
132a7(rgyud): ste//gnon pa rnam par shes pa'i chos//gzugs kyi dbus su thim par gyis//rgyud du dam pa'i chos bstan pa//'dir ni phyag rgya gnyis kyis bshad//de bzhin sngon gyi spyod par
132b1(rgyud): stug+sar+b+ha spyod par 'gyu//khams du 'do shAl //da m+b+ha ts+tsha bzlonas pa sos//ma pa 'od kun dran mngan//bdag nyid skyo no gas par byas/rnas
132b2(rgyud): mtha' med na mkha' //shin tun mkha' na mkha' min//gyen du phyin pa'i tsho la wa~M hU~M//ji srid ma yang ba //de skyid rgyun mi 'chad pa'athob//dga' skyes bde ba'i
132b3(rgyud): kyis mi 'bagro//dngos dang dngos med 'dres pa yis//skye ba kun nas byung ba yis//dngos med gzugs bdag nyid ma yin//dengos med thams cad smras skyes pade//lam sa gnas
132b4(rgyud): pa 'khyer 'gyur te//gang der ji ltar de bzhin//ye shes skyugs pa bzhin du gnas//'ching bas rang gi phyag rgya skyes//'di yis lkugs par 'gro ba s+ho//dgra bzhin du ni kun
132b5(rgyud): 'big+sas//rdo rje 'dzin k+Sha cig sa nyid na// blam snying mi dgos//mas cad dag pas rgyung po byed pa gzhan ni srid ma yin//yad bza mi de gang
132b6(rgyud): zug nyid//bdag med reg gyur/sa//rdo rje theg pa de rgya gnas//rlung bzhin bdag med par 'dod do//brjod pa 'dag med 'ad pa yad//rnal 'byor mthong bsdu
132b7(rgyud): mi 'gyur//de las langs pa'i rnal 'byor che/hUM yig gzhan dngos rnams kyis min//gnyis bdag bsku'i cing bskyeb pa ni//dpa' bo spyi gtsug rkang mang //rnams gnyi
133a1(rgyud): su sbyong ba yis/dbus kyi mdang ni sngags //mtshan bya man pas kyang mtshan pa//mtshan par bya dang mnyan byed med//pad+ma sbru yu k+Sha Ta'i skud pan/
133a2(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yis mtha' gnas phyin//mda' dang bA'u ni mi mthong ste//gang du btang zhing 'gro bar bya//de tshe srog kun lkugs par ni//'gyur ba 'di le the tshom mdo//dkyil
133a3(rgyud): 'khor 'khor lo'i sgom pa ste//de yi dbus su 'di dgod pa//'khor lo'i go cha ma lha mo//mdog dang dbyibs ni sngon gyi can//sngags yig rnams las byung ba ni//shes rab
133a4(rgyud): thabs bdag nyid can mchog/oM sa ba rban+ta bIn ka ka la rU pa ya b+ha hUM dz+nyA hUM na pha ka Ta rA pa yaT hUM swA hA oM tsak+kha barmaM Ni ye hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA//zhes bya sngags rab sbyor bdag nyid/
133a5(rgyud): lkugs pa'i rnam shes bsgrub par bya//sngon g+hi 'khrul 'khor byis nas ni//gsang sngags phreng ba 'di dgod bya//zag mo rnam par snang mdzad//gnyis par wAn+da nI rnam phyir/
133a6(rgyud): sbyin//bi yig gsum par sbyin par bya//bzhi par hU~M gi yi ge'o//lnga par d+ha yi ge ste//dum+b+ha bu drug par rA sbyin bya//bdun par gr-i ye yi ge ste//brgyad par ga yI yi ga'o//
133a7(rgyud): dgu pa m+b+ha yig sbyin bya//bcu par d+ha yig slar dgod do//gri yig bcu gcig pa ru te//hUM yig bcu gnyis par dgod bya//bcu gsum pa ru gr-i yig te//bcu bzhi pa la /
133b1(rgyud): yAMgo/bco lnga pa la b+ha yig ste//pa yA gnyis dgad bcu drug pa//bcu bdun pA la su yug ste//pa tsog bco brgyad par dgrod bya//gcig nyung nyi shu ra hA rA sbyin//nyi shu pa la
133b2(rgyud): Ta'i yi ge nyi shu gcig par yi ge hUM//nyi shu gnyis par hUM 'gyu ro//nyi shu gsum par gr-i yig ste//hUM yig nyi shu bzhi par ro//
133b3(rgyud): drug par TA yeg sbyin//nyi shu bdun par pha'i yi ge/hUM yig nye shu brgyad pa ra te//hoHyigra nyi shu rtsa dgu par//sum cu pa la h+Na yig sbyin//su ma cu gcig pa rah+na dgod
133b4(rgyud): bya//hwe yig su mo cu gnyis par spyan//sum cu gsumau 'dir m+bA yaM go/sum cu bzhi par hAM yig ste//de nyid sum nu lnga bar ro//sum cu drug pa ra ya yig sbyin//h+Na yig
133b5(rgyud): sum cu bdun par ste//sum cu brgyad par ba yA gnyis//gcig dman bzhi bcu pa la hUM//bzhi bcu pa la hAM sbyin bya//bzhi bcu gcig par ni b+ho'o//hUM yi ge bzhi bcu
133b6(rgyud): gnyis par skye ne//bzhi bcu rtsa gsum par la au//ya na'i yig gnyis sbyin bya ba//dum bu bzhi bcu bzhi par ro//bzhi bcu lnga par A na te//bzhi bcu drug par phaT de bzhin
133b7(rgyud): bzhi bcu bdun pa la ni oM//bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa la phaT/bzhi bcu dgu par su sbyin//thams cad ji lta'i rim paso//dum bu dbus mar bsgrub bya'i ming //ka ra ka ra sogs
134a1(rgyud): nang bcug/thams cad bsdus nas shes byas nas//lkugs par bcing bar bya ba ni//bye ba steng du 'gro ba'i sgor//'khrul 'khor glang mig bcas par
134a2(rgyud): s+tha//a ba d+hU tI ra ying byas nas//de yi dbusu rab tu gzhug/phyogs thams cad du srin po ni//byas nas 'khrul 'khor sgrub pa'o//dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las
134a3(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje mkha' gro de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so//'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal
134a4(rgyud): bo chen po las 'khor lo'i go cha mI lkugs par bya ba'i rab tu sbyor ba'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid dang 'khor lo sgom pa dang dpa' bo dang gnyisu meng ba'i rnal 'byor srin po'i rnam
134a5(rgyud): pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o////de nas shin tu dpa' mo'i las//zhi bar byed pa bsal bshad bya//rab sbyor de
134a6(rgyud): rnams kyis bya ste//na ga rer ni yang dag bzhugs//btang snyoms byang chub yan lag ste//lha yi 'khor lo rdzu 'phrul che//dpal ba'i gan su lha mo ni//skye 'gro'i bdag
134a7(rgyud): mo bsgom par bya//dbang gnyis yang dag 'dus pa las//rtse chen po ni bde bas gang //bcu gnyis mtha' ru bskyed pa las//'dir ni sa bon g.yo ba med//dbang po la
134b1(rgyud): sogs thams cad ni//'dod chags bral ba nyid 'thob 'gyur//rnal 'byor chen po mnyam pa'i bde//slar yang bde ba'i rang bzhin med//'dod chags zhe sdang mun dri ma//rnam
134b2(rgyud): bral pha rol son bya che//'thob bo dge' ba de yis ni//skyes bu dang ni gnyis med rtse//theg pa gsum pas gzhan med de//de rnams kyi lta bus kun tu//'gro dang nyal dang
134b3(rgyud): za ba na//rnal 'byor sgrub pas spangs pa yin//dga' ro lo rtsed mo rtse ba dang //glu len pa yis gos pa med//de phyir btang snyoms byang yan lag/gnas skabs kun rjes spangs
134b4(rgyud): khaso//de ltar ni don du byas pas//don yod mthong bas 'grub par 'gyur//gang dag gang gi sems can ni//nad pa la sogs la bltas pa//de dang de yi sems can ni//zhi ba'i
134b5(rgyud): las can du 'gyuraro//sangs rgyas nyid kyang myur du na//phra mo'i las ni smos ci dgos//rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs dbusu//shin tu dpa' mo bsgom par bya//lha mo rtag tu mdo/
134b6(rgyud): dkar mo//lhag ma sngon ma lta bu mchog/gsang sngags phreng ba'i rab sbyor bas//shes rab dang ni thabs byung ba'o//gtor mu sbyin bsreg cho ga yis//blo ldan zhi rdzas rnams kyis
134b7(rgyud): ta/zho mar 'o mi zas rnams kyi//'dir ni dgeng blugs dbul b.raro bya//ga bur tsan dan la sogs pas//'khrul 'khor sngon gyi bri bar bya//oM pa mu rat+na kri ba ta lI ya
135a1(rgyud): lan+d+rA ga man+t+ran+ta shan+d+ra dI sha rA nA ya ya d+hA t+ma d+hA d+hA ya pa yA pa hA g+hAr+thad+hA oM su dA re ya d+d+hany+dzaphaT phaT swAt+ma//zhes bya sngags yig sa na te//hUM
135a2(rgyud): ni gnas pa'i rgyu//ye shes sa bon thams cad rnams//sngags pas dpa' ba sogs paro//rnal 'byor pa rnams rtse dus las//bskyed par 'gyur zhing 'gag par 'gyur//du mo du/
135a3(rgyud): bzhi bcu rtsa dgu ru//sngags kyi phreng ba 'di dgod bya//dum dbus phyi rol brgyad rnamasu//phyogs mtshams ji lta'i rim pas yis//rnam par snang mdzad sa bon bzhi//hUM ga yi
135a4(rgyud): ge bzhi rnamaso//de phyi dum bu bcu drug tu//phyogs mtshams rami pa ji bzhin pas//hUM yig brgyad ni dgod bya zhing //de nas grih+Na gr-ih+Na'i tshig/sum+b+ha ni su 'o dum lhag ma//de
135a5(rgyud): yi phyi rol nyi shur bzhirA//m+b+ha gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya//'dir ni bri bar bya ba ste//A naM ya A nA ya ho'i tshig/b+ha ga wan bid+d+ha rA dza dang //phaT yig de nas bre bar bya//dbus/
135a6(rgyud): ma'i dum bum bsgrub bya ni/gnod mdzes sngags kyi nang bcug pa'o//lha'i gzugs kyi khar bri bya//de ltar lha yi 'khrul 'khor ni//ling ga'i gnasu bzhag par bya//kun
135a7(rgyud): tu spyod kun shes par bya//gzhan gyi dus su mi 'grub po//thig le sgra yi du su ni//rlung gi dbyibs ni brtan pa yis//sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi//zhi ba mya
135b1(rgyud): ngas 'gro na//slar yang sa gzhi'i 'jig rten pa'i//zhi ba'i dgos byed smos ci dgos//de byed rnal 'byor dbang phyug ni//lha dang lha min rnams kyis mchod//de yang sangs rgyas
135b2(rgyud): nyid thob na//de zhabs 'brang byed smos ci dgos//'jig rten sangs rgyas sogs chen pos//de ni phyag 'os mchod 'os//bsam gtan sngags kyi bzlas pa dang //sbyin sreg ya ga so//
135b3(rgyud): mchog tu//zhi dang byang chub kyi ni sems//'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med//rtsa ba'i sngags ni bzlas pa yis//las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//rkang pa bzhi bcu
135b4(rgyud): rtsa brgyad pas//kun mkhyen skye ba 'di la'o//dpal he ru ka gnyis med lhan cig pa'i//rdo rje phag mo mthong bar 'gyur//de yis mchag ni ster byed de//rang gi 'khor los
135b5(rgyud): bsgyur thim pa'o//de rnams phyag rgya'i grub byed par//mchog tu rmad du byung bar 'gro/mkha 'gro ma rnams dang gnas pa//gnas dang gnas rnamasu 'thob bo//hA ru kra sngar
135b6(rgyud): khrul 'khor dang //las rnams thams cad mi shes na//dri ni don med yongs ngal te//'gro ba drug tu 'khyal 'gyur zhing //skye ba bye ba brgya brag tu'ang //'jig rten
135b7(rgyud): 'gro kun grol ba min//dpal he ru ka'i go 'phang gnas pa yi//sngags kyi nus pas gral ba'o//brtsa ba chen pos phag mo sogs//rnal 'byor ma bsnyen shes par bya//
136a1(rgyud): gnyis sbyor ba bde ba'i rnam pa ni//bud med skyes pa ma ning min//dngos po tsam du sems can la//de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku bstan//dpa' bo
136a2(rgyud): thams cad mnyam sbyor las//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje mkha' gro de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungaso//'di ni dpal mkha' gro rgya
136a3(rgyud): mtsho rnal 'byor mi'i'o rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las shin tu dba' mo'i zhi ba'i las kyi rab tu sbyor ba'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid kyi 'khrul 'khor 'khor lo bsgom pa dang gnod mdzes
136a4(rgyud): kyi sngags kyi lnga kyi tshogs zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o////de nas lha mos mchod byas nas//'di skad kyi ni tshig dris/thams cad srung ba'i las chen po///
136a5(rgyud): khyab bdag bdag gis mi 'tshalo//phag mo lha rdzas pad can gyi//lha mo nyon cig rab bshad bya//stobs chen ma ya rab sbyor bas//sin d+hU yi ni gnas bsgrubs te/
136a6(rgyud): yang dag lta ba'i rang bzhin du//mchog gi ma mo shes par bya//de ltar de nyid nges par byed//mchog gi bsgom par 'jug par bya//ma mo'i 'khor lo'i grong nyams
136a7(rgyud): dgar//dpa' bo'i gtso bo bsgoms par bya//lhan skyes byang chub rigs pa yis//de'i bdag nyid du gar mtshon cha//sngon du hA ste bgrod pa bzhin//drag shul sbyor ba'i tsha
136b1(rgyud): nyid do//rnal 'byor thams cad yongs dmigs nas//phung po'i rtsa ba las gzhon nan//spyi bo yi ni thod par bzung //un+dan bu gar son pa ste//lto ba yi ni gnas thob nas//byang chub
136b2(rgyud): sa bon rnams kyis 'dzin//mtshan ma yis ni bzung bar ni//khams thams cad kyis gong bar byas//la la n+d+ra yi lam son nas//sngon gyi gan su yang dag rig/me yIs pa nu bi
136b3(rgyud): khams kyis ni//rtsa sbugs thams cad dgang bar bya//'jig rten khams ni thams cad du//skad cig la ni lta zhing mthong //zla ba 'gro ba'i dbus ni//sgor 'phyang ba ni blta bar
136b4(rgyud): bya//sbyor mchog shes byas bsgrub byas la//de yi rang bzhin can bsam bya//mdzod spung son pa'i bu ga ru//rlung gi lce ni gzhug par bya//rnal 'byor rnams kyi sgom rim pas//
136b5(rgyud): yang dag lta bar shes par bya//sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid mchog/shes rab rnal 'byor ma bsgom bya//sngags kyi yi ge las byung ba//shes rab thabs bdag nyid mchog//
136b6(rgyud): oM du ma Sha hA nA ra nAM k+Sha bi ka dA rA la ya nai hUM hUM hU~M hUM pha phu Ta Ta pha pha Ta Ta swA swA hA hA/dzaHhU~M baM hoHoM ma~M hA ba le hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA//zhes bya'i sngags las lha mo che//ye
136b7(rgyud): sku ni yang dge sbyong //gru bi ni zlum po dang tho tso sa pa'i//byang chub 'khrul 'khor rta bri ste//dum bu bzhi bcu rtsa dgu le/gsang sngagaso bzhi po yang dag pa//dum bu/
137a1(rgyud): bri bar bya//dum bu lnga ru sgrub po ste//g+ha g+hA la sogs nA/bcug pa//byang chub sems dpa'i phyag tu ni//gi wang 'am ni yang na ni//gi wa~M zhes pos bri bya ba/
137a2(rgyud): gro gang 'khrul 'khor thams cad ni//las kyi khyed par gyis bri ste//yul ngo chen po'i ras la ni//las thams cad po bya ba yin//dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las//rdo rje
137a3(rgyud): sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje mkha' gro de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so//'di ni dpal mkha' gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po
137a4(rgyud): las stobs chen ma'i sbyor bas srung ba chen po phur bu'i sngags kyi las byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul 'khor sgom pa'i man ngag gi cho ga'i mtshan nyid ces bya ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa
137a5(rgyud): bdun pa'o///de nas las mchog thams cad ni//sems can kun lu 'byung ba shad bya//'khor los bsgyur ma'i rab sbyor bar//ma ruH gan su bsgrub par bya//
137a6(rgyud): yang dag rtog pa byang chub kyi//phyogasu gnas bzhin par bya'o//rgyas pa bsgrub bya phyi nas ni//mkhasde pas las ni bye ba ni yin//gtum mo lte bar sbyar ba yis//tshigs thaMng
137a7(rgyud): ni sreg pa ste//mig la sogs pa bsregs nas ni//bsregs rkan las thig l-i 'dzag/'gro bo de ni mtshams kun tu//pad snal skud pa'i gri ba'o//'bibs shing 'gro bas/
137b1(rgyud): ro myang ba//stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis la'o//'thob dang rmugs pa'i ye shes ni//'gro ba med dang 'ong bar 'gyur//phyag rgya 'di yi rnal 'byor pa//lo yi sbyor bas de 'grub 'gyur//
137b2(rgyud): de dang 'di yis yang dag ldan//las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur//dga' ba 'jig rten thams cad du//zhes bya 'gro 'gyur de'i bdag nyid//rnam par rtog pa de khyer te//gom
137b3(rgyud): pa gcig ni 'gro mi 'gyur//tshigs kun ngo bor gyur nas ni//bdag gi gdan ni de mthong 'gyur//'chi bas mi 'jigs 'di yi phyir//gzhan gyi gdan du yang dag granas//gang grang
137b4(rgyud): las la bltas rnams kyis//de de thams cad du byed//char pa'i dus las shes byas pa//de ni rnal 'byor gdan du 'dod//kun mkhyen thams cad las can ni//gang phyir gsang ba'i
137b5(rgyud): gdan mchog yin//yang dag rtog pa'i sbyor bdag nyid//byang chub phyogasasu 'gro bar 'gyur//ba lang rta dang mi dang khyi//glang po ma he bong bu dang //rnga mo byi chung byi la dang //phag pa dang ni
137b6(rgyud): spre'u rnams kyi//sha nI sbyar po la btag sngo pa//dngos grub 'dod pas sbyin bsreg bya//rang bzhin dngos grub 'thob 'gyur na//dngos grub brgyad po sla ra tsis min//ral gri mig
137b7(rgyud): smon rkang byug dang //ril bu dngul chu mchil lam dang /bcud len dong ni se 'og dang //dgug pa yang ni 'grub pa'o//ro langs bslang ba'i dngos grub pa ni//khyim nag mo yi'o
138a1(rgyud): ma dang //mkha nag po'i thug pa yis//yi dgas bcu bzhi'i mtshan mo 'am//sngags pas chos brgyad la ro yi//kha ru sbyin bsreg bya de bzhin//dur khrod kyi niH
138a2(rgyud): yungs kar ram//mar khu 'bad pas bzung nas ni//des kyang dpa' bos byug bya ste//de'i tshe nub mor rnam par brjod//yo dgas chen po de langs na sa//dbang chen mthil la phye mar
138a3(rgyud): byed//de rtag 'jigs par mi bya ste//rang rkyen sbyor bas bskyed pa yin//til lam til mar gzhan yang ni//gang rung ci ru bzung byas nas//rnal 'byor rnams kyi sems can sgyur
138a4(rgyud): byin pas thams cad du 'gro'o//sgrol ma btsun do 'od zer tsan//khro gnyer ri khrod lo ma dang //gshin mthar bcas sogs khro bo che//sgom dang sngags kyi bzlas pA ni//'bu ma
138a5(rgyud): phrag gcig gis sdig 'joms te//bya bas mdzul ba 'thob par byed//dngos grub ci 'dra ba 'dod pa//stsal nas rgyun tu zhugs pa yin//yang na snyen ngag rig pa yin//lung gi/
138a6(rgyud): don ni 'chad pa'o//kun shes gang thams cad kyi skad//ma mthong ba rnams shes par 'gyur//char bcad rjes bzung thams cad ni//chos bya chos can thams cad byed//sgrom
138a7(rgyud): sogs rnal 'byor ma mchog rnams//rang bdag gzugs gzhan shes bya nyid//'di rnams kun bsdus gzugs nyid pas//'khor los bsgyur ma sgom par gyis//sna tshogs
138b1(rgyud): pa yi gzugs 'dzin da//de rnams kyis ni 'a khor bsgyur ma'o//au tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA//oM nun+ne swA hA//oM mA rA ts+tshe prA hA//oM b+h+r-i kuk+Shai swA h+ma//oM bar+N+Na sha ba re rI s+yAh+ma//
138b2(rgyud): ltar kun gyi 'khrul 'khor kyang //sngags kyi yi ge rnams kyis bya//ba'i skyed pa dang gnas pa yi rgyur//ji ltar rig pas bsgrub par bya//'od zer phreng bsra kun 'khrigs pa//
138b3(rgyud): snying kha'i 'khor lor bzung bar bya//'di yis 'chi ba'i 'jigs 'joms te//rgas dang 'chi ba med 'thob byed//'khor los bsgyur ma'i lha mo ni//shes rab thabs kyi bdag
138b4(rgyud): nyi mchog/mdog dang dbyibs ni rang gi ste//sngags yig rnams las yang dag byung //oM kro d+ha d+harmo s+phA dA rA ye swA ka ra rA NA ya mr-i tsuM hUM hUM hU~M phA phaT Ta pa phAT Ta swA swA hA hA/
138b5(rgyud): oM tsakra par+t+ti nI ye huM phaT phaT swA hA//de ltar sngags las yang dag byung //mkha 'gro ma yis 'khor laMs bsgyur//lha min 'khrul 'khor bri bya ste//gcig dman lnga bcu
138b6(rgyud): dum bu la//ji ltar lha rnams kyi ni sdigasa?//bsrub bya'i ming nang bcug pa yi//phrag mo yi ni snying po yang //dum bu so so la bri'o//phyi rol du ni sngags kun gyis//'dir
138b7(rgyud): ni rtag tu bskor bar bya//g.yul ngo yi ni ris la no//rdzas kun gyis ni yongs bris nas//'khrul 'khor las ni thams cad la//lha ma yin gyi khar sbyin bya//lo yi
139a1(rgyud): nyon zhag sbyor ba can//thun mtshams sa sar bsgom par rmA/bshin+da dbu'o 'khrul ga thA t+yA s+ho//dum bu bcu 'dun pa la ni//phyi rol bcu drug
139a2(rgyud): byA ba//d+hIHSh+T+rIH'i sngags 'di dag par bya//ye ma med k+She ra dzA sa do//ru Na yo nai rU man+d+ha ni//de sbyar sngags chen thos nas nI//lAswA thams cad ni sgrub par bya//yo /
139a3(rgyud): ro'i gtso bo yis//las rnams kyang ni bcu bdun// bsgrub bya'i ming ni nang bcug nas//gshin rje'i snying po'i sngags rnams ni//lugs bzlog/
139a4(rgyud): yi ge phyi rol tu//mkhas pa rnams kyis bri bar bya//'jigs dang rgyal po'i rigs dang ni//dgra thams cad ni rnam par 'joms//gzhan yang rdza rnga ba cing ba yi//khyab bdagar
139a5(rgyud): gis sngogs bcu ga/sku gzhi cha mnyam nyams dga' bar//tsan dan la sogs byug pa ru//sgrub pa po yis yang bya ste//ri mo dgu pa legs zlum por//gcig dman lnga bcwa
139a6(rgyud): dum bu le//gcig gnyis gsum drang bzhi yi khar//lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yis//sngags kyi yi ge rnams bya zhig bya//gnod mdzes rgyal po yi ni sngags/
139a7(rgyud): sngags pas de nas yang dag tu//de ni tshigs kun tu shes bya//rgyud gzhan du ni ma bshad//de yi yi ge rtsa rnams//re re yi ni tshigs mtshams ni//gcig dman lnga bcu yin
139b1(rgyud): mtshams//nA khA'i dus mi yi tshogs can no//gang gang tshe su yongs bshad pa//mnyam par bzhag pa sA de de'i tshigs//gang du yi ge gcig blangs nas//der ni yi ge thams
139b2(rgyud): cad de//rtsis kyi rims rnams kyis btu bar//bde mchog 'bum par bsrungs pa yin//phyi dang nang bdag nyid 'khrul 'khor//rnal 'byor rnams kyi kun bsgrub pa'o//gra sa sngags
139b3(rgyud): bde bas bsgrub par bya//khyad par du yang 'khrul 'khor ro//de yis dngos grub thob 'gyur bar//'dir ni som nyi srid ma yin//rten dang rten pa'i gzugs can te//ji lta'i rim
139b4(rgyud): bar ming dang gnas//gnas ni rten gyi gzugasu te//rten pa'i ming ni rnal 'byor ma//'di dag mnyam par snyoms 'jug pa//las thams cad mngon par brjod//de yis rnal 'byor
139b5(rgyud): rgyud ni//brten pa thabs kyi spyod yulo//gang phyir sa gzhi rten yin pas//de phyir thabs ni rnal 'byor ma//yang na thams cad thabs yin la//yang na thams cad shes rab
139b6(rgyud): bo//shes rab thabs bral de rnams kyis//sangs rgyas sku ni mya ngan 'das//theg pa mchog 'di'i shes rab dang //bral bas thams cad srid par 'gro/srid dang mya ngan
139b7(rgyud): 'das gang chos//de rnams spangs pas chos mdo//dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje mkha' gro de bzhin gshegs//bcom
140a1(rgyud): ldan bdag pos 'di gsungaso//'di ni dpal mkha' gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las 'khor khos bsgyur ma'i rab tu sbyor ba la sogs
140a2(rgyud): pa las sna tshogs sgrub pa'i 'khrul 'khor 'khor lo'i sgom pa'i lam dang /rdza rnga'i sngags mdor bstan pa'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o///
140a3(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang mchog gtso bo//'khor los bsgyur sogs rgyas pa ni//phan pa thams cad ster ba'i las//mdor bsdus pa yis bshad par bya//brtson chen mo yi rab sbyor
140a4(rgyud): bas//ku lu t+tAr ni yongasu bzhugs//byang chub phyogs ni yang dag ngag/'khrul 'khor mi yi gzugs cano//'phyang ba la ni yongs brten nas//bsam med byang chub 'thob par byed
140a5(rgyud): de ni las kun gtso bo ste//rang byung phyag rgya chen po'o//khams rnams thams cad yang dag byung //de ni 'phyang bar mngon par rjod//dpa' bo nyi shu bzhi rnams la//re re la ni rnam pa
140a6(rgyud): brgyad//khams thams cad la'ang shes bya ba//mig dang bu ga zla ba'o//dpa' bo thams cad so so yi//re re'i ming du'ang brjod par 'gyur//dkyil 'khor sum cu rtsa bdun du/
140a7(rgyud): dpa' bo re re bsgom par bya//khams brgyad po ni thams cad du//rnam pa gsum du'ang mtshon par bya//thod pa'i dum bu la sogs kyi//rab sbyor ming mdor bstan pas te//phag/
140b1(rgyud): ma sogasu yongs gnas pa'i//brtson chen ma'i rlung shes pAr bya//dal gyis khams la bsnun pa yis//gnyid ldog pa las sad par bya/dpa' bo'i rol gri gang 'dra bas//stobs//
140b2(rgyud): po che la 'bigs par 'gyur//de 'dra'i 'phyang ba'i ral gri ni//khams thams cad la 'bigs par 'gyur//hA yi mdor bstan shes byas nas//tshigs mtshams kun tu gnas
140b3(rgyud): par gyis//de las bskyed pa'i dpa' bo rnams//bye ba 'bum tsho stong phrag ge/byang chub sa bon rang bzhin can//rnal 'byor ma ni de'i rigs grags//khams thams cad du rgyas
140b4(rgyud): 'debs pa//nges 'byung dus su yang dag byung //phyang bzhin par ni de shes bya//rang gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs//rigs ni khams rnams thams cad de//rnal 'byor ma ni
140b5(rgyud): rigs can yin//gnyis po yang dag sbyor ba ru//'phyang ba lto bar rab zhugs bya//khams thams cad kyi re'i bar du//de ni chad pa nyid du 'gyur//bcud kyiso len ni
140b6(rgyud): bsgrubs pa yis//skye bo kun la rgyas po yin//de rnams kun tu gnas pa med//mkha' spyod nyid du nye bar 'gro/sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams ni//dbusu zag pa med
140b7(rgyud): pa bzhugs//de ltar yon tan gter thams cad//yang dag ngag gi go 'phang gnas//brjod min pa yi sngags chen po//bsnam zhing skye bo kun la sgrogs//gzhom du
141a1(rgyud): myod par de shes bya//su ni rnga rje dzin ma dang //khams rnams kyi dngom ma lus pa//maung gis dpa' bor yang dag kun swA/ du m+b+ha drum
141a2(rgyud): ni khams//rang nyings sor bshad par bya//senA mi deng ni sa 'bab pa//re ro'i brgyad du bye ba cano//sal sogs pa'i khams pashi dang //de bzhin dngas po bzhi dge
141a3(rgyud): de ltar gnas ni gsum gsum du//dpa' bo thams cad sbyar / byA/b+hU dang ba sdu 'babru pa dang //lpags pa dang ni gri ma 'bab//sha dang sha red 'bab pa dang //rmu rgyu
141a4(rgyud): dang ni rtsa bab dang //rus pa dang ni lpa gas 'bab dang //mkhal ma~M dang ni stobs 'bab dang //snying dang dra ba 'grub pa dang //mig dang chu ser 'bab pa dang //mkhrim pa da
141a5(rgyud): rlung 'bab dang //gro ba dang ni rtswa 'bab dang //dang 'bre pA yi ni dngos pa ni//gnye ma dang ni mchin pa 'breg/lto ba dang ni dbugs 'bab dang //bshang dang gci ba 'bab pa dpe
141a6(rgyud): mtshams kyis mtha' dang dri ma 'bag/rgyu shun dang ni mchil ma 'bab//garnag dang chu ser 'babs pa dang //khrag dang me tog 'bab pa dang//rdul dang rlangs pa 'bab
141a7(rgyud): dang //tshil dang lto tshil 'bab pu dang //mtshe ma dang ni khu ba 'bab//lud pa dang ni rims med 'bab//snabs dang rkang mar 'beb pa ste//dpa' rnams khams kyi mtshan nyid//
141b1(rgyud): de ltar dum bu dum bu nyid//khams ni gra sran du 'jug par 'gyur//re rI yi yang rang bzhin kyang //zad pa'i rlung gis thod pa can//bde ba kun gyi nang thim par//keng rus chen po/
141b2(rgyud): 'gro ba yin//sems dang bsam pa de yi phyir//keng ru si kun tu stong pa nyid//mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa yi sa//thams cad gnyis med lhan skyes gsal//lha yi dgra ni chen
141b3(rgyud): po'i gzugs//rnam shes lha dang lhan cig/'od dpag med dang tshig med pa//rdo rje'i 'od zer rang bzhin can//rdo rje rang bzhin gyi ni sku//rdo rje'i sku ni drir shes bya//myu gu can ni dngos
141b4(rgyud): po can//mthong ba tsam gyis dga' byed pa'o//bems por 'ching bar ni//rdo rje ral pa can 'gro'o//sa gsum zas ni mchog tu ni//dpa' bo chen po'i bgrod par byas//mkha 'gro ma
141b5(rgyud): dang bcas sdod pa d+mo//rdo rje hUM mdzad 'gro ba'o//shin tu bzang po thob med pa//'jig rten 'jig rten spangs pa'o//skye 'gro kun tu rang byung ba//rdo rje bzang po de glags pa'o//'jig byed
141b6(rgyud): chen po'i glo 'phang gris//lus kyi bag chags thal bas bsgos//mig mi bzang gis ma ltas kyang //thams cad mtshan nyid mthong bar 'gyur//stobs po che ni sngags thams cad//
141b7(rgyud): pa gsum gyi bdag nyid do//rin chen rdo rje sgra gcad che//zag med khams ni thams cad du'o//rta mgrin sa gzhi chen po la//srog son kun la sbyar bar bya//srog kud dgang ba bya ba
142a1(rgyud): s+ho//de yis namakha' stong par bshad//dpa he ru/rgyug tu sbyang //sku \u0f7fna yin+ti ba nan can//pad+ma gang dbang phyug pa gzugs//gzugs med nal 'byung
142a2(rgyud): du 'gro ba'o//bde ba chen pos snang byed pas//rnam snang mdzad du mngon par brjod//rdo rje sems dpa' da sgyings byas pa//mchog tu bde bar brjod pa yin//dpa' bo thams cad mnyam
142a3(rgyud): sbyar ba//khams thams cad kyi nang du'o//skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu//ro myang mtshan nyid shes par bya//khams 'di rnams ni thams cad kyi//zas nyid mchog tu ngo mtshar che//rang
142a4(rgyud): bzhin khams kyi rnam grangs ni//dus tshad dang ni klu dang mda'//de rnams rnal 'byor mar yongs grags//brgyud ma'i rim pa las 'ongs pa'o//khams kyang rnam par dpyad bzhin pas//thaMd
142a5(rgyud): bdag nyid kyis 'byung min//rnam shes ma yin ye shes min//thams cad stong po'o yod ma yin//gser 'gyur rtsi ni ma rig pas//mchog tu bde ba rig pa min//rang gis dgos pa
142a6(rgyud): byed pa ni//spar sha'i rigs lha'i mtshan nyid do//brtson 'grus chen por mngon brjod pa'i//de phyir rnal 'byor ma bsgom bya//khams thams cad du rgyas 'debs pa//rnal 'byor gdan
142a7(rgyud): du yang dag byung //gang zhig kun nas kun tu ni//de ni de bzhin gshegs par mthong //mkha' 'gro dang ni sdom rgyud dang //nges par brjod pa phyi ma dang //kun spyod 'byung ba'i rgyud rnamasu
142b1(rgyud): dngos po las ni rab tu bstan//de yis rgyu ni chen po 'di//rngub pa skyes du mchog gi gsungs//dum bu dum bur yongs gnas pa'o//las chen po ni der drang bya//phra mo'i bya ba myangon brjid//
142b2(rgyud): pa//khams rnams kyi ni gnas la'o//ji lha'i rim pas khamaso blang ste//yongs bsdus spyod yul bar du'o//tshigs bcad thog ma sogs pas kyang //ji srad rdzogs pa'i spyod yul
142b3(rgyud): du//rgyud 'di rnal 'byor gtso bo ste//las rnams rgya che ba mi no//yang na rnal 'byor thamaso cad ni//las kyi tshog su 'dod par bya//bdag gi de nyid rtag tu las//byas pa 'am gal te/
142b4(rgyud): ma byas pa'o//rnal 'byor rnams kyi sbyong mtshan nyid//rang bzhin la su yang dag bshad//de ltar rgyud rnams thams cad du//sngags pas mchog tu shes par bya//yang na gang dang
142b5(rgyud): 'dra'i rnal 'byor//de dang 'dra bar khams gnas te//bcud kyis len gyi rdzas rnams ni//sman chen nyi shu rtsa bzhi por//sbyar byas dpa' bo nyid rnams kyis//grol bar bgrod pa gsung
142b6(rgyud): pa yin//gsang ba mchog tu dgyes pa na//thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs//bcu drug de rnams rdzas chen te//brgyad gnyis tshigs bcad phyed kyis//sgra dang gzugasu
142b7(rgyud): yang dag byung //'jig rten gsum du rnyed pa dka'//srub dang srung ba'i kun sbyor ba'i//dbus ma bla na med pa'i dbugs//ril bu rtag tu mchod bya ste//pho nya lhan cig skyes
143a1(rgyud): bdag nyid//yid ni nang du son pa yAs//rang khu sangs rgyas thig le can//sbrang TI khrakra dang ga zur banas//tshogs kyi dbus rab tu zhugs//mI
143a2(rgyud): med mthe bong dag gi khar//zla ba'i btung ba myang bar gyis//bdud rtsi lngar gyur 'di rnams kyis//mchod pa bzhi ni de bzhin bya//lha dang mi rnams bde ba bsdu//bcu drug cha shas rin/
143a3(rgyud): che'o//de ltar tshogs bcad 'di kun gyis//khams lnga rab tu bshad par 'gyur//ra yi yi ges khrag gi khams//hA yi ga rI skye su 'dod do//s+ya yig dri yi lo ma ste//pa yig
143a4(rgyud): lpags pa ru ni 'dod//ra yig g+han d+ha kar rab bshad//me yig me tog tu dran bya//ra yig rA pi Na de bzhin//slar yang me yi yi ge sha/sa yig kun tu du las skyes//rba yig
143a5(rgyud): ge rtsar 'dod do//d+ba'i yi ge sdug skyes bshad//ni yig dri yi mar khu'o//sa yi yi ge so yi rdul//dA yi yi ge rgya mtsho skyes//s+thi yig bapa mo de bzhin du//ta yig snying
143a6(rgyud): po'i ga bu ro//sgra dang gzugasu yongs byung ba//khrag khu nor nu'i bar dag tu'o//'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba//rang rig pad+mar son pa'o//srub dang bsrub pa'i sbyor rnams kyis/
143a7(rgyud): rang 'byung gis ni rnam bsres pa'o//dbus ma'i mchog gi dbugs kyang ni//skad cig dbu mar bzung ba'o//ril bu rtag tu mchod pa ni//bdud rtsi gsang ba'i chu yin no//phonya
143b1(rgyud): lhan skyes bdag nyid ni//dbang gnyis sbyor las rtsa ba'o//yid ni nang du song ba ni//khams rnams kyang ni zhu ba'o//rang khu thig las sangs rgyas rnams//zhu gang sbyor ba las byung
143b2(rgyud): ba'o//sbrang rtsi khrag dang ga bur bcas//bcu drug 'dod ma las byung ba'o//tshogs dbus rab tu zhugs rnams kyis//'di kun lhan skyes la sbyar ba'o//ming med mtho bos khar
143b3(rgyud): bzhug pa//snyoms par 'jug las khrag byung ba'o//zhi ba'i btung ba myang ba ni//'pho ba'i dus las ma lus gang //'di rnams bdud rtsi lngar 'gyur ba//'phos las byung ba'i
143b4(rgyud): mi'i mar khu//mchod bzhi de bzhin bya ba ni//bzhi mnyam ga bur bcas pa'o//lha dang mi rnams bde ba ni//dga' ba kun las byung ba'o//bcu drug cha shas rin che ba//thams cad/
143b5(rgyud): bde ba'i rang bzhin can//de ltar dpa' bo thams cad ni//khams kyi rdzas rnamasu sbyar bya//bcud len de las byung ba ste//gtso bo ye shes me rlung gis//mdzad pa dang ni bsad byas

143b7(rgyud): bcing ba byas pa yis//khams thams cad du bzag par bya//bsad pa dngos po gzhom pa ste//rgyas pa 'jig rten khams rnams//sbyin sreg cho ga der shes nas//'khor lo
144a1(rgyud): bsgyur nyid 'thob par gyis//thab tu bdud rtsi bzlog bya ste//'jam po'i rdo rje mngon sum du//rnal 'byor ldan pas mthong bar 'gyur//sa thams cad su

144b1(rgyud): sog su sngags pas bri//phyi dang gsang bar mtshon par bya//de lta'i 'khrul 'khor rab sbyar bas//sa gsum po lA bsgom par bya//dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las//rdo rje

146a1(rgyud): dad+h+ya la sogs sbyor shes pas//'di ni sbyor ba phyi mo la'o//nyi ma byang du bzod pa yi//rgyal gyi zla ba sogs brtsams nas//zla ba bcu gnyis de ltar du//

148b7(rgyud): mo'i chu tshad du ni brtag/bcu la gnyis kyis bsgyur dong brgyad//nyi ma rnams kyi chu tshod bzhin//bcu la gsum bsgyur gnyis gcig pu//mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni
149a1(rgyud): brtags//mnyam dus dbus su gnyis sbyar nas//sum cu gcig pur rab tu brtags sum cu rnam pa gnyis rnams kyis//nyin re dag gi chu tshod 'byed/bcu//
149a2(rgyud): po rnam gsum gnyis gcig pu//nyon mo rnams kyi nyi ma ro brtags//bcu po gnyis rnams dang ni brkyang//mtshan ma yi ni eng ka bya//bcu po rnam gsum ang kA l-i//ni
149a3(rgyud): dang yang dag ldan pa'o//bcu la gnyis kyis bsgyur dang drug/mtshan mo'i chu tshod ang ka bya//bcu lo gsum gyis bsgyur dang drug/nyin dag ye shes can gyi'ang nyin//bcu
149a4(rgyud): la gnyis kyis basbyar dang bzhi//rdul can rnams kyi chu tshod grags//lho ru bgrod par rab bau shad de//nam zla'i dus kyi sa shes par 'gyur//bcu la gsum gyis bsgyur
149a5(rgyud): dang bzhi//nyin phye dri chu tshod yongasu bshwa de//bcu la gnyis kyis bsgyur dang drug/mtshan mo'i de bzhin mchin par bya//bcu la gsum basbyar gnyis gcig pu/nyin
149a6(rgyud): rnams chu tshod de bzhin no//bcu la gnyis kyis bsgyur dang drug/mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni grags//bcu la gsum bsgyur bas mtshon pa//mnyam sogs chu tshod de
149a7(rgyud): bzhin to//bcu la gsum bsgyur mtshan rnams kyi//bi shu'i dbus su gnyis de bzhin//bcu la gnyis kyis bsgyur dang brgyad//nyan rnams kyi ni nyin mor sems///
149b1(rgyud): bcu po gsum 'byur gnyis gcig pu//rdul can chu tshad du brtag so//bcu po gnyis 'gyur dang ni drug/nyin rnams chu tshod rim pas so//bcu po sum 'gyur dang ni bzhi/rdul
149b2(rgyud): can chu tshod rnams de bzhin//sum brgyad de bzhin drug cu ni//chu tshod rnams kyi dbugs bsgreng ngo //chu tshod grangs ni drug cu ni//zhag gcig tu ni rnam par badz+rod//zla rnams rim pa
149b3(rgyud): ji lta bas//de bzhin rims rnams kyis mtshan no//chu tshod dbugs sogs yongasu rdzogs pa//rim pas 'phel dang 'chad pa ste//las dang las min khyad par gyis//
149b4(rgyud): dbugs ni rim pas yongasu bzung //de ltar na mkha' mkha' de bzhin//zla mig chu tshod de bzhin du//lo gcig gir ni shes par bya//zhag rnams chu tshod mtshon pas so//
149b5(rgyud): da ltar byas pas rnal 'byor pa//dus kyi 'chi ba slu bar 'gyur//lte ba'i dbus su pad+ma che//ji ltar rdo rje phag mo'o//mtshams kun son pa'i pad+ma la//ba mo dang 'dra 'dzag par
149b6(rgyud): bya//lci ba'i dbus mtho' bcu gnyisu//'gro ba 'ong ba byed pa nyid//srog gi thig le de bgrod pa'ang //mtshams kun du ni 'bab pa can//blo ldan lo gcig sbyor ba yis//
149b7(rgyud): de nyid du ni them par bya//til mer mo ni 'bar be yi//gzugs can kha ni 'og tu bltas//chu shing me tog dang 'dra ba//mkhas pa yis ni 'phyang bzhin pa'o//lte bar A
150a1(rgyud): yi rnam pa'i gzugs//thung dang ring po 'bar ma'i bdag/phyag rgya lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs//dbyangs dang be mo gnyis med gnas//sgom dang sgrub
150a2(rgyud): pa mo bshad pa//rtul po bar ma rnon po dang //lhag par rno dang shin lhag no//thams cad de rnam su brtagasogang phyir rango bdag nyid kyis sgrub//de phyir gzhan gyis kyang
150a3(rgyud): bsgrub bya//nus mthu 'jig rten 'di nyid la//skye bo kun la yid ches byed//phyi nas gdul byar 'gro ba min//rong gzhin don gyis sems brnyan pas//dbyangs bcu
150a4(rgyud): gnyis ni thob byas nas//dge dang mi dge bshod par bya//'khor lo bcu gnyis rnamasu no//dbyings kyi bdag po mtshon par bya//a yig gis ni ye shos dang //
150a5(rgyud): mkhas pa chos don thams cad 'thob//A yi yig gos 'chi dra ba dang //rgas dang 'chi bar rnam nges bshad//sred pa'i 'jigs pa ma lus pa//mthong 'gyur lam
150a6(rgyud): las nyams par 'gyur//i yi yi ge yongs thob pas//sa yi dbang phyug du ni 'gro/I yi yi ge yang dag 'thob//myur ba nyid du 'chi bar 'gyur//u yi yi ge thab
150a7(rgyud): pa yis//skye ba dran par 'gyur 'gro ba'o//U yi yi ge gal te 'thob//yul la zhen pa can du 'gro//e yi yi ge yang ngag 'thab//byang chub sems dpa' nyid du
150b1(rgyud): /'gro/ai ye yi ge sems rmongs zhing //'gro ba drug sogs 'jigs par 'gyur//o yig pha rol phyin pa yi//der ni sa 'tho ba rnam nges ston//o yig ang ka thob pa yis//
150b2(rgyud): dam tshig nyams par 'gro ba yin//aM yi ge byang chub sems dpa' rnams//mthong bas skad cig la dgrol 'gyur//aH yig yang dag thob pa yis//phung po khams la
150b3(rgyud): tshom za//de la sogs pa ma lus pa//ma gsungs kyang ni bsgrub par bya//bla ma bstan bcos dang nyid de//rnam gsum chos kyis yid ches bya//zhes bya ba ni thong ba'i dum bu
150b4(rgyud): can gyi rnal 'byor gyi mtshan nyid kyi sgrub pa'i thabs dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs kyi ming can te thog ma'i tshig go/rab tu byed pa dang po'o//
150b5(rgyud): de nas keng rus chen po yi//mtshan nyid bdag gis bshad bya ste//bo pa dri'i rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis//yid kyi shugs ni 'jug medo bya//khams mnyam pa yi ri bo ni//
150b6(rgyud): skye bo'i gnasu bsgoms pa nyid//pad snal skud pa kha 'og bltas//glog ni kun tu 'gro ba mo/de yi dbus suR+sha pa'i mi tshwa//bong bu'i dbyibs can bsgom par bya//dkyil
150b7(rgyud): 'khor thams cad yang dag tshogs//mchod pa chen po bsam par bya//de yi dbus su dpa' chen po//rkang rus chen po'i sbyor bas so//skud pa rnams kyis lte
151a1(rgyud): dasas//rgyu da sa dug rnyed//pa klarnam pa yin gzugs//m-ig las spyad pa gtsug sa//me yang rnam pa na sems kyis na
151a2(rgyud): pa dadus su dal pas bya//bram po'i bdu rgyun rloms kyis//'a du'i dbus su 'ang 'i rig par 'gyur//thi ma dang longs spyod sogs dngos pos//sems kyi bgra ba
151a3(rgyud): bstan par bya//phung dor bong bu'i rnal 'byir gyis//skye ba bdun yang mthong bar 'gyur//ma las byung ba da byibs gsum dang //mi las byung ba gsum de bzhin/zla mis
151a4(rgyud): rnams cad dong bdun po de//rnal 'byor sgom pas mthong bar 'gyur//bde ba'i rang bzhin khams kun gyis//keng rus chen po yang dag //ldu ma la sogs bsgoms pa
151a5(rgyud): mes//de la gnas pa'i gzugs mthong 'gyur//bod du'i rnam de'i rnal 'byung du//khrag gi zham can rtse gsum du//tshe son pa yang nas par shes//rdo ring ba yang mthong ba
151a6(rgyud): 'gyur//snga ma blang ba che sogs pa//da pe'i rang bdag nyid kyis de mthong //chen po'i rtsa rnams thams cad du//de rus srog ni dus 'gro bya//de bskyang bong bur shes bya ste/
151a7(rgyud): tshogs ring bzhin de mthong 'gyur//si lu la sogs bzar ba'i dngas//de dang 'dra ba dngas pa kun//mthang stod na yod pa min//khams thams cad kyang 'dzu rje
151b1(rgyud): ngaltar skyes bur dus rnams kyis//rlung chen khams kyi sa shes par bya//de bzhin stong dus rje rnams sa//sa la la sogs khams rnon gyis//rang bzhin 'jig rten pa dmigs pas/
151b2(rgyud): rang bdag nyid kyi gzugs de mthong //rnam pa sna tshogs rigs de rnams//rnal 'byor 'dzin rnams kyis shes bya//ma rig sogs nyon so la//de rnams kyis ni nang du grags//rams
151b3(rgyud): la sogs pa'i nad tsam gyis//nad chen rnam par mtshon par bya//de la ma re ga nyi mo'i nad//legs pa rnams kyis de bsrung bya//'pho ba bco lnga pa la ni//'chi 'am la sa ni dge mi dag/
151b4(rgyud): ye shes me yi bdag nyid ches//nub lnga rnams ni grol bar 'gyur//rga shi yi ni dus su ni//'pho ba gsum na 'chi ba ste//yang na dge dang mi dge ba'i//las kyi bag chags mthong ba
151b5(rgyud): 'gyur//rang rig bde ba bzung ba yis//nub bdun na ni grol bar 'gyur//skye bo'i nyi ma'i 'chi ba ni//'pho ba gsum pa na yang ste//las ni dge mi dger 'gro ba//nub bdun na
151b6(rgyud): ni grol bar 'gyur//srid pa yi ni 'phro gsuman//'chi ba 'gyuraro mtshan ma no//ldan de rnams grol bar 'gyur//yang na de ni mi grol te//'das pa bzhi pa'i dus rnams su//
151b7(rgyud): bde ba de kun rtogs par gyis//de lta'i rigs 'gyur de rnamasu//dze d+ha'i rim pas shes par bya//len po'i 'chi ba'i 'dzing ni//gsum pa dang ni bzhi pa na'o//gal te
152a1(rgyud): las ni dag mi dgyes//mtshan mo bcu na grol bar 'gyur//bsod nams phun sum tshogs kun dang //blo dang ldan pas 'pho med sgrub//sred pa'i 'pho
152a2(rgyud): gsum na 'chi//las ni dge dang mi dge ste//nor bu'i nang son la blta bya//mtshan mo bdun na nges grol te//nga yi ngag la the tshom med//tshor ba'i 'pho ba ldan na ni//'chi
152a3(rgyud): 'gyur las kyang ngo de bzhin//dgu dang bcu dag na grol te//rdo rje padad+ma dbus son pas so//reg pa'i nyin mo'i 'pho ba ni//brgyad na 'chi bar shes par bya//de ltar las dge mi
152a4(rgyud): dge sred//yan lag drug gis thim par bya//gcig dman nyi shu'i nyi ma na/grol ba 'am yang na mi grol lo//skye mched drug gi 'chi ba ni//las dog mi dgos blta bya ste//
152a5(rgyud): 'pho ba brgyad na shes par bya//khams kyi nad rnams de ma thob 'gyur//nub bcu na ni grol 'gyur ti//'khor lo bzhi ru thim par bya//ming dang gzugs la 'chi bo'i las
152a6(rgyud): gsum pa 'am ni lnga pa yi//'pho ba dag ni shes par bya//mtshan mo brgyad na 'gro ba'o//sems ni thig le'i gnas son par//rten par gyur pa'i cho ga bya//rnam par shes
152a7(rgyud): pa'i 'chi ba'i las//slar yang brgyad dang bcu pa yi//'pho bar sa la shes par bya//yang na de nyid la 'grol te//bcu drug byed phyed kyi gzugs can//ye shes rlung gis
152b1(rgyud): bzung bar bya//'du byed kyi ni 'chi ba'i las//gsum dang bdun gyi de bzhin du//bltas par gyur bas 'pho ba yin//de yi lta bas grol bar 'gyur//thig le gnyis ni shes byas nas//
152b2(rgyud): steng du 'gro bas thim par bya//'di yis nad dang 'chi med 'gyur//de phyir sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang //sum cu bdun bdag nyid dge ba//slar yang dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//keng rus
152b3(rgyud): chen po'i gtso bo yi//rnal 'byor pa yis thams cad mthong //zhes bya ba ni bong bu'i rnal 'byor la keng rus chen po sgom pa po'i man ngag de kho na nyid dang ldan pa ste rab tu byed pa gnyis
152b4(rgyud): pa'o////de nas keng rus kyi sbyor bas//yul yul rang gi skye gnas skyes//rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' gtso mo//ye shes ldan pas shes par bya//en+dAr dgod pa rdul lha mo//
152b5(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma ni kun gyi gtso//de yi gan su gnas lha mo//ka dom shing lo dril chen ma//lha mo da yi rtag dpa' bo//zhing skyong zhal chen po yin no//keng rus bde ba'i sgyu ma yi//bdag
152b6(rgyud): nyid che los de 'byung 'gyur//de rnams keng rus kyis rgyas btab//ur+yan bu ga las steng son//rang khams las bzhongs rnam par shes//rim gyis yul thams cad du 'gro/
152b7(rgyud): ko l+la'i dri dang pa ru n+ya//dai pi ko Ta be ba ra dza ka/e ru n+ya dang de nas grong //e la'i grong dang khaM che dang //ma rU'i grong dang de bzhin du//puN+Da ba d+ha na yi zhing //dza yan+ti dang priSh+Ta'i grong //sau pa
153a1(rgyud): ra dang snod de bzhin//ur+yAn dang ni 'bar ba 'dzin//k+Shi ri ki dang b+h+ra mra'i kyang //oM puMSh+Ti dang rgyal po'i khab//byad kyi yul dang de bzhin du//mU la po dang pu lA ra sa//
153a2(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i gnas yin no//r-i yi rtsi dang tA la'i shing //b+ha Ta i mu gas ro de bzhin//ral pa'i shong dang gzhan gnon dang //ro yi rtse mor yang dag rten//thang chen po
153a3(rgyud): dang rtsa khung dang //a shwad+tha dang khang pa brtsegs//u dum bar shal ma le//ka rany+dza mya ngan med la rten//gser shing dang ni sA la dang //tsu ta d+hA tu da la la ki/brag brtsegs
153a4(rgyud): pa dang sbrang rtsi'i shing //sngon du yang dag rten pa'o//rdul gyi skye gnas tshol pa'i lus//stobs chen dang ni rnal 'byor gnas//thod pa las dang rdul rib gtum//skye gnas
153a5(rgyud): dpa' bo tshol pa'i lus//stobs chen rnams dang khrag de bozhin//dpa' bo'i skye gnas nus las byung //skye gnas zla ba las byung dang //stobs chen rigs las byung ba dang //
153a6(rgyud): 'jigs byed khrag las byung de bzhin//tshil dang g.yul ngo che las skyes//me tog skye gnas gnyis de bzhin//slar yang de nyid tshig dan bya//'di rnams rigs las byung
153a7(rgyud): lha mo//lhon cig skyes gzugs bu mo yin//dpal chen mo dang mo yi kha//zhing skyong mchog gi zhal can te//ma yi gdong can zhes gregs pa//keng rus bde ba rig pa
153b1(rgyud): po'o//de yi 'pho ba 'dzin pa ni//rnal 'byor ma gnyis spro bar byed//de yis de 'dod sbyor ba yis//dpa' bo gnyis mod yang dag rten//sems can rnams la ban don du//rdo rje
153b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du gnas te//kun tu spyod po'i bgrod gzugs kyis//yul thams cad du 'gro ba yin//lang dbang phyug ma gyen brdzes sgra//zhing skyong gtsigs pa chen po ste/
153b3(rgyud): gyen brdzus sgra zhes bshad pa ni//kong rus bde ba'i rgyu can to//rnal 'byor ma mchog khyad par ni//lhag ma ston gsungs bzhin shes bya//rna bo gcus dang dag mo ste//zhing
153b4(rgyud): skyong ba ni lus chen no//de nas yang na rgyu can dang //mchog dbang phyu go ma dag chen mo//ke rus bde ba'o stong pa yis//go 'phang 'ochog tu shes par bya//zhi ba'i gzugs
153b5(rgyud): drong me dang ni//zhing skyong an+tar dgod pa'o//me dang 'phrul chen dag dang ni//sgra chen por yang shes par bya//keng rus kyi ni gtum ma ni//'bar ba'i dbus su bde ba NAM//mi
153b6(rgyud): yi gdong drang brtson tshon ma//zhing skyong ba ni dril bu'i sgra//brtson 'grus chen mo zhes grags pa//keng rus bod pa'i 'byung gnas yin//dmar ser grags dang 'jigs mig ma//
153b7(rgyud): zhing skyong byin pa chen po ste//'jigs byed ma dang sbyin ma 'am//keng rus bde bas 'gengs byed pa'o//'jigs chen ma dang stobs chen ma//zhing skyong glang po chen po ste/
154a1(rgyud): /yang na glang pa'o rnam dang //TIng skyod glang po'i rnan+dana? te//'dzus bde ba la zhan pa//rtswa thams cad du de'i rang bzhin//ba lang rnam ri'i rtsom//nAng skyong 'ja/
154a2(rgyud): byed chen po ste//de nas slar yang sdug me'i byin//keng rus de de ba pa thim pa'o//bapyod pa mo dang 'jigs zhab ma//zhing skyong ba ni gtsigs pa ste//rmongs par byed mo zhal
154a3(rgyud): chen po//kong rus bde ba la chags pa'o//ro langs ma dang bzhin bzang mo//ting skyong ba spu'i byin pa can//yang na gyen go tsigs chen po ste//keng dus bde ba la za ba'o//
154a4(rgyud): tsu muN+Da dang lha chen mo//zhing skyong bum pa'i rlig pa can//yang na lha mo chen mo dang //zhong skyong bum pa'i grul can te//yang na lha chen po yin no//keng rus bde bar gar byed pa'o//
154a5(rgyud): rab gus ma dang ral gsum mo//zhing skyong gtsigs pa chen po ste//yang na ral pa gsum zhes bya//keng rus bde ba'i pha rol phyin//phrog gi gdong ma dril sgra ma//zhing
154a6(rgyud): skyosbyong 'ug pa'i gdong can te//dril du'i sgra ru nges grags pa//'dir ni keng rus bde za ba'o//me zhal ma dang lha chen mo//zhing skyong 'jigs par byed pa ste//yang ni lha chen por
154a7(rgyud): shes bya//keng rus bde ba'i gzi can no//ka ran+da ga nas ma de bzhin//gzhan yang dril bu chen mor grags//zhing skyong po ni stobs chen to//keng rus bde bas mdzes pa//
154b1(rgyud): yin//gsang grags mA dang lha chen mo//drag gzugs ma dang stobs chen ma//zhing skyong sgra chen po dang ni//grags po'i gzugs dang stobs chen te//keng rus pade las yongs
154b2(rgyud): byung ba'o//mchog tu mi 'gyur rnal 'byor ldan//gtum mo dang ni drag mo dang //zhing skyong ba ni 'bar bar grags//de nasi yang na dwags po'i gzugs//kong rus bde ba'i cha
154b3(rgyud): lugs can//'jig rten gyim gyin smra mo//zhing skyong ri rab chen po ste//de nas yang nA sbyin brdzas sku//keng rus bde ba snom pa po'o//'jigs pa dang stobs chen ma//zhing skyong
154b4(rgyud): 'dzegs pa de bzhin to//stobs po che dang 'jigs gzugs ma//keng rus bde ba'i snying po can//srul mo dang ni lha chen mo//zhing skyong brtul zhugs chen po ste//keng rus po
154b5(rgyud): ba'i nus pa yis//de phyir dbang po kun bde ba'o//bri pa na sa ma ril yi sgra//zhing skyong rna ba chen po can//yang na del li sgrogs pa ste//keng rus bde ba 'dzag pa'o//ldan
154b6(rgyud): skyed/phyogs ma 'byor grogs ma//dpa' bo chen po de bzhin mchog/zhing stong shin tu thob dka' ste//keng rus bde ba dpog byed pa'o//dbang bskur mnyam ma skyes dbang phyug/
154b7(rgyud): nor skyong sa tshog so dbang phyug ste//keng rus bde ba la gnas pas//rang nyid 'dod pa'i bde bar 'gyur//rdo rje mgo bo ga da rtsi gsum dang //dang dang rdo rje mdung thung dang //gtun
155a1(rgyud): shing zhags pa de bzhin du//rdo rje'i lcug sgrog lcags kyu dang //zhags pa gzhol dang kha T+wAM gA/rdo rje lcags sgrog phyag can dang //dbyug pa mdung thung gri gug
155a2(rgyud): dang //mdung thung rdo rje lcags sgrog can//gri gug ral go de bzhin du//rdo rje dang ni mdung thung gshol//ga da rdo rje kyo de bzhin//chu srin rgyal mtshan tho pa'o//zhi po'i zhal du
155a3(rgyud): shes bya dang //gtsigs ma dang ni rab 'jigs ma//chos kyi dbang phyug rab ster ma//rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun mchog ma//'dod pa'i dbang phyug rab ster ma//yang
155a4(rgyud): dag rmongs pa'i zhing ster ma//gtsigs ma rmongs pa'i zhing ma dang //'jigs chen ma dang de bzhin gzhan//gtum zhal ma dang dgra 'joms ma//rmongs pa'i zhing gi 'jigs
155a5(rgyud): byed ma//dpa' bo kun la mchog ster ma//longs spyod grol ba sdig 'joms ma//bde ba kun gyi mchog ster mo//bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed ma//gartsigs ma
155a6(rgyud): drag cing 'jigs pa mo//sha'i gdan can ma dang ni gzhan//bde ba'i dbang phyug mchog ster ma//mdzes shing thams cad dgos ma dang //'jog rten dngos grub ster
155a7(rgyud): ba mo//lha mo gtsigs ma 'jigs par byed//shin tu drag mo gzugs bzang ma//dbang phyug thams cad rab ster ma//dngos grub thams cad rab ster ma//
155b1(rgyud): 'dogs ma sgrub ma grags sbyor ma//nAg mo'i gzugs dang drag chen mo//dag thams cad gyi 'jigs pa zhon//thams cad dbang du byed ma dang //sems can thams cad
155b2(rgyud): 'jigs byed ma//'khor lo kun rgyalam nyid dang //'jigs par byed dang de bzhin gzhan//zhi ba'i zhal mu gzugs bzang ma//sgrub po rnams le 'thun byed ma//snyan grags ma
155b3(rgyud): dadrang rab ston ma//de ltar thams cad rim bzhin no//aT+TAr dgod par 'khor lor bzhugs//ko la'i rir ni ro la bzhugs/ba ru N+ya sid+d+ha
155b4(rgyud): si pa Da ri//lha mo'i mkhar du yi dwags gnas//bI ra dza ru shing leb bzhugs//e re n+ya ru Shaphag la bzhugs//de nas grong du yi dgas bzhugs//e le'i grong du
155b5(rgyud): bur gnas//kha cher nor sbyin+da la ni gnas//ma ru'i yul du ma he ra gnas//grong du mgo yi rgyab du ste//pud+d+ha ba d+har ro la gnas//dzA yan d+ha ru king rus gnas//br-ISh+kaM grong
155b6(rgyud): du brtsegs par gnas//saM pa red pe re ta la gnas//karany+dzar gnas tsa rI d+hi ra//un+d+ran du ni bdud la bzhugs//'bar bu 'dzin pa ro la gnas//k+Shi ri kar ni mo la
155b7(rgyud): ginas//sgyu ma'i grong du yi steng //am thu ka ru seng gar gnas//rgyal po'i khab tu'i khi ro lo ga nas//bod kyi yul du mi dgas gnas//ring gnas mAl ba
156a1(rgyud): bzhin//keng rus kyi ni rab sbyor bas//de lta'i zhing du dngos grub 'gyur//klong rus las byung bang ba ni//rtsa ba'i rtsa ba las yongs las//mtshams rnams kun
156a2(rgyud): tu khyab par ni//ye shes khu ba de mthong 'gyur//mgo med las byung ba'i ngage 'di//khams de nyid ni za ba'o//dbang po gnyis kyi mkha' gnas las//de yis bde ba mthong bar
156a3(rgyud): 'gyur//thams cad dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma//mkhas rnams cung zad med par 'gyur//de yi rang bzhin 'gro ba sgyu mar ni//lto ba sdus pa mthong bar 'gyur//'phyang ba yis ni thams
156a4(rgyud): cad du//bdud rtsi de ni 'gro dang 'ong //'dzag bzhin pa yis rnal 'byor ma//rang go zhing skyes rnam par spro//phyi nang bdag nyid gsang ba yi//de rnams la ni mchod chen bya//mi shes
156a5(rgyud): ri bo gcod pa yis//dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//sngon bshad dkyil 'khor dbus su no//ngo nas keng rus bsgom par bya//skye 'gro'i gtso bo'i dpa' bo yang //
156a6(rgyud): shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin can//gsungs pa'i yul du rnal 'byor ma//de nas rab gtum sogs ming ste//sgrub pa pos ni dngos grub 'gyur/der ni 'du ba yang bya'o//bza'
156a7(rgyud): dang btung sogs yang dag brtsams//nyer spyod lnga sogs mchod po dang //nyer spyod gtor ma'i snod rnams ni//rlon pa'i sha dang nya la sogs//bza' dang rdzas rnams thams
156b1(rgyud): cad dang //bdud rtsi lnga dang de bzhin gzhan//g.yon par snod rnams bzhag byas nas//ga ya su khro bo bstan par bya//shing gcig dang ne dur khrod dam//ri dang khrod dang khyim dang ni//grong
156b2(rgyud): dang grong khyer nges rnams dang //khang stong lam gyi bzhi mdo dang //chu la 'gro dang thang la rgyu//sa dang ma mo'i khyim dang 'gram//nag mo drag mi drag chen mo//lha sbyin yang dag rten ma dang //
156b3(rgyud): nag mo gtsigs dang 'jigs byed dang //dga' las 'das dang log 'dren dang //tsA mu ti dang drug gzugs ma//lha mo dbu ma dang ni ma//rgyal me rnam par rgyal mo dang //mi thub mu dang
156b4(rgyud): gzhan mi thub//bzang nag mo dang nag chen mo//sbom nag mo dang rnal 'byor ma//dbang po zla ba mo drag mo//sdang ma 'phyang ma sum cu'i dbang //kam po dzA ma mar me ma 'jib ma//
156b5(rgyud): grong du gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma//drag gzugs ma dang gzugs chen mo//mche me drag ma gtsigs pa mo//lha mo thod pa'i phreng tsan dang //kha T+wAM ga ni 'dzin ma dang //mi'u thung ma
156b6(rgyud): dang dge sna'i phyag/rdo rje'i phyag can de bzhin gzhu//mkha' 'gro ma lnga de nyid che//las rnams thams cad rab sgrub ma//sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal mo dang //rdor dbang phyug
156b7(rgyud): ma gtsi de bzhin//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po//rdul med rnal 'byor stong pa nyid//rdo rje'i dbang phyug bka' yis ni//kun nas 'dir ni spyan 'dren no//oM kak+ka kan+d+han//
157a1(rgyud): /u n+sa khaN+Da khAd na/sar+b+ba d+haSh+Tha no/tan+ta tar/b+hU t+yA yab+hUtwA ya/cho ga ma 'dags pa mdzad cig tu Ta yAdzaHsaH//pad+ma N+Di sa khani yangs bku nas//
157a2(rgyud): thams cad ni mnyes par bya//rnal 'ibyi rnal 'byor ma bsgom gyi//las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//oM d+h+yek+Sha sarba ya ge shrI ts+tshahU~M dz+nyAHswAnA//ji lha'i la sngags
157a3(rgyud): sangs ste ga/gtor mo'i la sreg so yongs sbyor bya//zho dang rgyus dang dab da ni//dgug dang ba sad dang bye ba dang /rnyings pag po'i//rnal 'byor rnams kyi
157a4(rgyud): las rnams kun//bsgrub bya'o ye shes lcags kyu yis//rang gi 'dod pa'i lha tshim byi//zhing dang gnas dong de bzhin glong //grong khyer rAm n+ti ri bo r+ya//'byung po mang
157a5(rgyud): rab tu bsdu//de yi tshogs ni 'du ba'o//rtsi thams cad kyi kun spyod kyis//de yi srog kyang bsdu ba'o//rang gi mdud pa'o gnas 'dug pa//de ni lta ba snying khar 'dod//rnal
157a6(rgyud): 'byor ma li gus 'dud pas//sgrub pa pos ni mchog thob 'gyur//rtag tu gnas dang nye gnas su//sdod la lha yis mchog ster 'gyur//gnas der nyams pa dang ldan pa//
157a7(rgyud): sngon gyi cho gas bsgrub par bya//bug rdol dang ni rgas pa dang //shu ba midze sogs spang ba ni//'byung ba'i nyi ma thob byas nas//de ltar legs mnyam gzhag pas sgrub//
157b1(rgyud): ya yis zhus b+hAs //khyud daphyur du phyung ngan ci lngas//yan lag mar na ga rten pas snru//de nyid kyis ni 'dug sa ston//sa par b+hA bawI gas ma 'o//dbus su
157b2(rgyud): 'bad pas bya ba yin//ji lta bor ni sngon bzhin du//sangs rgyas thams cad gsan du gzhug/gad mo rnam pa brgyad bya ste//tA hA hU~M hi hU trA te ha~M/zhes bya sgrub pa pa yis//me me
157b3(rgyud): sa bon yang dag zhon//rlung gis su ni phye ba ya//spyi bo'i gtsug tu sbyar byas nas//sa yi mthil du mchod byas nas//skye gnas dbus su dgod bya ste//'bad pas zhu ba lta bar
157b4(rgyud): bya//skye gnas dbus su rim ji bzhin//bdag nyid bsam bya rnal 'byor pas//po nyi'i 'od zer kun na so 'khrigs//'bar ba'i phreng ba rgya mtsho blta//de ltar rnam pa bsams
157b5(rgyud): gyur pa so//rnal 'byor thams cad bde ba'i gnas//rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan bdug pos 'di gsung s+ho//zhes bya ba ni keng rus kyi tshi ga ste rab tu byed pa
157b6(rgyud): gsum pa'o////de nas mche brngam gtsigs pa'i//ting 'dzin sbyor gnas bshad bya ste//gzhu 'gengs rim pa 'ong ba ni//rdo rje rnal 'byor pas yod de/srog gi thig
157b7(rgyud): son bsam pa//mtshams thams cad du nga rgyud de//gzhu dbyug mtshan mar bsam par bya//sgra thams cad ni bskul ba yis//kun nas 'gengs bzhin pa yo mda'//dbus
158a1(rgyud): Sh+To bar yang mas pa yis//rnam par shes pa'i 'byin gnas k+Sha//'byung gnas rnams cad bsnad pa yin//bathaMd bzhin pa yi bde ra/
158a2(rgyud): de ga pa yis gzhan du 'gre/mche ba nAm b+hA rA gtsigs pa yi//rlub snor rnams kyis dris byung 'gyur/mtshan ma zad pa med 'jams pa//skye bo kun la 'jug pa
158a3(rgyud): mye ngan 'das pa'i spyod yul les//gzhan gyi grong rnam su 'jug pa'o//ts+tshi ne g+hi sprul pa'i phyag tshigs ni//de la rgyun tu 'dzums par byed//rnam par zhu ba'i bdag nyid kyi//
158a4(rgyud): zhi nga'i gzugs sbyor bar 'gyur//b+h+rU~M zhes rkeng ba'i mthil byer du//na ri bu'i skyed pa bzhin du bgrang /na de mtshams kyi don dam pad+mo//sa gsum pa le lta bar 'gyur/
158a5(rgyud): de phyir skye bo bami sa cad la//mtshan bya mtshan nyid kyis 'byed do//dbang po de rnams thams cad la//bdag nyid kyis dbugs smrar ni smros//'gro bo gzhan du dbye 'jug pa //
158a6(rgyud): chog tu rlung phyung 'gru bar 'gyur//sgyu 'phrul dA bAr yod dag glunas//spyi bkun la rnam par blta//maugasags rnam par shes pa ni//nid rnams ni bai spyod par byu/
158a7(rgyud): mkhal gri'i rnam par de shes bya//mkha' gro mo'i gzugs kyi gtso//dkyil 'a khor sngon du sprul par ni/mche gtsigs la sags bsgom par bya/ya gi kham
158b1(rgyud): bde ba'i gzugs//rang rang gtso bor bya ba yin//de las skyes pa'i mkha' 'gro rgya//mkha' 'gro ma dang bcas pa'i gzugs//thams cad chos 'byung sna tshogs pa'o//snying por
158b2(rgyud): gnom du med zhi ba'i//chos kun gcig tu yongs bsdus pa//sngags pas cho ga bzhin du b+h+rUM//A le ka le mnyam byas nas//sde tshan rnams kyis yongs brjes pa//'dod don/
158b3(rgyud): thams cad sgrub byed pa//der gnas dpa' bos yang dag btu//ye shes la sogs sku bzhi po//zhes bya 'thob 'gyur the tsom med//steng 'ag rtag tu dngos grub ster+ya//bdag
158b4(rgyud): nyid pho nya kun 'gros so//yi ge lnga bcu sde tshan brgyad//de nyid mkha' 'gro mchog rmad byung //sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor rAm yang na//chung ngu'i rgyud dang 'dra ba mchog/yi ge thams
158b5(rgyud): cad kyi ni tshad//sdom pa sogasu mtshon par bya//yig rnams dang ming rnams dang //sdom pa rnamasu de brjod do//dkyil 'khor rnams dang rgyud rnams dang //le'u rnams dang
158b6(rgyud): ni de bzhin du//lwasna tshogs rnams ni thams cad de//nyis 'gyur thung ngu ring ba'o//de nyid du ni kun res rgyal//'byin cing sdud par byed pa po//sems can rigs zhes 'dir
158b7(rgyud): de bshad//re re ye ni mtshan nyid do//re re yi ni sgom pa ni//ji lta'i rim pas shes par bya//yi gaM yi ni ming dang gzugs//de ni sems can gzugasu 'dod//gsang sngags
159a1(rgyud): de ni zlos bzhin pa//de nyid du ni rab gzhug bya//A yig thig le dang bral ba//dmar po phyi mo rnam par spungs//a yig thig le dang bcas pa//de phyir
159a2(rgyud): 'tshal gyi rigs can no//guny+dza'i me tog dang mnyam par//a yig la ni rgyan par 'dod//a yig sin+d+hu ra yi mdog/bzang po lnga par shes par bya//u yig dbang po'i gzhu
159a3(rgyud): yi 'od//A yig yi ge drug pa nyid//glog gnyis dang ni 'dra ba'o//ri yig du ba'i kha dog ste//phra mo lu sa ni spangs pa'o//rI yig yi ge mun pa'i gzugs//lo ni bya rog
159a4(rgyud): bshog pa me tshungs//wI li yi ge mtshal gyi mdog/e yi yi ge dmar skya ste//ai sin+na ra da mar mdog ma//o yi yi ge nyi ma 'dra//'od zer stong phrag gyen du 'bar//o
159a5(rgyud): ye yi ge rtag 'bar ba//nyi ma bye ba dang mnyam 'od//zla phyed de bzhin du thig la//i yi ga sngon du bshad pa can//zla ba gnyis dang tshig dag ste//e.aHyig rgyal po de
159a6(rgyud): bzhin no//de ltar stong pa nyid bcu drug/las rnams kyi ni dag pa'i rgyu//myos dang brlab gdol rmongs pa dang //sems bral dang po ri steng nyid do//rmongs pa dang 'khrugs
159a7(rgyud): dbang dang ni//myur du thams cad ster ba'o//bsam bral ba dang myos pa dang //brlab gdol du ni gsal ba'o//stong pa nyid kyi las bsgoms pas//de ni rmugs dang dbang
159b1(rgyud): du'ong //yang dag rmongs dang rnam rmongs 'gyur//lus brlan pa dang sems pa bral//dbang du 'ong dang dgug pa dang //ye shes shes bya can mchog go//bskrad pa dang ni gzhu ba'i
159b2(rgyud): las//rnam pa bdun du 'dod pa yin//sa yi zil gnon 'dzin bzhin dang //sngags nimin pa dang rmongs pa'i sems//skye ba 'di la nom du yang //de yi slar yang 'ong min pa'o//
159b3(rgyud): rnam par sdang dang thams cad kyi//'jig rten gyis ni smod pa'o//'jig rten kun dang 'thun med la//skad cig gnas pa spongs pa'o//yid kyi lus ni thams cad rnams//de phyir
159b4(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum gang 'gyur//bde ba kha yis bkug byas nas//dbugs med ri mo 'dzag pa nub//phyi mo'i yal ga rnams kyis bya//dam tshig dbang phyug ma'i gnas kyis//
159b5(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin ni//gnyis stong mchog tu zag pa med//sangs rgyas ri mo stong 'og tu//pad+ma'i rnal can rab tu gnas//a li ka li mdor bsdus pa//bcud len
159b6(rgyud): khams kyi lus la so//rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha//zhal du yongasu 'gyur pa'o//de yi 'og dang gang gzhan du//yi ge thams cad nges par gnas//so sor snang ba
159b7(rgyud): ma byung bar//srung bgyis zhes bdag gis bshad//sems ni rjes 'thun dbyengasu 'gyur//sems ni stong pa'i rang bzhin can//zla gnyis yang dag sbyor ba ni//phyag
160a1(rgyud): rgya mchog tu myi 'gyur ba'o//de ltar khams kyi rang bzhin kyang //ji ltar 'dod pa'i las bya'o//sgyur yang thams cad byed pa yi//stong pa nyid ni so so
160a2(rgyud): dgod//thog ma gnyis ni rkang gnyis dgod//baR+Ya dang gsang ba rgod pa dang //lte ba snying kaM steng dang ni//mgron pa dang nr-i rkan de bzhin//kha drong sna dang rna dag dang //dpral ba
160a3(rgyud): mgo bo rgyab tu te//rang gi khams ming 'du shes kyis//dbang la sogs pa'i las byed do//slar yang re re yi yang ni//las ni nyi shu lnga'i bdag nyid//stong nyid de nyid rig
160a4(rgyud): byed pa//rgyun tu nang du bsgom par bya//ka yige la sogs ma yig mthar//lha mo bdog nyid chenu mos nyonu//gang gis su gsum gyi ni lha//thams cad lta ma yin dang mi//
160a5(rgyud): sgrub po'i legs par nges par ni//de rnams thams cad dbang du 'gyur//de nyid nyi shu rtsi lnga ni//ka yig sogasu 'du sheso//bdag dang dkyil 'khor lus dang ni//lha dang
160a6(rgyud): bla ma dang ni sngags//rnam shes ye shes snying po dang //dus dang rgyu dang 'bras de bzhin//dbugs dang bcud lenA la sa dang ni//gtor ma sa dang phyag rgya gzhan//dbang po
160a7(rgyud): dbu ma sgyu ma dang //'tshams dang rigs rus de bzhin te//lung ni rje su reg pa dang //mig 'phrul 'dra ba rim ji ltar//de ltar de nyid las mdzes pa//shes rab chen
160b1(rgyud): bos shes par bya//rang bzhin gyis ni brjod pa'i las//dus kyi me yi mdog can no//ji ltar dbang la sogs pa'i las//lnga lnga ru ni gsal ba yin//dmyur dang gnag dang de bzhin/
160b2(rgyud): dkar//ser dong ljang ku de bzhin no//sgrub po'i bsgrub bya'i 'dod pa ni//de rnams de nyid 'gyur gyis 'ong //ya yig la sogs dgu rnams kyis//ji lta'i tshogs yi ge rnams//
160b3(rgyud): phung po khams kyi rigs rnams dang //yan lag dbu rnams brjod pa po'o//ji lta'i rim pas blo ldan gyis//dbu dgu ru ni shes par bya//las ni de rnams shes bya ste//'dus pa
160b4(rgyud): bang mchog bla ma dang //bde mchog rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang //'byung ba de nyid 'dus pa dang //rdo rje 'jigs byed sum bu Ti//ji lta'i tshigs gzhan du yang ngo //de ltar nges brjod 'bum gsum
160b5(rgyud): las//phyung ba bde mchog chung ngu ste//a yig la sogs kAHyig mthar//le'u rnams ji lta'i rim pa yis//de kho na nyid ldan par bya//sdom pa rgya mtsho mkha' 'gro skyes//mkha'i
160b6(rgyud): mnyam nang du rab bshad pa'i//de yi sgrub thabs bshad par bya//ji ltar dbus ma'i pad+mar ni//sangs rgyas gzugs ni gsol bar sgom//sku yi rgya mtsho ser sna rgya mtsho dang //'dod
160b7(rgyud): chags rgya mtsho phrag dog rgya mtsho ste//phyogs bzhi por ni bsgom par bya//pad+ma 'dab mi rnamasu rnal 'byor ma//rdo rje rgya mtsho rin chen rgya mi tshom//pad+ma rgya mtsho sna tshogs rgya mtsho
161a1(rgyud): ma//g.yen bskor du ni bsgom bya ste//mdab ma bzhi la thod pa ni//rgya mtsho bzhi po yi ni gzugs//dngos kun bdud rtsir ston pa'o//slar yar grwa bzhi pa
161a2(rgyud): rnamasu//ji lta'i rim pas dgod bya ba//rnal 'byo ye shes de kho na//thar pa'i rgya mtsho g.yon bskor du'o//gzugs dang sgra dang dro dang ro//re ga dang chos dang yid dang
161a3(rgyud): sems//kun kyang rgya mtshor shes bya ste//g.yon dang g.yas kyis dgod par bya//sa dang na mkha' lce dang ni//rna ba thams cad rgya mtsho ste//ye shes zhes bya'i rgya mtsho dag/
161a4(rgyud): sngon gyi rim pas dgod par bya//sgo skyong ma yi lha mo he//g.yon bskor du ni dgong bya ba//glang po rgya mtsho rta rgya mtsho//seng ge rgya mtsho ma he rgya mtsho'o//grA l-i gnas pa'i
161a5(rgyud): lha mo ni//sgyu ma rgya mtsho rmi lam rgya mtsho ma//gsang snang rgya mtsho snang ba'i rgya mtsho mo//kha dog 'khor lo gzhan gyi bzhin//byang chub chung ngu bdag nyid che'i//dkyil
161a6(rgyud): 'khor de yis shes par bya//dur khrod brgyad kyi rime pas ni//sgrub thabs rim pas bsgom par bya//sangs rgyas gzugs kyi zhal nas ni//pad+ma'i yu ba nges
161a7(rgyud): par 'thon//kha dog dkar po 'obar chen po//pad+ma mdab ma stong phrag cin//de yi dbus su bsgom bya bo//mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho bde mchog ste//phyag stong pa ni rnam par
161b1(rgyud): sgom//zhal ni sum cu rtsa bdun no//zhabs bco brgyad kyis gar du mdzad//spyan gsum pa la sna tshogs mdog/rul pa'i con pan can gyi gzugs//sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed can//
161b2(rgyud): rgyab tu dbang phyug chen po 'dzin//lhag mar dpa' bo dpa' dbang me//bcu gnyis bdag nyid can 'khor lor//ji ltar bdag gis sngon bshad pa'o//shes rab phyag g.yin du
161b3(rgyud): bshad de//g.yas par rgyun tu thabs yin no//khyab 'jug drag po de bzhin tshangs//gshin rje dang ni log 'dren dang //bden bral deng ni thags zangs ris//dbar po chags
161b4(rgyud): bdag karti ka/sgra gcan zla ba nyi ma dang //bla ma skyobo pa bla de bzhin//nor rgyas dang ni skyes bu me//myos pa zhabs kyis gnon pa ste//rang rang khyim thab yang dag ldan//mdog dang
161b5(rgyud): mtshon cha yang bya'o//phag mo yis ni 'khyud pa ste//de'i gzugs can nam phyag gnyis skyes//sna tshogs gzugs 'dzin rab myur ma//slar yang rang 'dra'i gzugs can ma'o//
161b6(rgyud): mdab ma sdod du bsgom bya ba//rang bzhin rnal 'byor ma kun te//bcom ldan kha dog gang 'dra ba//de 'dra rang rnams mtshon pA rA bya//thung du ring po yon tan 'pher//a yig la so/
161b7(rgyud): sde brgyad do//phyi mo bcu gnyis kyis phye ba//stong phrag rnal 'byor ma'i yang ngo //ka rdo rje sogs shes bya ste//khams kyi rkyen gyi yid kyis so//'khor lo drug bdag rnal 'byor
162a1(rgyud): /can//de thams cad ni gar du mdzad//thams cad kyis ni ro la gnon//phyag gnyis pa 'am mkha' gro'i bdag/thod pa kha To kha 'dzin ma//bde chen rnam pa'i gzugs
162a2(rgyud): can ma'o//sangs rgyas thugs kha nas spro ba//'khor lo gsum sgro 'od zer phreng //grog ni 'og dang steng blta bas//sdom pa rgya mtsho dgugs par bya//slar yang 'od kyis dbyung
162a3(rgyud): ba ni//mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho gnyis med bdag/thams cadra sdom pa'i sgrub thab su//ji lta'i rnal 'byor gzhan bya'o//de ltar byed bzhin pa nyid kyisaso//phyag rgya'i dngos grub skye bar
162a4(rgyud): 'gyur//gzhung thams cad ni lta bar bya//gzhan pa'i rnal 'byor dmigs mi bya//dam tshig gi ni spyod pa tsam//sdom po chung ngur rab tu bshad//thams cad sogaso ma
162a5(rgyud): bzhin dor la//thams cad sdom pa bzung bar gyis//mche ba rnam gtsigs rab sbyor bas//gzhu 'gengs rim pas 'ong bar gyis//de'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yang //
162a6(rgyud): sngon gyi sbyor bas bsgom par bye//'og dang steng nyid mche ba gnyis//bde mchog mkha' gro rgya mtsho dag/rang ming brjod pa'i gsang sngags la//hUM phaT yi ge mthar sbyar
162a7(rgyud): gyis//yang dag ting 'dzin rdo rje yi//gsang sngags thams cad la bya'o//thams cad rgyan ni rab bshad pa'ang //sngags rig pa yis sngon bzhin no//bdag gis bdag
162b1(rgyud): byos rgyud 'di ni//gsungs byas yang dag dga' bar 'gyur//nyid dang lhan cig bya ba byas//phyag rgya 'og ste ji ltar lags//khyod kyis 'og dang stong phyag rgya//rab bshad bya yi lnga
162b2(rgyud): mo nyin//mkha' 'gro rgyo mtsho shes rab che//thabs ni sdom pa rgya mtsho'o//'go ngo snang du snyoms 'jug pas//de ni phyag rgyar ston brjod 'gyur//zhal las nges pa po'i thun yu
162b3(rgyud): ba//ngag gis bsgos pa'i bdag nyid do//de ni mkha' gro spyod de yang //rnam par shes dang thams cad 'ang //zhu bo'i gzugs ni snying kha ru//'od kyis thams cad sdom par
