162b4(rgyud): gyis//de ni theg pa cher sdom pa//bdag nyid chen po ye shes gzugs//de ltar gnyi su byar med gzugs//de ni phyag rgyar mngon par brjod/dpa' ba thams cad mnyam
162b5(rgyud): sbyong bas//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje mkhru 'gro rgya mtsha che//bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungaso//rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'o////de nas lha mos mchod byas nas//
162b6(rgyud): phyog byas nas ni 'di skad gsol//sems can rnams kyi sdom byung ba//bcom ldan bdag pa nyid kyis gsungs//lha dgu yi ni reb sbyor bas//rab bshad bya yis lha mo nyan//
162b7(rgyud): byang chub sems kyi cha can gyi/bde ba 'ong ba'i gang zhig rtsa//sdom pa sems can smin byed pa'i//rnal 'byor der ni rnam par spro//'dod chags chags bral rnam 'dres pa//sdom pa
163a1(rgyud): skye 'gro'i gzugs can no//gang phyir de nyid kyis sdom pa//sngon gyi spyod pas sdom pa'o//bo yin mkha' nam mkhar to//sku gsum rnams kyi yang dag bzhugs///
163a2(rgyud): chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa//'thob 'gyur 'od la the tshom med//gang tshe sems ni 'gro bzhin pa//gzugs kyi dbus su thim par gyis//rang rig bdag nyid byang chub
163a3(rgyud): ldan//lhan cig skyes pa'i sku thob 'gyur//ting 'dzin skad cig rig med pa//gang gi srid gsum la thim gyis//de ni 'byung bar shes bya ste//lus can gzhan rnams kyi
163a4(rgyud): sdom min//rnal 'obyer rnams kyi gsang sdom pa//de ltar de nyid nges shes bya//nang gi bdag nyid nyin zhag gi'ang //de yis sdom par baushad par 'gyur//mtshan nyid
163a5(rgyud): thams cad yongs ljon pa'i//a li ka li sogs sde tshan//dang po'i yi ge'i tsho la sogs//gang du ming ni nges par mthong //rigs ni de ru shes bya ste//ang ka'ang sems
163a6(rgyud): can yang dag ldan//mtha' yas la sogs klu gang dang //nyi ma la sogs gza' de bzhin//mkha' 'gro ma'i ming thog byas nas//ma mo de rnams su rab grags//lha
163a7(rgyud): rnams kun gyi bskyed pa dang //sngags rnams kyi dang rgyud nyid kyi yang ngo //'jig rten kun gyi ma yin te//de yis ma la yong dag brten//rtsa na dgu po 'gog pa las/
163b1(rgyud): srog rgyu rnam su shes par+yA bya//A A ka tsa Ta ta pa dang //ya sha'i sde tshwa na yig dbu/i I kha tsha na tha pha dang //ra nga gAnyis padra brjod pa'o//u U ga dza Da da bA dang //la sa sngo
163b2(rgyud): chen gsum pa'o//e au g+ha dz+ha D+ha d+ha b+ha dang //wa ha sde tshan bzhi pa'o//o au ai aHdi nya Na dang //na ma de ltar dgu'i bdag nyid//bzhi po yongasu grags pa ste//nyi can lnga
163b3(rgyud): rnams kyis de bzhin//de ltar 'jig rten gyi de//sdud pa dang ni 'byin par gnas//sgyu chen bcu gnyis de rnams kyis//sa bon gzugs kyi tshogs dran bya//de rnams rA sir
163b4(rgyud): yang dag grags//rgyu skar kun dang yang dag ldan//zla ba dang ni nyi ma'i cha sa//'og dang steng gi kha de bzhin//brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba gnyis//rgyu skar dad ni rA sir bshad//
163b5(rgyud): srog zung du ni de bzhin gshegs//ring dang thung ngu rgyal dang pham//steng du de yi rgyal bar bshad//'og tu 'chi ba mnyam mi mnyam//nyi ma'i rgyu bar son pa kun//rgyu ska da rA si
163b6(rgyud): gza' de bzhi ni//rA si rnam gsum skyong gang phyir//nyi mar gnas par 'char por 'gyur//srog 'char ba dang yang dag ldan//rA si kun gyis shes par bya//karka Ta sing
163b7(rgyud): bu mo dang //bum pa ras drug yang dag ldan//'char bar 'gyur dang shar ba yang //ji lta'i rim dag gza' kun gyis//br-ish+tsi ka dang rta nyid dang //ri dgas bum par yang
164a1(rgyud): dag ldan//cha shas lnga yi tshad kyis ni//gza' shar ba yis 'char bar 'gyur//ri bong lug de bzhin nyid dang //skran nga ru ni song de bzhin//cha shas kyang ni
164a2(rgyud): bzhi pa nyid//'char ba 'ong bar 'char bar 'gyur//zhag gi 'chang ba ma lus pa'ang //'bras bu'i ming dang yang dag ldan//nag mo sogs nas 'jib ma'i mthar//yongasu
164a3(rgyud): rim pas nyi shu bzhi//gang dang 'dra ba'i ming de 'dra'i//de rnams 'bras bur shes par bya//nyis 'gyur longs spyod bris pa dang //dbang po rnams kyis cha dang ldan//thob pa
164a4(rgyud): rtag tu shes bya ste/ngag gi rtag tu zhag lha mo//bdag nyid kyis ni dgos kun dang //gzhan rnams la yang de ltar skyer//de phyir phyi dang nang rnamasu//dge dang mi dge'i las
164a5(rgyud): shes bya//sdom pa 'byung ba'i dus su ni//rnam rtog med pas mtshon par bya//gza' gang de rnams dbyangs shes bya//dbyangaso gang de rnams rA si'o//dbyangs dang rA si de
164a6(rgyud): bzhin skor//rang gi gzugs rnams kyang blta'o//dngos grub 'bras bu ster ba po//yang dag sbyor dang bral na med//g.yo bo'i 'char bas g.yo ba'i las//nges par brtan
164a7(rgyud): pas g.yo med 'gyur//'dren ma yis ni 'dren mar 'gyur//sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyis//lha rnam grol ba'i rgyu nyid pas//lha yi dag ni bsgom par bya//sum
164b1(rgyud): cu bdun bdag nyid 'khor lo//rnal 'byor dngos grub byed pa'i bco//kha dog dang ni mtshan nyid dbya bas//las rjes 'brangs pas bsgom par bya//lha 'u ma lha min sbyor byed kyi//dgran
164b2(rgyud): 'khor lo sdom pa'o//dpa' bo thams cad snyoms 'jog pas//rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje mkha' 'gro lha yi dgra/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs//zhes bya ba ni
164b3(rgyud): rab tu byed pa lnga pa'o////de nas rnal 'byor ma thams cad//'dus par byas nas 'dri ba ni//lha dang sbyin byed sems can gyi//sdug bsngal ster po ji ltar lags//galo te kun
164b4(rgyud): rang bzhini ston pa//dge dang mi dge de 'dri ba//de nas bcom ldan lha la sogs//sems can kun stor po ci lags//'di la bdag ni the tshom mchis//gtso bo gsal bar
164b5(rgyud): mdzod cig kye//phag mo la sogs mang po yi//lha mo sgyu ma chen mo nyon//rang rang las kyi rjes 'brangs pas//lha dang sbyin byed sems can gyi//bdag gi rang bzhin du ni med//
164b6(rgyud): byang chub chen por zhu las yod//rang gi rang bzhin yon tan nyid//bdag gi las kyi yang dag 'byung //de phyir dge dang mi dag blta//sna tshogs kun rtog 'thob par byed//de
164b7(rgyud): yis lha dang sbyin byed rnams//gza' dang rA si rgyu skar can//rang gi las 'bras la za ba//ster ro gzhan du ci yang med//ston pa ji ltar grol bar 'gyur//klu 'di yis ni
165a1(rgyud): dkris par byed//a mo twASh+Tha dan d+hA sam+b+had+hamA ga sa ga rba d+ha mu pA ta ng+gam+b+hany+tsa ga m+b+ha s+yA t+ta mA rA ma d+hU pa te/sar-I ros byings de dz+nyAmAnA sU nya b+hUng+ka nI mAn
165a2(rgyud): sani/shI rI b+hu ga s+yA d+hAsmA d+hAmA d+hony+tsa pA ya ma bI dIdA ma da ma te//ded dpag med k+Shi ba spyi drangs//'di 'dri'i brel ba bsgrub par bya//e ba d+hA ti'i yang dbus su//rnam shes ma
165a3(rgyud): ba la mtshan bya//sr-i ga la saM gas pa'i rlung thams cad//rnam 'gyur byas pa'i bar thim bya//rnam par shrIs pa 'dres gyur po'ang //tse thams cad kyi bcud len te//'thung
165a4(rgyud): pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur//dbang po rnams bgrod mtshan nyid los//rkan gyi phyogasu gnas pa'i lce//a bi d+hU tir de rab bshad//cha shas can gyi tha ma yi//bdud
165a5(rgyud): rtse rgyun ni 'jog par 'gyur//rma thams cad du bkang ba ste/yang dag rig pa'i gzugasu thim//mdor bsdus pas ni khams lnga ste//gzhan gyi dngos po 'dir ma brjod/
165a6(rgyud): dbang chen la ni me yis srog/chu yis dbus su rab tu thim//myur du zhu nas dro bar 'gyur//rlung gi na mkha' la gnas so//chu yi tshigs ni skam byas pas//de nyid du ni tham
165a7(rgyud): nas 'gro//sems ni stong nyid la son bya//stong nyid na mkha'i khams la'o//na mkha' ye shes la 'jug bya//ye shes sgyu ma'i rang mtshan nyid//mkhas pas ye shes shes
165b1(rgyud): /bya'i bdag/de ltar 'odra dpag med par sgrom//rtsibs brgyad legs par rgyan pa yi//shes bya'i 'khor lo 'di bsgom bya//bu med dri ba ni u ku//d+ha se me ro ma ka 'drer//rlung du tu ka
165b2(rgyud): bo maM dbang ldan du//rA si'i 'khor lo ram dza bzhin//de bzhin 'di la 'di rnams dgod/e u e o aM aHsa bon rnams//bkra shis la sogs gza' lnga ni//shar la sogs
165b3(rgyud): par dgod par bya//ring po de nyid du dgeng bya//aM aHnyi ma zlar shes bya//nyi ma zla ba 'di grol ba//ku le re la nyi ma ste//gza' lhag gdong lnga pa 'dir gnas//mthar ni gang
165b4(rgyud): zhig lha ma yi//so so'i cho gas za bar 'gyur//rA si rnams kyis rgyan pa yi//'gro kun la phan 'khor lo de//de ltar do la'i 'khor lo dri//de ltar do la'i 'khor lor 'gyur//
165b5(rgyud): rgyu skar rA si dus dang zhag/lug rnams ro hai ta sogs dang //zla ba dang ni nyi ma rnams//'chi ba'i mtshan nyid mtshan pa ni//mdor bsdus pa yis bshad par bya//rgyu skar dus tshed
165b6(rgyud): yang dag ldan//gza' dang nad ni de bzhin to//do wA rA sI'i tshad kyisku ni//skye ba'i la su brjod pa yin//kArti ka dang bzang po'i tshe//mig dmar de bzhin smin drug ste//de la 'chi bar shes/
165b7(rgyud): par bya//gal te rnal 'byor mid na'o//ma rag shI ra'i mgo dang ni//gzo' lhag nyi ma la spyo ba//mgul ba'i nad kyis nyin bzhin//khyu mchog la ni rtag tu 'chi//rgyal dang sreg 'i/
166a1(rgyud): dang /rgyu skar dang //gzi'i lhag 'khrigs pa la 'chi'o//ku l+ya ra mchu'i chos brgyad kyi//tha rangs pa sangs la 'cha'o//gre dang mchu yi rgyu skar dang //chos bcu spen pa seng
166a2(rgyud): ge la//nub mo 'chi bar shes bya ste//gal te brgya byin mnyam gyur kyang ngo //bu mo gnyis mar kul mas 'chi//sa ga dang ni bcu bzhi dang //gzhu dang phur bu'i ri mo dang //gal te spangs
166a3(rgyud): rgyas mnyam gyur pa//srang la 'chi bar shes par bya//snron dang bcu gcig nag pa dang //phu ra bu sdig pa la 'chi'o//chu stod chu smad tshes dgu dang //gro zhin gzhu dang pa sangs 'chi/
166a4(rgyud): gro zhan tshes bdun zla ba dang //zla ba rgyal dang chu srin la nAr med//khrums stong khrums slad bcu gsum pa//zla ba man gri bum pas mdzad//tha skar brgyad pa nam gru dang //spen pa dang ni nya la
166a5(rgyud): 'chi//sems can kun gyi skye ba'i rtsis//dus smra bas ni shes par bya//sa bon gcig las skyes yon tan//gnyis pa skye ba'i dus kyis so//rigs gnyi su ni shes byas nas//de'i
166a6(rgyud): dus skye rtsis brtsam par bya//sngon las rnam pa sna tshogs kyis//mkhas pas de'i rigasu skyo'o//de'i 'bras bu shes bya ste//mtshan nyid kyis ni rje su gnas//rA si sogs
166a7(rgyud): 'khor 'brel pa de//rnam shes kun gyi mtshan nyid do//'od dpag med kyi rab sbyor bas//dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgom par bya//dbus su 'od dpag med mgon po//lhag
166b1(rgyud): /mar ma pa 'gram sogs so//don rnam shes skye gsal bar//lus kyu 'bras bur ded+hAn bya//thams cad bad bkun sgyur las//de gnyis med la brten pa'i//yad dpag med kyi sbyar
166b2(rgyud): ldan pa//bcom ldan ston pas 'di gsungs so//zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa drug pa'o//rdo rje 'od kyi rab sbyor bso//ye shes de kho nyid bshad bya//lha mos skur yang mchod byas
166b3(rgyud): nas//de kho na nyid ye shes zhus//sems can rnams kyi rnam nges pas//'chi ba'i mtshan nyid gang 'dra ba//de 'dra bdag gis bshad bya yis//rtse gcig pa yi yid kyis nyon//lus
166b4(rgyud): lardza rnams mtshan ma ni//de rnams ji ltar gsal bar dbye//rtsa chen sum cu rtsa gnyis te//de rnams kyi ni gtsa ba mtshad//bcu gnyis de bzhin du lha mo//dbyangs rnams bgrod pa'i mtshan
166b5(rgyud): nyid de//dkar po nag po'i phyogs kyis ni//nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru ni brjod//der ni rnying pa dgu po mchog/lus kyi mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid do//gang gis shes po tsam gyis ni//'chi ba'i dus
166b6(rgyud): lta bur gnaso//dbugs ni rnam par spros tsam gyis//lus can 'phro ba drug gnyis na//sA dA ro hi ti li char//de yi rtags ni mtshon par bya//sna dang mig gi phyogs dang ni//'gram pa
166b7(rgyud): dang ni rna ba'i rtsar//lce dang mchi ba'i mtshams dang ni//mgrin pa rtsib logs de bzhin du//snying gi gur dang lte ba dang //brla dang byin pa de bzhin gzhan//'doms dang ling gdag de bzhin//
167a1(rgyud): mgu bo dang na skye da'i phyogs//mtshams ni de rnams thams cad du//dbugs ni 'chad cing 'chad pa'o//lus kyi mtshan ma dgu rnams te//'chi ba'i dus ni bstun
167a2(rgyud): pa yin//nyi ma'i tshad kyi grangs rnams ni//'khor lo dus bdag nyid can dga'//gang tshe nyi ma drug rnams zhon//gcig brjod pa ni rgyan pa yin//der ni lo gsum 'gyur can te//
167a3(rgyud): sum cu drug cu rnams de bzhin//cha shas de ltar gyi ni tsha de//mdor bsdus pa yis bshad par bya//nyi ma bdun ni yongs thob nas//gang tshe rlung ni 'bab pa na//lo gnyis yang dag brjod
167a4(rgyud): pa dang //dus kyi grangs can zla ba dang //nyi ma rnams ni bco brgyad kyi//gang zhig tshad du yang dag brjod//zhag brgyad rnamasu yongs gtong bas//rlung ni gang tshe 'bab pa na//lo gnyi su
167a5(rgyud): ni yongs bshad par//de yi 'tsho ba yi ni grangs//nges par de'i tshe 'chi ba ni//de yi zla ba rig byed grangs//nyi ma nyi shu rtsa bzhir bshad//'tsho ba yi ni dus grangaso//lha mo nyi ma
167a6(rgyud): dgur 'bab na//lo gnyi su ni de 'tsho ste//zla gnyis nyi ma nyi ma yi//tshad ni sbyor ba'i lus can no//lha mo nyi ma bcu rnams kyis//lo gnyi su ni de 'tsho'o//nyi ma bcu gcig de
167a7(rgyud): bzhin du//gang che rtsa ni rab 'jug na//lo gcig gi ni lam bcas pas//zla ba yang ni dgu'i grangs kyis//nyi ma bco brgyad rab tu bshad//the tshom med par bshad pa'o//
167b1(rgyud): na bcug tus pa 'grub pas//mag ts+tshag/no ga /grags//zlab na brangs nan//marnas sa nas pa///bdu ga mdun dang can//gas su 'dod par 'a'adu //
167b2(rgyud): lan yang dag bshad pa ste//zla ba yang ni rig bye grag/nyi ma rnams ni dgu'i klu stan//'chi ba'i mtshan nyid pa/dpa'o//mgang tshe bdun gnyis//rtag tu d+d+hon bab ban//lon
167b3(rgyud): ru yang dag bshad//zla ba'i tshur ni yang dag glags//nyim rnams ni bcu gnyis te//de yi 'tsho ba'i tshad yin no//gang tshe bcwo lnga nyi mar ni//rlung ni de bzhin 'ab bi pan+da//de ci 'che
167b4(rgyud): shes bya ba//lo gcig na ni the tshom med//nyi ma mchog ni phan pa yi//gang tshe brgyad gnyi su 'bab na//'tsho ba zla ba bcu dang ni//nyi ma rnams ni mchog grangs kyi//nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i nyin
167b5(rgyud): rnams kyi//tshad du bdag gis bshad du'o//nyi ma rna ma ni bcu bdun du//nges par gang na chung 'bachen//de tse tshod kyi ni//zla ba rnams ni dathA da do//nyi ma bco brgyad na de bzhin/
167b6(rgyud): 'chi ba'i dus la rje tshe mi med//nyi ma bco brgyad rgyu ba yis//zla ba yang ni brkyang na dang //nyi ma rnams kyang nyi ma'i grangs//dus kyi grangs ni bshad pa'o//gang tsheg cig dman nyi shud ni//
167b7(rgyud): dril zhon po spyod pa na//nyi ma yang dag bshad bya 'o//'tsho ba zla ba bdun dang ni//nyi ma rnams ni dus grangs bshad//dus 'di rnams kyis mchog gdong can//gang tshe nyi shu du ni spyod//
168a1(rgyud): /drug na tshe dang 'bral//sa nyi shu bc-ig rnamasu//na ma rab 'baban//zla brdza ru yongs rgya b+ha//nyi ma rnams ni nyi ma'i grangs//nyi shu rtsa gnyis gang tshe 'dag
168a2(rgyud): zla ba'i rig na tshe 'gro//nyi ma rnams ni nyi shu bzhi//zla ba rig byed du bshad de//lha mo gang tshe nyi shu gsum//rlung ni rgyun tu 'bab pa na//de ni zla ba bzhir 'tsho ste//nyi ma dus rnams dran bya//
168a3(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa bzhir rab 'bab pas//zla ba gsum du bshad pa ste//nyin bcu gcig na de bzhin du//'chi ba'i dus rnam par brjod//dus kyi grangs ni mdor sdus nas//gong du sngon du bshad
168a4(rgyud): de'i phyir//bar gyi nyi ma ma bshad gang /bcu gnyis nyid kyi grangs kyis ni//cha yi rim pas de sbyangs nas//bar gyi gsal bar byas pa yin//blo dman rnams kyis rtogs don du//dus
168a5(rgyud): 'di rnams ni rab tu bstan//rnal 'byor ma rnams shin phra mo'i//'thun ma dus ni bdag gis bshad//lha mo de rnams kyis yid chos//khams ni mnyam pa can du 'gro/sna yi sha ni rnam
168a6(rgyud): chad cing //steng bltas ma ni de bzhin 'bab//de yi 'tsho bar shes byas pa//nyi ma bdun na the tshom med//mig gi gos ni yang dag chad//gyen khwa bltas ma mchog de bzhin//cha shas
168a7(rgyud): dbul yang dgra zhon//lngas sgeg pan 'chad de bzhin//go dA ba rtsa 'khur ba yi//de gu steng du 'gro ba po//nyim bcu ru shes bya ste//nub gcig gis lhag de banano//rna ba g.yas pa yo
168b1(rgyud): rten nas//bzang mo steng du yang dag rten//bcu gcig cha shas la zhon te//'chad pa bco brgyad na de bzhin//bcu gnyis de bzhin du lha mo//lce la ri mo nag po can//lus can kun gyi 'chi ba ni//
168b2(rgyud): nam zla'i mtshan mos shes par bya//bcu gsum so yi bar du ni//gdong nag po ni reg de bzhin//nam zla'i grangs kyi nyi rnams kyis//'byung po rnams kyi bgrod pa yin//rgyun tu mchi ma 'bab
168b3(rgyud): gang rtse//steng bltas mar ni rab tu grags//bcu bzhi pa yi dbyangs la zhon//bcu phyed kyis ni the tshom med//snying ka'i gzeb ni zhom pa dang //steng du lha ma de mchog ma//gsum dang lnga ru
168b4(rgyud): mdzes lha mo//zla ba phyed du the tshom med//lte ba'i dbus su son lha mo//bcu drug cha bdag can yongs rdzogs//sen so'i khrag med de bzhin zhag/nyon rnams bcu ru the tshom za//bcu bdun pa
168b5(rgyud): yi rtsa yang ni//brla yi steng du bskams pa ni//nyi shu rtsa bzhir yang dag grags//nyin gzhan nyin la the tshom med//byin pa zung gi gang zhig rtsa//steng du bltas ma de bzhin mchog/bco brgyad
168b6(rgyud): pa ru shes bya ste//nyi ma rnams kyang nyi grangs kyis//gcig gis dman pa'i nyi shu 'doms//'chi ba'o steng du kha bltas mchog/mnyam pas 'chad par 'gyur ba la//'di yis 'tsho ba the
168b7(rgyud): chom med//mtshan mar rol ldan mar grags ma//steng bgrod mchog gi dbang phyug ma//bcu gnyi su ni yang dag grags//nyin rnams dus tshod the tshom za//bar gyi nyi ma gang bshad pa/
169a1(rgyud): bcu banyis nyidra la the tshom med//lo l-I rim+ba pas de sbyangs nas//bdun cu rtswa gnyis pa las ni//drug dang sum cu bco brgyad bcu//'di na zla bas rim ji ltar//shes bya
169a2(rgyud): ltar lha chen mo//rim gyi rim gyis dbye ba'o//lhag ma nyid ni bsdus 'gyur bar//mtsho ba yir ni shes par bya//yang dag cheg 'di rnams kyis//rdo rje 'od ni bsgom par bya//rab tu sbyor
169a3(rgyud): pas sog bkang bas//sangs rgyas lus la 'chi ba smos//rab tu sbyor ba 'di brten nas//mdor bsdus pa yis 'chad par 'gyur//rdo rje'i lam nas son pa'i srog/snrel ma bcu
169a4(rgyud): gnyis mthar bar du'o//sangs rgyas rjesu dran sbyor bas//'dod pa lnga can la za 'gyur//gsang sngags chen po'i 'di la ni//gnas nas kun tu bgrod par bya//sgyu ma'i bdag nyid 'tshe med
169a5(rgyud): 'gyur//rnam pa dri za'i rig can no//rtsa yi kun nas 'gengs bzhin pa//dngos po kun la gnas pa yin//skye bo kun gyi khams rnams ni//ye shes rnam par 'thob par byed//chos
169a6(rgyud): bdag med pa 'jig par 'gyur//gang zag rnams la rgod par 'gyur//gnyis ka sgyu ma chen po ste//snying rje'i dbang gis bzhugs pa yin//mthar thug pa yi sbyor bas sems//mtshams/
169a7(rgyud): rnams kun tu 'chi ba yin//'chi ba chen po sangs rgyas gzugs//rnal 'byor rnams la bde ster byed//dkyil 'khor thams cad bzung ba yis//thams cad bde ba'i bdag nyid 'gyur/
169b1(rgyud): 'khor lo'i rim pa'i rab sbyor bas//bde ba dam pa yang dag myang //rdo rje 'od ni bsgom par bya//bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs mtshungs ma//lha ni mngon rtogs gzugs can tre//shes rab
169b2(rgyud): thabs kyi bdag nyid can//srog kun yang dag sbyor ba las//mchog tu zag med bzhugaso ldan pa//de bzhin gshegs pa dus 'khor grags//bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsung so//zhes
169b3(rgyud): bya ba 'di rab tu byed pa bdun pa'o///de nas phyag na rdo rje sogs//byang sems de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis//mchod pa byas shing phyag byas te//'di skad du ni gsol ba'o//gtso ba lta
169b4(rgyud): rnams sgrub thabs dang //de rnams rang sngags bdag la gsungs//gang gi thams cad dbang gyur pa//gang gis rab sbyor nyid kyis lags//lha la sogs pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs//rdo rje sku ya
169b5(rgyud): rgyal po nyin//gang gis yang dag che ga yis//myur du dngas grub rab tu 'jug/dkyil 'khor bro ba byas nas ni//sku bsgom bya ba 'dir bshad de//de la ma me lha rnams dang //pho nya 'byung ba
169b6(rgyud): gza' de bzhin//lus srul po ni chen po dang //rigs pa'i gsang sngags 'dir brjod bya//dbus mau yin nang gnas pa//srid pa dag pas bsgrubs pa yin//dus thams cad du bskyed pa ni//
169b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du ni rab 'bab can//ma mo dbang chen bsgrub bya dang //lha ni chu yi dkyil 'khor du//'byung po me la bsgrub bya ba//gza' ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor la//lus srul po ni ni mkha'
170a1(rgyud): hA//do smra yi ba ba d+ha//ye shes dky-i la rdzu yis ni//a b+hAr+g+hA d+hI thubapa pa yin//d+hAl 'khor rnams sbyin //de sa su ga shegs pa d+ma///
170a2(rgyud): deb nas nas na phyi la du//ras pr-I si la sogs dkyil 'khor dgod//nag pa'i brgyad dang bcu Sh+T+rI9/'byung pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya//'dum 'dreg pa zlas pas d+hA
170a3(rgyud): ste ngas mdun ldan sumadug/rangs pan pam de bzhin na ni du dag/dang po nyid du sa/sa ma de gan pa//gnyis pa'i dum bur dang po dang//shi
170a4(rgyud): hU~M lus de nA dang //yi dwags dacing dang me stan can//bden bral dang ni d+d+hi de bzhin//dum bu gsum par dgod byag//nyi ma zla ba mi g+h+ra myur dang //gza lhag pur bri bsangasu dang/
170a5(rgyud): na pa dang na na hU~M//'azhi par changs khyab 'jug de bzhin//dag pa gzhin nu des par sbyor//sa drong rgyu dang me dang rlung //'byung ba chen po'i khams rnams dang //mthu 'grom
170a6(rgyud): ma dang //ma~M ba~M dz+haiM khyab bdag de bzhin//'byung po 'byung ba'i gzugs kyis ni//rtag tu cho ga bzhin pasgrub bya//dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba yis//kun nas phyi yi dkyil 'kho
170a7(rgyud): ma sum bskor dbus byin pas//brtul zhugs can gyis mdzes par bya//pad+ma mad pa brgyad bri bar bya//lci bzab pa'i spyod yul ngan//de yi dbus su rdo rje sgo//zhal gcig pa ma/
170b1(rgyud): byug phan pa//cung zad mtsho ba gtsigs pa mo//bad+mad pa nalal khro dang bcas//bdag sngon pa drug tshon po//thod pa'i phreng bas rnapa par brgyan//nyi mar gAr mdzad rol bzhugs//
170b2(rgyud): sum cu pa rnams 'jig par byed//stag gi pags pa'i ni bza' 'dzin//bzang po'i gzugs can spyan gsum pa//thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin//tsang te'u gri gug gis ni brgyan//shar dang
170b3(rgyud): dang nu bo da nga ni//byang du rim po lta bas//mang 'grogs pa dz+ra nyi ma//'jib ma dang ni mar ma'o//de ltar rdo rje sku yi na//mdor bsdus pa yis brjod par bya//lte bar rdo rje rnam par
170b4(rgyud): 'byung//ji nya dang ba drug brjod pa'i//snying khrugasang ba mgri na pa rnga//de nyid rnam pa skur dgang bya//de nus skyeg na 'dzin bzhin pas//bsam tan sems te gzhan gyis min//sgra rdzas
170b5(rgyud): zer bskyed par 'gyur//dkyil la ba rnams dang sus m+b+has//las da pa mi sbyor ba yos//blugs bcu rnam par spro bar 'gyur// yig las byung ba'i snam//phag mi bya/
170b6(rgyud): ni bzhi pa ste//gzhu dang mnga' nyid de bzhin du//rgyal mtshan dang ni thod pa nyid//kha dog sngon po drug chen mo//phag gi midod can 'dzegs rlung ma'o//bed yig gis bris zhib mo//kha dog
170b7(rgyud): dmar mo 'di chen mo//thod pa dang na lcags kyu nyid//khadz+haiM Dam ru de bzhin//oM yi ges gzhon nu ma//kha dog ser ma phyag bzhim//rtse gsum pa dang bden gsum//gzhung
171a1(rgyud): mnga' nyid de bzhin no//6 yi yi ges nA murti//kha dog nub mo phyag bzhim//khaT+wA~M gtad thod pa dang //cang ti'u nga skad de bzhin no//oM yig las ni tshangs pa mo//
171a2(rgyud): dog dkar mo phyag bzhi ma//pad+ma nyid dang thod pa dang //gzhu dang mda' ni de bzhin mchog/ yi gi las ni tshogs dbang mo//kha dog lding ku phyag bzhi ma//rtse gsum pa dang thod pa dang /
171a3(rgyud): bgrang phreng dang ni la tu'o//bA yi ge las ni khyab 'jug ma//kha dog sngon mo phyag bzhi pa//'khor lo dang ni thod pa dang //zhags pa ral gri de bzhin mchog/I yig las byung ba dbang mo//
171a4(rgyud): kha dog ser mo phyag bzhi ma//rdo rje mdung thung thod pa dang //bsdigs mdzub bcas zhag de bzhin ni//thams cad 'bar bzhin gyen brdzes sku//sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/
171a5(rgyud): /rol zhon ma spyan gsum ma//rked par stag gi lpags pa dkris//shar sgor tshangs pa bri bya ba//kha dog dkar po phyag bzhi pa//thod pa dang ni bgrang phreng dang //spyi blugs pad+ma de bzhin no/
171a6(rgyud): byang du de bzhin khyab 'jug ni/kha dog nag po phyag bzhi pa//ral gri de bzhin 'khor lo dang //thod pa dbyug pa de bzhin no//lho ru drag po bri bya ste//du ba'i mdog can phyag bzhi pa/
171a7(rgyud): rtsi gsum thod pa de bzhin du//zhags pa phreng ba 'dzin de bzhin//nub tu gzhon nu bri bar bya//kha dog ser po phyag bzhi pa//dpa' bo mdung thung dbyug pa 'dzin//thod pa'i bgrang phreng
171b1(rgyud): 'dzin de 'dzin//dbang ldan khyu mchog la zhon pa//kha dog dkar po phyag bzhi ste//thod pa dang ni rtse gsum 'dzin//phyag gzhan thal mo sbyar ba'o//dbang po glang po la zhon pa//kha dog ser po phyag
171b2(rgyud): bzhi ste//rdo rje dang ni thod pa dang //thal mo sbyar ba byas pa mchog/mi ru lug la zhon pa ni//kha dog dmar po phyag bzhi pa//me yi thab dang thod pa dang //skrag nas de bzhin lag thal sbyar/
171b3(rgyud): gshin rjer ma he la zhon pa//kha dog nag po phyag bzhi pa//dbyug pa de bzhin thod pa dang //kun tu skra gnas thal sbyor 'dzin//bden bral mi la zhon pa ste//kha dog sngo sku phyag bzhi pa//rol gri dang
171b4(rgyud): ni thod pa 'dzin//kun nas skrag pas thal sbyor mchog/chu lhar chu srin la zhon pa//kha dog dkar po phyag bzhi ste//zhags pa de bzhin thod pa dang //thal mo sbyar ba de bzhin gzhan//rlung du ri
171b5(rgyud): dgas la zhon pa//du ba'i mdog can phyag bzhi ste//ba dan dang ni thod pa dang //de bzhin thal sbyar 'dzin pa mchog/lus ngan du ni gter la zhon//kha dog ser po phyag bzhi pa//rin po che dang thod
171b6(rgyud): pa 'dzin//thal sbyar byas pa'o de bzhin gzhan//thams cad rgyu skar dang ni gza'//rang dkyil 'khor la gnas pa sgom//rang gi dam tshig las byung ba//de rnams rdzu 'phrul ldan stobs che//ma
171b7(rgyud): mo rnams dang kun gyi me//'byung po rigs ma de bzhin gzhan//de lta'i cho ga'i bya ba yis//de phyir re re sgrub par bya//dur khrod la sogs gnas rnam su//sna tshogs dam tshigs za rnams kyis
172a1(rgyud): nal 'byo ngas spyod d+hAn dga' la//bany+dza'aM AnAM yang dag brtsam//zla ba 'i chog pIl//da rje sems dpa' 'byung bzhin no//sngags kyi rgyal pos bskul ba yis/
172a2(rgyud): de thams cad ni bran bzhin byed//gnas sogs nyi shu m+b+ha bani du//de phyir rim pas mchod par bya//de nas dri sags dbul bya zhing //sngags kyi bzlas pa yang bya ste//rang ming brjod pa
172a3(rgyud): gsang sngags la//mo d+d+ho phaT sogs nang bcug pa'o//dbu su bcom ldan 'das brdzes nas//der ni thams cad bsgrub par bya//de nis gzhan brjes pa'i nang du//bcom ldan 'das
172a4(rgyud): /gzhan gyi gzugs can to//ba dan gsum pa 'bar ba dang //rdo rje thod pa rdul can mchog/gzhu dang mda' ni 'dzin pa nyid//g.yos dang g.yon pa'i phyag gis 'phyar//lhag ma sngon gi
172a5(rgyud): gzugs can te//lus dang zhal sogs sngon gyi don//nges par dbus ma'i rnal 'byor gyis//'grub 'gyur 'dri la the tshom med//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje bdag/thams cad lus
172a6(rgyud): kyi rang bzhin can//gzugs thams cad kyi nang bzhugs pa//bcom ldan gzugs kyi 'di gsungaso//zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa brgyad pa'o//de nas 'dir ni bde rgyal po//rnal 'byor
172a7(rgyud): ma yis sad mdzad nas//ngag 'di yis ni 'dri bar mdzad/blo gros chen po dus ci lags//kye rnal 'byor ma rnams khyed nyid dus//myu gu can gyis skyes pa'o//sna tshogs bon
172b1(rgyud): sems nan+da hU~M//myu gargan b+h+yo sgyung bas pashad//gaH'ad sgyu skur rjes spangs na//sems kyi dus su ma ngon par brjod//gzugs med grangs ni de yi dus//rnal 'byur rnams kyi bde 'a /
172b2(rgyud): rgyu//'jig rten gyi ni dus tsam du//thub pa skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs//de rje myu gu can bsgom pa//sa d+hi nA sa ngan gyi mtshan nyid//myu gu sems kyi gzunas can te//sems
172b3(rgyud): las byung ba myu gu can//rgyu skar rA si bza' sogs pas//gang zhig du ni myu gu skyes//de yis myu gu can nges byas/Sha tI rang bzhin du sbyang bya//dge bo 'am ni mi dge kun//tshes grangs rgyu skar
172b4(rgyud): gza' 'cha ba//de rnams thams cad dus rnams//thams cad bde bdag nyid skyes sgom//ro tra ma ni rnyed byed pa'o//ma b+hi ma nad 'joms pas spangs//ku swa A dus spyod gzugs te//chos
172b5(rgyud): grangs de ni yangasu spangs//mo bum bzang dang bkra shiso//ra bu A 'joms par byed pa'o//b+ha bu b+he dus kyi gzugs kyis so//b+ha pU gu rnyed pa byed pa po//me gu d+ha nai ra la sogs par mdzad//tra
172b6(rgyud): gu ya dus kyis gzugs ca no//bri shu pU dge ba rnams byed do//b+hi shu pU nad dang 'joms pa yin//b+h+rUM b+ha shu gshin rje'i mche can// ma kri grogs dang bsod nams 'thob//byA ma A gdung
172b7(rgyud): byed pa po//pU ra ma 'chi ba'i dus can no//me'i gdan du mi ki ra//slar yang gshin rjer raN+Da spang //srin por bco lnga pa nyid dang //khyu mchog chu lhar spang bar bya//sems g.yengs rab tu 'joms
173a1(rgyud): nyid du//te du mamam can da zhan//bzangs pam/gsum pa nyid du/'byung ba 'aM pa shar do zhon//zla da na nyis gas nas/de rnams ram ma
173a2(rgyud): bshad bya//bzang po lugyis mo de bzhin//sems gsungs 'byung po'i nyi mar gnas//spyi kun gyi ma yin// yi shes par bya//rgya mchogs gang nyid dang //sbrul ma ban
173a3(rgyud): pa de bzhin//zla ba rgyu bar yang dag grags//rim pa 'di rnams rnam par brjod//nya lA me dro yang dag gnas//stong la drung gi gnas bu'o//de ltar de'i dbus gnas pa'i//phyog su dadre/
173a4(rgyud): byed yang dag gnas//zla ba nyi la swA p+na ri mo//mnyam par lta bas mnyam par 'gro//zhi dang sdig pa bltas pa yis//shes rab can gyis des de spungs//mche ba dang 'phrang mo bltas
173a5(rgyud): pas//bden par 'chi bar byed pa yin//dus smra ba ni mdor bsdus pa//rA dwa'i rgyu bar grags pa yin//dkar dang gcig shos cho ga yis//blo gros mthar thug byas shes 'gyur//
173a6(rgyud): rgyu skar sogs dang ma mthun por//rmongs pa gang zhig smra bar byed//skye bo rang gis byas pa yi//las 'di shes par ma gyur to//las de yis ni dus rnams ni//the tshom med par
173a7(rgyud): bair 'gyur//lus kyi tshogs pa ji srid pa//de srid du ni dus rab 'jug/rnal 'byor pa rnams nyam su myong //yang dag byang chub gnas 'thob 'gyur//de ni myu gu can du grags/
173b1(rgyud): da ya bar ldan ga//su sum ga ga snun//'ar bar gnas pa sgyu//dbar ba nang mar pa//gzugs de lta rdzas n+d+ha gzugs//s+yo shrIs na
173b2(rgyud): bsgoms las//la sa rnams thams cad mthong mi 'gyur//thams cad bdag nyid sbyor chen las//sngon yus rnam par 'joms mdzad pa//rgyu rnamasu ni rtag bzhugs pa'i//rdo rje rgyu mos 'ang
173b3(rgyud): gsungs//zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa dgu pa'o//de das de rje'i gar byas nas//rnal 'byor mas 'dri dris so//ji ltar ston pa sems dpa' tshe//las dang 'phel pas 'byung bar 'gyur//
173b4(rgyud): sbyin no las ni rnam nyams pas//rgyu ni nyams pas na 'od meng pa//'di la bdag ni n+ya ma moches//snying rje mnyes ka shin pas bka' stsal//sems can chen po'i 'byung ba yang /
173b5(rgyud): kyi sangs rgyas rnams gsungs pa/mdor bsdus pa yis bshad bya yis//khyod ni yid gcig pa yis nyon//rdo rje la pa can sbya bas//las kyi rlung du sgrub par 'gyur//
173b6(rgyud): sbyang ba yi//de ni rlung 'byung du gan so//shin tu dang pa la gnas pas//dbang po thams cad 'dra bar bya//dro ya la bas rtag 'jig rten//rnal pa'i meng ge sa 'tshong pa yin//dga' bkun
173b7(rgyud): yis khyad 'a byed pa'o//rdo rje'i sku khyod 'thob par 'gyur//dbyer bag chags thams cad dang //dge pa'i las las zad par 'gyur//skye ba chen po de 'byung ba//gcig nyid la ma
174a1(rgyud): 'thob par 'gyur//rtog pa med las rtog par 'gyur//rtog pa yis ni rtog med 'byung //dril bu'i sgra ni tho Ta byas nas//de rnams mtshan nyid bshad
174a2(rgyud): bar bya//rtse dag rtse mo gcig pa dang //rtse lnga rtse mo gsum pa can//de ltar la sogs dril bu che//rtse mo stong gi bar du'o//sgra brjod pa yis dngos po yis//spros pa med cing ye ga
174a3(rgyud): med//rnal 'byor pa yis mkha' gro rgya mtsho dge/de yi sgra las rtog pa yang dag byung //de nyid kyis ni rtog pa med pa'i bdag/gnas rnams gang la nges par zhugs pa yin//sngon bshad
174a4(rgyud): rtse can de rdo rje//gang du yid ni rnam 'phro ba//chos dang sprul pa'i ris sku can//de nyid du ni gaskor bar bya//phyi'i dral bu'i mtshan nyid ni//dpa' bos gsungs pa bshad par bya//dril bu
174a5(rgyud): rtag tu cha gsum can//lha yis yang dag rgyan par byas//re re yi ni lha'i bdag po//ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor du ji ltar//rnal 'byor rnams kyis lhag mos pas//de bzhin thams
174a6(rgyud): cad zhal bya'o//lha mo de rnams kyi ni gdan//dril bu de la pad sogs bya//ji ltar de rnams kyi ni rkyen//de bzhin dril bu'i ska rags//lce ni sgo dang grwa rnamasu//phyogs brgyad rnamasu bya ba
174a7(rgyud): nyid//ji ltar rnal 'byor pa'i mtshon bya//de rnams zhal nas rtse mo mthon//bum pa sogs dang zhal gnyis la'ang //steng du rang rigs mtshan ma can//'od 'dra ba yi dril bu che//
174b1(rgyud): rmad na gzhan nu shad da//donan //gzugs ldan pang //nga byung smad dang sa rgyan \u0f7f/tu 'a ga zugs khyab bdang tshe//dzar+b+hu dang rmAnyas par bya//de lta la na snang ba las//
174b2(rgyud): sems can thams cad bsgrub par bya//ral can dril bur yang dag grags//rdo rdo rdo rjer brjod par 'gyung //rdo rje la can bdag nyid kyis//dkyil 'khor du ni yang bsgom par bya//rnal 'gyur
174b3(rgyud): ma dang mkha' 'gro kun//de tshe nang du mingon par gzhug/thams cad gnyis pa yongs sbyor las//rdo rje la pa can byung ba//rdo rje dril bu yang dag brten//bcom ldan dpa' bos 'od gsung //zhes
174b4(rgyud): bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu pa'o//de nas gzhan gi sbyor ba che//dpa' bo chen po'i rab sbyor bas//bdag gis mngon sum du bshad kyis//rnam 'byor ma khyen mnyan par gyis//lus can
174b5(rgyud): kun gyi lus gang la//gang na ni stong phrag gnas pa ste//de rnams la yig dgod pa ni//kau sogs hA yig mthar de bzhin//yin tan la sogs dbyangs rnams yig/kham ste re re la yi gen rmA/
174b6(rgyud): slar yang phyi mo bcu gnyis kyis//mkhas pa rnams kyis dbye bar bya//gtum mo stong phrag bdag nyid can//mtshams kun du ni gnas pa 'baro//khams thams cad kyi de gnas las//
174b7(rgyud): dpa' po'i longs spyod thob par 'gyur//'od zer de rnams kyis bkug pa//byang chub sems dpa'i rigs chen po//bdag med pa la bdag tu bzhag/gnyis med chos 'byung nang du'o//
175a1(rgyud): du/deska snang phyug sbyin b+h+yo//da rlon bzlog d+ma gan sa//smyan rnams cad dang nyo bu'i yon//smras pa'o brgyad yon gsungs pa'o//phyong rnams kyi'ang nan
175a2(rgyud): bdag//de'i ming nyid du shes par bya//me tog 'bras sogs sde tshan gyi//dang po'i ming ni stong phrag can//de rnams kyi ni bcud len bsgrub//gzhan du 'bras bu med par 'gyur//
175a3(rgyud): lha'i rim pas rigs sogs kyi//ka sogs thams cad sman chen te//las smra ba yi rgyud gzhan du//der ni nges par gsel rigs bya//dang po'i mgon po rnams bsgoms nas//
175a4(rgyud): rtags rnams thob par bya ba yin//yang na grub rnal 'byor rnams kyis//bcud kyis len ni gang mthong ba//des kyang mthong ba tsam gyis ni//bla med dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur//
175a5(rgyud): sde tshan rnam pas yod sbyor las//bdud rtsi'i tshogs mtshams gzugs ldan pa'i//grub pa'i sman rnams rang bzhin can//bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungaso//zhes bya ba ni
175a6(rgyud): rab tu byed pa bcu gcig pa'o//de nas rnal 'byor ma dpa' bo//'dres pas mchod pa byas nAs nI//grong khyer gsum gyi nang byung ba//ston pa rdo rje che ci lags//gang gi gzugs kyis
175a7(rgyud): byon po lags//sprul pa gang du bzhud pa lags//chos nyan pa yi dus su yang //ci zhig gis ni brtan por byas//lha dang lha ma yin dang mi//ci yi ngag gis 'gro dang 'ong //mngon
175b1(rgyud): par tshogs mtshams mtshan nyid ni//sngon gying bzhin bshad du gsol//mngon par chog mtshams mtshan nyid ni//ji ltar rim pas bshad kyi nyon//shin tu zab mo'i don chen po//
175b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi snga ma shes//sems can rnams kyi rang snang can//bdag gi nges par mdor bsdus pas//rdo rje sems 'od gzhan nyid du//khams dang mtshan mar gnas
175b3(rgyud): min can/lus dang ngag sems dag pa yi//grong khyer gsum rnam su 'gyur ba'o//sngon gyi dngos por khyer nas 'ongs//nges par las chung par 'gro'o//yang na dus rnams thams cad
175b4(rgyud): du/ji ltar me long la bzhin mthong //sngon du nyan pa thob byas nas//sems kyang de yi gnas la'o//rdo rje la sogs ting 'dzin gyis//lha la sogs pa de rnams rmongs//de yis rdo rje hUM
175b5(rgyud): mdzad kyi//rab tu sbyor bas rtag tu sprul//rdo rje'i rtse mor 'jig rten sprul/'od zer lcags kyu spro ba ste//hUM yi ge'i sgo yis ni//ston pas 'khor lo can ston byas//chos 'byung khang
175b6(rgyud): bA brtsegs pa ru//nyi shu'i lhan cig skyes gdan du//ngag gi spyod pas mnyan par byed//der song nas no de la thim//de ltar rnal 'byor dbang po yi//slob dpon khyab bdag ches
175b7(rgyud): shes bya//rdo rje la sogs de'i ming nyid//de'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya//sems can kun la phan bdag nyid//mi 'jigs pa ni ster nyid dang /sngags dang rgyud kyis sbyor ba shes//
176a1(rgyud): sbyo ba 'apo dang N+Da la slebs//'thun pa'i ngag dang thams cad la//bu gcig pa ltar 'thun pa dang //gtong ba sogs la rtag tu dga'//bsam gtan tang
176a2(rgyud): 'dzin de mchog gzhol//ji ltar smras po de bzhin byed//'chi ba med cing bden pa'i dge/sems can kun la thugs brtse dang //lam du 'dzud pa de mthar phyir//kun mkhyen yon tan
176a3(rgyud): dang mnyam dang //bstan bcos kun gyi pha rol ston//mgon med rnams kyi pha dang ma//phyag rgya brda 'di byed pa 'o//de sogs yon tan rnams kyis gang //skye ba 'di la de bzhin ga
176a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma 'khor lo dbus su/rdo rje hUM mdzad sgom pa yin//dkyil 'khor byang chub sems kyi ste//bde ba'i rgyal po rnal 'byor ma//sgra rnamasu ni sgra yis shes//rdo rje hUM mdzad can
176a5(rgyud): khyab bdag/'phos pa'i lcug mar gyur ye shes//dang po'i mgon po'i rgyu yin ni//sems kyi nyam su myong ba ni//de phyir srin phra mo'i rang bzhin cani//sbyar shi'i khams yang dag
176a6(rgyud): grags//de nyid kyis ni khyer nas 'ongs//mthu 'gro rgya mtshor rta ga nges par//sa gsum de yi rang bzhin byas//de ltar sbyor ba mchog gcig/shing rtsi na gzhan na mogs
176a7(rgyud): bzhin//'di yis bgrod pa ma shes pas//byis pa mi shes pa yis bcings//mtha' yi bde ba gsung ba'o//bstan byi ston pa rdo rje 'chang //lhan cig skyes gzugs ston
176b1(rgyud): /bcom ldan ma shes kyis 'ad gsungs//zhes bya ba na rab tu byed pa bcu gnyis pa'o//de nas gang gis sgrub pa po//'grub pa'i bsam myed sbyor bshad bya//de ni shin bzang /
176b2(rgyud): rab sbyor bas//spyod dang rdul zhugs bshad par bya//lhun gyis grub 'gyur de'i spyod pa//dngos grub 'dod rnams kyis shes bya//phyi rol gnyis med sbyor ba dag nyid//spyod pa de ni rab tu
176b3(rgyud): bsngags//kun gyi bdag nyid yid bzang la//dbang po grong khyer yang dag rten//grong de rnamasu spyod pa yang //yid kyis brtul zhugs bstan par bya//srod dang zhi ba'i gzugs rnams kyang
176b4(rgyud): gang deng bdag nyid kyis 'gro bya//bdag nyid gzugs kyi rong bzhin can//yang dag mi long lo mthong 'gyur//zhu ba'i sems la brten byas nas//lus ni lus la thim par gyis//
176b5(rgyud): sdom par bdag nyid kyis bsdams pas//phyag rgya chen por yang dag grags//phyag rgya lta sogs lus la gnas//thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin//bdud rtsi lnga sogs pa za//lhan cig
176b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor mar la ldan//chags pa'i sems kyis sgom pa ste//me 'dod kyang ni de phyir 'gre/gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos blo yis//yid 'das ni gas pa med//'jigs med rnam
176b7(rgyud): sems kyi pa ni//mtshan ma du khrod sogs par 'gro/sa ga na gang du spyod pan//rnam shes brgyad du shes par bye//blo ldan spyod dang cul zhugs ni//de ba can du rten /
177a1(rgyud): /po'i sbyor bar yongs pan+da nas//phyi nus yod kyi tu ba shud//srog thams cang+ka ni mnyam sbyor byas//dbyu po'i grong khyer bde ba las//ye shrIs spyod
177a2(rgyud): pa'i brtul zhugs 'dzin//bcom ldan 'das kyi 'di gsungaso//zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu gsum pa'o//de nas skye bo'i rigs kyi ni//khyad par bshad kyis mnyan par gyis//rdo rje
177a3(rgyud): bzang po'i rab sbyor bas//de rigs 'dir ni nyams par 'gyur//de la dang po lnga dang bdun//brgyad dang bcu gsum bco lnga dang //bcu bdun dang ni nyi shu gnyis//nyi shu rtsa bdun
177a4(rgyud): de bzhin mchog/tha skur la sogs shes bya ste//lha rnams tshogasu dran par bya//bzhi pa dang ni sha ra ba gsum//gnyis pa dang ni drug de bzhin//byang phyogs pa rnams de
177a5(rgyud): bzhin gsum//mi yi tshog su dran par bya//gsum pa dang ni bcu nyid dang //dgu pa dang ni nyi shu gsum//bcu bzhi pa dang bcu drug pa//bco brgyad pa dang bcu dgu pa//nyi shu rtsa
177a6(rgyud): bzhi de glags pa//srin po'i rigasu dran par bya//ra rigs gsum dang brgyad pa dang //klu ni bzhi dang lta pa'o//drug pa nyi shu rtsa dgu pa//khyi yi dngos por bshad pa'o//bcu dang
177a7(rgyud): bcu gcig byi ba ste//byi lha de bzhin dgu pa'o//bcu bzhi pa dang bcu drug po//rtag tu de ltar brjod pa'o//bcu gnyis pa dang nyi shu lnga//khyu mchog gi ni rigs 'thob po//thog
177b1(rgyud): sa tha ma bong bu yi//rigasu do rnams rab tu grags//bAcu gsum pa drang btso lnga pa//dwe ni ma her mngon par brjod//thog ma dang nI nyi shu drug/rta yI rig su rab tu brjod//TI shu pa dang nyi shu/
177b2(rgyud): gnyis//spre'u zhes bya bar brjod pa'o//gnyis pa dang ni mtha' de bzhin//glang po yi ni rigasu 'gro//nyi shu gsum dang nyi shu bani//mo ste stobs ni che ba yin//nyi shu gcig pa sre mo ste//
177b3(rgyud): mdor bsdus pa yis rab tu bshad//stobs dang bdag byed pa'i rgyu skar//bshad kyis da lta mnyan par gyis//mi rnams sreg ni rgyu skar te//gzhan du rab tu 'thob pa yin//skar mer dus
177b4(rgyud): kyi rtswa son par//'dzin pa po ni nges par 'chi//lug drang srong dang kaurka Da//chu srin mthon po la dran bya//kIT bum seng khyu mchog ni//brtan pa'i bya bar rab tu gastan//nya dang 'khrig pa de
177b5(rgyud): bzhin 'dir//gzhu dang bu mo 'dren ma la'o//bla ma nyi ma se'i skyes bu//de ni spong rA tu zla bud myed//gze' lhag bkra shris mu ning ste//mkha' dkyil 'khor la gza' gang yin//de ltar
177b6(rgyud): rigs rnamaso gzhan du//byang chub sras po mi 'gyur ro//rdo rje bzang por de bshad de//rab sbyor rnams pa'i sems kyis ni//g.yon pa'i rtsa ru son pa'i sems//dbu ma'i tha ma'i sbyor
177b7(rgyud): bar ldan//byang chub so bon rnams 'bab pa//byang chub sems rnams kyi rig so//snying rjer son pa'i yid kyis ni//las kyi nyi ma mdzag pa yin/yang dag rab ster rtag tu ldan//
178a1(rgyud): rigs med rigs can kyang med do//srid par rtse mo tsam du ni//bsam gtan rnam pa'i lus son pa//me long gi ni yul la zugs//gang 'dra mthong ste de med do//
178a2(rgyud): de 'drar byang chub sems dpa' rnams//bsam gtan sbyor ba'i gzugs can no//de yi nang du zhu ba'i sems//de dang mnyam pa gzhan yod ni//nges par dkyil 'khor rnams dbus
178a3(rgyud): rdo rje bzang po bsgom par bya//shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yon//gsang sngags mchod pa sngon gyi can//dus dang dus min cha'i bdag nyid//dngos med ma yin byed por bzhugs//byang
178a4(rgyud): chub gzugs kyi bdag nyid che//bcom ldan sems dpas 'di gsungs//zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu bzhi pa'o//de nas gsang ba'i sbyor glang gis//bde kun bdag nyid du
178a5(rgyud): skyed bshad//don dam pa yi sbyor ba yis//de bzhin nyid du rab 'jug bya//'jigs byed chen po'i rnal 'byor gyis//sngags kyi phreng bar rang nyid byon//bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa nyid
178a6(rgyud): ni//sa rnam la ni rab tu bshod//'khor lo drug dbyi bras ra mo ni//sa yi dbus su bya ba yin//thams cad du ni gsang sngags tshig/bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bri bar bya//de rnams
178a7(rgyud): sngags kyi gzugs rnams ni//srog ni yi ge'i rnam pa can//yi ge'i cha rnams bzang po ni//spangs nas dbus ma'i gnas pa yin//stong par nges par thim byas nas//'og dang
178b1(rgyud): spyo du lta bar bya//d+ya ma pa nus man dUrla//nal 'gyur dang rgyu gang spyod byed//khams /narab tu zhugs pa la//sams spyod bAn+dan+naHg+has//de ltar gsang brtson nan
178b2(rgyud): 'i'i don can no//dbus mar rab tu zhugs pa yi//basbyin dang sgrub pa la stegs spyong ste//'ayod sku 'dzin ban pa yis ni//nyi ma dang zung med can//
178b3(rgyud): lAm nas sbyangs pa'i sems//ga phyeng ba rgyad pa'i rimi byas so//de ltad d+d+hi n+de'i bai zlasmra pa 'dir//d+hU ba'i sngags sdigs sh+ma mI g+ha rgyan//na blo kun gyi mig rnams/
178b4(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo 'grod par bya//ting 'dzin mgon po'i dpa' bo rnams//bcu gnyis rnams kyi'ang 'khor lor son//gang zhig gang gi ming ston gyis//de dang de yi gon su bya//gzhan
178b5(rgyud): gyi sngags kun 'dri rnams so//dkyil 'khor 'di ni 'byung bar 'gyur//sku la sogs pa'i bzlas kun dang //de bzhin dag sogs bzlas pa dun//sems sogs bzlos pa thams
178b6(rgyud): cad dadeng //de bzhin yis zla bzlas dz+nyAn//sngags kyi rgyal pos bsgral bye yis//de nas dpa'i zo so'i byung bar 'gyur//'jigs bying chen po dbus rnams//me yi gzugs can
178b7(rgyud): par bye//shes pa rigs kyi nus pa sas// byung po'i tshogs de kun spyodaH//ni bad na rgyas da nga //drag tha mas par byed yig//las deng rjes 'dzin gzugs bsgrums te/
179a1(rgyud): 'bar ba'i rnam pa sogs dgrong bya//'chib 'i nyid kyis//rnal 'byo nga ni ldan par 'gro//nAd nA dpa lam bya byed //thig la theg lar thim par bya//de ltar
179a2(rgyud): tshe ba'i bya ba yis//gsang sngags bzlas nas phur bus gda'//'di rnams sngags kyi gtso bo yas//rkang pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad de//oM hUM hUM phaT kyai yi ge mtha'//ji lta'i rim pas
179a3(rgyud): 'di kun la'o//na maHshrI badz+ra DA ka ma hA bI ra bI re shwa rA ya//tri b+hu wa na ga paH pA ba nA ya/diR+Yot+ta ta b+hI laN b+he ra bA ya/sha ta sa ta sra ne t+tA yau/bi Sh+yed dzi dA ya/kaM kA lam+bA lA b+hA rat+na ya/
179a4(rgyud): ko Te laMk+ShaM b+hA dzA ya/dzA lA bil+lI D+haM lI ga nA ya/pa ru pu pA sho d+yA ta shU lA la/kalpAn ted+d+ha mA gra ba pu ShA ya/pi kATA mu kha hA hA ra bA ya/mA tra gaM Na pa ri pU ra ta main+ta ya/se ha dza sun dwe ri br-iSh+ma/
179a5(rgyud): b+ha ke hA ma~M/kaihU~M hUM kA ron+te re Na mu khA yaM/ma hA sh+ma shAn pr-i yA ya/sarba b+hU ta saM trA saM na kai rA ya/mA hA ka l+yAn+d+ha g+ni ti dzA ya/dza Ta ka lA pa/ma ku TA ya/kha T+wAM ga ka pA la shU la b+hin na d+ha ri
179a6(rgyud): /me ta sa mu dr-i mi kha lA ya/bye g+h+ra tsarbA ma ba ri d+hA ro Ne/be tA la saM g+ha marda na ka rA ya/ma hA big+h+na ni bA re NAM/sha trA ne sum+ma ka rA ya/tra sa ha sr-i ma hA sA ha sr-i ka ro mA ba wAn+ta rba rtin sha
179a7(rgyud): ta sa ha sra mu khA ya/dz+nyA na sA ga ra pre b+hA ya/ma hA pe shi ta ru d+ha ro ba sa hA ri Ni Ne/sarba mA ra ba li d+hI sa te/sriSh+Ti sa tsI ra kA ra kA ya/sarba nA gA nI sho la Ne stam+b+ha ne bi dre ba d+hA ya an+ta
179b1(rgyud): mA la d+hA riH/su ma ru ka pi ta nA dA ya/kra d+ha bi gra ha d+hA ra NA ya/ma hAk+ShA sha ti lak+ShA ta ma ne/bud+d+ha kaT sa ha swak+ShANA nA ya/dA nA me ta bar+N+Ne bar+t+ta ya/sarba/rma pra bar+t+tanA yan+te/ban+d+han ka rA ya/sarbA
179b2(rgyud): bikal+le b+hany+dza na ka rA ya/mun+ta bi le lag+na sha rA rA ya/bai ra kr-i te yan+t+ra man+ta nA sha nA ya/ma hA rak+ShA ka~M rA ra/duSh+TA nA~M pa~M dA la ne/d+harmad ya ke rA ye/k+Sho sA ra swa ren+ta ye/in+da dza laM sarba satwa ta ma ne/
179b3(rgyud): gra sta bA da pre b+hA/da ma hA ma te//de lta la sogs gsang sngags gang //rab te mang ba rgya tshe'o//sna tshogs rnam pa dma'i ming //sems can ming gis shes par bya//sngags rnams thams
179b4(rgyud): cad mnyem sbyor bas//khams gsum rnamasu yongs gzhugs pa'i//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gco//bcom ldan sngags pas 'di gsung so//zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcwa lnga/
179b5(rgyud): pa'o//don sa mig la sogs dbang po//kun gyi mngon shas cho ga bshad//mig me bzang ga rab sbyor bas//rdo rje gsum ni rab bsgrub bya//gang du byang chub sems gnas pas
179b6(rgyud): de ni mig gis nges par lta//rnal 'byor rnams kyi zag me mchog/sems ni mig tu shes par bya//rtsa rnams kyini rab sbyor bas//sau darlung ni dbab por bya//gang nyid du ni skyes
179b7(rgyud): dus su//de yi dus su thim nas 'gro//de ni mngon shes meg rnams kyi//sems 'di yis ni 'gro bor 'gyur//skye 'gro'i nong du son pa'i gzugs//yid kyis sgra ni nyan pi re 'gyur//
180a1(rgyud): 'gro dang 'ong bu'i cho ga ni//lha rdzas dri ru rjes mtshon bya//lha rdzas ro yi rang sbyor bas//lce ni dga' ba dang bcas kyis//lce yi mngon shes la brten nas//dbu ma
180a2(rgyud): phonya skyes pa yin//lus kyi reg pa'i rnam pa yis//mchog tu zag med de bsgrub bya//sngon gyi bag chags dran pa la//de nyid rnal 'byor ldan par 'gro/nyin zhag mtshan mi mnyam
180a3(rgyud): byas nos//chu tshod drug cu nyid dang ni//chu'i srang drug cu tham paM dang //g+ha Ti ka ri yong sbyar bar bya//rgyar ni sor mo bcu gnyis la//dpong su sor brgyad nyid yin te//guny+dza drug
180a4(rgyud): baicu'i ched la ni//sor bcu gnyis pa'i thu ra ma'o//skad cig thang cig yud tsam dang //kASh+Ti mig btsums phye ba dang //se gol gtogs par shes bya ste/dbugs rgyu'i mngon
180a5(rgyud): par shes pas so//pha rol phyin drug tshul bdag gis//chos kyi dbyings ni mtshon par bya//dus dang dus min sel ba'o//mig mi bzang ba bsgom por bya//mtshon cha chen
180a6(rgyud): nyid rnal 'byor ma'i//dkyil 'khor nang du byas pa nyid//sems 'di sna tshogs gzugs tshon te//srog tshogs rnams kyis gar 'grod pa//bdag med rang bzhin 'thob par
180a7(rgyud): 'gyur//'dud pa rnams kyi phang pas gni so//gzugasu byed 'gyur de'i dngos po//mchog gi dang po bral mtha' can//chos kyi 'byung gnas gang gnas pa//rdo rje mkha'agror
180b1(rgyud): shos bya//thur sel lam la rtag rten nas/slar yang re re'i nang du ste//srog la sogs pa'i rlung lnga yis//mig ni lnga ru shes par bya//mdzag pa med pa'i sa bon 'dzag/ye shes
180b2(rgyud): mkha' go ma'i sbyor ldan//sa bon lnga rnams thig le yi//mngon shes byed po sogs lnga pa//de lha'i rnal 'byor mchog yongs rdzogs//rnal 'byor kun gyi mchog yin no//dngos po'i
180b3(rgyud): rang shes can ma lus//ring du yongasu spangs pa yin//thams cad lus su mnyam sbyor las//lhan cig skyes pa'i spyan 'jug pa//dngos kun dngos po med mdzad pa//bcom ldan mig
180b4(rgyud): gi 'di gsungs//zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu drug pa'o////de nas lha mos phyog byas nas//de bzhin mchod po tshan pa byas//stobs po che'i sbyin sreg ni//bdag po chen pos
180b5(rgyud): bstan du gsol//mkhasau pas rgyun tu nang bdag gi/sbyin sreg bshad kyis mnyan par gyis//stobs po che yi rab sbyor bas//khams rnams kun gyis dgang blug te/bde ba thab
180b6(rgyud): tu yang dag thob//nyi zla dgang gzur blug gzar ro//slob dpon gnyis med de med la//yang dag rig pa'i gzugasu sreg/sna tshogs mkha' gro rnams 'di med//gsang sngags
180b7(rgyud): rang bzhin mtshan nyid de//yab shing rtse ru yang dag grags//gang phyir sa li las skyes 'bras//tshe la ni rtag tu zhi zan yin//'di ru mar ni byang chub sems//khrag ni sbrang rtsir shes/
181a1(rgyud): bar bya//srogs sogs rlung rnams dur ba'o//gcan dang bshang ba dag de ltar//tsun dan dang ni gla rtsi'o//me tog rtag tu khrag tu grags//mchil ma
181a2(rgyud): lud pa 'bras thug yin//dung shing so sems can rus pa'o//mdor bsdus pa yis lpags pa gos//me yis thab kyi dbusu ni//sgra dang ba spu wA ru 'gyur//sna tshogs phra ma
181a3(rgyud): khams gzhan no//sna tshogs 'bru ste de la sregs//rim gyis mkha 'gro rdzogs son pa//mes gang ba'i sregs blug su shes bya//dbang po thams cad dgar byed de//de yi sa
181a4(rgyud): bag chags klu len+da no//sna tshogis sgra chen pos rol mo//snying rje sogs pas ston mo yin//srog rnams kun gyi bdag po yi//stobs po che ni bsgom par bya//lus tham
181a5(rgyud): cad pa'i sbyin sreg ni//des mnyes pa yis dngos grub 'gyur//'jig rten mchog gi khams kun tu//yid ni de ru yang drag rol//gang tshe'i dus su bde gyur pa//de'i dus su
181a6(rgyud): rab tu gnas//sbyin sreg nang bdag nyid mthong bas//rmod dang rjes 'dzin byed pa yin//'jig rten 'jig rten 'das ye shes//de rnam dbus mar thob par bya//'tshems//
181a7(rgyud): rnam kun tu khong khro bo//sems chen po ni bsod par 'gyur//rtog pas sprul pa'i sangs rgyas ni//de las byung ba bza' bar bya//mtshon bya mtshon byed rab bcom pas
181b1(rgyud): gnas dag shes par rnas pa yin+ta//rgyu ma'i bdag rnyed mtshan nyid na/de la rnam par byed par 'gyur//khamaldan yang drag snang ba las//pe shes gnyis byar med mtshan rnyeng /dra chu
181b2(rgyud): gzug su rtag bzhug pa'i//bcom ldan thab khung gis 'di gsung //zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu bdun pa'o//den rdo rje pad 'du ba//ji bzhin bshad kyi mnyan par gyis//rin
181b3(rgyud): /chetshen rdo rje'i rab sbyor bas//a ba d+hU ti tsan dngos grub//rnal 'byor ma la yang dog rol//don de ba yi nyams la gnas//de yi sbyor bas grol bar ni//gnyis med rgyu rnams kyis 'gyuraro//lus
181b4(rgyud): kyi nyam su myong bzhin pa/byis pa rnams kyi byang chub 'ong //ha yog drug dang ldan pa yi//sa bon rdo rje'i nor bur dgod//A ba d+hU tI'i rtsa la 'bab ste//steng du kha ltas dpral bar bsan/
181b5(rgyud): ba'i dus su blo ldan gyis//rang gis lug pos rdo rje bzung //byang chub sems la rten byed la//rgas dang 'chi ba dang bya yin//srin pa'i skyon las goms pa yis//srid gsum ngol
181b6(rgyud): rang bzhin 'gyur//las kyi phyag rgya'i rab sbyor bas//nyi ma ror bsgrib par bya//de'i dus su gang mthong ba//dngos po kun la ltung bar bya//'dod chags chen po'i tshul byedag nyid//rtug
181b7(rgyud): tu bdag nyid la'i byung 'gyur//rnal 'byor rgyud kyi rgyu'i don du//bstan bya ba ston pa por 'gyur//rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud kyi ni//sems can don ni nges par bya//sku bzhi po yi rnal 'byor
182a1(rgyud): gyis//bden man bdag gis bshad ma bya//rin chen rdo'i rang bzhin can//sbyor ba skyes ye shes gyen du bgrod//pho nya rnams kyig tso nyid bya//'dod chags ma
182a2(rgyud): yis dgyes par bya//byang chub sems ni rtag bzung ba//lho yis bya yis lag pas min//lha ni skyes 'phros pa'i mtshan nyid ni//mkha' lding phyag rgya nyid kyi gzung //phyag rgyu'i
182a3(rgyud): nyid du sbyin te//don sro gtung bar bya ba yin//stobs thams cad kyang bza' bar bya//sA li skye so sogs 'bad pas so//sbyin sreg kun kyang de nyid kyis//dbang la sogs pa
182a4(rgyud): gang gi byed//de de'i thod par bya ba ste//de nas sa bon 'dab par bya//de rnams rdzas kyi spang ba dang //gtor ma dang ni bsrung bar bya//de yis dacings pa tsam gyis ni//de dang
182a5(rgyud): 'dra ba'i gzungs 'jug 'gyuraro//ril bu'am ni skud pa ni//dpa' bo rang nyid kyis gsungs pa'o//b+ha ga'i dbus rnams bsgos pa'o//rin chen rdo rje can de slan//dkyil 'khor khams
182a6(rgyud): rnams kun gyi ste//spangs pa rab tu bstan pa yin//gang dang gang gi las kyi ni//de dang de'i ming can sngags//sa ben kun gyi yengs sbyor las//de ni rtag tu sman rnams te//
182a7(rgyud): bcom ldan las kyi phyag rgya ni//rtag tu 'ching bas 'di gsung so//zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bco brgyad pa'o//de nas 'khor ba'i mthor gnas pa'i//mkha'i gro'i mtshan nyid
182b1(rgyud): bshad par bya//rta mgrin gyi ni rab sbyor bas//po nya'i mtshan nyid bsgrub par bya//ha yig skye gnas dbus su te//ya yig mgo bor gnas pa'o//gri yig dbu ma'i pad+mar te//wa yi yi ge snying
182b2(rgyud): kha ru//rnal 'byor che la 'dzin bzhin pa//dbyangs can ma dang 'dra bar byed//rmongs pa nyid ni thams cad 'phrog/gang yin gzhung ni rjes 'jug 'gyur//mgrin par rtag tu tshogs bcad
182b3(rgyud): ni//mgrin pa ro ngag tu gnas pa nyid//tsho bo rta yi dbyibs 'drir ni//gnas pa rnal 'byor lhag ma yin//de yi sbyor bas 'gro 'gyur ba//sngon du me'i gdan du'o//nyid rdo rje sems dpa'
182b4(rgyud): ste//khams gsum por ni bskor bar 'gyur//ni mkhar nyi mas mdzes byas nas//byang chub yid kyis 'gro bar 'gyur//phyogs kyi 'khor lom lus rtogs//rnal 'byor ma yi
182b5(rgyud): chu skyes mchog/sems can kun gyi rmong se nyid dang //lam thong ba ni thams cad la//de nyid nyi ma rtag snang bar//mtshan mo'i mun pa drag po phrog/rnal 'byor ma 'khor dbus son
182b6(rgyud): paro//rta yi mgon po bsgoms pa yin//gang gi sangs rgya su 'gro ba//sgrub thabs yan lag 'char bar 'gyur//bgegs rnams nam par nyams 'gyu ro te//sprin la sogs
182b7(rgyud): pa'ang nyams par 'gyur//kun gyi sdig pa'ang 'phrog par byed//rang gi dga' ba shar mtshan nyid//mchod sbyin dus kyis 'jig rten du//thams cad skad cig la sgrub 'gyur//
183a1(rgyud): khams bdun rnam par bzung ba yis//de ches 'og dngos grub 'gyur//bdag med 'di rnams de lta mo//yan lag gcig gis rol bar byed//sngags kyi
183a2(rgyud): bzlas pa mi bya ste//sbyin sreg a ga sog de bzhin//ji ltar bde bas rtogs bya ste//rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'thob 'gyur//'dod chags kyi ni 'dod chags bsgre//me yis tshig la
183a3(rgyud): gdung bar bya//de bzhin 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags//bsten par gyur pas mi 'ching ngo //de nyid thab so yid kyi las//dge ba'i mtshan nyid can bya'o//nang du byed pa ma yin
183a4(rgyud): te//bus pa'i yid kyis dbu mar gnas//phyi rol ye shes can rnams kyi ye shes//de nyid sangs rgyas rdo rje 'ching ba sogs//sems can 'jig rten sogs 'byung ba//de
183a5(rgyud): rnams spangs pas sangs rgyas med//mu stegs can dang sangs rgyas par//kun tu dbye ba yod ma yin//lung thams cad ni 'gal ba ste//tshad ma pa rnams tho co can//thams
183a6(rgyud): cad tshig ni rnam shes pas//ye shes can rnams de'i phyi shes//mkha' gro thams cad mnyam sbyar las//nam mkha' rnamasu bzhugs pa yi//bcom ldan 'jig rten 'jig
183a7(rgyud): rten par//rtag tu zhugs pas 'di gsungs//zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu dgu pa'o//de nas rab tu 'joms yon tan//bshad kyis sgrub pa po rnams nyen//na mkha'i snying
183b1(rgyud): po'i sbyor ba yis//rdo rje rlung gi mtshan nyid do//'chags pa dang ni 'jig rnams//gang zhig stong pa de srog chag/khams rnams de 'drar shes bya ste//dul ba'i sbyor bar yang dag
183b2(rgyud): gnaso//zla ba'i gzugasu yongs grags pa'i//rang gi rang bzhin las skyes 'dzag/rnal 'byor lhag ma'i ye shes kyang //de ni rab 'joms la brjod do//dus thams cad du g.yo
183b3(rgyud): ba med//g.yo ba 'am 'dir na ma mthong ngo //de ni thams cad bdag nyid rlung //bsam pa thams cad rab 'jug pa'o//do lA d+har stsogs sbyar bas//rnal 'byor rnams kyi thi star
183b4(rgyud): bo//sgra dang thig ler de shes bya//'od gsal ba dang snang ba gsum//de phyir na mkha'i snying po yang //mkha 'gro'i sbyor rnams kyis shes bya//nang gi dbu ma'i sbyar ba yis//srog
183b5(rgyud): de'ang rab tu bsngags pa yin//de yang kun bzhi shes byi ste//me long du yang rab tu bshad//chos kyi sku la sogaso pa 'ang de//dmyal sogs 'gro ba de bzhin te//sangs rgyas
183b6(rgyud): byang chub sems rnams kyi//gnas ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro//zla ba'i lam du gang tshe mkha'//rnal 'byor rnams kyis lhag med 'pho//de'i dus rnam par bzhag med 'gyur//
183b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor byas pas bgrod bya min//na mkha'i khams rnams thams cad kyi//de yi snying por rab tu bstan//de dag shes rab thabs gnyis//gnas skabs kyang ni gnyis
184a1(rgyud): nyid do//sred pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyud//dbang po'i dbus su sbyar bar bya//sangs rgyas 'jig rten mtha' yas rnams//sa yi nang du rten par 'gyur//de ltar
184a2(rgyud): rnam bcas de nyid dang //rnam pa med pa'i go 'phang bzhugs//sems dang rnam por shes de'i rgyun//gnyis po nyid ni gnyis med 'gyur//dbu mar blta rnams kyis 'grub ste/
184a3(rgyud): ye shes der 'di rdzogs pa'o//gal te sangs rgyas rjes chag yod//chos dge 'dun la de bzhin mchog/gal te mu stegs mkhas po yi//tshul mtshan chos de 'dod pa dang //gal
184a4(rgyud): te shes rab thabs rnal 'byor//stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid can//gal te thams cad mi rtag bdag/tshul 'di bsgom par bya ba yin//'dir mang sla bas ci ba ste//chos dbyings
184a5(rgyud): gal te 'dod kyang ngo //na mkho'i snying po'i gzugs can gyi//sangs rgyas sprul pa bsgom par bya//shen pa sgrog ma mkhan la sogs//bsod pa'i don la yongs gnas pa//de kun
184a6(rgyud): de'i gnas nyams dga' bar//lam rjes skyobs rnams kyi grol 'thob//nges par dkyil 'khor dbus rnamasu//gzugasu bsdoms pa bsgom par bya//'jig rten 'di dang pha
184a7(rgyud): rol du//rmongs pa'i bdag nyid dngos grub 'thob//rnam shes kun gyi sbyor bdag nyid//stong nyid snying po gcig pu pa//bcom ldan rab 'joms rnam po yi//rnal 'byor la zhugs/
184b1(rgyud): pas 'di gsungs//zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa nyi shu pa'o////de nas lha mos mchod byas te//phyag byas nas ni 'di gsol to//rang gi rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni//bcom ldan rdo rjes
184b2(rgyud): gsung bar mdzad//rang rig ye shes los byung ba//ji lta'i rigs pas bshad par bya//dpal he ru ko'i rabo sbyor bas//rnal 'byor zla ba'i bgrod par rang //dkar po'i tshes gcig la
184b3(rgyud): sogs nas//ye shes rgya mtsho 'phel bar 'gyur//thog mar ye shes skye bar 'gyur//gnyis par na mkhor 'gro ba'i gzugs//gsum par mda'i dbyibs dang 'dra//bzhi par
184b4(rgyud): dben gyi gzugs can no//lnga par rtse mo lnga'i bdag nyid//drug par khams drug 'byung ba yin//bdun par rgya mtsho yi ni gzugs//brgyad par pad+mar brjod pa yin//dgu pa ru ni
184b5(rgyud): bcud len tAM//bcu par lhan skyes gzugs kyiso//bcu gcig pa la zhi pa'i gzugs//bcu gnyis pa la 'khor lo'i gzugs//bcu gsum pa la nyi ma ste//bcu bzhir zla ba de bzhin no//
184b6(rgyud): bco lnga pa nyid rA hu ste//thig le zhes byas bcu drug pa//rnam pa bcu drug mtshan nyid ni//rang gi rig par shes par bya//dpal he ru ka yi spyod pa yis//'khor lo bzhi rnamasu sgrub bya//
184b7(rgyud): rgas pa med cing 'chi ba med//nad dang mdze sogs sdang ba yin//lte ba ra shri yi yi ger gyur//haM yig steng khar dgod par bya//ru yig mgrin pa'i 'khor lo ste/thod par ka ya~M ya
185a1(rgyud): thig le bzhi yi rab sbyor bas//rang gis rig par 'grub par 'gyur//de nyid rnam pa bcu drug ni//rnal 'byor rnams kyi mchog zag med//gnas dang gan su 'phob
185a2(rgyud): nyid//dbu ma'i nang du rab tu bzhugs//'khor lo bzhi yi mdab son na so//rang gis rig pa mtha' yas mchog/rigs de rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi//byung bar rnam par shes par bya//
185a3(rgyud): sems chen po ni sad bzhin pas//don yod mthong bas 'thob par 'gyur//rtag tu rmi lam du 'gyur te//dus thams cad du nges par gnas//long spyod sprul pa'i mtshan nyid do//
185a4(rgyud): ba nyid log pa yis de tshe mthong //bzhi pa rab mang bdag med pa//de phyir de rnams mtha' longs spyod//de ltar 'khor lo bzhir gnas nas//nges par lam du 'gro bar 'gyur//
185a5(rgyud): shes rab de nyid rtogs byas nas//nyi mas thabs kyi de nyid can//rdul gyi sbyor ba 'byung ba ste//nig po'i phyogasu gang 'dir yang //bcu drug rnams kyi cha rnams kyi//nyi ma nyid ni bar
185a6(rgyud): bar du'o//stong nyid snying rje'i sbyor ba las//rdo rje 'bar ba 'bar zhing 'bar//dkyil 'khor lo'i dbus rnams//dpal he ru ka bsam por bya//mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag ldan/
185a7(rgyud): rdo rje'i dga' bar 'gro bar 'gyur//gnas skabs thams cad yang dag sbyor//gtso bo rang rigs bdag nyid can//bcom ldan 'das po'i bzhi pa'i mthar//rtag tu bzhugs//
185b1(rgyud): byas 'di gsungs//zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o///de nas lus sogs rgyu rnams kyis//rten ma mngon par bshad par bya//pad+ma ga rA dbang phyun nyid kyi//rab tu
185b2(rgyud): sbyor ba 'di byeng ngo //rtsa ni pad+mar yang dag grags//srog gi rlung gis gar byed do//byang chub sems kyis dbang phyug ste//de rnams kyi ni nang du bzhugs//rang gis rig pa bza' bar bya//
185b3(rgyud): snying rje'i kha yis gtung bar bya//gnyis med rnal 'byor mA dang rol//skyo ma'i rje su 'gro rnams 'grub//thams cad de'i rang bzhin du//bza' ba bza' ba med par bya//pad+ma gar dbang bsgram/
185b4(rgyud): byaM ste//ji lta'i rim pas mtshon par bya//pa yig gzhan gyi grong du 'gro/brtan pa thams cad t+ta ma yi yig/na yig g.yo ba'i rnal 'byor te//rta yig bde ba'i lho can yin//shA yig
185b5(rgyud): rto la sogs pa'i stobs//ra yig dga' rol rgyu can+da yin//srid pa mya ngan 'das kun la//de yis rab tu sbyar bar bya//mtshams kyi snod ni 'di rnams kun//ba mchog phyi mar shes par
185b6(rgyud): bya//bgrod pa'adi rnams la rten nas//pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug ring //he ru ka dang bder chog nyid//rdo rje sems dpa' sogs gtsob//pad+ma gar dbang phyug du yang //sbyor ba kun la
185b7(rgyud): shes par bya//pad+ma ye shes yang dag grags//gar gyi dbang phyug rnam shes can//gnyis pa gnyis med yang dag byung //lha kun 'dir ni byung ba yin//shes pa thams cad del/
186a1(rgyud): gnas//khams gsum du ni gar dbang phyug/gar byed pa yi sku chen la//de nas rtags na mtshan par bya//na mkhar zhen po'i sbyo ba yin//mchog tu rmad du byung bar
186a2(rgyud): 'gro/rnal 'byor ma re 'khor lo dbus su//lha ni skyes gzugs kyis rol bar gyis//'di yis rtag tu dbang gi las//de rnams kyis ni dga' bar byed//gang dang gang gis las rnams
186a3(rgyud): la//dngang de'i rabasgom par bya//sgrub po rnams kyi byang chub rtser//sangs rgyas thams cad du'o//de nas bdud ni bcom byas nas//gar byed bo zhen pas pad+ma 'dzin//sdig pa tham
186a4(rgyud): cad rab 'joms shing //tshe son pa rnams gnas par byed//'dod pa thams cad 'grub 'gyur cing //rnal 'byor rnams kyi srid pa sbyong //rang gis sems kyis dngos grub 'tho//
186a5(rgyud): rnam rtog nyid du mi bya'o//gzhan du srid pa'i sbyor bdag nyid//sems can thams cad rab 'jug pa//'khrul zhing chud zos mu stegs rnams//bstan pa rnams la rab 'jug bya//
186a6(rgyud): bag chags ning po yongs spangs nas//bye nas rang bzhin bstan par bya//bza' ba thams cad mnyam sbyar las//bza' ba med par rtag tu gnas//bcom ldan pad+ma gar mdzad
186a7(rgyud): pa'i//de bzhin gshegs pas 'di gsung so//zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o////de nas rnam par snang mdzad kye//mtshan nyid bshad kyis lha mo nyon//
186b1(rgyud): gzugs las 'das pa ye shes gang //de ni ye shas chen por brjod//rnam par snang bzhin pa de bzhin//sems dpa' chen pa'i ming can no//spu khungs ma thams cad las//de rnams
186b2(rgyud): nges 'thon stobs chen po//de rnams bu gang rab tu zhugs pa//'khar mo bzhi yi mchi skyes yin//ji ltar maral mar zhugs pa//de bzhin du ni khams la zhugs//g.yo ba 'gog par byas
186b3(rgyud): ba yis//de 'drar thams cad mthong bar 'gyur//gang mthong ba ni de mthong nyid/gdong gos gdong nI blta bar gyis//mi dang mi mo lha sogs kyi//gzugs ni pad+ma'i 'dung chu bzhin//srog chen
186b4(rgyud): po der shes bya ste//shi ba'i dus las nges par 'thon//aM gi yi ge yid la bya//dbus rgyu ba yis mtshon par bya//bdag nyid kyis ni hU~M yig spro//gsor ba yi ni rnal 'byor ldan//
186b5(rgyud): sems la oM gyi yi ger 'gyur//lus la gnas par mtshon par bya//haM yog mchog gi dang po yis//ye shes dngos po rnamasu sprul//chos kyi dbyings rnams kyi dbus/rnam//
186b6(rgyud): snang mdzad kyi sgom pa'o//bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'dzag pa rnams kyis//sngags pa la ni 'bar bar bye//bya ba stong phrag grangs kyi ni//rnal 'byor ma la 'dod spyod 'gyur//'dod pa rnams kyis
186b7(rgyud): mi 'pho ste//'dod na bde ba rnam par spro//de tshe rnal 'byor ma mnyes nas//dngos grub thams cad stor bar byed//sdug dang mi sdug rnam spyod pa//rna la'i 'phyir ma la mi bya'o//myur bar
187a1(rgyud): kASh+TA nan rnams kyi bla nasas//rnamapa sna mdzad dun/ rgyags sa /sa//nas smras nas na m+b+has/ m+b+ha nga dung
187a2(rgyud): dang /ni shA 'i /ngan me rjes mas da dzi ra du rje chab la stegs//shes ra pa 'i byin sogs kyang //dernams la'i gyur ma'i
187a3(rgyud): gre drug grol bar byed nyid dang //bde 'gro rnams 'jug pa//skyeldan sor sems can don//gnyis med dngos por byed par 'gyur//mi shes nyon mongs gan mngon du//
187a4(rgyud): rgyal 'di yo na bsgom parlob//khams rnams cad kyi mar ni//dgas pa mad pas bya ba yin//nAmA snang sgra bsdu brjod byu ma//byug pa'ang de nyid kyis byung//de sa
187a5(rgyud): sa sbyin 'a bya/rdorje'i lam du rtag tu//rdo rje'i chung gi gzug smra gyur//rnal 'byor marnams kyi ma //gnyis pa rloms de na ldan las//na ma
187a6(rgyud): 'did thaM ba 'o//bcom ldan thams ca dag pa'i sku//rab ka mdzad pa 'di gsungs//zhes bya ni rab tu byu pa nyi shun+ta gAs m+b+hing+ge'o////de nas ga slong chen
187a7(rgyud): shid byaste//mdar bsdus pa yis rgyas pa men//rdo rje sems dpe'i rab sbyar bas//gnas thams cad du yang dag bzhugs//rdo rje mi phyed ye shes te//sems dpa
187b1(rgyud): snying po ston pa'o//stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa//snying rje sems dpar rab tu grags//zla ba rdo rje'i rab sbyor bas//gnas rnams bgrod pa bstan par bya//bu li'i ri las lte bar 'bag/
187b2(rgyud): dzA lan d+ha ra ra yang dag gnas//ur+yAn du ni kun tu spyod//ar bu der bza' ba dang tung can no//go dA ba ror rol pa ste//ra me sha rir rgyu la dang pa ma//de bi ko Tir rjesu mdzin//mA la wer
187b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma'i gtso//kA ma ru par tshig 'grub po//o De ra mngon sum dngos grub ster//tri sha kunar dbang rnams kyi//myur du dngos grub rab tu 'jug/ko sa la ra rnal 'byor dngos
187b4(rgyud): grub ste//ka ling kar phra mo'i dngos grub skye//lam pa ka ru rtag par 'grub//kAny+dzi bsad pa'i dngos grub bo//he ma la yaMr 'thun pa 'grub//pi ta pu ri ra ra h+yaM gi lta ba//gr-i ha de ba tar
187b5(rgyud): bkas gnang ba//lhan skyes 'pho med sau r-I Sh+Tar//gser gling du ni rang don 'grub//nA ga rer gnas kyi dngos grub ster//sin d+hur stobs 'grub de bzhin du//ma rung 'chi med dngos
187b6(rgyud): grub bo//ku lu tar rang bzhin dngos grub tu//de nyid rnal 'byor rnams la skye//rdo rje sems dpa' rtag bsgoms nas//thams cad dngos grub 'gro bar byos//gnas sogs
187b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma dbus su//khamasu gyur pa'i ro chen 'o//gsong ba'i tshig tu shes par bya//mchog ni lhan cig skyes par dran//dgyes pa ye shes shes bya ste//thams cad bdag
188a1(rgyud): nyid yon tan gnas//rtag bzhugs gnyis med rnams ste//sems can 'jig rten las ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi//rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid kyis//nA da'i
188a2(rgyud): dbus las yang dag byung //de nyid du ni thims nas 'gro/gnas par de ni mngon par brjod//de ltar thams cad cho ga bzhin//dpa' bo mchog rnams kyis shes bya//de nyid nyi shu rtsa
188a3(rgyud): bzhi'i bdag/de ni nus par rab tu bshad//skyes pa dang ni skye bzhin pa'i//nus pa thams cad rab 'jug gis//dngos med ma yin pa'i gzugs kyis//dbyangs dang phyi mo gsum
188a4(rgyud): spangs pa//thig le'i gzugs ni sems dpa'i che//rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu grags//dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las//rnal 'byor ma rnams kun gyi gtso//sgyu ma'i
188a5(rgyud): gnas kyi dngos grub ni//'jug mdzad bcom ldan gyis 'di gsungs//zhes bya ba ni gnas thams cad kyi bdag nyid can gyi rab tu byed pa ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o////de ltar
188a6(rgyud): dpa' bo gtso bo yi//las kyi tshogs rnams shes par bya//nyi shu bzhi bdag nyid nyams dga'//thams cad gsang chen gyi gon su//gsang chen rgyas par bshad pa can//
188a7(rgyud): kun spyod cho ga bshad par bya//sngon bshad khams kyi 'du shes ni//gsum gsum du ni bshad pa yin//nyi shu rtsa bzhi gsum rnams can//de rnams brgyad brgyad shas
188b1(rgyud): par bya//dpa'i nyi shu bzhi rnams kyi//re re'i nyi shu rtsu bzhi ste//zlum po'i rnam pa'i rnal 'byor du//thig le nyid ni bzhag par bya//de rnams dkyil 'khor phyi rol tu//bskor bas//
188b2(rgyud): ting 'dzin rdo rje 'gyur//shar la sogs pa rim bzhin du//rdo rje'i 'khor lo gsogs par 'pho//dkyil 'khor du ni lha thams cad//rnal 'byor ma kun+da shos par bya//bdun cu
188b3(rgyud): drug lhag pa'i lnga brgya//nyin zhag rnamasu yongs 'pho bya//re re ya ne srog 'gyur ba//sum cu rtsa bdun phyed bcas pa'o//nyi khri brgya phrag bcu drug ni//nyin zhag la nau shes par bya//
188b4(rgyud): lus can kun gyi rang bsam pa//de rnams kyi dus rab tu 'jug/rnal 'byor de dngos bsgom rnams la//sangs rgyas bsam pa rab tu bskor//'di rnams kun nyid dpa' bo rnams
188b5(rgyud): gnas sogs nyi shu bzhi can la//the dang longs spyod bdag bye bas//dus dang dus tshod za bar byed//'di lta'i cho ga'i bya ba yis//kun tu gnas pa bdag ma yin//rnal 'byor
188b6(rgyud): mtshogs dang dpa' ba//da ni bdag dang bdag gi rim bzhin//sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad du//bdag dang bdag gi spyod yul med//yid ches tsam du myang 'das pa//
188b7(rgyud): gzhung smra ba la bstan pa'o//de kho na nyid ma rig pa yis 'jig rten mongs de kho na nyid rnam par spangs pas dngos grub mo 'thob bo//rnal 'byor rnams la rgyud rgyal du//de
189a1(rgyud): /dang de yi mchog ye shos//'od gsal sgyu ma bdag gis ni//sgyu ma'i 'jig tan la bshad do//kye lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gcig pur bstad/
189a2(rgyud): lha dang lhaman sa gsum 'joms pa la phyag tshol//dbang po dang ni 'jog rten pa yis mi shes te//mchog tu bde ba chen po'i glu yis mchad par gyis//gang zhig las thams
189a3(rgyud): cad pa'i gzugasu bsgom par byos//srid dang mya ngan 'das par ston pa kA la ci//sgyu ma gti mug gis ni ri mor gnas//sems can theg pa da dung nyams par ga la byed//de
189a4(rgyud): ltar yongasu dgyes pa'i mgu ro bcom ldan rang nyid kyis gsung so//de nyid dkyi bo 'khor rnams dang ni//byang chub dus su blang bar gyis//dpa'i thams cad mnyam sbyor las//
189a5(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje mekha 'gro de bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan padag pas 'di gsung so//'din dpal mkha' gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las
189a6(rgyud): de kho na nyid nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid rgyud thams cad kyi don ston pa po gsang chen thams cad pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o////de nas rnal 'byor ma dpe' bo//rnam pa du
189a7(rgyud): mar 'khor gyis kyang //rdo rje mkha'i gro khyab pa'i bdag/bcom ldan bdag po la bstod pa//khyod ni 'dod chags chen po'i tshul//dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin can//dge
189b1(rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin sbyin gzugs//chos rnams bstan pas tshim par 'gyur//chos dang chosnga min pa yi gzugs//chos dang chos pa khyod gnyis med//bdag gis sprul pa'i dngos po
189b2(rgyud): yis//'jig rten kun gyi'ang 'don can te//bdag nyid chen po ster po po//sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'jug byed pa//khyod kyis dam tshi go bstan pa ste//gzhan min dAm tshig nyid las
189b3(rgyud): byung //bdag gis bsod nams rjes sgom pas//byang chub tu ni yid bsgrubaso//ston pa mchog tu bde la bzhugs//de yis sems can don mdzad pa'o//hUM gi yi ge'i sgra sgrogs
189b4(rgyud): pas//nga rgyal can gyi bgegs skrag 'gyur//khyod kyis nye bar bsten pas ni//de rnams la ni skye 'chi med//bde ba'i rgyal po nyid du brtson//byang chub kyi ni yid du bgrod//khyod
189b5(rgyud): dang thabs gcig 'dres par 'gyur//go 'bu gcig tu gnyis med bzhugs//de ltar bstod pas rdo rje che//mchod pa bzhi ni rab ston mdzad//dkyil 'khor bdag dang gnyis/
189b6(rgyud): med nyid//mchod pa rnams ni gnyis med byed//phyi dang nang bdag nyid can rdzas//gnas pa yi na mchod par dran//bza' dang btung sogs la rol pa//gnyis med mchod pa
189b7(rgyud): gsum pa'o//bzhi pa chos dang rnal 'byor dog/'dzin pa yini mchod pa'o//de lta'i mchod pa la brten nas//thams cad byas pas las rgyal por//'gyuraro rdo rje mkha'agro ni//
190a1(rgyud): glu gsum du ni mnyes bya ste//sbyin du dkyil 'khor byas nas ni//lag pa g.yon pas thams cad du//pad+ma ra ni bskor nas snad//sngags pa rnams
190a2(rgyud): kyis bzung bar bya//sbyin du rnal 'byor ma lon//skra grol ba yis gto rom sbyin//rnal 'byor ma kun chu skyes ni//kha yis bzung nas dkrug par bya//de yi lagA par son pa
190a3(rgyud): dpal//gang su yis kyang de zlog mo nus//ji ltar bde bas bde ba bzung //rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya sa mchog mnyes bya//rtag tu dam tshig bskyang por bya//spun gyi spyod pa'i
190a4(rgyud): bstan par bya//snying rje'i mchog dbang gyur bya zhing //dbang po rnams ni mi rtag par//bsgom bya snang ba med pa yis//rang bzhin dbang du gyur par gonas//rdo rje pad+ma snyoms
190a5(rgyud): 'jug pas//phyag rgya nang gi bdag nyid mchog/stong pa nyid gnyis med rnal 'byor pas//dngos po thams cad spang par bya//don dam can de nyid 'dir bya//rtag tu byang chub
190a6(rgyud): sems dran bya//man ngag gcig ni bsgoms pa yis//man ngag thams cad mtshon par bya//ji ltar sa cig thob po yis//sa thams cad ni thob par 'gyur//de bzhi
190a7(rgyud): man ngag thams cad kyang //man ngag gcig gis 'thob par 'gyur//byis pa rnams dang rgan po dang //rnal 'byor ma rnams thams cad du//mnyam po'i mtsha dang
190b1(rgyud): cho ga yas//mkhas pa yis ni bya ba yin//mi mnyam pa yis dngos grub 'joms//dmyal ba la sogs ltung bar 'gyur//rgan po yon tan kun gnas pa//de rnams mnyes pas/
190b2(rgyud): byang chub ster//khyad par mchod pa nyid ni 'dir//byis pa rnams dang de bzhin yang //gnyis bcas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi//me tog bskor ba la sogs bya//kun tu smod pa'i
190b3(rgyud): ngag mi bya//'dod mi 'dod min sbyor bral bya//ma byin par yang blang bya zhing //rtag tu srog chags bsad par bya//sems can rnams la brdzun smra zhing //mau sogs rnal 'byor
190b4(rgyud): ma la ba grong //'khor lo mchod pa rgyun tu bya//bo za 'bya lnga la sogs pa sbyin//de yi bsod nams kyis 'thob pa//dus thams cad du bgegs med dang //grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma/
190b5(rgyud): mthong bas//bsam pa gzhan ni rab tu 'jug/dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/rdo rje mal 'gro bzhin gshegs//bcom ldan bdag pos
190b6(rgyud): 'di gsungs//dpal mkha' bru rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las bstod pa dang //mchod pa bzhi la sogs pa gnyi su med pa'i dam tshig bsten pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste lnga bcu

191a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor//gnyis meng mang 'bru rgya mcha dang //rtsabar rgyud rgyu man pa//'dus pa'i rnam pa'i 'azugs can to//sangs rgyas byung chub sems rnams s+ho/dus du
191a2(rgyud): cad du zhal nA gnas//phyo ga kun gyi za ma tog/'bum phrag sum cu drug dang po//mkha 'gro rgya mtsho ba bshad de//chen por chung ngu re gsungs pa'o//rwa rab kyi ni rdul tshad kyi//mkha'
191a3(rgyud): thams cad kyis gsung so//mtha' yas shing ni mu med nyid//rje da pa'i dus kyis zheng de//bcom ldan mtha' yas pas 'di gsungs//shAkya seng ges gsungs pa'i rgyud//rnam
191a4(rgyud): gyur bar mason pa'o//nyan pa ston pa rang nyid de//'chung ba bye ba gzhin kyang ngo //legs par gsungs dang 'chad 'gyur ba'i//de'i rang bzhin du 'du bagled par 'gyur//bslu

191b1(rgyud): mtshan la 'byor ma'i rgyun rgya sngo bo la sar+b+ba ma drug la sogs pa la rnal 'byor dang /ye shes dang /sdom pa dang /bya ba dang /de kho na nyid mtshor gyur pa dang /mkha' gra rgya mtsha las 'ang
191b2(rgyud): rnams dang ma mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgya la po chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs//dngol ba la yul grub pa ga des chen pa mdud lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang chen por rgya gror gyi paN+Di ta chen
191b3(rgyud): rje slob dpon rtog ge pa rnams kyi gtsug ginor bro dus dang sang 'gran nu med pa/snying rje chen pos thugs brnyan pa'i ngang tshul can/phyogs sna tshogs nas 'dus pa'i skye 'gro rnams
191b4(rgyud): chos dang zang zing tshar gyis tshim par mdzad pa//dpal rdo rje phag mo'i zhabs kyi chu skyes kyi rdul la reg pa shAkya'i sras pa rgyal ba'i sde'o zhal sta nis dang /bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba shUkya'i dge slong /

195a1(rgyud): dag ldan//de nas bco lnga pA yIs rgyun//drug pa yin gnyis pa dang //bzhi pa yi nI dang po dang //tshig rkang gsum par brjod pa yin//'dod pa'i don kun
195a2(rgyud): sgrub pa'o//dang po yi nI gnyis pa dang //lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang //an+ta s+tha yi dang po dang //drod kyi sde tshan bzhi pa la//dbyangs yig bcu gsum yang dag ldan//mchog tu dge zhing

195b1(rgyud): yi ge bye brag tu//dbyangs yig bcu gcig pas ni ldan//bdun par yongasu grags pas ni//dbyangs yig bzhi pas ldan pa yin//yi ge brgyad pa dag la ni//dbyangs yig bcu

195b3(rgyud): nyid kyis ni//'og gi gan su rab tu brtag/yA go bcu bzhi pa dag ni/dbyings yig gnyis pa dgage dang ldan//dge zhing mchog tu phan pa yin//yi ge boco lnga pa'i mtshan nyid/

195b6(rgyud): ljon//yi ge nyi shu rtsa gsum pa//dbyings yig lnga bas mnyam par ldano//dbyangs yig bcu gsum par ldan pa//yige nyi shu rtsa bzhi yin//gnyis pa yi ni dang po yis//nye
195b7(rgyud): shu rtsa lnga pa dang ldan//mkhas pas rtog tu ldan pas ni//nyi shu rtsa drug pa la brjod//dbyangs yi ge gnyis pas ldan pa ru//mtshon byed gnyis ni mtshon par byed/yi ge nyi
196a1(rgyud): shu rtsa brgyad pa//de bzhin bco lnga pas ni mtshon//gcig ma tshangs pa'i sum cu la//bzhi pa'i dang po sbyar ba dang //dbyangs yig gnyis pa yang dag ldan//me
196a2(rgyud): dang yang dag ldan par bya//dbyangs yig gnyis pas ldan pa ni//sum cu rtsa gcig yi ge yin//sum cu rtsa gnyis yi ge la//dbyangs yi gro bcu gsum pas ni ldan//sume cu rtsa
196a3(rgyud): gsum yi ga la//nyi mau yi sau ni rab tu dbye//sngags rnams kun+da gyi so gsal ba ste//de ltar the tsom med pa yin//sum cu rtsa bzhi'i yige la/dbyangs kyi bzhi pas ldan pa ste//
196a4(rgyud): go 'phang mchog tu dge ba yin//dbyangs kyi lnga pos ldan pa ni//de bzhin sum cu rtsa bdun yinA//sum cu brgyad pa'i yi ge la//dbyangs kyi gnyis pas ldan par bya//dngos grub
196a5(rgyud): thams cad rnam par nges//de bzhi ni bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis la//nyi ma yis ni sbyar ba yin//bzhi bcu rtsa gsum yi ge la//dbyangs kyi lnga pas sbyar bar bya//de yang dge ba'i mchog/
196a6(rgyud): yin no//bzhi bcu rtsa lnga rab gsungs pa//dbyangs yig gnyis pas ldan par bya//de ltar nyid du the tsom med//dbyangs kyi lnga pas ldan pa ni//de bzhin bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o//

196b1(rgyud): kyi gnyis pas ldan pa ni//mkhas pas lnga bcu rtsa gnyis brjod//dbyangs yig bcu gsum par ldan pa//lnga bcu rtsa gsum yi ge yin//lnga bcu rtsa drug yi ge la//dbyangs kyi drug par
196b2(rgyud): ldan pa yin//gcig ma tshang ba'i drug cu le//an+ta s+thA yi bzhi par sbyaro//dbyangs kyi gnyis pa sbyar bar bya//steng du nA des rnam par rgyan//dbyings kyi gnyis pas ldan po ni//drug curtsa
196b3(rgyud): gcig pa la sbyar//dbyangs kyi gsum pas ldan pa ni//drug cu rtsa gnyis bye brag go/dbyangs yog btso gcig ldan pa ni//drug cu rtsa gsum mkhas pas brjod//dbyangs yi ga
196b4(rgyud): lnga pas sbyar ba ni//yig drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o//de bzhin drug cu rtswa lnga la//mis ni nges par sbyar bar bya//dngos grub thams cad ces bya ba//'dzin pa ru ni the tsom mdo//dbyangs kyi
196b5(rgyud): gsum pos ldan pa ni//drug curtsa drug phye ba yin//rigs dang rigs min rab sgrub pa'o//dbyings kyi gnyis pas yang dag ldan//drug cu rtsa bdun bshad pa ni//dpa' bo mchod pa
196b6(rgyud): zhes ni bya//an+d+ra sgra ye bzhi pa yis//drug cu rtsa brgyad rab tu grags//bdun cu rtse gcig yi ga la//dbyangs kyi gnyis par ldan par byas//bdun cu rtsa bzhi yi ge la//de bzhin
196b7(rgyud): dbyangs yig gnyis pas ldan//mtshon tsha ru ni rab tu grags//bdun cu rtse lnga pa nyid la//dbyangs kyi drug pas sbyar ba yin//de ltar du ni gyur pa yon//bdun cu rtsa drug yi ga la//
197a1(rgyud): dbyangs kyi gnyis pas ldan byas to//mo yi bus ni rnam par dbye//lta ba'i bzhi pa ste sbyar bar bya//bdun cu rtsa bdun yi ga la//dbyangs yig gnyis pas
197a2(rgyud): ldan pa yin//bdun cu rtsa brgyad mkhas pas brjid//brgyad cu rtsa gcig de bzhin mtshang //dbyangs kyi lci pas sbyor ba yin//brgyad cu rtsa gnyis yi ga la//dbyangs kyi gnyis
197a3(rgyud): pas sbyar bar bya//chos don 'dod dang thar pa ste//dpa' bo rnams la phan 'dod pas//rigs pa'i rgyal po zhes bshod do//dpal khrog 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las sngags
