227b6(rgyud): 'jig rten skyong ba dang //sbyor ba'i lam la rab tu 'jug/rang mtshan bzhon pa kha dog dang //'jig rten skyong ba bdag nyid che//khro bo gnyis dang yang dag ldan//bsgrub bya la ni
227b7(rgyud): sbyar ba yino//nyin zhag bdun gyi sbyin sreg gis//sgrub po ci bgyi 'gyur ba yin//zhal bzhi pa ye sngags kyis ni//phyogs dang mtsham su gsungs pa ste//'bru rnams thams
228a1(rgyud): cad bsres nas ni//nyi khyi bu ni bsngags nas kyang //grangs ni brgyad dang dgu po skyug//'di rnams 'jig rten pa yin te//rnal 'byor paste ni sgrub pa po//sa yi steng du
228a2(rgyud): rnam par spyod//dpal ldan khrag 'thung 'jig rten 'gyur//thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mchog/sems can rang bzhin sangs rgyas kun//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/
228a3(rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgya mnyam par bya//dpal ldan khrag 'thung mchod pa dang //mtho ris kyi ni don ched du//zhi ba'i dngos grub 'ong ba ste//rtag tu drug cu rtsa bzhi mchod//dbang po
228a4(rgyud): gnyis kyi rab sbyor bas//rang 'byung ye shes kyi ni gzhi//thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mchog/dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las char dbab pa dang /'jig rten//
228a5(rgyud): skyong ba brgyad gyi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o////de nas gzhan na med pa yin//pho nya kun gyi dbang phyug mchog/zhal bzhi yi ni hUM yig dang /
228a6(rgyud): ji ltar 'dod par las kyis dbye//lha dang mi yi bde ba ni//gcig tu bsdus nas ltas pa yis//khrag 'thung gnyis med bde ba la//bcu drug char yang mi phod do//gos chen
228a7(rgyud): dang ni sha chen dang //dbang chen dang ni sbrang rtsi che//thams cad dur khrod nas ni byung //phyag rgya 'di yi dbang phyug mchog/bya ba kun la dngos grub ster//ji srid mdun du dag rje
228b1(rgyud): sgom//zhags pa nag pos mgrin pa bcings//'dod pas dbyug pas brdung bar bya//cho ga bzhin du sngags pas bsam//lho phyogasu ni bsgyel bar bya//dgar ba yod dang ltung ba dang /
228b2(rgyud): yang dang yang du bskrad pa dang //lci ba ru ni bkag pa nyid//yang dang yang du brgya la be ro 'gyur//nyi ma phyed dang num phyed na//gzugs brnyan gyi ni sbyin bsrog bya//nyi ma gsum pa kun tu
228b3(rgyud): bri//'chi bar 'gyur zhing mgo bo ltung //sngags kyi cho gas 'chi bar ni//sa stengs mche bas btob pa ste//rnal 'byor ma yi sngags kyis ni//rnal 'byor pa la dngos grub ster/
228b4(rgyud): snying pos mi la bsdus na su//phyin sa yang ni ltung ba yin//phyag rgya chen po'i snying po ru//yon po zhes byar rab tu grags//sgrub pos 'jig rten gsum po yang //'di yos
228b5(rgyud): thams cad bsdus pa yin//de nas bskyed pa bshad par bya//dag po rnams kyis stobs dregs dang //sngags pas sngon gsungs cho ga bzhin//nim pa'i mdab ma'i khu ba dang /
228b6(rgyud): bya rog sgo yi bye brag gis//sgrub pos rab tu 'bad pa mchog blo ldan rang gi gnas la bskyed//de ni sa stengs 'khor los bsgyur//nyi ma bdun gyis lha nyid dang //zla ba yis
228b7(rgyud): no 'jig rten po//lo yis sangs rgyas byang chub sems//dran pas phal che'i mi rnam so//zla ba phyed kyis lha ma yin//srin po dang ni gnod sbyin mo//klu dang dri za dag dang ni//
229a1(rgyud): mi 'am ci la sogs skad du//sngags dang phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis//sgrub pos sa stengs rnyed par dka'//rnal 'byor 'di ni dngos grub che//rnal 'byor kun
229a2(rgyud): la 'di mchog yin//rnal 'byor 'di ni dpal chen po//sum cu pas ni mchod pa yin//'di dang 'dra ba gzhan na med//cung zad mdzad pa gsang ba brgyas//'jig rten gsum
229a3(rgyud): las rnam par rgyal//gsang ba'i ming dang mkha'agro ma//gang zhig cung zad pas rab skye//de kun lho ru kha bltas pa'o//dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las bskrad pa dang
229a4(rgyud): bsad pa'i sngags kyi las kyi cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o////de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//'khor los sgyur ba drug gi sngags//cho ga shes pas sngag
229a5(rgyud): ni gsang //'dod pa'i dngos grub 'ong bar 'gyur//sems ni shin tu rnam dag byas//de nas rdzu rnga bcing bar bya//shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa yis//dbyangs kyi yi ge/dgo
229a6(rgyud): par bya//ri mig dgu ni bcing bya ste//mnyam par yi ge bzhi bcu dgu//gnas der blo ldan gyis ni btu//dang po rdo rje sems dpa' sogs//rdza rnga'i rnam pa dpa' bo che//dpa'
229a7(rgyud): chen po'i zhal ni bsgyur//ji ltar rigs pa de ltar byas//mtha' dag rab tu zhi ba yin//sde tshad dbye ba shes byas nas//mkhas pas phyi mo las ni betu//bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa
229b1(rgyud): blangs te//gsum pa'i yi ger gyur pa'o//drod kyi yi go gsum pa la//dbyangs kyi lnga pa yang dag ldan//bzhi pa'i yi ger gyur pa'o//drug pa yi ni lnga pa la//de nyid kyi ni bzhi pa ldan//
229b2(rgyud): lnga pa yi ger gyur pa ste//rdo rje sems bdag nyid chen po//de bzhin bzhi bcu rtsa dgu blang //dbyings kyi lnga las sbyar ba ste//steng du na des sbyar ba yin//yi ge drug pa ru ni brjod//oM
229b3(rgyud): gyi yi ge dang po ste//phaT gyis yi ge tha mar po//rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu grags//de bzhin gcig dman lnga bcu la//dbyangs kyi gnyis pa sbyar ba yin//ya yi sde tshan brgyad pa
229b4(rgyud): la//me yi dbus ni sbyar ba yin//dbyangs kyi bzhi pas sbyar ba ste//gnyis pa'i yi ge mchog yin no//steng du nI das sbyar ba'o//yi ge gcig doman nyi shu la//skye bar byed pas yang
229b5(rgyud): dag gnas//dbyangs kyo gsum pas sbyor ba yin//yi ge gsum par gyur pa yin//gcig gis dman pa'i lnga bcu blang //yi ge gnyis pa brjod pa'o//lan gonyis n-i brjod par/
229b6(rgyud): bya//de bzhin pozhi bcu zhe brgyad pa//gzugs kyis rab tu dbye ba yin//bco lnga pa ni yang dag blang //yi ge bdun pa rI ni brjod//'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa pos//oM gyi yi ge dang
229b7(rgyud): po ste//hUM phaT yi ge mtha' ru sbyar//rnam snang mdzad du gyur pa'o//'dis ni dngos grub thams cad ster//dbyings kyi gnyis pa nyid dag dang //a na tas+tha yi gnyis pa la//dpyang
230a1(rgyud): kyi bcu gsum pa yis sbyar//gnyis pa'i yi ger gyur pa'o//bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi yang dag ldan//dbyangs kyi gsum pas sbyar ba ste//yi ge gsum par gyur pa'o//
230a2(rgyud): oM yig dang por swA hA mthar//pad+ma gabau gyi dbang phyug go/'di rnams rang gri bsngags pa'o//de bzhin gcig do man lnga bcu blang //dpyongs yig bcu gcig pa yis sbyar//dang
230a3(rgyud): po'i yi ge brjod par bya//drod kyi yi ge bzhi pa la//dbyangs kyi bcu gcig gis ni sbyar//gnyis pa'i yi ge brjod par bya//oMn tAs+thA yi gnyis pa la//dbyangs kyi lnga pas sbyar
230a4(rgyud): ba yin//ra yig dag dang bcu bdun pa//lnga pa yis ni mnyam par ldan//bco lnga po yis mchod par bya//oM gyi yi ge dong po ste//hU~M hU~M phaT ni mtha' mar yino//'dod pa'i don kun
230a5(rgyud): sgrib pa'o//dpal ldan khrag 'thung dpa' bo che//rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun gyi dbang //de nas bco brgyad pa ni blang //drod kyi yi ge dang po la//dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa yi sbyab//
230a6(rgyud): ginyis pa ru ni rab tu grags//an tas+tha yi gsum pa la//bcu gsum pa yi sbyar ba yin//dbyangs kyi gnyis pa nyid dag dang //mkhas pas go sum pa ru ni brjod//bzhi bcu rtsa
230a7(rgyud): gnyis yang dag blang //gcig gis ma tshang lnga bcu la//dbyangs kyi lnga pas sbyor ba yin//stong du na das sbyar bar bya//oM gyi yi ge dang po ste//phaT gyi yi ge tha mar yin//de
230b1(rgyud): ltur nyid du the tshom med//'di ni rdo rje nyi mar gyur//dngos grub sbyor zhing thar pa ste//yi ge bzhi bcu pa nyid dang //de nyid la ni dbyangs yig dang //bcu gsum pa yi sgyur ba yis//de
230b2(rgyud): nI gnyis ldan du ni bri//'on kyang rig pa ba cung zad med//gcig gis ma tshang nyi shu dang //an tAsgra yi bzhi pa dang //dbyangs yig gnyis pas yang dag ldan//de bzhin bco lnga pa
230b3(rgyud): yi sbyar//bzhi pa'i yi ge ra brjod pa'o//dbyangs yig gi ni gnyis pa dang //de bzhin bcu drug pa nyid dang //dpa' bo nyi shu drug pa btu//yi ge bdun pas brjod pa'o//hUM phaT mtha'
230b4(rgyud): yar sbyar ba yin//dpa' bo chen po rta mgrin te//dngos grub kun gyi gtso bo yin//dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las 'khor los bsgyur ba drug gi bsam gtan dang sngags
230b5(rgyud): btu ba'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste so dgu pa'o////de nas yang dag gnas pa'i spogs//dpa' ba gnyis med rnal 'byor ma//snying kha mgo bo spyi gtsug dang //go cha mig la sogs pa
230b6(rgyud): ru/rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs sbyar//cho ga byas shing rab tu srung //rdo rje sems dpa' snying la sbyar//dngoso grub thams cad rab tu stor//rnam par snang mdzad mgo bor dgod
230b7(rgyud): de ltar yon tan khyad par can//spyi go tsug pad+ma gar dbang phyug/phrag pa khrag 'thung dgod pa ste//mig gnyis rdo rje nyi ma yin//yan lag kun la rta mgrin te//de ltar go
231a1(rgyud): bags pa yin//thams dad las ni sgrub par byed//lag par dgod du yang nI b+ha//lhag pa'i byu ni bsnun byAb+h+yo//rdo rje snyoms dpa' mthe bor gnas//dro zhin
231a2(rgyud): rnam snang mdzub mo ste//gung mo pad+ma gar dbang phyug/mong med dpal ldan khrag 'thung ste//mthe chung rdo rje nyi ma'o//sen mo'i ngos la rta mchog yin//lag pa'i mthil du dpa' bo che/
231a3(rgyud): gnyis med rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ma//rgyub tu rnal 'byor ma rnams kun//'di rnams lag pa la ni dgod//kun gyi lhug par mnyam pa ni//de ltar cho ga bzhin du ni//dpa' bo rnal
231a4(rgyud): 'byor ma mchod bya//gshin rje'i phyogs nas brtsoms nas ni//ji srid bden bral gyi ni bar//dus drug nyis 'gyur du ni byas//mkha' gro dra ba'i sdom pa mchog/tshe sa dang dbyangs//
231a5(rgyud): dang dus shes bya//dus bzhi sum 'gyur shes par bya//dkyil 'khor dbus su he ru ka/spyan drangs nas ni mchod po 'a la//rtag tu rnal 'byor dbang phyug la//mchod pas
231a6(rgyud): dbul bar mi 'ogyuraro//mkha' gro ma dang lA ma dang //dum skyes mA dang gzugs can ma//'od rnams dpa' bo'i sring mo yin//'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa ya na//dpal khrag
231a7(rgyud): thung mngon par 'byung ba las dpa' bo drug gi go cha dang //lha'i grangs dang //lag pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bzhi bcu pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bsha
231b1(rgyud): bya ba//dus bzhi mtha' yi rnal 'byor la//gsang ba'i mchod pa'i gsang ba ni//dpa' bo gnyis mod bstan par bya//rdzogs ldan 'di ru ma yin te//gsum lhun la ni srong mor brjod//
231b2(rgyud): gnyis ldan la ni bu mor shes//brtsod ldan chung ma'i pho nyar gnas//de ltar cho ga shes byas nas//dngos grub 'bras bu skal ldan 'gyur//dpa' bo kun gyi rjes bsgoms nas//
231b3(rgyud): 'dod pa'i dngos grub yod pa yin//phyag rgya chen po'i theg pa che//rnal 'byor ma rnams dngos grub ster//phyag rgya chen po gzhan na med//rnal 'byor kun la sgrub pa pos//'jig
231b4(rgyud): rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das//gzhan yang rig byed smra ba dang //dpyod pa du dong grangs can dang //gzhan yang bya ba spro ba ltar//tshangs pa khyab 'jugo lha chen gyi//kun tu dngos grub
231b5(rgyud): mchod pa ste/dngos grub yang dag ye shes nyid//thams cad pas ni mchog yin no//sa las rin chen bzhi yin te//de bzhin mchog gi mchog nyid do//mkha' gro ma dang rig
231b6(rgyud): pa che//dpal ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po dang //sdom pa'i bdag nyid chen po dang //rnal 'byor 'di rnams shes pa mchog/rig byed bzhi la nga mi byams//nga la gus pas nga byam so///
231b7(rgyud): de la nga ster de rjes bzung //ji ltar bdag nyid kun tu mchod//thams cad gnyi su med pa ste//kun nas kun tu rnal 'byor sgrub//dpal ldan khrog 'thung dpa' bo mchog/mdza'
232a1(rgyud): ba thams cad 'dus pa yin//zla ba'i btung bas dngos grub 'gyur//rtag pa yi ni go 'phang mchog//mkha'agro ma yi dra ba sdom//mkha' dang mnyam las btus
232a2(rgyud): pa yin//kun mkhyen ye shes de rang bzhin//khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung zhes pa//thar pa'i dngos grub mchog tu ster//dpal ldan khrag 'thung ji ltar 'thob//yon tan gzhan
232a3(rgyud): na rtswa bzhin btang //spyan ma mthe bong la ni gnas//mdzub mo mA ma ki ru brjod//gung mo'i rtse mor sgrol ma yin//ming med la ni 'od byed ma//mthe chung pha rol phyin ma dgod//lag
232a4(rgyud): pa'i mthil du mnyam par sbyor//rgyabadu ga sheg su gsol ba ste//de ltar nyid du the tshom med//dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las lag pa'i brda'i cho ga'i le'u zhes
232a5(rgyud): bya ba ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//skye ba'i bdun pa'i sgrub pa po//bsdus pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur//sngags dang rnal 'byor rab
232a6(rgyud): 'bad pas//'bras dkar btags pa'i rang bzhin las//sngags pa so byol song gzu gas dang ni//gro ga la sogs yang dag blang //sgrub pos gang ltar ji lta bar//
232a7(rgyud): de yi gzugs la bzhag bya ba//ming ni sngags kyi nang chung bya//lus ni tsanau dan dmar pos byug/shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas sgom//gang gi nub mo ci nus bzlas/
232b1(rgyud): dbyug pa'i mchod pa'i bye brag dang //de ni zos pa tsam gyis ni//mi rnams dam tshig can du 'gyur//lho sbyang sha dang chung gis ni//phyi nang bdag nyid mchod par bya//lce sbyang sbyin sreg
232b2(rgyud): byas pa las//de la dngos grub thams cad gnas//'di ru lce spyang sbyin sreg bya//nor gyi lha dang 'dra b.ro 'gyur//de nas gtor mo sbyin par bya//mkha' gro mo kun gyos por 'gyur/
232b3(rgyud): ji srid yongasu rgyas pa ru//de yi sngags kyis 'grub par 'gyur ro//yang dag brtag pa'i tshogs kyis gang //rnal 'byor bzhi sogaso phyag rgya dang //rang gi mdog dang phyag mtshan
232b4(rgyud): dbyibs//dngos grub thams cad rib ster ba//thig le dang ni nA das spar//rnal 'byor che la rnam par gnas//las kyi dbye bas hUM yin no//'bad pas thar pa bsgom par bya//
232b5(rgyud): lho snying mgrin pa sna yi rtser//hI gi yig rnam pa bzhi//'phar ba dang no ring thung dang //rnam bcad las ni dbye ba ste//'phor ba yis ni thar par 'gyur//ring bas rgyas pa rab
232b6(rgyud): tu brjod//thung bas mi mthong ba ru 'gyur//rnam par bcad pas gsod par byed//lte ba dril bu'i sgra dang mau nyam//snying khar 'brug gi sgra 'dra ste//mgrin pa ra ba lang gi ni
232b7(rgyud): s+tha/sna rtsir nyungs kar 'phar ba 'dra//hU~M yig bzhi po rgyal po che//'jig rten gsum yeng sgrub pa po//pu dza a aM go ra de ma//ka oM tri kau ka la ka ti//pr-i gri so su na sa mi
233a1(rgyud): ku//phyi nang bdag nyid rnal 'byor pas//pu yig la sogs rnam par gnas//rnam shes ye shes bzung bar bya//rab tu 'bad byas bla ma bstod//phyi yi lam/
233a2(rgyud): nas bsten pa ste//bstan bcos rnams kyang ring ba bzhin//thabs kyi rnal 'byor ma ni rnams//'bab pas bla ma'i bsnyen bkur bya//bstan bcos mtshan nyid mdor bsdus
233a3(rgyud): pa'o//de nyid ston pa'i dpa' bo yin//skad cig gis ni rnal 'byor bdag/skad cig gis ni phyag rgya byin//kun nAs kun tu skad cig ste//skad cig sngags dang rnal 'byor reg/
233a4(rgyud): dang la khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las skye ba bdun po'i bsgrub bya dang /hUM yig bzhi rnam par dag pa'i cho ga'i le'u sde bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o////de nas dpal ldan
233a5(rgyud): rgyal chen dang //dpal po phan par 'dod pa yi//dbu se mo sa la btsug nus ni//yid kyis kun nas phyag 'tshal te//sems can rnams la phan 'dod pa//gsang ba chen po dag
233a6(rgyud): nino zhus//kun gyi rnam pa rgyas pa ru//bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol//gang ni gan su gnaso pa yin//rgyu dang mi rgyu rnams la rtse//nyon cig man ngag ji bzhin bshad//
233a7(rgyud): rtag pa bsam gyis mi khyab bzung //gang gis ji ltar sngon du gsung //thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu gnas//lus kyi dkyil 'khor zhesu brjod//sgo dgu ru ni gyur pa ste//
233b1(rgyud): lte ba'i dbus su pud+ma che//thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes grags//de yi gnas na dpa' bo bzhugs//cha med cha nI rnam par spangs//lus rnams kun gyis rnam par rtsa//lus
233b2(rgyud): bral dri ma med pa ste//la lar gzugs kyi gnas na bzhugs//la lar sna yi gnas na bzhugs//la lar mig gi sgron gnas//la lar sgra yi sgo na bzhugs//la lar bshang
233b3(rgyud): grece'i skyon gnas//la lar sems dang rnam shes bcag la sred dang lcogs dang skom//la lar khro dang la lar zhi//la lar rtogs dang bcas pa'i gdong //la lar bud
233b4(rgyud): med mchog gi lus//la lar gsod cing rdeg pa ste//la lar sme ba bzhin du gnas//la lar me tog 'bras la gnas//la lar rtse zhing longs spyod gnas//la lar dri la
233b5(rgyud): rnam par gnas//la lar 'byung ba chen po lnga//sa dang chu dang me dag dang //la lar rigs kyi dbye ba yi//la le gtum mo sbom po dang //laM lar ma dang sring mo yin//la lar chung
233b6(rgyud): ma bu mo dang //la lnga ro tshangs pa dbang phyug dang //nyi ma dang ni 'phrog ma dang //la lar zla ba sgar mo dang //la la raM nub mo nyin mo dang //lA lar khams gsum pa yin te//la
233b7(rgyud): lar thams cad med zad rgyal//la lar ro dang bag chags nub//cha med stong pa kun mi gsal//la lar byang chub gzigs mo che//la lar bdud las rgyal ba yin//
234a1(rgyud): la lar chos kyi 'khor mtsho//de bzhin la lar 'tsho 'gro ste//la lar dka' ba spyod pa yin//la lar dge slong tshul du gnas//la par byos pa yi ni ga na//
234a2(rgyud): la lar rgas shing 'khogs pa dang //la la ra na bas zos pa dang //la lar snod dang bcud dag dang //lo lar sngo zhing dmar ba dang //la la re dkar zhing ser po dang //la lar sangs
234a3(rgyud): rgyas rnam snang mdzad//la lar sgrol ma gos dkar mo//la la ra spyan ma mA mi ki/la lar kun tu zhi bar 'gyu re//la lar bya yi mngal du 'gro//na mkha' ru ni 'gro ba nyid//la
234a4(rgyud): lar glang chen nga rgyal te//la lar slad 'tshong mar ni 'gyur//la lor rmi lam mthong bar 'gyur//la la reg nyid ni log par gnas//la lar rlung dang mkhris pa dang //la la
234a5(rgyud): khrag dang lpags pa dri/la lar ngu zhing mya ngan byed//la la ra mi rnams za ba dang /la la rabaskal par gsung pa dang //ji ltar kun tu rnam par dbye//lha yi ji srid gsungs pa
234a6(rgyud): kun//gang de thams cad bdag nyid gnas/dpa' bo 'di rnams gsang chen po//phyi dang nang du yang dag gnas//kun la khyab cing rtag tu stong //srid pa gzung zhing dri ma med//
234a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor pas ni 'di ltar sgom//gnyis med ye shes nyid dang yang //de dang 'dro bar stong par 'gyur//bdag nyid lo ni rnam par sgom//de la btul zhugs bshad pa med
234b1(rgyud): phreng ba dang ni sngags kyang med//gzugs dang sbyin sreg las med de//mi g.yo go cha'i bya ba med//lag pa phyag rgya'i sbyor ba dang //g.yon brkyang rkang stabs la sogs med//dpa' bo
234b2(rgyud): chen pos srid pa gzung //rang byung mchog ni byed pa'o//dgag pa ru ni mi bya ste//bdag nyid nges par mchad por bya//zla ba'i dbus su thig le sgom//brgya yi phyed kyis rnam par rgyan//
234b3(rgyud): de yi dbus su rab ba sems te//gzhom med thig ler bcas pa yin//de yi lus ni bral 'gyur te//sgom du med cing bsam du med//dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las
234b4(rgyud): kun gyi rnam pa'i sgyu ma ltar bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o////de ltar sgyu me'i cho ga dang //gong gi tshe mi rnam par spangs//rtag tu snying kha'i dbus na ge nas//'di ltar
234b5(rgyud): gsang ba chen po'o//lte ba'i rtsa bar pad+ma gnas//gAM sa ra bcas shing 'od dang ldan//rang bzhin kun ni shel dag ltar//bcu drug la sogs kyis ni bskar//yi ge mnyam
234b6(rgyud): par sbyor ba ste//nam mkha' sbyor ba'i bdag nyid do//de nyid dbus su stong pa che//spro dang bsdu bar byed pa yin//gang gis ming ni kun rang bzhin//gang gis yongasu grags pa'o//
234b7(rgyud): nyim zlo ba rnam dag te//'tshar dang nub par bstan pa yin//sdig pa kun las rnam par grol//bsod nams thams cad rnam par 'phel//pad ma'i sna rtser yungs kar
235a1(rgyud): /tsam//rgyu dang khri rgyu'i rang bzhin kun//yid kyis bzlas par yang dag ldan//phyi yi dbyangs ni rnam par sbyangs//de la ye shes spangs rgyas te//gzhan gyis sangs rgyas/
235a2(rgyud): mi 'gyur ro//rtag tu sems dpa' dngos po shes//khrus med dri ma med pa ste//bde ba'i chos ni de bzhin she/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rang bzhin//thams cad me yi rnam pa ru//mthong
235a3(rgyud): ba mtshan ma dang po'o//srin bu me khyer rnam pa yi//mtshan ma gnyis par mtshon pa ni//rdul phran dkar po'i rnam pa ru//phyogs bcur 'jig rten mthong ba yin//nyon mongs 'don
235a4(rgyud): pa'i las rnams ni//rnal 'byor pa yi mtshan nyid dang //'dod pa lha yi ljongs spyod myang //bzhi pa mthong bar bstan pa'o//lha gzugs mtho ris lha rnams ni//gang la mthong bar
235a5(rgyud): sems pa'o//drug pa'i 'jig pa longs spyod do//bdun pa chos kyi dbyings nyid de//brgyad par 'dod pa'i sangs rgyas nyid//rnal 'byor rnams kyis 'bras bu thob//skra yi rtse
235a6(rgyud): /mor brgyar ba shugs cha//rdul phran shin tu bsam par bya//stong pa lo sogs dmigs mi bya//gzugs la sogs pa mi blta ste//rdul med sa bon med pa bzhin//gzugs
235a7(rgyud): med mtshan nyid med pa'o//rnam shes ye shes bzung ma yin//rnam shes de yi rang bzhin te//mngon shes brgyad po yang dag 'thob//kun mkhyen kun byed gtso bo ste//ye
235b1(rgyud): shes sku ni dri ma med//skye ba 'di la thob par 'gyur//bzi brjid stobs dang ldan pa yin//sdug cing skal pa bzang por ston//dpag bsam shing ni yang dag byung //rtag tu sgom zhing bzlas pa//
235b2(rgyud): ni//ji srid lus ni bskul bskyod dang //ngag gi smra ba thams cad ni//de snyed sngags dang phyag rgya ste//dpal ldan khrag 'thung go 'phang gnas//pad+ma bzhi dang 'khor lo che//de bzhin
235b3(rgyud): dngos grub kun gyi bzhi//dpa' bo bye ba rnams dang ni//sangs rgyas bye bas legs par gsungs//dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las thams cad so sor gsal ba'i
235b4(rgyud): mngon par shes pa brgyad nges pa ro bstan pa'i cho ga'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o////de nas gzugs brnyan gyis zhi ba//'di ru yid ldan don du gsung //gang gis
235b5(rgyud): myur ba de 'grub pa//nad pa zhi bar byed pa ni//pho mo rgyal po byis pa rnams//sus kyang chog shes bya ba//spang leb khre sogs stan rnams ni//'bras dang sran chung yang dag bsres//
235b6(rgyud): shin tu bcos nas bsnos byas te//nywa dang sha dang khrag gos ni//gzugs brnyan dag ni bya ba ste//bu mas bskul ba'i skud pa ni//sgra yi tshad du bya ba yin//sngags kyi yo gas
235b7(rgyud): bskul bar bya//drug dang bcu gnyis yi ges so//bla re dag ni bye ba dang //sna tshogs go sau dang rgyal mtshan mchog/dri dang spos dang me tog segs//gsang sngags kyis ni
236a1(rgyud): bskul bar bya//srung ba chen mo'i gos kyi ni//smad g.yogs dang ni stod g.yogs byas//gang gis cung zad nad pa yi//spyod lugs ji ltar yin pa bzhin//ro ru song
236a2(rgyud): nas bskyal bar bye//rol mo sna tshogs glu dbyangs dang //de bzhin gzhugs pa bya ba ste//gzugs brnyan la ni gdags par bya//dpung rgyan lag gdub mgul rgyan dang //gos
236a3(rgyud): la sogs pa rnams kyis rgyan//rked pa la ni mautshon chas bcings//lag pa ral gri 'dzin pa ste//spyi bor cing zhing go cha bgos//snying rje la sogs phan pa'i sems//dpal ldan
236a4(rgyud): khrag 'thung rnal 'byor che//go cha gsum gyis rnam par rgyun//dur khrod du ni 'gro ba ste//rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bos bskor//'du byed rnams ni dang por byas//dkyil 'khor/
236a5(rgyud): mdzes par bri ba stau//ma ma rnams dang rnal 'byor ma//sgom zhing phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dgod//de du lha rnams yang dag bzhi gau/gzugs bstan lus ni lho phyogs su//
236a6(rgyud): sngags pas mgo bo bstan par bya//ji ltar mdzes pas bsgrub bya sgom//nod rnams kun las rnam par grol//g.yas brkyang gis ni yang dag gnas//rtsa ba'i sngags
236a7(rgyud): sogs kyis ni srung //sngags pas kha ni shar du bltas//log pas shes rab kha T+wAM ge/brib ma bgom par byas nas ni//lte ba'i phyogasu brdeg par bya//ji ltar sdug
236b1(rgyud): bsngal bar ni gtub//lha spyan+da nad ni zhi bar 'gyur//dbang po la sogs shar phyogs bzhag/sngags kyo bskul par bya ba ste//ji ltar cung za dang shug par bya//rlob dpon gyis ni
236b2(rgyud): mdzes par brtag/khye'u so khye'u grol ba ste//bu mos bu mo grol ba yin//thams cad khrus dang btsang sbra dang //mdzes shing bri bar bya ba ste//phyi dang slob dpon dgyes par bya//
236b3(rgyud): gos dang rgyan la sogs pa yi//gzhan kun la yang mchong par bya//bza' ba btung sogs gos kyis so//gsang ba chen pos zhi bar bya//dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba las
236b4(rgyud): 'bum phrag gsum las btus pa bstan bcos thams cad kyi rgyal po dpal khrag 'thung chen po bklags pas 'grub pa/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gzhan las rgyal ba

236b6(rgyud): ba bcings yon tan 'bor gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o////rgya gar skad du/badz+ra bA ra hi a b+hi dA na/bod skad du/rdo rje phag mo mngon par 'byung ba//sangs rgyas la
236b7(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo//de nas rnal 'byor bshad bye ba//'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa'o//phyi ma las kyang phyi ma ste//mkha 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom//phag mo yi ni gtso mo yang //rnal
237a1(rgyud): 'byor rnams kyi sgrub ster ma'o//rnal 'byor ma lus rnams kyi yang //snying po rnal 'byor ba tu sa pa'o//sgrub pa po la phan don phyir//bla ma'i brgyud pa gsal ba'o//
237a2(rgyud): phyi rol rnam tog med pa dang //kun tu dam tshig tshes nyid dang //spyod dang dogs pa med pa dang /kun tu saur sna rnam spangs te//tshes grangs dang ni rgyu skar med//bsnyan gnas tshe
237a3(rgyud): gau gtsor med de//dag dang ma dag gtsang yang med//chu yi gtsang sgo bya ba med//dus dang mal las rnam par grol//gtsang sbra'i spyod pa rnam par spangs//rang rgyud sngags dang

237a5(rgyud): sa dang khang stong dang //ma mo'i khyim dang dur khrod dang //bskyed mos tshul mchog sna tshogs dang //lha khang dang ni mchod rten gnas//khyim mam yang ni bzhi mdo ru//'dod pa

237b2(rgyud): yisu//tshangs pa'i gnas ni bzhi po dang //bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dag dang //sems can kun la bde 'byung ba'i//dge ba bcu ni dmigs por bya'o//chos rnams stong pa nyid du ni//phyi

237b5(rgyud): thams ni nyams dga' bar//dkyil 'khor dam pa mthong ba ste//byin gyis brlab pa dag kyang ngo //til gyi gang bu bzhin mthong te//khro bo lha mo thams cad dang //sangs rgyas byang chub
237b6(rgyud): sems dpa' dang //bla ma byang chub sems dpa' dag/mchod dang mchod pa byed pa'i bdag/lha mo rnam par dgu mthong ste//sangs rgyas tshogs kyi sprul pa spro//khro bo rgyal po rnola'i byer
237b7(rgyud): ma//'gro ba rigs drug sems can yang //de ni sangs rgyas nyid du bzhog/nam mkha'i khams zhes bya ba dbus//de nyid du ni zhugs mthong te//ji srid byang chub snying po'i bor//
238a1(rgyud): thams cad du ni sgru ba su mchi//sems can ma lus gyur pa rnams//sangs rgyas go 'phang la bzhag bya//sgrub pas de la gsol ba gdag//rtag tu skyabs su
238a2(rgyud): gsol bar bya//phung po lnga la de rgyal ni//sems bzang po ni bskyed par bya//gzugs dang tshar dang 'du shes dang //'odu byed rnam par shes nyid kyang //rnam zhes
238a3(rgyud): pa/rnam snang rdo rje nyi ma dang //de bzhin pad+ma gar gyi dbang //rdo rje rgyal po zhes grags dang //de bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' mchog/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid//dpal
238a4(rgyud): ldan rdo rje he ru ki//mig dang rna ba sna dag drung //lus dang ngag dang de bzhin nyid//oM hUM tAM A khaM haM//gti mug zhe sdang phyug dog dang //'dod chags ser sna nyid kyang ngo //skye mched/

238a6(rgyud): bai lha me ni//nam mkha' dang mnyam lta bu'o//de ltar phung po khams dang skye ched rnams la rnal 'byor pa tha mol pa'i rang bzhin yongasu dge ba'i chos thams cad ring gis yongasu dge
238a7(rgyud): zhes rnam par dag pa'i nga rgyal bya'o//de'i 'og tu gsum la skyabasu gsol to//sngags kyi lus su gyur par bya'o//bdag nyid he ru kar bsgoms te//sems can kun gyi don
238b1(rgyud): kyang byed//he ru ka yi gnas thob par//bla na med pa'i go 'phang la//sems can thams cad bzhag par bya//oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha/sarba d+harmA/swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho haM//zhes lan gsum brjod do//
238b2(rgyud): nyi ma'i 'od zer phreng lta bu'i//dngos po kun brtse phyogs bcu ru//'od zer de las ra bya dang //de bzhin du ni du byar ba lta//rdo rjes kr-i zhi byin gyis brlabs//bla re mda' yi ra ba dang /
238b3(rgyud): rdo rje me 'bar dra ba ni//de yi phyi rol ring du bas mo//oM me di ni badz+ra b+hA ba badz+ra ban+d+ha haM//oM badz+ra bA ka ra hUM gi oM badz+ra pany+dza ra hUM baM hUM/oM bodz+ra ba tAn hUM khaM hUM/oM shwa ra dz+wa la traM saMd+d+haM//
238b4(rgyud): badz+ra dz+wa la A na lArka hUM hUM hUM//mdzub mo mthe bong dag sbyar to//se gol gtogs te phyogs bcur yang //oM sum b+ha naM su b+haM hUM hU~M phaT sha ra du'i//oM gr-ih+Na grah+Na hUM hUM phaT byang du'o//aM
238b5(rgyud): gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M hU~M pha rnanab tu'o//oM A na ye ho d+h+r-i ga bAn badz+ra hUM hU~M phaTu m+bu ru'o//sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis bgegs thams cad kyi migo la phur pa bti bI ti g.yos bai skor dang
238b6(rgyud): g.yon pa bskor ba ma yin po'o//oM g+ha g+ha g+hi ta ya g+hA ta ya/sarba dweSh+T+r-i ne big+h+nAM hU~M phaT//kI li kI li ya//sarba pA baM hUM hU~M hU~M/badz+ra kI la ye badz+ra d+hA ra Adz+nyA pa ya ti/s+yArba duSh+pA Na big+h+nA
238b7(rgyud): ya bA kyai d+ha badz+ra kI la hUM phaT/brdung bar bya ste/rdo rje bu ripa la khro ba'i lte bas bistis nas/gorims dang go rims mi yin pas rdo rje sgrub pa pos brdungs te/oM badz+ri mu sa
239a1(rgyud): badz+ra kI la ya A kau TA ya d+hu phaT//bdud med bdud kyi las kyang med//rang gi sems kyis bcings pa bzhin//gang gis rang gi sems 'dul na/
239a2(rgyud): gang las bdud ni gnas pa ra'i gyur//stong nyid ye shes rdo rje yang //mAnyam gzhag dang bA sa dran par bya//oM ma hA shA n+ya dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko haHau a naM met+ta dz+nyA na
239a3(rgyud): badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko he//oM a prA Ni hi ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/mig yo ra tsam gyi ye sho sa ni//sems tsam rnam pa rI brtag par bya//na mkha' lta bu'i chos
239a4(rgyud): 'di dag/chos can med cing chos nyid med//nam mkha' lta bur gos pa med//dngos po med cing rtog pa med//snying rje'i bdag nyid phan bya'i phyir//smon lam dbang gis
239a5(rgyud): dmigs bya ste//ji srid sa yi 'og dmigs pa//rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam par bya//yi gri yi ge las 'byung ba//gzhu 'dra kha dog sngo dang ldan//rgyal
239a6(rgyud): mtshan gyis mtshan bsam bya ste//du ba'i phreng ba'i 'khregs pa'o//de yi steng du raM la sa ni//me yi dkyil 'khor mchog yin to//zur gsum po la kha dog dmar//
239a7(rgyud): 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrug cing dmar//nyi ma bye ba lte bur gnas//rdo rjes mtshan pa bsam par bya//de yi steng du chu nyid kyang //baM las bum pa mchog tu gyur//
239b1(rgyud): rnam thong 'ong zor brong bar ldan/khab lta bu nyid kyi drung //do y-i stang du bas pa bya ba//lo lus byung ba sor por ldan//gru bzhi pa lta rdo rjes mtshan//'od zer ser po'i tshogs 'khrug
239b2(rgyud): 'o//de steng rnal 'byo pe ba rloms pas//de la rgyal por rab mchog/zur ba ni rin chen bzhi rang bzhin//rtswa maM brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes//sum las byung ba bzang po'i//
239b3(rgyud): 'od zer bzang po mchog ge mchog/de yi steng du bsgom bya ba//bru las byung ba rtag pa ste//de yongs gyur las 'khor lo mchog/gzhal yas khang pa rnam par bsam//gru bzhi pa
239b4(rgyud): la sku bzhi pa//rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan//dri ba dra ba phyed pas spras//dar dang me tog chun pus rgyan//grwa yi cha ni thams cad dang //sgro khyed kyi ni mtshams rnams su//
239b5(rgyud): rdo rje dran po che yis spras//phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya//pad ma mdab ma brgyad pa bri//sna tshogs kha dog mchog gi mchog/lte ba dang ni gr-i sar bcas//thams
239b6(rgyud): cad dge ba nyid kyi bdani//de yi dbus su zla ba'i cha//gsal ba'i rang bzhin dri ma medo//de steng A le ka li ni//dbus su bAM gis rgyan pa'o//de yi dbus bzhengs gtso mo ni//
239b7(rgyud): phag mo rdo rje rnal 'byor ma//zhal bzhi phyag ni bcu gnyis te//spyan gsum shin tu chags pa'o//gdan la byed dkyil gyis bzhugs te//shin tu mdzes pas gar byed pa
240a1(rgyud): phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba//phyed ni dbus ma dbang phyug zhal//dkar dang dmar dang 'di 'dri'i gzugs//thod pa'i dbus ni dbu rgyan mdzes//rdo rje dril
240a2(rgyud): buM phyag rgya bsnams//pad ma bskor cing 'khor ba ldan//dpral bar phyag rgya 'bar pa dang //mi yi lpags pa bla gos dang //thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing //zhags pa lcags
240a3(rgyud): kyu 'dzin po bzhag/cang te'u gri gug mgo bo yang //zhal bzhi pa ni tshangasau pa yi//so dang ser dang ljang ku yi//bzang po'i zhal gyis nye bar mdzes//zhal ni mche ba gtsigs
240a4(rgyud): pa ste//zla ba phyed pas steng du rgyan//sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu rgyan mtshan//dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin phyed//lha mo phyag rgya drug gis rgyan//dum bu brgyad pas ska rags ni//
240a5(rgyud): ska rags sil sil sgra sgrogs pa//rkang pa'i gdub kyis nye bar mdzes//dpung rgyan mdzes par byed pa dang //dpral bar rdo rje phreng ba dang //phyag rgya rdo rjes mtshan paso//shin tu
240a6(rgyud): gzugs bzang yid du 'ong //shar gyi mdab mar mkha' gro ma//seng gdong ma he 'jigs par byed//byang gi phyog su 'phags gdong ma//lha mo lA ma 'jigs byed ma//nub tu
240a7(rgyud): lha mo glang po'i gdong //dum skyes ma te dra mo'o//lho ru lha mo gzugs can ma//rta yi gdod pa lhag pa'i gzugs//spyan gsum sna tshogs gzugs can ma'o//thod pa
240b1(rgyud): taT+wAM ga 'dzin cing //mgo bo gri gug 'dzin pa can//gcer bu skra ni grol ba ste//gar byed pa yis shin tu mdzes//yo dgas gdan la phyed dkyil gyis//drag cing gtum pa 'jigs/
240b2(rgyud): pa'i//'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan ma//lha mo zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan//me lha sogs pa mtshams bzhi ru//byang chub sems la sogs pa'i snod//bum pa'i steng du rnam par
240b3(rgyud): dgod//dung dung kun zla 'dra ba la//byang shar la stsogs phyogs bzhi ru//rtsibs drag pa yi 'khor lo bri//'khor lo dbus su bri bya ga//rigs kyi lha mo bzhi po ni//lha mo ma ma ki
240b4(rgyud): dang spyan//sgrol ma gas dkur mo dag ste//sngo dang dkor dang dmar ba ste//lha mo dz+ha rti rigs dbang phyug/dkar dang sngo dang dmar po yi//lha mo rtag pa'i rigs rten na//sdang ku
240b5(rgyud): dkaro dang dmar ba yi//lha mo las kyi rigs yin no//dmar dang ser dang ljang ku yi//lha ma pad mo'i rigs las byung //spyan gsum sgra ni grol ba yin//phyogs kyi gos ni 'dzin
240b6(rgyud): pa yi//rgyun rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs//phyag rgya drug gis rnam par d+hun//thod pa khe T+wAM ga 'dzin cing //rang gi mtshan me rnam pa bzhi//rdo rje 'khor la rgya gram dang /
240b7(rgyud): pad ma dmar po mchog gi mchog/de bzhin thams cad dril bu 'dzin//pad+ma bskor ba byed pa'o//bdud bzhi pa na zhabs kyi man ni//gar dang bcas shing bzhad pa'i nel//
241a1(rgyud): sna tshogs pad+ma ma zla dbus bzhugs//rigs kyi dang glu rlung bzhin byed//mgo dang n+ya du byugan pasnams//dza grag sa kyang mdzes//rdod
241a2(rgyud): pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//mgo bos phreng bas rkyen pa'o//mtshams kyi tshe ni thams cad du//gnas la sogs pa'i rim pa dgod//'khor lo'i rtsibs drug dang po la//
241a3(rgyud): pul+li ra ma yAr rab gtum ma'o//rtsi bas gnyis pa la dzA lan d+ha ra ra//gtum pa'i mig can na//gsum pa u rkyen du 'od ldan ma'o//bzhi pa a ra bu dar sna chen ma'o//
241a4(rgyud): lnga pa go dang rir brtan pa'i blo can ma'o//drug pa rA me shwa ri ra mi'u thung ma'o//gnyis pa byang gi 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa'o//de bi ko Ti rA laM ka'i dbang phyug ma'o//gnyis pa
241a5(rgyud): ma la yar shing grib ma'o//gsum ba kA mA ru pa ra sa bsrungs ma'o//bzhi pa o Ter 'jigs byed chen mo'o//wA pa tri sha kur nir rlung gi shugs can ma'o//drug pa kaM sa
241a6(rgyud): lar chang 'thung ma'o//gsum pa nub kyi 'khor rtsibs drug go//shar gyi 'khor lo rtsibs dang po ko lo ka ra ljang lha mo'o//gnyis pa la~M ba ka re shin tu bzang ma'o//gsum pa
241a7(rgyud): kany+tsi kar rtan mo'o//bzhi po kha bcan du bya ba gdong ma'o//lnga pa preta pu rir 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o//drug pagr-i ha daM pa tang dum skyes ma'o//bzhi pa lho'i 'khom
241b1(rgyud): rtsibs kyi shar du sau raSh+Ta ra chang 'tshong ma'o//gnyis pa gser gling du 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o//gsum pa nA ga ra rar shin tu dpa' mo'o//bzhi pa sin dur stobs chen ma'o//lnga pa ma
241b2(rgyud): ror 'khor los bsgyur ma'o//drug pa kun lu tar brtson 'grus che ni mo'o//dang po dkar ljang thod pa dang //kha T+wAM ga dang 'khor lo dang //cang te'u dang gri gug go/gnyis pa byang du ljang
241b3(rgyud): ser//rdo rje dang /thod pa dang /kha T+wAM ga dang //cang te'u dang /gri gug go/gsum pa nub tu da mAr ser thod pa dang //ba T+wAM ga dang pad ma dang /cang te'u dang /gri gug go/bzhi po lha'i
241b4(rgyud): lha mo ser dmar sna tshogs rdo rje dang /cang te'u dang /gri gug dang /thod pa dang /kha T+wA~M ga 'dzin pa'o//lha mo thams cad bud med phyed dbang phyug spyan gsum pa/phyag bzhi pa/
241b5(rgyud): gcer bu/skra grol ba/phyed dkyil gyi zhabs kyis bzhugs pa//yi dgas kyi gdan gyi steng na//thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan ca nau/phyag rgya lnga sau rgyan po/rkang padu ba dang ska rags
241b6(rgyud): dang /dbu rgyan rnams rdo rje mtshan pa'o//de nas 'khor lo phyi bskor te//rdo rje'i phreng ba shar du'o//'khor lo'i phreng ba byang du'o//sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba nub tu'o//pad+ma'i phreng ba
241b7(rgyud): g+ho ru'o//dbus su rdo rje rabs mdzes//mtshams kyi cha rnams thams cad du//sna tshogs rdo rje yang dag bri//blo ldan de yi phyi rol bskor//yi dgas phreng ba sna tshig ldan//
242a1(rgyud): phyi rol dkyil 'khor sgro rnams dang //mtshams kyi cha ni bzhi rnamasu//mkha' 'gro drag po'i gzugs can no//de la mnyam par gzhag pas dgod//khA gdang ma
242a2(rgyud): ni shar du dgod//kha dog sngon po yid 'phrog ma'o//'ug gdong ma ni byang gi sgor//dmar zhing ljang lo mdzes pa'o//khyi ga drong ma ni nub kyi sgor//drag cing ser mo dub 'dre//lho yi
242a3(rgyud): ngos su phog gdong ma//ldang zhing sngon pa'i gzugs can ma'o//spyan gsum drag po 'jigs pa'o//phyogs kyi gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/'bru tshugs blta zhing bde thung ma//gaR+Sha
242a4(rgyud): brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs//sna tshogs pad+ma'i nyi dbus gnas//phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par rgya no//thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//dbu skra grol zhing rnam par brtags
242a5(rgyud): gshin rje brtan ma ma he gdong //me yi phyogasu bzhugs pa'o//gshin rje pho nya bang bu'i gdong //bden bral gyi ni phyogasu bzhugs//gshin rje'i mche ba rnga mo'i gdong //rlung du
242a6(rgyud): rten cing drag por ldan//gshin rje 'joms ma rta yi gdong //dbang ldan rten cing rnam par 'khor//thod pa'i phre ba'i dbu rgyun can//sna tshogs gzugs can yid 'breg ma/
242a7(rgyud): gcer bu skra ni grol ba dang /khyed dkyil gyi ni ger dang ldan//mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal//spyan gsum zhal ni g.yo ba ste//sna tshogs pad+ma nyi dbus gnas/'dod//
242b1(rgyud): pa'i drag pos brtag pa'o//'khor gyi lha mo dkyil 'khor rnams//thams cad yi dgas steng du bzhugs//thod pa kha T+wA~M ga 'dzin cing //kri gug mtho bo 'dzin par byed //lag pa g.yon nu rnga chung na//
242b2(rgyud): rdung bar byed cing shin tu 'jigs//phyi rol bskor ba'i rnam pa ni//gzhan yang rnam pa mang por 'gyur//glu dang gar gyi yo byad dang //sna tshogs dam tshig mchog rnams dang //spos dang me tog mar
242b3(rgyud): mo sogs//dri dang phreng ba byug pa dang //lha yi na bza' gzhal yas khang //lha yi rol mo mchog gi rnams//kun nas yongasu bskor ba yis//phyi yi rnal 'byor mas mchod byed//de la sogs
242b4(rgyud): pab mtha' ya se mchog/na mkha'i khams ni yongs gang las//rnal 'byor ma yi sbyor ba mchog/phag mo mngom par 'byung ba'i mchog/gsang ba chen po'i mchog 'di ni//cung zad smra
242b5(rgyud): par mi bya ste/phyi rol yi dgas phreng ba dang //dkyil 'khor dam pa bsgomo par bya//'di ltar dgod par bya ba ni//ji ltar 'khor de rnams dgod//sen mo dang so dag la ni rab tu gtum ma'o///
242b6(rgyud): rmA dang ba~M spu dgol gtum pa'i mig can ma'o//lpags pa dang dri ma dag la 'od ldan ma'o//sha la sna tshon ma'o//rtsa rgyus la brtan pa'i blo can ma'o//rus pa la mi'u thung ma'o//mkhal ma
242b7(rgyud): le lang ki'i dbang phyug ma'o//snying la ni shing grib ma'o//mig les pasrungs ma'o//mkhres pa li 'jigs byed tshon mo'o//glo ba la rlung gi shugs can ma'o//rma maM la chang 'thung ma
243a1(rgyud): /gam la ltung l+h+wa ma'o//lbu ba l+ya shin tu bzad ma'o//rkang pa la rtan ma'o//'das su bya ga ma'o//bdakan ma 'khor la shugs can ma'o//rnaka la dum smos
243a2(rgyud): ma'o//khrag 'chang 'tshang ma'o//rdul la 'khor lo gar+b+ha ma'o//tshil la shin tu dpa'i mo'o//mtshan po la shin tu stobs can ma'o//mchi la ma la 'khor los bskyer mo'o//sdub
243a3(rgyud): la brtson 'grus chen mo'o//pul+lI ra ma la ya skye mag la rab tu gtu ma'o//hU~M lanA d+ha ste smyi gtsug la gtum pa'i mig can ma'o//ur+d+han rten du g.yas pa la 'od ldan ma'o//
243a4(rgyud): a.Ar pu tasti lhag par sna tshe ma'o//go dam ri sti rU ba g.yon pa la brtan pa'i blo can ma'o//rI mi shwa ra sti smin ma'i dbus su mi'u thung ma'o//de bi ko Ta ste mig gnyi su la pa
243a5(rgyud): kwa'i dbang phyugs ma'o//mU la wa ste phrag pa gnyis la shing grib ma'o//kA ma ru pa sti mchun khung gnyi su se bsrungs mab+ho//oM tre ste nu ma gnyi su 'dzegs byed chen ma/
243a6(rgyud): d+h+r-i sha ku ni ste lte ba la rlung gi shugs can ma'o//kos la sde sA rtser chung 'thung mo'o//ki la~M kA s+yai kha la lteng lnga po'o//lAM pa ka ste mgrin par shin tu bzang mo'o// ste/
243a7(rgyud): snying ka ri d+han ma'o//te ma~M la ya sti 'angos su bya gdong ma'o//pr-i ta bu ri ste gsang bar 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o//gr-i he de ba tI ste ba shang lam du dum skyes ma'o//so
243b1(rgyud): brla gnyis la chang 'tshong ma'o//su brna dwI pa ste rje ngar gnyis la 'khor lo'i po cha ma'o//nA ga ra ste sor mo rnams la shin tu dpa' mo'o//srin d+huste rkang pa'i bol la stobs chen mA'o//mar//
243b2(rgyud): ste mthe bong gnyis la 'khor los bsgyur ma'o//ku lu ta ste pus mo gnyis la brtson 'grus chen mo'o//sa'i khams ni ltung bar byed ma'o//chu'i khams ni gsod par byed ma'o//me'i khams
243b3(rgyud): ni 'gug par byed ma'o//rlung gi khams ni gar gyi dbang phyug ma'o//nam mkha'i khams ni pad ma'i dra ba can no//gzugs kyi phung po ni rnam par snang mdzad do//tshor ba'i phung po na rdo rje nyi ma'o/
243b4(rgyud): 'du shes kyi phu po la pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug go/'du byed kyi phung po la rdo rje rgyal po'o//rnam par shes pa'i phung po la rdo rje sems dpa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid la dpal
243b5(rgyud): he ru ka'o//mig gnyis la gti mug rdo rje'o//rna ba gnyis la zhe sdang rdo rje'o//sku gnyis la phrag dog rdo rje'o//kha la 'dod chags rdo rje'o//reg la ser sgra rdo rje'o//skye mched thams
243b6(rgyud): cad la dbang phyug rdo rje'o//thugs la rdo rje mi bskyod pa//kha la rdo rje 'od dpag med//sku la rdo rje rnam snang mdzad//oM be lte ba la rdo rje phag mo'o//hUM yoM snying kha rA ya mi nA'o//dz+nye mo kha la
243b7(rgyud): rmongs byed pa'o//hr-i hri mgo bo la skyed byed ma'o//hUM hUM spyi gtsug la skrag byed ma'o//ba Ta pa Ta yan lag thams cad la mtshon cha ma ste gtu mi byed ma'o//de ltar rab tu dgrong byas te/
244a1(rgyud): ye shes 'khor la de mthong nas//do y-i rnal 'byor btsam par bya//dngos po kun gyi nga ba 'dis//mdzub mo mdung blo gung mo nges par sbyar//mthe bong rdo rje brtan par rab
244a2(rgyud): sbyar te//de ni dpral ba'i dbyingasu rab sbyar nas//bskor zhing bskor zhing bskor bar bya//rkang pa mnan cing gyen du blta//gyen du pheM gau sgra sgrogs pas//phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams gnas
244a3(rgyud): ba'i//dpa' ba rnal 'byor mo rnams 'gugs//dzaHhUM baM ho/rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sbyor bas dgug pa dang //gzhug pa dang /bcing ba dang /dbang du bya ba'o//dpa' bo thams
244a4(rgyud): cad rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis/na mkha'i dkyil yongasu gang bar bltas te/bdud rtsi lnga sa yongasu gang ba'i bum pas mngon par dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o//ji ltar bltams
244a5(rgyud): patsam gyis kyang //de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsal ba'i//lha yi chu 'di dag pa yis//de bzhin bdag gis khrus bya'o//oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA oM d+he She ka sa ma yA shrI hU~M A~Mr+g+haM/
244a6(rgyud): rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du a las byung ba'i thod par ye shes lnga'i bdud rtsi gang ba cha bcu drug dang //hUM bo dang oM gyis byin gyis byin gyis brlabs te/yi ge ga~Ms
244a7(rgyud): gyur bar bsam la 'khor lo gsum bsgom par bya'o//oM sa ma ya shud+d+heHsa dza~M d+hi rmA/sa ma ya dz+haiMH/chos thams cad kun tu gcig pas gnas par sems kyis phyin//
244b1(rgyud): yis bdud rtsi sbyin pa yis//ye shes bdud rtsi'i chu btung ngo //a a mr-i ta u da ka hU~M ka hU~M two tha tha lo g+hu/a khaM hUM phaT swA //ye shes bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis//'khor lo'i tshogs mchog
244b2(rgyud): spro bar bya//ruso pa chen po'i phreng ba yis//phyis ni bzlas pa de gnas bya//srog dang rtsol po rab bsdams te//bas ma na skad cig gis 'char ro//dbang bskur mchod dang dam tshig ni//ro
244b3(rgyud): gcig byas te bsgoms pa yis//de snying ye shes sems dpa' dang //mchod pa ye shes bdud rtsi yis//lus dang ngag yid dam tshig ni//sems can bsam med shin tu brtag/
244b4(rgyud): bzlas dong sgom pa yang dag ldan//rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs te//dam tshig mchog gi bzlas pa 'dis//gsang sngags rgyal po'i mchog bzlaso//oM bai ro tsa nI ye hUM hU~M phaT swA hA/
244b5(rgyud): oM sarba bud d+ha DA ki nI hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA//oM dang ming ni yang dag ldan//hUM hUM phaT dang yang dag ldan//rab tu gtum sogs de stegs sogs//bzlas pa'i mchog la sbyar bar bya//oM badz+ra pA
244b6(rgyud): rA he pro ta ga br-i ti go//hai na ha ni prA tAM/ki ki mi Shi N+Di d+hIn d+hun/badz+ra histaM she Sha ya/sho Sha ya/badz+ra kha T+wAM gaM ka pA la d+hA ri Ni//ma hA pi si ta mAM sA shwa ni/mA nu Sh+ya tA br-i br-id+d+he s+phon ni d+hI na rI
244b7(rgyud): remA lA grA thi tad+hA ri /su~M d+han suM g+hA/tan d+ha na/prA d+h+waM sarba pA pa sa twA nA~M sarba pa shUnA~M ma hA mAMs ts+tshad ni/kr-id+ha mAHdaiShA ka rA li ni/ma hA mU dr-i shrIHhe ru ki deng swA gr-i mo he Sho sa ho sro shi nga/
245a1(rgyud): hAsrA b+hUd+hU ba sha t+yA s+yA t+yA swa Ananr-i dz+wA liHd+hAdza saM ng+ga lAm+b+ha paig la//mAn+da na badz+rA shAd+tha//badz+rA A s+yAn+tam+b+ha l-im+b+ha 'o//ta ma la~M ti mi lo/h+nit+tha/tAta/hU~Mdz+haiM//kAr+b+ha d+hA/
245a2(rgyud): ru ru/d+hu ru d+hu ru/mu ru mu ru/a dr-i to me hA yo ga nI rbi ti si d+ha dr-i d+ha dr-i d+hi gr-i graM he he ha ha/b+hI me ha sa he sa bI re hA tA//ha ho/hUM hUM/trai lo kya bi nA sha ta sa ha sra ko Ti ta thA gA tA pai ri wA ri ti hUM/
245a3(rgyud): /hUM phaT/siM ha rU pe kha/ ga dzo ru pe gaHtrai lo kyaM u di re ma hA sa mu dra me kha le gra saM gA sa hU~M hUM phaT/bI rA dai te/hUM hUM ha haHme hA pa shu mo hi ni ma hA yo gI shwa re tI/DA kI nI sarba lo kAM naM
245a4(rgyud): bAn+d+ha ni s+yA d+ya/pra t+yA ya kA ri Ni hu~M hU~M phaT/b+hUtwAtrA sa ni ma hA bI ri pA ra ma sid+d+he yo gI shA ra~M phaT/hU~M hUM phaT/hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA//de ltar rdo rje phag mo'i mchog tu grub pa'i snying po dmi pa'o//
245a5(rgyud): in mo b+ha ga bai ti badz+ra bA rA hi bi hU~M hU~M phaT/oM nA ma Ar+yA pa rA dzI ta trai lo kyaM mA tA ma hA bi d+ye shA rI hUM hUM phaT//oM na ma/sarba b+hU ta b+ha yA ba he ma hA badz+re huM hUM phaT/oM na mo badz+ra sa ni a dzi te
245a6(rgyud): a rA dzi te ba shraM ka ri nai tra b+hUm+b+ha Ni huM hUM phaT//ai na ma/sho ShA Ni ro Shi Ni kro d+ha na ke rA huM hUM phaT/oM na maM/tA sa ri mA ra Ni su pre b+hU da ni e pa rA dza ye huM hUM phaT/aM na mo dza ye bi dza ye dzam+b+ha
245a7(rgyud): nistam+b+ha ni mo ha ni huM hUM phaT/oM na mo badz+ra bA rA hi ma hA yo gi nI kA me shA ri khaM ge huM hUM phaT/sngags 'di thams cid du byas te/A li ka laM rdo rje phag mo'i bdag nyid kyi dngos por bya ste//
245b1(rgyud): rkang pa brgyad pa cho ga'i bdag nyid kyis mchod par bya'o//bzlas pa yongasu rdzogs nas ni//zhi ba'i gtung ba'i gtung ba'i mchog/chos rnams mnyam zhing dam chog mchog/sum bcu rtsa
245b2(rgyud): bdun gnas kyi mchog/de 'og rnam par dag po sgom//lus rjesu dran pa mkha'agro ma'o//tshor ba rje su dran pa lA ma'o/rdo rje su dran pa khaN+Da ro hi'o//sems rje su dran pa ru pi nI'o//bdun pa
245b3(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul bskyed pa mi rab tu gtum ma'o//brtson 'grus rdzu 'phrul bskyed pa ni gtum pa'i mig can ma'o//spyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul bskyed pa ni 'od ldan ma'o//sems kyi rdzu 'phrul bskyed pa ni sna
245b4(rgyud): tshon ma'o//dad pa'i dbang po ni brtan pa'i blo can ma'o//brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni mi'u thung ma'o//dran po'i dbang po ni ling kI'i dbang phyug ma'o//ting 'dzin gyi dbang po ni shing gring
245b5(rgyud): ma'o//shes rab kyi dbang po ni sa bsrungs ma'o//dad pa'i stobs ni 'jigs byed chen mo'o//brtson 'grus kyi stobs ni rlung gi shugs ma'o//dran pa'i stobs ni chang 'thung ma'o//ting nge
245b6(rgyud): 'dzin gyi stobs ni ljang lha mo'o//shes rab kyi stobs ni shin tu bzang mo'o//ting 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rten ma'o//brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni bya
245b7(rgyud): gdong ma'o//dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o//shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni dum skyes ma'o//chos rnam par 'byed pa yang
246a1(rgyud): dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chang 'tshong ma'o//dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o//btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni shin tu dpa' ma'o//
246a2(rgyud): yang dag pa'i lta ba ni stobs chen ma'o//yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni 'khor los bsgyur mo'o//yang dag pa'i ngag ni brtson 'grus chen mo'o//yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni khA gding ma'o//yang dag
246a3(rgyud): pa'i 'tsho ba ni 'ug gdong ma'o//yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni khyi gdong ma'o//yang dag pa'i dran pa ni phag gdong ma ste/rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi'o//yang dag pa'i tingange 'dzin ni bcom ldan
246a4(rgyud): 'das rdo rje bag mo'o//dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed par byed pa ni gshin rje brtan ma'o//dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams rjesu gnas pa dang srungs par byed pa ni gshin rje'i pha
246a5(rgyud): nya ma'o//mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spong bar byed pa ni go shin rje mche ba ma'o//mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skye bar byed pa ni gshin rje 'joms ma'o//chos bdag med pa'i
246a6(rgyud): lam na su//dkyil 'khor dam par bzhugs pa ni//shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba//de bzhin rnal 'byor ma dmar mo zhol steng du phyogs shing gyen du gzigs pa/zhabs g.yon pa
246a7(rgyud): la 'khyud pa'i thod pa'i phreng ba dang me tog gi phreng ba bcings pa'i phyag can mo/me tog gi zhags po g.yon pa'i phyag na'o//zhi bos g.yas pa'i rting pa la reg pa'i g.yas pa na rdo rje'i
246b1(rgyud): phyog can ma/rgyun thams cad spangs pa mo//rig pa 'dzin ma'i rigs pa'i sbyor ba can ma//spro zhing kun tu sdud pa'i lus can ma/man dA ra ba dang /mya ngan med pa dang /yongs 'du rnams skyes
246b2(rgyud): da gyur pa'i rin po che brtsegs pa'i khang par rab tu 'jug par bdag nyid sgom par bya'o//oM ba~M rdo rje phag mo'o//hU~M yoM sngon mo gshin rje ma'o//hriM ma~M rmongs byed ma'o//hraM hrI kun tu bskyed ma'o//
246b3(rgyud): hUM hUM kun tu sgeg byed ma'o//phaT phaT gtum mo yan lag thams cad la mtshan ma'o//lto ba dang /snying kha dang /de bzhin du kha dang /mgo bo dang /spyi bo ste 'di mtshon bya'o//rnal 'byor ma lnga po
246b4(rgyud): 'di rnams rdo rje sems dpar bshad do//rdo rje mkha 'gro ma'i go cha bgos la rang bzhin gyis bskyed pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya'o//oM shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra A kaD+D+h+ya a d+hU pr-i be She ya Sha tau Sha ya/sarba
246b5(rgyud): DA kI nI nI hr-i da yaM oM sarba bud+hA DA ki nI pra tIts+tshe mAM ba lI hU~M A~M//oM badz+ra DA ki nI ye pra tIts+tshe maM bi laM hUM hUM/oM rat+na DA ki nI pra tIts+tshi ma~M ba li hUM traM/oM pad+ma DA ki nI pra tIts+tsha maM ba~M laM hUM hrI/oM bi shA DA
246b6(rgyud): ki nI pre tIts+tshe maM ba liM hUM a/oM sarba yau gi nI pri tits+tshi maM ba liM hUM hUM/ha he he hi badz+ra dz+raHhU~M baM ho/oM badz+re yau gi nI sa ma ya~M/s+t+waM dr-i shaM rak+Sha rak+Sha tau//rig pa 'dzin ma'i rdo rje rnal
246b7(rgyud): 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas pa chen po dza ya sa na'i zhabs dang //lits+tsha ba btsun pa d+harme yon tan gyis bsgyur ba'o///
247a1(rgyud): /rgya gar skad du/yo ga nI sany+dzar+ya/bad skad du/rnal 'byor sa'i kun tu spyod pa/bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tsha l-I//gang na/
247a2(rgyud): drin gyis bde chen gnas//skad cig gis ni thob gyur pa//bla ma rin tshon lta bu yi//rdo rje can zhobs pa de la 'dud//de nas yang dag ba shad bya ba//kun tu spyod pa'i cho ga
247a3(rgyud): mchog/'khor lo gsum bdag 'di sgom pa//rnal 'byor lam la gnas pa yin//lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog par ni//rgyud du spros byar gnas gong de//bstan
247a4(rgyud): pa 'di ru ji skad gsungs//bshad pa yang ni de bzhi no//so sor bstan pa ma lus nyid//brda yi cho ga rgyas pa yin//gang gas shes pa tsam gyis ni//sgrub pa po yis grub
247a5(rgyud): thob pa//sum cu rtsa bdun tshul gyis ni//byang chub phyogs la gnas pa yin//'jig rten du ni bsgom byar bshad//he ru ka dpal 'gro ba'i mchog/de la thog mar rnal
247a6(rgyud): 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis phung po lha la lha'i nga rgyal bskyed par bya ba ste/gzugs kyi phung po la ni rnam par snang mdzad //tshor ba'i phung po la ni rdo rje nyi ma'o//'du shes kyi
247a7(rgyud): phung po la ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug/'du byed kyi phung po la ni rdo rje rgyal po'o//rnam par shes pa'i phung po la ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
247b1(rgyud): ny+tsi na/shA ha ru ka rnga rje'o//mig gnyis la ni gaN+DI mug rdo rje'o//rna ba gnyis la nI zhe sdang rdo rje'o//sna dag la ni phrag dog rdo rje'o//lce la ni 'dod chags rdo rje'o//lus la ni ser sna rdo rje rga
247b2(rgyud): skye mched thams cad la ni dbang phyug rdo rje'i dbyings/sa'i khams la ni ltung byed ma'o//chu'i khams la ni gsod ma'o//me'i khams la ni 'gugs ma'o//rlung gi khams la ni
247b3(rgyud): gang dbang ma'o//na mkha'i khams yun pad+ma'i dra ba mo ste/de ltar phung po dang khams dang /skye mched rnams la lha nyid kyi nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o//rnal 'byor pa'i kun tu spyod pa
247b4(rgyud): las lha rnams kyi gnas kyi rnam par dag pa gnas pa ste dang po'o//de nas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun lha'i sbyor bas sbyar bar bya ste/de thams cad kyang gang zhe
247b5(rgyud): na/lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /sems dran pa nyo bar gzhog pa dang /'dun pa'i rgyu
247b6(rgyud): 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pA da dA/dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dad pa'i dbang po dang /brtson
247b7(rgyud): 'grus kyis dbang po dang /dran pa'i dbang po dang /ting 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /shes rab kyi dbang po dang /drang po'i stobs dang /brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /dran pa'i
248a1(rgyud): stobs dang /nga rdzun gyi stobs dang /sa pa kyi stobs dang /ting 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /brtson 'grus yang dag byung chub kyi yan
248a2(rgyud): lag dang /dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan log dang /chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
248a3(rgyud): dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yon lag dang /btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /yang dag pa'i dag
248a4(rgyud): dang /yang dag pa'i lus kyi mtha' dang /yang dag pa'i tsha ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin dang /dge ba'i chos
248a5(rgyud): mu skyes pa rnams bskyed pa dang /dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par srung ba dang /mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spong ba dang /mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnam
248a6(rgyud): me po skyed pa'o//de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag po dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag
248a7(rgyud): dang do 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mthar thug pa rnams ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdan yin//rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las byang chub
248b1(rgyud): sa rgyas snyam duHbdun bstan pa sgrogats+tshas d+hag/dol du rnams ky-i m+b+hi'i ba b+h+ya s+yA d+hi lta bur mdor brdzus pa ste/sgras dran pa hUM bar gzhag pa na
248b2(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma'o//tsher ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni lA ma'o//chos dran pa nye bar gzhag po ni khaN+Da ro hi'o//sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni gzugs can ma'o//'dun
248b3(rgyud): pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni rab gtum ma'o//brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni gtum pa'i mig can ma'o//dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni 'od ldan ma'o//sems
248b4(rgyud): kI rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni sna tshan ma'o//dad pa'i dbang po ni dpa' bo'i blo gros ma'o//brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni ma'i tha~Mng rtswa'o//dran pa'i dbang po ni lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o/
248b5(rgyud): ting 'dzin gyi dbang po ni shing grib ma'o//shes rab kyi dbang po ni sa srung ma'o//dad pa'i stobs ni 'jigs byed chen mo'o//rtson 'grus kyi stobs ni rlung gi shugs can ma'o//
248b6(rgyud): dran pa'i stobs ni chang 'thung ma'o//ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs ni sngo bsangs lha mo'o//shes rab kyi stobs ni shin tu bzang mo'o//ti 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni
248b7(rgyud): rta rna ma'o//brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni bya gdong ma'o//dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i shugs can mo'o//shin tu sbyangs pa
249a1(rgyud): /yang dang byang chub kyi yan lag no khat+ta ro hA'o//chos rnam par 'dod pa yang dag byung chub kyi yan lhag na rba du 'tshong ma'o//dran pa yang dag byang chub tu/
249a2(rgyud): yan lag ni 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o//bat+tA snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni shin tu dpa' mo'o//yang dag pa'i lta ba ni stobs chen ma'o//yang dag pa'o rtog pa
249a3(rgyud): ni 'khor los bsgyur ma'o//yang dag pa'i ngag ni brtson 'grus chen mo'o//yang dag pa'i lus kyi mtha' ni khyu gdong ma'o//yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni 'ag gdong ma'o//
249a4(rgyud): yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni khyi gdong ma'o//yang dag pa'i dran pa ni phag gdong ma'o//yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin ni bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka'o//dge ba'i chos ma skyes
249a5(rgyud): rnams bskyed pa nig shin rje brtan ma'o//dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par srung ba ni g+ha shin+da rje pho nya mu'i//mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spong ba ni gshin rje
249a6(rgyud): miche ba ma'o//mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa nog shin rje 'joms ma'o//rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sna
249a7(rgyud): rnams kyi rnam par dag pa bstan pa ste gsum pa'o//de nas yang dge bshad bya ba//dpa' bo gnyis med dom pa ste//ho ru ka dpal sku'i yan lag/yan lag kunan
249b1(rgyud): shas gnas//sen mo dang so la ni thod pa phyed pa'o//skra dang spu la ni kong rus chen po'o//lpags pa dang dri ma la ni kong ruso//sha la ni mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'o//rgyus pa la ni/
249b2(rgyud): skyu dag+sab+h+yo//rus pa la ni 'od dpag med//mkha' mA la ni rdo rje 'od//snying lnga ni rdo rje smra'o//mig gnyis la myugla na no//mkhris pa la ni rdo rje ral pa tsan+do// ba lA ni du
249b3(rgyud): chen po'o//d+hu ma ya nI rdo rje d+hU mdzad//gnyi ma lu ni rab babyed//staM ba~M la nI rdo rje bzang po'o//bshang ba l-I ni 'jigs byed chen po'o//mtshogs ma'i sabyas la ni mig
249b4(rgyud): mi bzang //bad kun la ni stobs po che'o//rnag la ni rin chen rdo rje'o//khrag la ni rta mgrin to//rdul la nI na mkha'i snying po'o//tshil la ni dpal he ru ka'o//mchi ma la ni pad+ma
249b5(rgyud): gar gyi dbang phyug/mchil ma la ni rnam par snang mdzad//snabs la ni rdo rje sems dpa'o//rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las dpa' bo'i yan lag rnam par dag pa bstan
249b6(rgyud): pA ste bzhi pa'o///de nas gzhan yang ba shad bya ba//dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed pa//gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni//sgrub pos dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'o//
249b7(rgyud): ji ltar nang gi bdag nyid shes//bri yi dkyil 'khor dam pa yin/nam dgod ji ltar sbyor ba ni//snying po thams cad bsdus pa ste//rten dang rten pa'i tshul gyis ni//b+her
250a1(rgyud): /sogs yang dgra gnas/bla ma las brgyud rim bzhin du//yang zhig cho ga 'di shes pas//ra stengs pad+ma ge sar gyi//sna tshogs mang bum 'jam pa la//de sa
250a2(rgyud): dbus bzhugs dpa' po ni/'dod pa'i don kun sgrub mdzad pa//mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang //khaN+Da ro hi gzugs can ma//pad+ma'i phyogs kyi gnas la dgod//dngos grub thams
250a3(rgyud): cad sgrub byed yin//phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa//sna tshogs gzugs dang rnam rol ma'o//mtshams kyi bzhi po dag la ni//lnga pas gang ba'i thod pa bzhag/pu la sogs
250a4(rgyud): dang yang dag sbyar//yul dang yul du gnas pa yin//spyan drang 'khor lo'i dbus gnas la//rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod//pu zhes bya ba ni pu l+li ra ma la ya na khaN+Da ka pA la
250a5(rgyud): dang pra tsaN+Da'o//dzA zhes bya ba ni dzA lane d+ha ra na ma hA kaM kA l-i dang /tsaN+Da krI'o//u zhes bya ba ni ur+ya na na kaM kA la dang /pra b+hA ba tI'o//a zhes bya ba ni a ru bu da na bi ka Ta daMSh+Ti Na dang //
250a6(rgyud): ma hA nA pA ste gnaso//gau zhes bya ba ni go dA ba ri na su rI bai ri Na dang /bI ra ma tI'o//rA zhes bya ba ni rA me shA la na a mi tA b+ha dang /kha ra ba rI'o/de zhes bya ba ni de wi ko Te na badz+ra
250a7(rgyud): pra b+he dang /lang kai shwa ri'o//mAM zhes bya ba ni mA la ba nA badz+ra de ha dang /dru ma tsA yA'o//nye ba'i gan so//thugs kyi 'khor lo ste/na mkha' la rgyu ba'o//ka zhes bye ba ni kA ma ru pa na
250b1(rgyud): ang ku rI dang /ai rA ba tI'o o zhes bya ba ni/o dra na badz+ra dza Ti la dang /ma hA b+he ra ba'o//zhing ngo //tri zhes bya ba ni tri ku ni na ma hA bI ra dang /brA yu be gA'o//ko zhes bya ba ni ko sa la/
250b2(rgyud): na badz+ra hUM kA rA drang /si rA bAk+Shi'o//nyo ba'i zhing //ka zhes bya ba ni ka l-I/ke ne su b+ha dA dang sh+tse mI de bI'o//la zhes bya ba ni lAM pA ka na badz+ri b+ha dri daung /su b+ha drA'o//ts+tshan+do ha'o//
250b3(rgyud): kA zhes bya bi ni kAny+tsi nA ma hA bai rI ba dang /ha ya kar+N+Na'o//hi zhes bya ba nI hi mA la ya nA bi ru pI k+Sha dang /kha gA nA nA'o//nye ba'i N+yain+d+ho ha'o//gsung gi 'khyer l-i ste/sr-i la rgyu
250b4(rgyud): ba'o//pr-i zhes bya bi ni pre ta pu ri na ma hA ba la dang /tsakra be gA'o//gr-i zhes bya ba ni gri ha de ba tA na ra t+na//bidz+ra dang /khaN+Da ro hI'o//'du ba tsa no//sau zhes bya ba ni sauR+ShaSh+Ta naM
250b5(rgyud): ha ya gri ba dang /shauN+Di ni'o//su zhes bya ba ni su par+Na dI pa na I kA gar+b+ha dang /tsikra barme NI'o//nye bar 'du ba tsa nau//na zhes bya ba ni na ga ra na sh+le he ru ka dang /su bI rA/
250b6(rgyud): si zhes bya ba ni si na d+hu de sha na/pad+mi narti shwa ri dang /ma hI bI lA'o//dur khrod ngo //me zhes bya ba ni me ru de sha na/bai ro tsa na dang /tsakra brti na'o//ku zhes bya ba ni ku
250b7(rgyud): lu tA na bodz+ra sa tra dang /ma hA bIr+YA'o//nye ba'i dur khrod do//sku'i 'khor lo ste saM 'og na spyod pa'o//kA kA s+yA dang /u lu kA s+yA dang /shA nA s+yA dang /sU kaM rA s+tho ni phyog
251a1(rgyud): //su'o//Am d+hA r+d+ha da /ya mud+hAr+N+Na dang /yu ma dad+mir+N+Na dang /ya mA mAHn+d+ran+ta mtsham su'o//dewAr+ya b+hi dang nang gi bdag nyid ji srid sa par rtog du//
251a2(rgyud): pa'i spyod yul du gyur gyi bar du dmigs par bye'o//rnala'i phyir ma'i kun tu spyod pa las lnga'i gnas kyis bstan pa ste lbu pa'o///de nas bdage bo sogs kun gyi
251a3(rgyud): mtshan ma phyag rgya'i tshogs rnams dang //rang mdog phyag mtshon bzhugs tshul rnams//rgyud du sbas pa nges par bya//rgyal chen shrI he ru ka ne//bdug pa thams cad rab
251a4(rgyud): 'joms po//phyag gnyis yang dag 'khyud pa dang //gnyis kyis glang po'i lpags pa 'dzin//g.yas pa'i lhag mar dgra sta mdung //rtse gsum gri gugA Da ma ru//g.yon
251a5(rgyud): gyi lhag mar kha Ti sgreng //thod pa de mar tshon zhags pa dang //tshangs pa'i mgo bo rnams bshad//bcu gnyis kyis ni rgyan pa yin//thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i mchod phyir thogs
251a6(rgyud): brgya phyed par ni shes par bya//bcom ldan yum ni mdun du bzhugs//zhal gcig 'bar ba chen po ste//'khyad pa yis ni thod pa dag/gdug pa'i bdud kyi khrog bkang
251a7(rgyud): bsnams//g.yas pas rtag tu bsdigs mdzub dang //me rungs pa yi gri gug bsnams//sku mdog dmar zhing tshir 'bar ba//thong dum rgyan po'i sku rags can//da
251b1(rgyud): skragal zhing spyan gyi sum+b+ha sku//mche ba gtsigs pa 'jig su rung //byin pa zhags kyis legs par 'khyud//gnyis ka kha sbyar tshul gyis bzhugs//mkha' 'gro ma sogs bzhi
251b2(rgyud): pi na//kha T+wAM go snod gri gug bsnams//sku la spyan gsum rgya lnga sogs//skra grol bas ni rnam par rgyan//dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni//phyag rgya lnga la sogs pas rgyan//phyag
251b3(rgyud): gnyis zhal gcig spyan gsum pa//ral pa'i cod pan dar gyis bcings//rdo rje dril bus legs 'khyud cing //tshegs pa chen po rjes chags mdzad//rnal 'byor ma ni
251b4(rgyud): shu bla zhi//dbu skra grol bas rnam par rgyan//phyag rgya lnga la sogs pa dang //spyi bor nor bus rnam par rgyan//rnal 'byor snod dang bcas pas 'khyud//bsdigs mdzub
251b5(rgyud): kyis ni gyi gug bsnams//he ru ka dpal la sogs kun//g.yas brkyang ba yi gnos pas bzhugs//mgur chu dpung rgyan rna che dang //thod pa'i phreng bswa rnam par rgyan//
251b6(rgyud): mchod phyir thog sa dang thal ba ni//phyag rgya drug par rab tu bshad//pha rol phyin drug rnam dag pas//phyag rgya drug gis rgyan pa yin//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni//spyan
251b7(rgyud): gsum 'og pag ngag gis rgyan//sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis//yi ge gsum gyi dngos grub kyi//ngo bor bdag nyid bsgom bya zhing //dngos grub 'dod pas gzhan mi bya//
252a1(rgyud): de yi bsod nams gang 'gyur ba//sgrub pa'i yon tan rgya chen po/b+h+rUM ni brgya stong du pa yis//bsod nams brjod par nus ma yin//khwa gdong la sogs
252a2(rgyud): rnam pa bzhi//thams cad kyang ni sgo skyong ste//kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa thogs//sku la phyag rgya lnga sogs ldan//gshin rje brtan sogs mtshams bzhir te/de dag zhabs gnyis
252a3(rgyud): brkyang ba dang //gzugs gnyis ldan zhing yid 'phrog ma//mkha' 'gro ma bskyed ji bzhin du//khwa gdong la sogs dbye ba nyid//de ltar ma lus 'khor lo gnas//
252a4(rgyud): mdog dbye ba'i cho ga'i rim bzhini//rnal 'byor me'i kun tu spyod pa las rang gi mtshan ma dang /zhal dang phyag dang /sku mdog dang mtshan cha bstan pa ste drug pa'o//
252a5(rgyud): de nas cho ga gnyis po ni//gang shes pas ni myur ba ru//sgrub pa po yis grub thob pa//rgyud du sbas pa des bshad bya//oM ha/na ma hi/swa ha hu/bau ShaH&haM/hUM
252a6(rgyud): hUM ho/phaT haM/snying ka spyi bo spyi gtsug dang //dpung pa myig gnyis go cha sbyar//dang po rdo rje sems dpa' ste//gnyis po rnam par snang mdzad gnas//gsum pa pad+ma
252a7(rgyud): gar dngang rgyal//bzhi pa ho ru ko dpal bshad//lnga pa rdo rje nyi ma ste//drug po la ni rta mchog yin//de ni go cha rnam drug gis//shin tu bsrungs pa nyid yin no//oM //
252b1(rgyud): d+hA/dzam/d+hAr+k+ka d+hA dz+dza//phaT phaT/sna bskyed kha de bzhin kha//spyob sgrog drug go cha nyid//dang po rdo rje phag ma'o//gnyis pA yA min+tir+ya brjod//gsum pa rmongs byung ma/
252b2(rgyud): nyid de//bzhi pa sbyin mo yin par bshad//lnga pa kun tu skrag par grags//drug pa gtum mo yin par bshad//blo che drug nyid phag mo dang //dpa' bo gnyis mdado rnal
252b3(rgyud): 'byor ma'o//rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod bra lam+b+ha de rgyu gnyis bskrun pa ste bdun pa'o//de nas go chag nyi sa shes nas//ye shes 'khor rnam bsgoms nas//
252b4(rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis//de ma tshig 'khor lor nyur ga zhug bya//rkang pa mnan la steng du bste//steng du pa~M gi sgra sgrogs la//phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams
252b5(rgyud): gnas pa'o//dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams dgug/sngags kyis yang dag bskul ba dang //skad cig de la spyan drang bya//mdzub mo dgog byas gung mo nges par sbyar//
252b6(rgyud): mthe bong rdo rje brtun por yang dag sbyar//de ni dpalnga ba'i phyogs kyi dbus gzhag la//bcu zhing bcu zhing bskor ba byas pa yis//sngogs pas dpa' bo rnal 'byor
252b7(rgyud): ma byin brlag/yi ge d+ha ni sna rtser yang dag sbyar//Sh+Te ni mtshan gyi lte bar yang dag dgod//lte ba snying ka kha dang dpal ba ru//sngags kyi tshogs dang bcas pas byin gyis
253a1(rgyud): badrug/snru ba steng kha dag tu rnal 'byor ma//sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags kyis mi//a byA d+hA tI gnyis kyis dpa' byin+da rmAH//rnal 'byor ma dad dpa' na
253a2(rgyud): gnyis med yin//dang po dga' ba dpa' bo ste//mchog tu dga' ba rnal 'byor ma//rab tu dga' ba ma lus nyid//bde ba'i thabs te kun reg pa'o//lha yul sa stengs sa'on
253a3(rgyud): tu/skad cig gis ni gzugs gcig 'gyur//sgom pa bdag gis bshad pa yi//bsdu ba de nyid bshad pa ni//g.yas dang g.yon gyi lag gnyis kyis//bskor ba mkha' 'gro'o/
253a4(rgyud): bad de yin//rnal 'byor mu'i kun tu spyad pa las ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drang ba dang bsdu ba bstan pa ste brgyad pa'o////de nas sprul par shes bya dang //langs
253a5(rgyud): spyod rdzogs par 'dod pa nyon//theg po chen po phyag rgya che//rnal 'byor ma yi grub ster ba shi //phyag rgya chen po lam lhag pa'i//rnal 'byor kun las mchog gzhan rnyed/
253a6(rgyud): hU~M ru ka dpal rgyal ba che//rnal 'byor kun dbang dbang phyug yin//mkha' 'grom yi dra ba sdom//namakha' dang mnyam lasmra blangs pa//kun mkhyen ye shes de'i rang bzhin//
253a7(rgyud): he ru ka ba dpa' bo mchog/skye bo dam pa kun 'dus pa//zhi ba'i btung bas grub 'gyur ba//rtag pa'i go 'phang mchog yin te//skyon med pa ni brtag pa'i gnas//pu la
253b1(rgyud): sosogs pa yang dag sbyar//yul dang yul du rnam par gnas//he ru ka dpal bdag nyid dgod//yi ge ny+tsi shu rtsa bzhi ni//ljongs spyod rdzogs par shes bya ste//rnal 'byor che la//
253b2(rgyud): gnas pa yin//mdor bsdus nas nA rab 'jug pa//blo gros brtson pas shes par bya//ldog pa'ang ji ltar bstan pa ni//ba shing bya sgrub pa po rnams nyon+da//shrI ni gnyis/
253b3(rgyud): meng ye shes te//he ni rgyu sogs stong pa nyid//ru ni bkod dang bral ba ste//ka ni gang du yang mi gnas pa'o//da ni rang bzhin spyod pa ste//kun tu 'gro zhing mi shigs par//
253b4(rgyud): mdor bsdus nas ni sgo mi byed pa//'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur//chos dang longs spyod sprul pa yi//sku gsum dag ni rnam sgom pa//byang chub phyogs ni sum
253b5(rgyud): cu bdun//der ni nges par bsgom par bya//rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las 'jug pa bstan pa ste dgu pa'o///de nas bsgoms pas dub gyur pa//
253b6(rgyud): bsdus pa spyod tshul khyad par gyis//sbyor dang bral bar mi bya ste//spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa 'di yin//sngar ni ji skad bshad pa bzhin//bsam gtan cho ga rgyas byas la//
253b7(rgyud): rang 'dod la sa la gtor ma ni//khyad par du yang sbyin par bya//zla ba mor ngo'i chos bcu dang //zla ba yar ngo'i de nyid la//'bad pas dpa' bo chang sogs dang //rdo rje lha mo rab
254a1(rgyud): mchod cing //sngar ba shang sngags dang rgya sbyar ba//cho ga bzhin du yang dag srung //oM A ra li ho//dzaHhU~M ba~M ho//badz+ra DA ki n+ya/sa ma ya s+t+wa~M dr-i sh+yA ho//de ltar las
254a2(rgyud): gsum bzhi lngar brjod//dam tshig sogs rdzas legs gnas par//rdo rje thal mo gyen kha phye//dpa' bo rnal 'byor mas mngon bzla//moM kha kha/khI hi khA hi/sarba yak+kha/
254a3(rgyud): sa b+hu tA/pre ta/bi shrA tsi/un+na da/a pasmA ra badz+ra DA ki n+yA dA ya/i maM ba li grih+Nan+tu sa ma ya rak+Shan+tu ma sarba sid+d+him+me prA ya ts+tshanU/ya thaM gaM ya theSh+TaM b+h+yAM dzA tha/dzI g+ha thA/pi bi
254a4(rgyud): tha/mA ti kra ma tha/ma mi sar+b+ba kAr+N+Na ya/sata suM khaM bi shud d+hA ye/sa ha yi kA b+hA baM tu hU~M hUM phaT phaT swA hA//dpa' bo'i 'khor lo la sogs sngags//dur khrod la sogs kyis
254a5(rgyud): kyang rgyan//lho phyogs kha ltas rnal 'byor pas//gnas ni mthon por rab tu mchod//nye bar mtshon pa ji lta bar//bdag gis nus pas dbul bar bya//dgun zla 'bring po
254a6(rgyud): la sogs s+ho/tshes bcu la ni drad pas mchod//skye bo dam pa kun 'dus la//bde ba thams cad dbul bar bya//der ni bshos rnams bza' bya ste//lhag ma snod du bzhag
254a7(rgyud): par bya//de yi lag tu 'ongs pa'i dpal//gang gis kyang ni gzhom mi nus//de ni skye bo dang ldan rnams kyis mchod//he ru ka dpal mngon par dgyes gyur nas//kun tu dgyes
254b1(rgyud): pas mchog ni stsol 'gyur te//gang phyir mchog ni de yi lag na gnas//mtshan mo sgra ni grol gyur pas//brtul zhugs gos med gtor sbyin na//he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor badrag/
254b2(rgyud): des ni ma mo dpa' bar 'gyur//rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa lngas gtor ma dang //mchod pa tshe sna bcur bya ba srung ba bstan pa ste bcu pa'o////de nas pha rol phyin
254b3(rgyud): drug dang //byang chub phyogs ni sum cu bdun//gnas sogs sa ni bcu po rnams//che mchog lha yi bdag nyid can//dngos po gang dang gang gis ni//mi rnams yid ni yang
254b4(rgyud): dag sbyor//de yis de yi dngos 'gyur te//sna tshogs gzugs can nor bu 'dra//de bzhin 'jigs dang bcas pa 'am//'jigs med ji lta ji ltar gnas//bsam gtan dag
254b5(rgyud): gram sems can gyis//las rnams thams cad rab sgrub byed//spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras rab stsol//tshe 'di nyid la thob 'gyur ba//sgom pa bdag gis bshad par bgyi/
254b6(rgyud): snying po kun las btus pa yin//log pa'i shes pa shes pa can//gang yang khyod kyis bshad mi bya//bla ma'i rim las ji ltar bstan//gang gis myur du shes 'gyur ba//
254b7(rgyud): skyo ba bye bo stong phrag tu//sgyu 'phrul ye shes kyis bskul ba//dad pa yang dag spyod pa dang //rnal 'byor spyod tshul gnas pa yin//lkug cing glen la tha bas ngan ldan//byis//
255a1(rgyud): pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can//sems can yongasu ma smin dang //phyi rol bstan bcos kyis 'chalnga ba//de dag kun gyis mi shes te//mi shes mun pas
255a2(rgyud): khebs pa dang //khengs pa la ni rten par dga'//nga rgyal la sogs ba duni sems ldan//de kun gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi//spyad yuli byas dra ba mi shes so//he ru ka dpal
255a3(rgyud): yang dag 'jug/slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis//myur du dngos grub bskyed byed de//'phral du yid ches byed pa yin//kun spyod cho ga'i rnal 'byor shes//tshi ga'i bya
255a4(rgyud): ba bstan par bya//srid pa gsum po ma lus na//de ni kun mkhyen bstan pa shras//mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang //thos pa dang ni dran pa yis//sdig pa kun las grol 'brur
255a5(rgyud): ba//de ltar do ni the tshom med//lha rnams bzlog ste dgod pa dang //sngags kyi dbye ba bzlog pa dang //sgom pa gsang ba bzlog pa ni//snying po thams cad sgrub pa yin/
255a6(rgyud): rgyud rnams kun gyi spyi yin ni//sems ni yong su smin pa dag/'dir ni sbyor sogs sngags rnams kyis//dam tshig de ltar bstan pa yin//bde gshegs dbugs
255a7(rgyud): 'obyin gsungs pa ni//dag pa'i lus ni skyon med pa//bsod nams chung ba'i sngags pas kyang //nga dga' bas ni rnyed par 'gyur//rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las thams
255b1(rgyud): nAd rnam par dag pa bstan pa ste bcu gcig pa'o//de nas spyang min bza' min dang //dkyil 'khor ba smin dkyil 'khor min//bzlas brtul sbyin srog med min
255b2(rgyud): gyi//mdor na sems 'dul tshul can yin//bzung bya rnam shes ye shes ni//bla mas bstan la brtsol bya ste//phyi rol gyi ni bstan bcos pa//lam de shin tu ring ba yin//
255b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa rnams thabs kyis ni//bla ma'i bsnyen bkur la brtson pa//ston pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang //dpa' bos de nyid bstan pa yin//skad cig rnam pa'i rnal
255b4(rgyud): 'byor bdag/skad cig rnam pa'i phyag rgyar ldan//kun nas thams cad skad cig ste//skad cig gis ni gsang sngags brjod//sras dang lta dang lag bcangs dang //'khyud
255b5(rgyud): dang gnyis gnyis la sogs pa//de bzhin gshegs pas dbugs 'byin gsungs//grong nas gong du bsten par bya//thams cad 'dir ni bstan pa yin//rnam pa gzhon
255b6(rgyud): ngag rtswa dang 'dra//de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog/de nyid mi 'gyur dam pa yin//de nyid thams cad khyab byed do//lus kun la ni rnam par gnas//de nyid sangs rgyas
255b7(rgyud): ye shes te//he ru ka dpal yin par bshad//skyes pa ma ning la sogs nyid//phra ba'i snying po'ang 'dzin pa yin//ye shes dag tu byung de la//gang zhig sa la gzhan rnams
256a1(rgyud): dang /bstan bcos dag ni ma lus dang //rig byed grub mthar gnas pa rnams//'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dag tu//de med par ni grub mi 'gyur//rig byed
256a2(rgyud): grub pa'i mtha' rnams las//'di ni snying por rab tu bshad//'gro ba 'di kun sangs rgyas lnga'i bdag nyid//gar mkhan dag dang ri mo bzang ltar snang //gang du bde chen zhes
256a3(rgyud): bya gcig pu nyid//gcig pu nyams ni du mas gar mdzad do//'dug dang ldan pa nyid dag dang //'jug dang rdzogs pa nyid dag dang //byin gyis brlab dang dbang bskur dang /
256a4(rgyud): ting 'dzin mchod bsdus pa yin//de nas cho ga'i ming gzhan pa//thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa//de nyid du ni kun skyes pa//'byin dang sdud par byed pa yin/a A
256a5(rgyud): i I/u U/r-i rI/laM l-I/e ai/o au/aM aHka kha ga g+ha nga/tsa tsha dza d+haM nya/Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ta tha da d+ha na/pa pha ba b+hi ma/ya ra la wa/sha Sha sa ha/k+Sha/'di
256a6(rgyud): ni bcom ldan lha de yin//mchog nyid lhag par gnas pa yin//lha kun gyi ni bskyed pa dang //sngags rnams kyi ni rgyud nyid yin//gang zhig 'di rtag sgom pa dang //rtag tu klog
256a7(rgyud): cing sems dpa' dang //rnal 'byor pa yis dang por brjod//he ru ka dpal gnyis med 'gyur//der ni lag sogs rgya na yin te//ska rags gnas rnams thams cad yin//'di ni
256b1(rgyud): rtog tu 'dzin byed pa//chos kun rtogs par byed pa yin//A li ka lI mdun bsamyas te//rnal 'byor chen pos rnams gnas la//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor legs rdzogs pa//lte ba na
256b2(rgyud): rtsa bar gnas par sgom//de yi dbus gnos bsam pa ni//dam pa'i gnas mchog yi ge ste//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste//lha yi sku ni bsgom par bya//de ni gzugs las 'das
256b3(rgyud): pa ste ta dngos po med pa'i sems nyid yin//bsam mi khyab pa nyid bsams te//bsam de mtshan mar brtag mi bya//yang na bdag nyid sems bsam pa//de la gzugs ni thob
256b4(rgyud): par 'gyur//rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las rgyud thams cad las nges par byas pa'i de kho na nyid kyi gnas gcig pu bstan po ste bcu gnyis pa'o////de nas gzhan
256b5(rgyud): yang bshad bya ba//dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma gnyis med//he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor che'i//gnas ni yi ge'i sra pa yin//pul+lI ri ma ya mgo la//dzA lan d+ha ra spyi gtsug nyid//u
256b6(rgyud): r+yan rna ba g.yas pa ste//ar bu de ni rgyab tshogs la'o//gnas so//go da br-i rirna bA g.yon//rA me shwa ri smin pa'i mtshoms//de bi ko TaM mIg gnyis te//mA lA ba ni dpung mgor
256b7(rgyud): ro/nye da'i gnaso//kA ma rU pa mchan khung dgod//o Te num gnyis la'o//zhing ngo //tri sha ku ni lte ba'i dbus//ko sa la ni sna rtser ro//nye ba'i zhing ngo //ka li ka ni kha la dgo de//maM
257a1(rgyud): pa ka ni mgrin dbus nyid//tsAn+do ha lo//kany+tsi snying lnga dgod par bya//hi ma lA ya mtshan tsar ro//u pa tshan+da hA'o//pre tA pu ri mtshan la ste//gr-i h+Na drad
257a2(rgyud): shang lam la'o//'du bcan no//sau R+ShaSh+Ta brla gnyis bsam ga srer gling rje ngar gnyis lnga'o//nye bar 'du ba can+do//naM gA ra ni sor mor ro//sin d+hu rkang pa'i rol gnyis
257a3(rgyud): lnga'o//dur khrod do//ma ru mthe bong gnyis la dgod//ku lu tA nI pus mor gnas//nye ba'i dur khyod do//b+h+r-i dz+re oM A go ra daM ma//kra o t+yai ko ka lA ka hI//pre gri sr-i su na
257a4(rgyud): si ma ku/gnyid log ma log ldang ba dang //bza' 'am 'gro ba'i chos spyod pa 'am//gang yin der ni rnam bkod ni//'jig rten gsum gyis mi g.yo'o//ming gi rgyud ni 'bum
257a5(rgyud): sde las//snying po bslus par gyur pa yin//na mkha' dang ni mnyam phyi'i rgyud//'bum gcig nang nas de bzhin bshad//shes rab rgyud ni gsang ba ste//ming 'byung ba
257a6(rgyud): le gnas pa yin//bstan pa yis ni sprul pa yin//ba shad pus long ste spyod rdzogs par 'dod//so slar bstan pa m+b+ha lus nyid//mya ngan 'das pa'i de nyid bstan//sku
257a7(rgyud): gsum 'khor lo gsum du bshad//chos sogs longs spyod rdzogs pa nyid//bsod nams ye shes tshogs dag ni//bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yin//blo ngan glon
257b1(rgyud): zhid lkugs pa dang //shes rab dman zhing log lta can//phyi rol bstan bcas kyis 'tshal ba//bla ma la ni sun+ta 'byin yin//de dag kun kyang rnam spangs te//gus kyang ba shad par
257b2(rgyud): mi bya'o//cha dang chu yi khyad par la//dUr ni gnyi su med par bshad//dge byed dbang gi lha mo dang //bka' bsgo'o lha mo dpa' bo skyes//de 'og ma lus kun spyod pa//'khor ba
257b3(rgyud): las grol gtso bo yin//ma lus rig byed las sprul pa//grub pa'i mthar ni de rab bsgrags//dpa' bo khyod kyis nga la bshad//sangs rgyas mu stegs can la sba//sgra dang
257b4(rgyud): sgra nyams brda rnams kyi//lam 'di nyid kyi rjesu 'bring //bsdus dron yang dag blangs pa dang //brda yi tshig ni rgyus pa yin//gang gis kun spyod mi shes par//rnal 'byor pa
257b5(rgyud): ni rnal 'byor sten//de yi ngal ba don med de//'bras bu de ni thob mi 'gyur//'gro la phan pas sngon gsungs po//sbas te gzhan du gsungs pa yin//kun spyod 'dir ni bshad
257b6(rgyud): pAlAs//sgrub pa pos ni rab mnyam gzhag/rgyal bas sngon ni rgyud chen po'i//sngags kyi yi ge sgrub mdzad pa//las kyi bya ba gung yang rung //dge dang mau dge brtags te bya/
257b7(rgyud): yi ge mtha dang dbus dag tu//der ni thams cad rab tu grub//rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las A li dang las thams cad kyi nges pa gnyi su med par bstan pa ste bcu gsum
258a1(rgyud): pa'o//de nas rgyud rnams thams cad du//sbas gsang cho ga shes bya ste//sangs rgyas bzhi yi gad na bzhugs pa//rdo rje la sogs dpa' rnal
258a2(rgyud): 'byor//mkha' 'gro la sogs rdo rje yi//dpa' bo rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtso//me long la sogs rnam pa bzhi//gnyis med gnyisu med sbyor nyid//gnyis med rdzas ni me
258a3(rgyud): tog sogs//re re nas ni dbul bar bya//phyag rgya lnga sogs mchog lus kyi//pha rol son pas phar phyin drug/lag pa'i mchod sogs ye shes can//blo ldan dpa' bos
258a4(rgyud): shes par bya//rnal 'byor ma drug gau rims bzhin//rdo rje sems sogs bcu gnyis dang //dpa' bo chen por sbyar bya las//lag pa'i mchod la sogs pas bstod//
258a5(rgyud): lnga po lnga dang yang dag sro//'o ma dang ni bsre bar bya//mchod pa des ni legs gnas la//spyod dang grol ba'i 'dod dong ldan//lag pa'i mchod pas rnal 'byor pa//dbul
258a6(rgyud): ba'i 'dod don grub par 'gyur//sems ni gzhan du gyur pa dang //bza' btung gos sogs thob par 'gyur//lha yi mchod pa byas na ni//de la bsam pa rnam grub 'gyur///
258a7(rgyud): dpa' bo 'di ni dpa' chen po//sa stengs rnal 'byor ma rnyed dka'//rnal 'byor pa yi spyod brtul zhugs//rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun gyi gtso//gang zhig rtag tu 'dis rang
258b1(rgyud): mchod//'dod pa'i 'bras bu kun rab ster//rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las dpa' bo bzhi dang yang dag par sbyor ba'i lag pa'i mchod pa bstan pa ste bcu bzhi pa'o///
