258b2(rgyud): de nas dpa' ba rnal 'byor ma//gnyis med pa'i cho ga bshad//drang por mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pas//'bid de nus pa bskyed par bya//nus pa bskyed pa'i rje thogs la//yid
258b3(rgyud): 'dod pa yi brtul zhugs spyad//sems can rjesu gzungs don phyir//dpa' bo chen po 'gro bya zhing //srog chags yan lag gos bgos la//bdo don gnyer bar bde ba
258b4(rgyud): srung //mchod phyir thob snga ni kun spangs la//he ru ka dpal garjod sbyar gnas//grol bri'i 'bras bu 'dod pa yis//rnal 'byor ma kun mnyes par bya//rtsa ba'i sngags kyi
258b5(rgyud): dpa' ba gang //tshongs pa'i skud pa la sogs brtag/lha yi snying po'i gsang sngags kyi//brgya phyed phreng bas rgyan pa yi//thod pa'i dum bu lnga sogs kun//lus kyi khams
258b6(rgyud): su brtag par bya//dpa' bo'i gro chu drug gi ni//rgya 'dis lus ni mdzes pa yin//rdo rje phag mo sogs sngogs gang //mgur chus rked pa mdzes pa yin//sangs rgyas kun+da gyi mkha'
258b7(rgyud): 'gro ma'i//lpags pa'i gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/kha T+wAM ga ni lha yi su//shes rab Da ma ru ru brtag/yi ge bdun gyi gsang sngags kyis//rna bcas snyan ni mdzes pa yin//
259a1(rgyud): rnalaldan ma d+hag+sa ga s+yA skyugs sma//dgas byas pa rgyun pa yin//'dzur ljo na rnal 'byu 'aM//sngags na lagan rjo pa yin//rnam par
259a2(rgyud): skyong mdzad yul sngags dang //da pas mag brten pa na//de ltar bdog nyid rnam pasam+b+has nus//chung drim stegs kyi su legs par blad//rtag tu tshungs par spyad 'gyur
259a3(rgyud): naseng sngags nang pa brgyad mchod pa'o//nyon mo bcom ldan dpa' ba ste//mtshan mo bcom ldan ma bad+ha ge b+h+yo//me byA ci yang yod min te//rtakau tu mi bsam yid rmi
259a4(rgyud): ya ma man la//de dang ma ma smram //bdug nyi nga bzhin 'grod bzhen/'don ci 'a ba bzhin de bzhin//de ster rnam bla marnal 'byor byas
259a5(rgyud): 'dzugs pa thams cad yongs spya su ti//dpa' bo seng gi bzhin du spyod//bla sam pa thams cad rdzogs byed yin//he ru ka dpal gzhir gnas pa'i//yan lag bskyod
259a6(rgyud): pa rje snyed dang //tshig tu brjod pa ji snyed pa//de skyed phyug rgya gas de sngags yin//rigs lnga'i kun du spyod pa ni//dgas gcig nyid du spyad par bya//de ltar shes pa
259a7(rgyud): bdag nyid cen//go 'phang mchog tu 'gro bar 'gyur//gnyis med ye shes sems ldan la//me bye ba ni ci yang med//mi rtog bdag nyid sems kyis ni//'dod pa'i yon rkyen
259b1(rgyud): lnga rnams spyad//rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa las gnyi su med pa'i brtul zhugs dang gsang sngags bstan pa ste bco lnga pa////bzhan yang phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe//dus
259b2(rgyud): mther dngos grub mi thob ste//blo ni gzhan du rnam 'khrugs pas//phyag rgya dkyil 'khor bzlas pa yis//bde bar 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi//bkres dang skom gyi sdug bsngal 'gyur//
259b3(rgyud): 'bad de 'dod bya dmigs nas ni//de nyid kyis bdag rnal 'byor pa//ji ltar he ru ka'i ye shes//ji 'dod par ni yongasu rgyu//rna bas ring nas thos pa dang //skad cig gis mthong
259b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor pas//chos 'di de ltar shes nas ni//bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed yin//shes rab chen por byas pa nyid//gnyis med ye shes brtul zhugs bzang //A la
259b5(rgyud): kA li mau gtogs pas//gal te chos 'di 'dod na ni//de yi ngal ba don med de//'bras bu thob par mi 'gyuraro//mdo dang bya ba'i spyod pa rnams//rnal 'byor gsang sogs dbye ba
259b6(rgyud): nyid//'jig rten kun la bshad pa ni//byang chub don gyi rgyu nyid yin//nga yis 'jug par bshad pa ni//tshogs gnyis gnyisu med pa yin//de nyid chos kyi rang bzhin zhes/
259b7(rgyud): mya ngan 'das pa 'ba' zhig 'dod//thams cad bden pa gnyis la ni//rten par ngas ni sngon bshad pa//rnal 'byor pa yi dngos grub kyis//sgom pa mngon dgar gyur pa yin
260a1(rgyud): spros pa kun la dmigs nas ni/spros pas spros pa med par bya/rgyud rnams kun tu gsang ba gang /sprul pa rnams kyang nyid bstan/rgyu 'di yis ni rnal
260a2(rgyud): 'byor pas/bden pa gnyis la yang dag can/sems can thams cad gsal nas ni/longs spyod kun la nyer spyad bya/blo ldan chen po 'khor lo sdom/sdom pa la ni rnam
260a3(rgyud): par spyod/rnal 'byor ma yi mtshan ma gang /gzugs dang brda dang tha snyad dag/khyim lnga la sogos yul rnams/rnal 'byor ma ni lnga nyid gnas/bsgrub par bya ba'i gnas
260a4(rgyud): kun to/g.yon nas bskor ba la rab brtson/ji ltar sngar bshad 'khor lo ya~M/grangs kyi tsho gas brtul zhugs can/dpa' bo'i sngags sogs rnal 'byor ma'i//
260a5(rgyud): yid 'dod pa dgod par bya/shar gyi 'dra ba mar mkha' 'gro ma//bong bu'i rnam par bsgom par bya//he ru ka dpal zhes bya ba//las rnams thams cad byed pa yin/
260a6(rgyud): ru dpel ge 'phang gnas/lus ngag yid kyi las rnams la/bshad dang ma bshad gang bas mos pa/de dag thams cad myur du 'grug/rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyodapa
260a7(rgyud): las/dngos grub kyi nges pa dang dpal he ru ka'i mdzad pa bstan pa ste bcu drug pa'o////de nas he ru ka dpal rgyud//sems ni dri meng yin par bshad/dag pa'i
260b1(rgyud): chos kyi sprul pa ni//phag mo'i gzugasu bstan pa yin//thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba las//de nyid dang ni thams cad 'byung //me long la sogs rnam pa bzhi//pad+ma'i mngab
260b2(rgyud): gnas rnal 'byer ma//mkha' 'gro ma bzhi pad+mar gnas//mA ma ki sogs bzang mo yin//thod pa'i dum sogs 'khor lor gnas//nyi shu rtsa bzhi gnyis ming yin//
260b3(rgyud): sems can 'khor ba las grol ba//dpa' bo nyid ni yin par brtag/khro bo rnam rgyal la sogs kun//sgo dang mtha' yi 'tshams rnamasu//sna tshogs gdul ba'i thabs
260b4(rgyud): chen gyis//sems can don la brtson par mdzad//gsang ba'i gnas kyi rnam gnas pa//rab tu 'bad de sba bar bya//rnal 'byor ma dad dpa'i bo yis//ji ltar 'dod pa'i
260b5(rgyud): dngos grub ster//rnal 'byor 'bras bu thob nas ni//srid mtshor ltung bar mi 'gyuraro//'khor ba las ni bsgral ba'i thabs//rgyud kyi snying po bsdus pa yin//bla ma slob mas
260b6(rgyud): rtags su phyir//cho ga rgya cher ma bshad de//sems ni ngal so rnal 'byor pa//mya ngan 'das pa bstan ma bya//de ltar spyod pa'i skyes mchog 'di//sdig pa thams cad
260b7(rgyud): rnam dag 'gyur//'jig rten 'di 'am pha rol tu//'dis ni sangs rgyas nyid mthong 'gyur//ji ltar sngar bshad sdig pa rnams//spang bar bya ba'i mtshan nyid yin//gang zhib
261a1(rgyud): /'di sgom rnal 'byor pa//'dod pa'i bde ba thams cad sbyar//ha ru ka dpal mtshan brjod byas//lha sngogs kun gyi gsang glang dang //myi la stsogs la
261a2(rgyud): gang zhig yod//de yi bsod namaso nges 'thob//bsam gtan gyis ni bsems tsam 'am//'dod cing klog gam bris pa yis//mtho ris longs spyod 'thob 'gyur
261a3(rgyud): te/yang na 'khor las bsgyur nyid 'gyur//rnal 'byor pa ni 'pho ba'i tshe//dpal ldan he ru kA la sogs//dpa' bo dag ni thams cad dang //rnal 'byor ma ni ji snyed
261a4(rgyud): pa//lag na sna tshogs me tog bsnams//bi dan rgyal mtshan sna tshogs dang //rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang //sna tshogs klus ni nye bar mchod//'chi ba zhes
261a5(rgyud): rnam rtog ste//mkha' la spyod pa'i gan su 'khyer//de lta'i dpa' bi chen po dang //rnal 'byor ma ni sa steng dkon//ji ltar bude med byis gtA ma rjes yi rang //kun
261a6(rgyud): sme bsten po'i gtam yang brjod par byed//lam yang bshad cing 'chi bar 'gyur pa yin//rnal 'byor lam ngan de dang 'dra bar bshad//de nas gzhan yang
261a7(rgyud): bshad bya ba//gnas sogs rnal 'byor ma yi gnas//ha ru ka dpal sogs rnal 'byor//dpa' bo gnyis med rnal 'byor ma//pul+lI ma la yang rab gtum//dzA
261b1(rgyud): lan d+ha rarA ga tum pa'i mig/urAn na ni 'od ldan ma//A bu dar ni sna chen mo//go dra ba rir dpa' blo ma//rA me shU rir mi 'thung ma//de bi ko Tar lang dbang phyug/mA la
261b2(rgyud): bar ni shing grib ma//kA mA r+yA paR+Sha saM srung mo//o tIr 'jigs byed chen mo yin//tri shwa ku nIr rlung shugs ma//ko sa lar ni chang 'thung mu/ka ling lha mo sde bsang ma//
261b3(rgyud): lAm pa kar+ya ni rab bzang mo//kany+tsi nAr nai rti rnam//hai ma lA yar byi bdong ma//pre tA pu rir 'khor lo'i shugs//gri ha de bar dus skyes ma//sau raSh+Ta ra chang 'tsho dri ma//gser
261b4(rgyud): snying 'khor lo'i go cha mo//nA ba rab ni rab dpa' mo//sin d+hu'i yul du stobs chene mo//mya ngan yul du 'khor bsgyur ma//ku lu ta ra ni brtson chen mo//yul 'di rnams kyi bu
261b5(rgyud): mo gang //dpa' bo gnyis med rnal 'byor ma'o//gsang ba'i sngags laM rtag gnas nas//rab tu 'bad de bskyas par bya//rnal 'byor ma ni re re zhing //bye ba grangs steng dag
261b6(rgyud): gis bskor//mtshan mu mtshan nyid phyag rgya sogs//g.yon pa'i sgrib pa po yis sba//mi bzang las ni gang gang gis//skye bo rnams ni 'ching 'gyur ba//thabs dang bcas na
261b7(rgyud): de nyid kyis//srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol 'gyur//'khor ba'i pha rol rgal nas ni//ci 'dod ye shes can du 'gyur//mgur chu gtsug rgyan dpung rgyan dang //rna rgyan tshangs
262a1(rgyud): pa'i skud pa dang //mthum pa rgyun cing spyi bor phrang //ska rags nang ga b+h+yam+b+ha nyid po// ts+tshed sna tshogs pad+ma yai//ges rAstu lik+Sha mU la s+sa/ny+tsi cu
262a2(rgyud): rtsa bzhir yang dag ldan//dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs bcas//u me'i bdag po yang drag mnan//rdo rje dril bu sku la 'khyud//he ru ka dpal rgyal po che//go 'phyang
262a3(rgyud): mchog ni bsgom par bya//de nas rtag tu spos chus 'dir//rtag tu lus ni yan lag dril//dri zham yan lag gis rgyan cing //thal ba'i phyag rgya sogs pas bskos//kha dog
262a4(rgyud): la sogs g.yogs pa'i gzugs//rang gri lus ni yongasu bsgyur//spyod pa'i brtul zhugs la zhugs par//shes nas rnal 'byor lA legs gnas//yan lag can
262a5(rgyud): dang tshigs can dang //sdud dang de bzhin snying stobs dang //gau r-i gyi tshul ni bzhi po 'di//de nyid mthong bas shes par bya//btung ba'i tshul zhes bya ba ni//rnal 'byor
262a6(rgyud): shes pa yin par bshad//de la 'bad de bya ba ni//skal ba bzang po'i grwar chen yin//gar gyi gran su gnas pa kun//rgyan rnams de ni yin zhes bya//kun tu dbug
262a7(rgyud): dang bcing bya dang //gzhug dang de bzhin bskyed pa dang //'bebs dang 'di ni 'khyil pa dang //de bzhin 'dir ni rgyan pa dang //tshangs skud lus las dgrol ba dang //rnam pa
262b1(rgyud): na nu pa sto nga//rlud sur ts+tsha g+sas pa dang //rgyug ldanan da //dang // ga d+hu spyad pa sas+ho/dog ga//ts+tshan brgyad dang // na /
262b2(rgyud): kun tu spyod pa dz+rag s+ho/na m-its+tsha ba'os kyis bcas kyis nus gtan la //rgya bAr smad du/tu
262b3(rgyud): ma na na ni rnam ra //rgyu na slo na sa sa kyi /rna sem/ga
263a1(rgyud): gsal//rtag tu rdor can rnam par gnas//cha dang cha min rnam par grol//stong pa'i ngang las yang dag gnas//ya yi sngo mtha' yang dag rdzogs//u/
263a2(rgyud): yig dag ni thig ler bcas//'byar zhing gsal bar 'gyur ba ste//kha sbyor rnam pa rnal 'byor gyi//rdor can ci ltar chang gis myos//'khor nas sems ni rnam par grol//
263a3(rgyud): khams gsum po ni ma lus pa//rdo rje mig gis mthong bar 'gyur//bdun gyi rgyal po'i dngos grub kyis//mA lus lus pa med pa mthong //tshangs pa khyab 'jug
263a4(rgyud): dbang ldan dang //dbang po de bzhin 'dod dbang phyug/pha rol stobs kyis mnan na ni//rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis ni ched//tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams kyis//
263a5(rgyud): dam tshig sgra yis bshad pa ste//srog dang rtsol ba kun tu bya//de yis 'di ni dam tshig sdom//de la khe sbyor rnam pa bshad//zhal bzhi ru ni rab tu gnas//rnal
263a6(rgyud): 'byor ma bzhi de shes bya//sbyor ba bzhi dang yang dag ldan//gang gang dbang po'i lam nas byung //de dang de yi rang bzhin nyid//'dod pa kun la longs spyod pa//sangs
263a7(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'gyur//gzugs ni ji ltar rdzogs pa las//de la sgom pa ji lta bu//sngags rnams ji ltar bskyed par bgyid//rdzogs par yang ni ji ltar 'gyur//
263b1(rgyud): de dag thams cad tha snyad tsam//sngags dang rgyud rnams yang dag 'byung //byang chub sems ni 'dri ru bsngags//'dod pa lnga dang yang dag ldan//mtshon bya mtshan nyid kyis ni mtshon
263b2(rgyud): mtshan bya du ma'ang mtshan mi bya//sngags rnams rgyas par bshad nas ni//lha rnams kyi ni skem pa nyon//steng gi sgra ni gsum yin te//lte ba rlung gi gzugs can ma//de
263b3(rgyud): yi dbus su rtag tu stong //dag pa yi ne shel lta bu//longs spyod chen po nges par 'byung //dgu pa bcu yis ldan pa ste//cha brgyad de yi yan lag gis//sgo dgu'i
263b4(rgyud): sa bon pa yin te//lus la sa bon rjesu brjod//ye shes mkha' 'gro bdag nyid kyis//steng gi tshwar ni shes rab ste//rdo rje 'dzin dang bcas par 'byung //sems kyi rdo rje
263b5(rgyud): zhes ni bshad//'dir ni steng gi pad+mar ba shrad//de la gnas ni b+ha ger bshad//shes rab de nyid rdor can bcas//rten dang brtun pa 'byung ba yis//rtsa rnams kun la
263b6(rgyud): rnam par gnas//khu ba'i gzugasu gyur pa yis//sgo dang bsdud par byed pas//bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis//sgom pa'i rim pa phye bas so//gdams ngag rim
263b7(rgyud): pa'i rnal 'byor gyis//lha rnams sgom par brjod pa ste//de rnams sna tshogs rnal 'byor gyi//zla ba nyi mar bshad pa yin//gzhan yod gzhan min rnam par gol//
264a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas gzugs ni g.yo ba med//der ni gzung bar bya ba ste//gang zhig dweru ji ltar gnas//nyin mo bcom ldan+da rdo rje can//mtshan ma shes
264a2(rgyud): rab tu ni brjod//na mkha'i nang song mchog tu zhi//dag cing dge la yid du 'ong //sangs rgyas la sogs mu stegs kun//lha min gnod sbyin srin pa dang //de nyid 'dod
264a3(rgyud): chags chags bral dang //'dod pas thar par gyur pa 'dri//de nyid bud med rnams la chags//de nyid mngal ni rab tu len//de nyid 'tsho ste ril po'i gnas//de nyid
264a4(rgyud): skams pas mthong ba yin//de nyid gong du gyur pa ste//de nyid dri ru rnam par gnas//de nyid sdug bsngal rigs pa ste//rig pas bde ba nyid dag la//de nyid gcig
264a5(rgyud): pus khyab pa yin//bdud rtsi thigs pa'i gzugs kyis ni//gzugs bzang gzugs dang ldan pa'i mchog/sna tshogs gzugs rnams yi du 'ong //gzugs kun
264a6(rgyud): gsal bar byed pa'i dpal//gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chang bya'o//bcu drug phyed phyed de yi phyed//rtag tu dri nyid rig pa po//sna tshogs rtag tu zhi ba'i gzugs//
264a7(rgyud): na mkha' lnga dang yang dag ldan//de nyid rab tu bzhugs par mdzod//'gro la gsol bar mar mi bzhin//sna yi rtse mor rnam par 'byung //'bar ba'i phreng ba'i 'od zer
264b1(rgyud): te/'di rnams kun ni bdag gis brjod//rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid du//gang gis shes pas cho ga shes//de yi dpal ni rgyas par 'grub//gzhan yang sngags kyi tshig
264b2(rgyud): bshad de//gsang ba'i sbyor ba sbas pa ste//sde tshan brgyad kyis mthar ma gzung //sa bon lnga dang yang dag ldan//de bas 'bru yin sbyin par bya//dang por au yig yang
264b3(rgyud): dag ldan//A ni yig 'obru kun gyi mchog/thig le chen po yi ge med//na mkha' na mkha'i dbus gnas par//sngags dang rgyun ni yang dag 'byung //ji ltar de ltar sngags
264b4(rgyud): kyang ni//de bzhin nyid kyi tshul lta bur//yi ge tsam drang yang dag ldan//de la dbus rab tu grags//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //gang yang gzhan gyi lha tshogs
264b5(rgyud): dang /'byung po ma lus thams cad dang //lha dang lha min gsang ba pa//de yi dbus yang dag rdzogs//yi ge la sogs gzugs can gyis//gzugs can rnal 'byor lA ma dang //
264b6(rgyud): dum skyes ma yi bye brag gis//zhal bzhi zhes ni rnam par bshad//rnal 'byor bzhi dang yang dku ldan//lte ba dang ni ge sar ldan//drad pa ma bzhi dang yang dag ldan//de la dbus
264b7(rgyud): su dpa' bo che//phyag brgyad kyis ni rnam par rgyan//dang po la ni sha yis rgya no//gnyis pa khrag gis bkang ba gnyis//gsum pa bzhi pa lus phyag rgya//kha T+wA~M ge dang Da ma ru/
265a1(rgyud): de bzhin khya dog da// po 'gro//dri med ston+da ka'i namakha' bzhin//R+Sha dang dam+bAr dang de bzhin gnag/ljang ku zhab te gtsigs pa 'o//phyag rgya brgyad
265a2(rgyud): mdo ru bshad//phyag gis mtshan char rab tu grags//dang por 'jug pa'i phyag rgya ste//gnyis pa snying ni 'byor pa'o//gsum de rmongs byed phyag rgya yin//bzhi par ltung byed de
265a3(rgyud): bzhi no//lnga par gar ma'i phyag rgya'o//drug par bsod byed mar ni brjed//bdun par za byed ma'i phyag rgya//brgyad par steng du len par nges//shin rje mo dang skrag byed drag/
265a4(rgyud): gtum mo dang ni bzang za dang //b+ha su ma dang 'dod pa nyid//de nyid brgyad po phag mo nyid//mi bzad rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs//khrag dang khu ba za ba mo//'od zer 'bar ba sna
265a5(rgyud): tshogs 'bar//rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsgom bya//mang por rnam bshad ye shes ni//de la dbus rnam par 'byung //dpag tshad gsum gyi rgya khyon du//de yi gsal bar byed
265a6(rgyud): pa yin//sems can thog ma tha ma med//rdo rje sems dpa' chags pa che//thig le rdo rje can du 'gyur//zla ba phyed pa lta bur gsal//gdan ni pad+ma rA ga ste//rgyal po'i gzugs na
265a7(rgyud): gsol ba yin//rgyal po nyid ces rnam par bshad//stang du 'byung bar rab tu grags//yang ni dgod par bya ba ste//rigs kyi dbye bas brjod pa'o//shar du rdo rje sems dpa' 'gyur//
265b1(rgyud): lho ru rnam par snang mdzad brjod//nub tu rta bdun rgyal po'o//byang du pad+ma gar dbang ste//'khor lo'i dbus su he ru kra/stong gi sgra ni rta gdong yin//'di rnams 'di ru dgod par
265b2(rgyud): gsungs//rigs kyi dbye bris rnam pa lnga//dr-i ru bsgom par bya ba yin//gzhom med gzhig tu med pa ste//de yi dbus yang dag rdzogs//mgon pa rnam par snang mdzad
265b3(rgyud): sogs//rnal 'byor ma'i tshegs kyis bsgyings pa'i rgyud chen po las rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor zhes bya ba ste brtag pa dang po'o////de nasnga rdo rje phag mo de/
265b4(rgyud): rkang brgyan dang ni do shal rgyan//de yi dkyil 'khor lo ger byed//dbadra bskur ba ni ster ba yin//dam tshig la ni legs bzhag phyir//phag mo de bzhin rdo rje can//ci
265b5(rgyud): 'dod do bzhin rdo rje can//dri chen dri chu za ba dang //khrag dang khu ba de bzhin sha//rtag tu bud med dang nus sam//b+ha ba'i pad+mar 'o byed dam//smros shig rdor cani bde ba che//
265b6(rgyud): de nas re tsem ldan+da rdo rje can//ba zhid par gyur nas 'di dag smras//lha mo ci ste bdag me spro//khrag deng khu ba lA sogs bza'//rtag tu bud med gu ste par bgyi//b+hu
265b7(rgyud): ga'i pad+ma la 'o bgyid de//yang ni legaso legs byin//sgro skyong de bzhin rdo rje can//thod pa yang dag blangs nas ni//rdo rje can la bza' ba dbul//zhi zhing gcer bu
266a1(rgyud): 'dug pa dang //rdo rje can ni skra grol bas//legs par dbang bskur ster bar byed//b+ha gar 'o byed rdo rje can//de nas brtsams te rdo rje tsam//de nas brtsam/
266a2(rgyud): te rdo rje khyod//sems can don gyis brtul zhugs bzang //bzung ba dri chen dri chu dang //khrug dang khu ba sha dag go/b+ha ga'i pad+mar 'o bya ste//bdud rtsi rnams ni bsgrub
266a3(rgyud): par bya//rdo rje rnal 'byor po nya mos//de nas rtag tu dbang bsku ro//huM hUM ha hA aM A hri hrIM swa swA hA//de nas de ma thag tu kun//rdo rje mkha' 'gro mi nyid kyis//sgra chen pa
266a4(rgyud): ni rab tu bsgrugs//rdo rje can de dbang bskuraro//sna tshogs gzugs can drag po che//thod pa'i gden la yang dag bzhugs//sha dang khrag dag 'thung ba ste//gsang
266a5(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor du ni sbyor//la la rol mi'i chu byed rdung //pa ta ha sogs mu kun d+ha//la la rab tu glu len cing //le la pi wang sgreng ba ste//la la dor can gar byed do//
266a6(rgyud): la la spos kyis radwa tu byed//la la dri yis de bzhi no//le la sgra dag rab tu sgrogs//phyogs bcur pho gi sgra dge go/la la bar dge rab tu byed//lA la dkyil 'khor
266a7(rgyud): la ni gang//la la me tog rab tu 'grems//de yis rdor can la dbang bskur//la la spos kyis rab tu byed//la la dri yis de bzhin//'di ltar gyur pa'i mchod pa yis//
266b1(rgyud): gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la ni bya//de nas rdor can lha mo de//tshig 'di dag ni brjod pa ste//tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid drag dang //dbang dag legs par brjod nas ni//
266b2(rgyud): yis gzhan yang bshad bya ba//lha rnams dgod pa mchog dag go/rgya ru kun tu khru brgyad de//gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi bya//sngags pas de yis nyis 'gyur dpyad//gang
266b3(rgyud): du mkha' 'gro'i tsho gas 'gying ba//na mkha' 'od kyi rgya khyab par//gang de dkyil 'khor mchog yino//dbusu 'khor lo yang dag bri//lte ba dag ni ge sar lda na//'dab
266b4(rgyud): ma bzhi dang yang dag bcas//kha dog dkar por yang dag ldan//de la dbusu dpa' bo dgod//dag pa'i shel dang 'dra ba ste//dang po'i zhal ni rnam par bzhad//dang po
266b5(rgyud): spyan gyis rnam par gzigs//smin ma khro gnyer rab tu gsal//mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs pa ni//lho ru bltas pa'i zhal dag go/g.yon pa rmad du byung ba ste//rgyab
266b6(rgyud): ni 'jigs pa chen po yin//mdun rgyab rta yi zhal gyis rgyan//dkar po dmar po de bzhin gnag/ljang ku yi ni kha dog go/phyug brgyad pa yang bri bi re bya//thod pa'i
266b7(rgyud): phreng bas rnam par rgyan//dpal ldan mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin//'jigs byed ljags ni dril ba ste//'jig dus chen po'i me dang mtshungs//dur khrod lta bur 'jig su rung //
267a1(rgyud): /sa par bla cing byubyu pa /po'i smra sgrogs pa'o//shAm+b+ha c-ig byA ba nI g+haSh+Ta pAn+d+ha// bzhirnams nu brjod ltar bya//bAD+ga g+sa nga
267a2(rgyud): 'i lag/khrag dang khu bya dag 'thung ngo //'khor lo gan+d+he pa yang de/sha//zla ba'i dkyilnga ny+dza ra rnam+b+ha pa la//'khor lo chen po yi ge brgyad //'od zer dam 'bakyi
267a3(rgyud): bste//gzugs can ma dnga'o byung ma//lam mchog 'phel dang sa me lo//phyir mi ldog dang i ha~M kI/rdor rgyun brgyud par brjod pa yin//lha ma brgyang po 'di rung go
267a4(rgyud): kha dog dkar po shin tu 'bar//lag pas kha T+wAM ga bzung zhing //skrod pa khrag gis bkang ba'o//phyi rol 'khor lo yang dag brjod//lha rnams bkod pa mchog dang mi/
267a5(rgyud): sa kI ni dang phrag me//gsong ma dkar mo sgrog ma dang //g+ha tum mo re khyud ma nyid dang //snro lA mya de bzhin khro gnyid lA//khyims gsum rnam rgyal glang rkyen mo//
267a6(rgyud): bzhin zlam+bu ro dag dang //du na n+ye mun d+he ga dang //de bzhin rgyangs me khyab 'jug ma//sgra spyong yang dag bai shwad pa ni//sgo bzhi dag d+hA sbyar bar bya//'khor lho chen po
267a7(rgyud): kha dog sngos//'bar ba'i phreng ba tshogs kyi 'od//lha mi chen po kha dag da/8//kha T+wAM ga dang nya phyis 'dzin//dkyil 'khor 'di ni rgyal po ste//rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i sngam
267b1(rgyud): /na rgyun s+ho//stso tham lo sto/ n+d+ha blan/ mnas sam mnan smras
267b2(rgyud): Sh+T+rI khyA s+t+wa~M gnyas pa/ gzhan yang shA shA byeg pa'i zlus//rkang po dang bang cu dang /
267b3(rgyud): sa smai shAtA ts+tsha / bAn+d+ha / ma pa bye/ / sbyir kyi na
267b4(rgyud): du bar rlung //de rnams dang du byed 'am ba ba cu rnam par snad hU~M rgya gas
267b5(rgyud): das bya ba thams rgyud mcho ga/dU r+b+hu lda ni rnaMm brjod pa// myed de bo'i ming drug/rtog pa med pa ba zu // sngon bag+h+nAn med pa
267b6(rgyud): 'i sdub smra sa/bcu drug sa medi dag sbyin/ skyed du la ya cid bu //sbyinas can te snod pa yin//na
267b7(rgyud): thugs kyi ra sadun lan tu sbyi//ji dul de khri ba'i seM ma sa rkyeni
268a1(rgyud): sbyar//dbyangs yig gnyis pas rgyan pa yin//nyi shu rtsa gsum yang ni blang //'og gi chur ni skur bar bya//dbyangs kyi gsum pa yang dag ldan//bzhi
268a2(rgyud): pas sbyar bar bya ba yin//de yi dbusu yang dag gsungs//yi ge dbang phyug gris ni rgyan//bcu drug mtha' ni yang dag bshad//steng dang 'og tu khyab pa yin//de la
268a3(rgyud): dbus yang dag gsungs//steng pa chen po'i yi ge ste//rdo rje sems dpa' gzhig tu med//dag pa yi ni shel lta bu//rdza sa 'di rnams ni bza' ba yin//rnal 'byor 'di
268a4(rgyud): rnams mchog yin te//rnal 'byor kun las mchog tu 'phegs//khyod la mdo ru bsdus par bshad//bza' ba rnams ni yang dag brjod//gang gi rigs pas thams
268a5(rgyud): cad bza'//dngos po ro mnyam bsres nas ni//dag dang ma dag mi byed par//de bzhin nyid rnams thams cad dang //bza' ba thams cad bza' bar bya//de nyid bcu yis
268a6(rgyud): rab dbye bas//gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par grol//sbyin pa'i snying po sbyin par bya//sems kyis rnal 'byor rdzogs nas ni//thams cad rtsa sogs bzhin du btang //sangs
268a7(rgyud): rgyas rnams kyi tshul khrims gyur//de nyid kun gyis mi 'jigs pa//skyo ba thams cad 'tshe mo byed//dang por snying rje bla na med//bzod pa tshul khrims bgegs med dang //
268b1(rgyud): bzhan gyi gnod pa 'gongs b+hA ste//gur dang phur bu dra ba dag/gdug pa'i bdud ni 'joms pa ste//bdud med 'tsho ba med pa yin//bdag gi sems ni btsong par bya//dang
268b2(rgyud): gis rang sems btul ba yis//bdud kyis gnod pa smos ci dgos//mnyam pa'i sems kyis dri yis ni//bru bzhi pa ru yang dag bri//lus la ste'u dang tsan dan dang //
268b3(rgyud): sems kyis mnyam par brgyud pa na//minyam pa nyid kyi ye shes brjod//dngos po bdag med bsres pa ste//gang zhig rnal 'byor rgyal bar 'gyur//gang dag rnal 'byor
268b4(rgyud): / rnam nga//rnams sa sas dag s+ho/dang na pa'i 'ams la
268b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i brtag pa ste gsum pa'o///de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//sbyor ba dang po'i sgrub thabs to//sbyor ba rnam bzhir shes par bya//dam tshig bzhin
268b6(rgyud): sgrub pa ste//dang po khu bo rnams shes bya//gnyis pa de bzhin khrig nyid do//rdo rje chu dang dri chen no//dam tshig bzhi ni bsten pa ste//'dod chags khu bar rnam pa pa
268b7(rgyud): bshad//phrag dog khrag ni nyid dag go//gti mug rnam snang rgyala'i ste//zhes chung bcas pa yin//dam tshig bzhi yi rnal 'byor gyis//dam tshig bzhi la spyod pa
269a1(rgyud): phyog dang po sbyor ba 'grub 'gyur zhing //rdo rje sems dpa' dang mAny+dzam 'gyur//blos sgyu gzhug byung rnal 'byu b+h+yos//dam chog duny+tso bsgyu
269a2(rgyud): bya ste/ bstod pa'i rdo rje brjod bya ste//ye shes sems dpa' rnam par bsam//mdor bsdus pa ni sngags bzlas kyi//hUM dgi sngags ni brjod par bya//dngos pos sgom
269a3(rgyud): pas bsgoms par bye//sde dang sbrid dang byed pa po//bdud bzhi gzhan las rgyal ba yi//ge na mchen cha 'di yis bcing //re ba phur bu gur sogs kyis//phyogs
269a4(rgyud): bzhi la sogs bcing bar bye//khams bzhi por ni yang dag 'byung //bdud bzhi po ni rnam par brjod//bad kan sha dang rkang dag dang //rus pa'i khams la yang
269a5(rgyud): dag 'byung //stan dang bud ma sgrol m+b+ha dang //gos dkar la sogs bzhi po'o//khams bzhi dang ni rnam gnas bA//sbyor ba dang byor brjod pa'o//brtson chen zhesu rnam
269a6(rgyud): bshad pa//rlung dang me ni mchog yin te//de la dbusu yang dag gnas//'dzu' ra ta yi rang bzhin ming //dbyibs dang kha dog sna tshogs pa//kha dog med par rab
269a7(rgyud): tu grags//dbyangs dang yi ge'i tshul dag tu//dbyangs med yi ge med pa'o//tshangs min khyam 'jug drag po min//na mkha' min zhing 'dod pa yin//zla ba min
269b1(rgyud): zhing skar ma min//nyi ma min zhing rlung yang min//gnod sbyin srin po lha min mi//'byung po yau dgras nyid min cing //snod dang bcud ni sna tshogs dang //khams gsum po ni
269b2(rgyud): mA lus la//bdag nyid chen po de yis khyab//bems pa nyid la yid kyis rtogs//de nyid 'jig rten pa ru 'gyur//tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug tsha//zla ba gza'i
269b3(rgyud): zin skar ma lha//de nyid thams cad bde ba che//rdo rje 'dzin pa rnam snang mdzod//pad+ma nyi ma khyab 'thung ni//rdo rje rnal 'byor pho nya mo//de nyid rdo rje bde ba che//rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin
269b4(rgyud): pa nyid//de bzhin pad+ma pad+ma 'dzin//nor bu nor bu 'dzin pa nyid//rigs 'di rnamasu bsgyur ba'o//de nyid dkyil 'khor bri ba nyid//rdul tshon kha dog lnga pa'o//de nyid sdigasu rab
269b5(rgyud): tu bya/hUM hUM phaT kyi yi ge nyid//dmyal ba dud 'gro yi dgas dang //lha dang maM dang lce min dang //dmigs pa'i semasu gyur pa yis//'khor lo 'di ru 'khod par 'gyur//
269b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po mdor bsdus pa//rdo rje can la gnas pa'o//lha mo chen mA srung yang dri//'gro dang 'ong ba ji ltar 'gyur//gnas nas 'di yi sems dag ni//skye
269b7(rgyud): ji ltar brjod pa yin//khu ba ji ltar gzugasu 'gyur//skye bo'i skye ba ji ltar yin//de yi gzugs kyi skye ma la la//khrig la ji ltar 'byung ba lags//'byung ba rnams
270a1(rgyud): kyai 'byung ba //da ye swA ba ji ltar lags//sa dang chu dang de bzhin mo//rlung dang na mkha' nyid dang ni//skyo gnas kun la chags pa ni//dngos po rnam
270a2(rgyud): pa ji ltar khyub//zhi ba'i gzugs ni ji ltar yin//thams cad du ni ji ltar skye//'di rnams yang dge bshad pa ni//lha mo bden par bdag la gsungs//ji ltar de
270a3(rgyud): bzhin rdo rje nyon//sems can kun gyis bskyed pa dang //'khor bai yang dge bsrubs pa las//ding 'di thabs kyis 'di 'gyuraro//thog ma tha ma med dus su//sems
270a4(rgyud): can thams cad yang dag 'byung //rgya mtsho 'khrugs sogs gting gi bar//blo gros chen po bskyab pa yin//de lngas de dag skye bar 'gyur//sa yi khyams dang yang dag
270a5(rgyud): ldan//me yis mnyam par nges par bsrubs//chu dang rlung gis bye brag go/yid kyi de ru rab zhin pa//mngal ni bzung zhing blangs pa ste//de ni 'khor bar 'khor bar
270a6(rgyud): 'gyur//dgra pa mya ngan ldan pa ste//de las 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni//so sor skye ba smra ba ste//de bzhin chos dag zab mo nyid//sangs rgyas rnams kyis sangs rgyas
270a7(rgyud): rjod//de nyid 'di rnams mnyam bshad pa//sum cu pa ste rnyid par dka'//rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor las de kho na nyid kyi mun ngag sbyor ba bzhi'i cha zhes bya ba skye
270b1(rgyud): pa ban pa lade nas yang dag bshad b+ha ga/skyon srog la san rAg ts+tsha swAg+na/na sgrog rnam pa kanyis gyus s+ho//b+h+yo dang nang du yang dag kunas/ rdza
270b2(rgyud): lhur gsungs pa lags//nang du yang ni ji ltar 'gyur//nyon cog rdo rje nang gi ni//ji bzhin sbyin sreg ra sgrub bya//ma chen po dag rab tu snang //rnam rtog med po rje
270b3(rgyud): sbyin pasreg bya//bza' dang btung ba gang yang rung //de ru thams cad sbyin bsreg bya//sreg rdzas rang bzhin ga sungs pa dag/gzugs phung la sogs lnga po drug/rnam
270b4(rgyud): ga med pa'i sbyin sreg bya//de dag thams cad sems las byung //khrig dang khu bo de bzhin sha/dri chen dri chu lnga po dge/rnam smyig med par bza' bar bya//blo ldan
270b5(rgyud): rang bzhin med pas//gat+no mug nga rgyal de bzhin chags//zhe sdang de bzhin 'dod chag sa nyid//phrag dog sed smre phrag ma ngag/dmatshig de nyid dri ma med//stede nyi ma
270b6(rgyud): 'bar ba bzhin//de ltar dri ma med par 'gyur//ji ltar skyon gyi zla gsal ba//de ltar 'di yi dbus gsal yin//'dod chags chen por 'gyur ba yin//rdo rje snang byed
270b7(rgyud): sgron ma bzhi//de nyid thar par gsungs pa ste//bla med go 'phang thob par 'gyur//sbyin sreg 'di la rab gnas ni//lha rnams dga' bas tshim pa yin//sbyin sreg las ni
271a1(rgyud): rab gsungs nas//rab gnas dag ni brjod par bya//sngon gyi rnal 'byor la gnas nas//de nas rab gnas bya ba ste//rab gnas sku sogs thang
271a2(rgyud): ka dang //rnal 'byor can gyis glegs bam ste//dpal ldan g.yon gyi sa dril bu 'dzin//g.yas kyi rdo rje yongasu bzung //don kun rnal 'byor kun gyis ni//mdzes
271a3(rgyud): par sku gzugs mchod par bya//sha dang chang dag rab tu bkang //ro mi steng du yang dag gnas//par pa to pa li ka saM ku le//mchod pa kun gyis dgyes par bya//
271a4(rgyud): me tog spos dang mar me dang //dri nyid dang ni rnam pa bzhi//glu dbyangs de bzhin gArA dag dang //sgrub pos pa ta ha sogs te//sku la sogs pa 'di rnams la//rab gnas//
271a5(rgyud): chen po bya ba yin//ba i mu si aM sa hi dz+nyA yin//ma i hi mAM d+hum+bo pa hi dz+nyA i/tsi tri ha tsi nA da tA d+him+ma tsin ta dz+nyA i/sa au lAsa? d+hu sa rta tha ki rI dz+ya i/gru 'di dag ni/
271a6(rgyud): blangs pa yis//dbang rnams kun kyang blang ba ste//chos rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs//de bzhin gi shegs pa kun gyi gzhi//mchod pa kun gyi sprin chen po//spro zhing
271a7(rgyud): bsdu bar brjod pa'o//nga yis rab gnas bshad pa ni//rgyud rnams kun las rnyed par dka'/rnal 'byor ma bzhi'o kha sbyor las sbyin sreg rab gnas kyi brtag pa ste
271b1(rgyud): lnga pa'o////de nas mdor bsdus rab bshad pa//de nyid gtan la dbab pa'i mchog/rtag tu sems ni rnam rtog med//rnam rtog bcas pas ci ltar 'gyur//ji ltar me
271b2(rgyud): dag rab 'bar ba//rtag tu shing rnams tshig par brjod//de la tshig pa shing rnams te//'di yis tshig par mthong ba yis//de yis tshig pa ji bzhin du//blo ldan rnam rtog
271b3(rgyud): med pa yis//phung po lnga yi shing rnams te//de bzhin gzugs kyi phung po nyid//rus pa rkang dang bad kan dang //khrag dang khu ba dri chen dag/mig gnyis de bzhin rna ba dang //
271b4(rgyud): de bzhin du ni sna nyid dang //sa dang chu dang de bzhin me//rlung dang na mkha' nyid dag dang //'byung ba lnga po thams cad la//de nyid nyi shu ca lnga dag/de yi gnas ni bye brag tu//
271b5(rgyud): nga yis bye brag brjod pa ste//lte bar gnas pa'i 'khor lo chos//'dab ma drug cu bzhi dang ldan//shes rab gnasu rab tu gsum//zla bi la gzugs bzhin gsal ba
271b6(rgyud): ste//de yi se dbu su gnas pa dang //me lta bur ni 'bar ba yin//me chen de ni 'bar ba ste//de yi rtse mo mthong ba ni//de yi de ni gzugs mthong yin//dngos po thams
271b7(rgyud): cang gzugs 'dzin pa//blon po gan su gsungs shing brjod//hUM yig nga ro tshul 'dzin pa//rdo rje can ni rtag tu 'byung //rdo rje 'dzin chen gzugs bzhi no//rlung gis nus
272a1(rgyud): pa ma yin te//ni yi dbus rab tu grags//gang zhig ri bong can gzugs gsungs//shes rib de nyid mdor bsduso//ji ltar nyi mar rab tu brjod//rdo rje 'dzin
272a2(rgyud): dang bcas par 'gyur//sde tshan brgyad kyis tha ma gsungs//thig le dang ni zhabs kyis bcas//de nyid nyi ma zhesu gsungs//'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng ba can//de yi dbus su
272a3(rgyud): yang dag 'byung //rdo rje can gnas mnyam par 'gyur//ji ltar gnyid kyis bzung ba ni//cung zad kyang ni mthong ba med//gzugs la sogs pa'i bzung ba dag/langs na rtag
272a4(rgyud): tu mthong ba yin//de ru thabs ni sgoms pa yis//de yi rang bzhin mchog tu grags//sems can thogs med bde chen brjod//de ru der gnas dngos po yis//shes ram
272a5(rgyud): pha rol phyin pa gsal//de phyir de nyid dngos po yis//blo ldan sems kyis de nyid gsum//sems ni rnam par dag pa ste//'khor bri'i rgya mtshor 'khyams par 'gyur//sngags
272a6(rgyud): pa gar 'dod 'gro ba yin//skad cig gis ni gnas par 'gro//'dod chen rnams ni chags par 'gyur//drag po rnams la drag po mtshon//zhi bo rnams la zhi ba ste//'di ni
272a7(rgyud): mdun rgyab rgyal ba rim//ji ltar 'di ru pad+ma rim//'dod chags skyon gyis gos mi 'gyur//sna tshogs bag chags skyon mi chags//khams gsum po ni de bzhin dag
272b1(rgyud): stong pa mA yin mi sbyong min//dbu ma nye bar thob pa'o//shes rab pha rol phyin rnal 'byor//thabs ni snying rje'i bdag nyid//'di ni byang chub sems rdo rje//sems dang sems byung rang
272b2(rgyud): bzhin gyis//dngos po med par sgom pa'i dngosra//de la sogs par brjod pa yin//phreng ba med cing bya ba med//spungs pa med par brjod pa ste//rnal 'byor 'di la gnas pa ni
272b3(rgyud): dbu ma'i mchog gi go 'phang //bla na med pa'i ye shes ni//bla med zhes ni rim pa med//'dis ni 'khor ba rnam par grol//phyir mi ldog pa'i go 'phang mchog/rdo rje sems
272b4(rgyud): dpa' zhesu gsungs//de yis rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub//skye ba 'di la 'grub pa ste//rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam 'gyur//khrag dang khu ba bza' ba ste//dri chen dI chu sha
272b5(rgyud): dang lnga//de yi tshe ni rgyas par 'gro/rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam 'gyur//ba hU bi ha hU tra ta ga ti ba hU bi hA bi ha hu pa ri Ne sa be hU bi ha ra ga b+ha dz+re ta/ba hU bi ha bri t+ye gA ti
272b6(rgyud): tsa tsi d+hi dzi ba sad kya she/Sha na sha Sha sad tra bi nA ye bi ta gre sam+ba ru saM bi shu ha ha ho hi//a ho sa tsa bi sti dz+ya ma d+hu a ho/u kau to u ka ru a la la'o//glu 'di dag ni
272b7(rgyud): blangs pa ste//brtag pa kun gyi bla na med//de yi tshe na rgyas par 'gro/rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam 'gyur//rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor las de kho na nyid gtan la
273a1(rgyud): dbab bya'i brtag pa ste d+hag+sa pa///de nas yang dag bshad b+hA ga//de nyid rnal 'byor thams nA ste//sbyin dang tshul khyenas de
273a2(rgyud): bzhin brtson//bsam gtan bzod pa shes rab dang //stobs dang de bzhin thabs dang ni//smon lam ye shes yang dag 'byung //pha rol phyin po bcu rdzogs pa//byang
273a3(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yi//sbyin pa rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs//tshul khrims gsum gyi ngo ba nyid//bsam ga tA rna bzhir gsungs pa ste//brtson 'grus rnam pa lnga//
273a4(rgyud): ru 'gyur//bzod pa rnam pa bcu ro shes bya//shes rab rnam pa drug tu 'gyur//stobs ni rnam bcu rab tu gsung ste//thabs n+de rnam pa lngar 'gyur te//sprin lAm gnyi su
273a5(rgyud): shes bya ste//ye shes rnam lngar gnas pa'o//chos dang mi 'jigs rdzas dang byams//sbyin pa rnam pa bzhi po ni//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//rab 'dzin med
273a6(rgyud): cing khongs pa bral//bden pa gnyis med gnas pa ni//tshul khrims rnam gsum brjod pa ni//tshul khrims pha rol phyin par gsungs//bang gis rnal 'byor ma
273a7(rgyud): gnyis dang //phyi yi rnam pa gnyi su gsungs//bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa ni//dri chen dri chu bzhin shesha/khro dang khro bar ma dag 'byung //'di rnams brtson 'grus
273b1(rgyud): lnga po ni//dam tshig smra yis brjod pa'o//tshig rtsub brdzun dang ngag 'khyal dang //chags sdang zhe sdang phrag dog dang //nga rgyal khro dang de bzhin dbyen//'di ru rnam par bshad pa ni//
273b2(rgyud): rdo rje can ni bzod bcas 'gyur//yang dag lta ba yang dag rtog/yang dag dag dang yang dge las//yang dag 'tsho dang yang dag rtsol//bdag gis mdo ru bsdus nas na//shes
273b3(rgyud): rab rnam pa drug tu brjod//dad pa'i stobs dang dran pa'i stobs//ting 'dzin stobs dang shes rab stobs//lus kyi stobs dang ngag gi stobs//ye shes stobs dang smon la
273b4(rgyud): stobs//brtson 'grus kyi ni stobs rnams te//'di rnams stobs ni bcu pa'o//ma skyes pa yi dge ba bskyed//skyes pa'i mi dge yang dag spong //mi dge ma skyes mi bskyed dang //
273b5(rgyud): dge ba skyes pa 'phel ba ste//lnga pa thams cad chos rnams kyi//dge ba'i chos rnams gsungs pa ni//rdzogs par byed pa nyid dag go//smon lam rnam pa gnyo su gnas//mi
273b6(rgyud): ljong mnyam nyid so so rtog/bya grub chos dbyings rnam par dag/ye shes rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur//'di rnams bcu bzhi po dag ni//pha ri yi phyin pa mdor bsdus pa//bdag
273b7(rgyud): gis de nyid brjod pa ste//rnga ro tsa na nyon cig gtan la dbab//bcu gnyis mtha' deng rgya yi mtha'//mgo nas rkang pa'i mthol bar du//de yi dbus nges 'gyur ba//lce
274a1(rgyud): bya'i dbus rnam par gan sa//rtag tu shAr bar 'gyur ba ste//'di ru rdo rje can gyis mthong //lus ngag snyoms kyi smad+ma dus drug tu//'byur ba'i phyed pa
274a2(rgyud): 'bya phreba'o//steng gI sto ru rtag gnas pa'o//nyi ma'i 'od zer phreng ba can//zung zud lus las mthong ba med//'gul me'i 'khor lo'i gzugs can te//de nyid rnam
274a3(rgyud): 'byor la mya gyis ni//rtag pa'i dusu rnam par gnas//de la dbyer gyi dus med cing //dpyid med ston yang yod ma yin//dgun med sos kyang med pa ru//rnal 'byor byas
274a4(rgyud): ni rtag tu sgom//sngags pas steng gi bzhin du spyod//sngags dang rgyud la ji ltar gnas//nya dang shrI ni bza' bar bya//chang gi btung ba mchog yin//bcud kyi lon gyi tshe
274a5(rgyud): ga yis//sngags ni brjod pa myi bya'o//mtshon tshe'i gnas la dus rtag tu//mtshon bya'i mtshan nyid mtshon par bya//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs pa la
274a6(rgyud): 'khor lha dang /mI dang /lha ma yon rnams dang bcus pa'i 'jig d+hAnA yi rangs te//bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
274a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs so////dpal in dI pa na las nges par 'byung ba'i rnal 'byar ma'i rgyud chen po stong
274b1(rgyud): rgyun na sa byal nadang 'dzug rnon las 'dus bya'irgyas khyo pal b+hU trA~M'aM klu ga sa / dgra b+hU mdzad pa'o//
274b2(rgyud): lo ts+tsha ba la chongs yon tan 'barasabasgyur te/smad kyis de nyid tshe paN+Di ta gnyis la yang dag par ga tu m+b+ha te gtan la phab pa'o////
274b3(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/sau pu waM nA ma ma hA tan+t+ra/bod skad du/yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po/rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo//'di
274b4(rgyud): skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs
274b5(rgyud): //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i nang nas rdo rje snying po la gzigs te 'dzum pa mdzad do//'dzum pa mdzad ma
274b6(rgyud): zag tu de'i tshe rdo rje snying po sten lces lhangs te/blo gros phrag pa gcig tu byas na ste dbu sa mr-i g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gzugs te/thal ma sbyar ba byas nas bcom
274b7(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//ye shes kyi dbang po rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gi ni'i gsang ba yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba'i mtshan nyid nyan par 'tsha
275a1(rgyud): oM ma'o rdo rje snying po lags lag so//snying rje chen po logaso lagaso//byang chub sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi phung po leg so log so//glang
275a2(rgyud): zhig rgyud thams cad du gsang ba de thams cad 'dod pas zhus shig/de nas rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po de rnams rab tu 'dzum zhing mig
275a3(rgyud): phye bas phyag btsal te/rang gi the tshom yang dang yang du zhus pa/rgyud ni thams cad ci zhes brjod//gleng gzhi yang ni ji ltar lags//'di la gsang ba ci zhes gsungs//ji
275a4(rgyud): ltar yang dag sbyor byung ming //de la mtshan nyid ji ltar legs//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/rgyud thams cad ni rgyud thams cad do//rgyud thams cad kyi sgras ni
275a5(rgyud): 'dus pa la sogs pa'o//de rnams kyi gleng gzhi ni byung bar nges pa zhes bya ba'i don to//khyab 'jug dang /dbang phyug chen po dang /tshangs pa dang /nyan thos dang /
275a6(rgyud): rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir gsang ba'o//yang dag par sbyor ba ni thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can no//de las byung ba ni yang dag par
275a7(rgyud): sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin ces bya ba'i don to//'byung ba ni skye ba ste/de ltar gnas pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos po'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid can du gyur pa'o//mtshan nyid ces
275b1(rgyud): bya ba ni 'dis mtshon par byed pa'o//yang na rgyud thams cad kyi gle ga yang dag pad+ma sbyor ba lngas byung ba zhes bya ba'i sgras ni rdo rje sems dpar gas so//gsang ba zhas
275b2(rgyud): bya ba 'di ni man ngag can gyi sngags btu pa dang /dkyil 'khor gyi lha la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid do//thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid rgyu de//de ni nga yis bla shad kyis
275b3(rgyud): /da par sbyong nyid bsams pa ni//lus can rnams kyi dri ma bkru/gzugs kyi khams ni stong pa yi//sgyu la de nyid kyis ni bye//d+hI yoM khams ni stong pa yis//ro la de
275b4(rgyud): nyid kyis ni bya//rig+na bya'i khams ni stong pa yi//srid la de nyid kyis ni bya//rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/mig gi rang bzhin stong pa yi//nang du rnam shis ji ltar lpags//
275b5(rgyud): rna ba'i rang bzhin stong pa yi//nang du rnam shes ji ltar lpags//sna yi rang bzhin stong pa yi//nang du rnam shes ji ltar lags/mye yi rang bzhin stong pa yi//nung
275b6(rgyud): du rnam shes ji ltar lags//lus kyi rang bzhin stong pa yi//nang du rnam shes ji ltar lugs//yid kyi rang bzhin stong pa yi//dbus rnam shes ji ltar lags//de phyir
275b7(rgyud): gzugs med lta ba med//sgra med thos pa po yang med//dri med sdom pa po yang mad//ro med myong ba po yang med//reg med reg pa pa yang med//sems med se mas
276a1(rgyud): la byung ba'ang med//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gnyis med gnyis na rnams spangs pa'o//de nyid lam ni ji bzhin nyon//d+h+r-ig go ma
276a2(rgyud): cing rnam shes med//de bzhin rtog ge pas mi rtogs//sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ni//na mkha' lta bur mnyam pa nyid//nyan thos rnams kyis mi shes te//mi shes
276a3(rgyud): pa yi mun pas bsgribs//bag chags sad pa'i ye shes grang //rang rgyal rnams kyi sprul pa'o//gsang ba sangs rgyas spyod yul nyid//de rnams kun gyis mi sheso//
276a4(rgyud): 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i 'jigs pa las//rgal bar 'gro ba'i sems kyis ni//lus kyi dbus su bskor ba yi//rgal ba mtshan par gsungs pa ste//rnam shes ye shes
276a5(rgyud): sems kyis ni//mtshan nyid mtshan bzhi mtshon par byeng //ye shes kyis ni shes bya blta//shes bya rnams kyis 'gro ba brtag/'gro ba brtag pa'i sems kyis ni/
276a6(rgyud): ji ltar rung 'dod la sogs 'gro/'gro bar sngon gyi skye ba ni//stong phrag du ma drug tu 'gro/yo gis sngor gsungs mtshan nyid kyis//mnyem nyid stong par bsams nas ni//
276a7(rgyud): lus kyi stong pa'i zhing sogs la//blo dang ldan pas so bon gdab//rtsa yi mdzes spyi las byung ba//de ni rdul bral rab tu grags//dag pa'i shel gyi 'od dang mnyam//byang
276b1(rgyud): chub sems de'i 'dugs yu ba//ye shes lnga da ngas do nyid//yungs kar gyi ni sgom phywa tsam//de yi nang du gnas pa'i skye//mi gsal gsal ba'o rang bzhon can//ma m+bo byA/
276b2(rgyud): ba mchog tu phra//thig le'i gzugs ni yid kyi dngos//snying gi dbusu rtag gnas shing //'od zer ldan zhing gzi brjid tshe//bcu gnyis mtha' dang dgu yi mthar//rkang mi thal
276b3(rgyud): mgo bo med par ni//theg pa gcig ni rnam phyung nas//lte ba'i dbus rnam par gnas//cha nI lnga bye tsam nyid ni//rlung dbang dbyibasu rgyas pa la//de yi cha yang phye nas ni//
276b4(rgyud): rdo rje'i dbusu rnam phyung ste//skye gnas dbu su sa bon gnas//chos dbyangs khu bar byas nas ni//sgo ni dgu po thams cad du//de ni rim pas 'pho bar 'gyur//de bzhin
276b5(rgyud): me ni tshangs pa'i dngos//sa yi sa bon gnyis kyis ni//mig la de nyid sbyar bar bya//rlung gi stong sogs sa ban gyi//sems kyis sna dang rna ba sogs//bdud rtsi chu yi sa
276b6(rgyud): bon lnga//dbang por gtso bo dbang phyug nyid//mgrin par gti mug so bon te//lag par nyon mongs de bzhin te//g.yo ba snying gi gnas rnams//phyugs bdag lta
276b7(rgyud): ba'i rtsa bar ni//yan lag brgyad kyi sa bon gyis//yan lag brgyad kyi cho gas 'dzin//brtan sogs g.yo bar bcas pa yi//'gro kun khyab par byed pas khyab//tshangs
277a1(rgyud): sogs m+b+ha dang lha man no//da ma gdan du gyur pa yin//gang la gtso bo da gyur pa'o//khyim ci thA ga zhos gsungs//ji srod la stsal rnam gnasag/
277a2(rgyud): de yi las dang las min 'gyur//dge dang mi dge'i las cung zad//byas pa'i las ni thams cad byed//rnal 'byor mnyam pa nyid du gsungs//rab tu sbyor ba sgom pa yin///
277a3(rgyud): gang tshe las kyi lus btsam pa//de ltar lha ru 'gyur ba yin//gang gis brtan dang g.yo khyab pa//des ni de tshe rang gis nus//na mkha' lta bur mnyam nyid ni//de yi kha
277a4(rgyud): drog shes par bya//mya ngan 'das gnas dpa' bo ni//gos pa med cing dri mya spangs/mo dang sring mo nyid dang yang //bu mo de bzhin gnyen mo dang //bram ze mo dang rgyal
277a5(rgyud): rigs dang //rje'u mo de bzhin dmangs mo dang //gar ma chos ma g.yung mo dang //de bzhin du ni gdol pa mo//thabs dang shes rab tshi ga yis//de nyid sdug pas
277a6(rgyud): mchod par bya/ji ltar bye bar mi 'gyur bar//rab tu 'bad pas bsten par bya//ma gsang sbal dang chom rkun sogs//sa la spyod pa sdug bsngal byed//rigs kyi dbye
277a7(rgyud): bas phye nas ni//phyag rgya rnam pa lngar ni gsungs//bram ze skye gnyis rigs skyes ma//de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gsungs//rgyal rigase ma ni rgyal po'i rus//
277b1(rgyud): rma bya zla sogs rigs las skyes//rdo rje bdud rtsi zhes byar grags//rje'u mo ba glang skyong ba ste//las kyi rigs lus skyes sngar gsungs//dmyangs mo yang ni bran mo ste//rnam
277b2(rgyud): par snang mdzad chen por gsungs//gar mo pad+ma'i rigs nyid de//ches ma de bzhin las kyi rigs//g.yung mo rdo rje'i rigasu ba shad//rin chen gdol po mar shes bya//
277b3(rgyud): phyag rgya lngar ni rnam par nges//'di rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs//mdor bsdus pas ni brjod par bya//dpal ldan de bzhin nyid gshegs shing //de bzhin slar
277b4(rgyud): yang gshegs pa nyid//'dis ni shes rab rigs pas ni//de bzhin gshegs par mngon par brjod//rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru gsungs//rigs ni brgya dang mtha' yas
277b5(rgyud): dang //sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis//phyi nas rnam pa gsum du 'gyur//rigs dang 'byung ba lnga rnams dang //phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gyis//rdo rje rin chen pa nor bu//
277b6(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i rim po'i rigs rnamaso//sbom po po med bsgom bya ma de//sngags med lha yang yid ma yin//spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin nyid//sngags dang lhar ni yang dag
277b7(rgyud): gnas//rnam snang mi bskyod don yod dang //rin chen dpag med sems dpa' po//tshangs pa khyab 'jug zhi ba dang //thams cad sangs rgyas de nyid brjod//tshangs pa
278a1(rgyud): sgrib bral sangs rgyas nyid//'jug phyir khyab 'jug brjod par bya//zhi ba rtag tu dge ba ste//thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid gnas//dam pa'i bde bas de nyid
278a2(rgyud): de//dga' ba rtogs phyir rnam sangs rgyas//gang phyir lus las byung ba'i phyir//lho zhes mngon par brjod par bya//'di le b+ha ga mnga' ba'i phyir//bcom ldan 'das zhes
278a3(rgyud): brjod par bya//b+ha ga rnam pa drug tu brjod//dbang phyug la sogs yon tan kun//yang na nyon mongs la sogs pa//'dzem pa'i phyir ni bcom ldan 'das//gang phyir skye
278a4(rgyud): 'gro bskyed pa'i phyir//shes rab ma zhes brjod par bya//grang phyir skal ba ston pa'i phyir//shes rab de nyid sring mo nyid//shes rab tshos mar brjod pa ni//sems
278a5(rgyud): can thams cad 'tshed pa'i phyir//btso blag ma zhes de bzhin brjod//yon tan 'jo bar gsungs pa'i phyir//shes rab bu mor brjod par bya//snying rje chen pos g.yo
278a6(rgyud): ba'i phyir//shes rab gar mar brjod par bya//gang phyir bcom ldan mi reg pa//de phyir g.yung mor brjod par bya//A li kA li rab smras pas//bzlas pa smra bar yang
278a7(rgyud): dag bshad//rkang pa'i rjes ni dkyil 'khor yin//nyid phyir dkyil 'khor brjod par bya//lag pa sgyur ba phyag rgya yin//sor mo nyed pa'ang de bzhi ni//gang phyir rnam
278b1(rgyud): sems pasam gtan ni//gang sems de ni bsam gtA no//pha las bde ba gang thob pa//nga yi bde ba rang gi sa bzlal//bde ba gang gis 'ching bya 'dir//de yi bde ba bsam
278b2(rgyud): gtan brjod//brjod par bya ba dang brjod par byed pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i sgom pa'i de kho na'i rab tu byed pa ste dang po'o////de nas byang
278b3(rgyud): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bshad par bya'o//nang gi lus dang /phyi'i lus dang /phyi nang gnyis ka'i lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing gnas pa'i phyir yang
278b4(rgyud): drag par rab tu shus te/mi rig pa la sogs pas yid gnyis su gyur pa'i 'dul ba'i 'jig rten la dran pa dang ldan pa'o//nang gi tshor ba dang /phyi'i tshor ba dang /
278b5(rgyud): phyi nang gnyis ka'i tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjesu lta zhing gnas pa'i phyir yang dag par rab tu shes tAM//ma rig pa la sogs pas yid gnyi su gyur pa'i 'dul ba'i
278b6(rgyud): 'jig rten la dran pa dang ldan pa'o//nang gi chos rnams dang /phyi'i chos rnams dang /phyi nang gnyis ka'i chos rnams la chos kyi rje su lta zhing gnas pa'i phyir yang
278b7(rgyud): dag par rab tu shes te/mi rig pa la sogs pas yid gnyisu gyur pa'i 'dul ba'i 'jig rten la dran pa dang ldan pa'o//nang gi sems dang /phyi'i sems dang /phyi nang
279a1(rgyud): gnyis ka'o sems la sems kyi rdosu lta zhing gnas pa'i phyir yang dag por rab tu sheste te/ma rig pa la sogs pas yid gnyaMs gyur pa'i 'dun
279a2(rgyud): ba'i sems can la dran pa dang ldan pa'o//'di rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'o//sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed do//
279a3(rgyud): 'bad do//brtson 'grus rtsom mo//sems rab tu 'jug/smon lam yang dag par 'dre ba so//sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed//'bra//
279a4(rgyud): brtson 'grus rtsam//sems rab tu 'jug go//smon lam yang dag par 'debs/dge ba'i chos mi skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dren pa bskyed do//btsun 'grus rtsom mo//
279a5(rgyud): sems rab tu 'jug go//smon lam yang dag par 'debs so//de ltar dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas par bya ba'i phyir thabs tshad med pa bsgoms pas yongasu
279a6(rgyud): gang ba'i phyir yongasu gang bar gyur pas sgom pa dam pa 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed do//'bad do//brtson 'grus rtso mo//sems rab tu 'jug/smon lam
279a7(rgyud): yang dag por 'debs so//'di rnams ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi'o//'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom par bya
279b1(rgyud): ste/bye brag phyed pas nges par 'byung ba dang /'dod chags dang bral bas nges par 'byung ba dang /'gog pas nges par 'byung ba dang /rnam par byang bar gyur pas bdag gi
279b2(rgyud): bdun po nub por 'gyur zhing shin tu rab tu 'jog pa ma yino//brtson 'grus kyi ti nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul byi rkang pa bsgom par bya ste/bye brag phyed
279b3(rgyud): pas nges par 'byung ba dang /'dod chags dang bral bas nges par 'byung ba dang /'gog pas nges por 'byung ba dang /rnam par byung bar gyur pas bdag go brtson
279b4(rgyud): 'grus nub par 'gyur zhing shin tu rab tu 'jog pa ma yin pa'o//dpyod pa'i ting 'dzin sbyong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom par bya ste/bye brag
279b5(rgyud): phyed pas nges par 'byung ba dang /'dod chags dang bral bas nges par 'byung ba dang /'gog pas nges par 'byung ba dang /rnam par byang bar gyur pas bdog gi dpyod pa
279b6(rgyud): nub par gyur zhing shin tu rab tu 'jog pa ma yin pa'o//sems kyi ti nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom par bya ste/bye brag phyed pas
279b7(rgyud): nges par 'byung ba dang /'dod chags dang bral bas nges par 'byung ba dang /'gag pas nges par 'byung ba dang /rnam par byang bas nges par 'byung bas bo dge go sems
280a1(rgyud): nub par 'gyur zhing shin tu rab tu 'jog pa ma yin pa'o//'di rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ste/'dong par spyod pa dang bcas pa'o//'jig rten
280a2(rgyud): pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba la dad par byed de/rang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa la so sor yid ches par gyur pa gang zhig de ltar las byed par 'gyur ba dge ba 'am sdig
280a3(rgyud): pa de dang de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir de ni 'tsho ba'i rgyur yang sdig pa'i las mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i/'di ni dad pa'i dbang
280a4(rgyud): por gsungaso//gang zhig chos rnams la dad pa'i dbang pos rab tu 'jog par byed pa'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus kyi dbang pos shes par byed do//'di ni brtson
280a5(rgyud): 'grus kyi dbang por gsung so//gang zhig chos rnams la brtson 'grus kyi dbang pos shes pa 'i chos rnams ni dran pa'i dbang pos rab tu 'jog par byed do//'di
280a6(rgyud): ni dran pa'i dbang pos gsungaso//gang zhig chos rnams la dran pa'i dbang pos rab tu 'jig par mi byed pa de'i chos rnams ni ting 'dzin gyi dbang pos rtse gcig
280a7(rgyud): tu byed pa'o//'di ni ting 'dzin gyi dbang por gsung so//gang zhig chos rnams la ti nge 'dzin gyi dbang pos rtse gcig tu byed pa de'i chos rnams ni shes rab kyi
280b1(rgyud): dbang pos so sor rig pa ste/de ni chos de dang de rnams la so sbyor rtog pa skye bar 'gyur ro//'di ni shes rab kyi dbang por gsung so//dbang po lnga po 'di rnams 'phel ba ni stobs
280b2(rgyud): lnga ru 'gyur te/dad pa'i stobs dang /brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /dran pa'i stobs dang /ti nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /shes rab kyi stobs te/'di rnams ni stobs
280b3(rgyud): lnga'o//de la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /chos rab tu rnam par 'byid po yang dag byang chub kyi yan
280b4(rgyud): lag dang /brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
280b5(rgyud): tingange 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan log dang /btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yon lag ste/bye brag phyed pas nges par 'byung ba dang /'dod chags dang bral
280b6(rgyud): bas nges par 'byung ba dang /'gog pas nges par 'byung ba dang /kun nos nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/chos rab tu 'byed pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sogs
280b7(rgyud): pasgom pa'o//de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/yang dag pa'i lta ba ni gang zhig 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/bdag tu lta bas kun nas bslang ba
281a1(rgyud): ma yin pa dang /sems can med pa dang /'tshob med pa dang /gsob med pa dang /skyes bu med pa dang /gang zag med pa dang /shod las smra
281a2(rgyud): med pa dang /shed bu med pa dang /byed pa po med pa dang /tshor ba po med pa'i lta bas kun+da nas bslang ba chod pa ma yin pa dang /rtag par lta bas kun nas bslasrung ba ma
281a3(rgyud): yin pa dang /srid pa dang bral ba'i lci bas kun nas bsrung ba dang /rig su lung bstan pa'i lta bas kun nas bslang ba dang /ji srid 'khor ba ma yin zhing mya ngan las 'das
281a4(rgyud): pa yin pa'i lta bas kun nas bslang bya ste/'dri ni yang dag pI lta bar gsung so//gang zhig yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang /
281a5(rgyud): nyon mongs pas kun nas bslang ba'i rtog pa de ni yang dag pa'i rtog par mi 'gyuraro//yang dag pa'i rtog pa gang zhig tshul khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /
281a6(rgyud): rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung pos kun nas slong ba de'i yang dag pa'i rtog pa de ni yang dag pa'i rtog par 'gyur te/'di ni yang
281a7(rgyud): dag pa'i rtog par gsungaso//gang zhig tshig gis bdag la gdung bar mi bya zhing gzhan la gdung bar mi bya ba dang /bdag la mi bya zhing gzhan dag nyon mongs par mi
281b1(rgyud): bya ba dang /bdag la mi dbye zhing gzhan drug la yang dpya bar mi bya ba ste/de mnyam par gzhag pa dang ldan pas tshig dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /gang zhig tshig gis yang dag
281b2(rgyud): po'i 'phags pa 'jug par 'gyur ba 'di ni yang drag po'i ngag tsos gsung so//gang zhig las nag po dang nag po'i rnam par smin pa de'i las mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang //
281b3(rgyud): gang zhig lus dkar ba dang dkar po'i rnam par smin pa de'i lus mngon par 'du byed pa dang /gang zhig las dkar po dang /nag po'i rnam par smin pa de'i las mngon
281b4(rgyud): par 'du mi byed pa dang /gang zhig las dkar po dang /nag po dang /dkar po'i rnam par smin pa dang /nag po zad pa'i bsam pas gnas pa de'i las mngon par 'du byed
281b5(rgyud): de/dam po'i las lta bur 'gyur ba ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ste/'di ni yang drag po'i las kyi mthar gsung so//gang gi tshe 'phags pa lta bur dul ba dang /yon tan
281b6(rgyud): yang dag pa'i chas zhum zhing dul ba dang /kha gsag med pa dang /mang du smra ba ma yin pa dang /gta ma la mi dga' ba dang /rang gi spyod pa'i tshul khrims dang /'jig
281b7(rgyud): rten pha rol gyi dbang phyug dang ldan pa dang /bdag gi rnyed pa kha na ma tho ba med pas bdag chog par 'dzin pa dang /'phags pa'i bka'o gnang bas 'tsho ba ste/'di ni yang
282a1(rgyud): dag pa'i 'tsho bar gsung so//rgyal ba ni gang zhig brdzun dang /'phags pas ma gnang ba dang /'dod chags dang /zho sdang dang /gti mug dang /
282a2(rgyud): nyon mongs pa sten par mi 'dod pa ni rtsol ba ste/rtsol ba gang zhig yang dag pa'i 'phags pa'i lam gyi bden par 'jug cing mya ngan las 'dres par 'gro ba dang /so so'i
282a3(rgyud): gnasu skyed par byed pa de ni rtsol ba yang dag par rje su 'brang ba ste/'di ni yang dag pa'i rtsol bar gsung so//gang la nye bar gnas po de ni rab tu mi g.yo ba dang /lus drang
282a4(rgyud): pos kyog po ma yin pa dang //'khor ba'i sbyin sna tshogs lnga sogs pa dbang du byed pa ston cing /mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas 'dod pa'i dran pa ni mi brjed pa ste/
282a5(rgyud): 'di ni 'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor ba'o//'di ni yang dag pa'i dran par gsungaso//yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin ni ti 'dzin gang la gnas nas sems
282a6(rgyud): can thams cad rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par gnas te/mya ngan las 'das pa mnan pa'o//'dis ni yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin du gsung so//de nyid
282a7(rgyud): yang dag bshad pa ni//dga' ba la sogs rnams te//dbang po la sogs rang bzhin gyi//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas//phung po la sogs khyad par rgyas
282b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni gnas//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi//sangs rgyas nyid ni mchog tu 'bab//byang sems sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis//gang tshe 'dir ni gang gyur
282b2(rgyud): pa//dbang po phung po 'byung ba yi//sangs rgyas de yid ma thag/rang lus nyid la sangs rgyas nyid//gzhan ni gang du'ang mi gnaso//lus las gzhan du sangs rgyas nyid//mi
282b3(rgyud): shes pa yis bsgribs par brjod//ye shes chen po rang lus gnas/rtog pa thams cad yang dag spangs//dngos po kun la khyab pa po//lus gnas lus la ma skyes pa'o//
282b4(rgyud): rdo rje snying pos gsil pa//lus la rtsa du lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsal pa/'khor lo bzhi yi rab dbye bas//brgya phrag gcig dang nyi shu lcug/byang chub sem
282b5(rgyud): kyi rang bzhin gyis//rtsa rnams sum cu rtsa gnyis mchog/gsungs pa/'di lta ste/mi phyed ma zhes brjod pa dang //phra gzugs me dang /rtse ba ma dang /g.yon po ma dang /
282b6(rgyud): thung ngu me dang /ru sbal skyes ma dang /sgom pa ma dang /dbang ma dang /skyon ma dang /'jug ma dang /ma mo dang /mtshan mo dang /bsil sbyin ma dang /tsham pa dang /rkyang ma dang /
282b7(rgyud): ram da pa kun 'bar ma dang /'bab ma dang /rangs ma dang /mdog ma dang /gzugs can ma dang /spyi ma dang /rgyu sbyin ma dang /sbyor bral ma dang /sdu gu ma dang /grub ma
283a1(rgyud): /da da pa dang /do zhin du da ba ma dang /gas dang /b+h+yod ma dang /m+b+ha dang /gsum dang / /

283a3(rgyud): bzhi dang //yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu pAl gyi nang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags
283a4(rgyud): pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa'i mthar thug pa la sogs pa'i rnam par 'grel pa byang chub kyi sems 'jug pa zhes bya bste rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o//
283a5(rgyud): de nas btsam ldan 'das la de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyis marnyed pa b+h+yos+thA nas phyag/'tshal te 'di skad kyis gsol to//gisang pa'i ye shes smra
283a6(rgyud): med lcing bya bcom ldan pa shud dru gsal//de nas btsum ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas
283a7(rgyud): cad kyi snang po ye shes mer me rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyems par bzhugs te/rgyud thams cad kyi gsang ba 'di bka' stsal pa//gsang ba'i mchog
283b1(rgyud): dgyes pa ni//thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs//sangs rgyas kun dngos sems dpa' ni//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor to//
283b2(rgyud): brtan pa rtag tu mchog tu yang //yid srub so sor skyes pa nyid//rtag tu rang bzhin mnan dka' ba//sna tshogs las kyi rnal 'byor gyis//sna tshogs tshig 'dod po yi//
283b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs rnams//sems can rnams ni 'dul bar brjod//sangs rgyas kun sogs brtan dang g.yo//thams cad dngos po srid pa 'di//sangs rgyas
283b4(rgyud): kun dang mnyam spyod pa//mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom//'dis ni sgyu ma'i rnal 'byor gyis//thams cad las ni sna tshogs mchog/sangs rgyas sogs pas 'dul ba'i
283b5(rgyud): phyir//dngos grub sems can kun don mchog/rang gi ngo bos yang bsgyur bas//bud med sgyu ma thams cad 'grub//sna tshogs sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'di//mkha' 'gro ma
283b6(rgyud): zhis kla klo'i skad//De baM hA ya sar 'gro bar//skad dbyings 'di ni rnam pa ro brtag/na mkha' kun tu spyod 'grub pas//mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags//kun nas
283b7(rgyud): sna tshogs phyag rgya ste//kuni las sna tshogs sdom pa yi//rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid//pad+ma de bzhin pad+ma 'dzin//nor bu nor bu 'dzin pa nyid//'di rnams kyi ni rigs rnams
284a1(rgyud): yin//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis mnon pa rdul dang bral ba'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs twa/
284a2(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems 'di bka' stsal pa/stong min stong pa min pa'ang min//dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur te//shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba//thabs ni snying rje'i
284a3(rgyud): bodagra nyid de//de nas mdzes pa'i snying rje thabs//shes rab pha rol phyin gsalnga ba//rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la//dngos po mod cing sgom pa'ang med//rnam
284a4(rgyud): rtog med pas rtag mos pas//brtag pa kun gyis brtag par bya//rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la//sems can don ni yongasu brtag/de bzhin gshegs pa kun
284a5(rgyud): bdag chos//chos can med cing chos nyid med//sgra brnyan lta bur mnyam pa nyid//de nas 'di ni chos dag 'byung //de nas theg pa chen po las byung ba'i sgom pas
284a6(rgyud): yon tan rgyas pa rnams kyis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis yang dag par bstod pa/rnal 'byor gyi bdag po
284a7(rgyud): sems can grol bar mdzad pa la bstod cing phyag 'tsha so//sems can bdag nyid skyes pa gcig par mdzad pa la bstod cing phyag 'tshalo//'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i
284b1(rgyud): gti mug gcod par mdzad pa la bstod cing phyag 'tshalo//de kho na thams cad kyi ye shes gcig tu ston par mdzad pa la bstod cing phyag 'tshal te/bdag rtag tu phyag 'tshalo//
284b2(rgyud): yang mchod pa byas nas phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to//chos rnams thams cad gcig pa'i sku'i//snying po bcom ldan bshod du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis
284b3(rgyud): bka' stsal po/dbang po gang dang gang lam nyid//de dang de yi rang bzhin 'gyur//mnyam par ma gzhag rnal 'byor gyis//rtag par shin tu mnyam gzhag nyid//gang
284b4(rgyud): phyir thams cad bdag nyid kyi//rnam shes phung por gnas pa ni//skyes bu tha mal sems rmongs pa//la la so so sor rtog mi nus//sems dang sems byung sems kyi
284b5(rgyud): dngos//ye shes shes bya rang bzhin can//'bras bu rnams la byed pa nyid//chos dang chos can sgom pa nyid//gang phyir chos ni du mas ni//chu bo'i rgyun ni rgya mtsho ltar//
284b6(rgyud): thar pa nyid ni gcig pu yin//mang po dmigs par mi 'gyuraro//ji ltar nang du rnam gnas pa//bla ma'i zhal nas rnyed par 'gyur//de kho na nyid mdor bstan pa ste rab tu
284b7(rgyud): byed pa gsum pa'o////de nas rgyud rnams thams cad du//gtan la phab pa rab bshad bya//sems can kun la mnyam pa'i phyir//gru gsum rgya che'i gzugs
285a1(rgyud): na na mas rgyun sa/na su na sunan tu du shA ThA smra na/nan nas // ga
285a2(rgyud): yul pa rnam sa/slo ga ngas blanas //mid rdzus pa nis saskyes bya

285a4(rgyud): sa pa sa phywa/klananA yang rnye la 'dod pa ltung / chags byu paH//drug du ni n+dan ma sa sa/sams
