285a7(rgyud): mdzi nas ni//sa kyinas sprul pa'i rgyug/nyin me rnams ni 'ad ces 'phru//mtshan pa 'di ni 'bras bur gyur //khrims gsu
285b1(rgyud): //gang drang grang gis gnas gyur pa//da ni dri yi ngo bo can//bud shing bsregs pa'i rigs pas ni//dgyes pa'i rgyal bgrar mdan mchog/phung po khams drung skye mchod//
285b2(rgyud): rnams//'di nyid rnam dag mtshon pa 'di//ji ltar dgra bo nus pa la//dbri bo nus pas de bsnun pa//gti mug dag pas gti mug ste//zhe sdang dge byas zhe sda nyid//'o
285b3(rgyud): chags dag pas 'dod chags te//nga rgyal rnam dgra nga rgyal che//phrag dog dag pas phrag dog dag/thams cad rnam dag rdor 'dzin mgon//de yi ngo bo rnam dge ba//nyon
285b4(rgyud): rmongs lnga ni mAny+dzamA par 'gyur//de ltar rigs ni lnga rnams dang //ye shaMsde sna dang sangs rgyas sde//'di las rdo rje snying po dang //khro bo khams gsum sems can skye//rlung
285b5(rgyud): gi dbye bre 'di nyidi ni//bla ma'i zhal las rnyed par 'gyur//bla ma draman pa'i sems can rnams//sngags dang phyag rgya rnyed mi 'gyur//gang zhig shin tu gsal byas ni//
285b6(rgyud): 'dzam gling de 'dir sangs rgyas bsngags//gru gsum dag pa e yi dbyings//dbusu dgyes pa'i e paM yin//gru gsum dkyil 'khor nyams dga' bar//rdo rjer lci
285b7(rgyud): rnam par byung //btsun mo'i b+ha ga zhes kyang bya//chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes byang ba shid//de yi nang song bad+ma ni//mdab ma brgyad pa snying por bcas//de la A li
286a1(rgyud): 'dres//sngo tshon brgyad ni rnam par gnas//sngags kyi gzugs kyis lus can gyi//las kyi tshogs ni byed par 'gyur//sngo go rnams ni lnga bcu nyid//
286a2(rgyud): rig byed rnams la nye bar gnas//sngags rnams nyid dang rgyud rnams dang //phyi rol tshul gyis bstan bcos kyi//rdo rje snying po'i rang bzhin 'di//gzhan du 'di las cung
286a3(rgyud): zad med//a ka tsa Ta pa ya sha//sde tsher dga' ba lnga bcu yang //mnyam pa dag tu sprul pa rnams//rdo rje ra li pad+ma son//mdab ma brgyad po phyogs rnams dang //mtshama?
286a4(rgyud): rnams su ni 'di rnams rigs//de rnams dbus su ze 'bru la//dam pa'i dbang phyug ma yod de//sde chen brgyad po rnams kyis ni//yi ge dam pa yongasu bskor//a ni
286a5(rgyud): yig 'bru kun gyi mchog/don chen sde chen gtso ba ni//lus can rnams kyi sngags kun ni//de nyid las no yang dag 'byung //gang zhig ral gri dang /mig sman dang //
286a6(rgyud): rkang byug dang /ril bu dang /rkang 'og dang /gnod sbyin mo'i yan lag ma dang /'jig rten gsum gyi khongasu rgyu ba/de ngul chu'i 'gro bas rje su 'brang ba/gang zhig
286a7(rgyud): thams cad du mthu che ba/rang gi khyim du lnga bcu 'dod pa dang ldan par 'grub bo//de ni sde tshan brgyad nang son//dbyangs mcho pa sde tshan bdag nyid 'byin//skye bo rnams
286b1(rgyud): chog rgyas pa//byang zhig cung zad rtogs bya ba//de kun sngags kyi gzugs kyis ni//de phyir rab tu skyo bar 'gyur//lus can rnams ni thams cad kyi//sgra ni sngags zhes
286b2(rgyud): brjod par bya//sna tshogs 'dud pa'i gnas tshon las//chos kyi ra li rnam par 'byung //dngos grub rdzu 'phrul rnam gnas pa'i//sngags dang nges pa gang yang med//rang bzhin gyi
286b3(rgyud): ni ma skyes pa'o//sngags kyis yig 'bru dbang phyug mchog/yang dag sbyor 'byung mtshan nyid ni//de nas mchog tu rab bshad bya//e ni sa ru shes par bya//las kyi phyag rgya
286b4(rgyud): snyan mo nyid//snang rje chen mo thabs chen me//rang bzhin sna tshogs sbrid yul ma//lte bar sna tshogs 'dam skyes la//sprul pa'i 'khor lor rnam par gnas//bai ni chu ru shas
286b5(rgyud): par bya//chos kyi phyag rgya mA ma ki/byams pa dang ni smon li mtshul po lha mo rdo rje'i rigs btsom//snying kha ra chu skyes med ba brgyad la//chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag gnas//
286b6(rgyud): mya ni mo ru brjod pa ste//phyag rgya chen mo gros dkar mo//dga' dang stobs kyi rnal 'byor gyis//lha mo pad+ma'i rigs byung ma//lkog ma chu skyes mdab brgyad gnyis//longs
286b7(rgyud): spyod 'khor lir yang dag gnas//yA ni rlung gi rang bzhin te//nyon mongs thams cad rab 'joms byed//dam tshig phyag rgya chen mor nges//lha ma las kyi rigs
287a1(rgyud): gtsom//btang snyoms ye shes rnal 'byor gyis//sgrol mu 'khor ba sgrol ba ma//'dam skyes mdab ma sum cu gnyis//bde chen 'khor lo chen
287a2(rgyud): por gnas//es ni shes rab brjod par bya//daM ni thabs dang ldan pa nyid//ba~M gyis rnam par rgyan ma nyid//e ni nges par mdzes par 'gyur//thabs dang shes rab
287a3(rgyud): rang bzhin gyis//steng dang 'og tu snyoms par 'jug/e nyid dang ni baM nyid dag/gnyis gnyi su ni brjod pa nyid//'di skad ces bya ba'i tshig gi phrad ni de skad ces
287a4(rgyud): gsungs nas zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa'i rgyud kyi tshogs la bskye gso zhes brjed do//bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba ni de skad du 'dod chags chen po 'di la rtag tu gnas
287a5(rgyud): pa'o//shru zhes bya ba ni 'dzag par gsung s+ho//tA zhes bya bya ni gang yang bde ba chen po'i mgon po'o//bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis thos pa'i phyir
287a6(rgyud): ba'i ye shes kyi thos pa yin gyi/rtogs pa ni ma yin//bcom ldan 'das rtogs pa'i skyon gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sdud par byed pa dang
287a7(rgyud): 'chad pa po dag dbyar med par 'gyur//yang na rtogs pa nyid ni gdul bya'i skye bo'i dbang du byas nas 'chad pa po nyid sdud par byed pa yin te/'chad pa po ngo chos
287b1(rgyud): k+Sh+Na nga /rang gi tshogs ldan ny+dzan pA dang //de dag ji ltar 'tsha lo bAr bgyi//gang du bde ba chen po'i mgon po ga mdzad pa'i cho ga cig nyin+d+ra gtsug dang du ma'i ro zhes bya ba'i/
287b2(rgyud): tshig gris rol par mdzad pa'o//rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyis gang cung zad gsungs pa de bdag gis gcig na zhes bya ba ni dus gcig nyid la'o//gcig na zhes
287b3(rgyud): bya ba ni skad cig gcig la'o//thos pa zhes bya ba ni lhag par son pa ste/'dis bsam gyis mi khyab lhag par mos pa'i ti nge 'dzin rnyed do zhes bya bar bsnyeg so//
287b4(rgyud): dus zhes bya ba ni dus tshod ces gsungaso//dus ni rnam pa gsum du brjod//bde ba'i dus dang sdug bsngal dus//bsam gyis mi khyab dus nyid do//'o ma'i rgyun ltar sna
287b5(rgyud): bug tu//'ong ba bde ba'i dus su gsungs//me yi gzugs kyis 'gro ba nyid//sdug bsngal dus dang de gcig grags//gcig ni lhan cig med pa yin//dus ni
287b6(rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur//'dod chags med cing chags bral med//dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro//de la 'dod chags nus mtshan nyid//'dod chags bral ba
287b7(rgyud): 'gog par gsungs//'di bral dbu mar mi rtog pas//'di gsum dmigs par mi 'gyuraro//'dod chags nyid dang chags bral nyid//'dres par gyur par rnyog pa
288a1(rgyud): med//de bzhin 'dod chags chags bral las//ro mnyam bcig bu'i skad cig ma//dngos po kun gyi ro mnyam pa//sgom pa'i dus ni gcig tu
288a2(rgyud): gsungs//'di lta ste/dbang phyug dang /gzugs dang /grags pa dang /dpal dang /ye shAs dang /brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa ste/b+ha ga drug ces gsungaso//
288a3(rgyud): de 'di la mnga' bo'i phyir bcom ldan 'das//yang na gang zhig mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi chos de rnams bcom pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'daso//de bzhin gshegs pa
288a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi sku dang /gsung dang /thugs rnams dang /de rnams nyid kyi snying po dang /de nyid kyi rdo rje dang /de nyid kyi btsun mo dang /de'i b+ha ga de la bzhugs so//
288a5(rgyud): kye bcom ldan 'das bzhugaso zhes bya bas ci gsungs lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ro gcig pa thabs
288a6(rgyud): sna tshogs kyis 'dul ba'i skye bo yid 'phrog pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don te//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /gsung dang /thugs kyi snying po rdo
288a7(rgyud): rje'i rang bzhin gang gis chos kyi 'byung gnas la/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa de'i tshe bdag gis thos pa'o//'di lta ste/shes rab gang gis nyon mongs
288b1(rgyud): pa dang /nye ba'i nyon mongs pa 'joms pa de'i phyir shes rab b+ha gar gsungs te/b+ha ga dor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang btsun mau lhan cig tu bzhug so//e ma sad
288b2(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi//kun mkhyen ye shes bla na med//de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde don gang //btsun mo nye bar mdzad pa'o//rigs kyi bu 'di skad bdag gis thos pa
288b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i yig 'bru ni chos kyi thog mar rtag tu yang dag par gnas pa ste/dag pa dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dngos grub skyed par byed pa'o//
288b4(rgyud): lag na rdo rje ma bshad pa de ngas khyod la ba shrId//yig 'bru 'di rnams kyis sems can rnams 'khor ba las pha rol tu shin tu ring bar 'gro po mngon du mtshon par
288b5(rgyud): mdzad pa dang /mngon du ma mdzad pa de nub pa'i sems kyi skye ba 'dir sangs rgyas nyid dam/rdo rje sems dpa' thob par 'gyur te/gang dag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
288b6(rgyud): g+haganas ma thog pa de ni bde bar gshegs pa ste sangs rgyas yin no//mtshan bzhi mtshon par byed pa ni sems dpar yang dag par gsungs te/snang bas bsten pa tsam
288b7(rgyud): kyis mnar med par rab tu ltung bar 'gyur bas na/kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyis ro spang bar bya'o//kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi srid pa 'jigs pa las
289a1(rgyud): 'das pa'i sgrub pa po dpal dang ldan pas dag pa'i sems bsgoms par byed na/thabs dang shes rab kyi sbyor ba 'dis ji ltar yang dag pa thob
289a2(rgyud): pa dag pa'i yang dag par rig pa'i bdag nyid can gyi mchin bzhi thabs dang shes rab kyi nus pas na mkha' dang mnyam zhing gnas gsum du snang ba ste/de'i mtshan
289a3(rgyud): bzhi ni mtshon par dka' ba dang /thams cad du son zhing rgyu dang rkyen spangs pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bur 'jig rten gyi rang dang gzhan gyi de ni byed/dngos grub
289a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi mchog/rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi gsang ba dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba'i brtag par rgyal po ste dang po rdzog so////de nas
289a5(rgyud): yang dag rab bshad bya//sgrub pa po la phan don du//gang gis slob ma dbang bskur ba'i//cho ga yang ni bshad par bya//dang por lha yi bdag nyid kyi//rnal 'byor
289a6(rgyud): pas ni nor 'dzin spangs//'bad pas hUM las rdo rje can//byas te phyi nas dkyil 'khor bri//tshalnga dang skye bo med gnas dang //byang chub sems dpa'i khyim dang yang //
289a7(rgyud): khang stong dang ni khyim nang du//dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs par bya//rdul tshon dam pa nyid dang ni//yong na 'bring pa nyid kyis te//rin chen lnga yi bdag nyid byas//
289b1(rgyud): yang na 'bras la sogs pas bri//dkyil 'khor khru gsum bya ba dang //mthe bong gsum yang lhag par bya//der ni rigs lnga las byung ba'i//rig ma bzang po gzhug par bya//sngags
289b2(rgyud): kyi lam gyi rjes btsal bas//gang tshe mkhas pas dbang bskur ba//sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum du//dkyil 'khor bde bar gshegs gnasu//'jig rten khams ni
289b3(rgyud): mtha' yas bdag blo dang ldan pas de bzhin blang //rang byin rlab pa'i gnas thob pas//dam tshig nyams pas 'jigs pa yis//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis don dam las//
289b4(rgyud): sngags kyi lan ni de bzhin gsungs//rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha'i//dam tshig rim pa shin tu ring //de phyir don kun la 'bad pas//dbang don rgyal ba'i bdag nyid
289b5(rgyud): skyes//rdo rje slob dpon yon tan mchi//ji bzhin sbyor bas gsol ba gdab//yang na ma dang srid thu mo//bu sring mo yi bu mo nyid//'di nang gang de ji lta bar//rnyed nas sgrub pa nyid
289b6(rgyud): du gyis//yang na mngon du 'di myed na//kun gyis bsngags pa'i rig ma ni//sangs rgyas rnams kyis khyad mdzad pa//de ni de phyir bzung bar bya//skye ba gnyis kyi bu mo dang //yang
289b7(rgyud): ni betso blag ma dang /yang na gdol pa mo dang /g.yung ma dang /rigs las skyes ma dang /yang na rgyal mo dang /gar mkhan gyi bu mo dang /bzo mo dang /yang ni ri dag kyi mig
290a1(rgyud): ma dang /rked pa phra ba dang /ro smad rgyas pa dang /nu ma mtho ba dang /b+hA gra bzang ba dang /dam tshig gi spyod pa la shin tu rnam pa dang /de kho na la
290a2(rgyud): gnas pa dang /sngags dang rgyud shes pa ste/sgrub pa po'i dbang po la gnas gsum du che bi'i bu mo 'di dge bshad//rigs kyi rim pa nyid kyis 'di rnams kyis thams
290a3(rgyud): cad 'grub par 'gyuraro//me rnyed ji ltar gang rnyed de//de bzhin bcu drug lon pa nyid//dang po'i lang tsho phun sum tshogs//mig mdzes phyag rgya rnyed nas ni//rig ma de
290a4(rgyud): nyid blangs nas ni//skyab su 'gro ba'i rim pas ni//sbyangs nas de nyid gsang ba dang //sngags dang rgyud kyi rim kun bsgrags//sgra 'am 'og gi lam du lces//de nyid de
290a5(rgyud): bzhin steng du gzhugo/kun gyi cha rig sna tshogs byed//rim pa nyid kyis rna cha dang //ske rags che dang se mo do//lag gdub dang ni rkang gdub ldan//de ltar dngos grub
290a6(rgyud): dam pa ster//glang zhig sbyangs pa'i rig ma kun//nye bar 'tshe bo med gnas//rig pa 'dzin pa 'khor yang po//de nas tson dan gos phreng sogs//rnam par rgyan nas
290a7(rgyud): dbul bar bya//dri dang phreng sogs rim gro yis//'o ma'i mchog sogs rgyas pas na//phyag rgya thabs gcig sgrub pa pos//bus par 'bad pas yang dag mchod//
290b1(rgyud): slob mas pus mo'i lha nga ni//sa la dad pos btsugs nas ni//thal mo sbyar nas bstod pa 'dis//ston pa la ni zhu ba bya//stong pa'i snying po phyag 'tshal bstod//rtog pa thams cad
290b2(rgyud): yang dag spangs//thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshogs//ye shes sku la phyag 'tshal bstod//'gro ba'i mi shes gcod pa can//dag pa'i de nyid doni stan mdzad //bdag med
290b3(rgyud): chos las byung ba yi//rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod//rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems//pha rol phyin pa'i yon tan rnams//mgon po las ni rtag tu byung ///
290b4(rgyud): byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal bstod//dkon mchog gsum dang theg chen dang //de bzhin bstan dang 'gro ba dang //khams gsum po ni 'di dag kun//'gro ba'i dpa'
290b5(rgyud): bo phyag 'tshal bstod//yid bzhin nor bu ltar gyur pa'i//'gro ba'i 'dod pa'i don grub phyir//dpal ldan bde gshegs bka' bzhin mdzad//sangs rgyas sras po
290b6(rgyud): phyag 'tshal bstod//de nyid bla med bdag 'tshal bas//yon tan mtsho khyod bka' drin las//kun mkhyen rdo rje dbang gis ni//da lta nyid du bka' drin skyobs//sangs rgyas
290b7(rgyud): kun gyi gsang pa ni//ji ltar dpal thugs rdo rje yis//rdo rje chos can la gsungs pa//de bzhin mgon pos bdag grub mdzod//bcom ldan zhabs pad spangs nas ni//
291a1(rgyud): gzhan du bdag la 'gro ma mchis//'khor ba'i 'gro las nges rgyal bar//de phyir mgron po thugs rje mdzod//de nas rdo rje slob dpon dpal//rjesu
291a2(rgyud): brtse bcas pa na sems kyis//slob la snying rje bskyed nas ni//tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dgug pa dang //'dod yon lnga yis gang ba dang //bla res bris pas nye bar 'bar//
291a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma dang sbyor ldan zhing //dril bu sil si l-i sgra dang ni//me tog bdug 'khyil nyams dga' ba//lha yi dri phreng bde ba'i mchog/dpal ldan rdo rje sems sogs lha'i
291a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mchog tu ngo mtshar bar//slob dpon skal ba bzong po mchog/de nas phyag rgya sbyor byas nas//rgyal ba'i bdag skyes byang chub sems//pad+ma'i snod du
291a5(rgyud): bzhag par bya//rnga ya ba g.yob cing gdugs dang ni//bkra shis tshigs bcang glu rnams kyis//phyag rgya ldan pos slob ma de//'gro ba'i gtso bos dbang bskur bya//
291a6(rgyud): slob dpon mchog gi dbang phyug gis//dbang ni rin chen mchog byin nas//bzang po'i rang bzhin logs sbyangs pa'i//dam tshig yod 'ong nges par smin//khrag tshon
291a7(rgyud): dang ni ga bur bcas//tsan dan dmar po sbyar ba dang //rigs kyi bdag po'i chu ldan zhing //lnga pa sems las yong dag byung //'di rnams dam tshig yang dag par//sangs rgyas
291b1(rgyud): rnams kyis nye bar byasrungs//bzang po rtag tu bskyang bar gyis//sdom pa yang nr-i da ltar nyon//srog chags blasad par mi bya zhing //bud mod rin tshunA yongs ma srung //des ni slong/
291b2(rgyud): dpon spang mi bya//sdom pa shin tu dpyad par dko'o//gong du gsungs pa'i rab ma 'am//yang na bdag gi rnal 'byoraro ma//drag cing sprul pa'i rig me ni//sih+la ga bur bsgos
291b3(rgyud): pa ni//ji srid khu ba ldan gyur pa//de spyod phyag rgya bsten par bya//phyag rgya'i gdong yang bcing ba dang //thabs kyi gdong yang de bzhin te//bsten pas yang dag gang byung ba//slab
291b4(rgyud): ma'i kha ru ltung bar bya//ro mnyam slob ma'i spyod yul nyid//de nyid la ni bya bar bya//rang rig ye shes nyi du 'gyur//rang gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs//mkha' mnyam rdul bral
291b5(rgyud): stong pa nyid//dngos dang dngos min bdag nyid mchog/thabs dang shes rab rnam par 'dres//'dod chags 'dod chags bral bas 'dres//de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog/
291b6(rgyud): de nyid yi ge dam pa nyid//de nyid 'di ni kun khyab byed//de nyid sangs rgyas ye shes can//he ru ka dpal zhes byar brjod//gzhan rnams gang rnams de rnams dang //dngos dang
291b7(rgyud): dngos med de las byung //dga' ba dang po dpa' bo ste//mchog tu dga' ba rnal 'byor ma//shin tu bde dga' thams cad nges//bde bde thabs las thams cad rig/dang po
292a1(rgyud): dga' ba tsam nyid do//mchog tu dga' ba gnyis pa'i grangs//gsum pa dga' bral dga' bar bshad//bzhi pa lhan cig skyes par brjod//de
292a2(rgyud): yang dbang ni rnam pa bzhi//dang po la ni bum pa'i dbang //gnyis pa la ni gsang ba'i dbang //gsum pa shes rab ye shes te//bzhi pa de yang de bzhino//byang chub sems
292a3(rgyud): kyi dbang gis ni//slob ma sdig pa bral ba yin//sangs rgyas grong khyer mchog sngon du//de nas de la gnang ba sbyin//byang chub snying po'i bar du ni//phyogs kun tu ni 'khor
292a4(rgyud): lo ni//chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med//kun tu mchog tu rab tu bskor//thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin bdag/yid bzhin nor bu ltar mthong bas//sbyor med bral zhing ma
292a5(rgyud): zhum pas//sems can don ni da ltar gyis//dbang dang bkas gnang thob nas ni//bya ba byas pas rab 'dzum zhing //'gro ba dga' bar byed pa yi//shin tu snyan pa'i tshig
292a6(rgyud): 'di brjod//deng bdag skye ba 'bras bur bcas//bdag gi 'tsho ba 'bras bur bcas//de ring sangs rgyas rigasu skyes//nga ni sangs rgyas rigasu 'gyur//bskal pa rgya mtshor
292a7(rgyud): 'jigs chen por//mnor med skye ba yang dag 'khrugs//nyon mongs 'dam phag rgal dka' lnga//bdag ni mgon pa khyod kyis bsgral//khyod kyi zhabs kyi bka' drin las/
292b1(rgyud): theg pa rdzogs pa lta bur bdag/bag chags thams cad bral bas na//bdag la byang chub 'tshal ma mchis//rangs shing mig ni phye ba yis//zhabs la 'jus nas gus par bya//
292b2(rgyud): gang dang gang zhig sdug pa'i rdzas//re ba med pa'i sems kyis ni//de dang de nyid dbul bar bya//bla ma'ang snying rje ldan pas ni//slob ma bsdu ba'i bsam pa'i phyir//de la phan pa'i
292b3(rgyud): bsam pas bzung //de nas phyag 'tshal mchod nas ni//bla ma la ni yon rnams dbul//gser ni stong phrag brgya dang ni//rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang //gos ni zung 'gyur
292b4(rgyud): brgya nyid dang //glang po rta dang yul 'khor nyid//rna cha dang ni rkang gdub dang //nor bu dang ni sor gdub mchog/gser las byas pa'i mcho de phyir thogs//rang gi chung ma bu ma
292b5(rgyud): dang /bran pho bran mo sring mo nyid//phyag 'tshal nas ni dbul bar bya//bdag gi dngos po thams cad kyis//blo dang ldan pas bla ma dbul//de ring tshun chad bdag bran du//khyod
292b6(rgyud): lwa bdako na 'bul lags zhes//de ltar zhu ba byas gyur pas//mngon par 'dod pa'i gnas thob nas//nga ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis//bdag la bka' drin legs par skyobs/
292b7(rgyud): ji ltar bla med byang chub de//byin gyis brlabs kyis bdag gis bsgrubs//bla na med pa'i byang chub gnas//kun mchog mchod pa bskyed par bgyi//sems can gnas gsum
293a1(rgyud): 'khor ba rnams//de nyid la ni bzhag par bgyi//dbang cho ga 'dis sbyin par bya zhing slob ma'i lhag par mos pa dang //zab pa dang rgya che ba rig pas/
293a2(rgyud): lhag par mos pa'i yid kyis shes par byas nas tshig nyid kyis dbang rin po che sbyin par bya'o//ga thob dbang rab mchog ni rigs kyi bdag por bzung ba rnyed par dka'
293a3(rgyud): zhing mtshungs pa med par gdams//longaso sbyong rdzogs pa'i zhing gi dpal dag blang bar byas pas byang chub chen po'i dbang bskur ba//bka' yi gnang ba rnyed nas 'jig
293a4(rgyud): rten gyi gsum gyi dgra bo las rtsom pa'i go bgos pa yi blos//byang chub dag la dgod pa'i sangs rgyas 'dir ni de nyid rnal 'byor pas ni dri ma med par spyod//byang chub
293a5(rgyud): kyi sems kyi dbang gnyis pa las rab tu byed pa dang po'o////de nas thabs dang shes rab don//sgom pa yang dag rab bshad bya//pha ral don brtson brtson
293a6(rgyud): 'grus kyi//sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir//'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i 'jigs pa las//bsgral dka' gang zhig rnam sgom pas//rnal 'byor pas ni rang don du//mya ngan 'das
293a7(rgyud): par gnas mi 'gyur//gang gis khyod 'phags mthar thog par//sangs rgyas dri med ngo mtshar rmad //'gri ba dang 'phel las rnam paro grol//byang chub bla med thob par
293b1(rgyud): 'gyur/phung po lnga sa gas chos rnams dang //thog gsum shin tu snang mi bya//chos dbyings myi mnyam mnyam pa nyid//chu shing lta byur yongs bzung //stong pa bsgom par mi bya ste//
293b2(rgyud): stong min bsgom par mi bya'o//stod pa mi spang rnal 'byor pas//stong min yongasu mi spong ngo //stong dang stong min bzung ba las//rtog pa nyung mi ni skye bar 'gyur//yongasu spangs
293b3(rgyud): na kun rtog ste//de phyir ngo gnyis yongasu spang //gnyis kyis gzung ba yongs spangs pa//rnam grol gnas dang bral ba ste//ngo zhes bya ba'i kun rtog 'dri//de phyir de ni yang
293b4(rgyud): dag spong //rnam pa med cing dogs pa med//'dod pa med cing sdig pa bral//thog ma tha ma'i rtog las grol//na mkha' lta bur mkhas pas sgom//snying rje ljon pas sem
293b5(rgyud): can la//rgyab kyis phyogs par mi bya zhing //sems can yod dang yod min zhes//de ltar yongasu brtag mi bya//spros po med pa'i rang bzhin nyid//shes rab zhes ni rab tu
293b6(rgyud): grags//yid bzhin nor ltar ma lus pa'i//thams cad don byed snying rje nyid//dmigs med gan su shes rab dang //dmigs med snying rje chen po nyid//blo dang lhan cig
293b7(rgyud): gcig gyur pa//nam mkha' na mkha' ji lta ba'o//gang la sgom pa po yang med//gang yang rnam par sgom pa'ang med//bsgom bya nyid kyang yod min pa//de yi de nyid sgom par brjod
294a1(rgyud): gang yang bya ba yong min 'dir//bza' bya nyid kyang yod ma yin//dang po bza' las rnam par grol//don+da dmya rnam par bsgoms pas ni//'di la sgrub pa
294a2(rgyud): gang yang med//gang yang bstod par byed pa med//dor ba cung zad med par brjod//blang ba'ang cung zad yang ma yin//dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang //sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dre ba dang //
294a3(rgyud): 'phrog pa zla ba'i grong khyer mitshungs//rmi lam rtse ba lta bur blta//sgyu ma ji bzhin thams cad du//blta ba nyid dang reg par bya//'phyo ba thams cad gnas pa ni//gang
294a4(rgyud): yang rnyed par mi 'gyur te//sbyor ba'i 'dus par bsam mi khyab//rmi lam sad pa lta bu ni//ji ltar gzhon nu'i gzugs kyis ni//dbang po gnyis ni 'dus pa yis//bya grwar
294a5(rgyud): ling gi bzhag nas ni//sangs rgyas rje su dran pa sgom//ye shes ci zhig skye zhe na//thog ma dbus mtha' dri ma med//rang gis rig pa'i ye shes de//gzhan du smra bar mi
294a6(rgyud): nuso//gzugs rnams thams cad blta ba dang //sgra rnams nyid kyang nyan pa dang //smra ba dang ni rgod pa dang //sna tshogs ro ni za ha dang //las rnams thams cad byed pa ni
294a7(rgyud): gzhan du sems ni mi 'gro bas//de nyid rig pa'i rnams bor ba'i//rnal 'byor rtag tu skye bar 'gyur//'di ni gnyi su med par brjod//'di ni byang chub sems mchog
294b1(rgyud): //rdo rje rdo rje sems dpa' dpal//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub nyid//'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin//pha rol phyin pa kun gyi dngos//mnyam nyid bsam bya nyid du gsungs//
294b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun mchog bsgom bya nyid//'gro ba brtan dang g.yo ba'i bdag/byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas dang //rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan thos sogaso//de nyid las ni/
294b3(rgyud): thams cad skyes//dngos dang dngos med sbyor bral ba//rnal 'byor pas ni de nyid sgom//dngos dang dngos med rnam grol ba//bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur//ma lus skyon
294b4(rgyud): la sdang ba dang //kun nas nyon mongs rgyab phyogs nges//dpal ldan bde gshegs yon tan rnams//mtha' yas de las skye bar 'gyur//kun rtog mang po'i mun pas khyab
294b5(rgyud): gyur pa'i//rab tu 'joms pas skyo zhing glog 'gyu ba//chags so gas dragag dka'i dri mas gos gyur pa'i//sems ni rdo rje can gyis 'khor bar gsungs//rang bzhin 'od gsal
294b6(rgyud): rtog las rnam par grol//'dod chags la sogs dri mas gos bral ba'i//gzung ba dang ni 'dzin med sems dpa' mchog/de nyid mya ngan 'das pa mchog tu gsungs//sdug
294b7(rgyud): bsngal phung po du ba'i mtshan gyur pa//'di las gzhan du cung zad yid ma yin//bde ba mtha' yas 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur pa//de las gzhan du grol pa'ang yod ma yin//sdug
295a1(rgyud): bsngal ma lus zad par 'dod pa dang //rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bde mchog thob 'dod pas//sems ni brtan par byas nas 'brad pas dpyad/de yi rang
295a2(rgyud): bzhin dngos po med par byed//ji srid rtog pa'i mun pa'i yol stug po//skye dashu'i yod bsgribs sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa//ji srid de nas de ni bral yin pas//de srid
295a3(rgyud): bde ba rgya chen tha dad min//mnyam pa nyid kyi mthar thug 'phags dgyes pa'o//de yi zad phyir rang gis bya ba yang //rgyas pa de yi yan lag 'gro ba blta//de ltar de kho na nyi
295a4(rgyud): kyi rnal 'byor pas rnal 'byor gyis ngos po byas nas bka'i gnang ba dang /rang gi dam tshig la gnas pas sgom pa byed na lag pa'i phyag rgya dang /sngags dang /sku gzugs
295a5(rgyud): kyi nga rgyal sgom pa dang /dam tshig gis thun mong gi dngos grub bskyed par byed pa yino zhes pa ci zhig bya/sangs rgyas nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mtshon pa mngon du rang
295a6(rgyud): gi lha'i rnal 'byor yin te bskyed pa dang /de mtshon pa na gnas gsum po na mkha' lta bur 'gyuraro//gzhung thams cad spangs nas thob pa'i gnas kyi bsam gtan gyi
295a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor de la brtson pas rong rig pa tsam la spro bas nyin dang mtshon du goms par bya'o//ri'i rtse mo dang /zhi ba'i gnas dang /pad+ma'i tshal dang /rgyal po'i tshal
295b1(rgyud): dang/dben pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas dang /rang gi khyim 'am/sems la mngon par 'dod pa'i ngoms cad mkhyen pas bsngags pa 'di'i nang du gang dang gang tu
295b2(rgyud): gnas der gnas shing sngags shes pas spro ba dang ldan pas sgom par byed de/thabs dang shes rab ma gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid mngon du thob par mi 'gyuraro//de'i phyir
295b3(rgyud): shes rab mang ngosu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyin par byed po bzang mo spang bar mi bya ste/phyag rgya re re dang ldan pa 'di ma gtogs par dngos grub ster bar mi
295b4(rgyud): 'gyuraro//de phyir ye shes bskyed pa yi//phyag rgya bzhi ni sbyor bar bya//gti mug dam tshig phyag rgya ste//zhe sdang phyag rgya chen por brjod//phrag dog las kyi phyag rgya ste/
295b5(rgyud): 'dod chags chos kyi phyag rgya bdag/yo gos phyag rgya sna tshogs 'di//bskyed nas rig ma bza' bar bya//de la gnyis ka yang lha'i gzugs mngon du bsams nas gaN+Di
295b6(rgyud): mug las zhi ba dang /khro bo las ma rungs pa dang /'did chags las chags pas las rnams byed pa'o//de'i don du rab tu byed pa lta po 'di rnams kyis rgyal ba yin no//
295b7(rgyud): snga dro dang /nyi ma'i mtha' dang /nyi ma phyed dang /nam phyed kyi dusu yang phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor bya'o//mnyam par sbyor ba las gzhan du ni 'grub par mi 'gyuraro//bstan pa
296a1(rgyud): la spyod pa'i 'jigs pa dang /skye bo gdug pa'i nang du gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas rang gi sems 'ba' zhig de bsams pas sems la lhag par
296a2(rgyud): mos pa mngon du bya'o//gang zhig yang rnal 'byor pa brtson 'grus kyi 'bad pas rnal 'byor 'di bsgrub par bya'o//shes rab mngon du ma rnyed na byol song dag la'ang
296a3(rgyud): rtag tu goms par bya'o//de ltar gang zhig rnal 'byor pas gal te pad+ma 'dzin pa la mngon du nyi mi re re 'am/zla ba so so 'am/lo la reg par mi byed na dam tshig
296a4(rgyud): nyams par 'gyur ro//dam tshig nyams pas rnal 'byor pa bag med par skye bar 'gyur te/byang chub sems dpa'i dam tshig blang bar byas nas yang mi byed par sdom
296a5(rgyud): pa bzung bar bya ste/de'i phyir kun gyis sdom pa dang ldan zhing de kho na la gnas pas phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor bya'o//gsang ba'i nye ba'i rdzas dang sngags dang rgyud kyis 'di
296a6(rgyud): skad yang dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas yang dag par sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pa rtag tu nye bar 'dug ste/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gan su gnas gsum po rtse gcig
296a7(rgyud): pa'i tshul gyis sgom par bya'o//thabs dang shes rab kyi don sgom pa zhes bya ba gnyis pa las rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o////de nas 'khor lo thams cad kyi
296b1(rgyud): rnam par 'phrul ba yang dag bshad//dang ldan rdo rje sems sogs lha'o//thams cad las ni sna tshogs mchog/gsang bu mchog go dgyes pa na//thams cad bdag nyid
296b2(rgyud): 'di la sgrub//rnam par bral dang gnasu yang //reng gi tshel stsogs rnams yang //kun lngas sna tshogs phyag rgyu ste//kun las sna tshogs sdom pas ni//kun las sna tshogs bya ba rnams
296b3(rgyud): ji ltar bang bar bsgrub par bya//'di ga shegs kun gyi dkyil 'khor ro//stong pa nyid kyi ye shes nyid// zla'i sgrub thabs thams cad dang //zhi ba rnams kyu ste rnams la//ci zhig
296b4(rgyud): dA yis bshad pa'i bya//bsam gyis me khyab sangs rgyas gar//sgom pa lha yi rnal 'byor dang //sngags kyi bzlas pa'i cho ga rim dang //bris sku'am ni sku gzugs kyang //sems
296b5(rgyud): kyi thams cad sprul pa ste//sems can rnams la phan 'dod phyir//nga yis rgyud du bsgrags pa yin//stong nyid gcig las rdo rje can//rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru gsungs//rdo rje snying
296b6(rgyud): pos gsol pa/bskyed pa'i yig 'bru gzugs dang ni//phyag rgya dbyings kyi tshi ga ram dang //sngags kyi bzlas pa'i cho ga yang //gang gis sgrub po 'grub 'gyur ba//gtso
296b7(rgyud): shin tu dga' chen pos//bka' drin gyis ni bskyab tu gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dang por byams pa bsgom par bya//gnyis par snying rje rnam par sgom/
297a1(rgyud): gsum par dga' ba sgom pa dang //kun g+hi tha mar btang snyam so//yang na spyod pa'i byang chub sems//gnyis pa ldan sA don bsdu//gsum pa la ni gzugs/
297a2(rgyud): rnyan rdzogs//bzhi pa la ni yig 'bru dgang //re bas nyi ma sngon du rnam bsgoms nas//nyi dor hUM byung sna tshogs rdo rje ste//rdo rje de nyid kyis ni ra bi dang //gur yang cho ga
297a3(rgyud): bzhin du bsgom par bya//dang por ro ni bsgom par bya//chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid brjod//de steng rnal 'byor pa gnas nas//he ru ka nyid rnam par sgom//rang gi snying khar de
297a4(rgyud): pasgom//de las byung ba'i nyi dkyil 'khor//der ni hU~M gi dbyibs nyid ni//thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid can//khwa dog nag po 'jigs chen po//hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje nyid//
297a5(rgyud): rdo rje lta ba'i dbus gnas par//yang na hUM ga de nyid sgom//de nyid yongasu gyur bltas nas//zhe sdang bdag nyid rnam par sgom//rdo rje skye ba dpa' bo che//'dam skyes ston pa 'dra
297a6(rgyud): ba'am//yang ni sngo dang nyi ma ltar//dad pas nges par bsgom par bya//ni mkhar rje btsun bltas nus ni//rdo rje skye ba snying rdzu cha//rkyen rnams thams cad 'dzin po ya//lha ma
297a7(rgyud): brgyad kyis mchod per bya//dkar mo ri dgas mtshan pa 'dzin//chom rkun bdud las rgyal ba'i snong //raM longs me ni chu lag ma//g+hasma ri ni sman 'dzin cing //puk+ka sA na
297b1(rgyud): nga / tan dang da sa 'dzin//'dus pa mnanadaSh+TaSh+Tharung //ba mam+b+ha lta 'byung ba//rmed pa'i tshig rgyas pa yis//de rnams kyis n+na gar du ma //da nas pa
297b2(rgyud): la rnam la de'i//ches rnams kun gyi bla ga nyid 'gyur//oM la b+h+rUM bka li~M te//sa bon ning du mni shA pa//de nyid sems dpa' zhes bya brdad//mchog tu dga' bzhen
297b3(rgyud): can rnam lnga'i dkyil 'a khor khyab pa yi//ge lus mtshungs rnam par s+ho//bzlas nas m+b+hi khyer dag ga pa na//maM ge zhi sdang bdag nyid 'gyur//nam pa'i khams kyi nang son par/
297b4(rgyud): dri nas nyi ma dkyil 'khor bsam//b+h+rUM skyes lnga dang nyi ma ltar//rkyen rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//phyug gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa//sbyin gsam sgra ni gyen du sar//snang
297b5(rgyud): tshig brgyad gnyis lnga yi dbyibs//'jigs byed mnan cing g.yon pa na//rdo rje khaT+wA~M gnyid dang //thod pa yang ni g.yon pa na//g.yas na rdo rje nog pa nyid//hU~Mn 'di ni par byed pa
297b6(rgyud): dadag/snum brgyad kyis bsgyus nas nI//dur khrid du ni mgon par la//de ltar rnal 'byur bas ni sgom//rnal 'byung bdud rtsi sdom pa kun//de nyid bcom ldani rnal 'byor to//
297b7(rgyud): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//zla ba'i gzugs ni 'dzin gyur pa//phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par rgyan//bdud po ni rnam par dag pa ni//dga' ba bzhi yi rang bzhin no//sngar gsung /
298a1(rgyud): smon na rgyu ga rgyu rgyun na du chu ga tu d+hA r+m+ma ga // smyan du /
298a2(rgyud): na nams rkyen rgyas yang don dang // pa'i ke na lnga yang dgaganas/ shu sa d+hu ba zlub rnams kyi/nga sbyin sa nang ba da /na dang med ni
298a3(rgyud): / ng+ge ga 'di su sbyi pa ga//de nis nyid rnam pa //skye mi sbyin ci ldan pa ni//
298b1(rgyud): par bya//thod pa'i rten la gnas bor ni//mdab mar lha mo bri bar bya//sna tshogs gzugs ma yid 'ong ma//zhal gcig ma la phyag bzhi ma//drang por rim pa byi bar bya//gzhu dang mnga' na
298b2(rgyud): 'dzin ma mdzes//thod pa khu bas grang ba dang //lcags kyu lag pas 'dzin pa mo//gnyis pa rtse gsum lag pa dang //khrag gis grang ba'i thod pa dang //rdo rje de bzhin zhags pa nyid//
298b3(rgyud): gsum pa lag par ral gri dang //thod pa chu yis gang ba dang //de bzhin rdo rje dril bu nyid//bzhi pa kha T+wAM ga lag ma//g.yon pa'i lag pas thod pa nyid//mu su rje dang ba dan gsum//
298b4(rgyud): lnga pa zhags pa'i lag pa dang //thod pa lag pas bzung ba dang //de bzhin ud phal cang te'u nyid//dug pa'i lag pas pad+ma dang //thod pa tshil gyis gang ba dang //de bzhin me
298b5(rgyud): long dgra sta nyid//bdun pa 'phang mdung lag pa dang //dung dang 'khor lo'i mtshon cha 'dzin//thod pa khrag gis gang bar ni//khru gang tsam du yang dag bri//brgyad pa bum pa'i lag
298b6(rgyud): pa dang //de bzhin rdo rje dril bu nyid//thod pa skyes pa'i lpags pa yis//bkab pa rdzas kyis gang ba ni//ze 'brur bde ba chen po dang //mdab mar lha mo bri bar bya//rol mo rnam
298b7(rgyud): pa sna tshogs rnams//gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya//lha mo rdo rje lcags kyu dang //rdo rje zhags pa lcags sgrog dang //de bzhin rdo rje dril bu nyid//sgo yo skyong ba yang
299a1(rgyud): dag bri//b+ha ga'i dbus su bskum bya zhing //phyis ni bzlas pa yang dag brtsams//hUM ni rdo rje sems dpa' yi//oM ni dbyangs kyi 'bya ba nyid//u ni dgra dang
299a2(rgyud): yang dag ldan//shel ni drag pa lta bu nyid//tri ni de la yang dag sbyar//de bzhin du ni yang swA hA nyid//sngags kyi bzlas par yang dag gsungaso//bsamo gtan yi ge gcig po
299a3(rgyud): nyid//lha mi rnams kyi hrI nyid ni//mdab ma rnams la de nas dgo do//mchod pa bzhi yi rang bzhin gyis//sa bon bzhi dang yang dag ldan//sgo yi skyong ba thams cad du//dang
299a4(rgyud): po dbyangs yig la sogs ldan//b+ha ga nyid du sgrub pa pos//de nas rdo rje gzhug par bya//hI yi rnam pa nyid dang yang //de la hUM ni brjod par byo//zla mtshan dus su khrag
299a5(rgyud): btsas pa'i//khu ba khwa yis bza' bar bya//bdeg nyid drang ni b+ha ga la//me tog dri yis mchod par bya//gal te sgrub po sgrub 'dod na//de nyid la ni bzlas pa bye//rdo rje
299a6(rgyud): drag mo de bzhin gcig/de bzhin rdo rje gzugs brnyan nyid//gsum pa rdo rje 'dod chags ma//bzhi pa rdo rje zhi bo ma//lnga pa rdo rje gnod sbyin ma//drug pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro
299a7(rgyud): ma//bdun pa sgra yi rdo rje ma//de bzhin brgyad pa rdo rjes//gnyis pa las rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o////'khor lo sgrub pa'i khyad par gyi//rim pa ji bzhin rdo rje nyon//
299b1(rgyud): stong rgyu mya dang dbang dang //b+hung dang de bzhin mngan spyod sto//byamapa dgu sar+b+bas 'khor la lo// rol su khyud nyid du \u0f7f//la pA l-I las kyi kha dog sobs//mkhas pas rnam
299b2(rgyud): par bsgol par bya//oM d+hA r-i tu rI swAhA/dri yi su byin thams cad kyi//d+ya zla 'tshal sngags drugs tha mi no//dbus ming ni sbya r+ya bar bya//srung ba'i tshig kyang rnam
299b3(rgyud): par bya//mnyam nyid ye shes stong pas ni//bdag nyid kyi ni gzugasu bya//mnyam nyid dmas cad rig pa'i gnas//smyung de'i 'khor lo myur bya ba//byung ba ye shes can gyis
299b4(rgyud): sgom//'jigs pa thams cad ring du byed//sems can dngos po medan ni//rnal 'byor dngos po bsgom par bya//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dngos gnas bya//pad+ma'i gdan na
299b5(rgyud): bsam pAr b+hu//dngos grub thams cad rlob ste rnas pa//bdag gi lus n+ti sgom par bya//oM tAr+ye swA n+te/mgo bo lo//oM tu re swAt+ma/mig dag la'o//mai trA~M ra swAhA/
299b6(rgyud): dgal 'o//oM tu rmA Sh+T+rIrU be drug la'o//oM re swA hA/lce la l-i//oM tA re ni skAn+do/sgying kar ro//yan lag drug ni rtag tu ba //'phags ma sgrol ma bsam par hU~M/
299b7(rgyud): /gnyis sems de pa'i skyil mo krung //rkyen rnams kun gyis rnam par brgya//kunI la skyabs sbyin lag po dang //g.yin pa ud pa la lta bu mchog/sngags kyi rgya
300a1(rgyud): ngos bskul ba yid//lha rnams thams cad bsgrud par gyu/ hU~M swA hA//las thams chud pa'i s+yAng+gas//dAn dang rgyal pos bcangs pa dang //
300a2(rgyud): 'phro ba'i shin tu 'jigs pa'i dug/yan lag rims ni sna tshogs dang //dag sogs dus mon 'tsho ba yi//'jigs pa'i gnas ni gang glung la//de dang de la rab sbyar bya//shes/
300a3(rgyud): rab chud pa blo ldan par//srung ba bres nas bzung bar bya//srung ba bzang po 'di nyid ni//'jigs pa thams cad du ni spangs//srung ba 'di ni thams cad las//rnal 'byor de nyid
300a4(rgyud): gang na med//zla ba'i 'od zer lta bu yi//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas ni//de yi dbus hI nyid ni//kha dog dmar po lta bu'i 'ang//de nas bdag nyid bas mo bar bya//
300a5(rgyud): zhal gcig ma li phyag bzhi ma//mda' dang gzhu yi lag pa ma//ud pa la dang lcags kyu 'dzin//'di ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni//'jig rten gsum po dbang du byed/
300a6(rgyud): 'bum phrag gcig gis rgyal po rnams//khri yis 'jig rten phal pa nyid//bye bas phyugs dang gnod sbyin sogs//'bum phrag bdun gyis lha ma yin//'bum phrag go sa
300a7(rgyud): kyis lha rnams nyid//brgya phrag gcig gis sngags pa nyid//'khor lo mdab mi brgyad pa 'di//kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes//mnyam nyid gzugasu bsam nas ni//khams
300b1(rgyud): byA pun gyi ni rang bzhin las//sngar gsungs mtshan nyid yang dag ldan//gang du gsungs pas bsgrub par bya//shes rab 'bar ba'i las rnams ni//'di yi 'khor lo bsgom par bya//
300b2(rgyud): oM byAd+d+he ma hA prad+d+ho hU~MhUM swA hA//dngos po'i ngo bos bsgom par bya//'od zer 'ber ba du ma yi//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//shes rab bdag nyid rnam par sprul//bya
300b3(rgyud): gnyis sems dpe'i skyil mo krung//rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//kha dog dkar ma 'ad gsal ma//shes rab bdag nyid bzung bar bya//'di yi sa bon bzlas nis ni//
300b4(rgyud): shes rab 'dra ba ma lto bur 'phel//gu pa 'am blo ni dman pa yi//shes rab 'phel ba'i rnal 'byor ro//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//yi ge de la dgod par
300b5(rgyud): bya//thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus gnas par//zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa//zhi ba'i 'khor lo dril bu 'dzin//thod pa dang ni zhags pa nyid//de bzhin 'brar ba'i byeng 'khrugs
300b6(rgyud): par//kun tu rnam par spro bar bya//'dris ni rnal 'byor rim pas ni//rin chen 'byung gnas bsgom par bya//gcom bzer gyi mdog lta bu//sku mdog ser po gAbi brjid rje//rjod pa'i
300b7(rgyud): gdan gyi dbus bzhugs pa//zhom gcig pa la phyog bzhi pa//dpa' bo rin cheni lcags kyu 'dzin//thod pa de bzhin zhags pa nyid//'dir ni rnal 'byor rim pas ni//pad+ma
301a1(rgyud): rdordzu 'chang ba rdA//zhal gcog pa la phyag ngan pa//dUd+ma r+b+hag smra bu'i 'od//dpa' ba mad dang ga'u 'dzin rnyeng //khyod pa bdun la yang dag 'azhungs//
301a2(rgyud): pad+ma zhabs pa 'dzin pa nyid//rgan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//'dis ni rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis//don yod phyed na ral gri 'dzin//thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus bzhudas
301a3(rgyud): //zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa//da pa rdo dril bu dang //lcags kyu dang ni g.yas pa 'gyur//bai DUn sbyar snang ku ste//rgyan rnams kyis ni rnam par brgyan//na mam
301a4(rgyud): khams kyi dbus son por//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya//de yi nang son sa bon ni//bruM las sbyin gyi dbyibasu ni//thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus gnas par//phyag ni
301a5(rgyud): brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan//'khor lo'i lag pa mnga' dang gzhu//de bzhin rdo rje dril bu nyid//zhags pa ral gyi thod pa nyid//spyan gsum pa la zhal gcig mo//rgyun
301a6(rgyud): rnams kun gyis yang dag gang //do shal dang ni rkang gdub brgyan//kha dog dkar mo shin tu mdzes//de bzhin thod pa'i dbu rgyun nyid//na mkha'i khams kyi dbus
301a7(rgyud): son pa//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yangs gang ba/de yi nad san bsam par bya//hU~M las mA ma ki'i dbyibs//thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus gnas par//kha dog sngon mo 'bar
301b1(rgyud): chen no//spyan gsum pa la zhal gcig ma//thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan//mda' dang gzhu ni 'dzin pa nyid//lcags kyu dang ni rAl gri nyid//zhag pa dang rdo rje de bzhin du//dril bu
301b2(rgyud): dang ni thong po'o//'khor lo rin chen pad+ma dang //kha T+wAM ga dang bcu gnyis ni//gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor byi bar bya//rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//b+ha gA'i dbus yongs gang ba'i
301b3(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//de ri ni tI nI bsim bya zhing //gos dkar zhes bya rnam par sgom//thod pa'o gdan gyi dbus gnas par//kha dog dmar mo 'bar chen mo//rgyan
301b4(rgyud): rnams kun gyis yongs gang ba//phyag brgyad kyis ni rnam par rgyan//gzhu dang mdo'i ni 'dzin pa dang //pad+ma'i lag par ral gri dang //bad pa rdo rje dril bu dang //zhags pa rdo rje rin
301b5(rgyud): chen nyid//do shal dang ni rkang gdub sgra//rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//rnal 'byor pas ni 'di bsgoms na//myur du sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur//mkha'i dbusu yongs
301b6(rgyud): gang ba'i//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//de yi nad song tAM nyid ni//sgrol ma'i dbyibasu bsam par bya//thod pa'i gdon gyi dbus gnas par//phyag ni brgyad kyis rnam par
301b7(rgyud): brgyan//ral gri phyag ma chags bcas ma//ud pa la de bzhin lcags kyu dang //thod pa khrag gis gang ba dang //zhags pa de bzhin 'khor lo dang //gzhu dang mda' ni 'dzin pa
302a1(rgyud): nyid//zhal gcig ma ni yang dag bri//kha dog ljang ku spyan gsum ma//rgyun rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgoms
302a2(rgyud): pas//rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam par 'gyur//rgyud thams cad kyi gling gi ni'i gsang ba dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las rtag pa'i rgyal po gnyis pa'o//
302a3(rgyud): he ru ka dang bdag med ma'i//bskyed pa'i sgrub dang de nyid nyon//gang gis gdug pa drag po yi//sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba yi//mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro mas mdzad
302a4(rgyud): pa'i//de dag thams cad khyod lo bshad//rdo rje sems dpa' gyur nas yang //rdo rje can nyid rdo rjer bab//'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs drag po ni//kun tu rnam par spro bar
302a5(rgyud): bya/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//sa bon phreng ba de nas dgod//de nas rdo rje tshugs chen las//rig mar bcas pa khu bar gyur//sna tshogs glu yi mchod pa
302a6(rgyud): las/de de nas rig ma bskul bar bya//rje btsun snying rje'i yid bzhengs shig/puk+ka sI ni bdag la skyobs//stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spangs la//bdag la bde chen sbyor
302a7(rgyud): bzhed mdzod//khyod med na ni bdag 'gums pas//kye'i rdo rje khyod bzhengs shig/stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la//ri khrod ma 'bras grub par mdzod//dga' ga tso
302b1(rgyud): 'jig rten 'gron gnyer ba//stong pa nyid la bzhugs sam ci/khyod med phyogs ni mi 'chol bas//gdol pa mo bdag zhu ba bgyid//bdag gis khyod kyi thugs 'tshal gyis//
302b2(rgyud): mig 'phrul mnga' ba khyod bzhings shig/g.yung mo bdag yid dran nyams pas//snying rje rgyun chad ma mdzad cig/oM dang hUM las rdo rje che//khu ba'i gzugs las bzhengs
302b3(rgyud): nas ni//zhabs rnams sa la rdebs pa dang //lha dang lha min bsdigs par mdzad//gaM tsi bai g+haM paM shaM laM DaM//'di yi sa bon dbyung bar bya//bdag po dga' ma'i sa bon las//
302b4(rgyud): aM hUM sngon po 'bar brtsigs pas//ma mo'i 'khor lo grong nyams dgar//gtso bo 'di ltar bsgom par bya//zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa//phyag ni bcu drug dag gis brgyan
302b5(rgyud): bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan pa nyid//'jigs pa dang ni 'jigs pa po//sgeg cing dpa' ba mi sdug pa//rgod cing drag shul 'jig su rung //snying rje rnga ma dang zhi ba yi//gar dgu'i ro
302b6(rgyud): dang ldan pa nyid//mgo yi phreng bas do shal mdzad//nyi mar bzhugs shing rol mor bcas/kha dog gnag pa 'jigs pa'o//sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin//nyid kyi zhal nas
302b7(rgyud): hUM spro zhing //thal bas sku la byugs pa nyid//bdag med lhan cig mnyam sbyor zhing //dga' ba gnyis gnyis snyoms 'jug pas//dbo' rlabs med pa'i rang bzhin can//rtsa ba'i
303a1(rgyud): zhal ni bskus cing gnag/g.yos pa'i zhal nI kun dam tshungs//g.yon pa dang sa rgyur 'jigs pa//skyong ma'i thul ni rnam par gtsigs//s+yAd d+ha d+hA/
303a2(rgyud): shu rtsa bzhi che//lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs//rdo rje ral gri 'dzin pa dang //mda' dang de bzhin 'khor lo nyid//de bzhin gshir dang dbyig pa dang //rtse gsum pa dang lcags
303a3(rgyud): kyu nyid//g.yon par dril bu pad+mar bcas//gzhu dang kha T+wAM grwa 'phyar zhing //thod pa dang ni rin chen nyid//bsdigs mdzub zhags pa de bzhi no//sangs rgyas sprin gyi 'od zer
303a4(rgyud): ldan//kun tu rnam par spro bar bya//de ltar cho ga sna tshogs kyis//dkar mo la sogs de rnams dgod//dkar mo kha dog dkar mo ste//gzhu dang mda' ni 'gengs ma mchog/
303a5(rgyud): thod pa khrag gis bkang ba dang //de bzhin rdo rje gI gug nyid//chom rkun ma ni kha dog dmar//'khor lo lcags kyu 'dzin mar brjod//thod pa dang ni cang te'u nyid//gsal
303a6(rgyud): ba'i gzugs can dgod par bya//rmongs byed ma ni sku mdog gnag/de bzhin thod pa dang ni gshor//sa la rlog pa nyid dang ni//g.yas pa rtse gsum 'phyar ba'o//ro langs
303a7(rgyud): ma ni dkar sar mtshungs//phyag dag na ni chang dang chu//ral gri dang ni thod pa nyid//mdzes ma'i gzugs can bsgom par bya//puk+ka sI ni kha dog ser//dpag bsam shing gi
303b1(rgyud): lkog ma dang //sha yis grang ba'i thod pa dang //rin chen dang ni mchod sbyin nyid//gdol pa ma nI sngo mdog mtshungs//de bzhin rlung gi gos 'dzin ma//gzhan pa dag glos thod pa dang //
303b2(rgyud): de bzhin pad+ma dkar po nyid//g.yung mo sngo dang dkar ba'i mdog/rdo rje dang ni lcags kyu 'dzin//g.yon pas thod pa 'dzin pa ste//gzhan pas rlung gi gos 'dzin ma//g+hasma
303b3(rgyud): ni ljang ser mtshungs//rdo rje me thab dgra s+ya'i lag/thod pa tshil bus yongs gang ba'i//g.yas pa mi 'jigs sbyin byed ma//ro khrod ma ni dkar mdog mtshungs//kha T+wAM gaM dang
303b4(rgyud): thod pa'i lag/rdo rje de bzhin zhags pa nyid//sna tshogs gzugs can bsgom par bya//ro ha te drang bag nyid dang //rus sbal de bzhin lto 'phye nyid//seng ge de bzhin sdig nyid
303b5(rgyud): dang /wa dang dge slong nyid rnams dang //de ltar dkar mo la sogs pa'i//thod pa brgyad du cho ga bzhin//rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//sgeg pa la sogs ro dang ldan//rta
303b6(rgyud): yi gzugs dang phag gi gdong //khyi gdong de bzhin seng ge ma//zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi ma//rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//gling bu dang ni pi wang dang //mu kun da dang
303b7(rgyud): rdza rnga ste//phyag gnyis ma la zhal gcig ma//rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//nag mo dkar ser lta bu dang //de bzhin steng du rta gdong ldang //ser mo nag mo dkar mtshungs
304a1(rgyud): dang ta de bzhin du ni phag gdong dmar//dmar zhing gnag dang dkar mtshungs zhing //de bzhin steng du khyi gdong ser//ljang dang gnag dang dkar ba'i
304a2(rgyud): gdong //steng du 'bar ba'i seng ge gdong //thams cad skra ni steng du 'bar//g.yon brkyang ba yis ro mnan cing //spyan gsum khro zhing sgeg pa dang //rgod pa'i bzhin ni bsgom
304a3(rgyud): par bya//he ru ka bskyed pa gsum pa las rab tu byed pa dang po'o////ye shes mkha' 'gro sgrub thabs ni//rdo rje gtso pa rgyal po nyon//gnyis med ye shes chos
304a4(rgyud): ldan pa'o//gnyis kyi dngos po spangs pa yis//rnal 'byor kun sogs dang por ni//dag pa gsum ni gdon par bya//swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsArba d+harmA swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho&haM/badz+ra shud+d+ha/
304a5(rgyud): sarba d+harmA badz+ra shud+d+ho \u0f85 haM/yo ga shud+d+haHsarba d+harma yo gA shud+d+ho&haM/de ltar byas nas rnal 'byor pas//yang na bsam gtanade nyid bya//yi da dang rjes 'thun gnas
304a6(rgyud): rnams//de nas bsam gtan brnam par bya//bla rI yang ni bye bo nyid//sna tshogs gos ni 'phyang ba dang //'phan dang rgyal mtshan sgreng ba dang //phyogs bcu'i gnas ni tham
304a7(rgyud): cad du//dri zhim me tog sna tshogs dang //de bzhin dri yi dkyil 'khor du//skad cig gcig pa'i rnal 'byor gyis//bdag gi lus ni bsam par bya//blo gros ldan pas sngar mchod
304b1(rgyud): nas//yo shos mkha' 'gro mni gzung //de ltar tshog sna tshogs ni//nges par bsgom pa nyid du bya//ye shes mtsha'i ri bo'i mgo rA/phyogs stsogs kha dog bzhi ni bsam+ba/
304b2(rgyud): de bzhin gser gyi rgyan byung dang //rin chen bdun gyis rnam par spras//g.yer ka 'bar ba'i phreng ba ni//'dod pas kun tu rgyas par ni//gnas ni lnga ru seng ge yi//gdan
304b3(rgyud): bsgom pa nyid du bya//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas ni//gdugs ni dkar pos rnam par spras//bdag gis dbugs kyis phyung nas ni//dbu su ye shes mkha' 'gro ma/
304b4(rgyud): zhal gsum me l-i phyag drug nyid//sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gi gnas//ma bcings sgra yis mdzes pa dang //sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par rgyan//kha dog sngon mo 'jigs
304b5(rgyud): chen mo//sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan//rgod dang khro ba sgeg pa dang //spyan gsum gsal ba'i gzugs can ma//sgra cher dgod dang 'jigs pa mo//gos ni dmar pos
304b6(rgyud): shin tu mdzes//sbyong du kha Te ba nyid dang //gnyis pa la ni dgra sta nyid//gsum pa la ni rdo rje nyid//g.yon na de bzhin dril bu'i sgra//gnyis pa la ni lhung bzed nyid//gsum
304b7(rgyud): par de bzhin ral gri 'dzin//'od zer 'bar ba du ma dang //dbusu mkhas pas bsgom par bya//ye shes mkha' 'gro'i mdun dri ni//bdag gi dbugs kyis phyung nas ni//kha dong/
305a1(rgyud): dkar mo shin tu mdzes//ma bcings pa yi sgra yis rgyan//sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang //skrag pa'i ro dang ldan pa dang /shin tu mdzes pa'i gas
305a2(rgyud): kyis rgyan//phyag gnyis kyis ni rnam par sbas//rnal 'byor lhung bzed kha T+wAM ga/rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsgom bya//ye shes byang gi cha la ni//bdag gi dbugs las phyung nus
305a3(rgyud): ni/phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung //btso ma gser gyi mdog lta bu//rnal 'byor lhung bzed kha T+wAM ga/ma bcings sgra yis rnam par rgyan//yan lag sbrul gyis
305a4(rgyud): rgyun dang ni//shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyis rgyan//'jigs pa'i mkha' 'gro zhes bya sgom//ye shes nub kyi tsha la na//yang ni ro langs ma byung nas//phyag gnyis sems dpa'i
305a5(rgyud): skyil mo krung //kha dog sngon mo shin tu mdzes//rnal 'byor lhung bzed kha T+wAM ga/ma bcings pa yi sgra yis rgyan//lus la sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan//shin tu mdzes pa'i
305a6(rgyud): gos kyis rgyan//ye shes lho yi cha la ni//gdol pa mo ni dmar mo ltar//rnal 'byor lhung bzed kha T+wAM ga/ma bcings pa yi sgra yis rgyan//phyag gnyis ma la zhal gcig
305a7(rgyud): ma/sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan//yongs gang gzugs dang gzi brjid ldan//'di ni rnal 'byor pa yis sgom//dbang ldan lha mo seng ge ma//gdong ni seng ger
305b1(rgyud): par //du/ dang sor byA lta bur no//k+Sha dAbyu s+thAn s+yA g+sa yas rgyud kunas//na lcags rgyu bsngags ma nas/shin tu mdzes pa smyan//da na ba
305b2(rgyud): mas ni//lus ni 'byur bar bsgom par bya//mI ni stug mo zhes bya 'o//rin chen bden pa mchog gi gdan//phyag gnyis sde dang dkar ba mchu gi//zhes dang rkyen gyis brgya
305b3(rgyud): ba dang //'bar bya'i rdo rje lcags kyu dang //de bzhin bsdigs mdzub zhags pa nyid//'di zer 'bar ba du mas ni//lus ni 'bri bar bsgom par bya//bden bral l+h+wam lU ga dang
305b4(rgyud): ma//sku cher dgod dang 'jigs pa m+b+ha//ma he'i gdan dang yang dag ldan//dmar zhing gnag pa'i khyo dog ma//lus la shin tu madz+nyAs gos dang //byug gnyis kyis ni rnam
305b5(rgyud): par skyes//lcags kyu zhags pa bsdigs mdzub ma//sbrul gyi rgyun gyis brgyan pa'o//rlung du lha mo 'ug pA ma//ser dang dmar ba'i kha dog me//glo yA gdan la gnas pa
305b6(rgyud): dedang //de nyid rkyen ni rab tu brtag/phyag gnyis sems depa'i skyil krung gnos//lcags kyu zhigs pa bsdigs mdzub ma//'od zer 'bar ba du mi yis//thams cad kyi ni
305b7(rgyud): thams cad 'bar//mkha' 'gro mo brgyad dbu su ste//phyi rol tu ni bzhi po rnams//de ltar dgod pa'i rim bltas nas//phyi nas gnas ni rab tu brtag/shar du mkha' 'grel
306a1(rgyud): rgyal mo dbang //phyag gnyis dang ni mdog dkar mo//yi dgas gadran la gnas pa dang //sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang //sgra ni grol zhing drag mo dang /
306a2(rgyud): monr-i 'bar ba'i 'od lta bu//khor ni lag pa bcug nas na//sgra cher dgod dang de bzhin 'bar//byang du ma re me rgyal mo dbang //kha dog gser mo drag shul ma//'jigs
306a3(rgyud): pa'i gzugs can gcig pa can//shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyis rgyan//rab tu song ba'i bstan la gnas//'bor ba'i me ni lta bu'i 'od//thal mo gnyis kyi lag pa ni//
306a4(rgyud): bo'i steng du mar me bzhin//nub tu lha mo 'jig byed ma//kha dog domar mo 'jigs pa mo//rab tu song ba'i stan la gnas//shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyis rgyun//khrag gi
306a5(rgyud): krung buM lage pa yi//snyim par khrig ni 'thung por byed//me nI 'bar ba'i 'od dgu mo//lha mo gtso mo 'dzizhi byed ma//lho drug yo ldan ma zhes bya//kha dog nag mo lte bu'i 'od//
306a6(rgyud): tu song ba'i spyan la gnas//ma bcings pa yi sgra skye rgyun//gos ni dmar po shin tu mdzes//sbrul gyi rgyun gyis brgyan pa dang //bsdigs mdzub dang n-i gtun shing ldeg/thams cad
306a7(rgyud): sems ni rmongs par byed//'bar ba'i me yi 'od drag mo//thams cad rig pas thams cad sgom//'di rnams gzugs sogs mdun du ni//dam tshig de bzhin bstan par bya
306b1(rgyud): rlung dang me yi bdun pa'i don//rdo rje'i sa bon gyis ni bskul//thig le sgras ni mnan pas ni//rgyun gyi char ni zhes byar gsungs//gsum pa las rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o//
306b2(rgyud): de nas bdag med sgrub pa ni//ci gsungs mdo ru bstod nas bshad//na mkha'i khams kyi dbus son par//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya//'khor lo sngon du ci rigs
306b3(rgyud): pa lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba nyid//'khor lo sa dang chu ni sngon//go rims bzhin du byin za dang //lha rnams kyi ni rlung chen dang //ji ltar sgom pa po 'byung ba//chos 'byung
306b4(rgyud): las skyes 'khor lo ni//'pharnga ma gnyis dag skyon med pa//ze 'bru las ni gcig yin to//rdo rje can gyi sku gsum mchog/bco lnga'i gdan dang ldan pa yi//ro ni nges par
306b5(rgyud): bsam pa ro bya//de yi steng du zla ba yin//zla ba'i steng du sa bon nyid//phyi nas bdud las rgyal bas mnan//gi nyes 'dus pa las bde chen po//A li zla bre'i gzugs kyis gnas///
306b6(rgyud): kA li'i gzugs kyis snang byed do//zla ba nyi ma gnyis 'dus pas//dkar mo la sogs rab tu grags//zla ba me long ye shes ldan//de bzhin mnyam nyid ye shes nyid//rang
306b7(rgyud): lha'i sa bon phyag mtshan ni//so sor rtog par brjod par bya//thams cad gcig gyur nan tan nyid//gzugs brnyan rdzogs pa dag pa'o//mkhas pas cho ga gsungs pas ni//rnam pa lnga po
307a1(rgyud): bzlon par // mAk+ShA l-i mAn+tas byu ba//darjes nas dag ny-id kyi da na//seM g+ho sa byung dong bas//ma rnam par 'ad myo ga//na da d+hA//
307a2(rgyud): gzugs brnyan las byung bya//dkyil 'khor badrag po bsgom par bya//phyag mtshan zhal sogs gong ma bzhin//zla ba chu shal ni re bu'o 'od//thabs dngo shes rab rang bzhin
307a3(rgyud): las//de ltar thams cad rdzogs pa nyid//A li shes rab kA li thabaso//zla ba nyi ma'i rab dbye bas//gang phyir dkar ma la sogs pa//kha dog dbye bas so so yin//de phyi
307a4(rgyud): kun tu rab 'byed pas//dkyil 'khor pa yang rab tu brtag/rnal 'byor ma lnga 'di dag ni//nong gi 'phar mo yang dag gnas//phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gyis//rnal 'byor rig
307a5(rgyud): pos rtag tu sgom//dbang por rdo rje gshin rjer dkar//chu bdag chu yi rnal 'byor ma//lus dran rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma//dbusu bdag med rnal 'byor ma//phyi rol 'phar ma
307a6(rgyud): dkar mo dang //chom rkun de bzhin ro langs ma//g+has+sa d+hi dang puk+ka sI//ri khrid ma dang gdol pa mo//brgyad pa g.yung myos gang po'o//'og ldan mA dang steng ldan nyid//mkha' spyod
307a7(rgyud): sa spyod ma zhes brjod//sred dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyis//ngosu sgyur ma yang dag gnas//lha mo thams cad sna tshogs mdog/dran chen phyag rgya lnga yis rgyan//zhal gcig ma la
307b1(rgyud): phyag bzhi ma//spyan gsum gsal ba'i gzugs can ma//'khor lo rna cha mgul rgyan dang //lhag par gdubu skya rags nyid//sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag pas//'di lnga phyag rgya dag
307b2(rgyud): por gsungs//ji ltar bdag med rnal 'byor ma//de ltar thams cad rnam par bshad //g.yon pas rnal 'byor lhung bzed dang //de bzhin steng du khA T+wAM ga/g.yas ni rdo rje sngon po
307b3(rgyud): dang //de bzhin du yang gri gug nyid//ro la zhon zhing gzi brjid 'bar//spyan dmar de bzhin steng skyes ser//kha dog sngon mo ches gsal ma//stag gi lpags pas snam dkris
307b4(rgyud): shing //'jig pa'i mi ni lta bur ni//gsal ba'i gzugs can ma de gnas//g.yas na dkar dang sngo ba ste//yon na margad sngo dang mtshungs//phyag gnyis ma la zhil gcig
307b5(rgyud): ma//rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//lag pa gcig na thod bsam brel//g.yas na gri kug 'dzin pa ma//rgod dang khro dang sgeg pa dang //de ni mchod pa'i gzugs gnas pas//
307b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas sprin dang mnyam pa yi//'od zer sna tshogs kun tu spro//de nyid gsum gyi rang bzhin bdag/mkhas pas dbusu bsgom par bya//gsum pa las rab tu byed pa
307b7(rgyud): gsum pa'o////de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/yang dag rab tu bshad par bya//rdo rje dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dbyings//rdo rje dbyings zhes bya bar gsungs//dkyil 'khor
308a1(rgyud): gnas ni sbyangs nas ni//phyag rgya chen por yongasu gzung //thams cad rnam par bltas nas ni//sngags pas 'di ni bsgrub par bya//sar pa legs
308a2(rgyud): par bkal ba dang //shin tu tshad ma mdzes pas ni//srad bus thig gdab shes rab can//ji ltar nub par dkyil 'khor nyid//gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta babs rnams
308a3(rgyud): kyis shin tu mdzes//thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan//gos dang me tog phreng bas rgun//mtshams kyi cha rnams thams cad dang //sgo yi khyud kyi grwa rnams//rdo rje rin chen
308a4(rgyud): rnams kyis spras//de yi 'khor lo so so'i skabs//nang du yang ni zhugs nas ni//rdo rje thig ni yongs bcug cing //phyi rol dkyil 'khor thag gdab bya//ka ba brgyad kyis
308a5(rgyud): nye bar mdzes//rdo rje ka pa'i nang logasu//dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par rgyan//de nas dkyil 'khor nang du ni//sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rnam par dgod//gsungs
308a6(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor cho ga yi//sgrub pa'ang khyod la bshad par bya//de la dang por lha nyid kyi//khyim du sngags pa zhugs nas ni//a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni//bsarma/
308a7(rgyud): nas de steng rdo rje ni//dkar po rtse mo lnga pa nyid//cho gas bsam par byas nas ni//de bzhin gshegs pa kun sogs la//mchod nas phyag 'tshal 'di skad gsol/
308b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas byung chub sems dpa' kun//bad+mag la dgongs par mdzad gsal//bdag ni chu ga mo zhes pab+hI//dus 'di nas ni bzung nas ni//hU~M srid byang chub skyong po'i blar//ji ltar/
308b2(rgyud): dus gsum mgron po rnams//byang chub du ni nges mdzad pa/byang chub sems ni bla med mchog/dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi//dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //sems can
308b3(rgyud): don byed tshul khrims dang //tshul khrims bslab pa rnam pa gsum//so sor bdag gis brtan por gzung //sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te//bla na me pa'i dkon mchog
308b4(rgyud): gsum//sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i//sdom pa ding nas brtan por gzung //rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //de nyid las ni so sor gzung //
308b5(rgyud): slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi//ron chen rigs mchog rnal 'byor gyi//dam tshig yid 'ong bya la//nyi ma re re drug byas nas//sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin//byang chub chen po lnga
308b6(rgyud): byung ba//pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa la//phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum/dam pa'i chos kyang so sor gzung //las kyi rigs mchog chen po la//sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni//
308b7(rgyud): thams cad so sor bzung bar bgyi//mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi//byang chub sems ni bla med pa//dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi//sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir//sdom
309a1(rgyud): pa ma sus gzung bar bgyi//ma bsgral ba dag bsgral bar bgyi//ma zil ba dag sgrol bar bgyi//dbyabs ma byon pa dbugs dbyung zhing //sems can
309a2(rgyud): mya ngan 'das la bzhug/de nas bcom ldan 'das rje rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi rna ma las byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te tshig 'dis bka
309a3(rgyud): stsol pa/de nas bsam gtan gnas 'dug nas//chos rnams thams cad bdag med par//yid dag rje su blta bar bya//phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can//'di dag thams
309a4(rgyud): ts+tsha sems kyis brgyugs//sems las mi gtogs pa nyid ni//gzhan du yod pa ma yi'o//chos kun rang bzhin 'od gsol ba//chos kun dang por ma skyes phyir//snying
309a5(rgyud): s+ye Anu d+hAn+ta brjod//de nas rang sems de nyid 'dis//rang bzhin gyis ni 'di gsal bya//'dod pa'i sngags kyi bzlas pas ni//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par blta//
309a6(rgyud): Ta d+h+wi kai ra mi//tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ched ga pa//namakha' lta bur dri ma meng//yid gnyis kun las rnam par grol//mchog tu rnam par rtog pa 'jom sa//nyon mos
309a7(rgyud): rnaMmamams cad dag/dang po zla ba ltar bzlas nas//sangs rgyas kun gyi yan tan 'dir//ma songs gzugs kyis 'jug par 'gyur//a A oM s+t+wa~M su oM
309b1(rgyud): oM oM au oM aH/bcom ldan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi//yon tan khyad par ji ltar lags//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//gru gsum rgya tshor rang bzhin can//
309b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan gnas//'di ni a sogs gzugs kyis ni//sangs rgyas yon tan 'jug par 'jug/shel dang zla bo lta bung ni//de yi stong du 'jug par 'gyur/
309b3(rgyud): sems ni rang bzhin 'od gsal bas//de nyid dga' bar byed pa'i rgyu//sngags pas 'di yi sngags kyis ni//byang chub sems ni bskyed par byed//oM bi d+ho tsi d+hi ut+pA de yA
309b4(rgyud): mi byams pa'i rje su rim 'byung ba//sems can rjesu 'dzin pa'o//dge ba'i chos kyis yang dag gang //nyon mongs thams cad nges par gnon//zla ba'i dkyil 'i khyer
309b5(rgyud): dbusu ni//byang chub zla ba gnyis pa can//'dir yang skar ma'i rnam pas ni//sangs rgyas yon tan ka sogs kyi//gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan lte bu yi//rnal 'byor
309b6(rgyud): gyis ni 'jug par 'gyur//ka kha ga g+ha nga/tsa tsha dza dz+nyAnya/Ta tha Da D+ha NA/ta tha dA d+ha no/pa pa bo b+ha ma/ya ra la wa/sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/'di yi dkyi lI 'khor cho ga kun/
309b7(rgyud): rgyud ni gzhan du ma gsungaso//de la dbu su rtse lnga pa//'od zer dkar po btsas pa nyid//kun tu bzang po'i sems bskyed pa//brtan par byed pa'i rgyu yi phyir//bdag nyid
310a1(rgyud): /rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan du//'dri yi sngags kyis bsgom par bya//oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra/byang chub spyod pa bla na med//de yi sa ni rtogs pa 'di//ye shes
310a2(rgyud): dag pa zag pa med//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni//rdo rje nges par brtag par bya//na mkha'i khams ni thams cad kyi//chang du yang dag gang ba yi//rdo rje'i lus kyi bdag
310a3(rgyud): nyid du//sngags pas bsgom par bya ba'o//'dis ni sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis//spro ba dang ni bsdu bar bya//oM badz+ra At+ma ko&haM/sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang ni//snang ba
310a4(rgyud): med cing gnas pa med//ma skyes ma byas dag pa nyid//dngos po med pa la sogs spangs//bcad med dbyer med bzung du med//chos kyi sku ni gzugs med pa//rdo rje bdag
310a5(rgyud): med yang dag gyur//rdo rje'i sku ni grong na med//de ltar yang rdo rjes mtshan pa bsgom par bya ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyon cig/yang ni rdo rje
310a6(rgyud): sems dpa' ni//rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa//sangs rgyas rnams kyi gzugs brnyan ni//'di yi sngags kyis bsgom par bya//oM ya thA sarba tA thA ga tA staM b+hU hi//sku dang
310a7(rgyud): gsang ba de bzhin spyod//spyod yul de nyid rtogs pa ni//mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga//sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid dge/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems de pa'i
310b1(rgyud): chen po rdo rje snying po la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i rdo rje dang /pad+ma'i rigs kyi ming ci lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis
310b2(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun la gnas//pad+ma'i rigs ni lha mo chen mo ldan//de yi rdo rje pad+ma'i steng du gnas//de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad don//
310b3(rgyud): de nas de ltar bdag nyid rnam par snang mdza du bskyed nas steng dang 'og tu sngags kyi yi ge bkod/cho ga bzhin du ri rab dang /gru gsum rgya chen po bskyed par bya ste/'od zer sna tshog
310b4(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rgyan pa las yang dag par byung ba'i mdzes pa'i gnas bsgoms nas/der paM las byung ba'i sna tshogs pad+mar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khoraro//rlung dang me'i dkyil
310b5(rgyud): 'khor dang ldan pa ya ra la was rgyan pa'o//de nas de yi steng du sngags kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab cing bstod pa rab tu bsngags pa nor bu
310b6(rgyud): rin po che chen po 'od gsal ba dang /kha dog sna tshogs shing dril bu dpyangs pa dang /rlung gis bskyod pa'i gos dang /'phan dang /me tog gi phreng ba dang /do shal dang /de
310b7(rgyud): shal phyed pa dang /zla bra nye bar mdzes par rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mor gzhal med khang bsam par bya'o//hU~M gi sngags 'dis rang gi snying khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du sngags 'di
311a1(rgyud): bkod gyur pa las rnga n+da rtse lnga pa bsgom par bya'o//yang sangs rgyas thums cad spro ba dang bsdu bar bya zhing rdo rje de nyid yang yongasu gyur pa las rdo rje sems
311a2(rgyud): dpa' rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan pa zla bo'i kha dog gi 'od lta bu ste/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na bzhugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/dpa' bo shes rab
311a3(rgyud): dang dga' ba gcig pus mdzes pas rdo rje dang /dril bu dang /ral gri dang /lcags kyu nyid dang /thod pa dang /zhags pa 'dzin pa nyid do//g.yas pa ni kha dog nag po'o//
311a4(rgyud): g.yon pa ni pad+ma rA ga'i 'od//zhal gsum pa dang /phyag drug pa nyid dang /spyan gsum pa nyid dang /bzang po'i gzugs can te/rang gi rig ma'i pad+ma la bzhugs pa/dgye
311a5(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o//rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par dkyil 'khor pa'ang rab tu brtag par bya'o//shar du ni rnam par snang mdzad //lhor ni rin che ni
311a6(rgyud): 'byung gnaso//nub tu ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o//byang du ni gdon mi za bar grub pa'o//dbang ldan du ni spyano//mor ni mA ma ki'o//bden bral du ni gos dkar mo'o//rlung du ni sgrol
311a7(rgyud): ma'o//phyi rol gyi 'pher ma la drag shul ma ni kha dog dkar mo'o//lho ru ni rdo rje gzugs brnyan ma ni khaM dog ser ma'o//nub tu ni 'dod chags rdo rje ma kha dog dmar mo'o//
311b1(rgyud): byung du ni rdo rje zhi bya mo kha dog ljang ku mA'o//dbang ldan du ni rdo rme gnod sbyin mo kha dog dkar ser ro//mA ru ni rdo rje mkha' gro mA da marar+ya sor lta bu'o//bden bral du ni sgra'i rdo rje ma ni
311b2(rgyud): skyon de mer lta bu'o//rlung dusa'i rdo rje me ni kha dog ltung skye mi'o//phyi rol gyi 'phyar ma la dbang ldan du ni gling bu ma'o//mA ru ni pi bi ma'o//bdon bral du ni mu kun dme'o//gling bu ma la
311b3(rgyud): sogs pa ni phyag gnyis ma la zhal gcig ma'o//phyi rol gyi snam bu la me tog lnga sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor ma de bzhag par bya ste/de bzhin du phyag gnyis
311b4(rgyud): ma'o//shar byi sgol lha mo rdo rje ljags kyu ma na mkha' sngo bsangs ma'i mdog bri bar bya ste zhal g.yas pa dang /gzhan pi ni gnag pa dang /dkar ba'o//phyag g.yos pa'i dang po
311b5(rgyud): na ni lcags kyu'o//gnyis pa na ni ral gri 'phyar ba'o//gsum pa la ni 'khor lo'o//g.yon pa na ni zhags pa dang /bsdigs mdzub dang /dril bu 'dzin pa ste phyag drug pa bri bar
311b6(rgyud): bya'o//sgo'i sgor lha mo rdo rje zhags pa ma kho dog dkar ser te/zhal g.yas pa dang /gzhan pa ni gnag pa dang dmyur ba'o//g.yas pa na ni zhags pa dang /rdo rje dang ral gri 'phyar
311b7(rgyud): ba'o//'khor lo dang /dril bu dang /bsdigs mdzub zhags pa can ste drug pa'o//nub kyi sgo la ni rdo rje lcags sgrog ma ste/de bzhin du yang kha dog dmar zhing gzi brjid cho
312a1(rgyud): b+h+yo/zhal g.yas pa dang gzhan pa ni gnag pa dang dkar ba'o//phyag drug na lcags sgrog dang //rdo rje dang /ral gri dang /'khor lo dang /dril bu dang /lcags
312a2(rgyud): kyu'o//byang gi sgo la ni rdo rje dril bu ma 'jigs mar byed pa ste/zhal gsum ni ljang ku dang /nag mo dang /dkar mo'o//phyag drug na ni dril bu dang /rdo r+N+Ne dang /ral gri dang /
312a3(rgyud): 'khor lo dang /lcags kyu dang /zhags pa'o//thams cad kyang skra ste du 'bar ba ste/sna tshogs pad+mar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du bzhag par bya'o//me'i phyogs nas brtsams
312a4(rgyud): te me tog la sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor ma de gzhag par bya ste phyag gnyis mar gsungaso//shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams ni rnal 'byor mo lcags kyu ma dang /
312a5(rgyud): zhags pa ma dang /lcags sgrog ma dang /dril bu mA'i log pa ste/sgo srung ma dang yang dag par ldan pa'o//dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes bya ba 'di rnams kyi snying po bstan pa ste the tshom
312a6(rgyud): mi za'o//de ltar bkod pa dang byas pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis kyang mtshan ma dang phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor//gong ma lta bu'i de'i phyed
312a7(rgyud): kyis de'i nang du zla ba phyed pa'i dbyibs lta bu'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa dang /phyi rol tu ri mo bzhis yongasu bskor ba'o//lha mo thams
312b1(rgyud): cad kyi gun su ji skad gsungs pa'i gdan rnams ni dkar mo la sogs par rab tu brtag par bya'o//de la dbusu hrIH'i yi ge rnam par bsgom par bya'o//de'i shar gyi re'u mig
312b2(rgyud): la ni hri'o//lha ru ni ho'o//byang du ni dzI'o//me ru ni haM ngo //bden bral du ni dz+r-i ngo //rlung du ni mau ngo //dbang ldan du hai ngo //dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi bkod pa ni me'i mtshamA su aM ngo //
312b3(rgyud): bden bral du ni u'o//rlung du ni e'o//dbang ldan du ni ai dgod par bya'o//shar gyi sgo la dzaH'o//lho ru nau hU~M ngo //nub du ni baM ngo //byang du ni hoHdgod par bya'o//phyi rol du
312b4(rgyud): dur khrod brgyad kyis yongasu bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams te/dor dbang po la sogs pa'i 'byung po chen po brgyad po 'jigs par byed pa dgod par bya'o//shar du
312b5(rgyud): ha ro b+he sa la//lha yi tshogs ni yang dag bri//lho ru tsu ta'i shing la ni//gshin rje'i gtso bo'i dbang phyug bri//nub tu oM sho ka gan su//sprin gyi rgyal po der nau dgod//de
312b6(rgyud): bzhin byang du byang chub shing //gnod sbyin sde dpon mnyam par gzhag/de bzhin mer ni ka rany+dzar//drang srong tshogs kyis yang dag khyab//bden bral ta dza ta ra ni//srin po la
312b7(rgyud): sogs do nas dgod//rlung du b+ha li pa lar ni//rlung gi bdag po yang dag bri//dbang ldan pa ta s+tha lar ni//yi dgas tshogs ni yang dag bro//drag bcas dbang bcas nye dbang bcas//
313a1(rgyud): zla bcas nyi ma ga shin+da rje N+Da//rgyus btab rmongs byas zos byas shing //thal ba'i dngos tsam 'tsho bar byed//thabs dang shes rab rnal 'byor gyis//
313a2(rgyud): g.yon par kha T+wAM bat+te ne nas su//dri lnga bu si lA sil sgra sgrogs shing //khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa bsnams//g.yasu rdo rje 'ab ba ste//'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par
313a3(rgyud): mdzad//skyil krung phyed pa byas nas ni//nyid kyi brla stengs g.yon pa mnan//tshangs pa la stsogs mnan pa de//grags pa nye bar mi za ste//kun tu 'od zer sna tshogs kyi//

313a6(rgyud): thub pa chen pos bsho gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro mo rnam par rgyal ba'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas mkha 'gro ma'i dam

313b2(rgyud): shud+d+ha a shud+d+he nam+me Ni A mI/nai rau shra au ga tsaM D+hA b+hI/t+yeh+ni dza si d+hI barbeNi.au.I/ma la ya d+h+we kuna? d+hAr+b+h+yAM miN+Di ma ta ts+tshir+N+Na b+hUd+d+haM s+yA yI/mu khI g+ho g+h+rA/b+h+yAMb+h+yA

313b4(rgyud): /dz+r-iSh+Ta/hrIk+Shu/dz+dzASh+Ta/snA/b+h+yAM/dr-i.au/a//r+m+ma de/m+b+ha/!/Shi/kauk+Sha/kAstAM/su/na/makuM/dA nasaM dag b+hits+tsham ma/

314a4(rgyud): ni phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan du gsung so//yi ge dang ngagra gits+tsho mA ste bzhi pa las rab tu byed pa dang po'o////rdo rje snying pa snying rje che//yid ni gcig tu gyur pas
314a5(rgyud): snron//gzugs can ma dang 'o byed ma//ldu ma yongs gyur byis bcas mo//mi ldog mo dang 'dod pa mo//'di dag mkha' gro bdun du gsungs//mngon par zhen pas lta ba dang //

314a7(rgyud): sdug pa 'am gal te mi sdug pa'i//byis pa lta zhing 'i byed na//de ni 'o byed mar shes bya//mkha' gro mchog kyang de nyid yin//byol song ste stangs khro gnyer gdong //'di
314b1(rgyud): ni smin rgyur bsdogs par byed//gzhan du dbugs kyi 'jigs byed ma//do ni lA mar rnam par bstan//phrag dang lce spyang byi la dang //rta rnams thams cad 'jigs byed pa//de ni
314b2(rgyud): yongs gyur me ru gsungs//rab tu dga' zhing gsal bar dgod//song bar gyur nas mi ldog pa//de ni byas bci so mo ru gsungs//gang zhig skyobs lag pa 'am//bong
314b3(rgyud): 'am ni rkang pas sam//gos mtha' 'am yang na shing gis ni//des reg pa ni 'tsho mi 'gyur//de ni mi ldog mar shes bya//dgong drang smra dang ngu ba dong //glo bur du ni khro 'gyur ba//

315a1(rgyud): gsum som//lus ni sngo bsrungs skye ba dang //ud pal sngon po dri dang mtshungs//khyim du rdo rje bris nas ni//rtag tu mchod par byed pa ni//he ru ka dpal
315a2(rgyud): rigs byung ba//de ni mkha' gro mar shes bya//mig dmar dkar dang dmar ba drung //de bzhin rkang pa log pa dam re//ra skyes khyim byA dag gis kyang //rtag tu dga' bar gyur
315a3(rgyud): pa dang //de yi khyim du rdo rje ni//bris nas rtag tu mchod byed pa//he ru ka dpal rigs byung ba//mkha' gror 'di la the tshomo med//'khor lo gang gi dpral ba 'am//lag pa
315a4(rgyud): yang ni mthong gyur pa'i//ser zhing sngo sangs bud chud gang //rtag tu gos ser dga' ba nyid//me tog dkar po dri chen dang //skal bzang phun sum tshogs ma de//khyim du
315a5(rgyud): 'khor lo 'dri bar byed//de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rdzus 'gro/gnag cing sngo sangs bud med gang //so ni dkar zhing mtho ba dang //rtag tu gdug pa'i g.yon pa ni//skye
315a6(rgyud): ni rtag tu grol ba yin//rtag tu khrus la dga' ba dang //spyod cing mang du smra ba dang //rdo rje khyim du bris nas ni//rtag tu mchod pa byed pa ni//rdo rje phag mo'i rigs las
315a7(rgyud): byung tadakar zhing gser dang mtshud pa dang //'bar ba'i mig dang ba spu gang //rdo rje gang gi dpral ba 'am//lag par yang ni mthong gyur pa//rtag tu rgyal srid dga' ba dang //snyems
315b1(rgyud): shing bden par smra ba dang //ma li ka lI dri dang ldan//khyim du rdo rje bris nas ni//rtag tu mchod pa byed pa ni//du ma skyes ma yi rigs las byung //rnal 'byor dbang rgyan mo ni mchog/
315b2(rgyud): shA la dga' ba'i bud med gang //mig sman neg po lta bu'i 'od//dpral bar mdung rtse'i rnam pa nyid//drag shul las la dga' ba gang //rtag tu dur khrod 'gro gang dang //

315b4(rgyud): mdog 'dra'i bud med gang //so ni mi mnyam par gnas shing //rtag tu drag shul las rnams dang //g.yon pa'i mche ba byung ba ni//khyim du dgra sta 'dri byed cing //rtag tu
315b5(rgyud): mchod pa byed pa ni//rnam par 'dren pa'i rigs byung ba//de ni mkha'agror the tshom med//gang gi skra ni li ba dang //bzhin ni yongasu zlum pa dang //rtag tu kha lo sma ra dang /
