315b7(rgyud): phyag rgya sbyin par bya//yang na rus sbal phyag rgya bya//ril ba spyi blugs mchod byed pa//phyag rgya lan du brjod par bya//de ni tshes bcu'i res dag le//khyim du pad+ma 'dri bar
316a1(rgyud): byed tu ma mtsho 'phyang zhing mig yungs ma//mig ni dmar zhing ser ba dang //che zhing skal bzang nor dang ldan//ser zhing tsam pa lta bu nyid//ring zhing lag pa
316a2(rgyud): ring ba dang //sna tshogs gos la dga' ba dang //ri mo gsum ni dpal ba 'am//steng gi mtsham su nges par gnas//dgod pa dang ni dga' ba nyid//lam gyi rnam pa
316a3(rgyud): gnan cing min na//g.yul du shi ba rnams kyi ni//gtamra la rtag tu dga' ba nyid//de 'dra'i rab myos mthong nas ni//mdung rtswa'i phyag rgya rab bstan bya//rkang pa g.yon pa
316a4(rgyud): bskums pa yi//grwar nyid kyang ni rab bstan bya//g.yon gyis yongasu bskor ba ni//phyag rgya'i lan du brjod par bya//de'i bcu bzhi 'am brgyad pa la//de khyim mdung rtse bris
316a5(rgyud): shing mchod//'jig rten dbang phyug mtshon nyid yin//dmar zhing dkar ba'i bud med gang //migo nr-i ldang zhing sor ba dang //de bzhin skra ni 'khyil ba dang //dar dbyangs
316a6(rgyud): bcings par snang ba nyid//ri mo gcig par rab tu gnas//de bzhin steng du ring ba dang //rtag tu gos dmar la dga' zhing //rtag tu dgod cing glu len dang //glo bur du ni
316a7(rgyud): khro ba dang //khyad par du ni sems g.yo dang //rtsod pa rtag tu dga' ba nyid//de 'dra'i rab myos mthong nas ni//'phang mdung phyag rgyas bstan bya//gnyis pa yis kyang 'bad
316b1(rgyud): pa yis//dril bu'i phyag rgya rab tu ston//g.yon na sna yongasu bskor ba dang //phyag rgya'i lan du brjod par bya//thung zhing byin pa sgom pa dang //rtag tu gos ser dga' ba dang //mgrin pa/
316b2(rgyud): nas ni gos 'phyang ba//de 'dra'i rab myos mthong nas ni//'khor lo'i phyag rgya rab bstan bya//gnyis pa'ang rab tu 'bad pas ni//dung gi phyag rgya sbyin par bya//de bzhin yongasu bskor
316b3(rgyud): banyid//de yi dus ni bcu bzhi la//khyim du rdo rje 'dri bar byed//yan lag kun la ba spur bcas//mig ni gnag cing ser ba dang //gtsigaso shing rnam 'gyur 'jigs pa dang //
316b4(rgyud): bzhin sbom kha na sbom pa dang //ma mchu 'phyang zhing khung mig dang //sna ni nyams par gyur pa dang //rtag tu dri ba 'dod pa dang //sprin gyi kha dog lto che ba//de 'dra'i rab myos mthong
316b5(rgyud): nas ni//klu yi phyag rgya rab sbyin bya//gnyis pa yang ni 'bad pa yis//'phang mdung phyag rgya sbyin par bya//yongasu bskor ba gong ma bzhin//de ni bcu gcig tshes la ni//mche ba
316b6(rgyud): 'dri zhing rtag tu mchod//motshan ma'i phyag rgya ste bzhi pa las rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o///de nas yan lag phyag rgya yi//mtshan nyid yang dag rab bA shad bya//bud
316b7(rgyud): med gang zhig/spyo gtsug reg/spyi bo de yis rab bstan bya//gang zhig dpral bsten pa la//mkhur tshos de yis rab bstan bya//gang zhig so na ston pa la//lha ni de yis rab
316'a1(rgyud): bstan bya//gang zhig ma mchu ston pa la//kos kau de yis rab bstan bya//gang zhig mgrin pa rog pa la//lto ba de yis rab bstan bya//gang zhig lto ba ston
316'a2(rgyud): pA la ta lto ba de yis rab bstan bya//gang zhig mjug ma ston pa la//sa ni de yis rab bstan bya//gang zhig gsang ba stan pa la//ling gA de yis rab bstan bya//gang
316'a3(rgyud): zhig dbus mo ston pa la//dpung pa de yis rab bstan bya//gang zhig rkang pa ston pa la//rkang mthil de yis rab bstan bya//gang zhig sor mo ston pa la//sen mo de yis
316'a4(rgyud): rang bstan bya//gang zhig sA ni ston pa la//na mkha' de yis rab bstan bya//gang zhig na mkha' ston pa la//nyi ma de yis rab bstan bya//gang zhig chu bo ston pa lnga//rgya mtsho de
316'a5(rgyud): yis rab bstan bya//gang zhig sor mo cig ston pa//legs par 'ongs shes brjod pa yin//gang zhig sor mo gnyis ston pa//shin tu legs 'ang brjod pa yin//g.yas
316'a6(rgyud): pa'i smin ma skyur tshul dang //g.yon pa'i smin sgyur tshul ston pa//slob dpon gnyis dang 'du ba ston//rgyud thams cad kyi gsang ba yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba rdo rje mkha'
316'a7(rgyud): 'gro mi'i brdo ste brtag pa'i rgyal po bzhi pa'o////de nas skye bo dam pa kun//'du ba yang dag rab bshad bya//de la zas gcig bza' bar bya//sna tshogasu yang ma
316'b1(rgyud): lus brtson//kye/bcom ldan 'das 'du ba'i gnas gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sngal pa/gnas dang nyo ba'i gnas dang ni//zhing dang de bzhin nye ba'o zhing //
316'b2(rgyud): ts+tshan+do nye ba'i ts+tshan+t+r-i dang //'du ba de bzhin nye 'du ga/dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod dang //'thung gcod nye ba'i 'thung gtsang nyid//'di rnams sa ni bcu gnyis te//sa bcu'i dbang
316'b3(rgyud): phyug mgon po nyid//'di ni gzhan gyis brjod mi bya//kye/bcom ldan 'das gnas la sogs pa gang lags/de bzhin du sa bcu gnyis po rnams rgya chen po las
316'b4(rgyud): 'byung ba bka' drin gyis bskyab du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gnas ni dzA la n+ta rar gsungs//de bzhin du ni ur+yan nyid//gnas mi ko la gi ri dang /
316'b5(rgyud): de bzhin arbu da nyid do//nye gnas gau dA bA ri nyid//de bzhin dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang //de bzhin de bi ko Tar bshad//de bzhin mA la ba nyid dang //de bzhin kA ma ru par gsung
316'b6(rgyud): o tre zhing ni nyid du gsungs//nye zhing tri sha ku ni dang //de bzhin kro sha la nyid dang //ka lI kaR+Sha ni ci gsungs bya'o//de bzhin l-I pa ka nyid dang //kany+tsi kha bi'i gnas nyid ni/
316'b7(rgyud): tsAn+dor yang dag gsungs pa dang //nye ba yi yang tsAn+da'o//pre ta a hi pa si dang //de bzhin khyim gyi lha nyid dang //sau rASh+Ta dang gser gling nyid//'du ba de bzhin nye 'du ba//na ga
317a1(rgyud): dang sin+d+hu nI/dur+ya khyod nyid du brjod pa dang //myu ru dang nI ku lu tA//nye ba yo ni dur khrod nyid//snying rje de bzhin las kyi brang //hU rI ka la nyid dang ni//lan thA
317a2(rgyud): mchu'i nang song dang //bin+d+ha gzhi nu'i grong khyer nyid//'thung gcod nye ba'i 'thung gcod do//de dang ny+tsi ba dur khrod nyid//rab song dge 'dun rgya mtsho'i 'gram//bskyed mos tshal
317a3(rgyud): gyi rdzing bu'i 'gram//nye ba'i dur khrod brjod par bya//de nas gnas la lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/rdul bral ga nAs nu tI gnas//kong ka nar ni zla
317a4(rgyud): bA'i snying //ka rany+dza raM gnas tsa ri tra//an+d+ra ha sa ra ka dram pa//lha mo'i mkhar du bA Ta gnas//ha ri ke la ra hA ri g+ho nas//ur+yen a sho ki nI gnas//dzA lan+d+ha ra gas
317a5(rgyud): b+h+rUM snying gnas//gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i so//de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med//zhing ni 'o byed shes par bya//nye ba'i zhing ni 'od 'phro can//ts+tshin+do mngon du gyur pa ri des//nye ba
317a6(rgyud): dz+dza srung dka' ba//'du ba ring du song ba ste//nye ba'i 'du ba mi g.yo ba/dur khrod legs pa'i blo gros nyid//nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sprin//pha rol phyin bcu'i sa rnams
317a7(rgyud): /rnal 'byor ma yi kla kla'i snying //bu la sogs pa ci gsungs pa//phyi dang nang du bsam par bye//rnal 'byor ma rnams legs 'dre ba'i//nyin por nyid kyang lags
317b1(rgyud): bshad bya//yi dgas zla phyed bcu bzhi dang //brgyad pa la srung khyad par du//n+yal mtshon dang ni mtshon bsnun nyid//skyo ba bdun pa khyad par du//'bad pas snying rje bskyed
317b2(rgyud): nas ni//mkhas pas bsod par bya ba nyid//snying rje med na mi 'grub pas//de phyir snying rje yang dag bsha//ji ltar bdag bzhin sems can nyid//ji ltar sems can//
317b3(rgyud): de bzhin bdag/'di ltar sems dpa'i rnal 'byor bdag/dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur//'du ba'i gnas te lnga pa las rab tu byed pa dang po'o////gsang
317b4(rgyud): ba'i pad+ma'i mtshan nyid ni//ye shes dbang po nyan par 'tshal//ye shrIs semams dang 'dres pa yi//rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim pa ci//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
317b5(rgyud): stsal pi/gnas bzhi mnyam par gnas nas ni//rdzogs bya rim pa rdo rje 'dzin//mnyam nyid sems ni bskyed nas ni//'dod chags la sogs ring du spangs//yid dang
317b6(rgyud): 'thun pa'i gan su ni//bde ba'i bstan la 'dug nas ni//brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po kun//snying rje phan pa'i bsam par bya//spyi bo med pa'i spyi bo dang //sgra mtha' de bzhin
317b7(rgyud): gsang pad+ma//tshan sna tshogs yig 'bru rnams//de bzhin du yang bstan rnams nyid//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni//chos kyi dbyings kyi rnam par byed//bsdus nas gong bu'i
318a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyis//rdo rje sems dpar rang nyid 'gyur//chu yi khams dang me yi khams//ro gcig mchog gi gan su ni//thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid sbyor
318a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dbang po drug/bstan bcos tshad ma slob dpon dang //lung gi rjes 'brangs de nyid shes//gsang don dri nyid dngos po yang //de nyid las ni gtsog
318a3(rgyud): las gcig/sngar gyi mtshan nyid thams cad kyi//stong sogs de nyid mtshan nyid kyis//lus kyi dri ma bkrus nas ni//rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim par sbyang //zla ba'i dkyil/
318a4(rgyud): 'khor dbus gnas par//ye shes sems dpa' bsam par bya//mdog dkar kun da zla ba yi//'od zer rnam par spro ba ni//phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung //pad+ma'i
318a5(rgyud): gnas la yang dag bzhugs//rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan//phyag rgya chen po phyag gnyis kyis//stong gi gan su gzir
318a6(rgyud): ba mdzad//gzugs dang gzi brjid yongs gang ba//ye shes sems dpar sgom pa nyid//chu shing me tog lta bur ni//lce ba ru ni yang dag gnas//langs nas snying khar kun tu
318a7(rgyud): gnas//sngar gyi mtshan nyid yongs snang ba//gton nas dang po pad+ma ni//mdab ma brgyad pa shin tu mdzes//za ba dang ni ze 'brur bcas//yi ge rnam dgod dgod par bya//dkyil
318b1(rgyud): 'kho da bu su gnas pa ste//phyag gnyis zhal ga cig drukar phrin//bzang po dri mang dbus bsam//de sto dbu sa rnam shes dang //yo shos de nyid sbyar byar bya//dang po shUr gyi mdab ma lnga/
318b2(rgyud): byams par ldan pa'i mi bskyod pa//lho yi spong ni snying rje nyid//rin chen de nyid sa bin las//nub kyi sgo yi mad ba ma la//'od dpag med pa'i sa bon dgang //byang gi sgo yi gnasu ni//
318b3(rgyud): sems kyi don yod gtso bo nyid//dang po'i dbyangs sogs sa bon gyi//zla ba'i thig le ji bzhin rim//zla ba'i 'od zer dkar rgyan pa'i//yi ge bzhi ni dgod par bya//mtshams rnams
318b4(rgyud): su ni ma ning nyid//rnam pa bzhi po sngar gsungs pa//de yi dbusu de yi sems//yi ge yis ni sbyar bar bya//sems la the tshom 'khrungs lags pas//bcom ldan bdag la ba sha du
318b5(rgyud): gsol//stong pa mtshon du med pa la//yi ge'i rnal 'byor la sogs ci//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de nyid ji ltar rdo rje nyon//mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid//snying
318b6(rgyud): po med pa'i chu shing las//snying po bdud rtsi 'bras 'byung ltar//'bras bu rnam she yis ni/gzugs med pa la ye shes gzugs//ye shes sku ni skyon med pa//mtshan nyid mtshon du
318b7(rgyud): med pa nyid//dngos dang dang sa med rnam par grol//yig 'bru med las yig 'bru'i gzugs//de dbus ngo bo stong pa nyid//de nyid rnal 'byer po yis gzung //ji ltar mtshan nyid
319a1(rgyud): na turgyun rgyu tun nan/dus na nan du rgyu ngadu dun / du gas /
319a2(rgyud): sa dang /nad sbyin bcas mang ba /den+ting+ge btsun pa so//d-i d+d+him+b+ha pa sa // Sh+T+ri ky-ir pos rnas par
319a3(rgyud): sno mched /dudum+b+hi'i sa pon du snyam san nI// drug / dgas ts+tsha //'drA d+hI nA nI jug par ma gyis sprin pa du sa sa
319a4(rgyud): kyil la seM dusus panam// sa brgyas pa// dag //rape shin tu madz+re swA/b+hu ba'i 'di ra 'bru ba ni//de lji dbu sbyinam
319a5(rgyud): sa pa sam na ste/ na snang dag gnas/sa pa zhin / /rgyun
319a6(rgyud): 'ang na gnas kyi sa /mas kyi mtshan nyid rnams da shiste/ sa pa'i sbyin ni//thig sa m+b+ha si la ma las ni//bla ma'i man drug brtson pa 'in
319a7(rgyud): shes ye shes kyi yang blang //lam gyi pha rol bstan bcos kyang //ma yin ring bar gyur pa min//bstan bcos rnams ni rnyed sla yang //sbyor ba de la rnyed par dka'//rnam
319b1(rgyud): 'byor pa yi thabs kyis ni//bla ma gsol pa 'debs la brtson//bla ma'i mun ngag lam b+h+yas ni//rnam par mkhas pa sna mthong bar 'gyur//mnyam gzhag dngos po'i rang bzhin
319b2(rgyud): gyis//g.yo ba med cing 'tshe ba med//yid ni chos rnams sngon du 'gro/yid ni dag cing yid ltar mgyogs//yid kyi rgyal po'i bka' drin gyis//smra ba dang ni byed par
319b3(rgyud): 'gyur//de phyir yid kyis bdag nyid kun//yid la byung bar blo ldan pas//snying khar sems sgom sdom pa ni//gal rje 'dod na yo gis bzlas//rgyu ru gyur pa'i sa bon te/de
319b4(rgyud): nyid dpyad pos ma yino//'bras bu rgyu yi sa bon te//de nyid mthong ba ma yin//gzugs sogs srid pa'i long spyod kyi//dmigs pa'i se bon rnam pa lnga//spyi bo spyi med
319b5(rgyud): yang dag gnas//kun nas kun tu 'bar bar 'gyur//rtag tu rtsa ba'i sa bon gyi//ye shes rnam shes sa bon laso//thig le sgra dang yang dag ldan//'khor ba'i longs spyod
319b6(rgyud): 'dod pa yis//yid kyi bzlas pa yang dag ldan//yi ge dag ni rnam par spangs//nges par rtag tu go 'phyang gnas//rtag pa dang ni chos kyi dbyings//rtag tu phra zhing rgyuni
319b7(rgyud): med pa//ye shes la ni rnam shes nub//ye shes dngos pos rnam shes kyi//rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim mthong 'gyur//dang por mtshan ma thams cad kyi//mer mo'i rnam
320a1(rgyud): pa mthong bar 'gyur// mtshan mA mo/rA//rnam pa'i rdul du mArmAn+tha pUr byeng //dz+ha s+yAd//rAHna kA dbyings su//phyogs bcur+ya de bzhin mtha
320a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur//gsum par nyon mongs bcom pa ni//rnal 'byor po yis rnam par brdeg/lha yi longs spyod 'dod pa yang //bzhi par yang no bstan pa'o//lha yi gzugs
320a3(rgyud): ni thams cad kyang //lnga par sems kyis brtag par bya//drug pa gzugs ni med pa'i tshe//bdun pa chos kyi dbyings nyid de//brgyud par rang 'dod rnal 'byor bya'i//spangs
320a4(rgyud): rgyus rnams kyi 'bras bu'i don//rdo rje sems dpa' snying rje che//yid nA gcig tu gyur pas na//nges par dngos po thams cad kyi//dag pa de bzhin nyid du brjod//phyis
320a5(rgyud): nai re rer dbye ba yis//lha rnams kyi ni brjod par bya//lus can rnams kyi phung po dang //khams rnams dang ni skye mched rnams//rang bzhin gyis ni rnam par dag/nyon
320a6(rgyud): mangs mi shes sgrib sbyang bya//rang rig bdag nyid dag pa nyid//dag pa gzhan gyis rnam grol min//yul gyi dngos po dag pa'i phyir//rang gis rig pa'i bde ba mchog/
320a7(rgyud): gzugs la sogs po'i yul gang dang //gzhan yang rnal 'byor pa snang ba//de kun rang bzhin dag pa ste//de phyir sangs rgyas sna tshogs dngos//kye bcom ldan 'das rnam par
320b1(rgyud): mngag pa dang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gzugs la sogs pa'o//dwa ci'i slad zhe na/gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i phyir//gsol pa/gzung ba dang 'dzin pa
320b2(rgyud): gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mig gis gzugs ni bzung bar bya//sgra ni rna bas mnyan par bya//dri ni sna yis tshor bar bya//lce yis ro ni rig par bya//lus
320b3(rgyud): kyis dngos po rig par bya//yid kyis bde sogs thob pa ni//dag pas dug med byas nas ni//bsten bya 'di dag bsten par bya//gzugs ni sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad//tshor ba rdo
320b4(rgyud): rje nyi ma ste//'du shes pad+ma gar dbang phyug/de bzhin 'du byed rdo rje rgyal//rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' nying //kun gyi ngo bo hA ru ka/mig la gta mug rdo rje bshad//zhe sdang rdo rje
320b5(rgyud): mngon thos pa//phrag dog rdo rje de bzhin sna/kha ni 'dod chags rdo rjer bshad//reg las ser sna rdo rje ma//khams dang skye mched thams cad ni//dam pa'i dbang phyug he ru ka/sa
320b6(rgyud): yi khams ni ltung byed ma//chu khams gsod par byed mar brjod//me yi khams ni 'gugs byed ma//de bzhin rlung ni gar dbang phyug/na mkha'i khamasu brjod pa ni//pad+ma 'bar
320b7(rgyud): ba 'khyil pa nyid//'di ltar lus can rnams kyi lus//phung po la sogs lha bdag nyid//bde dang sdug bsngal ji bzhin las//nyon mongs la sogs des bskyed pa'i//bskyed pa'i
321a1(rgyud): tsha la legs gnas pas//srid dang mya ngan 'das pa thob//phung po dang skye mched rnam par dag pa ste lnga pa las rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o////de nas/
321a2(rgyud): spyod pa rtog pa rnams//'jig par byed pa bshad par bya//chos rnams kun la mnyam byung ba//de nyid spyong pa gang na med//sangs rgyas seMs la phan pa'i phyir//rdzogs pa'i
321a3(rgyud): byang chub rnam gnas pa//gang zhig yang ni de nyid las//rdo rje yan lag med pa yi//shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog/skye ba'i rgya mtsho 'jigs chen por//rga ba'i rlabs
321a4(rgyud): gyis 'khrugs pa las//sems can thams cad sgrol bar byed//tshong pa dge bar 'gro ba dang //myur du dngos grub gsal byed cing /snying po'i yon tan kun gyi gnas//sems
321a5(rgyud): kyi rin che ni las byung ba//'dod don rab tu sgrub par byed//rdo rje 'dzin pas rab bsngags pa'i'o//longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sngon tan kunaM//lus 'byung 'di las ma gtogs
321a6(rgyud): par//dga' ba'i dngos grub 'byung mi 'gyur//mkhas mchog spyod pa mtshungs med 'di//grol bar 'dod pas spyad par gyis//lha yi dgra dang brgya byin dang //grong khyer sum
321a7(rgyud): brtsegs dgra bo dang //nor sprin tshangs pa la sogs pas 'bos kyi 'dam skyes mchod pa yi//sdig pa 'jig byed 'di la spyod//myur du de bzhin gshegs pa yi//gan+da
321b1(rgyud): kyi mchog ni thob par 'gyur//dang ldan rdo rje sems dpas no//gang zhig 'gro la phan par ni//kun 'dar gyi ni spyod pa gsungs//de ltar mchog tu bsam pas gnas//shin tu
321b2(rgyud): gsang ba yo gis sgom//rtog pa thams cad bral ba ni//de mtshag la ni spyod par bya//rgyu 'thun 'bras bu rang bzhin las//dang po'i rtsom par yi gi gnas//de nas bsgoms pas
321b3(rgyud): dub pa na/smras nas byis pa'i rtse bar bya//sna tshogs gdul bya'i 'jig rten la//'dzem pa'i gzugs can rang nyid skom//grub par grags pa ma lus pa//ci gsungs rnam
321b4(rgyud): po sna tshogs pa'o//spyod pa bla na med pa yis//kun bzang mtshungs pa med 'grub pas//spyod pa nges rig rdo rje can//bcom ldan 'das kyis bku' stsal to//dpe ldan slob dpon
321b5(rgyud): rdo rje can//kun gyi mgon la phyag 'tshalo//gsong ba'i spyod pas gnas nas ni//blo glos chen po bya ba byas//de nas rang gi 'dod sgyur bas//sbyor ba kun la kha phyir bltas//kun
321b6(rgyud): tu seng ge lta bur ni//de nyid ldan pas bdag gis spyad//ji ltar byung don yang dag rig/'gro ba 'don pa'i bsam pa yis//yang dag lte ba rab sbyar ba dag/brtan pa'i sem+ba/
321b7(rgyud): banas nga na/nga gi mas pags na//mas tshad rmil mi sbyar//khams gi rjes 'di dag thams cad ni//mad sa nis ni 'a chenas /
322a1(rgyud): pa b+hU/mas rnam par grol//'tsho bar dbang phyu 'du ba dang //de bzhin 'jig rten chos baspyad no//thams cad shin tu rnyong du sbyangs// tu rtog pa myu
322a2(rgyud): gyur bas//gnyi su med par nges byas nas//pha rol phyin drug rnal 'byor gyi sa//sangs rgyas dngos grub rang grub phyir//sems can don la legs nus kyang //sems tsam yongs
322a3(rgyud): brtag mi bya//byang chub la ni sems bzhag nas//phyogs las rgyal ba'i spyod pa brtsam//thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i bdag/sbyor ba kun le rgyab kyis phyogs//de nyi
322a4(rgyud): grams par rab byas pas//skye ba 'dir ni 'grub par 'gyur//rtog pa kun las rnam par grol//sems can bsam pa'i khyad par las//skyer ma ltar sogs rnal 'byor
322a5(rgyud): gyis//thams cad nyid ni bza'i bar bya//chos kyi dbyings las yang dag byung //mi mthun phyogs ni gang yang med//dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni//ji ltar 'dod par rab
322a6(rgyud): rAt+na bza'//longs spyod rdzogs don 'dre dag kun//khams gsum dag nr-i ma lus pa//sgrib pa po la phan pa'i phyir//rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sprul//ye shes mtha' ya
322a7(rgyud): thob pa yis//de bzhin gshegs phyag mi byan//rtag tu sgom pa ldan pa yis//dbang bsupa med sogs smos ci dgos//byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las//dngos po kun gyi
322b1(rgyud): rang bzhin 'di//de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can//de phyir de nyid lha rnams nyid//dkyil 'khor bsnyungs pa mi bya zhing //phyag rgya mchod rten las mi bya//dpya ldan rdo rje mgon pos ni/
322b2(rgyud): gang yang gzhan du bstun pa rnams//lhag par mos pas gnas gang yang //de rnams kyi sa kyang de nyid rig/ji ltar bdud rtsi don gnyer bos//snying pa blangs nas ngar bya
322b3(rgyud): spong //de ltar chos kyi snying po ni//thob nas rtog pa thams cad spangs//rtog med gang tshe blo ldan pas//dogs pa spangs shing gnas med pa//thugs kyi rdo rje ci gsungs bzhin//
322b4(rgyud): de tshe 'grub 'gyur the tshom med//rtog pas dmyal bar 'gro 'gyur te//'gro ba drug gi 'khor bar ni//'khor ba ru ni 'khor bar 'gyur//rtog pa med na grol 'gyur zhing //
322b5(rgyud): gnas ni dri meng zhi ba nyid//de phyir rtog pa'i dri gzhom phyir//ngamachog sangs rgyas mdzad pa gang //de ni rtag tu goms par bya//gang gis dam tshig gnas gyur pa//sngags
322b6(rgyud): shes bsam pa'i nus pas bya//dngos po kun la blta bar bya//nges par thams cad ma skyes pa'i//rnam pa yi ni rnal 'byor gyis//khyi dang bong bu rnga mo dang //glang po
322b7(rgyud): la sogs khrag 'thungs nas//sha yang rtag tu bza' ba nyid//sha chen khrag gis gos po ni//thams cad khyad par du ni bsti//dman pa'i sha ni thams cad dang //srog
323a1(rgyud): /rnams 'bum phrag brgya ldan bzal//rnam snang shin tu du pA li//sngon bu bAn+d+ha thAg b+hI DUr ldan//khyu dang mi skyugs bskyes nas ni//sha ni ts+tsha rgyu ngas/
323a2(rgyud): ldan/rnal 'byor pas ni spro ba yas//rnam snang bskyes nas bza' bar bya/rdo rje'i chu ni btung bar bya//phreng ni tshe shi yang za bar ma gyur na bzhin du rnam par rtog
323a3(rgyud): she'i ring gi ngo bos bza' bas bza' bar b+hi ste/gang zhi ba bzhin po'i 'jig rten zab de bza' bor bya'o//de kha na sgrub pa po'i dbang po gang zhig bgrod par bya ba ma yin pa
323a4(rgyud): dri la bgrod par bya ba dang /gang zhib bya ba ma yin pa de ni de'i bya ba dang /bgrod pa dang bgrod par bya ba ma yin par rnam par rtog pa dang /bza' ba dang bza' bar bya ba ma
323a5(rgyud): yin pa dang /sdug pa dang mi sdug pa dang /btung ba dang btung ba ma yin par sngags pas mi bya ste/sku dang /gsung dang /thugs mnyam par gzhag par 'gyuraro//ji ltar
323a6(rgyud): yang sems 'khrul pa ma yin pa de ltar chang rnal 'byor pas rtag tu btang bar bya ba dang /dman pas shin tu sgeg pa dang /rigs dang bcas pa dang /rigs med pa
323a7(rgyud): dang /sdug cing phongs pa'i sems can thams cad la bu gcig po'i tshul gyis rgyal ba lta bur lta ba dang /glegs bam bklags par gsungs pa mi bya ba dang /dkyil
323b1(rgyud): 'khor dang me tog bsdu bar mi bya ba dang /sngags kyi bzlas pa mi bya ba dang /lha dang dbang bskur ba la sogs pa la phyag mi bya ba dang/brdzun du smra ba dang /pha rol gyi bud med skal
323b2(rgyud): pa bzang mo bsten par bya ba dang /gdug pa can la byams pa mi bya bar gsungs pa dang /sangs rgyas dang srog chags bsad ba dang /rgyal bas mchod pa'i slob dpon dang //
323b3(rgyud): ye shes kyi dam tshig sems can te dam tshig rtag tu dngos grub sna tshogs sbyin par byed/blo dang ldan pa la phyogs bcur rnam par bzhugs pas mchod par byed de//gang gi
323b4(rgyud): phyir rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams gang zhig slob dpon gyi ba spu'i khung bu'i rtse mo la mthong ba de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i slob dpon
323b5(rgyud): la sangs rgyas kyis mchod pa byed pa mthong //nges par rang gi dam tshig sangs rgyas 'dod pas dngos grub sbyin par byed pas bla ma dmo pa la smad par mi bya ba dang /rdo rje sman
323b6(rgyud): la mi gus par mi bya ba dang /gang zhig byin pa de bzung nas mchod rten la phyag mi bya ba dang /spun dang /bu dang /pha dang /rgyal srid kyi longs spyod dang /gter dang /nor
323b7(rgyud): bu dang /'bru thams cad la rtswa lta bur mthong nas khams gsum gyi rgyal po bsgrub par bya'o//'khyud pa'am spyod pa ste lnga pa las rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o////de nas
324a1(rgyud): /yang dag pa sh+ma b+h+ya//spyod pa pa la b+h+yon mtshan nyid//gang gis rlung nas shos pa na rjem gor tshom med//mkha'agro ma sogs kator ma ni//dz+haiM
324a2(rgyud): sbyi rnyeng dang bza' bzung ni//de bzhin rnol 'byer pa yis bzla'//rdo mi khros ma'i gos bzang dang //ro/sregs rdal bas rnam par rgyan//phra chags shin tu gsang bar ni//
324a3(rgyud): mtshan mo'i dus su rgyu bar bya//bzhi mdo dang ni ri bo dang //shing gcig gi mu ni dur khrod dang //bzhir na do nas sngags pa yis//sgom pa bzang po bya bar brjod//ma mo
324a4(rgyud): khyim dang mtshan ma dang //yang na dben pa 'am pas mthar ni//cung zad drod ni thob pa yis//gal te spyod pa byed 'dod na//bdag nyid gal te 'grub 'dod pas//byis pa bzhin/
324a5(rgyud): dro spyad nas ni//sems can rje su bzung ba'i rgyur//blo ldan chen pos rgyu bar bya//zhan pa med pa'i sems kyis ni//kha dog can gyis rtag sgrub pa//ba spu'i khung bu'i rtsa bug
324a6(rgyud): namo/phyogs bcu rnams dbyung bar bya//'dzom pa'i rdo rjer rang gyur nas//dkyil 'khor par ni rab tu brtag/pAd+ma'i tshul ni nyams dga' ba 'am//chu bo 'dus pa rnams
324a7(rgyud): su yang //der gonas rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na//dngos grub myur du thab par 'gyur//phug gam ri yi rtse mor ni//shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas gnas//ji lta
324b1(rgyud): rnyed pa bzhin du bza'//zos shing zos nas gtor ma sbyin//'bras bu sna tshogs do shal sogs//'ol ma zi sogs de bzhin spras//srog chags yan ljag gos gon zhing //
324b2(rgyud): bde don gnyer la bde ba smin//res 'ga' legs sbyor zur bcag ni//bzlog pa yis ni 'don par byed//bza' dang bza' min ci rnyed pa//smyon pa'i sbyor bas bza' bar
324b3(rgyud): bya/gzhan pa'i yul 'khor grub pa dang //ri yis phug dang tshang tshing dang //gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod che//rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram du yang //der gonas shes rab
324b4(rgyud): can gyis sgom//skrag pa thams cad rnam spangs te//de ltar byas nas rnal 'byor pas//yang ni phyogs las rnam rgyal brtsam//sgrib pa kun las rnam par grol//
324b5(rgyud): phyogs bcur rnam par gnas pa yi//skye ba'i sgrib pas bsgribs pa yi//kun gyi bsam pa yongasu 'gengs//bzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa kun//sgom pas spangs shing
324b6(rgyud): rnam par spangs//'dis ni sgom pa thams cad kyis//phyogs las rnam rgyal mngon par brjod//de ltar re shig gnas byas nas//de nyid mi shigs rnal 'byor pas//
324b7(rgyud): rig ma'i lha mo 'dod pa yi//shin tu gzugs can bsdus nas bya//chus byung yid 'ong rin chen dang //rig pa 'dzin pa'i nyams dga' ma//lha yi bu mo gnod sbyin mo//
325a1(rgyud): yang nA klu mo rkang 'od du//gnas pa dang ni lha mon mo//'di nang yo gis rig ma gcig/rang gi sems la mngon 'dod pa//lcags kyu zhags pa'i rab
325a2(rgyud): sbyor bas//rnal 'byor pa yis bkug nas sgrub//nyaM bar dgos pa rgyas pa kun//ma bslangs par ni lha yis ster//rga dang nang las rnam par grol//gnyis med gnas
325a3(rgyud): gsum sdig pa med//lus kyi sbyin pa byin nas ni//phyis ni spyod pa yang dag brtsam//skal dang skal min rnam dpyad pas//de phyir sbyin pa sbyin ma bya//bza' bca' de
325a4(rgyud): bzhin btung ba nyid//ji ltar rnyed pa bza' bar bya//yid 'ong mi 'ong rnam rtog phyir//zhen pa tsam du mi bya'o//bslab dang dbang las rnam par grol//de bzhin ngo che'i
325a5(rgyud): bya ba nyid//dngos po kun gyis rang bzhin gyis//yi gis rnam dpyad snying rje che//mchod sbyin sbyin sreg dka' thub 'das//sngags dang bsam gtan rnam par spangs//dam
325a6(rgyud): tshig sdom las rnam par grol//shrIn tu rnal 'byor ldan spyod kyis//nges par sngon du lha min gang //brgya byin lta bu yin na yang //de la 'jigs par mi bya ste//seng
325a7(rgyud): ge'i gzugs kyis rnam par rgyu//sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir//rtag tu snying rjes btung bar bya//rnal 'byor btung dga' rnal 'byor pa//gzhan pa'i btung bas
325b1(rgyud): bzo ba mod//yang na dang ldan rgyal chab tshe//brtul zhugs spyod pa'ang bsgrags pa yang //gang gis dngos grub mthar 'gro ba//sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir//sgom pa po yis
325b2(rgyud): rnam bzung ba//rna ba dag le rna cha bzang //spyi bor 'khor lo rnam par 'dzin//lag pa dag la lag glangadu ba nyid//rked pa la ni ska rags nyid//rkang pa de bzhin rkang gdub bo//dpung
325b3(rgyud): pa'i rtsa bar dpung rgyan nyid//mgrin pa la ni nor bu ste//bgo ba stag gi lpags pa nyid//bza' ba mi'i cho bcu phyed de//he ru ka sbyor skyes bu nyid//mnyam par gzhag pas rgan
325b4(rgyud): par bya//shin tu bzhin bzang mig yangs ma//rang gis dbang bskur snying rje can//rdo rje bu mo 'di khyer nas//spyod pa brtul zhu gros rtogs par bya//rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos ma
325b5(rgyud): na grong zhig rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i//rigs kyis kyang ni bya ba'o//yang na gzhan gyi rigs byung ba//byang chub skye bon bcug pa yis//sbyang bar byas te khyer nas ni//gang chen
325b6(rgyud): rje mchog ldan par//de tsha glu ni blang bar bya//gang tshe dga' ba skyes pa na//thA ra pa'i rgyur ni gar bya ste//de tshe rdo rje rkang pas gar//rtag tu rnal 'byor pa yis bya//'khor
325b7(rgyud): lo'i gzugs kyi mi bskyod pa//sna cha'i bdog nyid 'od dpag mdo//mgul gyi phreng bar rim tshan bdag/lag par rnam par snang mdzad brjod//ska rags la ni don yod gam+ba//
326a1(rgyud): shes rab kha T+wAM ga gzugs can//thabs kyi gzugs kyi cang te'u//sman ni rnam par bzal bar bya//chu ni rtag tu btung bya ste//rga shis zil gyis mi no n+yA
326a2(rgyud): nga //kun tu srung bar gyur pa yinA/rkun mA'i sgrub byas rjod pa ni can//de la hUM byung sbyar bar bya//sangs rgya sr-i lnga yaM thad pa rnams//rnal 'byor spyod pas rnam par 'dzin/
326a3(rgyud): sor lnga'i dum bur byas nas ni//cod pan la ni rnam por 'dzin//thabs dang shes rab rnying bzhin las//skra yi ska rags nyes skor nyid//thal po sku yi mchod phyir thogs
326a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yi spyod pas 'dzin//cang te'i sgra ni bzlas pa ste//sems can thams cad 'gron gnyer ba'o//kha T+wAM ga ni shes rab ste//rdo rje bzlas dang sgom pa yin//thod pa
326a5(rgyud): can du rang gyur pa//rkam dang rmongs dang de bzhin 'jigs//khro dang ngo tsha'i bya ba ni//rtag tu rnam por spang bar bya//hA ru ka bdag rnal 'byor pa//rigs lnga la ni gnas
326a6(rgyud): par bya//rigs lnga dag dang mnyam ldan par//rigs ni gcig tu rnam par brtag/rigs gcig du ma nyid kyis ni//gang phyir dbye ba bskyed mi bya//bdag nyid kyis ni
326a7(rgyud): gnyid spangs nas//the tshom med par spyod par bya//dpal yang dag bar sbyor ba las byung ba las spyod pa'i brtag pa ste lnga pa'o////lha lags mnyan par 'tshal/
326b1(rgyud): lags na//rang byin rlab pa'i rim ci lags//gsang ba la sogs dgongs pa ci//rdo rje sems dpa'i snying rje che//yid ni gcig tu gyur par nyon//thams cad rgyud kyi glung na phab
326b2(rgyud): pa/mdor bsngos nas ni bsgrag par bya//aM yi rnam pa gang gsungs pa//gnas kyi mtshan nyid mi gsal bar//'gro dang rjesu 'ong ba nyid//khams dang sems kyi rtag
326b3(rgyud): 'gro ba'o//khams shes bya ba'i sgra ru lags//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'di ltar gsang ba'i yi ge bcu drug brjod par bya ste/ra yi rnam pa khrag gi kham//
326b4(rgyud): ha ni de bzhin reg bya nyid//s+ye ni ben kan zhes byar gsungs//pa yi rnam pa sems nyid dang //ra yi rnam pas ro nyid de//mus ni de bzhin lta tshel dag/rA ni mo nyid du ni
326b5(rgyud): gsungs//mu yI rnam par sha ru gsungs//sa yi rnam pa bshad par gsungs//rba yi rnam pas de bzhin tshol//kAt+ma ni lpags pa nyid du gsungs//ni yi rnam pas rus
326b6(rgyud): pa nyid//sa ni gci ba nyid du gsungs//da yi rnam pas zlo ba nyid//s+thi ni pad+ma nyid du gsungs//shin tu mdzes pa'i rdzis dang ldan//ta yi rnam pas khu ba ni//byang chub
326b7(rgyud): sems las byang ba yin//rtsa yi sgra yi rang bzhin las//de ltar lha mo bsgrags pa yin//byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las//cha yi bdag nyid 'gyur ba nyid//ri ni mi zhes
327a1(rgyud): bya bar gsungs//khrag las la bris pA yang dag blangas+ho//mtshan nyid gcig 'dod bad kan las//rdul dang chu rgyus yang dag byung //de yi mgon par//
327a2(rgyud): brjod pa'i rlung //hA ni kun tu 'gro bar gsungs//rus pa'i mtshams ni 'di rnams//sa bon lnga ni yang dge btag/rkan tu re dang thams cad du//sa bon bzhi ni dam pa
327a3(rgyud): nyid//dang pa'i re mig gnas der ni//sa bon lnga ni mdzes pa nyid//hA ni dbyings kyi drug ldan pa//rnam par shes par yongasu grags//hA yi rnam pas thams cad du
327a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par sbyor//sgra yi tshul las byung ba ton zhing //dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul nyid//'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba//thog ma dbus
327a5(rgyud): mtha' yang dag gnas//srub dang sgrub byed sbyor ba las/ji lta ba ni de bzhin no//sngags bzlas bsam gtan la sogs ldan//rgyu de las gsungs pa mnyan par
327a6(rgyud): gyisak+Shartsa gnyis skye gnas dbus ni//g.yon dang g.ya su de bzhin du//g.yon du khu ba rnam shes bya//g.yas pa la ni khrag nyid de//de yi phan tshun bsdu ba yang //
327a7(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings ni bsdud pa yin//snying stobs sku dang rdul dag bcas//mun pa sems kyi rang bzhin las//snying stobs khu ba rin chen rdul//mun pa skyed par byed pa
327b1(rgyud): //rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas//dngos dang dngos med ro gcig 'gyur//gshang ba gtso ba bad kan dang //khrag dang lnga pa khu ba nyid//bdud rtsi lnga yi yong bu dngos//de phyir
327b2(rgyud): rdo rje can+da du brjod//rus pa rkang dang khu ba ni//pha las skyes par de bzhin gsungs//lpags pa dang ni sha dang khrag/ma lus smyos pa zhes byar be sgrags//grong bu'i bsdu ba
327b3(rgyud): rnams kyi yang //tshad ni 'di dag gsungs pa ste//gong bu gcig pu gnyi su 'gyur//gnyisu gyur pa du ma rnams//gcig pu du ma'i rang bzhin gyis//de phyir rdo rje can 'dir
327b4(rgyud): gsungs//rtsa yi spyod yul nyid gsungs pa//de yi sgo yang de gnyis la//de rnams 'du ba'i dus su ni//lha ni dmigs par 'gyur ba yin//steng gri sgo dang 'ag nyid de//
327b5(rgyud): 'og gri sgo ni rnam par shes//steng gi sgo ni dbyings nyid do//rtswa ni thams cad mnyam sbyor bas//rnal 'byor pas ni 'jug par bsam//dwe yaM lus kyi steng sgo la'ang //rdo rje
327b6(rgyud): n+dan gyi rtag rgyun bzhugs//stang gi sgor ni sbyor ba gsum//sgo dgu rnams kyis yong su bskor//kyai/bcom ldan 'das sbyor ba gsum ni ci zhes bshad//ji ltar gang
327b7(rgyud): gi rnam pa yis//sems kyi rtag tu 'gro ba logs//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gsum nyid sbyor ba sbyor ba gsum//rnam gsum dbye bas rnam par gnas//
328a1(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin gyis//tha ma 'bring po dam pa nyid//ka ba gcig da sgo dgu pa//sbom po lnga ni lhag pa'i lha//bug pa dgur ni son pa'i sgo/
328a2(rgyud): dgu yi rnam par yongasu grags//tha ma'i sgo ni skur ldan pa//sbom po lha yi sprul pa'o//sems dang skyes bu skyes bu can//khyad par rnal 'byor pa yi don//rtag par kun
328a3(rgyud): tu dus su ni//'gro dang 'ong ba'i khyad par las//rkang med rkang gcig rlung gnyisde dang //rkang bzhi las ni sogs pa yi//rlung la sogs pas rab dbye bas//rtag tu 'gro ba
328a4(rgyud): rlung rnams bzhi//sems kyi gnas pa rnam pa gnyis//nub dang rab rgyu'i cho ga yis//rtag tu nub dang rab rgyu ba//sems can kun la 'gro ba'o//de ltar gang zhig mi rig
328a5(rgyud): bya/sems med skyes bu med pa dang //yid dang ldan pa med pa dang //rnal 'byor pa yi don med pa//mi nyid gang dang rlung dang ni//dbang chen dang ni de bzhin chu//'khor
328a6(rgyud): lho sems kyi kun spyod pa//steng dang ngos dang drang 'og 'gro/zla ba nyi ma'i rab dbye bas//gsum pa'i sgo ni yid dang bcas//rngub dang dbyung ba gnyis ka yang //sgo
328a7(rgyud): yi dam pa nyid yin to//gtso bo dam pa yi ni sgo//steng dang 'og tu rab tu grags//'og gi sgos ni rnam par shes//steng gi sgos ni dbyings nyid do//rnam snang la sogs sangs
328b1(rgyud): rgyus rnams//steng gi sgor ni g.yo zhing gnas//de rnams 'og tu rnam par gnas//stong gis gshog su gsos pa nyid//dbugu dang gshesasu dkrol ba yi//tshul gyi sems kyis
328b2(rgyud): rtag tu 'gro/dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang //mkha' gri rnal 'byor ma mo rnams//'jug pa dang ni ldog pa la//yon tan skyon ni rab brjod pas//bud dang sdug bsngal
328b3(rgyud): rang bzhin gyis//lhan cig skyes pa grub pa'i gnas//rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//de nas bcom ldan lha mos ni//bo la kak+ko lar
328b4(rgyud): bcug nas//sems dpa' chen po mnyes byas te//tshi ga ni 'di drag yang dag gsol//dpyid ces bgyi ba ji ltar lags//thig le bgyi ba ji ltar lags//mi phyed ma sogs
328b5(rgyud): ji ltar gnas//de yi gnas ni ji ltar lags//pul+li ra sogs ci gsungs dang //'khor lo bkod pa de bzhin gzhan//ji ltar rtswa yi rdzogs pa yi//de yi dbye ba bdag la
328b6(rgyud): gsungs//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha mo bshad par bya yis nyon//gsang ba las ni ches gsang mchog/rtsa yi rang bzhin dang /gnas la sogs pa dang /
328b7(rgyud): sa bcu dang /pha rol tu phyin pa'i sku dang /gsung dang /thugs kyi 'khor lor son pa gnas kyi nang gi rab tu dbye bas nyi shu rtsa bzhir gsungs pa/spyi bo ma la ya yi yul/
329a1(rgyud): de bzhin spyi gtsug 'bar ba 'dzin//de bzhin du ni ur+yan nyid//rna ba g.yas pa nyid du brjod//rtsi bla ma'i rgyab ni arbu tA//bzhi ni gnas shes pa bya'o//
329a2(rgyud): rna ba g.yon pa'i rang bzhin no//de bzhin go da bA rir shes//dga' ba'i dbang phyug bshad pa ni//smin pa'i dbus bla nas rab tu bskul//de bzhin mig dag lha mo'i
329a3(rgyud): malapa/lag pa'i na bar sprul pa//de ltar nye ba'i gnas nyid de//thugs kyi yo d+mor lon rnam par gnas//gnas kyi khyad pa de rang bzhin gyi//mu nga'i spyod rnams
329a4(rgyud): yang drag bshad//mchan khung kA mu ru pi nyid//nu ma o trer rab tu grags//'di dag zhing du yang dag brjod//lte ba traM sha ku nir brjod//sna yi rtse mor kau sha lA//1
329a5(rgyud): ba'i zhing du brjod pa'o//kha ni ka ling ka ru brjod//mgrin pi laM pa ka ru gsungs ts+tshan+do ha zhes rnam par bshad//sgying ni kiny+tsi ra brjod pa ste//dbang po hi mra la ya nyid//
329a6(rgyud): nye ba yi ni ts+tshin+dor brjod//de ltar yul rnams thams cad du//gsung gi 'khor lor rnam par gnas//byaganas kyi khyad par yul gyi ni//sa spyod rnams kyi yang dag bshad
329a7(rgyud): rtags la yi dges lhag par gnas//gsang ba la ni khyim gyi lha//'di dag 'du bar brjod pa'o//brla ni sau khany+dzar brjed//rje ngar gnyis ni gser blang gi/rang gi ngo bo rnam
329b1(rgyud): pAr+ya bshad//nye ba yi ni 'du ba nyid//sor mo na ga rA ru brjod//rkang pa'i rgyab ni sin+nar nges//dur khrod du ni yang dag brjod//mthu bong la ni ma ru zer//dbus me ku lu tA ru brjod//
329b2(rgyud): 'di dag nye ba'i dur khrod nyid//mkha' 'gro mar ni gsungs pa'o//'di dag yu la dang rang lus skyes//rang gi na dang phyi rol gnas//sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo la//nyi
329b3(rgyud): rtsa bzhir phye ba yis//mkha'agro ma ni kun gyi gnas//thams cad du ni yang dag bshad//'di rnams gnasu ma' 'gro mo//rtswa yi gzugs kyis yang dag gnas//drug pa la swe
329b4(rgyud): rab tu byed pa dang po'o////de nas gzhan yang dmA pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ji ltar gan su son pa'i rtsa'i 'khor lo bshad par bya'o//snying gri nang san pad+ma ni///
329b5(rgyud): mdab mo brgyad pa snying por bcas//de yi nang du son pa'i rtsa//mar me'i rang gi ngo bo ca ni//chu shing ga ni me tog ltar//brkyang zhing kha ni 'og tu'o//de yi nang gnas dpal
329b6(rgyud): bo ni//yungs kar gyi ni sbom phra tsam//mi shigs hUM gis sa bon ni//kha ba lta bur 'dzag pa nyid//lus can rnams kyi snying dga' ba//dpyid ces bya bar rnam par bshad//
329b7(rgyud): rgod ma'i me yi gzugs kyis ni//bdag med ma ni zag ler brjod//las kyi rlung gis bskul ba yis//lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du ni 'bar//dpyid thob pa yi chog shes
330a1(rgyud): pas//snyoms par 'jug pas rnam par gnas//dpa' bo shrI ni he ruH/'di ni dpyid kyi thig ler brjod//rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs 'dzin ma//
330a2(rgyud): rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas par gnas//sku gsung thugs kyi dbye bas ni//sgo ni rnam gsum 'byung ba las//'gro ba dang ni 'ong bar byed//'di ni kun gyi lus la gnas//lta
330a3(rgyud): bor a ya~M gzugs kyis ni//thung ngu ru ni rab tu grags//snying la yang nI hUM nyid ni//ring po mu mo gnyis dang gnas//mgrin par oM gyi gzugs kyis ni//ma mo gsum
330a4(rgyud): brjod pu lu ta//dpral bar he gis rnam pa 'di//sgra dang thig le mI shigs pa//'khor lo bzhi ni rab dbye bas//sa sogs 'byung ba chen po dang //thun bzhir byin
330a5(rgyud): gyis brlabs pa dang //pad+ma bzhi las byung ba dang //dga' ba bzhi yi ngo bo yis//rnal 'byor bzhi yi mngon du'o//mchog tu dga' ba'i ngo bo yis//bya dang byed
330a6(rgyud): pa'i dngos po las//rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs kyis ni//'di ni ji ltar bde bar rol//mdab ma rnams kyi gzhi la yang //'byung ba bzhi yi rtsa rnams ni//mar me'i
330a7(rgyud): rang bzhin lta bur ni//phyogs bzhi la ni rnam par gnas//rtsa rnams bzhi yang mtshams rnamasu//rnam par gnas shing der son pa'ang //bdud rtsi lnga ni 'bab pa ste//
330b1(rgyud): de mchod rlung po gzugs gnas pas//de yi dngos po'i'o ngo bo las//mchod pa bzhin rnam par bshad//lus kyi snying gi nang du ni//rtsa lnga rnams ni rnam par gnas//sku gsung thug
330b2(rgyud): kyi dbye ba yis//nyi shu rtsa bzhi nye bar brjod//gnas sogs dbye ba la gnas nas//gnas dang gnas la rnam par gnas//spyi bor yang dag byung ba yi//rtsa na spyi bo skyes zhes brjed//
330b3(rgyud): rdul dang snying stobs mun pa'i tshul//de yi nang nas gtso mo ni//pul+li rar ni mi phyed ma//so dang sen mo 'bab par brjod//'brar ba 'dzin pa phra gzugs ma//de bzhin rA/
330b4(rgyud): deng ba spu 'bab//ur+yan gnas ni chen po la//rtse ba ma ni rnam par gnas//rno ba g.yas par gnas nas ni//lpags pa dri ma 'bab ma gnas//arbu dar ni g.yon pa ma//
330b5(rgyud): mkha'agro ma ni sha 'bab ma//gang zhi ba chu rgyas 'bab pa'i rtse//ba yi mchog sbyin rnam par gnas//de ni sra ba'i tshul gyis gnas//zung ngu mar ni rnam par bshad//gang
330b6(rgyud): zhig dge' ba'i dbang phyug gnas//de bzhin rus sbal skyes mar grags//sra bo'i dngos po gnas pa'i phyir//rus pa'i phreng ba 'khrugs par gnas//lha mo'i mkhar du gang
330b7(rgyud): zhi ba rtsa//'jam pa sgom pa ma ru brjod//de ni rtag tu mtshon pa 'bab//thams cad lus la rtag par gnas//mA la bar ni dbang ma ni//rgyal ba'i dbang phyug snying la gnas//
331a1(rgyud): d+hA ni gang zhig mig 'bab ma//'dod pa'i gzugasu rnam par gnas//gzugs ni mthong bar 'dod pa ste//skyon bral mA zhes rnam par bshad//oM
331a2(rgyud): Der mkhris pa 'bab pa'i rtsa//gang zhig mjug ma chen mor brjod//tri shaM ku ner byung ba ni//mA myo nges par glo brla bcas//kau sha ler ni mtshan mo nyid//sgyu ma phreng bzang
331a3(rgyud): khyab cing 'bab//ka ling kar ni bsil sbyin ma//ngos kyi chu rgyus yang dag bA shad//tsha ba mA ni lto gnas nges//laM prA kar ni rab tu grags//chud ma nyid ni kIny+tsi ra gnA//
331a4(rgyud): thams cad du ni bshang ba 'bab//mtshams kyi mtha' yi nang du yang //kha yi gnasu rangs pa'i gdong //shin tu gzugs can bad kan ldan//yi dgas lha gnas yang dag
331a5(rgyud): gnas//gang zhig rtag tu rnag 'bab pa//khyim gyi lhar ni yang dag gnas//mkha' glo dam pa'i dbang phyug ma//sgyu ma nyid du rnam par bshad//ser ltar ni gang
331a6(rgyud): zhig rtsa//rgyu sbyin ma ne dmar po 'bab//rdul ni 'bab par gyur pa ni//gAsar glang du ni yang dag bshad//yan log gzi brjid kun khyab pa//sbyor bral mar ni rab
331a7(rgyud): tu grags//na ga rar ni sdu gu ma//tshil can sbom zhing myos byed 'bab//sin d+hung shin tu grub ma nyid//mya ngan 'chi ma 'bab mar brjed//ma rung gnas ma lud skam
331b1(rgyud): 'brub//'tshod pa ma thos rnam par bstan// lu t+tArA ni yod bzung ma//shA dang skyabs ni 'brub man//drug pa las/rdul rgyu dko pA rab tu da blag ny-i su da //
331b2(rgyud): lags mnyan par 'tshal lags ni//nang gi dkyil 'khor mchod pa las//sdigs pa'i las ni ji ltar lags//sbyin srog las ni mI'i tshul bas//bde ba chen pos
331b3(rgyud): ba shadugasol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/he ru ka la sogs pa'i lha//rtsa gzugs mdzes par yang dag byung //lus kyi dkyil 'khor nyams dga' bar/
331b4(rgyud): sku bzhir ji skad gsungs pa'o//rang gi yan lag brgyud byung bas//ka ba dwe mIs bsgyur nus gnas//dngos po kun gyis minyam pa'i phyir//gru bzhi par ni rab tu grags//sku
331b5(rgyud): gsung thugs kyi ngo bris ni//dkyil 'khor 'khor lo gcig tu gsungs//ri ni mgo bo'i ze 'bru la//ji ltar rtso mtshon la sogs ri mo//bla ma'i dus thabs rim nyid kyis
331b6(rgyud): de ni rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gnas//rkang pa'i mthil du rtsom tshan rlung //gzhu yi dbyibasu rnam par gnas//sum mdo yi ni gan su ni//de bzhin gru gsum 'bararlab
331b7(rgyud): nyid//zlum po'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni//chu ni lte bar rnam par gnas//snying kar yang nis nyid de//kun nas gru bzhi pa nyid do//sgal tshigs dbyug gu'i gzugs kyis ni//
332a1(rgyud): /rab ri rdzas de bskrun no//don ste hU~M Ar glan sa //dam sgyus mdA bA mA sum cu gnyi/b+hU smA da /sal byed mdzes par gnas//sum r+tha
332a2(rgyud): gnyis byang chub 'dod//pad+ma'i nang du sen pa dang //de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'a khor brjod//s+t+rI ba'i rnying du klad pa na//gang zhi ga gnas pa de gsungs//de ni gis na mi nga
332a3(rgyud): thig le'i gzugs can mi shegs pa//'jig rten kun gyi rtse bad//brtan pa'i bdage nyid g.yo ba'i badrug/bsalnga dang mi gas la gzugs las ni//sa bon gzugs kyi
332a4(rgyud): rnam par gnas//lus can rnams ni kun gyi gzugs//de phyir gdong nas rdzogs pa nyid//bdud rtsi'i gzugs kyis 'jig par ni//nyin dang mtshan du rnam par gnas//
332a5(rgyud): nyid kyis ni sgyu 'byed rnying //seM nI dga' bar byed pa //des ni gang ba'i dekyil 'khor ni//yin pa nyid du the tshom med//de nyid daN+DalA 'khor zhes phyir gsu ma//nga
332a6(rgyud): pa rnams kyi snying po mchog/de ni ldan cing dag cid pa'i phyir//smras ni dkyil 'khor nyid du brjod//rnga cheni sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis//'khor lor yang ni dkyil lam
332a7(rgyud): brjod//byang chub sems ni rin po che//dkyil 'khor de nyid dkyil 'khor nyid//phyi rol bcas pa'i nang gzugs kyis//sna tshogs khyab cing rnam par gnas//phyi rol
332b1(rgyud): /gzugs dang sgra la sogs//dbang po thams cad 'jug pa'o//nang ga khu ba la sogs pa//grub pa'i rdzas na rnam par gnas//phyi rol bcas pa'i nang nyid kyis//rdo rje can gyi byung /
332b2(rgyud): chub sems//sbom dang phra ba'i rang bzhin gyis//'gro ba'i gnyen gyi rang bzhin can//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yo//dam tshig don du gsungs pas ni//dkyil 'khor
332b3(rgyud): goms pas skye ba 'dir//sangs rgyas nyid ni thob par 'gyur//nyan thos rnams kyis sangs rgyas dngo //de bzhin rang rgyal rnams kyi dang //tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams kyi//
332b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor goms pas rdzogs pa nyid//shes rab mo ni cher 'bar bar//nang gi khu ba la sogs dang //de bzhin phyi rol gzugs sogs kyi//sreg rdzas kyis ni sbyin sreg
332b5(rgyud): bya//skye mched drug dang khams rnams dang //phung po la sogs khyad par las//de rnams kyi ni gzugs can lha//de bzhin mkha' gro ma nyid ni//des ni de mchod gang gi phyir//
332b6(rgyud): rnol 'byor mchod par yang dag bshad//zod pa 'di ni mgo bo nyid//sreg rdzas kyi ni snod du gsungs//blugs bzar ro mAr bA shad pa ste/snying gi 'khor lo brkyang ma dag/
332b7(rgyud): dbang gzar zhes byar yang dag brjod//thab khung lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du//las kyi rlung gis bskyod pa yi//tshangs pa'i me ni sum mdor gnas//sgra ni sngags zhes brjod
333a1(rgyud): pa ste//bzlas pa 'khor bar byed pa yin//sgom pa mtshungs par snang ba nyid//dkyil 'khor gnyis med rnal 'byor phyir//lhan cig skyes pa zhon pa
333a2(rgyud): 'di//de ni rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gsungs//dkyil 'khor bdag po'i gzugs kyi phyir//slob dpon sems kyi rgyal po nyid//de snod la sogs ci gsungs pa//rgyud ni
333a3(rgyud): thams cad rtogs par bya//da dung bdag la the tshom mchis//chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang //bde ba chen po'i gzugs kyis ni//mgon po ji ltar rol par 'gyur//de rnams
333a4(rgyud): dbye ba mi 'tshal bas//bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/spyi bo lte so nu 'khor la ni//e yi dbyibasu yang dag gnas//snying
333a5(rgyud): dang mgrin par yang dag gnas//bAM gi rnam pa lta bur brjod//lte ba'i nang gnas pad+ma ni//mAd ba mA drug cu rtsa bzhir ldan//'angam skyes mdo ba ma sum cu gnyis//spyi bo'i
333a6(rgyud): rlung du rnam par gnas//mgrin pa'i nang du son pa yang //pad+ma lo ma bcu drug nyid//de yi snying ka'i gan su ni//pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad du brjod//mdab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi
333a7(rgyud): nyid//sprul pa la ni rab tu grags//pad+ma chen po mdab brgyad par//chos kyi skun rab tu bskor//longs spyod rdzogs pa bcu drug rtsibs//de bzhin mdang mo sum cu
333b1(rgyud): gnyis//bde rten ye shes chen po la//kun tu yang dag rnam par gnas//sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus ni//sde tshan brgyad kyis yongasu bskor//yig 'bru dang po'i ngo bo yis//
333b2(rgyud): 'di ni a sne yi ge mchog/chos kyi 'khor lor rnam bshad pa//hUM ni mi shigs pa ru brjod//dbyangs sgra lnga ni yang dag ldan//ya ra la was rnam par rgyan//longs spyod
333b3(rgyud): 'khor lo'i nang gnas pa//oM ni yig 'bru gsal bar byed//cha ni rnam pa bzhi rnams kyis//kun tu yongasu bskor ba'o//bde chen 'khor lo chen po la//haM ni thig le'i
333b4(rgyud): gzugs cano//g.yon dang g.yas pa'i ngos dag la//zla ba nyi ma rnam par bshad//mgrin pa nus brtsams g.yon pa'i rtswa//longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku can ma//lce
333b5(rgyud): ba'i nang du ngal sos shing //kha ni 'og tu myos byed 'bag//gang zhig lte ba las stengs rtsa//de bzhin khwa ni steng du 'bab//mgrin pa'i nang du ngal sos shing //khrag
333b6(rgyud): 'bab par ni rab tu grags//myos byed zla ba zhes byar bshad//khrag ni nyi ma zhes byar gsungs//sgo gnyis mnyam par zhon nas ni//steng dang 'og tu mnyam gnas pa//
333b7(rgyud): 'di dag zla ba nyi ma gnyis//rtsa ni gnyisu rab tu grags//dpa' bo rnams dang mkha' bro ma'i//'gro ba dang ni 'ong ba'i rgyu//nub pa dang ni 'char ba nyid//log dang sad pa
334a1(rgyud): lta bur gsungs//g.yon dang g.yas pa'i ngos la nI//dbyangs n+do bcu gnyis yang dag gnas//kha ni steng du yang dag bshad//ku la sogs pa rnams/
334a2(rgyud): kyis bskor//kha ni 'og gi gan su gnas//lhag par byas nas sbyar ba nyid//k+Sha ni sbyin pa nyid gsungs pa//'og gi char ni rnam par gnas//gang tshe mgrin par chags
334a3(rgyud): chen gyi//gzugs kyi zla ba gnas pa na//sangs rgyas rnams kyi dam pa'i sku//de tshe longs spyod rdzogs par bshad//gang tshe rdo rje'i rtser gnas pa//de chi der ni sna rtser
334a4(rgyud): ro//gang tshe longs spyod rdzogs sku yang //nub par gnas par 'gyur ba na//b+ha ga nang du son de yang //yungs kar tsam du rnam par gnas//nyi ma'i gzugs yang
334a5(rgyud): dge bshad//sprul pa'i skur ni brjod pa ste//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi//spros pa de yis bskyed pa'o//pad+ma gur dbang rgyal po ni//mdab ma 'byed pa'i sbyor
334a6(rgyud): bla can//sprul pa 'i sku yi gzugasu ni//dror ni nyi ma nub pa na//glang tshe rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems//gong bur gyur pi rnyog pa med//'khor ba'i lam ni rnam bcad
334a7(rgyud): cing //spros pa nyer zhi dge ba ste//gnyis med mchog tu dag pa nyid//dang ldan rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs//shrI ni he ru ka zhes bshad//rgyud ni sin bu'i gzugs
334b1(rgyud): can nyid//dgod dang lha dang lag bcungs nyid//rgyud ni de nyid rnam par gnas//'dod chags nyid dang chags bral yang //zos nas sbyin du gnas pa nyid//rtsa thams cad kyi myanyam
334b2(rgyud): par sbyor ba mkha' gro ma'i dra ba'i sdom pa skye drug pa las rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o////de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po la sogs pa dang /rnal 'byor
334b3(rgyud): ma bdag rjed ma la sogs pas 'di skad ces gsol to//'khor lo'i sdom pa'i lam dang ni//lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba dang //mkha' gro'i 'khor lo khyad pa dang //dgongs
334b4(rgyud): pa'i skad kyis khyad par ni//bcom ldan 'das kyiso sngar gsungs na//sdom pa'ang bdag la bsha du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rnal 'byor ma lus
334b5(rgyud): dbus gnas par//a yi rnam par sdom pa'i gnas//ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang //sdom pa de nyid rab tu phye//po la'i bde ba phyag rgya che//rdo rje skye mched thams cad nyid//
334b6(rgyud): 'dis ni gsang ba'i snyems 'jug pas//phyi rol gnyis gnyis bstan pa med//sku gsum lus kyi nang du ni//'khor lo'i gzugs kyis brjod par bya//sku gsum yongasu
334b7(rgyud): shes pa las//bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor brjod//chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang //de bzhin bde bo chen po nyid//skye gnas 'drin snying dbus ni//sku gsum po
335a1(rgyud): rlon stanas/A yAs rnamasams ldan d+he//smre ba skang la dz+ro b+hUp+na// zhig smras pa gnas brdzun byu //de la snam d+hA man//
335a2(rgyud): na sems kyi rlung nani//rgyas la la smin//rnam drug k+shi kA nag nam/sa pa nga sa spyo brjod//rdzus rnams pa la
335a3(rgyud): pa'i phyir//thams cad yod pa'i rang bzhin can//mgrin par longs spyod 'khokhar lo dang //bde ba chen po spyi bor gnas//e baM rnamA pa rgyu thun nyid//rnam+b+ha sten rjes kyi
335a4(rgyud): las+ho//skyes bu byed pa longs spyad la//bde chen 'khor mer dri med nyid/rgyu 'thun la sngags rab dbye bas//'bras bu rnam pa bzhi zhes brjod//las kyi rlung gis bskum
335a5(rgyud): ba yis//laso la bcom ldan shes rab brjod//gang zhig snal bya gnas ban+d+hanA b+hir//sprul po'i 'khor lo gnas brtan brjid//chos ni ngag lngas byung ba'i byin
335a6(rgyud): 'khor lo thams cad yod par skye//gang zhig mkhyen pa kun bak+kir bIr//longs spyod 'khor l-i kun bkur nyid//gang zhig 'di smin mgur gunas phyir//bde chen 'a
335a7(rgyud): mi dge 'dun che//sde ba sgre zhes brjod pa ste//lci ba gnas brjod po bya//skye gnas 'dod chags bral po nyid//mngal gyi khrum chis gos te//de bzhin man mkha
335b1(rgyud): da//mgo bor thal mo sbyar ba phyag/'gro ba'i bya ba khrims kyis gnas//de bzhin sngags bzlas a dang ha~M//sngags 'don skyes pa dge slong nyid//gces bu sku dang kha spu
335b2(rgyud): bregs//'di rnams rkyen gyis sems can rnams//sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med//zla ba bcu yang sa rnams te//sems can sa bcu'i dbang phyug/btsun mo'i b+ha ga bA de can du//
335b3(rgyud): khu ba zhes pa rnam par gnas//de med pas na bde med 'gyur//bde ba spangs na de med 'gyur//nus pa med phyir ltos dang bcas//lha yi rnal 'byor las bde ba//de phyir sangs
335b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas dngos po min//de nyid dngos med tshul kyang min//zhal phyag rnam pa gzugs can nyid//mchog tu bde ba gzugs med pa//de phyir 'gro kun lhan cig skyes//lhan
335b5(rgyud): cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin brjod//rnam dag rnam pa'i sems kyis ni//rang bzhin gyis ni mya dran 'das//zhal phyag kha dog dbyibs las ni//lha yi gzugs kyis rnal 'byor ni//
335b6(rgyud): skyes po tsam gyis rnam par ge nas//'on kyang bag chags phal paso//de skad lha mos bshad pa ni//rnal 'byor kun gyi gong na medo//de nas rnal 'byor ma bdagu med ma la sogs
335b7(rgyud): po lha mo thams cad la 'di lta ste/spyan dang /mA ma kI dang /gos dkar mo dang /sgrol ma dang /khro gnye ro ca na dang /bskul byed ma dang /ri khrod ma shing lo can dang /'og
336a1(rgyud): zhal ma dang /sdom pa ma dang /de dag la sogs pa ri rab kyi rdul phra rag dang mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar byar gyur cing brgyal
336a2(rgyud): ba dang /skrag par gyur to//de nas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//rnal 'byor ma ni kun gyi tshogs//bcom
336a3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bslang du gsol/de na sa bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin lo snyoms par zhugs nas rnal
336a4(rgyud): 'byor ma thams cad bslang ba'i phyir 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas nyid//'on kyang blo bur dri mas bsgribs//de bsal bas ni sangs
336a5(rgyud): rgyas nyid//bcom ldan 'das de dri bzhi no//rigs kyi bu gang zhig mi shes 'jig rten pa//btsan dug zos pas brgyal bar 'gyur//rmongs sangs de nyid yid kyis ni//
336a6(rgyud): dro yi dI nyid yongasu gcod//dug gi dum bu gang nyid kyis//skye bo thams cad 'chi bar 'gyur//dug gi de nyid shes pa dos//dug gis dug ni 'bigs par byed//ji ltar rlung
336a7(rgyud): gis zin de la//maM sha'i bza' ba sbyin par bya//bzlog pa'i sman ni rtags pa las//rlung gis rlung ni snun par byed//so sorare rtog las rnam rtog dang //srid pa nyid kyis srid/
336b1(rgyud): dag byed//ji ltar rna bar chu zhugs pa//chu gzhan gyis ni dgug par bya//de bzhin dngos po'i rnam rtog kyang //rnam par nges par snang bar bya//ji ltar 'tshed pas tshig pa la//yang na/
336b2(rgyud): me ltos gdung bar bya//dri bzhin 'dod chags mes tshig pa//'dod tshogs me yis gdung bar bya//skye bo mi bzad pa yi lus//gang dang gang gis 'ching 'gyur ba//thabs dang bcas
336b3(rgyud): na de nyid kyis//srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol 'gyur//'dod chags kyis ni 'jig rten 'ching //'dod chags kyi ni rnam grol 'gyur//bzlog pa'i sgom pa 'di nyid ni//sangs rgyas
336b4(rgyud): mu stegs kyis mi shes//'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin las//kun tu ru la lnga ru 'gyur//dga' ba chen po gcig pu nyid//dbye bas lnga ru 'gro bar 'gyur//bi la kAk+ko la sbyor
336b5(rgyud): bas/rang pa sba ba'i bag chags kyis//sra ba gti mug chos yin phyir//gti mug rnam par snang mdzad brjod//gang phyir byang sems ge shar ba nyid//gsher ba chu yi khams
336b6(rgyud): brjod//chu ni mi bskyod ngo bo'i phyir//zhe sdang 'dran pa mI bskyod pa//gnyis kyis bskyod pa'i sbyor ba las//rtag tu drod ni skye bar 'gyur//'dod chags dpag meng rdo rje yin//'dzed
336b7(rgyud): chags drod las 'byung bar 'gyur//ka ki lar ni gang zhig sems//de ni rlung gi rang bzhin ce na//don yod rlung las 'byung ba'i phyir//phrag dog don yod grub pa yin//bde ba
337a1(rgyud): 'dod chags sems yin te//rin chen khrag dang 'dod chags nyid//ser sna na mkha' las byung ba//na mkha' ser sna rdo rje yin//sems ni chen po gcig nyid/
337a2(rgyud): la//lnga yi gzugs kyis mtshon pa nyid//rigs ni lnga po skyes pa la//de la stong phrag du mi nyid//de phyir 'di dag rang bzhin gcig/bde chen mchog tu phan pa nyid//
337a3(rgyud): 'dod chags la sogs sems lnga yis//dbye bas lde ru 'gro bar 'gyur//gang ga'i klung na bye ma spyad//rigs gcig la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs//rigs
337a4(rgyud): chen lnga ni rigs ni du ma rnams//de rnams rigs las brgya phrag du ma rnams//de rnams la yang 'bum phrag rigs chen rnams//bye ba'i rigs la grangs ni med par
337a5(rgyud): 'gyur//de la rigs la grangs med rigs rnams nyid//mchog tu dga' ba'i rigs las byung ba rnams//zhes bka' stsal to//'dir gsol pa/ci gong bu'i
337a6(rgyud): gzegs tsam du nga chud pa de rnyed kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ba ci lags/bcom ldan 'das kyi sku bka' stsal pa/bye ma'i lom ni gcig pu la//sangs rgyas du ma
337a7(rgyud): dog min cing //gzir min stobs bcu mnga' ba'i lha//bzhengs shog bzhengs shig bdag gi ni//sdum par ston ma bzhes par 'tshal//rdzu 'phrul stobs kyi
337b1(rgyud): rigs kyi bu//yang dag byung ba bka' stsal pa//yang dag sbyor 'byung mtshan nyid ni//bshad par bya yis lha monyon//gsang ba la ni sna yi khams//mchog la de brnyan du
337b2(rgyud): ni rgyu/rmad gyes pa la ne mau ru bshad//thams cad bdag nyid rlung lci gnas//rtag tu bzhugs por 'dod pa 'di//sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa bdag/yang na me long gyi
337b3(rgyud): bu'i tshul//de bzhin du yang mnyam pa nyid//so sor rtog pa'i cho ga bzhin//de bzhin bye ba nan tan la//rtag tu bzhugs par brjod pa 'di//shin tu rnam dag rang bzhin
337b4(rgyud): can//de bzhin rnam par snang mdzad nyid//gzhan yang mi bskyod pa nyid dang //yang na rin tshon 'byung gnas la//yang na 'od dpagra med pa yis//gang tshe rtag bzhugs don
337b5(rgyud): de la/bdud rtsi lnga yi gong bu dngos//thig le'i gzugs ti yid lta bu//shin tu rnam dag ye shes cher//lha mo kun gyi rang bzhin can//rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar bshad
337b6(rgyud): blang ba dam pa ru ni brjod//rlung byung ngo bo 'di nyidadra ni//chos kyi skur ni rab tu grags//de ye shes rab lhan cig skyes//de phyir gnas pa'i gzugs can ma//las kyi rlab
337b7(rgyud): gis bskul ba yis//lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du ni 'bar//bdage med me zhes rnam par bshad//dpyid kyi theg le nyid du brjod//skra yi rtse mo brgya stong lus//glog gi zar
338a1(rgyud): mo mnyam pa'i 'od//lha yi rnal 'byor dus su ni//bya spu'i khung bu'i rtsa bug nas/phyogs bcur rnam par phyung nas ni//kun tu lha dang lha min bsdigs/
338a2(rgyud): snying kha chos kyi 'khor lor ni//bsregs nas longs spyong 'khor lor song //sna yi bu ga g.yas pa nas//thams cad du ni phyung nas ni//mdzod spur srong ba dag gis kyang //
338a3(rgyud): byug pa nges par phyogs bcu yi//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi//shangs kyi bu ga g.yon par ni//zhugs nas spyi gtsug 'khor lor ni/kun bsregs rnam
338a4(rgyud): par phyung nas ni/sngar gsungs nyid kyi bug pa nas//yang ni spyi gtsug zhugs par bya//sangs rgyas rnams ni bsregs pa yi//dga' ba de nas bskyed par bya/lte ba'i
338a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor phyin nas ni//snga ma bzhin du gnas par 'gyur//yang dag par spor ba las byung bu'i rgyud chen po lus dpyid kyi thig le zhes bya ba'i brtag pa'i rgyal po
338a6(rgyud): ste drug pa'o////ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni//bcom ldan bdagi ni nyan par 'tshale//de gongs pa'i skad ni co zhes bgyi//rnal 'byor ma yi rtag dam tshig/
338a7(rgyud): nyan thos la sogs mi shes pa//dbod dang lta ba dag gis kyang //'khyud dang de bzhin gnyis gnyis sogs/rgyud kyang rnam pa bzhi rnams kyiso//dgongs pa'i skad ni
338b1(rgyud): mya bsgrags pa//bcom ldan nges par gsung du bsol//dgongs pa'i skad ni skad chen porwa//da mA tshig brda ni rgyas pa ru//rdo rje snying po ngas bshad kyis//de nyid rtse gcig sems kyis
338b2(rgyud): nyon/ma na chang ba la she/'du ba ma la yo dzi hrid//'gro ba khe Ta ro nA shra ba//rus pa'i rgyan ni Ni raM su//'odra ba pro kA na ru brjod//cang te kri bai Da ru brjod//skal med du du ra zhes
338b3(rgyud): ba shad//skal ldan ka lany+dzi rar brjod//reg min Di Di ma zhes brjod//thod pa pad+ma b+ha dza naM//bza' ba tra pe tA shes bya//tshod ma mA la tre na d+ha nau//ba shang ba tsa tu se mi brjod/
338b4(rgyud): gci ba kaM sku ri zhes brjod//rang byung sr-i hrur shes par bya//khu bA ga bur brjod par bya//sha chen sha li dza zhes brjod//dbang po gnyis sbyor kun tu ru//rdo rje bo la zhes
338b5(rgyud): brjod de//pad+ma kak+ko la zhes zer//muM khi sor mo kha ru btsug pa ni//mkha'agro ma'i mtshon ma'o//g+hA g+hu/thal mo spyi bor yang dag bzhag/mor mai ma yi mtshan ma'o//g+hug+d+ha/
338b6(rgyud): mthe bong rgan po bcangs pa ni//'jib byed ma yi mtshan ma'o//mu g+hu log pas rna ba brdebs pa ni//g.yo ldan ma yi mtshan ma nyid//lu g+hu/sna rtser thal me rdi bas
338b7(rgyud): pa ni//dge ba'i gtam ni 'dri ba'o//draSh+ma ri dgas 'og ston pa//rnal 'byor ma yi mtshan mar mtshon//DA zhes bya ba skyes bur nges//De ni bu de mod de nas brjodas/bu
339a1(rgyud): zhes bya bar rengs pa nyid//sa ni de bzhin za ba nyid//ma zhes bya bra mA ru brjod//mA ni de bzhin chung mar nges//b+h+rUM zhes bya ba skyong mo nyid//d+ha zhes bya ba
339a2(rgyud): mdza' mor brjod//lu zhes bya ba bu mor des//sti ni khrag tu shes par bya//sa ni zhi ba'i btung ba nyid//phe zhes bya ba thug pa ste//bo zhes bya ba nges par bI shad//
339a3(rgyud): zhes bya ba bza' bar brjod//b+hu zhes bya ba 'du ba nyid//pi zhes bya ba dur khrod nyid//blu zhes bya ba re ru brjod//TI zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma//ga ni de bzhin l+h+wam
339a4(rgyud): nyid/s+t+rI zhes bya ba gzugs cani ma//ku zhes bya ba mkha' gro ma//kha zhes bya ba dum skyes mo//rje zhes bya ba byin pa zung //kI zhes bya ba lag pa gnyis//b+ha zhes
339a5(rgyud): bya ba gsod por smra//sra ni legs 'ongs bye ba yon//'di rnams ni yi ge re re zhing ying brda' ste/dpa' bo dang sring mor des shes par bya'o//yi ge'i dmatshig gi
339a6(rgyud): phyag rgya'i ye shes so////rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ngag gi brda' ni mi 'tshal bas//bde ba chen po be shad du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
339a7(rgyud): stsol pa/mdor bsdus nas ni bshad bya ba//de ni nga yi bshad kyis nyon//po taM gi zhes bya ba ni phya'o/pra ti po ti gi zhes bya ba ni phyag gi yi no//ga mu zhes bya ba

339b3(rgyud): sbyin zhes brjod pa ston//bar ho zhes byu ba ni//zhes brjod pa yin//shA blan nas bye ba sbyin pa'o//san+d+ra nas bya ba ni bdud rgyu'o//nA re zhes bya ba n+ti m+b+hanyam par sbyar ba

339b6(rgyud): la dul/hU~M hrIn zhes byA ba nI b+h+yag+h+ra n+d+ha// d+hIt+tadzA d+ha zhes bya ba bak+kus zhes brjod pa In+do//T+Ta b+h+yo d+hIn skyed sa b+hA ba nA gan+d+ha du so+o/

340a1(rgyud): ni sbyin no//d+hus+thA pr-i ya dang sa nu nI raiwau//sa ritAr+tha chu ba'aM//oM gulpA nr-i yan lab dang ny-id lag/bA da ni nA kha//ra dza ka ni l+yA'o//An+ma nA sa ra/tra
340a2(rgyud): ka ta ni rgyal mtshano//ts+tshan+don phreng ba'o//tsa la ni rlung ngo //mig pa ti ni phyog so/man+da l-i ni mnyam pa'o//s+ya sa nI lam gyi bzhi mdo'o//badz+ra sha ni skye ba'o//ma hA k+ShA ra ni
340a3(rgyud): phyugs chen po'o//rgyu no ra'o//nu zhes bya ba ni skyes pa'o//b+h+yo zhes bya ba ni ba klung //me zhes bya ba ni ma he'o//b+hi zhes bya ba ni bza' bya'o//hi zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs so//
340a4(rgyud): yaM bya ka zhes bya ba ni rgyal po'i skyes bu'o//sgo zhes bya ba ni granas so//mu khaM s+pha ru na ni thosau zhes bya ba'o//dAn+ta s+pho R+sha na ni 'drang so zhes bya'o//ha~M zhes bya ba ni gang yang
340a5(rgyud): rnam grangaso//hriM ka ni ngo che'o//shu n+yA s+phaR+sha na ni ma thun gyis shig ces bya'o//u ru s+pha dra ne ni de ltar gyis shig ces bya'o//dag gi brda'i ye shes so//mnyam par
340a6(rgyud): rlig shul dpral ba can//rtag tu ltung bar byed pa brjod//dbang gi ste sbyangs grwa yon na gnas//gdon pa na ni gzugs brnyan gnyis//g.yas pa'i chal dgug pa
340a7(rgyud): nyid ga gnyis ni steng du sbyar bar bya'o//dbu ma rings pa'i sgra stengs nyid//oM rtse mo'i dbusu gnyis//dud 'gro ste stangs bsad pa la//sna yi rtse mar gzugs partan
340b1(rgyud): nyi//dbyung ba gnyis kyis ltung bar byud//bum pa yis ni dbang du byed//dgang pa yi ni dgug pa nyid//zhi ba nyid kyis rengs par byed/rlon pa'i shring la ltung byed nyid//mo
340b2(rgyud): tog la ni dbang du grags//rdo rje shing la dgug pa nyid//g.yo bci ste rtsal rengs byed nyid//zla drug goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis//'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom meng //'di la
340b3(rgyud): 'khrul par mi bye ste//sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab//slob dpon gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas//shin tu phyag 'tshal dpal ldan ni//rdo rje sems sogs rnal 'byor
340b4(rgyud): gyis//g.yas pa'i smin ma sbyar tshul gyis//na mkhar 'gro ba'i bsgoms pas ni//glang zhig gnas pas 'grub par 'gyur//g.yon pa'i smir sgyur pha rol gyi//sde las mchog
340b5(rgyud): tu rgyal bar 'gyur//bdud kying pung ni gzhom pa'i phyir//de nyid kyi ni rnal 'byo gyis//g.yon pa'i mig bskul zhes bya bas//dkar mo li sogs gzugs bsgoms

340b7(rgyud): snyad ma gtogs par//'jig rten rab tu grags pa yi//tha snyad du yang 'grub par 'gyur//de ltar yo gas 'jig rten dang //'jig rten 'das par bsdus par 'jug/
341a1(rgyud): logs par bshad pa'i dngos grub 'o//lha stengs kyi b+h+ya/na'o ya sheste/A ldan rdo rje sems sbyo shing // ltar dab+h+ring sad+d+hi sku ljon pas//'dor ni mi ma
341a2(rgyud): thod par ni//yungs kar cho ga bzhin du gdab//bac+doMs pa'i mar khu bzo'i byas shing //mgo bo 'bras bus de bzhini byugs//phyogs mtshams ni mkha' sa bcings pas/
341a3(rgyud): srung ba kun gyi gong na med//dpe ldan rdo rje sems sbyor zhing //tshems ni bsdums shing zhal btsums pas//dang ldan g.yon pa bsgyings 'dzin cing //g.yas par 'khor
341a4(rgyud): lo phyogs tshul gyis//gsal bar steng 'og byin gyis brlab//sa la rang gi phyag rgya bya//sangs rgyas kun dngos dngos grub sbyin//skyo ba gnyis pa'i thod par 'di btab nas//
341a5(rgyud): phyi nas ni mo'i thod pa'o//de nas btus nas bud med dang //skyes pa dang /ma ning la sogs pa dang /khro dang /'ug pa dang /bya rgod dang /mchil pa'i dngos grub mchog
341a6(rgyud): sna tshogs byed do//'ol ma saM dkar po bsgrub pa'i cho ga 'dod na glang pa dang /rta'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /'dod ni ba glang dang /ma he'i gzugs 'dzin par
341a7(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang //'dod na khyi dang /byi la dang /lce spyang gi gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /'dod na bud med dang /skyes pa'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro//ro'i kha'i bug
341b1(rgyud): papa nang du song ba ro bsregs pa'o mes bu ra nag po mang du'i 'byung po'i nyi ma la gdungs shing bdug pa byin na 'gro ba ma lus pa 'bebs par 'gyuraro//ka na ka'i 'bras bu dang //
341b2(rgyud): ma tu lung ga dang /tse tA ka dang /ba tsa dang /khyim bya'i sgo nga dang /arga'i 'bras bu rnams thams cad dadug pa las rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i 'jig rten kun 'bebs par 'gyur//
341b3(rgyud): rta gsod pa sgyu de'i zla ba dang /ny+tsA ma'i ldan shrIng dang /nga chags pa dang /sdig pa'i rnga ma dang /dug tu nges pa'i bad+ma'i cha dang ldan pa 'das de rnams cha bsnyams te lag pa
341b4(rgyud): la byugs na ba glang gi snar 'gyuraro//de na ke ra'i 'o mas tra nA ra nyi ma bdun du blugs nas nags kyi mi zhag bdun spangs te/de bzhini du kha tI kas byis pa'i lag pa dag gis reg
341b5(rgyud): naklu'i dbang po'i dug 'byin par 'gyuraro//'di'i phyir bzlog pa sbyin par bya ste/ma la ya las byung ba dang /nA gA saM ge sar dang /nAd kyi dbang po dang /ma da nA phral dang /

341b7(rgyud): po'i rol bu zos na lag na rdo rje wa bur ji ltar 'dod par dug btung bar bya'o//sbal pa dang /sbrul gi dang gnyis pa'i tshol bu bsdus la shweSh+ma'i shing gi 'bras bu

342a3(rgyud): nyi ma la lag pa la bcings na nyin bzhi pa 'jig par byed do//lto 'phye'i dbang po'i shun pa sar po dang /lto 'phye'i dgra'i be shog pa'i cha dang ldan par gdug pa dang
342a4(rgyud): ldan pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum po snang bar byed do//yang na kA gnyis dang /nyin mo 'jigs pa'i bu shog pa dag cho ga bzhin du gdugs paste ni 'phrog byed ma smad

342a6(rgyud): gyis byed par 'gyur//ha li ni dang /phag gi rtug pa dang /ro'i mgo skyes dang /mgrin rings kyi rus pa rnams gnas gsum gyi sbyor ba'i mchog ste nyi ma bdud gyis stod
342a7(rgyud): par byed do//rta gsod pa dmar po'i me tog dang /bA la ta ka dang /stor bu rnams kyis me long skus na rta dang /bong bu dang /rngo mo la sogs pa'i gzugs mthong
342b1(rgyud): bar 'gyur//rta dang /ba glang dang //phag dang /sgye'u dang /nga bru dang /rnga ma'i lag skyes rnams khwa myur du mes bsregs nas skal pa'i tshe lnga bu bsregs pas de rnams kyi

342b7(rgyud): ldan pa 'dod pas gnaso//so na ka'i sa bon rkang pa'i lham zung byas na chu'i steng du skyes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa lham lta bur 'chag cing 'gro bar 'gyur//mar sar
343a1(rgyud): dang /b+hU tsAg smra blo dang /dring dang //nya'i mar khwa'i tshigs mas bug pa thams cad byugs na skyes pa blo dang ldan pa chu srin lta bur rgyu bar 'gyuraro//sa bon da/

343b1(rgyud): blangs nas gang gi skye bor byin pa de skrod par byed do//khwa dang 'ug pa'i bshog pa dag dang /bram ze dang /gtsor bya ba dag pa'i sgra gcig tu byas nas da du ra'i shing la me slar

343b6(rgyud): btabyas pas skad cig gis brkyang mi dbang du byed //put+tony+dza ri dang /a par+Na dang /du ba dang /daN+Da ut+pa la lhan cig btags pa'i phyi ma dang /phyogs kyi chus sam rig pa
343b7(rgyud): nyid kyis 'gro ba'i yan lag ma dbang du byed//biSh+Nu kAn+ta dang /sra ban+ti dang /lak+Sha Na dang /a bA nA tA dang /mig las byung ba dang /phyogs kyi chu lhan cig btags pas
344a1(rgyud): /m+b+ha'i bdag pa'i brgyad mA sang skad cin gis dbang du byed do//daM na kAr dkar po'i shing gi rtsa ba dang /many+dziSh+ThA dang /mtshol pa dang /kuSh+mASh+ma dang /rang /
344a2(rgyud): gi yan lag gi rma las byung ba dang /de ga to 'di rnams kyis gnas gsum pi dbang du byed do//rA mA du ti dang /ru dan+ti dang /k+ShI rA d+hi dang /bdag gi myos byed dang bsres

365a7(rgyud): pa la sogs pa'i mi'i bu mo gzhug par bya'o//de'i dngos po med na gzhan phal pa mchog gi yan lag la hI'i sngags dgod par bya'o//yan lag thams cad
365b1(rgyud): la zhes bya b+hA ni snying kha dang /smin mtshams dang /lkog ma dang /spyi bo rnam su hrI dang /b+haM pra'i dbu su b+h+raM dgrod par bya'o//ci bcom ldan 'das gang du de rnams kyis/

365b4(rgyud): gyi rnam pa zhes bya ba kha dog dkar mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bsgom par bya'o//dbang la gdol pa mo sgrol ma khA dog de mar mo bsgom par bya'o//rgyas pa la gor/

365b6(rgyud): me tog drang /khu ba bzhugs par bya'o//de ltar sbyin sreg gis spangs par byas pa yino//dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga la yang gzhan phal pa mchog gi bu mor rtogs par

366a1(rgyud): gdab par bya zhing /rdul chen gyi dkyil 'khor dang /gsang ba chos kyi dkyil 'khor ji snyed pa'i rang gi dam tshig ste/'di skad du rnal 'byor gyi

366b2(rgyud): nas ni//me l+yA spyan n+ye drang bar bya//sngags 'dis cho ga bzhin du g.yas pa'i mthe bong dang /'jigs pa g.yo bas/oM e h+ye hi ma hA b+hU tA de bai raSh+Ta dI dzaM srat+ta ma/gr-ih+nitA

369b6(rgyud): bya la ni sta ra'o//bdun pa la ni mdung //brgyad pa la ni mda'o//dgu po ni ni lcags kyu'o//bcu pa nA ni dbyig tho'o//bcu gcig pa na kha TI ga'o//bcu gnyis pa na ni 'khor

370a5(rgyud): pra yon pa'i 'og tu ni bya rgod dang /'ug pa dang /khwa dang /seng ge dang /khra dang /man tre dang /bya rgod chen po dang /bya long ngo //de ltar gyur pa'i rdo rje 'ojigs

371b6(rgyud): min//rA yi yi ge yang dag ldan//kha dog dmar po phyag bzhi ma//'bar ba'i phreng khyab 'jigs ma ste//zhal bzhi wa yi gdong gis smras//hUM gos bkang ba nyid kyis ni//

372a1(rgyud): ni rdo rje mtshon cha yis//'bar ba dang ni khrag gI lus//kun tu 'jib par byed par ni//rdo rje mkha'agro ma ni sgom//oM badz+rI DA ki nI a mu ka sA rak+Shi A kaR+Sha ya hUM
372a2(rgyud): phaT/'dis ni rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis//khrag ni 'gugs par byed pa'i mchog/lha mo de ltar bshad pas ni//skems par 'di la the tshom med//de nas de nyid kun rdzogs nas//
372a3(rgyud): mA he'i gzugs ni 'jigs pa po//sku mdog nug pa 'jigs chen po//zhal bzhi pa dang 'jigs par mdzes//phyag brgyad pa dang zhabs bzhis spyos//rdo rje gtuni shing ral
372a4(rgyud): gri dang //'khor lo de bzhin cang tre'u nyid//g.yon na kha T+wAM ga dang ni//thod pa gzhu dang zhags pa nyid//sna tshogs mtshon cha 'dzin pa yis//rdo rje khro ba yang ni sgro//yid kyis
372a5(rgyud): bsgrub bya'i srung ba ni//cho ga yis ni bkug nas ni//des ni bsgrub bya rnam par bsam//zhugs pas bcings nas lho phyogasu//rdo rje khro bos drangs nas ni//rdo rje gzhan gyis brdag
372a6(rgyud): pa dang //ral pri yis ni dral ba dang //rgyu mnar zhing myos pa nyid//oM badz+ra rAk+ShA sa b+hak+Sha ya ti phaT//de nas khyi yi gdong byas nas//rdo rje srin po sgom pa'o//oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHbi kri tA man
372a7(rgyud): hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA//'di ni ma he'i gdong gshin rje'i gzugs kyi sngag so//khre dang wa dang bya rgod kyiso//thams cad du ni yongasu bskor//des ni bza' ba lnga na par ro/
372b1(rgyud): yid kyis bskul bar bsgom par bya//rlung gi dkyil 'khor mnyam zhon par//rdo rje mche ba rnam par bsam//de yi rgyab tu ston par ni//bsgrub par bya ba yongasu brtag/rdo rje khro bos/
