379a6(rgyud): khyad par rdzo//ye shes chen po yang dag nyon//mnyam nyid sems kyi dbye ba la ste//mnyam par gzhag pas 'khor lo brtag/zla ba'i dkyil 'khyor dbus
379a7(rgyud): gnas par//ye shes sa bon gyis ni sbrul//sku mdog dkar po bsgom par bya//pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par ni//phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo klungs
379b1(rgyud): rgan rnams kun+d+ha gyis rnam par brgyan//phyug r+b+ha tshun po phyag gnyis kyis//rlung lnga'i blan su brjer ba nyid//sku mdog dkar po shin tu mdzes//'phags pa rnam par
379b2(rgyud): snang mdzad kau ts+tsha/kun tu 'od zer sna tshogs kyis//sangs rgyas dam tshisprin gyi swA spro//zang ltar rim+b+ha pa'i cho ga yis//sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu grags//bayon
379b3(rgyud): ding g.yas pa'i lag gnyis kyis//bskor bas mang 'gro ma de ba//A la~M kA li'i sa ban nI//hU~M gI s+yAd bus brgya ba nyid//'di yis sa bon rnal 'byor pas//bsgom
379b4(rgyud): nA myur du sangs rgyas thob//brgyad pa las sngags kyi byazlas pa dang sgom pa ste rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o///'pho ba rnal 'byor mtshan nyid kyis//de hU~M ji
379b5(rgyud): rdo rje nyon//bzang po'i lam du rna lnga 'byor pa'i//'gro ba mdzes pa khyod la bstan//ye shes dbang po nyan par 'tshal//sgo rnams dgu ni ji ltar logs//ye
379b6(rgyud): sgo yi dbye bas ni//yon tan sbyin ni ji ltar lags//dus su srog ni 'chad pa yi//yang dag rab tu sbyor ba nyon//legs pa'i lam ni mdzes pa'i gnas//ngan pa'i
379b7(rgyud): lam yang skyon rnams nyid//lte ba steng nA rig le dang //mig dang sna tshogs rna ba dang //btung dang btung ba min pa'i sgo//mtshan nyid lte bar 'dod pa can//mtho ris
380a1(rgyud): thig le gzugs lus can//rnyeng nI steng du gnas pa yi//'gro dang 'ong bar yongasu grabs//sku las gnod sbyin dag tu 'gyur//rna ba dag las grub pa'o//
380a2(rgyud): lha/gal te mig las shes 'gro na//mi rnams kyi ni rgyal por 'gyur//srid pa'i sgo laswa yi dgas te//bcoM laswa de bzhin byol song so//dmyal ba brgyad ni btung
380a3(rgyud): min pas//de ltar spang phyir rigs kyi bu//sred pa'i 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid ni//gang phyir sgo yi khyad par ni//'khor ba'i dbye ba yang dag 'byung //de phyir sgo yo khyad par gyis//
380a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor pas ni mnyamo gshag pa//'chi ba'i dus kyis thob pa ni//'chi ba'i mtshan ma bstan pa nyid//rims la sogs pa ma phye ba'i//'phyo bo'i rnal 'byor dam pa
380a5(rgyud): nyid//bum pa dang por brtsams nas nI//sgo rnams thams cad rengs par byed//mchod rten rnams kyi lcags sgrog lnga//sgo yau bug pa'i sgom pa ni//do bos dam
380a6(rgyud): ba'i sgo nyid ni//sa bon chu ltar dkar po nyid//btung dang btung min ma yi no//de yi sa dron 'bar ba ltar//dwe yi dang po dbugs kyi yang //de la shin tu mnyam
380a7(rgyud): gzhag pas//dbugs ni bum pa can bsgom bya//lus kyi rlung gi kha dog dang //rlung gi dkyil 'khor soms kyis ni//rlung gi sa bon rtsa ba rnams//rlung ni mtha' yi
380b1(rgyud): rtsa ba can//thig+sa le sgra dang ldan pa yis//sems kyi sa bon gyis ni drang //rdo rje can gyi sa bon gyis//'jigs pa'i lcags kyu la sogs sbyar//gnas ni bcu drang nyi shu ni//rtswa ba ni'i
380b2(rgyud): gnas las 'jigs mas dgug/go 'phang gnas ni go 'phang ster//bug pa dgu yi steng ma so//mdzod srur sgra dkar sa bon gyi//yi ge phyed dang gnyis ni sbyar//dreg po'i sgra
380b3(rgyud): yis brjod nas ni//brgyad kyi mtha' yi sa bon gyis//'jigs dang 'jigs pa'i sde chen gyis//dang po la sogs dang po yi//yi ge phyed pas sbyar nus ni//rlung gi sa bon
380b4(rgyud): 'og mya las//sgra ni sgra yis bskul bar bya//rlung gi sa bon ldan pa dang //rlung gi dkyil 'khor sems kyis ni//gnas ni ny+dzi shu rtsa bzhir ni//de nas steng nas steng
380b5(rgyud): du mchog/rnal 'byor byA yi sgra dkar bas//steng gi yi ge bza' bar bya//bu ga dgu yi steng mchog nas//'phral du yid kyis 'pho bar byed//nyin zhing bram ze gsod//
380b6(rgyud): pa drung //mtshams meng lnga ni byed pa dang //chom rkun las kyi longs spyod pa//'di yI lam gyis grol 'gyur te//sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur zhing //srid pa'i skyon las//
380b7(rgyud): shin tu grol//dper na 'a mau las skyes pa yi//pad+ma gzi brjid dri mo med//de bzhin 'dam sogs lus kyis ni//ye shes sku ni rang 'dod pas//dus thob na yang
381a1(rgyud): 'pho bya ste//dus min lha ni gsod pa nyid//de phyir lus mtshan nyid shes nas//blo dang ldan pos rnal 'byor brtsam//rnal 'byor bsgrub bya'i khyad par wa//
381a2(rgyud): ji ltar de nyid rdo rje ljon//mnyam nyid sems kyi dngos po ni//sngar gyi mtshan nyid thams cad lus//snying gi dkyil gyi dbas gnas par//sangs rgyas lnga yi sa bon
381a3(rgyud): rnams//'di yi nyi ma'i 'od zer 'bar//ngo bo sems kyis mtshon par bya//sngar gsungs stong pa nyid kyis ni//sngar gyi mtshan nyid yang dag ldan//hUM la gnas
381a4(rgyud): pa'i sems kyis ni//gzugs la sogs pa thams cad gzhig/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//sa bon gyis ni gzugs bskyed nas//pad+mo'i gdan
381a5(rgyud): la bzhugs par ni//ye shes mkhye' 'gror bdag nyid bsam//zhal gsum pa lnga phyag drug nyid//skyon gsum dbu rgyan gyis ni brtson//bzhad dang khro zhing
381a6(rgyud): sgeg pa dang //rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//kun nga zla ba'i mdog lhur dkar//shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyis rgyan//sangs rgyas sprin ni spro bar bya//sems
381a7(rgyud): dpa'i skyil mo krung du gnas//dang por mda' ni dgod par bya//de bzhin gnyis par lcags kyu nyid//gsum par rdo rje 'phyar ba'o//g.yon pa bsdigs mdzub
381b1(rgyud): zhags pa nyid//gnyis par dpag bsam shipo lcug ma/gsum par bzhu yi tshogs khyab/'od zer phreng ba du mya dang //dbugs ni g.yo bya med par sgom/sa bon
381b2(rgyud): brgyad la sogs pa yis//yi ge rnam dgod dgod par bya//A li kA li rab 'byor pas//ji ltar btus pa'i sa bon bzhin//thams cad kha dog dkar po rnams//sa bon
381b3(rgyud): zla ba'i 'od zer ldan//pad+ma'i chu shing me tog gis//snying la sgreng skyes gzhag par bya//de yi dbu su ye shes dang //rnam par shes pa lhan cig pas//dngos po'i ngo bo
381b4(rgyud): bsgom par bya//g.yo ba med cing 'tshe ba med //de nas phyi rol rnal 'byor rnams//rnam par mkhas pas bzung bar bya//gnas gnyis kyi ni sems dang ni//rlung gi dkyil
381b5(rgyud): 'khor sems kyis ni//de yi dbus su me nyid de//de yi steng du nyi ma der/A li kA li ldan pa yi//sa bon de nyid dmar po'o//rnal 'byor pa yi khyad par du//dbyung
381b6(rgyud): dang rngug pa'i bzlas pa bya//ye shes sa bon dbu su ni//'byung ba yis ni bsnun bye zhing //rngub pas snying ka'i ye shes ni//me tog lta bur bsnun par bya//de byung dang
381b7(rgyud): dbyung min bzlas pas ni//dbyung dang rngub pa'i rnal 'byor pa//bdag nyid phyi rol du ni byed//dbyung ba'i mtshan nyid mtshon po dang //rngub pa'i mtshani nyid mchin par
382a1(rgyud): g+ha dbyung dang rngubya pa'i rnal 'byor gyis//mnyam nyid de nyid bsgoms pas ni//mnyam gzhag dngos po'i rang bzhin gyis//'grub 'gyur 'dal
382a2(rgyud): the tshom med//de nas phyi rol rnams kyi lus//sgrub pa pos ni rnam par sprul//gzhan gyi sems kyi rje su sems//rnam par mkhas pas shes par bya//skom dang
382a3(rgyud): bzlas pa'i khyad par gyis//mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis ni//legs pa'i lam ni bas mi byas nas//'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med//de nas ye shes
382a4(rgyud): gzugs kyur dang //de phyir mAr ma'i snyems kyis ni//rnam par mkhas pas las rnams byed//nyan thos la stsogs de nyid ni//legs par bya shad pa bsgrags
382a5(rgyud): da//shel ltar snyoms ni bar+d+han d+ham+b+hi nas/mar me'i rnam pa'i sems kyis ni//smyos pa thams cad da mi b+his nus ni//spros pa nyid ni spros med byung //nga
382a6(rgyud): bzhin rnal 'byor dmigs nas ni//'di dag thams cad yongasu spang //kye bcom ldan 'das ye shes gang gis ye shes khyad par du 'phags lagos/bajom
382a7(rgyud): ldan 'dis kyis bka' stsal pa/ye shes rnam pa lnga ru gsung so//gsang ba'i ma mang ye shes lha//khri za'i mi shes ste ma yin//yi dgas ye shes nyim ste/
382b1(rgyud): dmyal ba'i 'jigs shang ngu ba nyid//gta mug ye shes byol sod rnams//snoms med brtan pa la sogs pa//me la rnam shes khyad par ni//rnam pa lnga ru shes par
382b2(rgyud): b+h+yaHwa yi dbya bas ye shes bsgrubs//glen zhing lkugs pas khebs pa yi//byis pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can//ye shes de nyid khyad par can//rnal 'byor bstan
382b3(rgyud): chos khyad par las//skye ba bye ba stong phrag du//nga yi ye shes kyis bskul ba//mkhas pas rnal 'byor bstan chos la//'bad pas dad pa bskyed par bya//phyi rol bstan
382b4(rgyud): bcos sgra la sogs//dper na gar mkhan khe dog bzhin//rnal 'byor bstan bcos rjes btsal bas//bza' dang grol ba'i gnasu bya//snying po las ni snying po mchog/
382b5(rgyud): rnal babyung zhal mchog khyed la bshad//brgyad pa las mu stegs k+Sh+ma ye shes 'jigs pa zhes b+ha bste rab tu byed pa gsum pa'i///sngags rnams kyi ni mtshan
382b6(rgyud): hr-id ni//rdo rje gtso bod+d+ha la po nyo na//oM badz+ra mri ta ma hA su kha hU~M swA hA//snying po'o//oM AHhUM hUM swA hA/rdo rje sems dpa'i bzlas pa'i sngags so//oM AHAM hUM swAhA/d+ha
382b7(rgyud): mo lo//oM AHAM haM swA hA/rdo rje gzugs brnyan ma'i'o//oM A~MHi haM swA hA/'dod chags rdo rje ma'i'o//oM AHI haM swA hA/rdo rje zhi ba ma'i'o//oM AHuM haM swA hA/
383a1(rgyud): 6/6/ rje gnad sbyin+da ma'iwau/oM Ut+ma.U hU~M s+yA hA//rdo rje mkha' 'gro m+b+ha 'o//oM AHau hU~M swA hA/s+thA'i rdo r+d+he mya'i'o//A~M AHuHhaM sA hA/sa dzAr+d+ha/
383a2(rgyud): ma'o//AM AHI h+yaM s+yAH/kli ma 2//ma n+ta hA/ wa ma'o'o//a AHau ts+tsha stA hUM/mAklen du'i'o//s+yAM a sAMHe haM swA b+h+yAM/rdza rnga ma'i
383a3(rgyud): oM AHbadz+rAM ku shi dzaHha~M swA hA/rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i'o//oM AMHbadz+ra pA she hUM hUM swA hA//rdo rje zhags paM ma'i'o//oM AHbadz+ra s+pho Ta baM haM swA hA/dz+haiM r+d+he lcags
383a4(rgyud): sgrog ma'i'o//A~M AHbadz+ra g+haN+Te hoHhUM swA hA/rdo rje dril bu ma'i'o//spyan la sogs pa'i sngags ni snga ma bzhin du sngags pas bzlas par byi'o//oM ra~M swAh+mA/me
383a5(rgyud): d+h+r-ig ma'i'o//oM r-I swA hA/bdug pa mA'i'o//oM l-i swA hA/dri ma'i'o//oM l-I swA hA/mar me mu'i'o//'di dag ni rdo rje sems dbu'i 'o//oM hriHsU hA/he ru ka'i'o//
383a6(rgyud): oM badz+ra gu h+ye sid+d+ha pA rA ma yo gai shwa ri ka pA la mA lA d+hA ri Ni/ru d+hi ra pri ye sh+mi shAn bA si ni hUM phaT swA hA/dak+Sha ra mo'i'o//oM badz+ra tsaN+De shI ri kha T+wAM gi ma hA badz+dzi
383a7(rgyud): NI ka pA lo mA lA mu ku Te/A kan+na A kaD+D+h+ya sarba duSh+To hr-i di ya mA kan+d+ha ru lu ru lu b+h+yo hUM phaT/chom rkun ma'a'o//oM badz+rA pa rA dzi te pa ra maM gu h+ya ka pA la mA lA bi b+hU
383b1(rgyud): Sh+Thi tAM sarba dr-iSh+TaM m+b+ho d+hA ni pr-I ye oM d+ho hU~M b+h+yA grA wA ti badz+ra gud+d+he sh+tsa ri ba hu bi bi d+ha bo Sha d+ha ra Na sarba duSh+TA ni b+hA ra Na hUM phaT/rab tu rmongs ma'i'o//oM badz+ra be tA liM kha//khA ho ShA/
383b2(rgyud): hrI sarba duSh+TA nAM bi kr-i ta bai Sha d+hA ri NI bau kr-i tA laM kA ra/b+hU Shi tAM ha na ha na/daM ha dA ha/pA tsa pra tsi m+b+ha bI lam+bu mAM bi lam+ba sa ma ra ma nusma ra pra bi sha ye maN+Da la ma d+h+ye u
383b3(rgyud): ya/sarba hUM hUM phaT/ro langs ma'i'o//i e d+h+yai t+ye b+ha gaM wi tI badz+ra guh+yaM shwa ri br-i hu bi bi d+ha de Sha d+hA ri Ni sarba tAthA ga ta duSh+Ta sa mai ya ma nu s+phA ra hA nA hr-i nu/raMb+h+r-i raM gaM/
383b4(rgyud): raM gA pa ya rU gU pa ya/pU ra ya pU ra ya/A bi sha ya A bi sha ya/sarba b+hU tAn+sa/nat+tanar+t+ta/nar+N+Na pa ya nan+d+ra pa ya haHhaM h+ye ha ha hUM hUM phaT/puk+ka pI'i'o//au badz+ra shwA
383b5(rgyud): lA glau b+hIn+na b+hin+da s+yAn duSh+NA hr-i da yAM kr-iR+ShA ya kaR+Sha ya ha na ha naM/d+yA hA da ha/ni mtho narmi tha/mA ra yA m+bA ra yA/mU b+hi lam+pAm+b+ha bi lam+ba se mr-i ye ma nA smA ra hUM hUM phaT/gang
383b6(rgyud): pa mo'i'o//au bar+d+ha mr-i hi shwa ra hU~MhUMhaMhUMHru lu ru lu b+h+yo hU~M hUM phaT/b+hak+ShA yai sar+b+bA duSh+TAn+tir+m+ma tha hri da yaM hUM hUM phaT swAt+su/g+hAsmA rI'i'o//oM suMm+b+ha ni dIp+ta sa ma yA
383b7(rgyud): badz+re hUM phaT/he ru ka dang mtshungs pa'i'o//oM badz+ra bai shaM hU~M swA hAM/gling bu ma'i'o//oM badz+rI bI Ne hUM swA hA/paM wang ma'i'o//oM badz+ra mu kun+d+re b+h+rUM swA hA/mu kun dal/
384a1(rgyud): oM badz+ra mU daM go hUM swA hA/rdza rnga ma'i'o//oM badz+ra bA Da bA mu khai yo gI shwa ri h+niHhI hAM hi hAM hAM dzaT+Tarta kAdod mA'i'o//oM bradz+dzi daSh+mA ba dwA ha mu khi tI ba
384a2(rgyud): /rdorje blag gdang mAts+tsha/oM hrIn s+yAr+b+ba sa ni sa~M \u0f7fna nA des k+Shasa~M d+hani n+ti ts+tshin hU~M baT+Te/sang gA'i gdong mchin//oM badz+nyAd+ha
384a3(rgyud): ni ma hA yak+Sh+mI Ni shwA nA rU pi NI myA s+t+rI p+sA lA ya nairni dak+to me ru prA NI twAM nut+tATAM traT hoH/b+h+yo gdong mi//swAhA/zhes bya ba ni thams rgyud du'o//'di rnams ni dpal
384a4(rgyud): h+yaM ru kI 'khor dang bi tsaM saM pa'i'o//oM ai swA hA/bdag med ma'i'o//au AM s+yai hAM/rdo r+t+r-i mAH'o//au ai srAh+ni/dkar mo'i'o//au I srAd+h+ma/chu'i rnal 'byor ma
384a5(rgyud): 'o//au UM s+yA hA/rdo rje mkha' g+h+ra myA'i b+h+yo/ai s+yAM swA hA/puk+ka s+thi'i b+h+yo//au r-i skA tAM/ri khrod ma'i'o//au r-I skAhA/gdol pa mA'i'o//ail+lI swA hA/gA yu
384a6(rgyud): mo'i'o//i l-I swA hA/dkar mo'o'o//oM ai srA hAM/chom rkun ma'i'o//oM aM swAhAM/ro langs mA'i'o//oM au swA hA/g+hasma ri'i'o//A~M au swA hAM/sa spyod na
384a7(rgyud): 'o//oM i swA hA/mkha' spyod ma'i'o//'di rnams ni bdag med ma 'khor dang bcas pa'i'o//oM de ba pi tsu badz+ra hU~M hUM hUM phaT swA hA/kye'i rdo rje'i snying po'o//
384b1(rgyud): hU~M lauk+ka k+ShA pa hUM hU~M hU~M phaT+Ta s+yA h+mA/phyag gany+dzi sa pa'iSh+To//oM dz+wa la dz+wA la b+h+yo hUM hUM b+h+r-i phaT swAny+tsa/phyag bzhi pa'i 'o//A~M krA Ta ko Ta bAdz+ra hU swA hUM phaT swAh+ma/phyag drug par
384b2(rgyud): ho//au nam+bo b+haM gai wa ti b+hai raM shA ya hUM hU~M phaT/AM ma hA kalpA g+ni n+t+r-i b+h+r-i yaM hAM hU~M phaTaM/au dz+r-I D+ha mu ku Tot+ka nA y+ya hUM hUM phaT/aM daMSh+TaM kai r-I lau gra dz+nye Sha NAM mu khyA ya
384b3(rgyud): hUM hU~M phaT/oM sa hA swa b+hu dza b+hA su rA ya hU~M hUM phaT/oM pA rA shu pA sha d+ye taM shU lo khaM T+wAM ga d+ha ri Ne hUM hUM phaT/oM byA g+hi dzi nAm+ba ra d+ha R+R-i ya hUM hU~M phaT/oM mA hU d+hu mAn+ta
384b4(rgyud): kI r-I rba puMSh+Ta ya hU~M hU~M phaT/phyag 'bumo pa'i//oM shrI hu~M he ru ru ka~M badz+ra TI ki nI dz+wA la sa~M ba ra hU~M hU~M phaT swAhA/dur khrid lA dgyes pa phyog gnyis bag
384b5(rgyud): oM shrI he ru ka badz+ra sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu dra pra b+haM dza ka hUM hUM phaT swA hA/drag po'i gdin tsan phyag gnyis pa'i'o//aM hrIHhaM hA hU~M hU~M phaT/rig po'i rgyal po'i'o//'di
384b6(rgyud): /rmabs nI he ru ka 'byung bI'i sngagaso//oM badz+ri pi raM tsa ni yau spr-i hA/yau gA bcu po 'di rnams ni mkha' gro ma'i rtsa ba'i sngagaso//aM mAM rI n+yai swA hA/'odra zer can gyi snying po//
384b7(rgyud): oM mA rI ts+yai bat+tA yi ba dA lI ba rI li ba ra ha mu kha swAh+ma/nye ba'i snying po'i sngagaso//au pi shA tsi par+N+Na sha ba ri sarba mA ra pra sha ma ni hUM hUM ma ho da ri phaT/rai khrod ma shing
385a1(rgyud): lo can gyi'o//oM badz+rA ku shAR+ShA ya hUM/oM badz+ra pA sha bAn+na hUM/oM badz+ra kA li tardza yu hUM/oM badz+ra muSh+Ti brIh+na hUM/A~M badz+dza kI li k+ShI la ya hUM/oM baH
385a2(rgyud): mud bA rA ko Ta ya hUM/sngags 'di rnams ni shin tu grub pa ste/don yod pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa'o//oM badz+ra DA ki nA e mi ba l-i br-Ih+ma gr-ih+Na hrI phaT swA hAM/oM dzaMH
385a3(rgyud): hU~M baM hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM dri sh+ya hoHde ltar lan gsum bzhi lngar bzlas nas gtor mA sbyin par bya'o//rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i gtor ma'i sngags//oM khi khe khA hi khA
385a4(rgyud): hi sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa saun+na b+hU ta pre ta pi shA tsi un+ma dA pAsmA ra DA ka DA ki n+yA da yaH/i mi bri yau br-Ih+nA tru sa ma ya rak+Shan+tu sarba sid+d+him+me pra yets+tshan+tu hUM hUM phaT phaT swAh+ne/
385a5(rgyud): 'byung po thams cad kyi/gIt+k+r-i r-i me'i sngags so//au ki Ti kiM Ti badz+ra hUM/byin gyis brlab pa'i sdig so//oM AHhUM sho d+hi ya sho d+haM ya rek+Sha rak+Shi hUM phaT/sa skyes
385a6(rgyud): pa'i rdzag so//oM badz+re DA kIR+ShI hUM phaT s+ye hA/A~M gau rI hUM phaT swA hA/oM tsaN+Da lI hUM phaT swA hA/oM bai trAM lI hUM phaT swA hA/sngags pas cho gaste bsnun pa dang /bsod pa
385a7(rgyud): dang /dgug pa dang /gar byed pa'o//oM badz+ra si ha nAM A~M swA hA/oM badz+ra byA g+h+ra oM swA hA/oM badz+ra dzaM bu kai UM swA hI/oM badz+ra ulU kA s+yo r-I swA hA/oM badz+ra radzon+d+re l-I
385b1(rgyud): nAr+d+ha/\u0f7fbar+d+had+hAn+tad+hAdz+nyA m+b+ha d+hu/oM d+yAr+d+harbA rAN+Di nASh+Ta yA sar+b+ba smA tAn smAd+ha/oM badz+rA ka bod+d+hA AHUt+mA/oMHswAhA/da stu ye shes ts+tsho mkha 'gr-I mA la
385b2(rgyud): dnge bcas pa'o//oM dzaHhUM baM hoHkha raM/mchod yin b+hi sngag so//oM kho na g+hig/zhabs bsil gyi sdigs//mai d+b+had+h+waM/dri dang po shes gtsang ma la sogs pa'i

385b5(rgyud): po rdo rje snying po la sogs pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to//mya ngan 'das

386a1(rgyud): 'khor lus shes brjod par bya//sgo ba ni ji skad gsungs pad+ma//lte ba'i dbus gnas pad chen po//kun mkhyen ye shes mngon par grags//garma
386a2(rgyud): der gnas pa'i dpa' bo ni//dri med dri ma rnam par spangs//lus la gan sa shing nag nog med//lus can kun la rnam par rol//sangs rgyas kun gyi rdzu 'phrul
386a3(rgyud): che//rnam par mdzad cing rab tu bsgyur//kha cig du ni byang chub chen po'i sems//kha cig du ni ji ltar spyod rjes 'brang //kha cig du ni dga' ldan lha rnams dang //

387a2(rgyud): tu bskyed//yang ni chu ni kun gyi dbyibs//de bzhin mi yis zad par byed//de bzhin rlung ni rtag pa yi//saM ni dbang po'i gzugs son ma//hUM bi glu yi rnam pa yis//
387a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma kun mnyes par byed//rdo rje yan lag dgyes pa'i mthus//sbyin gyis gzigs par mdzad pa yi//yi ge'i dngos po'i rang bzhin no//stong par rol

392b5(rgyud): du bdag thong shing //tshogs kyi 'du ba bzang po nyid//lha mo skal ba chen mo nyon//'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa mo//gang du zos pas 'grub 'gyur ba//dur khrod ri yi
392b6(rgyud): cheng tshing dang //rgya mtsho chen po'i 'grem du yang //yang na dben pa 'am bas mtha' ru//bza' ba 'di dag yang dag brtsam//me tog bdug pa mar me dang //de bzhin
392b7(rgyud): bza' ba bca' ba nyid//chang ni sgeg mo ru ni brjod//sbyang chang rab tu myos mar brjod//bu ram chang ni myos byed gsungs//snying po bdud rtsi ro mchog dang //sangs
393a1(rgyud): chus kun gyi klu k+ko yis//bdud rtsi lam ni yan lag brgyad//rgun 'brum sbrang rtsi dpa' bo gcig/nya phyis rtsub pa'i 'dod pa can//sings po bshang
393a2(rgyud): bar brjod pa ste//rtsabs dang bran mo sengs por brjod//de ltar bza' ba sna tshogs dang //chang dang nya dang yang dag ldan//dga' ba'i longs spyod skal bzang bas//
393a3(rgyud): dpa ldan rdo rje sems dpa' 'brug/A mra smin dang pa na saM//rgun 'brum ni li ke ra dang //a lu ka skar la sogs pa'i//'bras bu sna tshogaso tha dad pa//tshogs kyi
393a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbul bar bya//'dis ni klu dang phyag rgya dang //nges par gar kyang khyad par du'o//kA kA kA ka/hI hI he hi/hI hi he hi/hUM hUM hUM hUM/hA ha ha hA/i hA hA i
393a5(rgyud): ha ha/Da Da Da/dzI dzA dzA dzAM/a i a ai/dz+re dza i dza i dza dz+r-i dzaM dzaM/e dz+re ai wa au hi hi hi hI/kadz+dzi haM hUM/de ltar kla k+Sho saM kun 'dar nyid//he ru ka yi sbyor
393a6(rgyud): sa gar//phyag rgya nyid kyang khyad par du'o//gang phyir lta stengs de khu tshur//lta stengs khu tshur rkang pas rkang //ji ltar rnal 'byor rimA paM las//sangs rgyas kun
393a7(rgyud): gyis rnam par mdzad//sring mo'i bu mo sgyug mo dang //ma dang sring mo yin na yang //de rnams gang bar mchod byas na//tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur//
393b1(rgyud): skyes pa'i thod pa cha gcig par//chang ni bzang pos yongs bkang ste//bla ma la dbul skyal chen ma//phyag 'tshal nas ni rang yang btung //pad+ma'i lag pas blang ba dang //de
393b2(rgyud): nyid kyis ni log pas dbul//yang nas yang du phyag 'tshal pa//de la sgrub pa po yis bya//dpal yang dag par sbyor bya las byung ba zhes bya ba bzhi'i de kho na'i rgyal
393b3(rgyud): po ste brtag pa dgu pa'o////rdo rje slob dpon dam tshig gi/grub rtags lag ni rdo rje nyon//dang por dkyil 'khor chen po ni//snying kha yi ni dkyil 'khor du/
393b4(rgyud): rang gi dbang sogs rgyas pa yis//rang gis nang du zhugs pas na//rdo rje slob dpon mtshungs med pa//'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med//gang phyir thogs pa de nyid kyis//bsam
393b5(rgyud): gtan spro ba nyid kyi phyir//rdo rje slob dpon 'gro bar 'gyur//rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po sogs//'bum du bzlasra pas rab tu 'grub//skal ba kun gyi sngon 'grub pas//slob
393b6(rgyud): dpon chen po gdod nas grub//cho ga 'dris ni sems can rnams//rgyal bar 'gyur bar the tshom med//gaunyes med spro bar bcas pa rnams//de nyid gnas zhing go cha bgros///
393b7(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pas gang gang gi/rigs kyi rab tu dbye ba las//phyag rgya gang dang gang gsungs pa//de dang de yi cho gas blang //de dang de nyid kyis ni sgrub//gti mug bdag nyid nges
394a1(rgyud): par ma//lha mo 'am skye gnyis bdag nyid skyes//gti mug rnam dag bsam gtan pas//blangs nas mngon du rnam snang 'gyur//mu ni rig ma dam pa ste//
394a2(rgyud): glal te pha yis sngar bstan kyang //de bzhin de nyid kyis kyang 'grub//bde ba chen pos bka' stsal to//zhe sdang bdag nyid gdol pa mo//bu mo 'om gnod sbyin bu mo blang //zhe
394a3(rgyud): sdang rnam dag bsam gtan pa//mi bskyod pa ni mngon du 'gyur//'dod chags bdag nyid gar mkhan ma/sring mo 'am klu mo lha min blangs//'dod chags rnam dag
394a4(rgyud): byesam gtan pa//'od dpag med par sgom par 'gyur//phrag dog bdag nyid bzo shas+t+ra ma//chu byung dga' ma 'am sring mo yi//bu mo yang dag blangs nas ni//phrag
394a5(rgyud): dog rnam dag bsam gtan pa//dpa' po don yod grub par 'gyur//nga rgyal bdag nyid mna' ma 'am//rgyal po'i bu mo 'am rig 'dzin ma//blangs nas nga rgyal
394a6(rgyud): rnam dag pa'o//bsam gtan pa de nor bu'i rigs//'byung gnas su ni 'gyur ba'o//spyan dang lhan cig sangs rgyas nyid//mA ma ki dang myi bskyod par//'grub 'gyur
394a7(rgyud): dkar mo lhan cig tu//pad+mo can dang sgrol ma ni//lhan cig don yod grub par 'gyur//rin chen rin chen ma dang 'grub//rigs pas 'dod pa 'di dag 'grub//gzhan
394b1(rgyud): yang 'dis ni khra bo yi//lha dang rgyal ba'i sras po dang //khro bo rab gtumachog dang //zhi la zhi ba'i cho ga yis//zhing rab tu 'grub par 'gyur//'dod chags rgya chen zhen pa dang /
394b2(rgyud): rgyal ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur//de ltar dka' ba med pa'i thabs//kun mkhyen thugs rje bcas pas bsngags//shin tu bde bsgrub pa'i thabs//brtul zhugs dka' thub
394b3(rgyud): spyod pa spangs//de ltar bdud rtsi'i ro snyed nas//nyon mongs gzhom phyir mi brtson gang //ji ltar dka' thub brtul zhugs des//sangs rgyas nyid ni bya bar nus//rang gi bde ba'i
394b4(rgyud): thabs rnyed nas//gang zhig bdag don mi byed pa//rmongs pa'i bdag nyid de yi ni//sangs rgyas nyid ni gang du 'gyur//yang ni da ni shes mi 'gyur//'dis na sangs rgyas thams
394b5(rgyud): cad du//skye bo dam pas mthong ba nyid//las kun rmi lam sgyu ma ltar//sangs rgyas chos la mi shes pas//'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu//ji srid ma phyin par du bya//bcu pa
394b6(rgyud): las slob dpon dang phyag rgya byin gyis brlab pa ste rab tu byed pa dang po'o////de nas gang du rig ma'i skyes bu grub pa der 'di lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ste/
394b7(rgyud): sa 'di dag dga' zhing mgu la rangs pas rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas bdud kyi gnasu cha lang lta bu'i sgra grags pa dang /phyogs btsur bskal pa'i me lta bu'i skar mda'
395a1(rgyud): byung du/ma man po 'khrugs pa ma /rnams smra //napa dmag da da du ba /la pa ma'i gzugs du sa shes sgru bar byu
395a2(rgyud): byug rgya'i sgyu banas kyi phung por khams gsum thams cad ste bya dang /tshangs pa dang /khyab 'jug dang /chu ba dag dang /bad+ma byin dang /drug pa dang /me nga
395a3(rgyud): stobs bzang po dang /nye ma dang /zla ba dang /gnod sbyid dang /gru pa dang /dr-i dang /mi'i ma ts+tsha dang /sti 'bye dang /spyi'i mchog dang /rig
395a4(rgyud): ba 'dzin pa dang /chu byung la sogs pa gang zhig gzhan yang sum cu rtsa gsum du gnas pa'i lha rnams der 'ongs nas yang dag par dga' bas me tog gis
395a5(rgyud): mchod par byed do//pi wa dA dang /gling bu dang /mu kun+na da dang /tam pu ra dwang /dud dang /zang+yas dung dang /nAd de dang /prA Ta ha dang /rdu rnga s+ya nam+ba khAr gnas te/
395a6(rgyud): des rtag tu mchod par byed//lha'i bu mo dang /rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po'i bu mo thams cad kyis gar byed pa dang /sril snyen du ma byed pa dang /mi 'ame ci dang /gnod sbyin gyis glu len
395a7(rgyud): par byed cing zhir byed pa dang /de la dga' ba dang bcas pas rgyal brgyal ba zhes bya ba'i sgras rtag tu rol par byed pa dang /gang zhing grub pas nam
395b1(rgyud): mkhar gnas pa rnams kyis ni legs so'i rnam pa rab tu gsol bar mdza do//gang zhig dga' ldan du gnas pa'i lha'i rab mchog dang /gang myid lha'i bu dang /rib pa 'dzin//
395b2(rgyud): pa dang /'og min gyi bar du 'ongs nas phyag 'tshal zhing me tog sna tshogs kyi rnam pa dang /dri sna tshogs kyi dri'i char dang /bdug pa sna tshegs kyi khyad par gyis gus
395b3(rgyud): pa'i tshul gyis mchod par byed //gzhan yang khyod la rgyas par bshad pa'i tshul gyis ci zhig dgos te/bsgrub par bya ba'i bsod nams kyis khams gsum du skyes
395b4(rgyud): pa'i mchod pa de rnams kyis mchod par byed do sa bcu pa las bde ba chen po'i dngos grub kyi mchod pa dang ri mi gro zhes bya ba ste rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o////reg
395b5(rgyud): pa'i skyes bu'i gru ba swa ni//gang du mchi zhing gang du gnas//bdag la the tshom 'di dag ni//bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/
395b6(rgyud): rig ma'i skyes bu grub pa ni//gang du yang mi 'gro/gong du yang mi ga nas/thog ma dang /tha ma dang /dbus dang bral ba/gnyi su med pa/gnas gsum du snang ba/thams
395b7(rgyud): cad du son pa/thams cad mkhyen pa/thams cad pa/thams cad kyi don thams cad sems can thams cad kyi sems la gnas pa/sdig pa thams cang las rnam
396a1(rgyud): par grol ba/yon tan thams cad kyis rgyan par byas pa/thams cad dang ldan pa/zhi ba/mnyam pa med ga/rtag tu 'char bar mdzad pa//mgon
396a2(rgyud): po/spyod pa/kun tu rtog pa spangs pa dbyibs dang kha dog dang bral po/rgyal ba'i yang spyod yul ma yin pa/rgyal po/phyed par dkar ba'i phyir rdo rje/nyon mongs
396a3(rgyud): pa'i nye bar gdung ba las grol ba'i phyir zla ba/dogs pa med pa'i phyir seng ge/gting dpag par dka' ba'i phyir chu'i phung po'o//de ltar dpe sna tshogs kyis rnal
396a4(rgyud): 'byor pa rnams kyis dper bya'o//de nyid gcig pus sems can rnams kyi don byed pa dang /rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs kyang bltams pa ston pa dang //khab
396a5(rgyud): nas mngon par 'byung ba dang /gzhon nu'i rol rtsed mdzad pa dang /rab tu 'byung po dang /rdo rje gdan gyis sa mnan pa dang /bdud btul ba mnyam pa med pa dang /
396a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas pa dang /dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bstan pa dang /lha las babs pa nyams dga' ba dang /shin tu sna tshogs pa'i cho 'phrul dang /glang po che
396a7(rgyud): nor skyong 'dul ba dang /skal pa dang ldan pa'i skye bo dag pa gzhug pa dang /phas kyi rgol ba tshar bcad pa dang /dasod nams kyis lhung bzed pa ltos pa med
396b1(rgyud): pa dang /'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo 'dul ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rgyal tsha ba nyid dang /yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa dang /khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal
396b2(rgyud): po chen po ste/de ltar rigs kyi bu 'di ltar khyad par du ma rmi lam lta bur sangs rgyas kyi rol pa mchog tu ston par mdzad de gang zhig grub pa sgyu ma'i tshul gyis 'gro
396b3(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi don mjed do//bcu pa las sangs rgyas kyi sgyu ma rnam par mdzad pa zhes bya ba ste rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o////gong du bshaM nga gci khrag dang ni//
396b4(rgyud): nya dang sha yi sbyin sreg gi/lha ni khyod kyis gsungs pa nyid//ji ltar ye shes sems dpa' la//mi gtsang bas ni kha bkang na//sdig pa ji ltar skye mi 'gyur//gal te sreg
396b5(rgyud): las ji ltar 'bros//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mi shes rmongs pa'i sems can gang //ye shes thabs ni rnam par spangs//phyi rol dngos por mngon zhen
396b6(rgyud): pras//rtog pa'i dra bas dra bar byas//de yi sdig dang bsod nams kyi//cha gnyis rnam par rtog pa ste//'di rnams chos ni rang bzhin dag/ma skyes pa dang gnas med
396b7(rgyud): cing //sems can ye shes 'phel ba'i phyir//don dam las ni bsod nams nyid//thabs ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan//skye ba dang ni spangs medon//bsod nams mid
397a1(rgyud): la su zhog nan//dper na snrums can pa rol 'gro/r+m+makyA rgyu yis gang ba lta//shing dang bas nas na//rgyal bzlas nr-i s+thA nas//de pa 'dzus
397a2(rgyud): nas rgal nas kyang //sbyangs nas bde bar 'gro bar 'gyur//de ltar la kho ba'i pha rol du//chos dang chos min zhan nas ni//bde bas byang chub thob par 'gyur/
397a3(rgyud): chos dang chos min rnam par spangs//de phyir rtog pa'i dra ba ni//spangs nas zab mo'i chos ni 'phel//de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i lam//lam rig rnam
397a4(rgyud): par rtog mi bya//rnam rtog gti mug chen po ste//'khor ba'i rgya mtshor ltung byed yin//mi rtog ting 'dzin la gnas pa//mkha' bzhin dri ma med par 'gyur//dbang
397a5(rgyud): po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas//sku gsung thugs ni 'dus pa yi//nga rgyal las ni rgyal po'i gzugs//rnam pa thams cad yongasu spangs//rnam par shes pa rdzogs
397a6(rgyud): pas ni//skye ba 'dir ni ye shes ce na//bud med dang ni skyes pa'i lus//las ni du mas bskyed pa ston//mi shes pas kyang mi bya ste//sku yi rdo rje'i dam tshi go//sems
397a7(rgyud): can sna tshogs 'dul ba dang //kun rtog dra ba'i rnam rtog gis//sems la smad par mi bya ste//thugs kyi rdo rje'i dam tshigo/phrag dog nyid kyis ma rangs pas//tshig
397b1(rgyud): rU pA la sogs sgyu me bya//rna ba bde bar byed pa nyid//gsung gi rdo rje'i dam tshig/shwa yi khams gnas sangs rgyas ni//rnam snang chen pa rtse mor skye//rkang la mi bskyod gnas
397b2(rgyud): pa nyid//khrag ni rin chen lta bur ni//nor bu chen po rnam par rgyan//rus pa la ni 'od dpag med//sems can rnams kyi rigs bcas 'bag/rtse yi 'ching ba'i tshogs
397b3(rgyud): kyis bskor//don yod thub pa rgyal po nyid//khyod la gsang ba nga yis bshad//dam tshig ye shes rig pas bsten//blo ldan thugs kyi rdo rje yis//rtag pa ru ni bsgom
397b4(rgyud): par bya//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang //sred pa dang ni 'du byed 'phel//'di lta thub pa'i rgyal por gsungs//ba shang gtse khu ba bad kan dang //khrag dang yongasu
397b5(rgyud): 'dzag pa rnams//'byung ba bzhi ni yongs bzung nas//blo yi rdzogs pa yongs sgom pas//gang zhig dam tshig bsten par bya//thams cad du ni zos pas 'byung //
397b6(rgyud): dper na bud med byis pa yi//gtAm la rjes mos smra ba yi//'du ba'i gtam ni brjod pa ste//lam yang 'ching bar med par brjod//de lta'i cho gas rnal 'byor pa'i///
397b7(rgyud): legs pa'i la mi ni ston pa'o//de nas rnal 'byor pa dang /rnal 'byor ma dang /mkha' 'gro dang /mkha' gro ma dang /mkha' 'gro bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang /byang chub
398a1(rgyud): sems dpa' dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge 'dun du ma'i 'khor thams cad dga' zhing /mgu ba'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams/
398a2(rgyud): cad kyi ye shes kyis thob par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po la sogs pa thams cad dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin
398a3(rgyud): dang /dri za dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o//rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi dpal yang dag
398a4(rgyud): par sbyor ba las byung ba de kho na nyid thams cad kyi gleng gzhi brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po ste bcu pa rdzogaso////de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
398a5(rgyud): dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po la sogs pas yang mchod pa byas nas phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to//thig le thig le dag gis don//gtAn phab yang dag
398a6(rgyud): gsal gsungs nas//bdag gi dbus su rang byung bas//dr-i na rang byung brjod par bya//rang byung zhes bya 'byung chen gyi//don ni rje su dpag bya'i phyir//'di ni rang byung
398a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das//gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha//lhag pa'i lha zhes bya ba ni//bong du gsungs pa'i khams rnams//de rnams dbusu phul 'byung che'i//zhes
398b1(rgyud): byA gca ba'i gzugs kyis na//gsang ba mchog tu dgyes pa na//thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs//ji lta bur nu bcom ldan 'das//sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor
398b2(rgyud): /mkha' gro ma ya dra ba sdom//gzhan du ji ltar rnam pa 'dis//sdom pa mchog tu phan pa las//gsang ba'i smrab ni yin tan can//gsang bya'ang yin tAn du ni br-ig/
398b3(rgyud): rdo rje can ni yon tan can//'jig rten mchog da sa spyod pa spangs//gsang ba'i sgra ni kla klo'i skad//phyi rol rjesu btsal bas yang //'di ni mngon sum shes pa re hU~M/
398b4(rgyud): rjes dpag yon tan can gyi sgras//gang tshe sems ni mi mthong ste//sems zhes bya ba 'di yang ni//yon tan+da can dang yon tan gsungs//gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa
398b5(rgyud): nan thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs//gsang ba 'di la chos nyid phranas//de la thams cad bdag nyid ni//de ni thams cad rnam par gnas//de gang spyod pa'i rdo rje can///
398b6(rgyud): sgrub dang lhan cig dga' ba'o//byang sems kyi gzugs kyis ni//rje sogs kha dog mi mthong zhing //sa s+yo ba sdu thos par mi 'byung ba//dri rdo sems nI ji lta bur/
398b7(rgyud): tshe rjes dpag ji ltar lags//'di ni sna yis mau dmigs na//dri bzang dbus gnas sam ci//sems ni phyi rol mi dmigs shing //de bzhin nye ba'i longs spyod med//
399a1(rgyud): ran mad+mar dang shU la ts+tshin/d+hA bAnan+da dAn+tu shA d+hA ny-id//basmang bla ma dag n+d+ha das pa ni//m+b+has cang bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs//gsung ba 'did /
399a2(rgyud): lta bur//rjesu dpag pas bsam par bya//ji ltar yi ge'i de ngasu no//byin pa yi ni ye shes nyid//gzhan du bcom ldan s+tha dz+nyA wA rau// zhes bya ba dza ltar lags//
399a3(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi nges don ci//mAnyam par sbyor ba ci zhes bgyi//mkha' 'gro ma ni gang gi ming //d+hU ba dza lta bu zhog lags//sdom pa zhes bya ci zhig bshad//de bzhin
399a4(rgyud): spyad par dka' ba nyid//khyod kyis 'dod chags med gsungs ci//tshugs bral med pa de bzhin gzhan//dbu ma zhes bya gang gi ming //bud med kun gyi sgyu ma ci/
399a5(rgyud): stong nyid gzugs khams la sogs pa//ci zhig bshad cing mnyam nyid sbyor//dang po rnam pa drug 'gyur du/sna tshogs pad+mar bres sku dang //A lI kI l-i ga
399a6(rgyud): de nyid med sems rnal 'byor dang //de nyid bzung po ji ltar lags//rnal 'byor nyid la mnyam gzhug dang /phyir la dag kyang yang drug bshad//zla ba ma rdzogs spongs rgyas
399a7(rgyud): 'byung ba ji lta bu zhig logs//bris pa dang ni ma bris pa'i//dkyil 'khor ji ltar bzhag par bgyi//de bzhin sngags dang rgyud nyid dang //gsang ba'i gnas ni mi 'tshal
399b1(rgyud): zhing+ga/pad+ma bzhin no khyad pa ru du//bdag dang bdab blo ji ltar lags//da duzhin sems dang sems byung nyid//sems kyi ngo bo yo shes gsungs//de bzhin rnam par shes
399b2(rgyud): pa nyid//rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po dang //de bzhin chos dang tshes can nyid//chu bo'i rgyun ni ci zhes pa shud//rgya mtsho yang ni khyad par du'o//sna tshogs nyid ni khyod bsung
399b3(rgyud): na/mang po ji ltar 'thob mi 'gyur//rnam shis ye shes khyod kyis gsungs//de bzhin bcud kyi len nyid dang //g.yon brkyang la sogs ci legs dang //gzhu yis
399b4(rgyud): rnam rgyal de bzhin gzhan//gtso drung gtso min+d+ra sgra ci lags//rtog pa yang ni ci zhig gsungs//byang chub chen po'i chos rnams ni//sum cu rtsa bdun nang gi dang //sku lA
399b5(rgyud): sogs pa de bzhin gzhan//nyan thos rnams kyis khyod gsung ste dang //des kyang dgos pa ci zhig mchis//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che'i//rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis ni ci//
399b6(rgyud): tshungs pa dbang phyug khyab 'jug kyang //de bzhin gsol ba ci yi don//'dod pa'i lha ni chung mar bcas//lha mo dka' bzlog gzugs bzang ma//gong du skyobasu song ba
399b7(rgyud): nyidade gnyis gnyis sbyor ba 'dod mdzad pa//'di ltar sbyor ba'i 'thab mo dang //de la gsang ba ji lta bu//rdo rje can gyis brdzun pa'i tshig/phyis ni tshig tu spro bar mdzad//
400a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' yang //tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug dang //zla ba sngar gsungs gzhan du ni//thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs//
400a2(rgyud): 'di ltar rdo rje can zhi bas//khro bo'i gzugs can ji ltar lags//chos kyi sku ni ji ltar lags//lings spyod rdzogs pa tsA zhig lags//sprul pa rdo rje nyid 'byung dang /
400a3(rgyud): he ru kA ni ji ltar gsungs//pad+ma gAr dbang ji ltar logs//gshin rje yi ni gzugasasu 'gyur//de bzhin du nau rta mchog nyid//ji ltar cho gas ci gsungs dang //lha mo
400a4(rgyud): de bzhin khro bo nyid//kla klog khyod kyis bshad pa ni//des kyang dgos pa ci zhig mchis//r-i shig lha mo rnams kyi tshig/btu bar byas pa ji ltar legs//sngags
400a5(rgyud): kyi smra byos 'di dag ni//ji ltar rdo rje sems khyod kyis//thams cad yang dag rnam par shod//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa//'di skad bdag gis zhes bya
400a6(rgyud): ba la sogs pa nas bzung ste/dang por brtsom par byas nas 'dir yang rje su 'byung ste/rigs kyi bu yang brjod par bya'o//gsang ba'i sgras ni bdun gyi rnam pa
400a7(rgyud): ste bdun pa zhes bya ba'i don to//brgyad pa ni brjod du med pa'i mtshan nyid do//gsang ba zhes bya ba'i sgras ni sems dang sems las byung ba gnyi su med pa ste/de bzhin
400b1(rgyud): shi/ pa nyid du gsungs//de bzhin nyid ra btsug pa nyid rdo blo gtsog pa snga dor gcig byos nas gsang bar byung bya'i phyir gsang ba ste/na mkha' thams cad du khyab par //
400b2(rgyud): 'gro ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ched de/dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa dang /rdo rje'i lha mo dang ldan pa ni gan so//kye bcom ldan 'das khyod par
400b3(rgyud): du 'phags pa'i gnas gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mchog ces bya ba ni khyad par du 'phags pa ste/ye shes dam pa'i yulo//dgyes po na zhes
400b4(rgyud): bya ba ni nyams dga' ba na ste/dpe thams cad dang bral ba'o//spyan la sogs pa dang yang dag par sbyor bas dga' bar byed pas nyams dga' bar byed pa'i phyir dgyes pa
400b5(rgyud): na'o//dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba dang /lha mo thams cad dang mnyam par 'gro bas na mkha'i khoms kyi mthar gtugs par lha mo thams cad kyi bde ba chen por sbyor
400b6(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi bde ba dang ldan po 'di las byung ba'i stobs ni gzhal du med pa ste/phan tshun du rab tu rangs par dga' bar byed cing //skyes bu rnams dang de rnamasakyi
400b7(rgyud): dga' ba ni dgyes pa na'o//thams cad bdag nyid ces bya ba ni thams cad kyi bdag nyid de/rigs kyi bu de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gnos gang sngar gsungs pa'o//de'i
401a1(rgyud): b+hi de bzhin gshogs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid du gsungs d+d+he/thams cad bdag nyid kyis ni de dag gsung so//de ltar gyur pas thams cad
401a2(rgyud): bdag nyid ces bya ba 'dis gnas phun sum tshogs pa gsung so//ji ltar gi spangs pa'i gnasu so so skyed pa'i rang bzhin gyis ji snyed btsun mo'i 'khor gyi dbusu rtag tu
401a3(rgyud): bzhugaso zhes gsung so//sangs rgyas dang kun 'di ni sangs rgyas kun te/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'o//rtag pa la sogs pa de
401a4(rgyud): rnams kyis byas pa'i phyir ram/rang bzhin gyi phyir gnas ni sangs rgyas kun dngos zhes bya ba ste/rgyu'am rang bzhin la dngos po'o//sems dpa' ni sems can gyi
401a5(rgyud): don la nus pa'i phyiro//rdo rje ni thabs dang shes rab kyi ye shes kyi rlung bzhin gyi phyiraro//sems dpa' ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyis mi bskyod pa'i phyiraro//bde ba
401a6(rgyud): ni sngar gresungs pa'i dga' ba'i sbyor ba las shin tu ldan par zhi ba'i yid kyi rang bzhin gyi byiro//mchog ni khyad par du 'phags pa ste/bde ba'i go 'phang 'di
401a7(rgyud): rnams kyi sems dpa' 'di rnams kyi don dam pa'i phun sum tshogs pa gsung so//'on kyang sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/mkha' gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom
401b1(rgyud): zhes bya ba mi 'dod pa'i phyiraro//'on kyang gzhan nyid du brjod par bya zhe na/dogs pa bsu nas bka' stsal pa/'di ni zhes bya ba ni gang de skad du rigs kyi bu da ni gsungs pa
401b2(rgyud): de nyid sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyar ba/mkha' phro ma'i dra ba'i sgrom zhes bya ba'i don to//lha mo thams cad kyis yongasu bskor cing dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag
401b3(rgyud): nyid kyi rnal 'byor rdzogs pa ni skal ba bzang ba ste/rang gi bdag nyid kyi sgrub pa shin tu sbyor ba de nyid mchog tu 'dod pa dang ldan pa'o//skyes bu med pa'i gar mkhan
401b4(rgyud): rang gi btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du gnas pa'i shin tu don la rnam par mi g.yeng bas lha mo rnams dang yang dag par sbyor ba'i bde ba myang bar bya'o//yang dag par sbyor ba ni
401b5(rgyud): rnal 'byor te zhes pa'o//brtun pa/rtag pa/mchog tu yang /yid srub pa'o//yang na brtan pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gis mi g.yo bo'i phyiraro//gzhan yod mtha'i
401b6(rgyud): mtha' ji srid gnas pa'i phyir rtag pa'o//mchog tu yid srub pa ni lha mo thams cad kyi bde ba rje su myong ba'i phyiraro//brtan pa dang /rtag pa dang /mchog tu yid
401b7(rgyud): srub pa 'di ni brtan pa dang /rtag pa dang /mchog tu yid srub pa'o//sangs rgyas kun zhes bya ba ni gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya ste/yul gyi rang
402a1(rgyud): /bzhin rnamaso//rang byi bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi rgyu 'thun pas ci zhig byud ces na/'di ni rang gi longs spyod dang dri rnams za bar byed do//gzhan du
402a2(rgyud): na ni tha dad pa'i dngos po la rang gi nye bar longs spyod pa nyid ma yin//ye shes kyi rang bzhin so sor skyes pa ni rgyal ba rnams kyis kyang shin tu mi spyong ste/rnam pa sna tshog
402a3(rgyud): pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba'i 'dod chags kyi spyod pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin las gang zhig 'dod chags la spyod pa de rnams ni rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga 'dod pa'o//gang
402a4(rgyud): zhig rang bzhin bzang po de rnams ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi dngos grub 'dod pa'o//de ltar zhe sdang dang /'dod chags dang /ser sna dang /le lo la spyod pa rnams
402a5(rgyud): kyis he ru ka dang /pad+ma grer gyi dbang phyug dang //rdo rje nyi ma dang /rta mchog gi cho ga 'dod par 'gyuraro//rigs kyi bu de lta de ltar 'i dod chags la spyod pa la srogs
402a6(rgyud): pa mo mthun pa'i phyogs kyis ji ltar dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bskyed par 'gyur ba de bskyed nas/tshegs kyi dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor las bskyed
402a7(rgyud): de rnal 'byor gyi gtam gyis slob ma 'dul bar byed//gtam ni brjod pa'o//bcom ldan 'das btam ji lta bu lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
402b1(rgyud): gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bat+ta ma brjod pa ste/kun rdzob kyi bangon pa'i rang bzhin du byas pa'o//dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i chos kyi sku'i rgyu 'thun pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid
402b2(rgyud): kyi sku'i rang bzhin la nye bar spyod pa'i phyir dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bskyed pa'o//rang bzhin brjod par bya ste/brtan pa zhes bya ba ni chos ri rab ltar brtan pa'o//
402b3(rgyud): dper na ri rab rlung gis bzlog pa dka' zhing rab tu gtum pas kyang rab tu bskyod par mi nuso//de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' 'di ni 'dod chags
402b4(rgyud): la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang /nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /mu stegs can ngan pa'i rgol ba rab tu gtum zhing rab tu 'joms pas rang lhag par 'gro zhing bskyod
402b5(rgyud): par mi nuso//dur khrod du bzhugs pas kyang sems can thams cad kyi rgyud du rgyu zhing rnam par dag pa'i sems chos kyi sgo du mang rjesu 'khor zhing /lhan cig tu bcom
402b6(rgyud): ldan 'das 'khor bar bzhugs pa'o//brtan pa zhes bya ba ni gnas pa'i phyi ba so//g.yo ba zhes bya ba 'di ni sems can gyi rgyud las gzung ste/de rnams ni bcom
402b7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis shes par bya'o//ji ltar rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid de rnams nyid de gzhan dang rnam pa gcig pa'i ngo bos ste/de bzhin nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das
403a1(rgyud): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thubs rnams la bzhug so//sems can nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nga/dngos po'i don
403a2(rgyud): dam pa la gnas pas de bzhin gshegs pa zhes gsung so//g.yo bA ni spre'u lta bu ste/gang zhig sems can thams cad kyi sems brtan pa'i phyir sems dpa' zhes/
403a3(rgyud): gsung so//'dzin pa'i phyir te nge 'dzin te/nges par 'byed pas rdo rje nyid du 'gyur//de'i phyir sems kho na g.yo ba nyid du/gsungs shing phyi la sogs pas ma yin
403a4(rgyud): te/de rnams ni gcig dang du mas dngos po med pa'i phyir//thams cad ces bya ba ni ma lus pa'o//dngos po zhes bya ba ni gnas kyi don to//srid pa zhes bya ba ni skye
403a5(rgyud): ba'o//brtan pa dang g.yo ba zhes bya ba ni brtan pa dang g.yo ba'o//dngos po dang thams cad 'di ni dngos po thams cad de/de ni brtan pa dang g.yo ba dang //g.yo ba
403a6(rgyud): thams cad dngos po dang srid pa'o//brtan pa dang /g.yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni gang gi thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin 'di ni brtan pa
403a7(rgyud): dang g.yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi bdag nyid can de/de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyis rdo rje 'di bka' stsal to//rdo rje sems dpa' thugs nyid
403b1(rgyud): kyis brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi bdag nyid de/'dis 'di dag brjod par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa dang /me ldong lta bu la sogs pas
403b2(rgyud): bsdus par 'gyur ba rtag pa dang /mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga po thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa bsdus par gyur pa'o//kun b+hi sgra sin+ni yongasu zhes bya
403b3(rgyud): b.ri bzung //mnyam par sbyor ba ni 'du ba'o//gang du zhe na/gsang bar to/thams cad kyi chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi bdag nyid du yin gyi/gzhan du ni ma yino//gang
403b4(rgyud): lhan cig zhe na/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' dang ste/de dang yang drag pa'i rang gi ngo bos sprul pa la sogs pa'i yan lag dgu yiso//'on kyang longs spyod
403b5(rgyud): rdzogs pa can du mdzad pa'i sku gcig gis thams cad nas de'i bdag nyid kyi chu dang 'o ma lta bu ra'i dra ba yongasu 'dzin to//de nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i rnal 'bya
403b6(rgyud): gyis phyi dang nang gi dngos po thams cad kyi nang du de kho na skad cig gis ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mdzes pa ltar rtogs shing sheso//de bas nu sangs rgyas thams
403b7(rgyud): cad dang /de las gzhan pa rnams kyi lhan cig yang dag par sbyor ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'o//mnyam pa'i dus ni dbyer med pa'i dus te/sbyor ba'i
404a1(rgyud): gnas kyis thams cad kyis des sems tsam du rloms par zhugs pa sa gcig tu gyur pa'i dngos pos phan tshun du bsdus pas dngos po thams cad kyi rang
404a2(rgyud): bzhin gyis thams cad du 'gro ba'i phyir sangs rgyu ste thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba zhes gsungs so//de byas na sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor bas ni phyogs
404a3(rgyud): bcu'i na mkhar 'gro ba yang dag pararo mthong ba 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i mkha' 'gro myur gsungs so//dra ba'i sgras kyang sgyu ma'i rnam grangs su
404a4(rgyud): blta ste/shing la sogs pa rnams las sgyu ma'i rnam par sprul pa'i glang po rgyu la sogs pa ltar mi bskyod pa la srogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las bud med kyi tshe
404a5(rgyud): 'dul ba'i sems can mi spyad pa'i phyir ro//dkar mo la sogs pa'i rdo rje lha mo'i gzugs la rig pa'i phyir 'di nyid gyur byas sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par
404a6(rgyud): sbyor ba'i sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyis gang zhig zag pa med pa'i bde bas yid zhi ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa mang por 'gyur ro//de nas sdom pa
404a7(rgyud): smras pa rjod par bya ste/sam zhes bya ba ni bde ba'o//ba re zhes bya ba ni khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i don to//bud med kun ni gong du gsung so//sgyu ma yang ji skad
404b1(rgyud): drugasung sa paste/sgyums sgyu ma'i rlung bzhin zhes bya ba'i don to//da yang rang bzhin gyis grub ste sgrub pa rdzogs pa//ji ltar rang gi don yongs su sbyar bas zhe na/rang rnams
404b2(rgyud): denanas ga zugs can ni rang gi ga zug s+yA d+na/gr-i gzhi dang /nyin mos pa da / dang /rna ba dang /sgra dang / da /sus kyi rnam
404b3(rgyud): pa'i shes pa de rnams slongs su gyur pa ni rang ging ba yongs su gyur pa'i//bdag med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgrim pas me 'de lta bu dang /mnyam pa nyid dang /sa sma rtag pa dang /
404b4(rgyud): n+na d+hA hUM deng bzhin la gnas nas rdzog padu 'byung ba zhes byung dad te//gangag nga yang byung pas zung med rnams skye nin ma du sa
404b5(rgyud): yin te/de'i phyir rnyed pa kun gyi bdi sto bas/bud med thams cadu 'grub pa rje gyur zhes bya ba yin//sna tshogs dang sgyu mni sna tshigs sgyu maste/kha dog dang dbyibs sde tshogs
404b6(rgyud): pa ltas lha ma thams cad la sogs pa'i gzugs d+hA na//da ni sna cho sgra sgyu ma'i drug rgyu 'di bzung na m+bu thul bzhag pa d+mo b+h+yasma nI sI 'di skad bkAR+ShA stsal dunam mkha
404b7(rgyud): 'gro ma bcom ldan 'das rdo rje thams nyid kyi tsun mo kyi ring du sa mi phyogs cu'i nimakha'i gang zhig 'gro ba 'di ni skyes sna tshogs kyi phyag rgya zhes
405a1(rgyud): bya ba'i don to//'jig rten dang 'jig rten lus 'das pa thams cad kyi baspyan bcos kyi nang du rab tu grags pa mi gsal ba'i skad kyis rang gi brdar
405a2(rgyud): byas pa zhes bya ba'i don to//mkha 'gro ma la sogs pa 'di ni mdor bsdus nas gsungs pa yino//gang gi phyir bud med thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje lha mo'o//
405a3(rgyud): 'khor bar byed pa'i kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa rnam pa brgyad la gnas nas ldog pa'i mtshan nyid kyis me long lta bu dang /mnyam pa nyid dang /so sor
405a4(rgyud): rtog pa dang /bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyis grub pa'o//de'i me long lte bu'i ye shes la sogs pa ni sna tshogs sgyu ma'i rang gi ngo bo ste/de rnams
405a5(rgyud): kyi sgyu mas na mkhra 'gro ba'i bya ba de ni gzug sa sna tshogasu gyur te/de'i phyir sna tshogs skye ma'i phyag rgya 'di ni mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba ra brjod par bya'o//kla klos
405a6(rgyud): de rnams kyi na mkhar 'gro mo 'ba' zhig gis bya ba ni mkha' 'gro mar porjod pa ma yi na te/'di skad na mkha' kun tu spyod grub pa/na mkhar 'gro mo zhes rab tu
405a7(rgyud): grags zhes de de'i phyir bshadado//kun las shrIs bya ba ni phyogs bcu'o//sna tshogs dang de'i phyag rgya ni sna tshogs phyag rgya ste/spyan la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'o//gzugs
405b1(rgyud): brnyan gyi rnal 'byor gyis sems can gyi khams la phyag rgyas 'debs pa'i phyir des na phyag rgya zhes brjod do//sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi rang bzhin nam/dpal rdo rje
405b2(rgyud): sems dpa'i thoms cad dang /phyag rgya ni sna tshogs kyi phyag rgya'o//kun la sau sna tshogs kyi sdom pa yis zhes bya ba ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa ste/bde ba'i mchog grin mkha'
405b3(rgyud): kun tu 'gro ba'i ngo bo ni mkha' 'gro ma'o//sangs rgyas skad dbyings zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dpal rnam par snang mdzad la gnas nas mngon par ldog pa'i rgyu rnams ni de'i
405b4(rgyud): rang khams rnams te/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /gsung dang /thugs kyi rang bzhin gyi khams rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi skad kyi dbyings kyi sgras brjod de/
405b5(rgyud): ji ltar dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas nas mngon par ldog pa'i rgyu rnams ni de'i rang bzhin gyis khams rnams te/mkha'o 'gro ma'i sgras na mkha' la 'gro ba'i rang
405b6(rgyud): bzhin du bstan to//de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad dang /mi bskyod pa dang /rin chen bdag po dang /'od dpag tu med pa dang /don yod grub pa'i yar khams rnams
405b7(rgyud): blta bar bya'o//sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' gro ma zhes bya ba ni bcomo ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la spyan la sogs pas yong su bskor ba'i na mkha' la 'gro ba thams
406a1(rgyud): cad rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid kyi mkha' 'phro ma dang /de skad du dpal he ru ka la dkar mo la sogs pas yongasu bskor ba'i nam mkha' la
406a2(rgyud): 'gro ba thams cad he ru ka'i bdag nyid kyi mkha' 'gro ma dang /de skad du bdag med mo'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa la rdo rje ma la sogs pas yongasu bskor ba'i nam
406a3(rgyud): mkha' la 'phro ba thams cad bdag med ma'i bdag nyid kyi mkha' 'gro ma dang /de skad du ye shes dang ldan pa la rdo rje mkha 'gro ma la sogs pas yongasu
406a4(rgyud): bskor ba'i na mkha' la 'gro ba thams cad ye shes kyi bdag nyid can gyi mkha 'gro ma dang /de ltar sgrol ma dang lhan cig pad+ma can dang /pad+ma'i 'khor lo dang /
406a5(rgyud): gshin rje'i rgyal po dang /de skad du rta mchog dang /de bzhin du 'jig rten gsum las rnam por rgyal ba nyid dang /gzhan yang yid la 'dod pa'ang rigs kyi rab
406a6(rgyud): tu dbye bas phye ba la mkha 'gro mas dri bzhin du yongasu bskor ba nyid du brjod do//de skad du sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams bstan nas/sdom pa bshad par
406a7(rgyud): bya ba'i phyir bde ba zhes bya ba ni gang zhig bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang lhan cig mnyam par sbyor bas gang zhig shin tu bde
406b1(rgyud): ba dang ldan par bskyed par byed//de las cir 'gyur zhe na/mchog ni khyad par du 'phags pa ste/bde ba thams cad kyi thabs phul du byung ba'i phyiraro//de nyid kyi phyir sgyu ma
406b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi rab tu sbyor ba ste/de yang gzhan du nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang mnyam par sbyor bsta ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i drin to//sangs rgyas thams cad dang
406b3(rgyud): mnyam par sbyor ba mkho 'gro ma'i dra ba'i rab tu sbyor ba nyid kyis gang zhig bde ba bskyed pa de nyid kyi phyir saM gyi sgrar brjod do//de'i phyir de'i rgyus gang zhig bde ba mchog khyad
406b4(rgyud): bAr du 'phags pa bskyed par byed pa de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis yongasu mya ngon las 'das po de'i rnam par dag pa sgyu ma lta bu'i chos rnams thams cad rtog par
406b5(rgyud): snying rje chen po skye'o//stong min zhes bya ba ni khams gsum dang /'dod pa kun tu spyod pa'i yang dag pa ma yin pa ro kun brtags pa'i dngos po yin pa'i phyir
406b6(rgyud): der yang dag pa ma yin par kun brtogs pa stong pa yin pas dngos po yin pa'i phyiraro//stong pa min pa'ang min zhes bya ba ni don+da dmA par bzung ba dang 'dzin
406b7(rgyud): pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dngos po med pa ste/gang gi ye shes kyis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po med pa mngon sum du byas pa'i de'i ye shes kyang rnam par
407a1(rgyud): rtog pa'o lA ma na pa'i phyir dmigs par mo 'thung te/ny-i na spyod don du yang drug su so shos ts+tsho dbu myur rtags par bya'o zhes bya
407a2(rgyud): ba'i don to//de yang shes rab pha rol byin sbyor ba zhes gsungs te/de nyid kyi thabs te snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi snying
407a3(rgyud): bdag nyid kyi dmigs pa ni snying rje'i rang bzhin te/de nas mdzes pa'i snying rje thabs zhes bya ba ni shin tu snying rje yong mdzes pa'i snying rje ste/bye tang snyoms kyis
407a4(rgyud): dmigs pa med pa'i snying rdo chen po'o//de nyid thabs te gang shin tu snying rje dang ldan pa'i thabs 'di ni myi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin te/dpal
407a5(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad de//cir gyur pas zhe na/chos drug byung zhes bya bar sbyar//ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang dag gsal zhe na/shes rab ces bya ba
407a6(rgyud): ni chos rnams sgyu ma lta bur rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i rnam par brtag par bya ste/de nyid bdag gi phun sum tshogs pa'o//pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni son pa
407a7(rgyud): ston pa ste/shes rab pha rol phyin gsal po zhe'o//gang gis zhe na/rnam rtog med par lhag mas zhes//ci mdzad can/brtags par ni sngon du bdog po'i nus
407b1(rgyud): po las zhes bya bar dkrongs pa'o//ci brtags zhes na/brtags pa kun gyis zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa rang dbang du sgyu m+b+ha lci bu'ong ba'o//ci'i mtshan nyid rnarmA/
407b2(rgyud): las zhe na/rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la/sems can don ni yongasu brtagaso//zhes pa ni snying rje'i dang shis sems can gyi don gyi don rgyur brtags pa'o//
407b3(rgyud): brtags pas cir 'gyur zhe na/sgra brnyan lta bur mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba la/sgra brnyan zhes bya ba ni brag cha'i sgra'o//des dbyangs mchog dang mnyam nyid mnyam pa
407b4(rgyud): dbyangs kyi rje su 'gro ba dang /sgra rnam par rtog pa'i ngo bo dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas dI smre brnyan lta bur mnyam pa nyid de de ltar gyur pa su brtago/
407b5(rgyud): ci zhe na/de nas 'di ni chos dag byung zhes bya ba ni de nas de'i phyir chos las chos kyi don gyi nges pa'i tshigs sa saR+Ya snang ba so sor rig pa ni brtags pa'i ngo bo stede
407b6(rgyud): nyid kyi phyir 'di ni dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dam tshig gsum gsal byed pa'o//ngag bri chos ni ngag gi dbyangs zhes bya ba'i don to//de de ltar gyur
407b7(rgyud): pa ni ngag 'byed pa ste/ngag gi 'di ni de'i de bzhin du brjod do//de yang dag pa ma yin pa las grub pa ni chos ngag las grub pa'i phyir//theb pa dang chen po de ni theg
408a1(rgyud): ba chen po ste/byang chub sems dpa'o lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o//chen po rnam pa bdun du sbyor ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
408a2(rgyud): lha sogs pa'i mdo sde dag tu grub//de'i phyir ches khyad par du 'phags pa rdo rje theg pa chen po ni skye ba 'dir sangs rgyas la sogs pa rab tu srub par byed pa'i
408a3(rgyud): phyir de'i yon tan dam par gyur pa stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa ste/dri rnams kyi tshogs ni rgyas pa ste/de rnams yon tan dam par gyur pa so//dus
408a4(rgyud): gsum ni 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da lta ro//dam tshig gsum zhes bya ba ni sku dang /gsung dang /thugs kyi rang bzhin thams cad//de bzhin gshegs
408a5(rgyud): pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o//bstod pa ji lci buzhi no//rnam par rtog pa med pa'i rnam par grol bas gzugs brnyan la sogs pa
408a6(rgyud): rib pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bskyed//gang gi phyir brtan pa dang g.yo ba la sogs pa me lus pa la stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis khyab cing /
408a7(rgyud): brtan pa dang g.yo ba la sogs pa des khyab pas khams gsum rnam par rig pa tsam ste/de'i phyir sdom pa la sogs pa rnams la lha'i rnal 'byor dugasu
408b1(rgyud): ma ldan 'das gal tA'i skad de'i rang bzhin thams cad de'i rnam par 'jig rten pA pa dAr+Nogs par mi 'gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang
408b2(rgyud): ge bying zhes bya ba ni gtan tsho/so//thams cad bdag nyid ces bya ba ni thams cad kyi dngos poso//bdag nyid k+Shi zhes bya ba ni rang gi'o//rnam shes phung po zhes bya ba ni
408b3(rgyud): gang zhig rnam par shes pa'i lus la'o//gnas pa ni rang rig po'i sems kyi ngo bo ste/de'i phyir rmongs pa ni gti mugo/skyes bu tha mya ni rigs pa can la sogs pa'o///
408b4(rgyud): rtogs mi nus zhes bya ba ni rmongs pa dang bcas pas mi she so//bcom ldan 'das grul d+h+r-i de mi 'tshal na ji ltar de rnams kyi de kho na 'tshal ba lags/bka' stsal
408b5(rgyud): bya/sems dang sems byung sems tshul bdag ces bya ba ni sems can gyi sems kyi ngo bo'o//sems zhes bya ba ni thams cad du dngos po'i rang bzhin dge ba'i phung
408b6(rgyud): po la sogs pa rig par byed pa'i bdag nyid can gyi 'tsho ba'o//ye shes kyi bdag nyid ces bya ba ni thams cad 'gro ba ste/de la khyab 'jug gi ye shes kyi bdag
408b7(rgyud): nyid skyes bu'o//zhes bya ba'i rang bzhin can zhes bya ba ni shed bu dang /shed las skyes pa dang /tshor ba po dang /byed pa po dang /gnas kyi don dang /rang gi ngo bo
409a1(rgyud): can dang /byed pa po nyid do//dbang phyug tu smra ba rnams na chos rnams kyi byed par dbang phyug 'dod do zhes ze ro//chos can dngos po de nyid ces bya
409a2(rgyud): ba ni de nyid grub pa'i mtha' las bsod nams la sogs pa'i chos rnams byed pa po 'am/chos kyi ngo bor dbang phyug chen po 'dod de/de rab tu bstan pa'i ngan
409a3(rgyud): du 'dis rje su 'gro ba dang ldog par gsungs pa dang /gcig dang du ma dag dang /bsgrub par bya ba dag dang /chos can dag dang /gtan tshigs dang /dpe dag pa
409a4(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/chos rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /du mas zhes bya ba ni gal te du ma nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i rgyur brjod na du ma nyid mi skyed pa'i phyiraro///
409a5(rgyud): 'dis gcig pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir brjod pas chu bo dang rgya mtsho'i gnas kyis gnyis kyi'ang dpe ba rjod do//'dis gcig dang du ma dag giso sgrub po'i
409a6(rgyud): phyir dper brjod par bya ste/de la re shog du me'i chos rnams kyi mthar brjod pa'i sems la sogs pa'i dngos po du ma ni mang po nyid de/gang gi phyir gaucig lbu
409a7(rgyud): log pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rim pa 'dis chos ni du mas ni zhes pa ni rgyas thams cad mu stegs pa'i sems la sogs pa'i rnam pa du mar 'dod do//ci bcom
409b1(rgyud): ldan 'das dmigs pa lags sam/bka' stsal pa/chu bo'i rgyun no zhes bya ba'i sgras na nyan thos//rgyu mtsha zhes bya ba na rol mtsho las phyi rol du ji lta bu chu bo
409b2(rgyud): dang /sin d+hu dang /gang ga la sogs pa'i chu bo'i rgyun 'bab cing rab tu 'khor ba 'di ni sin d+hu'i chu bo'o//'di ni gang ga'i chu bo zhes sna tshogs nyid du dmigos par
409b3(rgyud): 'gyu ro//de bzhin du zab cing gting dpag dka' ba'i chos kyi dbyings las phyi rol tu gyur pa'i mu stegs can rnams kyi bdag dang /'tsho ba dang /skyes bu dang /gang
409b4(rgyud): zag ces bya ba sna tshogs nyid do//bcom ldan 'das ci 'dir de kho na nyid du mo'i rnam po nyid lags sam/bka' sprul pa ma yino//gang zhig 'di de kho na ni gcig
409b5(rgyud): tu mngon par 'dod de/de kho na nyid de'i ngo bo gcig par gsungs pa nyid do//gang gi phyir gcig dang mang po nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pa las mang po nyid ces bya ba ni
409b6(rgyud): de rnams kyi sems la sogs pa gang zhig du ma rnam pa sna tshogs pa de ni dam pas dmigs par mi 'gyur zhing rigs pas rtogs par mi 'gyur ro//ngag gi phyir lus
409b7(rgyud): nyid ni gcig la 'jug pa ste/dper na chu bo rnams kyi du ma nyid rgya mtshor 'jug pa ltar/sems dang bdag la sogs pa yod do zhes bya bar rig pos rtogs
410a1(rgyud): par myo 'gyur zhing /rigs yod pa dang ldan du zin kyang sems la sogs pa gang po tshe chos thams cad bdag med par zhugs pa de'i chu'ang /de rnams
410a2(rgyud): po sna tshogs nyid mi 'dod do//dper na rgya mche la chu bo du ma nyid zhugs pa'i so sor snang ba'i dngos po med do//de bzhin du du ma nyid kyi dngos po med pa'i phyir/de kho na nyid/
410a3(rgyud): gcig pa'i rnam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyiraro//de lta bu'i rnam pas gang las de kho na nyid rnyed par 'gyur ba lags/bka'i sprul pa/bla ma'i zhal las zhes bya ba la
410a4(rgyud): bla me ni sngags dang /rgyud dang /man ngag can te/gang zhig tshig gis man ngag rnyed par 'gyuraro//de'i man ngag nges par bstan pa bka' stsal pa/nang gi zhes
410a5(rgyud): bya ba ni rtswa mdzes pa'i spyo bar ji lta bu'i gzugs kyis rnam par gnas pa dang /na mkha' lnga yis rgyan par byas pa'o//grosang ba'i pad+ma ni gsang ba'i gnas na
410a6(rgyud): gsungs te/pad+ma'i lte bar rtsa mdzes pa'i skye ba'i phyogasu khrag dang /khu ba dang /gtso ba 'dzin pa'i rtsa lnga yis mdzes pa'i spyi bo'i na mkhri'i gnas su'o//yang na
410a7(rgyud): chu dang /me dang /dbang chen dang /rlung dang /bsil ba dang /tsha ba dang gnyis kyi tsha ba'i mtshan nyid dang /'dod rags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs pas nam
410b1(rgyud): mkha' lnga po 'angadi rnams kyis rgyun par byas pa ste/pad+ma 'ba' zhig gis rgyan pa ni ma yin no//zhes bka' stsal to//gsang ba zhes bya ba ni don rnam pa bdun to//brgyad pan
410b2(rgyud): brjod du med pa'i mtshan nyid do//gsang ba zhes bya ba ni mi gsal ba'o//der gsang ba de nyid phyogs yin te/de kho na nyid mdor bston pa'o//gsang ba ni sa bon lnga'o//
410b3(rgyud): gsang be ni dam pa'i dngos po sbas pa'o//gsang ba ni gsang ba'i pad+ma'o//gsang ba ni lte ba'i dga' ba'o//gsang ba ni thams cad du 'gro ba'o//gsang ba ni bde ba thams cad
410b4(rgyud): mtha' yas pa ste/rgyud kyi gzhung gis bshad//gsang ba yang ni byang chub sems//gnyis pa thabs dang shes rab nyid//gsum pa yang ni snying rje ste//bzhi pa snyid po dam
410b5(rgyud): pa nyid//lnga pa mnyam pa nyid du gsungs//drug pa la ni byams pa nyid//bdun pa chos nyid ye shes te//'di rnams gnasu kun tu bzhugs//byang chub sems ni ma skyes
410b6(rgyud): pra/tang 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs mchog/mAng ni mdzes phyir rnam par bshad//rdo rje sems dpa' dga' me de//mang po'i gnasu gcig du ste//de ni shes rab pha rol
410b7(rgyud): phyin//kun mkhyen kun 'gro thams cad pa//pra snying gsang ba'i kha nang 'gro/sgyu ma'i gzugs brgya rig pa'i phyir//sangs rgyas kun gyis 'chang par byed//me long la sogs
411a1(rgyud): sgom pa yis//sngags ni lnga po yang dag bshad//shes rab pha rol phyin par gdungs//yig dang po gcig gyur pa//ma long la sogs bdar ga sha
411a2(rgyud): lnga//drug pa dpal ldan bde chen po//de yi yeng ni ye shes bzhan//drug pa steng du grags pa med//rgyud ni 'bum phrag tshad du ni//drug pa yod par ma gsungaso/
411a3(rgyud): d+hI sems dpa' lta bu nyid//mi yi 'jig rten yod ma yin//de phyir nga yis khyod la bo shad//'di nyid kyi ni nang ston pas//gnyis med mnyam pa nyid du dang //sngon dang
411a4(rgyud): phyi mar bcom ldan 'das//dang lnga ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs//'di la slob dpon gyis thams cad du 'gro ba'i ye shes ji lta bu lags/thams cad bdag
411a5(rgyud): da rtag tu bzhugs/gnas ni rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs//bzhi ni cha dang yang dbu ldan//d+ma bzhi lnga rnam par gnas//spyi bo med snying pad+mar gnas//kha yi pad+ma
411a6(rgyud): spyi bor gnas//lte ba'i pad+mar gnas pa'i sgra//sgra mthar gsad pa'i pad+mar ni//'gro dang rje su ring bar byed//thig le'i sbyor bas rab tu bskor//kha dog gnag dang
411a7(rgyud): domar ba dang //mngag dkar de bzhin ser ba nyi//cha ni bcom ldan thig le'i gzugs//tshan shes rab cha zhes gsungs//lha mo sgra ni nges nges bstan//gang de rig
411b1(rgyud): mu sgyu ma che//sna tshogs gzugs can mtha' yas ma//'byin cing sdug dang 'jigs dang chags/khig la'i sgra ni yongasu bskor//chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dang //bzhi stong
411b2(rgyud): ge no tshogs ni//lus kyi de nyid mi shes pas//de dag thams cad 'bras bu med//yig 'bru rnams kyi dang pi u//stan ni g.yo ba rnams la gnas//snying rje chen po re ga
411b3(rgyud): 'byung //kha ni 'og tu na mkha' 'byed//thog ma tha ma med pa'i lha//de yi spyi bo nges par bstan//mchog gi de nyid 'di dag ni//lha mo nga yis rab tu phye//'di nyid las ni
411b4(rgyud): thams cad 'byung //chos kyi da byings ni bruM du brjod//skye gnas dbusu rnam par gnas//mthar ni swA hA zhes bya'i phyir//bsdus nas zhes ni rnam par brjod//rus pa
411b5(rgyud): rkang dang khu bo nyid//pha las skyes pa gsum du gsungs//lpags pa dang ni sha dang khrag/mA las skyes pa gosum du grags//'di dag tsam du gsungs pa rnams//gong
411b6(rgyud): bu rnams ni bsdus pa nyid//gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang //'du byed dang ni rnam shes nyid//sangs rgyas lnga yi gzugs brnyan dngos//phung po dag ces bsgrags
411b7(rgyud): par bya//gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ni//ro dang yang ni rig bya nyid//chos kyi khams zhes rnam par bshad//khams rnams dang ni skye mched rnams//'di rnams las
412a1(rgyud): ni thung ba yi//khu ba las ni gang bu'i //gang bla las na ma rnams 'byung //rnyed ni nam la khams kun d+ha//sgyu mchud d+ha na/m+b+has rnams dang//
412a2(rgyud): dang po phung po 'byung ba dang //khams rnams las ni byung ba yi//dkyil 'khor lus gsungs pa ste//dkyil 'khor b+ha gar brjod pa nyid//dkyil 'khor yang ni byung
412a3(rgyud): chub sems//dkyil 'khor gsum ni brtag par bya//gang la gtso bo kun spyod pa//brtag pa du mar kun tu gyur//phung po rnam pa gnyisu gsungs//'byung ba
412a4(rgyud): rig par rtag tu brtag/myos byed dang ni lcags kyu nyid//zhags pa pad+ma gzhug byed dang //bcing ba lcags sgrog dril bu yang //nges par byed pa ru ni gsungs//
412a5(rgyud): bshang ba dkar po zhes byar gsungs//pad+ma zhes bya khrag tu gsungs//shwa zhes bya ba mar me nyid//khu ba na mkha' nyid du brjod//thim pa'i phyir na ling gar
412a6(rgyud): gsungs//me tog snyim pa b+ha gar brjod//glu ni longs pa nyid kyi glu/gAr ni mnyam par sbyor ba nyid//ro ni shi bar brjod pa nyid//kha ni zhal dang bug pa nyid//
412a7(rgyud): snying po ro bsregs dur khrod//me ni byin za gsal ba dang //de bzhin du ni 'bar ba'o//gu ra ni gu gul du brjod pa'o//nag po'i 'byung po'i nyi ma ni//mar gyi ngo'i
412b1(rgyud): bcu bzhi pa'o//gser shing ni da du ra'o//a li ni ldong ros so//ma du lung gA sa bon grang ba'o//tsi tra kA ni tsI tra ka'o//ba tsa ni tshig nyid do//khyim bya'i sgo nga thams cad ni khyim/
412b2(rgyud): bya'i sgro nga'i dum bu'o//skya bo nI dkar po'o//rta gsod pa ni ka ra bi ra'o//nyi ma'i shing ni arga'i shing ngo //pa chag pa ni cha ga pa dang srog chags zhes bya ba'i ngan
412b3(rgyud): /sdig pa nr-i s+phu lo//oM la ni rnga ma'o//skal ba la ni cha'o//nyin phyed kyi 'o mas byug cing zhes bya ba ni yang bsgos pa'o//ba na ri ni kA pi'o//yul ni ka ts+tshir brjod
412b4(rgyud): do//da'i bdag nyid ni thod lo skor dang spre'u dang /kha ti ka nyin phyed kyi 'o ma'i nang du nyi ma bdun du bzhag par bya'o//de dag dang nyin phyed kyi 'o ma dag dang sbyar ba sa mgo
412b5(rgyud): blo'i dbang po dri bar bya'o//dug sbyin par 'gyu ro zhes bya ba ni rog pa las skye bAr byed pa'i daM na ti//ma la yaM las byung ba ni tsan da nau na//nA ga gai sar ni nA ga'o//nad
412b6(rgyud): kyi dbang po ni ru rta'o//myaMs byed kyi 'bras bu ni tsher ma'i 'bras bu'o//dza gu'i yul ni myos byed spro bar rtogs par bya'o//ta ka ra ni dri'i te ka ra'o//ldan pa ni sbyor
412b7(rgyud): ba'o//'bras kyi chu ni kau sha'o//ji snyed pa'i dug sna tshogs ni du ma'i rnam pa'o//'jig par byed do zhes bya ba ni zad par byedo zhes bya ba'i don to//de'i nyin par skyes
413a1(rgyud): su smra ga na na na rgyu smra du ga/na na / ldan ga chu /rnams
413a2(rgyud): pa hrI /hrI Sh+T+r-in ga byung da de// rkye ni N+Di pa smrig pa'i nas bya ni s+t+rai ng+ga ka m+WAr ni pa ma //
413b1(rgyud): ni phag pa'o//mugo skyes ni sa?//mgrin rangs ni rnga mo'o//dmyur po khrag go//b+hUm+mu N+Da kA ny-id dang /spyad bu no a s+sa bot+tats+tshe do//lug+na skyes ni sen+da ma'o//ba sbyor man+ta
413b2(rgyud): sbyar gyi 'chad pa'o//bsregs pa ni thal bar byas pa'o//a kr-i Te ni ya~M kau Ta'o shing //de rnam pa ni ba glang ngo //ma~M kau Te'i sa bon bi tus pa'i mar khu des sgrub pa
413b3(rgyud): mig sran 'o ma dang bsres pasna mig sman des mI gr-i byugs par bya'o//rgyal ni skar ma rgyal lo//aM ko Ta'i mar khru'i rtsigs ma dang /takA ra'i 'bras bu dang /i k+ko Ta
413b4(rgyud): sa ban mar khru dang /glang zhig gnyis ka'i myigs ma drug gis mig blugs na lha'o gzugasu 'gyur//tAkA ra'i 'bras bu'i mig sman gyis byug+sas na sngar hU~M rang bzhin
413b5(rgyud): du 'gyur te/rang gi ngo bo nyid can du mthong //ri bong can gyi chu ni se ba la'o//dz+wa lu ka ni pad+ma nyid do//sprul pa'i mar khu ni snying po can gyi mar khru'o//bya Ta l+ya'i rtsa ba dang
413b6(rgyud): sbyin cig dag sbyong ni sna bregs pa'i//zla ba las byung ba ni sa~M pA las byung ba'o//dun d+hA b+hI nI snrel gadrong gnyis pa ni//khrag ni gzugs 'dzin pa'o//gos d+d+he na
413b7(rgyud): gajug par byas nas khar gzhug na//sr-i nata zhes bya ba'i shing //mar ra rim pa de nyid dege skye bo'i btsag ni gsar kyi bcag gi/dri ngan pa ces bya ba ni no//
414a1(rgyud): na ni nya'o//srin bu ni shing gi rjesu rgyu ba'i 'bru srin no//kau ki lA naM sbrang du'o//bu ram ni gu Ta nyid do//mA ran la nI si sa po'o//skye bya gnyis pa nr-i
414a2(rgyud): bram rje'o//khyi la ni rtug pa skyed pa'o//spre'u ni ba re ne'o//rang 'tshed pa ni g.yung po'o//khwa'i dgra ni 'ug pa'o//na gu la ni skye mong nyid do//tsa ra mo nI byi la'o//'di
414a3(rgyud): dag gi phye ma'o//ba glang 'tsho ni lce sbyong //ma du lung ga ni sa bon gang bya'o//phug ron ri ka po tA'o//zangs kyi tsug bud can ni khyim bya'o//'di dag gi rtug pa bsdu
414a4(rgyud): bar bya'o//sgra'i las kyi mtha' zhes bya ba ni mgo reg go/pi tsu marda ni nI ma pa'o//gtor zan ni khA'o//dga' ba dang bcas pa'i dkor mo ni khyi mo dkar mo'o//nus
414a5(rgyud): pa ni 'byur ba'o//myada'i rma ni sbrang bu'o//bsnun pa ni brdungs pa'o//rang gi sa bon ni bdag gi rdzaso//rgyal ni skar ma rgya'o//skyes ma ni bud med do//skal ba ngan pa
414a6(rgyud): bzung ba ni byungs pa'o//skyes pa'i shIng ni i mra la stso zhes pa'o//shing gri yal ga ni mdab ma'o//pi lu ni glang po'o//steng du 'dren pa ni lag pas 'dzin po'o//
414a7(rgyud): skyes bu'i myos byed ni rdzas so//kran+ta ni khyab 'jug gnon pa'o//sra ban ti ni ngu ba'o//u ba ne ta dza ti ka ni thal mo sbyar ba'o//shaM kha ni rma bya'i gtsug phud do//mtha
414b1(rgyud): 'gro'i bdag blon namakhar ldeng gi 'dug pa'o//lha'i bdag po'i sgras pani dbang po smras pa'o//byA bla ni man shU la'o//ldong ros ni ljong ris lhung klu'o//u krAn bA tsa'o//bca/
414b2(rgyud): nas skyes pa ni dur ba'o//bkra shis ni ro tsan 'o//bi sa zhes bya ba ni lta ba mngon par sar pa'o//dbang po'i nas ni ku Ta dza'i sa bin twe/gr-i ku Tu dza'i sa bo no//dpral
414b3(rgyud): thams cad ni mdzes pa dang ldan pa'o//a ru nU ni tsan dan dmar po'o//drang srong gi bu ni nA mkhra' la 'gro ba dang /ni mkha' skyed pa'o//de'i snying po ni gzhan gyisgra mi
414b4(rgyud): thub pa'o//sra nga ni rna ba'i mig smano//ri bong kis mtshan pa'i tsher ma nI se pA le'i tsher ma'o//nga kyi sbe ma skang []dang po'i me tog ni dang po'i zla mtshan gyi khrag
414b5(rgyud): go/lcags gsum zhes bya ba ni gser dang /dngul dang /zang so//sngon po nyid kyis nye bar mtshon cad sbyar ba'i A sh+lo ka'i shing ni ya sho ka sngon po'o//de las byung
414b6(rgyud): ba'i myu gu nI a sho klu sngon po las byung ba'i myu gu'o//nyi mA ni zangs te shin tu dmar bya'o//zla ba ni dngu'o//me ni gser ro//ba glang gi bri wang ni bA gleng gi gi wung /
414b7(rgyud): eng gu de'i shing gi me tog ni eng gu de'i sngon shing gi ku sum ma ste/ljon shing gi me tog kun bsdus pa'o//'gegs pa ni skyes pa shi ba ste/de'i mig dang
415a1(rgyud): spu rnam so//khwa gnyis pas zos pa dang ldan pa ni khras zos pa skyugs pa dang lhag ma zos pa'o//pha'i bskyed mos tshal ni dur khrod do//der
415a2(rgyud): mnyas pa'i zla mtshan gyis myos pa'i bu mo'i rdzas blangs pa'o//A sho ka yang yin la ston pa yang yin de ni a sho ka sngon po'o//de'i byang phyogs kyi khri'i chang
415a3(rgyud): ni kha'i gnas//de las gang zhig byung ba'i myu gu de ni a sho ka ston pa'i byang phyogs kyi khre'i tshang gi myu gu'o//phug rin gyi khang par swe tA A~M dza na bcug la/'on
415a4(rgyud): kyang tsi ta'i mes bsreg par bya ste/de nas mog sman 'grub par 'gyur//byA l-i dkar po ma yin pas bsad pa ni bye la nag po'i khrag gis mI snang bar byas te
415a5(rgyud): spyod pa bskyed par byed pa'o//d+h+r-i ne'i myu gu sar po'i tshigs de rnams ni tri na'i myu gu sar pa'i tshogs rnamaso//des bteg pa'i s+yA ni trai la'i myu gu sar pa'i
415a6(rgyud): tshogs kyis btig pa'i sa'o//de'i steng du gnas pa'i sa dang /mdo'i rma dang /tA l-i dang ldan pa'o//mda'i rma ni sbrang bu'o//ta la ni sdong ris so//de dag dang yang
415a7(rgyud): dag par ldan pa ni bcas pa ste/sa ra ga dang /ta la dang ldan pa'o//rgyal la zhes pa ni rgyal gyi nyi ma la'o/mig sman ni gong du gsungs pa'o//gang zhig sngags
415b1(rgyud): daR+shanaN+Dam+b+ha bas sngags par byas na da'i sbyor byas 'grub par 'gyu //'do dag no nas gyur rgyud las 'angs pas+thA/dAn m+b+ha b+ha ga dbus bsgrub pa d+hA sngags /
415b2(rgyud): dIng bar phyag rgya byin b+h+yas brlabs nas/phyi nas meg sman gyi sgrub pa bcug cing sbyor bas ji srid dngas grub kyi mtshan ma ma skyes kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o//gang zhig stegs
415b3(rgyud): kyi sgrub po dang bral ba'i mig sman 'di 'ba' zhig gis zhi ba'i las la sogs pa'ang byed//zhes gsung so//mig mig sman gyis byugs nas zhi ba la sogs pa'i sta stangs
415b4(rgyud): kyi bltas na zhi ba la sogs par 'gyur//mig mig sman gyis byugs nas rgyal po lo bltas na rgyal po mchod pa rnyed par 'gyur//mig mig sman gyis byugs nas khro
415b5(rgyud): bo'i lte bas dgra la bltas na dag zad par 'gyuraro//de bzhin du bgegs thams cad la nges par bltas na/gdon la sogs pa'i bgegs thams cad yang dag par skrod
415b6(rgyud): par byed do//'chad par 'gyur ba'i sngags kyis mngon par bsdog cing bzla bar bya'o zhes gsung so//bud med kyi b+ha gar gur gum bcug nas phyi nas rang gi sgrub pa
415b7(rgyud): gzhug par bya zhing mnyam par sbyor bas sngags bzlas te khyad par du yang bsgrub por bya'o//de'i sngags brjod pa bka' stsal pa/oM pra san+na tA ri/a mr-i ta mu khe/
416a1(rgyud): a mra N+Da la tsa nA/sarba aHsA d+hA ni/sar+b+ba sat+kA/ba shaM ka ri hUM phaT haM swAhA/oM ti mu khaiSh+To b+hU dzaM/de bi mA mA kI r-i drA R+ShA pir+t+ti trIhrIM hUM hUM A U d+hA hA swA hA/
416a2(rgyud): sngon gyi bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gci ba bzlas nas/phyi nas mig sman dang gur bum yang bsgrub par bya'o//zhes gsungs pa yin no//gur bum des dpral bar thig le zhes
416a3(rgyud): gsungaso//bud med skal ba bzang por byed pa bka' sprul pa/b+ha ga tsan da ni gyis byugs pa'i steng du/ba blang gi gi hang gis bruM bris nas/bdag po dang lhan cig sbyor
416a4(rgyud): bas+t+ra ji srid myos byed ma 'ongs kyi bar du'o//de nas bdag po de bran bzhin du 'gyuraro//nI ba ni dung ba'i rgyal po'o//ts+tshi Ti ni mdab ma skyong pa'o//mtshan mo ni yung ba'o//ba
416a5(rgyud): ku tsi ni e bo gu tsa'o//ud pa la'i snying po ni ut+pa la kha ma phye ba'o//lcags kyi dri ma naM lcags kyi bA shang ba'o//dr-i la sogs pa nI bu gul dang sa dzA ra sa'o//khrag sel
416a6(rgyud): bA ni las kyi kha dog go/gser gyi shing ni gser bye ljon shing //DI D+ha pra ro ha ni pa la'o//sin+na pa ra ni nir kur+t+ta'o//shra mA nI prI yi ku'o//ke shA ri nI na ga ge ster ro//
416a7(rgyud): reg pa 'dzin pa ni tsam pa ka'o//na ga ni bu na na ga'o//'khor lo 'theg pa ni a di tsa'o//mtshan mo spyod pa ni yung ba'o//she khi ni rma byi'i btsug phud do//pra ba ra ni bla

416b2(rgyud): pa ni lpags pa'o//b+hu na ni mu sta ka'o//mtshan me'i shing ni skyer pa'i shI //nad kyi dbang po ni kuSh+ma'o//srid pa'i rdul ni khyim gyi me togo/rkun ma ni rgan po gzhon par

416b4(rgyud): bcad pa'i phyir/mtshon tshwa kun gyi phyag rgya rje//'khrul 'khor 'phangs dang ma 'phangs dang //de bzhin leg pas 'phangs pa nyid//'phangs pa 'dzin par bcas pa dang ///

416b6(rgyud): lag pas grol ba 'khor l-i sogs//grol ba 'dzin bac+doMs zhags pa sogs//mtshan cha thams cad yongs spangs nas//lag pa'i 'tha' mos dgra 'dral sogs//de bzhin
416b7(rgyud): bcing ba yang dag ldan//dang ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi//mtshon cha'i mchog ni sna tshogs pa'i//gnas dag dbyings ni rab bshad bya//rnal 'byor sgrub thabs shin tu
417a1(rgyud): mdzes//sbyor dang myur bar gsor ba dang //dgug pa dang ni 'dzin pa nyid//gsal ba ru ni gtong ba ste//sa la mnyam stabs phyag rgyas dadab//do sha kha
417a2(rgyud): gsar phyag rgyas gdab//dkyil 'khor de nyid phyag rgyas gdag/gnas ni gsum du g.yas pas brkyang //dbyibs kyi phyag rgya bka' stsal po//mthe bong dang ni sor mo

417b1(rgyud): dang dug ga nad//mkha'agro'i 'tsho ba gdon dag ni//'dis ni yan lag kun rgyan pa//thams cad du ni zil gyis gnon//gang ba'i skye mchod kyi phyag rgya'o//rang skying 'gugs//
417b2(rgyud): pa'i rnal 'byor gyis//shin tu mdzes pas gzhu nyid bzung //ga ya su rab tu sgyur ba dang //mda' ni bcug na 'grub par 'gyur//mngon du log pa mnyam byas nas//rgyab
417b3(rgyud): du bkug nas rim par ni//gang zhig dral gyis dgug bya zhing //'gro ba thams ca da dgug par bya//thams cad dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o//rna ba'i skye mched dkyil 'khor du//

417b5(rgyud): bkug nas//cho ga ji bzhin bzung bar bya//de la cung zad drang bye zhing //yongasu bkang na 'grub pari 'gyur//dgang ba'i phyag rgya'o//'dzum zhing mig gis blta ba dang //

418a1(rgyud): phyug r+b+ha pas//khams gsum rgyal po chen po dang //rgyal ba'i bde brko bar spyod//dang ldan 'jig rten gsum rgyal ni//phyag rgya bcug cad mnyam

429b1(rgyud): glashogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbusu sngun twor bri bar bya'o/rgyas pa'i don du rin+da po che'i dkyil 'khor la nyi ma shaR+Sha nu bri bar bya'o//mngon spyod kyi las rnams la nyi ma/
