429b3(rgyud): kyai nges pa yod pa ma yino//shar dang /lho dang /byang dang /nub kyi phyog su thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgya du'o//yongasu gang ba'i dbang zhes bya ba ni slob dpon
429b4(rgyud): thams cad do//slob ma mchog 'bring thu ma kun zhes bya ba ni the mo la ni dkyil 'khor gyi dpung dang /nyin par b+hI thig le'o//'bring po lnga ni nya phyis kyis//gang zhig
429b5(rgyud): mchog de rnams lnga ni sangs rgyas gcig pu'i bdag nyid kyis sbyin par bya'o//dum bu gcig pa'i mgo skyes zhes bya ba ni dum bu gcig pa dang /mgo bo'i rdo rje ni
429b6(rgyud): dumA bu gcig pa'i mgro skyeso//dum bu gcig pa ni thod pa du mo bu gtsog pa'i bdag nyid kyis dbang yod bya'o//mgo skyes zhes bya ba ni pad+ma'i snod do//dum bu
429b7(rgyud): gcig pa ni bug pa gcig pa ste/ma gas pa dang ma chag pa zhes bya ba ji snyed pa rtog par bya'o//kaM ni phung po skyong bar byed pa'o phyir thod pa'o//de bzhini du gsungs pa/
430a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'grub//pad+ma gcig bdag de bzhin no//bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dab //dpal he ru ka
430a2(rgyud): rdo rje'i dang ngo //'od dpag tu medra pa'i dbang ni nor bu'i dbang dang /der bzlas par yang bya'o//rin po che phyed pa ni rdo rje'i dang //sangs rgyas kun gyi sku ni nor bu'i dbang
430a3(rgyud): du shes par bya'o//rtswa mchog gi yang //rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis mi bskyod pa ni rdo rje sems dpar yang shes par bya'o//thod pa'i gradan 'di'i 'bad pas
430a4(rgyud): bsgrub par bya bo glang zhe na/rang bzhin nyid de'i 'grub pa rab tu 'byung bas rang bzhin las rab tu 'byung ba'i nus pas bzung ba drung 'dzin de'i rnam par rtog pa sgrubs
430a5(rgyud): med pa'i ngo bo'i phyir de nyid du gyur pa'i rab tu byung bas de'i rang bzhin gyis grub pa'o//bod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan gyi ga/zugs kyi rang bzhin las zhes bya ba ni gnyisu med pa'i
430a6(rgyud): ye shes las de ltar gsung sau pra yin//dper na me ni che ba'i rang bzhin du grub pa ste/de ltar de'i yang rab tu 'byung ba nyid las rang bzhin rnam par drag po'i phyir
430a7(rgyud): de nyid kyi bzang po'i bsam pa'i rnal 'byor byas ni ye shes sems dpa'i dang lhan cig gcig pa'i dngos pos de ltar gyur pa'i rnal 'byor gyis de bzhin gshegs
430b1(rgyud): /sa pa sa smras rkun du da du rgyu/smra/ na dang ma rnamam k+Sha/ R+Sha r+m+ma
430b2(rgyud): ma seM kyil la ts+tsho du rdo rje rje sde pa ya na/ de zhin gi shegs pa rnams snang bats+tsha ra spyod rdzas
430b3(rgyud): sarjeg la ba zlun su la da sbyin mi chog pA'i sbyi pa gas d+hA'o//zhes bya ba'i dri to//de
430b4(rgyud): rnab pa snyi mi du ma rdzogs pa ya ri 'byung ba'i snyir po hU~Mste/'dis ni rab tu sto bas ga zhig de rnams spro ba den nyim dang
430b5(rgyud): 'byung ba ste dru'o//phyi rol dang nang gi bdag nyid las yaM gI wAr 'gyur ba'i phyir lha mo thams cad gnyis las smyos pa dang rdzogs pa'o//las thams cad rab tu
430b6(rgyud): par 'byung ba'i tshi ga'o//la le zhes bya ba na mo mdzod bya'o//deng gi sems so sor rtog pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems so//byang chub tu btab pa'i sems dpa' ni byang chub
430b7(rgyud): sems dpa'o//de'i spyod pa ni byang chub kyi spyod pa ste/ji ltar sems dpa' yang dag par rnyed nas rngo su 'brangs pa'i phyir rngo mu 'gro ba'o//rgyal bar byed pa dang/smra
431a1(rgyud): byed pa dang /don thams cad grub par byed pa'i ming po gsum gyi gzugs kyis gnas pa'i tshul gyis dang /sems can gyi don byed do//de nyid sna tshogs
431a2(rgyud): kyi rnam par 'gyur zhing /rdul dang /mun pa dang /skyong stobs kyang sems can gyi don du 'gyur te/gang zhig rnam par dag pa de ni kun tu bzang po'o//de bas na byang
431a3(rgyud): chub kyi spyod pa 'di ni ji ltar rjesu 'brang ba zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhi no//khab nas gsal bar 'byung ba 'am zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi don du skyes bu chen po'i mtshan/
431a4(rgyud): sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rdzogs pa ste/bsod nams kyi phung po de'i nyi zer gyi rdul ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams/
431a5(rgyud): de rnams kyi rdul ni dpe byad bzang po rnamaso//gsal bar gyur pa de gang zhe na/gsal ba ni khyad par du yon tan la sogs pa 'dzin ste/byang chub chen po'i
431a6(rgyud): mchod pa ni dri rnams kyi tshogs kyi yongasu bskor ba'o//bdud kyi gzugs kyis byang chub sems dpa' slu ba ni skyes pa'i bdude/nyan thos dang rung byang chub kyi sems
431a7(rgyud): gsod pa'i phyir bdud ni 'dod chags rdo rje'o//bdud bzhi bcom pa dang ldan zhing bdud las rgyal bar kha cig tu shAkya thub par gyur pas mngon par rdzogs
431b1(rgyud): byang sa ya d+hasata/chos dang gang zag tu 'dzin pa char bcud pa'i phyir thar pa rnam par dag pa'o//'jig rten pa'i rnal 'byung ba'i dang zug rngur ban paSh+Ta ra dang /nyan
431b2(rgyud): thos dang rangasangs rgyas kyi cho su 'dzin pa tshar bcud pa'i phyir de lhor chos dang gang zag la bdag med par rtogs nas ji ltar gyur pa yong su shes pa'i byir thar pa zlums
431b3(rgyud): nang rnam par dag pa yin te/'di'i don du bcom ldan 'ongs rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad pa'o//bdag tu lta ba rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis dang /
431b4(rgyud): 'dod chags rnam pa thams cad dang /de'i rnam par dag pa ste/de kho na laM bdag mi dmigs pas rang bzhin med pa'i phyir de'i don du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug
431b5(rgyud): gi rgyal po ni pad gar gyi dbang phyug yino//dga' ldan gyi lha rnams thams cad kyi mthar thug pa la 'khor lo dam pa'o//rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul sna tshogs pa'i mechogan
431b6(rgyud): lha'i 'khor lo dam pa'o//'di lta ste yang na rigs kyi bu sangasu rgyas thams cad kyi 'dus pa zhes bya ba la 'du ba ni tshogs pa'o//bde ba can zhes bya ba ni mchog dga'
431b7(rgyud): ldan te/rigs kyi bu bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams lta bu'o//dper na bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pas rgyan
432a1(rgyud): pa'o//de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang /dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa gzhal du med pa
432a2(rgyud): kun tu bskor bas/de ni bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams lta bu ste/de'i don du pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug sgrol ba po 'byung ba yino//sbyin pa dang sbyin pa po dang /len pa
432a3(rgyud): po mi dmigs pa'i ser sna spang ba'i phyir don dam par rnam par dag pa de'i don du sir sna can gyi sems can rnams 'khor gsum yongasu dag pa'i ye shes kyis shin tu
432a4(rgyud): sbyin pa la sbyor ba yino zhes bya ba'i don+da to//nyi ma lta bu'i phyag rgya chen po ni nyi ma'i phyag rgya'o//na mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba ni na mkha' la mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes las
432a5(rgyud): skyesnying po bskyed pa'i phyir gang gi 'di ni de de bzhin du gsungaso//dngos grub thams cad kyi dbang phyug bsam pa thams cad yongasu sbyong bar byed pa ni sems can thams cud
432a6(rgyud): kyi rnam pa thams cad 'khor lo sgyur ba la sogs par gsol ba 'dabasdu pa de rnams kyi bsdam pa de rab tu sbyin pa thams cad kyi bsam pa skong bar byed pa ste/de'i phyir
432a7(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/na mkha' la glang po la sogs pa rin po che bdun gyi rin po che thams cad kyi char 'bebs po ces bya ba ni rin po che bdun gyi char 'bab pa'o//de'i
432b1(rgyud): don du sgrol ma ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba yin//shin tu brtson 'grus dman pa zhes bya ba ni l+yA l-i la sogs pa'o//stobs kyi rnal 'byor ni drag po'i rnal
432b2(rgyud): 'byor//de bas na stobs kyi rnal 'byor gyis rnam par dag pa ni drag shul gyi rnal 'byor gyis rnam par dog pa'o//brtson 'grus kyi sbyor bas ni de'i don du stobs kyi rnal 'byor
432b3(rgyud): rnam par dag pas rta mchog 'byung ba yin te/rta mgrin yin zhes bya ba'i dron tau//dpung pa bzhi dang lag pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni phyag brgyad pa lta bu'o//zhabs bzhi
432b4(rgyud): zhes bya ba ni g.yon brkyang ba'i sbyor ba'o//de nas g.yas pa'i zhabs gcig gis ni mi'i dngos grub ma dang dpal mo mnan to//gnyis pas ni lha mo sha tsi dang dga' ma
432b5(rgyud): mnan pa'o//g.yon gyi dang pos ni mig gsum pa dang khyab 'jug/gnyis pas ni tshangs pa dang 'dod lha mnan nas bzhug so//dngos grub thams cad kyi dbang phyug rta
432b6(rgyud): mchog gis ni 'jig rten gsum po lha chen po la sogs pa de rnams bsdus nas gsum la skyabasu 'gro ba la sogs pa rnams kyis rnam par btul ba zhig rdo rje hUM mdzad
432b7(rgyud): kyis 'jig rten gsum po thams cad bsgral nas/de'i dkyil 'khor du lha chen pos bla ma lo dka' bzlog ma yon du phul nas phyung ba ni rim pa ji lta bar gru bzhi sgo
433a1(rgyud): bzhi par thig gdab par bya zhing sgeg mo la sogs pas yongasu gang ba zhes bya ba'i don to//dkyil 'khor gyi tshod gang gis thag gdab par bya zhe na/nang
433a2(rgyud): du khru gang zhes bya ba ni dbusu khru gang ste/phyi rol du khru gang nyid dang /'phar ma gsum pa khru gnyis pa zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bu zhes bya ba
433a3(rgyud): ni dkyil 'khor gyi snying po zlum po yin zhes bya bar bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum po sgrol ba'i dkyil 'khor bka' stsal to//da ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi
433a4(rgyud): sgom pa dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi sgom par bshad par bya ste/de la re shig dang por tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni sred pa'i rgyu'i phyiraro//rmongs pa lngas bden
433a5(rgyud): pa bzhi la 'jug pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa ni lus la tshul bzhin ma yin pa sgom pa ste/de yongasu brtags pas gang zhig sdug bsngal gyi badren pa
433a6(rgyud): la 'jug pa'o//de'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid kyi phyir tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal te/de dang //
433a7(rgyud): lhan cig zag pa med pa dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs kyi sdug bsngal gang zhig lta ba'i phyir tshor ba ni sred pa'i rgyu'i phyir te yongasu brtags pas kun 'byung gi
433b1(rgyud): 'don pa la 'jug/badrug gi dngos po la mngon par zhen pa ni sems de yongasu brtags pa'i phyir 'gog pa'i badren pa la 'jug/bdag tu lta ba gcod pas rtogs pa'i phyir chos
433b2(rgyud): la brtags pas gang zhig kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba'i chos thams cad la rmongs pa med pa'i phyir lam gyi bden pa la 'jug pa'o//de ltar dang por badren
433b3(rgyud): pa bzhi la 'jug pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i sgom pa rnam par bzhag par bya ste/de nas yang dag par spong ba'i sgom pa yongasu shes la/gang gi phyir 'thun pa'i
433b4(rgyud): phyogs dang /mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam pa thams cad du de rtogs na brtson 'grus rnam pa bzhi po 'di rab tu rtsomo//dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgoms pas 'thun pa'i
433b5(rgyud): phyogs dang /mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam pa thams cad yongasu shes nas 'thun pa'i phyog yongasu shes par bya ba'i phyir dang /mi mthun pa'i phyogs yongasu shes par
433b6(rgyud): bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rnam pa bzhi yang dag par rab tu rtsom ste/sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir zhes rgyas par gong du gsungaso//las nyid la
433b7(rgyud): gnas po zhes bya ba ni de la don thams cad yang dag par rtogs pa'i phyir/skyon lnga spang ba dang /'du byed brgyad brten pas de'i phyir yongasu shes pas
434a1(rgyud): brtson 'grus kyi sgom pas snyoms gnas pa'i las nyid do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni don thams cad yang dag par 'phel ba'i rgyu'i phyir gnas/
434a2(rgyud): pa ni 'dir sems kyi ting 'dzin du rig par bya'o//de nas yang dag par spong ba'i mthar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de yang las nyid de/skyon lnga spang ba dang /'du byed brgyad
434a3(rgyud): bsgoms pas rig par bya'o//skyon lnga gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de la le lo dang /shes bzhin ma yin pa dang /rmugs pa dang /bying ba
434a4(rgyud): dang /rgod pa nyid do//mngon 'dus ma byas pa dang /de nas mngon par 'du bya ba skyon lnga spang bar lnga po 'di rnams brjod do//de la bying ba dang nod pas skyon gcig
434a5(rgyud): byed de/mngon par 'du ma byas pa bying ba dang rgod pa 'jug pa'i du su skyon no//mngon par 'dus byas pas rab tu zhi ba la 'di rnams spang ba'i phyir ji ltar spang zhing
434a6(rgyud): 'du byed brgyad rnam par bzhag ce na/bzhi yis le lo spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa dang /rtsol ba dang /dad pa dang /shin tu sbyangs pa de rnams yang rim pa ji lta bar
434a7(rgyud): rig par bya'o//gnas dang de nas gnas pa dang /de'i mtshan ma dang /'bras bu nyid de/gnas ni 'dun pa'o//gnas pa ni rtsol ba'o//de'i gnas 'dun pa'i
434b1(rgyud): tshon ma ni drad pa ste/yid ches pa dang /dang ba dang /'dod pa'o// nas ba rtsol brda 'brang bu ni shin tu sbyangs pa te/'dun pa dang bcas pa'i brtson 'grus
434b2(rgyud): tingange 'dzin gyis khyad par rtogs par bya'o//lhag ma spong ba'i 'du byed bzhi ni dran pa dang /shes bzhin dang /sems dpa' deng /btang snyoms te/grangs je lta
434b3(rgyud): bar skyon bzhi'i gnyen po'i phyogaso//de yang dran pa la sogs pa'i rim pa de bzhin du rig par bya ste/dmigs pa ni rmugs pa med pas bying ba dang rgod pa rjesu rtogs
434b4(rgyud): par bya zhing /de nyid kyi mngon par 'du byed pa zhi ba la shin tu sbyangs pa 'byung //dran pa dmigs pa na rmugs pa med pas shes bzhin to//rmugs pa med par
434b5(rgyud): gyur nu bying ba dang rgod pa rtog so//ma rtogs pa de rtogs par bya ba'i don du mngon par 'du byed pa'i sems kyis bying ba dang rgod pa zhi ba la dam pa shin tu sbyangs
434b6(rgyud): pa'i snyoms kyi btang snyom so//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i mthar dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga po de rnams kyi rnam par gzhog pa ji ltar dgod ce na/thar pa'i cha dang ldan pa
434b7(rgyud): gang zhig 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor gyi bdag po dang /dmigs pa na rmugs pa med pas brjed pa med pa'i bdag po'o//bdag po zhes bya ba ni bsgyur bar byed pa'o//
435a1(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i las ni sems kyi 'jug pa'o//thar pa'i mdang ldan pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba la 'dun pa'i bdag po dang /rab tu sbyor ba'i
435a2(rgyud): bdag po dang /dmigs pa ni rmugs pa med pa'i bdag po dang /brjed pa med pa'i bdag po dang /rnam par 'byed pa'i bdag po ste/go rims ji lta ba bzhin du
435a3(rgyud): dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga po rnams rig par bya'o//de la za ba po dang bza' bar bya bas stong pa bka' stsol pa/nang gi skye mched rnams nas brtsams te/
435a4(rgyud): phyi rol gyi bza' ba stong pa nyid dang /de'i lus kyi za ba po dang /bza' ba dag gang zhig byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus de'i stong pa nyid la'ang lta zhing skyo bas 'du
435a5(rgyud): byed spong bar byed de/dge bo mi zad pa dang /gang yang khyad par du bltas pas nang dang phyi rol stong pa nyid du gsungaso//rab tu gnas pa'i dngos po snod kyi 'jig rten
435a6(rgyud): rgyas pa'i phyir dri stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid ces gsung so//de yang nang gi skye mched rnams la sogs pa gang gis stong pa nyid mthong ba stong pa nyid kyi ye shes
435a7(rgyud): kyi de'i stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do//ji ltar don dam pa'i rnam pas mthong ba'i de'i stong pa nyid ni don dam pa'i stong pa nyid do//de'i don du yang byang chub
435b1(rgyud): sems dpa' rab tu spyod do//de'i stong pa nyid kyi don ji ltar 'tshu lnga par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dpo b+ha gnyis 'thob pa'i don du dag bA'i 'dus byas/
435b2(rgyud): dang /'dus ma byas gnyis//rtag tu sems can la phan pa'i phyir dang /sems can lnga shin tu phan pa'i don du 'khor ba myi spang ba'i phyir de'i stong po nyid ni thog ma dang
435b3(rgyud): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid//rgyan mi 'chad par 'khor ba stong pa nyid du ma mthong bas skyo ste/'khor ba yongasu spong bar byed do//gang yang dge ba mi zad par khyad par du
435b4(rgyud): lta bas mya ngan las 'das par yang mi byed cing de'i stong pa nyid spong par yang mi byed/'di ni blang ba dang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do//rigs kyang rnam par dag pa'i phyir
435b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba la/rigs ni rang bzhin te/ngo bo nyid do//mtshan dang dpe byad thob par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang /dpe byad dang bcas par
435b6(rgyud): thob par bya ba'i phyir dang /dag par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu spyod de/khyad par gyi stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la
435b7(rgyud): sogs pa sbyang ba'i phyir re shig stong po nyid bcu bzhir rnam par gzhag par rig par bya'o//yang 'dir stong pa nyid dang zhe na/chos dang gang zag gi don dngos po med pa
436a1(rgyud): stong pa nyid de/de'i phyir de las byung ba don dam pa'i dngos pa nA dA rA nga stong pa nyid dang /phyi rol gyi chos drang gang zag dngos po med pa nyid las
436a2(rgyud): byung ba'i gcig pa'i dngos po'o//der ji skad gsungs pa'i zab mo la sogs pa stong pa'i phyir stong pa nyid bcu drug tu mtshan nyid bshad pa'i don du gzhung gnyisu
436a3(rgyud): stong pa nyid rnam par gzhab par bya ste/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid de/chos dang gang zag la yang dag par 'jug
436a4(rgyud): po de'i stong pa nyid ji snyed pa yong su sbyang ba'i don du rim po ji lta ba de ltar stong pa nyid kyi rab tu dbye bar shes par bya'o//ji ltar sgrub par rnam par shes par
436a5(rgyud): bya zhe na/gal te 'di kun nas nyon mongs pa can du ma gyur na lus can thams cad grol bar 'gyur//galAM te 'di rnam par drag por ma gyur na brtsams pa
436a6(rgyud): 'bras bu med par 'gyur//gal te chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid blo bur gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa ma skyes pa'i phyir mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis kun nas nyon mong
436a7(rgyud): pa can du ma gyur na kun nas nyon mongs pa dngos po med pa'i phyir 'bad pa med pa nyi du sems can thor grol bar 'gyur//de nas ma skyes pa'i yang mi mthun
436b1(rgyud): bla phyogs sa rnam par dag par m+b+ha b+hU NA/thur pa'i don du rlom pa 'dus du mad par 'gyur//da ltar byas nu nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa dang /dag pa dang ma dag pa
436b2(rgyud): nyid sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i phyir de ji ltar na nyoni mongs pa yang ma yin zhing ma dag pa yang mo yin//nyon mongs pa blo bur gyi phyir ji ltar nyon mongs pa can
436b3(rgyud): ma yin zhing dag pa'ang ma yin//de ltar stong pa nyid kyi rab tu dbye ba gsung so//de la stong pa nyid kyi mdor bsdus pa'i don sgrub pa yino//yang gsungs pa/'dod chags
436b4(rgyud): kyi gnyen por mi sdug pa la sogs pa dang /zhe sdang gi gnyen por byams pa dang /gti mug gi gnyen por rten cing 'brel par 'gyur ba'o//de la ji ltar 'dod chag
436b5(rgyud): rnam par ldog ce na/gal te de dang 'gal ba'i phyi ro ma na/yin mod kyi gang zhig de skad du 'dod chags kyi bdag nyid du byed pa na 'dod chags dang bral ba yin//de
436b6(rgyud): bzhin du gsungs pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu aM ma ho sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dod chags kyi ye shes ni rnyog pa med pa ste/'dod chags kyis 'dod
436b7(rgyud): chags dang bral ba bcom nas bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed//'dod chags la sogs pa ni rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba med pa dang bcas pa ste/gzhan du rgyun tu zhugs
437a1(rgyud): de'i 'dod chags rnyed pa yin na der 'dud chags la sogs pa stong su mi sbyong bar spyadan/na tu rnam pa'i khyad par laswA yan tan po khyad pa byung
437a2(rgyud): ra 'gyur//da bar nA kAt+yA kA mA tig dre'i thung pa ches zos nak+shar+Nil sogs pa'i dngos par 'gyur ro//glang po che phul pos zos na lte bar dngas bIr 'gyur/
437a3(rgyud): bsan de la ko ta ka'i me tog gi skyon ma yin te/de bzhin du 'dod chags la sogs pa yang rnam par dag pa'i rim pa la gunas pas bsam pa'i khyad par
437a4(rgyud): sbyor ba las khyod par du 'phags pa nyid kyi 'bras bu sman par 'gyuraro//dper na 'o ma sprul la sogs pas 'thungs na dug gis dngos por 'gyuraro//gzhan yang
437a5(rgyud): skyes bus 'thungam na bdud rtsi'i dngos por skye bar 'gyur//de ltar rigs kyi bu 'dod chag sa la sogs pa bsam pa'i khyad par gyis rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho
437a6(rgyud): med pa'i phyir sbyor bas dngas po khyad par can gyi 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur//gang dang gang khyadra par du 'phags pa'i rgyun gyi dngos po dang ldan pa de dang de'i 'bras bu
437a7(rgyud): khyad du 'phogs pa 'byung //dbar na ke ta ka la sogs pa de rnams kyi khyad par du 'phags par rim pa la gnas po/'dod chags la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnam
437b1(rgyud): pad shA par//d+h+ya ts+tshiN+Dal brdzun po dpal ya d+ma dag par sbyor ba 'dzin lo zhes bya badzug so///rgyu kar gyi mkhan po k+ShA ya s+thA pang+ka rad+hArA'i zhal sngun dang /radu
437b2(rgyud): n+ti ba dag slo shAn+ti ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/skud nas yang bud kyi pats+tsha ba gzhan rnams kyis bsgyur ba la zung mi 'dra ba re bcos nas rang
437b3(rgyud): bri ming bcug cing /gzhan gyi ming 'phyi ba de dag dang /mi shes pa de dag sun dbyung ba'i phyir slad nis yang r+g+ha gar b+h+rUM rgyud bzhi dang /dge slong shAkya ye shes de nyid
437b4(rgyud): kyis gtugs nas btsas te gtan lo phab pa'o//rgyu gar skad du/shrI badz+ra maN+Da kA la kr-i d+h+r-i n+yA ThA ra hUM s+yA sid+d+hi b+hA be tar+b+ho m+b+ha/ba skad du/
437b5(rgyud): dpal rdo rje nag pa chen po khros pa'i mgon pa gras dra ba dngos grub 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyu /dpal he ru ka li phyag 'tshalo//de nas bcom ldan kun mkhyen pa'i/
437b6(rgyud): ye shes mngon par mkhyen pa yis//bdud kyi dkyil 'khor 'joms byed pa//bka' yi 'khor lo ba shad par bya//de bzhin gshegs pa thams ca kyi thigs
437b7(rgyud): med cing gdon mi za ba bde ba che zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsung so//ji srid 'khor ba'i gar su ni//kun mkhyen bde gshegs bcu
438a1(rgyud): gyur pa//mya dran 'da' bar mi mdzad cing //de srid mtshungs mod sems can don//rgyun ma 'chang par 'gro ba kun//srid pa'i zhags pas 'jigs
438a2(rgyud): med par//byams pa'i thugs kyi brtson 'grus kyis//rtag tu sems can don rnams mdzad//na mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par//smon lam rnam par spong byed//
438a3(rgyud): cing //snying rjes don brtson sems kyis ni//dpa' bos srid pa sbyong bar mdzad//sna tshogs gzugs can nor bu bzhin//'di ni rgyud rnams kun tu yang //kla klo'i snyid/
438a4(rgyud): kyis sbas pa ste//'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'joms pa'o//rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam gyur pa'i//rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid che//myur du dngos grub ster byed pa
438a5(rgyud): 'phral du yang dag yid ches byed//bsam pa gang dang gang dag gis//mi rnams sems dang 'thun par 'jug/de dang de yi gzugs sprul te//sna tshogs
438a6(rgyud): g.yogs te bde bar bzhugs//de phyir 'bad pa du ma yis//sna tshogs tshul gyis 'thun par bya//bdag nyid sangs rgyas he ru ka//dpa' po rnal 'byor ma tshogs
438a7(rgyud): can rang gi lha yi rab sbyor bas//bdag nyid ye shes mchog 'grub 'gyur//'di yis rgyal pa rgyo mtsho dang //dkyil 'khor ba dang zheng skyeng tshogs//gdod nas grub
438b1(rgyud): pa'i dur khrod gnas//mkha 'gro'i dbang phyug mgon po che//sku gsung thugs dang drin+da las tshogs//ye shes yon tAn rigs kyi lha//nag po chen po 'khor dang bcas
438b2(rgyud): lha mo tshon mo bka' 'bangs bcas//rdo rje 'dzin pas dus kun tu//sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis//phyi nang gsang ba'i mgon po che//bde ba chen po'i rol pa yis//
438b3(rgyud): ye shes gsang ba bsam mi khyab//tshe 'di nyid du 'grub 'gyur zhes/bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//thams cad na mkha'i mtshan nyid//na mkha' la ni
438b4(rgyud): mtshan nyid med//khams gsum po ni ma lus pa//'gro kun sgyu ma lta bu yin//brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba yis//'gro ba dmigasu med pa ste//mthong ba dang
438b5(rgyud): ni thos la sogs//thams cad sgyu ma lta bur 'char//gang gis skye bo 'ching gyur pa//de nyid yongs shes rnam par grol//phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni//sa
438b6(rgyud): gsum bde ba chen por bsgyur//nyon mongs med na ye shes med//nyan rang byang chub lam las ring //phung po khams dang skye mchod dang //'byung ba bzhi la
438b7(rgyud): sogs pa rnams//thams ca da gdod nas dag pa ye shes chen po'i byin rlabs kyis//dngos po du ma gsal bar snang//ye shos med par skye mi 'gyur//sangs rgyas
439a1(rgyud): so shes sa nga bskul//rlobs bla myod rgyud 'drer//'dud de dad pa bskyod pa b+ha gsang pa'o sdom pa bla na med//dang po bla mad ga ka/'o
439a2(rgyud): bsanA dang 'bras bu 'byung//sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin te/brten pa dag ni longs spyod yin//nges par brten pa mya ngan 'dre'i//rnal 'byor gyi ni dam tshig
439a3(rgyud): gdas//brda yi sbyor ba gas ba dang //dbang bskur bas ni dngos grub ster//bla ma de bzhin gshegs pa dang //rgyal ba byung chub sems dpar bcas//dkyi
439a4(rgyud): 'khor nag po bla na med//sngags pa gsang ba 'dir zhugs gang //yid dag bla me bsten par bya//'dir ni byang chub sems kyis ni//bsnyen phye nye byar bsnyen par

439a7(rgyud): ma skye dang //de nas bcom ldan 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis/bcom ldan 'das
439b1(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i gsung rmi lam lta bur nye bar gsam te/gsung rdo rje'i tshig 'di skad gsungaso//rdo rje 'dzin pa gang zhig gis//sgyu ma brag cha'i sgra brnyan ltar//yid
439b2(rgyud): 'ong deben pa'i gnas dag tu//dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa sgrub//bskal pa bzang po 'di la ni//byung ba'i mgon po ma lus pa//kun gyi snyid por gyur pa
439b3(rgyud): nItagasang ba zhing skyong mgon po che//sangs rgyas kun gyi mi gon po 'dis//bstan pa srung bar mdzad pa yin//zhes gsungaso//de nas byang chub sems dpa'
439b4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la sogs pa dang /rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//gang du rdo rje'i theg
439b5(rgyud): pa che//gsad pa bsdus pa'i yang dag lama?//sangs rgyas bstan pa srung byed pa'i//snying po 'bras bu lam byed pa//snyigs ma lnga ldan dus nyid du//'dren pa ye
439b6(rgyud): shes bstan pa srung //'di nyid gsang ba'i sgrub pa gang //rdo rje'i theg pa 'dir bstan gsol//de skad ces gsol pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
439b7(rgyud): 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/shes rab snying rje zung 'jug pa//ting 'dzin gang du sgom gyur pa//bla med dkon mchog bstan pa ste//rgol ba ngan pa bzlog par mdzad//na
440a1(rgyud): pa mchog po bstan pa la//'don dang spyod dang spyad pa gsum//lnga brgya dus kyi sgyogs ma lnga//bdag tu 'dzin pa spong bar mdzad//sku gsum
440a2(rgyud): ye shes lnga ldan par//gsang ba gcig pu bsgrub par bya//zhes bka' stsal te//gsang ba'i bde ba chen po dbyings la rab tu zhugs pa bcom ldan 'das dpal
440a3(rgyud): hUM ru kA rdo rje rang rig pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbusu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lhun gyi grub pa'i gnas gsang ba rang byung bla na med+ma
440a4(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje rab tu rgyal ba'i snying po mi phyed pa'i rdo rje'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i snying pa ye shes kyi dngos grub sgrubo cing bdud kyi
440a5(rgyud): g.yul las rab tu rgyal bar byed bzhis bya ba'i chos mi zad pa yang dag par 'byung po zhes bya ba ston par mdzad //rdo rje bzhi la gnas pa'i cha//gter gyi bum
440a6(rgyud): pa kha skyer ldan//dus kyi rgyal po 'od gsal ba//chu 'dzin phyogs tsam phyed ldan nyid//sgra dang sgra las khyab pa ste//du ma ma yin gnas pa'i yul//dam tshig
440a7(rgyud): gsang po 'byung ba las//rgyal ba rin chen 'bar ba'i gtso//byaM k+kas dus med par rang byung ba//chos 'byung po brang dkyil 'khor du//rigs kyi yon tan ldan par ni//
440b1(rgyud): na mkha'i rgya mtsho 'bras ldan pa//phun sum tshogs pa lhun gyis 'grub//mo phyed lhan cig skyes pa rgyal//pho brang gsang ba'i gnal yas khang //dkyil 'khor rin chen 'od 'khrug//
440b2(rgyud): bab+he sar pad+ma'i dbusu ni//kun nas zlum por 'khor ba ni//tshad med phreng bas rgyan pa ni//bkod pa dpag med rim par ldan//ri rab lhun po mchog byung bI//de nyid kun /
440b3(rgyud): nas yongs bskor ba'i//rgya mtsho dang ni ri rnams te//shin tu mnyam zhing mtshungs par 'khor//de nyid rim pa yongasu brta ni//bye brag mtshungs med dmar chen mtsho//rin
440b4(rgyud): pas chu bter 'o ma'i gnas//'byung ba bsdus pa mi lus kyi//phung po rus pa'i ri bo la//phyi nang mnyam pa'i tshad can gyi//lhun gyis 'grub par bstan pa yin//de las
440b5(rgyud): dngos po sna tshogs kyis//DA dang snang ba ye shes gzugs//rang byung bde ba chen po nyid//mnyam pa med pa kun tu 'byung //dus gsum de bzhin gshegs pa yi//
440b6(rgyud): 'byung gnas snying po rdo rje'i gang ni//rdo rje skyil krung mi phyed las//thog mtha' med pa'i rang bzhin can//gras ba chen po'i rigs dag pa'i//'dod chags rdo rje'i skur
440b7(rgyud): ldan pa//lho phyogs bya rkeng ri dang ni//dpal kye ri la mdun phyogs pa//d+ha na ka Ta parba te//pad+ma ge sar rgyas pa'i dbus//chos kyi 'byung gnas rtag par gnas//dang ldan dog
441a1(rgyud): ba'i khang pa brtsegs//gsang ba sngags kyi rgya mtsho yi//ma lus rgyal ba bgrod pa'i yul//gsong ba chos kyi dbyings chen po//dang ldan rgyu skar dkyil
441a2(rgyud): 'khor du//kla klo'i yul gyi mi rnams dang //lha dang lha min dri zar bcos//gsang chen yongasu rdzogs pa yi//rang byung ye shes pho brang du//tshangs dbang khyab 'jig dbang phyug
441a3(rgyud): bdag/dkyil 'khor sgo bzhir bcug nas kyang //skye bo chag can pa 'dul phyir//mchog tu gyur pa'i snying po gsungs//phyogs bcur gnas kyi sangs rgyas dang //byang chub
441a4(rgyud): sems dpa'i tshogs rnams dang //dpa' bo rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs//gang ga'i klung gi bye snyed kyi//khrag khrig ri rob rdul mnyam pa//de dbus song ge'i khro bzhugs
441a5(rgyud): pa'i//thub pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs//rdo rje 'dzin pa che ni pA la//rdo rje snying po sems dpa' tshe//bla gros phrag pa gcig gzar te//pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs//
441a6(rgyud): thal mo sbyar te 'di don zhus//gsang chen khyad par 'phags pa yi//lhun gyis 'grub pa'i phyag rgya che//mi 'gyur rdo rje theg pa'i lam//dus dang gnas dang gang zag ste//
441a7(rgyud): spyod yul bstan pa'i khyad par gyi//sgrub dang sgrub pa phrin las tshogs//thabs dang stobs dang 'jug pa ste//rim pa mngon byed rgyur ldan pa/de nyid bcom ldan gsung
441b1(rgyud): du gsol zhes gsol to//de nas bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/bla ma sangs rgyas bstan pa la//dka' zhing mgu la rab dad pa'i//sems dpa' chen pos gsang
441b2(rgyud): ba'i don//rab tu zhus pa legaso legs//shin tu rmad du byung ba yi//gdul dka' ma lus gdul don du//byang chub sems kyi ye shes mdzod//khyod la yang dag bstan
441b3(rgyud): par bya//de nas dngos grub thams cad kyi//grub pa rab tu sbyor byed pa//rgyal ba kun gyi snying po ste//gsang po las kyi rim pa nyid//dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//
441b4(rgyud): bstan pa srung zhing bka' la gnas//dam tshig 'dzin pa'o zhing skyong la//mgon po sa bcu'i dbang phyug gtso//dang ldan rig 'dzin thams cad la//mchog tu gyur pa'i
441b5(rgyud): las sgrub pi//dang ldan nag po chen po ni//'dis ni lha min 'dus pa yi//g.yul las rkyal bar byed pa yin//lha srin sde brkyang ma lus pas//mchod 'os gtso bor
441b6(rgyud): gyur pa yin//dpal ldan lha mo chen po dang //nag mo re mA tir gyur pas//lcam dral gyur pas bstan pa sruH//sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang ba//phyi nang de nyid kho na ri//
441b7(rgyud): de ni/yon tan phrin las dbang phyug tu//dam tshig mgon po zhing skyong ba//nyi shu rtsa bzhi gtso bo ste//gzhan dus gsum dbang byed pa'o//dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub
442a1(rgyud): 'byung ba'i rgyud las gas ba spyi la dgongs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o////de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba//'di nyid bla med sgrub pa po//'khor ba'o//
442a2(rgyud): rgya mtshor lhung ba yi//sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas ni//ji lta ji ltar grol 'gyur ba//de dang de yi thabs ston mdzad//dus ni bskal pa bzang po yi//rdzogs ldan//
442a3(rgyud): tha mar gyur pa yi//dpag med dus las 'das nas ni//gnyis ldan dang ni gsum ldan las//rtsod pa'i dus kyi rim pa la//thecom ldan tshe lo brgya pa'i dus//de nyid
442a4(rgyud): bstan pa'i snyigs ma yi//lnga brgya pa yi dus kyi mthar//shin tu gdug cing rtsub pa yi//mi srun pa yi dus kyi tshe//de tshe mgon po'i bstan pa 'byung //gang zag la
442a5(rgyud): yang gnyisu bshad//bsgral bar bya ba'i gang zag dang //sgrol bar byed pa'i sgrub po ste//dang po bstan pa 'jig byed cing //dkon mchog gsum po snod pa dang //bla ma la/
442a6(rgyud): sdang bdag la smod//de dag la sogs bya bar bshad//sgrub pa po ni rnam pa gsum//he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor ma//dag cing sbyangs te ting 'dzin gisal//rim pa go
442a7(rgyud): 'phang zab pa ste//thun mong spyi dang bye brag tu//dam chog gnas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin//gnas kyi khyad par 'byung ba yang //bsnyen po'i dus dang sgrub pa dang //las la sbyar
442b1(rgyud): ba'i dus shes pas//yid 'od dben dang dur khrod sogs//bsum gtan 'phel dang khyad par bya'o//yul dang dbang po'i spyod yul du//mthong ba dang ni thos pa dang //reg pa dang /
442b2(rgyud): ni dran pa yis//dkyil 'khor pa yi snang ba yang //ma lus dngos po gang shar ba//bde ba can du shes par bya//bstan pa kun las bsdus pa ni//byang chub sems dpa'i
442b3(rgyud): lam las kyang //gsang ba 'bras bu lam byed pa//rdo rje theg pa 'di nyid de//bstan pa 'dzin skyong srung dang gsum//'di ni khyad par srung ba yin//grub po bsnyen pa'i ting 'dzin
442b4(rgyud): dang nye bar bstan pa'i ting 'dzin dang //dpa ldan khrag 'thung ye shes che//rnam dag mtshan nyid kun grub pa//bde ba'i bsod nams rgyun gnas pa//rnam dag stobs ni rgyas
442b5(rgyud): par byed//bstan pa'i du su rang lha yi//he ru kar ni gnas pa yi//mdun du bka' sdod dam tshig gi/mgon po phyag bzhi bsgom par bya//de nas thugs kha'i rang sngags
442b6(rgyud): las so 'od 'phros 'khor ba'i bzlas pa las//khyad par du ni skra bcas dang //shin tu de la bar bzlas pa bya//nye bar bstan pa'i du su ni//bdag nyid he ru ka las ni//hUM phyung
442b7(rgyud): mdun du 'od 'phros pas//bskyed cing mthar ni nye bar bsdu//sgrub cing du su mgon po yi//rgyas 'debs spyi bor he ru ka/de nyid gsang sngags phyogs bcas pa//de nyid
443a1(rgyud): sems dpa' sum brtsig bsam//gsang ba zhing skyong rgyal po che//cho ga gsum gyis sgrub pa'i tshul//'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i bdag/thams
443a2(rgyud): cad bde chen gnas pa la//dus gsum 'khor lo gsum du gnas//brtul zhugs 'dzin pas 'thob par 'gyur//sgrub pa chen po bla na med//ye shes mgon po chen
443a3(rgyud): po nyid//khra gdeng la sogs lha mo brgyad//rim pa bzhin du yongasu bskor//dkyil 'khor pho brang dbu su yang //dur khrid du ni mgron po rol//'jig rten gsum na rnyed
443a4(rgyud): dka' ba//dam tshig spyod pa'i rang bzhin ni//rtag tu rang sngags sbas pa ste//rab tu 'bad de gsang bar bya'o//phrin las khyad par gang yin pa//las la sbyor ba rim shes bya//
443a5(rgyud): rengs par byed dang skrod pa dang //rmugs par byed dang brgyal du 'jug/rnam par rmongs dang lkugs par byed//dug gis 'dzin dang 'o na long dang //rang sha rang gis za byed
443a6(rgyud): cing nga/gshos ngan dug dang khrag tu skrag/'di dag dus min 'chi byed pa//las kyi khyad par yongasu bstan//cher dbab pa dang sprin dral dang //thog dang ser ba dbab pa/
443a7(rgyud): dang sa rang phyogasu ni bzlog cing srung //byad ka bzlog dang dag bcing dang //nus pa gzhom dang cho 'phrul dang //phran tshegs las kyi gsang ba'o//thabs ni las kyi rim pa ste//
443b1(rgyud): dang nA /dang ma mas /pa ba dang //ma pa rkyen ma gan nas na// na na du
443b2(rgyud): na du//mA nar 'jug pa'i go rims shes//rten tshul khyad par shes pa b+ha//snrubs ni chos rnams thams cad la//sgyu ma ste shes pa dang //yang dag bden pa
443b3(rgyud): stobs kyis ni//rang bzhin med par rtogs pas 'byung //'jug pa thun mong mi yin pa//byams phye snying rje byang chub sems//tshad med bshe dang ldan pa yis//'gro ba'i don
443b4(rgyud): mi sems pa 'o//mngon du byed pa nyer sgrub ste//dus dang grangs dang mtshan ma ste//dang po bar dang tha mar yong //gtso bo dang ni 'khor rnams kyi//gang grub ram+WA shing tha ma
443b5(rgyud): rug rtags kyi dbye ba bsteni pA yin//rgyuni thogs pa med pa yi//rten cing 'brel par 'byung \u0f7fste/mngon sum du ni 'byung ba ma//gang gis dgag par mi nus po//da las
443b6(rgyud): 'bras bu phun sum tshogs//snying po smi na pa bzhin du 'byed//gang du thogs med rdo rje yo//snying ba zang pa med pa'i don//yang dag ye shes snang ba po//bla me'i drin las
443b7(rgyud): thob par 'gyur//dpal mngon po chen po dngos gruba'i byung ba'i rgyud las gsang ba'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u sa gsum pa'o////de nas dbang ldan bdud 'joms pa'i
444a1(rgyud): sgrub pa ya / n+d+ha shod//sa ba mnan na na du po// pa'o ma dang sa so//sa ngam nga rnam na dang///nAg tun duH
444a2(rgyud): par rol//zhal btson+ti pa la phyag bzhi pa//gdul dka' 'dul ba'i dpa' bo ni//zhal gcig pa laM sprin gsum pa//me thung khros pa ut+pal mdog/mdo skyes gyen 'byung
444a3(rgyud): rngam pa'i sku//ra yi gdan lnga bzhugs mdzad cing //klu brgyad rgyun gyis brgyan pa po//khros pas char sprin nag po ltar//mi stag phung po lta bu yi//spyan gsum drag po'i
444a4(rgyud): skye bas gshegs//glang po'i tshul can stobs ldan pa//rgyu ma de shal sbyangs pa yi//mi mgo non pa'i phreng bas b+hAbs//shin tu mi srun sgeg pa'i sku//bdud 'dul chen
444a5(rgyud): bo lha yi ste//nyams ldan gzi brjid phun sum tshogs//ma rig mun sil sgrub pa'i nyams//rmad byung chos sgrogs bzhad par ston//bairtul zhugs spyod bye pa'i bo ste//
444a6(rgyud): gdug pa 'dul mdzad 'dzegs par smin//log lta spyong byed gtsigs pa'i nyams//gdug pa tshor gcod 'jigs par ston//ngo mtshar nyon mongs 'joms mdzad cing
444a7(rgyud): khri tshogs mi g.yo zhi ba'i thugs//g.yas kyi dang baM saM gr-i gug bsnams//g.yon gyi dang thos thod khrag 'dzin//yas kyi gnyis pas ral gri 'debs//g.yon pas/n+d+he/
444b1(rgyud): smon par ma //gsung gis twA hA zhes sgrogs pa//log pAr lta ba 'dzums par mdzad//sdug ga sgragasmra pa'i sham 'dus can//sna tshogs chu sgras ts+tsho mAr byAn+d+has/'ang byung
444b2(rgyud): rol pa'i stabs kyis gnas//de bo mdun du gtum pa mo//lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis me//mun pa'i mdog can zhal gcig ma/phyag gnyis spyan gsum khro tshul can/
444b3(rgyud): gug thod pa bsnams par mdzad//ya the laM phyag rgya drug gis brgyan//yum l-i lha yos rgyas byud+b+ha ba nas//sgra dang gnyis med 'khrul bar bzhugs//mi 'od phreng bas yongs
444b4(rgyud): bskud//ye shes rgya mutshwa'i 'khor bsrungs mo//shor phyogs mkho' 'gro 'phrog ma dang //spyi phyogs gleng ste ma zhes bya//nub kyi srin mo ral po can//byung dus yes gtsug
444b5(rgyud): na ni//gang du rgya mtsho chu dngas dang //nag po'i chu dang 'dra ba'i sku//ma rAngs 'joms byed nag po che//'bad pas snying rje bskyed pa nyid//bskrad par bya ba brjed pa skyid//
444b6(rgyud): rje med na mi 'grub pas//de phyir snying rje bskyed par ste//mtshams med lta ni byed pa dang //songs rgyas bstan pa 'khrug byed pa/sdang rinas kyi ting 'dzin gyis//shig rngu
444b7(rgyud): du bsadade par bya//gzas pa'i sha laM tag tsu rol//kun tu gtum pa'i shugs 'chang ba//yul dang yul du rol byed pas//shing rnams la no gnas nas kyang //dkyil 'khor
445a1(rgyud): zhing rnams sbyong bar byed//dur khrod gnas kyis yongasu bskor//ma mo'i gnas sngags khyab par byed//klu yis mchod pa'i zhing sbyang ba//mA yis phye mas
445a2(rgyud): yongasu bskor//sgo dang mig gis khyad par 'gyur//gtso bo'i sngags kyi lus can te//sgrub pa po yi lus la gnas//dri dag rim par dus bstan pa//dam tshig ldan pa'i
445a3(rgyud): sngags pa yis//sgrub pa'i rdzas rnams khyad par las//'bru nag gtor ma rab tu shis//sha chen gyis ni rgyan pa yi//tshogs rdzas pu dza gus pas dbul//phyi nang
445a4(rgyud): gsang ba khyad par lis//bstan pa'i tshul gyis phrin las las//bye brag rgyun dang gnas skabs pa//grub dang sgrub pas mngon du gyur//dus rnams kun tu zhe sdang gis//
445a5(rgyud): rnam pa kun tu gzhom mi bya/yul min pa las bsad byas na//rnal 'byor mtshig lngas nyams phyir//grub pa nam yang yod mi srid//khyad par ye shes bla med pa//
445a6(rgyud): dam tshig mgon por sgrub pa yi//dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che//bde bar gshegs pa'i lam sbyor mdzad//byang chub sems kyi zla ba 'di//yar ngo mar ngo rab tu gnas//
445a7(rgyud): yang ngo yis ni bskyed byed la//mar ngo la ni 'grib par byed//yang ngo yi ni bco lnga la//byang chub sems kyis mkha' gro yang //bde ba chen por 'du ba mdzad//'di ni ngas
445b1(rgyud): pa'i don du gsungs//dkyil 'khor lta nyid lus nyid yin//gzhan du lha dang dkyil 'khor ni//btsal yang rnyed par mi 'gyur zhes//'dren pa dpa' bos rtag tu gsungs//sku/
445b2(rgyud): gsung thugs kyi gsang ba la//drag po kun gyi srog gyur pa//yon tan phrin las dbang phyug gi/phyi nang gsang ba'i bdag po yin//ston pa gnas pa'i rang bzhin las//'khor
445b3(rgyud): lo dgag bya gnyis med bstim//dngas snyigs las ni rgyu 'bras dang //gnas pa khyad par rten 'brel te//'khrul dang 'khrul pa ma yin pa//khams gsum kun la dbang byed
445b4(rgyud): pas//'jig rten las dang ye shes kyi//mgon po'i khyad par mngon du 'byung //gdagos pa tha snyad khyab pa po//thun meng par ni bstan pa yin//'di dag las dang skye bo
445b5(rgyud): las//sgrib pa thun mong lha yi cha//dngos dang rgyud pas lung bstan pa//srog deng srog ma yin pa ste//rgyu dang rkyen dang bskul ba yis//gsang sngags bzlas pa mngon par phye///
445b6(rgyud): 'di ni mngon du 'byung ba'o//dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gsang ba mngon par 'byung ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o////de nas yang dag bshad bya
445b7(rgyud): pa te ru ka dpal mgon nyid kyi ni//gsang ba'i sprul pa nag po che//'di yi sgrub rim bshad par bya//gsang ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs mazhog ste//skal pa can la sbyin par bya//
446a1(rgyud): glang du sgrub pa'i sa phyogasu//mi mthun ga yong ba spang byas nas//de nas nag pas bsgrub par bya//'gro ba kun la rab bltas nas//tshad med byang
446a2(rgyud): chub sems kyi blos//snying rje chen pos bskyod byas nas//bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni//lhor bltas sgra grol gcer bu yis//dang por skad cig tsam gyis ni//rang
446a3(rgyud): lhor bskyed pa'i snying kha ru//a las zla bo'i dkyil 'khor yang //bsil zhing 'od dang bcos pa bsam//rang steng raM las nyi dkyil 'khor//rta bdun 'od zer tsha ba dang //
446a4(rgyud): mo yi rang bzhin 'phro ba bsam//de dbus yI gaM hUM nag po//ye shes lnga pa'i rang bzhin can//de yis 'od kyi snang ba las//dpag med kha dog bzhi bcas bsam//
446a5(rgyud): rang bzhin gan su 'phros pa las//bla ma dang ni lhag pa'i lha//dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bcas pa dang //nag po chen po 'khor dang bcas//mdun gyi na mkhar bzhugs
446a6(rgyud): pa la//skyabasu 'gro dang mchod pa dbul//sdig pa bshags pa la sogs bya//bzod par gsol nas gshegasu gsol//de rjes dngos po thams cad kun//ma lus
446a7(rgyud): stong pa nyid gzhug cing //oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA swa b+hA shud+d+ho&haM/oM badz+ra shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA/badz+ra shud+d+ho&hi/oM yo ga shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho&ha~M/zhes brjod
446b1(rgyud): par bya'o//phyi dang nang gi dngos po kun//gdong nas dag pa'i ngang du bsam//de nyid hUM dang bcas pa yang //nA da tsam du gnas pa las//na mkha' lta bu'i ngang las ni//tshangs pa'i
446b2(rgyud): gnas bzhi khyab par bya//de las sa pan+da 'di dag ni//'tshad bzhin pa las rim pas bsam//yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang //raM las me I dkyil 'khor dang //baM dkar chu
446b3(rgyud): yi dkyil 'khor te//l-i las gser gyi sa gzhi nyid//de steng bruM las ri rab 'byung //de dag phyi nang ngo bo nyid//de dag steng gi cha la yang //dbu su paM las pad+ma ni//sna tshogs
446b4(rgyud): pad+ma rgya che ba//lte ba gaM sar bcas dbus//ha las sna tshogs rdo rje ni//kha dog lnga dang ldan par bsam//de dbus r-i las nyi ma yi//hUM yig sa bon las byung ba//se gzhi ma
446b5(rgyud): lus rdo rjer gyur//steng 'og phyogs mtshams rdo rje dang //ral gri 'khor lo mda' dang ni//phur bu gri gug kha T+wAM ga/rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang ni//rtse gsum nyi shu rtsa lnga'i sngags/
446b6(rgyud): du ma rnam par 'phros nas ni//shin tu rgya rje bsdam par bya//bla re ra ba sogs dang ni//gur gyi rnam par mtsha mas bcing bya//me 'od 'bar ba khyad par 'gyur//'di dag srung
446b7(rgyud): ba'i khyad pa'o//khru lis byung ba'i 'khor lo ni//rtsibs bcu pa ni yongasu 'khor//de stengs raM las nyi dkyil 'khor//de yi dbu su hUM mdzad do//zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste//
447a1(rgyud): rin tshon k+Sha dang du rgyun dang ldan//rol pas rnam par sgrog par bsam// la sa nyama'i dkyil 'ar dbus//de stengs hUM bcu rnam par bsam//de la
447a2(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po bcu//zhal phyir gzigs pa rnam par bsam//khro bo de dag re re zhing //phyog myong bcu po gdan la ni//bkug nas gnyis med bzhugs par bsam//
447a3(rgyud): lha gsang sngags brjod tsam gyis//phur bus gdab dang brdung bar bya//des ni bla med mchog dag gyur//khro bo de dag re re zhing //brtan par bya phyir gsang sngags brjod//
447a4(rgyud): oM dkar 'khor lo dang bcas pa//'od ldan de las spros bsdus pas//bcom ldan rang bzhin yangs shing khyab//'od du zhu nas gzhal yos khang //rin chen sna
447a5(rgyud): las grub pa//gru bzhi sgo dang rta babs bcas//rdo rje dang ni nor bu yi//'od zer 'khrugs pa'i rnam pa'o//pho brang nang ma zlum po la//re mig dgu pa rdo rjes bskor//
447a6(rgyud): phyi ni pad+ma mu khyud bcas//de yi nang na e yi dbyibs//dran po'i gnasu bsam par bya//dbus ma'i nang du paM las ni//pad+ma nye zlar bcas pa bsam//A li kA
447a7(rgyud): 'dres pa las//de las na mkha'i sa bon te//na mkha' las ni hUM byung ste//gnyis med zhudas las 'od du zhu//de la rdo rje gri bug bsam//'od kyi snang bas khyab pa mas//
447b1(rgyud): skad cig gis ni sku rdzogs pa//nag po chen po bsam par bya//bral gcig phyag bzhi 'jigs pa'i gzugs//dpa' bo chen po rol pas bzhugs//yang yum gnyi su med par
447b2(rgyud): bsam//de ltar yib yum rdzogs bskyed nas//mkha' gsang byin gyis brlang bya ste//sngags brjod pas ni dkris pa bskyed//de las dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnams//yab yum/
447b3(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs pa las//yum gyi mkha' dbyings bde chen du//so sor tshogs bskyed byas la//phyi rol du ni rim gyis 'byung //dang por gtso bo'i rgyan dang bcas//rdzogs
447b4(rgyud): par phyung ste d+hi ti nAs//gyen du thugs kha'i pad+ma los//'thon te 'gro ba'i don byas la//slar 'dus rang la shrI me gyur pa//dpa ldan snying rje'i stobasu gnas//de las rim pa ji bzhin
447b5(rgyud): du phyung nas so so'i gdan la bzhugs//gtso bo'i phyogs bzhir mkha' gro ba ni//zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa ste//gar stabs ldan pa'i lha mo ni//g.yas brkyang ba ni rnam pa
447b6(rgyud): 'gyed //dpa' mo bde ba'i skur bskyed pa'o//mtshams bzhir thod pa bdud rtsis bkang //sna tshogs pad mda' la gnas pa//rI ma la gnas mgon po ni/shar du sku yi mgon
447b7(rgyud): po nang //lho ru yon tan mgon po dang //nub tu gsung gi mgon pa dang //byang du las kyi mgon po ste//thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa//bri gug thod pi bi snrums pa'o//
448a1(rgyud): so so'i g.yon du yum re re//gtum mo dang ni drag mo dang //bzlog byed ma dang dpa' mo ste//zhal glacig phyag gnyis rgyan dang bcas//de yi phyi yi
448a2(rgyud): gru chad la//beng 'dzin pa dang kha T+wAM gai/gaN+DI 'dzin dang rgyal mtshan 'dzin//so so'i yum dang bcas pa ste//zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'bar ba'o//de yi phyi rol sgo
448a3(rgyud): dang grwa ra//lha mo brgyad po gar gyis rol//thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa//gA ra stabs ldan pas bzhugs pa'o//dkyil 'khor lha rnams rdzogaso pa dang /
448a4(rgyud): de nas gtso bo yab yum dag/snyoms par zhugs pas 'od du zhu//de nas lha mo bzhi yis ni//rdo rje tshad med dbyangs kyi bskul//e baM si ta u Da na nI b+hU dza ti d+ha ma
448a5(rgyud): d+ha mA g+ha ma g+ha ma i ka ma/d+ha d+ha sha ri d+ha raM/sa ni sa sas ni ga maM sa sa sA/ri ga mo bu ma twe sa ri sa ra sa ri r-i sa khI/ma hAM ma a d+hA ma saM sa/shru tr-i nAM sA sa sA//
448a6(rgyud): sa ni sa ri ta g+ha ma aM g+hi/a ta ma tA ya/sa swa pa pa/ma ya a pA sa d+haM nA ma a I//de ltar bskul bar gyur pa las//de ltar nye bar gsan nas ni//thugs
448a7(rgyud): rje'i ngang las bzhengs mdzad do//nag po gsang ba'i bu dang bcas//shin tu 'jigs shing 'bar ba'i sku//bdud 'dul chen po rgyan dang bcas//spro ba dang ni bsdu bar
448b1(rgyud): mdzad//de nyid brtan dang mnyes par mdzad//sku gsung thugs ni rgyas gdab cing //ye shes gzhug dang dbang bskur dang //byin gyis brlabs dang mchod pa dang //sngags kyis brtan
448b2(rgyud): ched bzlas pa bya//bdud rtsi myang dang bstod cing bskul//ting 'dzin don bsam nyer bsdu bya//de na sa ldang bar gyur pa na//gnyis pa lha rnams thams cad kun//skad cig gis na
448b3(rgyud): rdzogs bya ste//de yi ngang la ting 'dzin//gsang ba khyad par brjod par bya//rnam rtog bzhi tshogs kyis bcings la//rtog pa dag pa'i thabs mchog ldan//rnam rtog rang bzhin
448b4(rgyud): yongs shes na//de nyid thob du med pa ste//bde ba chen po yang dag 'byung //chags pa med pas kun tu spyad//'di de'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor pa//rig ma rnams la rol byed na'ang //
448b5(rgyud): de nyid shes la bcing med de//rnam par rol pa'i tshul mchog//dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gsang ba lha'i gnas mngon par 'byung ba'i le'u ste/
448b6(rgyud): lnga pa'o////de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//gang du sngags kyi yi ge dang //bzang po'i sngags kyi phreng ba 'di//rdzi rnga bcings pa las shes bya//re mig bdun pa'i grangs kyis
448b7(rgyud): ni//kun nas mnyan par dgod par bya//mkhas pas dbyings dang gsal byed ni//sde tshan rim pas phye ba nyid//kun nas bskor ba'i tshul gyis ni//rim pa bzhin du btu bar bya//
449a1(rgyud): snga tshan drug pa'i lnga pa ni//ha yi mdon gnas pa blang //um+ma Sha yi bzhi pa nyid//wa 'og gnas pa de nyid de//rdza tshan gnyis pa'i dang por ste//pA yi snang
449a2(rgyud): nu gnas par blang //en+tas+tha yi gsum pa ste//ya yi steng ma yang dag blang //sde tshan brgyad pa'i bzhi pa ni//ma yi steng na gnas pa skyer//sde tshan dang po'i gnyis pa nyid//1
449a3(rgyud): yi 'og na gnas pa sbyar//sde tshan dang po'i lnga pra ste//Da yi 'og na granas par sbyar//sde tshan drang po'i bco lnga pa//d+hi yi steng na gnas pa yi//zla chesna thig los brgyan par
449a4(rgyud): byA//sde chen dang po bcu bzhi pa//de yi 'og me'i yi ge la//dbyangs kyi bco lnga po yin te//d+hU yi 'og mas brgyan par bya//de nyid thog mar sbyin bya yin//sde tshan drug pa'i
449a5(rgyud): gnyis pa yin//ne yi 'ogan gnas pa ste//bzhi pa yi ni thog ma gang //ra yi 'og ma sbyar byas te//tha mar 'byung ba'i drug pa ste//'di ni yid skyon nor bu ster//chu yi stang na
449a6(rgyud): gronas pa gang //b+ha yi 'og ma rnam par blang //Ta yi steng mas brgyan par bya//ho yau 'og na gnas pa dang //wa yig 'og ma bzung bar byo//pa ye steng ma nyid btu bya//ya
449a7(rgyud): yi steng na gnas pa las//nya yi steng mas las kun byed//ma yi stong gnas yi ge nyid//ra yi 'og ma sbyar byas la//nyis 'gyur d+ha yi steng mas rgyan//tsaM ye stong na gan+da/
449b1(rgyud): pa la ma ma sbyang ma drung du bzhog//'di ni dngos grub 'byung ba'i gnas//da yaM stang ma'i yAM ga la//d+hA yaM snying mas yang dgu rgyun//rig byed mngon sum dang por gnas//ma lus
449b2(rgyud): ye shes sbyar gyur pa'o//tha yaM 'ag na gnas pa la//b+he yi 'og ma'i yi ge dang //Na yi 'og nas rab sbyin dang //sa yi 'og ma yang dge blang //tha 'og Da 'og sten du sbyar/
449b3(rgyud): sa bar gnas yi ge dang //dz+nyA yi 'og ma bdag po ste//sha yi bar na gnas pa bzung //kha dang a yi bA rA gnas pa//tA yi 'og ma ny+dza stengs ldan//ma yi steng gnas ri 'og
449b4(rgyud): sbyar//thig las rgyan pa nyis 'gyur sbyar//tsa yi steng na gnas pa la//a yi steng mAs brgyan pa drung //'di ni sbas pa'i snying po ste//rang srog yi ger gsang ba'o//de yi steng
449b5(rgyud): mo'i yi ge lA//d+ha yi steng mas brgyan par bya//sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes che//snying po bzlas pa'i rig pa ste//bak+ku shis pa ni thog mer sbyar//na yi steng mas yang dag
449b6(rgyud): rgyun dza yi gling ma d+ha stengs sgyur//sa la bor gnas Da sting sa sbyar//big le nA das brdzun par bya//na 'o/d+hA stengs mgo bar sbyin//'di las mi stengs ri 'ag ldan//thig
449b7(rgyud): zlachos dag gis mtshan//tsa yi steng na gnas pa la//ra yi 'og ma drung du sbyin//b+ha stengs gnas pa la 'og sbyar//nya yi 'og ma yang dag ldan//shes par gnas nye 'og
450a1(rgyud): sbyar/'di ni gsang ba'i bzlas pa sku// stobs ldan nyid yin//gang du mngon par phyogs pa yi//dang ldan+d+ha nug po chen po yi//gsang sngags mchog tu
450a2(rgyud): gyur pa 'dis//stong dang brgya pa bcur 'gyur gyis//rigs ni dam pa'i sA la gnas//thob pa yul dang yul du gnas//pha yi 'og ma dang por blang //ha ye 'og ma blang
450a3(rgyud): byas la//tha yi skyeng ma sbyin par bya//DA yi steng ma'i drung nyid du//sha yi thog mas brten par bya//pha yi steng mas btu bar bya//la yi steng ma'i yi go la//Da yi steng
450a4(rgyud): skyon du sbyar//nya yi steng mo nyes 'gyur la//phyi ma nya yI 'og mas rgyan//e yi 'og gyur bsdus pa la//sha yi steng ma drung du sbyar//la yi 'og ma rgyan du byas//nyaM yi/
450a5(rgyud): 'on zhi sbyin par bya//oM yaM 'og na gnas pa la//nya yi 'og mas brgyan par bya//da yi 'og mar gnas pa la//thig le nA da dog gis rgyan//da yi 'og ma'i yi ge lwa//
450a6(rgyud): u yi stong mi sbyin par bya//tshwa yi steng na gnas pa dang //b+hU yi 'og ma rnam par blangs//ta yi steng mas brgyan par bya//d+hA ye 'og ma gnas pa dang //wa yi 'og ma
450a7(rgyud): bzung bar bya//sa yi stong ma nyid nus la//ya yi steng na gnas pa las//nya yi 'og gnas de la rgyan//nya yi 'og mo kun gyi rten//sa yi steng ma blang bar bya//zla yi steng
450b1(rgyud): na glanas pa la//lA yi 'og mas brgyan par bya//pa yi stong ma nyid de blang //d+ha yi 'og ma nga stong dang //pa yi stong na granas pa 'o//yu yi stong ma yang dag blang //e yi 'og gnas
450b2(rgyud): yi bre la//d+ha yi steng ma mgo bor sbyin//la za bar gnas pa la yang //Na yi steng mas brgyan par bya//ma stongs thig le nA das rgyan//dzaM 'og gnas pa'i yi ge la//du sbrengs
450b3(rgyud): sa ye steng ma dang //pha 'og ta yi 'ogo mas rgyan//dza yi gong na gnas pa dang //ma yi steng mas stengs gnas//ya yi steng ma nyid dang ldan//dzA 'og nya yi steng ma la//d+ha yi ste
450b4(rgyud): mas mgo bor rgyan//Da yi 'ogam sha stengs ldan//thig le nA das rgyan pa'o//Da yi steng mas tsha nyid du//sha yi thog mas ton par bya//pha yI stang ma btu bar bya//la stengs
450b5(rgyud): gnas pa Ta stengs sbyar//nya yi steng du nyis 'gyur ba/phyi mo'i nye yi 'og mas rgyad//dbyangs yig dang po ka 'og can//sau stengs gnas pa nyid dang yang //u steng gnas pa
450b6(rgyud): yang dag btsas//so steng gnas pa thig les rgyan//nyi yi steng ma'i gnas pa la//oM yi 'og gnas ga bdun gnas//taM yi 'og ma mgo bor sbyin//nga steng gnas pa Na 'og
450b7(rgyud): sbyar//la stengs gnas pa Ta 'og bcas//la 'og zung gnas sbyar bar bya//b+ha yi 'og ma'i yi ge la//ma stangs gnas pa stan du byas//sha yi chod rje'i steng mar sbyar//
451a1(rgyud): 'og gnas pa nyid drung ste//b+ha stongs banas pa'i 'og mas rkyen//sha stengs drung du sbyin par bya//la steng sha yi thog ma la//phyi ma nya 'og gnas pas/
451a2(rgyud): mdzes//Ta 'og sha thog thig les rgyan//sha thog ri yi 'og mas rgyan//ba tho kr-i la stangs gnas pa sbya ro//de la ny+Ni 'og sbyin par bya//ba stengs gnas pa la 'og ldan//
451a3(rgyud): nya 'og dag gis yang dag mdzes//kro ga bar gnas pa nyid la//nyes 'gyur du ni bsngo bar bya//g+ha steng gnas pa dI nyid lo//nya 'gro brgyan pa nyid du bya//ma yi thog mar
451a4(rgyud): Da 'og bcas//g+ha stengs gnas pa nyid dang ni//wa 'og gnas pa tha 'og sbyin//ha 'i ga Na yi 'og mar ldan//de yi nyis 'gyur shes par bya//kha dog ma yi yi ge la//
451a5(rgyud): su ri bar gnas sbyar bar bya//ma steng pha 'ag 'og tu sbyin//de ni nyis 'gyur sbyar bar bya//tsha yi steng ma pha theg drung //ShA yi theg ma drung du gnos//do ni zung du sbyar par
451a6(rgyud): byad ma steng gnas pa sa thog drung //nyis 'gyur rim por shes par bya//sha thog gnos pa wa thog drung //lan gnyi su ni brjod par bya//kai 'gra gnas pa pha ston pa//ba
451a7(rgyud): 'og stan du byas pa nyid//nyis 'gyur dag tu shes par bya//b+ha stengs gnas pa Ta stengs drung //Sha ya 'og ma stan du byas//sha yi steng Di'i 'og mas rgya nau//d+hA 'og
451b1(rgyud): a thog sngon du sbyar//pha la stong ma drung du bzhag/ha yo 'og ma Na 'og ldan//pha thog drag par 'gyur ba'o//sha stengs thA yAM 'og yas rgyan//'di nyid rim pa mngon spyod pa'o//
451b2(rgyud): mA ra ya mi thA ga mar sbyar//maM yi steng gi nas ri 'og sbyar//nyis 'gyur TIg le nA ngas rgyun//tsU yi steng na granas pa laM//i yi steng ma rgyun pa drung //b+hU thog tha thog gnas pa sbya
451b3(rgyud): de la nya yi dog mas na//ma steng gnas pa nya'og ni//yang dag stan du bya ba'o//'di ni dri med bde ba'i gte rA//snying po gsang sngags 'di nyid ni//gang du gnas
451b4(rgyud): su/nag po chen po'i 'khor dang bcas//ma lus zhing skyong 'khor dang bca so//dur khod rol ste spyad drang //sha za'i tshogs rnams 'dre ba bzhin//nges par 'du bar byed pa ste/
451b5(rgyud): bstan pa rgya mtsho srung byed pa'o//dpag tshad brgyad khri'i bar du ni//de yi bgegs rnams ma lus po//til 'bru tsam du byed par mdzod//snying po 'di ni zlos byed cing //gang du
451b6(rgyud): myi gcig tu yang //mched mngon par sems pa yi//he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor la//'jigs pa kun las srung ba dang //zhi ba dang ni nus pa dang //de bzhin dbang dang mngon
451b7(rgyud): spyod la//thogs pa med par 'grub par 'gyur//ji srid mtshan ma ma byung gi/bar du 'bad de bsgrub par bya//mtshan ma byung nas bla ma yi//man ngag bzhin du las la sbyar//
452a1(rgyud): dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las kasang sngags kyi le'u ste drug pa'o///de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//yang
452a2(rgyud): dag ye shes bskyed pa po//gdug pa ma lus 'dul mdzad pa//gtum po de yi gsang ba'i yum//lha mo bzhi dang bcas pa yi//gsang sngags btu ba bshad par bya///
452a3(rgyud): dbyangs yig bcwo bzhi pa dag lce//thig le nA das rnam par rgyan//rig byed mngon sum dang por gnas//drug pa yi ni lnga pa dang //mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang //bdun
452a4(rgyud): po yi ni dang po nyid//an+tas+tha yi gsum pa ste//dang po'i grwa sum pa thog tu sbyin//lnga pa'i lnga pa gsum paste rgyan//gnyis pa yis ni dang po la//An+tas+dza yi gsum pas
452a5(rgyud): stan//dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa yis rgyan//drug pa yi nI dang po dang //dbyangs kyi dgu pas gnas der sbyar//gnyis pa yi ni dang po ni//an+ta sgra yi gsum pa dang //dri
452a6(rgyud): nyid kyi ni gnyis pa dang //lnga pa yi ni dang po la//dbyangs kyi bdun pas steng 'og sbyin//lnga pa yi ni lnga pa la//dbyangs kyi gsum pa mgo bor spyan//gsum pa yi ni dang
452a7(rgyud): la//drung du lnga pa'i lnga pa sbyar//lnga pa'i bzhi pa dag dang sbyar//dang po'i dang po'i drung du ni//gnyis pa'i gsum pa sbyar ba dang //mthar gnas las kyi phyi ma yi//de la dbyangs
452b1(rgyud): kye gsum pas rbAn//ar+thas+thA yo drang po la//dbyangs yig bcu gcog pa yIs rgyan//brgyad pa yi ni bzhi pu la//dbyangs yog drug pa dang blos rgyun//TIbA le nA das mdzes pa'o//
452b2(rgyud): drug pa yi ni gnyis pa nyid//bzhi pa yi ni thig ma sbyar//'di ni gsang ba'i gtum pa mo//drag cing shin tu cher 'jigs byed//yid bzhin nor bu'i rigs 'dzin gter//bkra
452b3(rgyud): shes pa ni thog mar sbyar//mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa la//dbyangs yig bdun pa steng 'og sbyar//thig le nA das mdzes pa yin//uR+YA ShA yi bzhi pa la//dbyangs yig drug
452b4(rgyud): pa dang sbyar ba//an+ta s+tho yi gnyis pa sbyar//de nyid thig las mdzes par byas//gnyis pa'i dang po blang byas la//dbyangs kyi dgu pa blang ba nyid//drug pa yi ni pa la//su
452b5(rgyud): 2 yi bzhi pa dang //gnyis pa yi ni dngango po dang //dbyangs yig bcu pa sbyar bar bya//bdun pa yi ni gnyis pa dang //gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang //lnga pa'i dang po btu bar bya//

452b7(rgyud): pa dang //phyi ma'i yang ni bzhi pa la//lnga pa yi yang lnga pa la//dbyangs kyi gsum pas margyan par bya//dang po yi ni dang po dang //drug pa yi ni lnga pa la//dbyangs kyi lnga
453a1(rgyud): pas brtan par bya//gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang //mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa la//an+mA s+tha yi dang po sbyar//mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang //bdun
453a2(rgyud): pa yi ni lnga pa dang //drug pa ye ni bzhi pa sbyor//lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang //dbyangs kyi dgu pa'i yi ge lA//lta pa'i bsum pa badregs par bya//usmA Sha yi gsum pa la
453a3(rgyud): lnga pa'i dang po sbyar bar bya//thig le nA das yang dag rgyan//drug pa yi ni gosum pa dang //an+ta s+tha yi dang po ste//yi ge gsum gyi bdag nyid kyis//nyis 'byur dag tu sbyar

453a5(rgyud): sbas pa mchog gyur pa//lha mo nag mo ye shes che//sngags ni drag cing sdud pa'o//dri nas ye shes lnga ldan bri'i//rig byed mngon sum dang por gzhag/drug pa yi ni
453a6(rgyud): lnga pa dang //mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa la//gnyis pa ye ni dang po nyid//an+ta s+tha yi gsum pa ste//dang po'i gsum pa thog tu sbyin//dang po'i bcu drug pa mtha'
453a7(rgyud): byed mthar ni hUM phaT sbyar bar bya//sde tshan gnyis pa'i dang po la//an+ta s+tha yi gnyis pa sbyar//dang po'i dbu pa blang ba nyid//drug pa yo ni lnga pa la//thig le nA ngas brtan
453b1(rgyud): 'o//gnyis pa yi ni dang po la//drung du de nyid lnga pa sbyar//gnyis pa'i dang po de nyid dang //dbyangs kyi dbu pa skur bar b+ha//mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pA la//bdun pa yin
453b2(rgyud): gnyis pa sbyar//de la thig le nA das n+yanA//gnyis pa yi ni dang po la//an+tasgra yi gsum pa dang //bdun pa yi ni gnyis pa sbyar//lnga pa'i dang po nyid la yang //dbyangs
453b3(rgyud): kyi bdun po steng 'og sbyar//bdun pa yi ni gnyis pa la//thig le nA das mdzes byas pa'o//'di dag kun gyi thob ma dang //tha mar yang dag brten par bya//'di ni DA ki bzhi dag gi

454a1(rgyud): /brud du//khyod cing bskul ba'i las grub pa//skyon gsung ba rlom bzhin du//dbab dang sngags pa pazlog pa ste//rna ba yan lag las banor 'gyur//dang
454a2(rgyud): po thun mong dgu pa ste//gnyis pa bye brag phyed pa dang //bskyed pa'i ye shes mi bzlog pa//klung suM chud pa phyag rgya che//snying po gcig la dus gsum du//'gyur med de nyid
454a3(rgyud): dbye ba nyid//gcig las du ma'i ngo bo cano//'jig rten po dang ye shes che//myi 'gyur ba dang 'bugs pa dang //las rnams byed pa'i srog gyur pa//gsang sngags 'kho

454b1(rgyud): /Aka tA kAr+b+ha rlu /asprul /n+d+ha n+da//mas da dang nyam su yang //nag don na paldan pa rten du//!m+b+ha ma yang ston pa//mon ga thung gsus byung

456b1(rgyud): byas nas kyang //rang mdun gru gsum nag po yi//nang du gzugs de gzhug par bya//de la lha dang dbye ba dang //nyes pa dad+mo zhing bsgrag par bya//de nas bdag nyid lha dang ni//mdun

457b1(rgyud): kar zhungs nag la sogs pa'o//thun rdzas rnams la sngag sra bzlas shing //dus dus dag tu bajog par bya//skabs skabs dug go chu yis brdog/gal ta gu gul nag po dang //

457b3(rgyud): thabs 'di yis//dgra yi khang par bya rog dreg/mang po 'ba' zhig skad 'don dang //lus la tsha bas thabs la sogs//du ma'i cho 'phrul 'byung bar 'gyur//dang por nang /

457b5(rgyud): pa'o////de nas gdug pa 'dul don du//nag po chen po khros pa yi//sgrub pa'i rim pa mchog gyur pa//gzhin yang rab tu bshad pa ro bya//rje btsun he ru ka dpal
457b6(rgyud): dang //nag po chen po'i lha tshogs rnams//na mkha' mngon par bltas nas ni//bdun po yongasu dag par bya//bzod par gsol ba gshegasu gsol//de rjes stong pa'i
457b7(rgyud): dang las ni//tshang med bzhi po bsam par bya//byang chub sems kyi dang las ni//pad+ma zla nyir gnas pa yi//hUM yig nag por bsam par bya//de yi 'od kyis khyab pa las//bsdus/
458a1(rgyud): da rtug na gyur pa//da na na d+hun tha na/ bas na gsum pa/gas sgyu myu nga shin d+ha ngan ka/dbu skra khaman/
458a2(rgyud): gyen du rjes//g.yas paM ga shin rje'i lce 'dra ba'o//gri gu ge rnon po 'dzin par mdzad//g.yon parjod pa khrig bkang bsnams//thod pas sgra mtshams bcings pa dang //man
458a3(rgyud): lag thung zhing rags pa'i gzugs//mche gtsigs 'jig su rung ba ste//ltos 'gro brgyad dang rin chen brgyad//rgyu mo'i ga sha stag lpags can//mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng
458a4(rgyud): ba 'phyang //zhal nas khrag 'jig dang rgyangs can//phyag N+DI drug gis sku laM smras//dran ze'i nyams dang ldan pa ste//skad cig tsam gyis bskyed par bya//de yi thugs
458a5(rgyud): khar nyi myu la//ye shes sems dpa' gsal bar dmigs//ting 'dzin sems dpa' dang bcas pa//rten dang brten par bcas pa byas ma//de la 'di yi gsang sngags
458a6(rgyud): byung //oM badz+ra ma hA kA lA ya hU hU~M phaT/ji srid skyo bar ma gyur pa//gsang sngags phreng ba bzlas par bya//de nas sha chen spras sreg cing //gzhan yang dug dang khrag la
458a7(rgyud): sogs//bdug pa'i du bas mchod par bya//mo sha 'bras dang so ba dang //'bru nig me tog byug pa dang //sgron pa lnga dang mi 'tshe lnga//khur ba chen dang chang la sogs//gtor
458b1(rgyud): ma nag po che la dngul//mchod drang bstod pa tshul bzhin bya//'di yi nye bar spyad pa ni//bsgrub bya'i zag pa'i rdzas rnams dang //tsha ba gsum la sogs pa la//gang gi ming drang bcas
458b2(rgyud): pa'i gzugs//byAs d+d+hi dug gis byugs nas kyang //tshe rims bkang ste tha'i klung du//sa phub ma la gdung la sogs//bya ba ste tshogs las byas na//skad cig gis ni brlag par
458b3(rgyud): byed//rdo rje slo dpon smr-i de byed cing //sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig byed pa//hrInr-i me tshig+sa gi su me la snang ba ding //sem+b+has tsanA~M kA ni la 'chi ba rnams//di dag nag pa chen pos sgrol
458b4(rgyud): yan lag dag gi sha tshod lo//mgon po nag po'i zhal du gsol//yang na de yi sbyi nas ni//til tsam du ni mdzad du gsol//khrag gi rgyun yang 'thung bar mdzad//de ltar phrin las
458b5(rgyud): las btsal bya//de nas sbyin sreg brtsam par bya//phung shul g.yul spyad la sogs pa//dur khrod sel bas byug byas te//gru gi sum rim pa kha khyer ldan//de yi nang du drug
458b6(rgyud): po'i shing //tsher ma can gyis partsig par bya//mtshad dang srog rdzas gtor ma dang //bsgrub bya'i ling ga sha chen dang //nyungs kar bcas pas yongasu bskor//sngags pas lhor
458b7(rgyud): bltas ting 'dzin zhugs//me lha bskyed cing dgug gzhug bya//ling gi phur btab ba tu so byas la//me sbar bsregs pas lha la mchod//gsang sngags 'dod yin bsgyur ldan
459a1(rgyud): pa/phrag gcig gis ni lan gtsug s+ho//lan grangs rol mtsho'i khyad par gyis//phyir mo bzlog cing srog gtor byed//de rjes gsol gdab btsal bskul/

459a3(rgyud): po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las drag po'i sbyin sreg bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o////de nas dkyil 'khor chen po yi//dur khyed gnas pa'i zhing spyod dang //

459a5(rgyud): 'di ni kun tu sbas//dang ldan mgon pa rdo rje can//khro ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku//dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs dpa' ba ni//shin tu 'gying zhing 'bar ba'i sku//le
459a6(rgyud): tshe dgu pa'i dbusu ni//sna tshogs pad+ma nyi dbus la//dpa' bo chen po phyed dkyil tshul//zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa//spyan gsum b+ha ru la ltar dmar//sku mdog
459a7(rgyud): sngon po 'jigs chen po//thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan//phyag rgya lnga ldan gar gyis rol//dang pos gri gug thod pa dang //gnyis pa ral gri kha T+wAM gaM/klu brgyad rkyen

461a1(rgyud): /mangs pa shabradz+nyAn yul rnam//N+Da ya bar ma shog d+hA/kun d+hob+ha ban+dan pa dong mor babyas//gzung 'dzin sa sar ka ka 'o//srid pa dnga'i bung nga /

464a7(rgyud): ched stong du ltung ba yin//dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myos gyur pas//bdag gis myur du bsgral nas ni//gzugs kyis lha rnams mchod pa yin//khyekhyod kyis srung bar ma
464b1(rgyud): byed par//sdig can 'di ni myur du spongs//zhes brjod par bya'o//bstan pa srung ba'i bsam pa dang //snying rje chen po ldan pa yis//yongs pa med par byas gyur na//nges par

464b7(rgyud): rgyan pa//n+ya gro d+ha yi shing la brten//bi ni yo ka mnan par bsam//oM badz+ra ma hA kA lA k+ShaM k+Sha tA big+h+nAM bi nA ya kau ne hUM hU~M phaT d+hA hA//sha chen bsregs spros phul nas ni/
