465a2(rgyud): ma ya mA hA kA lA ya hUM phaT/sku'i mgon po'i sdigaso//oM ma hA kA lA gu Na hr-i daM hU~M phaT/yon tanA b+hi margan po'i sta p+na sau//oM badz+ra mA hA kA la rak+Sha ru dri b+hUShA ni hU~M phaT/
465a3(rgyud): gsung gi mgon po'i sngag so//oM badz+ra kr-iSh+Na tsaN+De mA tsa ya ma hA kI la tsi tA la hrIHdzid+d+ha las kyi mgon po'i sngagaso//oM badz+ra mu hA kA li he ni badz+ra hU~M phaT/yi ge bcu pa'i/
465a4(rgyud): g+hasang ba'i mgon po'i sngag so//oM nAN+De shA rI ye swA hA//ga tu mi po mo'i sngagaso//oM tsaN+Di kA ye swA hA//drage mo'i sngag so//oM ka lI kA ye swA hA//bzlog byed ma'i sngag so//
465a5(rgyud): AM ku li she shwa rI ye swA h+ne//dpa' mo'o swA ge si//i shrI ma hA kA la grA Ne mI tri dzaHbong 'dzin mi'i sngagaso//oM r+ye dan+ti ma hA kA li tI shU la sar+b+ba sha trUM dza/rtse gsum
465a6(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i sngag so//oM badz+ra ma hA kA la kro Te gar+b+he sA ya hU~M phaT/gir+b+ha 'dzin pa'i sngagaso//oM badz+ra ma hA kI la te tsi tsi ta ki ra mA r-i NAM hU~M phaT/rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'i
465a7(rgyud): sngag so//gseng ba bong 'dzin mgon po yi//lha mi yin gyi grong khyer ni//sum brtsegs la sogs khang bzeng rnams//khro bo can dan bing bsnams kyis//lha dmag bye
465b1(rgyud): ma ma thamamamams mamathamasams mamamathasamathas mamamam sa pas yas gzal mamam thal
465b2(rgyud): 'dud rgyur rnams//byung na sa sprug par mdzad pa 'o//maud khyer 'dum phrag bArgyu nu 'am//gnag byed bdud 'dul chen po ste/'di nyid gadzin panas lha man//kun tu byu /
465b3(rgyud): nas gaur stangs gnas//oM shrI ma hA kA la~M du be ma ni dza oM mu ru Ti /oM shrI ma~M hAk+Sha/dz+nyA ga~M /bi ni dzi/mA~M nag shigad+hI//mr-i shid+h+waM/che ge mo mA rA ya~M Ta/
465b4(rgyud): d+d+ha mahA kI la rak+ShadzA yak+Sha/ru drA sa mA ya/sair+b+ba sha d+hA ru ru tsi bo lA ya~M/mA rA Na chad rjod/ni rbang pu rlung du/tshal pa tshal pa ni sha~M ku ru sa~M ma ya/che ge mo btA bas
465b5(rgyud): /aung+gaM drAm+b+ham+b+hi r+m+ma m+b+ham+b+ha shaMd+d+ha/m+b+hi r-i yAM drAd /shaur+b+hut+thaya? g+h+rAN+Daya/m+b+ha l-i smai d+d+hak+Sh+ma nes hwAk+Sha pa yak+Sh+mI shrI s+thAn/A kA drin la
465b6(rgyud): mAr+ra ru mA mai b+h+yo/dzidzi dang/traM piM dza~Mkaha~M hrIh+na/tik+Shi pid+hi hUM/adz+rakati stA ma sh+yA mo s+yA/tir+m+ma Ting+ge shig/kun ta d+h+r-i shig drung sod/gar+b+he giN+Te 'dzin
465b7(rgyud): pA'i khri bo tshe//ma rungs klad pa 'dams par byed//tsa mr-iN+DI ldan rol pa ste//gdug pa 'dul ba'i las la shis//baT+wAM rtsa gsum 'dzin pas ni//dag bgegs lus dag
465b8(rgyud): yid la 'debs//gtum po thog 'bebs migo sbyar ma//sangs rgyas bstan pa skyid pa'o//gang du keng rus rgyal mtshan bsnams//bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs skrag byed/
466a1(rgyud): 'di tsI legs ldan rgyal po che//rdo rje bse gdong sna tshogs gdong //dkyil 'khor lha tshogs 'di dag gis//gsang sngags rim pas bstan pa'o///
466a2(rgyud): thun mong khyad par bye brag gis//lus kyi mtshan nyid rtags bcas pa//grub pa kun tu bgrod pa'o//dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'ibyung ba'i rgyud las dkyil 'khor
466a3(rgyud): ba'i mgon po dang yum dang bcas pa'i gsang sngags dang phrin las kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o////de nas bden pa tsam gyis ni//grub pa stsol bar mdzad pa'o//
466a4(rgyud): dngos grub 'byung gnas rim pa ni//yang dag nyid du bshad par bya//bya rog pa yang gzhis rgyan pa yi//nag po phyag bzhi pa yi sku//gsang zhing dum tshig ldan pas bri//
466a5(rgyud): de yis sku yi rten du bshang //gser dngul la sregs kyis bris pa'o//nag po chen po'i snying po dang //nye ba'i snying po bris pa rnams//gsung gi rten du 'dod pa'o//bye rog
466a6(rgyud): sogasra deng rta nog snying //khyi yi snying dang mi yi snying //rIn chen lnga dang bcas pa rnams//thugs kyi rten du bzung bar bya//snying gi rnam pa thams cad dang //nya sha la sogs
466a7(rgyud): 'bru yi chan//sman gyi rnam pa thams cad dang //bsnyen pa'i gtor me bya ba yin//rdzas dang rta gtor stong dang 'og/steng nas dar nag gur gyis dbug//sha lnga sman lnga myos
466b1(rgyud): 'onas//rgyun du thugs dam bskul phyur mchod//rta nan lug na g.yag rag la//mgul du spyod pa bras la gad nas/dab drang phyo/sa dul la//rgyu sa ston du bya bang /
466b2(rgyud): bshad//nag po ros sam der lA yang //rin chen lnga dang bcas pa yis//nab pa zhal gcig+sa phyag bzhi pa//bris pa nyin gcig gis rdzogs nas/bar tshad med par ro
466b3(rgyud): granas bye//gsang rten lus la bcing ba'o//sna tshogs 'bru nag dpal byas pa'i//gtor ma mi shes rgyun pa dge/pho brang rtan dang brten par bcas//nang gi rten du slob pa'o//
466b4(rgyud): skyes po phrer shi tha~Md phreng ni//yon tan ldan phyir d+hakrAt+ta s+thi//mi bsad motshan las byas pa yi//rdo rje gugats+tsha bris pa//phrin las byed pa'i khyud pUr//dam tshi ga gnas
466b5(rgyud): pi la rnal 'byor pa ste//nyams dka' dben po'o gnas nyi du//lha mo'i rten yang 'di ltar//rigs med kyi ni thod pa li//gsung sngags yi ge 'di dang ni//bris pa tsam gyis las
466b6(rgyud): 'grub byed//sgrub mi dgos pa rA nus pa 'byung //dur khrod sol bas sngags 'di bri//oM shrI dwe wi tsa muN+Da rak+ShA tsa mUr+t+ti/sr-i ka mor+Ya/d+hu ke saM ha saM te/mu khe ka rA ha ra/kI la
466b7(rgyud): kI li/phreM k+Sha ti ta sa na sa ta b+h+rUM b+h+rUM la la ta yai/kA pA lI mA lA d+ha ra Ni hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA//thod pa'i nang du 'khor bar bri//phye yi rten du bshad pa yin//bong bu neg mo'i
467a1(rgyud): das// ba d+hA sa s+ho rlung na rgyu du shud pa yon du rgyu snyu many+dzams pa/ts+tsha la na pa bzhag/gagang ba
467a2(rgyud): nade gzugs par /bla ma'i byed pa ji ril da//grI g+ha m+b+hi da kyi sa btu mis pa dang //dri bzang mtshan gyis bdug par b+he/de kho na nyid rten du ba shad//de nas
467a3(rgyud): hUM phyogs dag nas ni//gsum gyis khur nas 'ongs pa'i tshe//mi nag gsum gyis 'di skad brjod//sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid nan//rdo rje mgon pa 'khor
467a4(rgyud): bcas pa//rang bzhin gnas nas sku banongs la//'dir ni bstan skyed bzhug sugasol//len gre sum badz+rod nas bzhugs par bya//rol mo'i sgyu dang sgros dung
467a5(rgyud): dang //sna tshogs rol mos bsu nus kyang //phrin las gang 'grub rim shes bya//'di ni rang bzhin rten yin//dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud
467a6(rgyud): las/phyi nang gsung ba dang sku gsung thugs kyi rten gzugs pa'i le'u ste bco lta ba'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya//dang ldan nag po chen po yi//
467a7(rgyud): bka' mo tshogs kyis 'khor gyur pa//'di ni kun tu shes par bya//las kyi mgon po rnams dang ni//lha mo chen mo 'khor dang bcas//lha srin sde brgyad ma lus pa
467b1(rgyud): pan+d+ha mngag gzhan las byud pa//gzhan yang phyogs spyang bcu dang ni//klu tshon brgyad lta chen brgyad//bana' chen brgyad dang rgyal tshon pa'o//rgyu sgra shu rtsa brgyad du//
467b2(rgyud): gnod sbyin brgyad dang 'phrog ma'i bu//sha za dang ne ma mi dang //'jig rten pa dang drim tshig gnas//zhing skyong ma lus 'i khor dang bcas//'di dag las kun byed pa yi//
467b3(rgyud): 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcas pas//grub pa rab tu stsol mdzad pa//lha dang lha min mi 'am ci//lto 'phyo grul bum srul po dang //lus srul grib gnon skom byed sogs/
467b4(rgyud): na mkha' ldeng drang dri za dang //'byung phyi ma lus 'dus pa kun//'di dag sgrub la grogs byed cing //mthu stobs dpung dang nus pa yis//srung zhing bar chad nges par sA la//
467b5(rgyud): gcan 'dzin pa'i rwa hu la//'di la sogs pa thams cad lo//tshogs kyi gtor mas cher mchod na//dpal dang rdzu 'phrul myur du ster//'di dag 'khor dang bcas pa yi//nye dang
467b6(rgyud): mayin ma dang //rtabs dang tshe 'phrul du ma 'byung //sku gsung thugs kyi rtags dang ni//phyi nang gsang be rti gsuM gyur pa//dngos dang nyams snang rmi lam dang /sprul
467b7(rgyud): pa'i phrin las nges 'byung ba//gtso ba nyid dang 'khor rnams kyi//rom po rjesu 'brel par 'byung //rtags byung nas ni las la bskul//dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub
468a1(rgyud): 'byung ba'i rgyud las btso bo dang 'khor du bcas pa mchod par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o////de nas gzhan yang ba shad bya ba//dpa
468a2(rgyud): ldan mgon po chen po yi//thar po'i grong khyer nyams dga' bar//dbang bskur cho ga bshad par bya//'das ni bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs//de las rgyal bar byed pa yi///
468a3(rgyud): cho ga bzang po bla na med//dkyil 'khor bzang po bzhengs par bya//phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas dag tu//rgyud shes yang dag blo ma la//snod ldan dag pa'i slob
468a4(rgyud): ma yis//gsol ba lan gsum gdab byas la//maN+Dal me tog sngon 'gro yin//rdo rje 'dzin pa ma lus dang //rgyal ba mgon po ma lus ding //dbang phyug dam
468a5(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor dang //dbang bskur gnang bar mdzad du gsol//lan gsum brjod nas gnang gyur pas//dang po bsnyen pa brtsam par bya//mtshan ma nye bo 'am tshul
468a6(rgyud): shes nas//de nas sngon 'gro brtsam par bya//dang po bamigs rnams nyer zhi yi//phrin las mchod pa gtor ma yi//ye shes lha rnams mchod pa dang //lus de
468a7(rgyud): ngag dang yid kyis ni//sdig pa bral zhing bgegs dbyung ba'i//sngags dang bcas po'i yungs kar gyis//me sbar sreg dang bral bar bya//de rjes sa phyogs gtsang ma
468b1(rgyud): las//sa brtag pa dang sbyang bar bya//sa blangs nas ni bka' thob pas//brga zh-i dang lha ngasal bar bya//de nas srung zhing bcag par bya//rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhengs nas ni//
468b2(rgyud): gom pa'i gar sbubs kyis//hU~M hU~M drag po'i sgra brjod pas//phyogs kun bcing ba byas nas ni//bgegs lnga bka' bsgo gtor ma sbyin//slob ma kun la srung byas la//rdo rje
468b3(rgyud): mgon po chen po yi//ti de'i dzin du gnas pa la//gsol ba gdab pas gnang ba sbyin//khyad par bdud rtsi 'khyil bas bsrungs//yang dag ye shes sems dpa' che//'khor
468b4(rgyud): ba'i g.yul las kyal byed pa//rgyal ba ma lus bstan skyong che//de nas lhag par gnas pa brtsams//sa 'dzin lha mo nyid mchod pas//bka' byin nas ni thim par blta//
468b5(rgyud): bum pa bkra shis yang dag ldan//ma nyams mtshan nyid ldan pa lnga//kha tshor ma nyams ras zung dkri/snying po sman dang 'bru lnga sogs//spos dang rin chen dag gis dgang ///
468b6(rgyud): rgyun 'bab chu yis gang ba dang //'bras ldan shing gis kha rgyan pa'o//de nas srung ba'i 'khor lo yi//dka' yi khro bo rnam par sgom//dkyil 'khor dri yi thig le la//me tog
468b7(rgyud): gi tsal bkram lha rnams ni//bskyod cing mchod la gnyis med bstim//so shing dor dang ltas brtag pa//srung skud ku sha sbyin par bya//de nas sems bskyed sdom gnas
469a1(rgyud): ngas//dam tshu gA gsang basbyin par bya//khyad par ltal gas pa btab nas//rdul mtshon dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya//dang por ye shes thig gdab cing/
469a2(rgyud): phyi nang dam tshig nges par gdang//go rims ma nor nges po'i tshu'o//srad baM shes rab can thig gdab//tshon ni byin gyis brlabs nas kyang //pra brtag rdul chen rim par dbye/
469a3(rgyud): gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta babs bzhis ni mdzes pa yi//zlum bskor pho brang ling tshe dgu/dbus ma oM dbyibs drag po nyid//phyi rol pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa//lha khyams
469a4(rgyud): bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/'dod yon rin chen skyed bde dang //dri phyed be ku li yi phreng //yang na kha bad+mo mdzes pa'i rgyan//chos 'khor ri dgas gdugs dang bcas//
469a5(rgyud): thod skam pad+ma'i phreng bar ldan//dur khrod brgyad kyis yongasu 'khor//rdo rje me 'od 'bar byas 'khrigs//dam tshig ye shes gnyis med pa'i//gsang sngags nye ba sngags
469a6(rgyud): par gnas//bstan zhing mtsho la gsol ba gdag//nye bar rgyun cing yongasu bskor//de nas slob dpon bdag 'jug bya//sbyin sreg las ni rab tu shis//dpel mgon po chen
469a7(rgyud): po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor gsang bar byed pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o////de nas gzhan yang rnam bshad bya//yang
469b1(rgyud): nA ling tsho dgu ldan pa'o//pad+ma 'dab brgyad phyi rol du//mu khyud 'khor lo rim gsum la//oM dbyibs zhing skyong rim pa dgod//lha dang sa bon phyug mtshan ni//sku gsung thugs
469b2(rgyud): kyi phyag rgyas mtshan//slob me khrus byas rkyen btags te//maN+Dal me tog phyag bya zhing //ras kyis mig ni bkab nas su//dang por me tog dor bar bya//mtshan ma mthong bas
469b3(rgyud): legs par drang //sgo bzhi nas ni nong 'jug cing //gu gul bdug cing ting 'dzin gyis//nag po chen po'i lha tshogs kyang //nges par spyan drang bstim par bya//de las nges par
469b4(rgyud): rtags rnams byung //yang na so so'i mgon par bskyed//ye shes sems dpa' byin gyis brlab//bla ma dkyil 'khor gtso bcas las//'od 'phros rang byin rlabs par 'gyur///
469b5(rgyud): mthong ba dri dang bdud rtsis gtor//gdong g.yogs dkrol zhing lha ngo bstan//de nas dbang po'i bye brag gis//nges par rim pas dbang bskur te//bstan pa 'dzin cing
469b6(rgyud): bstan pa skyong //bstan pa srung bar byed pa yi//sangs rgyas bstan pa 'phel mdzad pa//sku yi mgon po 'khor bcas kyis//bla med dngos grub sbyin pa'i phyir//yang dag
469b7(rgyud): ye shes dbong bskur//sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang //phrin las lha yi khyad pa'o//mi long ye shes dbang nyid can//rdo rje rigs kyi mgon po yis//dkyil 'khor
470a1(rgyud): chen po'i nang du ni//zhe sdang dag pusa? dbang bsku ro//mnyam nyid so sor rtog pa dang //bya ba nan tan chos kyi dbyings//ye shes lnga yi ribs kyi gtsang //
470a2(rgyud): nges par dbang bskur brtan par bya//phrin les bzhi yi dbang yang bskur//lha mo brgyad kyis las rnams 'grub//bum pa spyi bor byin pa dang //thod pa'i bdud rtsi blugs/
470a3(rgyud): pa yis//gsang ba bde chen ye shes nyid//rang byung dri med dbang bskur ba'o//de rjes pa ling gtad pa yis//nus pa thogaso med sbyin byed yin//sku gsung thugs kyi
470a4(rgyud): gsang ba mchog/lha dang sngags kyi zab pa'i chos//ting 'dzin chen po'i phyag rgya che//'di nyid dngos grub kun gyi gter//zab cing rgya che'i don sgrub pa//skal ba can la
470a5(rgyud): sbyin par bya'o//he ru ka dang nag po che//bla ma tha dad mod pa la//tshogs kyi 'khor los legs mchod cing //zhabs khyAg tugs la smon lam btag//'di ni thob par
470a6(rgyud): the tshom med//phrin las kun tu grub ster byed//dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlabs pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o///
470a7(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//dpa ldan mgon po de nyid kyi//phyogs bzhi yongasu skyong ba yi//rgyal po chen po rnam pa bzhi//shar phyogs nas ni yul 'khor srung //lho//
470b1(rgyud): phyogs nas ni 'phags skyes pa//nub phyogs nas ni spyan mi bzang //byang phyogs nas ni rnam thos sus//stangs rgyas bstan pa srung byed pa//'di nyid grub pa ster byed pa'o//rab tu dpon
470b2(rgyud): zhing gtsang ba dang //bkra shes nyim so dga'i sa gas//rnam thos sros ni bsgrub par b+h+ya/sA ga ni bri mi s+t+rI byas byug+sa/dri bzeng tsan dan dkar da mar dang //mr-i kA ru dang dA ru rmA/
470b3(rgyud): kha che gi wang sna tshogs sman//sreg cing tshogs po'i sman du bya//maN+Dal gru bzhi madra' gang ba//dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi rta babs dang //rin chen khang pa yid 'ong ba//pho brang ran
470b4(rgyud): chen las grub pa//sna tshogs pad+ma rin chen gling //gter dang dpag bsam ljon shing bcas//ka pa stong phrag du ma yis//rab tu rgyas shing yongasu bskor//lte ba rin chen mu khyud
470b5(rgyud): lad lha mo brgyad kyis yongasu bskor//bar me lha khyams mdzes pa la//gnod sbyin chen po brgyad kyis bskor//phyi mA ra bas bskor ba la//klu chen brgyad kyis yongasu bskor//
470b6(rgyud): sgo bzhir gnod sbyin bzhi bkod pa//dbusu rin chen seng ge'i khri//sna tshogs pad+ma ga sar bcas//de dbus rmya ba dar gyi gdan//de la sku gsung thugs kyi gnas//sa bAn phyeg
470b7(rgyud): mtshan sku dgang bye//sna tshogs mchod pas yongs bskor te//'bras dang bro dang 'bru sna la//gtor ma shin tu bzang bar bsham//khyad par me tog sna tshogs ni//nig ge
471a1(rgyud): sar Ta mu d+ya//pun ta ka ba ba ku lo//par shi ka dang nAm pa ka/d+hA ruH/rI ma lau ka/su tr-i ka dang ung+ga la//pad+ma man d+hA ra ba dang //daN+Dod pa la sogs pa'o/
471a2(rgyud): sna tshogs chu dang sreg spos tshegs//gu gul khyed par bsreg par bya//ka ra bu ram sbrang rtsi dang //khur ba 'bras chen zhun mar ding //zhil zas bye brag thams cad dang // de/
471a3(rgyud): ges la mar me byug pa dang //s+thi snyan sna tshogs mchod pa'i rdzas//gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang //'phen dang bla raM lA sogs pa//sna tshogs der gyi lda ldi dang //
471a4(rgyud): ltar bkod pa legs rgyan nus//bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas kyang //ri de lhur bskyod bya'i sa bon las//'od 'phros mdun gyi dkyil 'khor la//rab tu 'phros pas 'dzi
471a5(rgyud): 'bar//de las dbusu rgyal chen ni//sku mdog gur gum mdog 'dra ba//rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan//seng gego'i khri la legs bzhugs pa'i//phyag g.yas
471a6(rgyud): bzhin nor bu ste//rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyal mtshan can//g.yon pa ne'u le'u snod can las//kha nas rin chen skyug par bsam//gnod gnas dbang po gang ba bzang //nor
471a7(rgyud): bu bzang dang rta yi bdag/yang dag shes dang 'brog gnas dang //lnga rtsen po tsi kuN+Da li//sna tshogs rgyan dang phyag mtshan bcas//re re'ang du mas yongs bskor na sa//
471b1(rgyud): shin tu gsal ni tan par byasam//de nas sa bon las 'phros te//rang bzhin granas nas spyan drangs la//mchod rjod bstod de gnyis mod bsgom//khyad par gsol pa gdab
471b2(rgyud): byar bya//rgyal ba mgon po 'khor bcas pa'i//lcid 'ong khang bzang po brang 'di//yid bzhin nor bu'i char da bebs pa'i//rnyed chen gter gyi dngos grub gsol//oM baM swA hA/
471b3(rgyud): oM baM shra ma NA yA swAhAM/oM dzam+b+ha lA ya swAhA/A~M pUd+b+ha b+hU drA ya swA hA/oM mA Ni b+hA drA ya swA hA/oM ku be rA ya swAhA/oM saM pra dz+nyA nA ya swAhA/oM gu N+ya d+ha nA ya swA hA//oM hA
471b4(rgyud): tsi kA ya swA hA/oM paM nAM kuN+Da lA ya swA hA/dang po lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ste//gnyis pa rin chen 'bar ba nyid//gsum pa kun nas bstod par bya//de nas gtor mi dbul bar bya//
471b5(rgyud): gsal ba btab nas phrin las bco la//de nas ye shes gshogasu gsol//drir gnas pa ni bzhugs par bya//phye rten nang rten khyad par po//rim pa 'khor lo sngags dang bcas
471b6(rgyud): sI mi mthong bar spras te bcang //khyad par rtags ni gsal bur 'byung //nye ba'i mtshan ma nges mthong nas//dngos grub blang zhing gter mo dbul//sbyin sreg las kyis myur du
471b7(rgyud): 'grub//gsang sngags 'bum phrag bcu yis ni//'bras bu yid la 'dod kun 'grub//kha skong me yi mchod pa bya//gtor ma chen po dang bcas pas//len bdun nye ba basbyin/
472a1(rgyud): pas 'grub//'di ni lha rnams kun gyi gtor//sgrub pa po lnga stsol bar mdzad//dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las khyad par du
472a2(rgyud): 'phags pa rnam thos sras gnod sbyin chen po brgyad dang bcas pa sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshang bya ba//'phags pa chen po de
472a3(rgyud): nyid la//klu chen brgyad kyis yongs bskor ba//rim pa 'di ni bstan par bya//khyad par sa bcu'i dbang phyug che//dang ldan thugs rje'i bdag po nyid//zhal gcig phyag

478b6(rgyud): nas sa blangs te gzugs brnyan byas la gnas kyi sar rus pa'i phur bus btab ni ni 'o na bA dang ldong ba dang yan lag nyams pa dung lpags par 'gyur te/klu gnas pa'i
